aṃśavastava niśākara nūnaṃ kalpitāstaruṇaketakakhaṇḍaiḥ / yena pāṇḍurataradyutayo naḥ kaṇṭakairiva tudanti śarīram // 1	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
aṃśukaṃ hṛtavatā tanubāhu- svastikāpihitamugdhakucāgrā / bhinnaśaṅkhavalayaṃ pariṇetrā paryarambhi rabhasādaciroḍhā // 2	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
aṃśukamiva śītabhayāt saṃstyānatvacchalena himadhavalam / ambhobhirapi gṛhītaṃ paśyata śiśirasya māhātmyam // 3	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṃśukena jaghanaṃ tirodadhe ka cukena ca kucau mṛgīdṛśām / pīyamānamaniśaṃ priyekṣaṇaiḥ kṣāmatāmiva jagāma madhyamam // 4	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: snrlg], rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
aṃśupāṇibhiratīva pipāsuḥ padmajaṃ madhu bhṛśaṃ rasayitvā / kṣībatāmiva gataḥ kṣitimeṣyaṃl lohitaṃ vapuruvāha pataṅgaḥ // 5	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
aṃśumānapi vipākapiśaṅgaṃ rūpamāpa parito divasānte / kaḥ paro'tra na vikāramupeyād dhvāntabhīmaparivellitamūrtiḥ // 6	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
aṃśo daṇḍasamaḥ pūrvaḥ prayāsasama uttamaḥ / vilopo vā yathālābhaṃ prakṣepasama eva vā // 7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṃśo'pi duṣṭadiṣṭānāṃ pareṣāṃ syād vināśakṛt / bālaleśo'pi vyāghrāṇāṃ yat syāj jīvitahānaye // 8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṃsāvavaṣṭabdhanatā samādhiḥ śirodharāyā rahitaprayāsaḥ / dhṛtā vikārāṃstyajatā mukhena prasādalakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya // 9	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṃsālambitavāmakuṇḍaladharaṃ mandonnatabhrūlataṃ kiṃcit kuñcitakomalādharapuṭaṃ sāciprasārīkṣaṇam / alolāṅgulipallavairmuralikāmāpūrayantaṃ mudā mūle kalpatarostribhaṅgalalitaṃ dhyāye jaganmohanam // 10	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṃsāsaktakapolavaṃśavadanavyāsaktabimbādhara-dvandvodīritamandamandapavanprārabdhamugdhadhvaniḥ / īṣadvakrimalolahāranikaraḥ pratyekarokānana-nyañcaccañcadudañcadaṅgulicayastvāṃ pātu rādhādhavaḥ // 11	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṃsena karṇaṃ cibukena vakṣaḥ karadvayenākṣi tirodadhānām / saṃtāḍayāmāsa hariḥ sametya cakoranetrāṃ calukodakena // 12	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṃhaḥ saṃharadakhilaṃ sakṛdudayādeva sakalalokasya / taraṇiriva timirajaladhiṃ jayati jaganmaṅgalaṃ harernāma // 13	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
akaṇṭakā puṣpamahī veśayoṣidamātṛkā / mantrihīnā ca rājyaśrīr bhujyate viṭaceṭakaiḥ // 14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe kathaṃ puṣpamālā vinā nāsikāyāḥ kathaṃ dhūpagandhaḥ / akarṇasya karṇe kathaṃ gītanṛtyam apādasya pāde kathaṃ me praṇāmaḥ // 15	bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy]
akaparddakasya viphalaṃ januriti jānīmahe maheśo'pi / śirasi kṛtena kaparddī bhavati jaṭājūṭakenāpi // 16	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akaravamadhimauli pādapadmāv apanaya mānini mānitāmakāṇḍe / yadi pararamaṇīṃ gatastadātha stanayugaliṅgayugaṃ sprśāmi tanvi // 17	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: nnry] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
akaruṇa kātaramanasā darśitanīrā nirantarāleyam / tvāmanudhāvati vimukhaṃ gaṅgeva bhagīrathaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ // 18	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akaruṇatvamakāraṇavigrahaḥ paradhanāpahṛtiḥ parayoṣitaḥ / svajanabandhujaneṣvasahiṣṇutā prakṛtisidhamidaṃ hi durātmanām // 19	drutavilambita [12: nBBr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
akaruṇa mṛṣābhāśāsindho vimuñca mamāñcalaṃ tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅmayetyabhidhāyinīm / aviralagaladvāṣpāṃ tanvīṃ nirastavibhūṣaṇāṃ ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet // 20	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
akaroḥ kimu netraśoṇimānaṃ kimakārṣīḥ karapallavāvarodham / kalahaṃ kimadhāḥ krudhā rasajñe hitamarthaṃ na vidanti daivadaṣṭāḥ // 21	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
akarṇamakaroccheṣaṃ vidhirbrahmāṇḍabhaṅgadhīḥ / śrutvā rāmakathāṃ ramyāṃ śiraḥ kasya na kampate // 22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akarṇadhārāśugasaṃbhṛtāṅgatāṃ gatairaritreṇa vināsya vairibhiḥ / vidhāya yāvattaraṇerbhidāmaho nimajjya tīrṇaḥ samare bhavārṇavaḥ // 23	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi / kartavyameva kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // 24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akartavyeṣvasādhvīva tṛṣṇā prerayate janam / tameva sarvapāpebhyo lajjā māteva rakṣati // 25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akarmaṇāṃ vai bhūtānāṃ vṛttiḥ syān na hi kācana / tadevābhriprapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃcana // 26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akarmaśīlaṃ ca mahāśanaṃ ca lokadviṣṭaṃ bahumāyaṃ nṛśaṃsam / adeśakālajñamaniṣṭaveṣam etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta // 27	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
akalaṅkacandrakalayā kalitā sā bhāti vāruṇī taruṇī / bhālasthalīva śambhoḥ saṃdhyādhyānopaviṣṭasya // 28	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akalaṅkāntike kāntiḥ keti kālaṅkalaṅkinaḥ / aruṇe taruṇe masyā dhāvaṃ kāmayate śaśī // 29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akalaṅkā pulakavatī sasnehā muktakañcukī śyāmā / patatu tavorasi dayitā khaṅgalatā vairiṇaḥ śirasi // 30	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akalaṅko dṛḍhaḥ śuddhaḥ parivārī guṇānvitaḥ / sadvaṃśo hṛdayagrāhī khaṅgaḥ susadṛśastava // 31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akalitanijapararūpaḥ svakamapi doṣaṃ parasthitaṃ vetti / nāvāsthitastaṭasthān acalānapi vicalitān manute // 32	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akaliyugamakharvamatra hṛdyaṃ vyacaradapāpaghano yataḥ kuṭumbī / mama ruciriha lakṣmaṇāgrajena prabhavati śarmadaśāsyamardena // 33	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: nnry] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
akalilatapastejovīryaprathimni yaśonidhā- vavitathamadadhmāte roṣānmunāvabhidhāvati / abhinavadhanurvidyādarpakṣamāya ca karmaṇe sphurati rabhasāt pāṇiḥ pādopasaṃgrahaṇāya ca // 34	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
akalpaḥ svāṅgaceṣṭāyāṃ śakunta iva pañjare / anucchvasansmaran pūrvaṃ garbhe kiṃ nāma vindate // 35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇāṃ akasmāccāpakarṣaṇam / śubhāśubhe mahattvaṃ ca prakartuṃ buddhilāghavāt // 36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādapi yaḥ kaścid arthaṃ prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ / taṃ haṭheneti manyante sa hi yatno na kasyacit // 37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādunmatta praharasi kimadhvakṣitiruhaṃ hradaṃ hastāghātairvidalasi kimutphullanalinam / tadā jānīmaste karivara balodgāramasamaṃ saṭāṃ suptasyāpi spṛśasi yadi pañcānanaśiśoḥ // 38	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akasmādekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmunataṭaṃ vrajantyā dṛṣṭo'yaṃ navajaladharaśyāmalatanuḥ / sa dṛgbhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛhakṛtye na lagate // 39	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akasmādeva kupyanti prasīdantyanimittataḥ / śīlametadasādhūnām abhraṃ pāriplavaṃ yathā // 40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādeva tanvaṅgī jahāsa yadiyaṃ punaḥ / nūnaṃ prasūnabāṇo'syāṃ svārājyamadhitiṣṭhati // 41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādeva te caṇḍi sphuritādharapallavam / mukhaṃ muktāruco dhatte gharmāmbhaḥkaṇamañjarīḥ // 42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādeva yaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ bahu bhāṣate / tasmādudvijate lokaḥ sasphuliṅgādivānalāt // 43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmāddveṣṭi yo bhaktam ājanmaparisevitam / na vyañjane ruciryasya tyājyo nṛpa ivāturaḥ // 44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāṇḍakopino bhartur anyāsakteśca yoṣitaḥ / praśāntiścetasaḥ kartuṃ brahmaṇāpi na śakyate // 45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāṇḍadhrtamānasavyavasitotsavaiḥ sārasair akāṇdapaṭutāṇḍavairapi śikhaṇḍināṃ maṇḍalaiḥ / diśaḥ samavalokitāḥ sarasanirbharaprollasad- bhavatpṛthuvarūthinīrajanibhūrajaḥśyāmalāḥ // 46	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
akāṇḍapātajātānām astrāṇāṃ marmabhedinām / gāḍhaśokaprahārāṇām acintaiva mahauṣadham // 47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāṇḍe vakṣojaskhalitavasanavyāpṛtakaraṃ mṛṣā jṛmbhārambhonnamitabhujabandhonnatakucam / vṛthā yātāyātaiḥ kapaṭakalitānyonyahasitaṃ harantyetāścittānyahaha jagatāṃ vāravanitāḥ // 48	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate neha kaṛhicit / yadyaddhi kurute kiṃcit tattat kāmasya ceṣṭitam // 49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
akāmāṃ kāmayānasya śarīramupatapyate / icchantīṃ kāmayānasya prītirbhavati śobhanā // 50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāmān kāmayati yaḥ kāmayānān paridviṣan / balavantaṃ ca yo dveṣṭi tamāhurmūḍhacetasam // 51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāraṇaṃ rūpamakāraṇaṃ kulaṃ mahatsu nīceṣu ca karma śobhate / idaṃ hi rūpaṃ paribhutapūrvakaṃ tadeva bhūyo bahumānamāgataṃ // 52	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
akāraṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tantrīśabdo'pyakāraṇam / akāraṇaṃ trayo vedās taṇḍulāstatra kāraṇam // 53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāraṇāviṣkṛtakopadāruṇāt khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate / viṣaṃ mahāheriva yasya durvacaḥ suduḥsahaṃ saṃnihitaṃ sadā mukhe // 54	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
akāraṇena viprebhyo yaḥ kupyati narādhipaḥ / krṣṇasarpaṃ sa gṛhṇāti śirasā baladaṛpitaḥ // 55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
akāryakaraṇādbhītaḥ kāryāṇāṃ ca vivarjanāt / akāle mantrabhedācca yena mādyenna tat pibet // 56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāryapratiṣedhaśca kāryāṇāṃ ca pravartanam / pradānaṃ ca pradeyānām adeyānāmasaṃgrahaḥ // 57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāryamasakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hyadhanā narāḥ / dhanayuktāstvadharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥ // 58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāryāṇyapi paryāpya kṛtvāpiṃ vṛjinārjanaṃ / vidhīyate hitaṃ yasya sa dehaḥ kasya susthiraḥ // 59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akārye tathyo vā bhavati vitathaḥ kāmamathavā tathāpyuccairdhāmnāṃ harati mahimānaṃ janaravaḥ / tulottīrṇasyāpi prakaṭanihatāśeṣatamaso ravestādṛktejo na hi bhavati kanyāṃ gata iti // 60	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akālacaryā viṣamā ca goṣṭhī kumitrasevā na kadāpi kāryā / paśyāṇḍajaṃ padmavane prasuptaṃ dhanurvimuktena śareṇa bhinnam // 61	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
akālajaladendoḥ sā hṛdyā vadanacandrikā / nityaṃ kavicakorairyā pīyate na ca hīyate // 62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akālajaladaślokaiś citramātmakṛtairiva / jātaḥ kādambarīrāmo nāṭake pravaraḥ kaviḥ // 63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akālajaladacchannam ālokya ravimaṇḍalam / cakravākayugaṃ rauti rajanībhayaśaṅkayā // 64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akālamṛtyuṃ parihṛtya jīvitaṃ dadāti yo dehasukhaṃ ca dehinām / natena dhātrāsti samaḥ kuto'dhiko na jīvitāddānamihātiricyate // 65	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
akālamṛtyurviśvāso viśvasan hi vipadyate / yasmin karoti viśvāsaṃ sa jīvatyaparo mṛtaḥ // 66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akālasahamatyalpaṃ mūrkhavyasanināyakam / aguptaṃ bhīruyodhaṃ ca durgavyasanamucyate // 67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akālasainyayuktastu hanyate kālayodhinā / kauśikena hatajyotir niśītha iva vāyasaḥ // 68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāle kṛtyamārabdhaṃ kaṛtuṃ nārthāya kalpate / tadeva kāla ārabdhaṃ mahate'rthāya kalpate // 69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
akāle garjite deve durdinaṃ vāthavā bhavet / pūrvakāṇḍahataṃ lakṣyam anadhyāyaṃ pracakṣate // 70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akiṃcanaḥ paripatan sukhamāsvādayiṣyasi / akiṃcanaḥ sukhaṃ śete samuttiṣṭhati caiva hi // 71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akiṃcanatvaṃ rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayat / akiṃcanatvamadhikaṃ rājyādapi jitātmanaḥ // 72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
akiṃcanasya dāntasya śāntasya samacetasaḥ / mayā saṃtuṣṭamanasaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ // 73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
akiṃcanasya śuddhasya upapannasya sarvaśaḥ / avekṣamāṇastrīṃllokān na tulyamupalakṣaye // 74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
akiṃcanāśca dṛśyante puruṣāścirajīvinaḥ / samṛddhe ca kule jātā vinaśyanti pataṃgavat // 75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akiṃcitkāriṇāṃ dīnair ākṛṣṭaguṇakarmaṇām / aghāya gatasattvānāṃ darśanasparśanādikam // 76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te'vyayām / saṃbhāvitasya cākīrtir maraṇādatiricyate // 77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akīrtiryasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasyacit / patatyevādhamāṃllokān yāvacchabdaḥ prakīrtyate // 78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akīrtirnindyate devaiḥ kīrtirlokeṣu pūjyate / kīrtyarthaṃ tu samārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ sumahātmanām // 79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akīrteḥ kāraṇaṃ yoṣid yoṣidvairasya kāraṇam / saṃsārakāraṇaṃ yoṣid yoṣitaṃ varjayettataḥ // 80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akuṇṭhotkaṇṭhayā pūrṇam akaṇṭhaṃ kalakaṇṭhi mām / kambukaṇṭhyāḥ kṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhe kuru kaṇṭhārtimuddhara // 81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akuberapurīvilokanaṃ na dharāsūnukaraṃ kadācana / atha tatpratikārahetave- 'damayantīpatilocanaṃ bhaja // 82	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
akurvanto'pi pāpāni śucayaḥ pāpasaṃśrayāt / parapāpairvinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā // 83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akulānāṃ kule bhāvaṃ kulīnānāṃ kulakṣayam / saṃyogaṃ viprayogaṃ ca paśyanti cirajīvinaḥ // 84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akulīnaḥ kulīnaśca maryādāṃ yo na laṅghayet / dharmāpekṣī mṛdurdāntaḥ sa kulīnaśatairvaraḥ // 85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akulīnastu puruṣaḥ prakṛtaḥ sādhusaṃkṣayāt / durlabhaiśvaryasaṃprāpto garvitaḥ śatrutāṃ vrajet // 86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akulīno'pi mūrkho'pi bhūpālaṃ yo'tra sevate / api saṃmānahīno'pi sa sarvatra prapūjyate // 87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akule patito rājā mūrkhaputro hi paṇḍitaḥ / nirdhanasya dhanaprāptis tṛṇavanmanyate jagat // 88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akūpārād vāri pracurataramādāya jaladaḥ sa dānādhyakṣo'pi prakirati jalaṃ nādbhutamidam / sa megho dhanyo yat parikirati muktāphalatayā yadīyāsau kīrtirnaṭati nṛpanārīkucataṭe // 89	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akūrcārambho'pi praticubukadeśaṃ karatalaṃ pratijñāyāṃ kurvan yuvatiṣu dṛśaṃ snigdhataralāṃ / kumāro'haṃ kārāt pariṣadi samānānagaṇayan bhujau vakṣaḥ paśyannavavayasi kāntiṃ vitanute // 90	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akṛtakavalārambhairvaktrairbhayasthagitekṣaṇāḥ kimapi valitagrīvaṃ sthitvā muhurmṛgapaṅktayaḥ / gaganamasakṛtpaśyantyetāstathāśrughanairmukhair nipatati yathā śṛṅgāgrebhyo'kramaṃ nayanodakam // 91	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
akṛtajñamanāryaṃ ca dīrgharoṣamanārjavam / caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñ jātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // 92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtatyāgamahimnāṃ mithyā kiṃ rājarājaśabdena / goptāraṃ na nidhīnāṃ mahayanti maheśvaraṃ vibudhāḥ // 93	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṛtadviṣadunnaticchidaḥ śritasaṃrakṣaṇavandhyakarmaṇaḥ / puruṣasya nirarthakaḥ karaḥ kila kaṇḍūyanamātrasārthakaḥ // 94	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
akṛtapremaiva varaṃ na punaḥ saṃjātavighaṭitapremā / uddhṛtanayanastāmyati yathā hi na tatheha jātāndhaḥ // 95	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṛta viśadadhāmno bimbasāraṃ gṛhītvā dayita yuvativaktraṃ lokadhātreti vidmaḥ / na hi na hi bhavadīyo moha evaiṣa mitra sitagaralanidhānaṃ tattvato niścinu tvam // 96	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
akṛtasyāgamo nāsti kṛte nāśo na vidyate / akasmādeva loko'yaṃ tṛṣṇe dāsīkṛtastvayā // 97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtātmānamāsādya rājānamanaye ratam / samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // 98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛte'pyudyame puṃsām anyajanmakṛtaṃ phalam / śubhāśubhaṃ samabhyeti vidhinā saṃniyojitam // 99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛteṣvevakāryeṣu mṛtyurvai saṃprakarṣati / yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam // 100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahānapi na pūjyate / pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāgaghātinam // 101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtayaṃ naiva kṛtyaṃ syāt prāṇatyāge'pyupasthite / na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtayaṃ manyate kṛtayaṃ agamyaṃ manyate sugam / abhakṣyaṃ manyate bhakṣyaṃ strīvākyaprerito naraḥ // 103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtrimapremarasā vilāsālasagāminī / asāre dagdhasaṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā // 104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtrimavilāsāṅkam aśikṣitakalākramam / avibhāgāṅgasubhagaṃ babhūva surataṃ tayoḥ // 105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
akṛtvā karma yo loke phalaṃ vindati viṣṭitaḥ / sa tu vaktavyatāṃ yāti dveṣyo bhavati prāyaśaḥ // 106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
akṛtvā nijadeśasya rakṣāṃ yo vijigīṣate / sa nṛpaḥ paridhānena vṛtamauliḥ pumāniva // 107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtvā parasaṃtāpam agatvā khalanamratām / anutsṛjya satāṃ vartma yat svalpamapi tad bahu // 108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtvā pauruṣaṃ yā śrīḥ kiṃ tayālasabhāgyayā / kuraṅgo'pi samaśnāti daivādupanataṃ tṛṇam // 109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtvā mānuṣaṃ karma yo daivamanuvartate / vṛthā śrāmyati saṃprāpya patiṃ klībamivāṅganā // 110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛtvā helayā pādam uccairmūrdhasu vidviṣām / kathaṃkāramanālambā kīrtirdyāmadhirohati // 111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṛpaṇamaśaṭhamacapalaṃ yoginamaviṣādinaṃ budhaṃ śūram / yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā bhavati // 112	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṛśaṃ kucayoḥ kṛśaṃ valagne vitataṃ cakṣuṣi vistṛtaṃ nitambe / aruṇādharamāvirastu citte karuṇāśāli kapālibhāgadheyam // 113	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
akṛśaṃ nitambabhāge kṣāmaṃ madhye samunnataṃ kucayoḥ / atyāyataṃ nayanayor mama jīvitametadāyāti // 114	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṛṣṭaphalamūlena vanavāsarataḥ sadā / kurute'harahaḥ śrāddham ṛṣirvipraḥ sa ucyate // 115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akekī kiṃ kekī vacasi caturaḥ kinna kuraraḥ śukaḥ kiṃvā mūkaḥ sa ca kalaravaḥ kiṃ kṣataravaḥ / tvayāgaṇyaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pikamadhurimā dhīragarimā yato labdhaḥ stabdhaḥ kimasi ruciraṃ neha suciram // 116	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
akausumī manmathacāpayaśṭi- ranaṃśukā vibhramavaijayantī / lalāṭaraṅgāṅgaṇanartakīyam anañjanā bhrūranuyāti dṛṣṭam // 117	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
akratvaṅgamatastakraṃ na śatakratunā hutam / nādattamiti vākyārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham // 118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akratvarthamiti jñātvā śakre na hutavān purā / nādattamiti śāstrārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham // 119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrameṇānupāyena karmārambho na sidhyati / dadhisarpiḥpayāṃsīva śabarasya yathā hi goḥ // 120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhaṃ śikṣayantyanyaiḥ krodhanā ye tapodhanāḥ / nirdhanāste dhanāyaiva dhātuvādopadeśinaḥ // 121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas tathā titikṣuratitikṣorviśiṣṭaḥ / amānuṣebhyomānuṣāśca pradhānā vidvāṃstathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ // 122	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: jByy], ajñātam [11: jmylg], ajñātam [12: mysy], ajñātam [11: tttgl]
akrodhanaḥ satyavādī bhūtānāmavihiṃsakaḥ / anasūyaḥ sadācāro dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt // 123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhanaśca rājendra satyaśīlo dṛḍhavrataḥ / ātmopamaśca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalamaśnute // 124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhavairāgyajitendriyatvaṃ kṣamādayāśāntijanapriyatvam / nirlobhadātā bhayaśokahārī jñānasya cihnaṃ bhayalakṣaṇāni // 125	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
akrodhasya yadā krodhaḥ sarvanāśāya kalpate / rāghavasya prakopena baddho nadanadīpatiḥ // 126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet / jayet kadaryaṃ dānena jayet satyena cānṛtam // 127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aklāntadyutibhirvasantakusumairuttaṃsayan kuntalān antaḥ khelati khañjarīṭanayane kuñjeṣu kañjekṣaṇaḥ / asmanmandirakarmatastava karau nādyāpi viśrāmyataḥ kiṃ brūmo rasikāgraṇīrasi ghaṭī neyaṃ vilambakṣamā // 128	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
akliṣṭabālatarupallavalobhanīyaṃ pītaṃ mayā sadayameva ratotsaveṣu / bimbādharaṃ daśasi ced bhramara priyāyās tvāṃ kārayāmi kamalodarabandhanastham // 129	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
akleśādiva cintitam upatiṣṭhati siddhameva puṇyavatām / uḍḍīyāpuṇyavatāṃ gacchanti kapotakāḥ paśya // 130	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṣatrārikṛtābhimanyunidhanaprodbhūtatīvrabhruvaḥ pārthasyākṛta śātravapratikṛterantaḥ śucā muhyataḥ / kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti vaktrādbahiḥ // 131	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
akṣadevanapaṇīkṛtedhare kāntayorjayaparājaye sati / atra vaktu yadi vetti manmathaḥ kastayorjayati jīyate'pi vā // 132	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
akṣadyūtajitādharagrahavidhāvīśo'si tatkhaṇḍanā- dādhikye vada ko bhavāniti mṛṣā kopāñcitabhrū latam / svidyatkhinnakarā /grakuḍma/ laparāyattīkṛtāsyasya me mugdhākṣīpratikṛtya tat kṛtavatī dyūte'pi yannārjitam // 133	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
akṣamaḥ kṣamatāmāno kriyāyāṃ yaḥ pravartate / sa hi hāsyāspadatvaṃ ca labhate prāṇasaṃśayam // 134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣamālāpavṛttijñā kuśāsanaparigrahā / brāhmīva daurjanī saṃsad vandanīyā samekhalā // 135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣamā hrīparityāgaḥ śrīnāśo dharmasaṃkṣayaḥ / abhidhyāprājñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartate // 136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣamo'satyasaṃdhaśca paradārī nṛśaṃsakṛt / pacyate narakeṣveva dahyamānaḥ svakarmaṇā // 137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣaradvayamabhyastaṃ nāsti nāstīti yat purā / tadidaṃ dehi dehīti viparītamupasthitam // 138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣaramaitrībhājaḥ sālaṃkārasya cāruvṛttasya / kiṃ brūmo sakhi yūno na hi na hi sakhi padyabandhasya // 139	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
akṣarāṇāmakāro'ham iti viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ bruvan / bhavatā so'pi yat satyam ākāreṇa laghūkṛtaḥ // 140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣarāṇi parīkṣyantām ambarāḍambareṇa kim / śaṃbhurambarahīno'pi sarvajñaḥ kiṃ na jāyate // 141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣarāṇi vicitrāṇi yena jānanti mānavāḥ / balīvardasamāste tu khuraśṛṅgavivarjitāḥ // 142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣarāṇi samānāni vartulāni ghanāni ca / parasparavilagnāni taruṇīkucakumbhavat // 143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣipakṣma kadā luptaṃ chidyante hi śiroruhāḥ / vardhamānātmanāmeva bhavanti hi vipattayaḥ // 144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaśārābhyām asyāḥ karṇau na bādhitau / śaṅke kanakatāḍaṅkapāśatrāsavaśādiva // 145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣīṇakarmabandhastu jñātvā mṛtyumupasthitam / uktvāntikāle saṃsmṛtya punaryogitvamṛcchati // 146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
akṣīṇabhogādviṣamād iṣṭāniṣṭabhayojjhitāt / durjanādvata devā apy aśaktā iva bibhyati // 147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣetre bījamutsṛṣṭam antareva vinaśyati / abījakamapi kṣetraṃ kevalaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ bhavet // 148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca strīṣu pāne vṛthāṭane / nidrāyāṃ ca nibandhena kṣipraṃ naśyati bhūpatiḥ // 149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣeṣviyaṃ vyasanitā hṛdaye yadete rāgo ghano madhumadotkaṭamānanaṃ ca / padmastathāpi paramāspadameva lakṣmyās taddainyameva kila durbhagatā yadebhiḥ // 150	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
akṣoṭhaśuṇṭhimaricārdrakadāḍimatvak kustumburūlavaṇatailasusaṃskṛtān yaḥ / matsyān suśītasitabhaktatale dadhāti sa brahmalokamadhigacchati puṇyakarmā // 151	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
akṣaure'pi ca nakṣatre kurvīta budhasomayoḥ / yukte'pi tithinakṣatre na kuryācchanibhaumayoḥ // 152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣauhiṇī ripuṃ hanyāt svayaṃ vā tena hanyate / brāhmaṇo mantraviddhanyāt sarvāneva ripūn kṣaṇāt // 153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣṇornikṣipadañjanaṃ śravaṇayostāpiñchagucchāvalīṃ mūrdhni śyāmasarojadāma kucayoḥ kastūrikāpatrakam / dhūrtānāmabhisārasaṃbhramajuṣāṃ viṣvaṅnikuñje sakhi dhvāntaṃ nīlanicolacāru sudṛśāṃ pratyaṅgamāliṅgati // 154	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
akṣṇormañjulamañjanaṃ caraṇayornīlāśmajau nūpurā- vaṅge nīlapaṭaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛgamadanyāsaḥ kapolasthale / yatprītyā pariśīlitaṃ paradṛśāṃ rodhāya tatsāṃprataṃ nepathyasya vidhāvapīdamasatījātasya jātaṃ tamaḥ // 155	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
akṣṇoryugmaṃ vilokānmṛdutanuguṇatastarpayantī śarīraṃ divyāmodena vaktrādapagatamarutā nāsikāṃ cāruvācā / śrotradvaṃdvaṃ manojñādrasanamapi rasādarpayantī mukhābjaṃ yadvatpañcākṣasaukhyaṃ vitarati yuvatiḥ kāmināṃ nānyadevaṃ // 156	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
akṣṇorvipakṣa iti sānuśayaṃ lulāva nīlotpalaṃ yadabalā kalamasya goptrī / bhūyastadeva śirasāvahadunnatānāṃ vairaṃ virodhiṣu dṛḍhaṃ na parājiteṣu // 157	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ śrīmān paśyaiṣa pṛthivīpatiḥ / na niśākaravajjātu kalāvaikalyamāgataḥ // 158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akhaṇḍitaṃ ca kramukaṃ cūrṇam tu rasavarjitam / bhūmau nipatitaṃ patraṃ śakrasyāpi śriayaṃ haret // 159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
akhaṇḍitā śaktirathopamānaṃ na svīkṛtaṃ na cchalarītirasti / aspṛṣṭasaṃdehaviparyayasya ko'yaṃ tava nyāyanaye niveśaḥ // 160	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
akharvaparvagarteṣu vicchinno yasya vāridhiḥ / sa eva hi muneḥ pāṇir adhastādvindhyabhūbhṛtaḥ // 161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akhilaṃ viduṣāmanāvilaṃ suhṛdā ca svahṛdā ca paśyatām / savidhe'pi nasūkṣmasākṣiṇī vadanālaṃkṛtimātramakṣiṇī // 162	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
akhileṣu vihaṃgeṣu hanta svacchandacāriṣu / śuka pañjarabandhaste madhurāṇāṃ girāṃ phalam // 163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agajānanapadmārkaṃ gajānanamaharniśam / anekadaṃ taṃ bhaktānām ekadantamupāsmahe // 164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
agaṇitaguṇena sundara kṛtvā cāritramapyudāsīnam / bhavatānanyagatiḥ sā vihitāvartena taraṇiriva // 165	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agaṇitagururyācñālolaṃ padāntasadātithiḥ samayamavidan mugdhaḥ kālāsaho ratilampaṭaḥ / kṛtakakupitaṃ hastāghātaṃ trapāruditaṃ haṭhā- daparigaṇayan lajjāyāṃ māṃ nimajjayati priyaḥ // 166	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
agaṇitanijaśramāṇāṃ parakṛtye'bhyetya vartamānānām / sujanaghanadinamaṇīnāṃ paropakārārthamajani janiḥ // 167	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agaṇitayaśasā tyakta- sthitinā kriyate'tha yākṛtajñena / snigdhe suhṛdi sarāge mitre tava vañcanā na yuktā sā // 168	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
agatitvamatiśraddhā jñānābhāsena tṛptatā / trayaḥ śiṣyaguṇā hyete mūrkhācāryasya bhāgyajāḥ // 169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agatīnāṃ khalīkārād duḥkhaṃ naivopajāyate / bhavantyaśokāḥ prāyeṇa sāṃkurāḥ pādatāḍitāḥ // 170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
agadaiḥ sarvasāmānyair vyantarāṇāṃ viṣaṃ haret / dhūpo devīsahāpicchakhaṇḍanaistadviṣāpahaḥ // 171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agamyagamanāt prāyaḥ prāyaścittīyate janaḥ / agamyaṃ tvadyaśo yāti sarvatraiva ca pāvanam // 172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agamyāni pumān yāti yo'sevyāṃśca niṣevate / sa mṛtyumupagṛhṇāti garbhamaśvatarī yathā // 173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agamyārthaṃ tṛṇaprāṇāḥ pṛṣṭhasthīkṛtabhīhriyaḥ / śambhalībhuktasarvasvā janā yatpāripārśvikāḥ // 174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agamyo mantrāṇāṃ prakṛtibhiṣajāmapyaviṣayaḥ sudhāsārāsādhyo visadṛśatarārambhagahanaḥ / jagadbhrāmīkartuṃ pariṇatadhiyānena vidhinā sphuṭaṃ sṛṣṭo vyādhiḥ prakṛtiviṣamo durjanajanaḥ // 175	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
agastitulyāśca ghṛtābdhiśoṣaṇe dambholitulyā vaṭakādribhedane / śākāvalīkānanavahnirūpās ta eva bhaṭṭā itare bhaṭāśca // 176	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
agastihastaculukamite'bdhau vāhanākṛtau / magnaḥ samudro velāyām iti devāstadā jaguḥ // 177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
agastya iva yasyāsir nyañcitakṣitibhṛdbabhau / citraṃ so'pyakaronnṛtyat kabandhaṃ samarārṇavam // 178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agastyasya muneḥ śāpād brahmasyandanamāsthitaḥ / mahāsukhāt paribhraṣṭo nahuṣaḥ sarpatāṃ gataḥ // 179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agastyena payorāśeḥ kiyat kiṃ pītamujjhitam / tvayā vairikulaṃ vīra samare kīdṛśaṃ kṛtam // 180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agā gāṅgāṅgakākākagāhakāghakakākahā / ahāhāṅka khagāṅkāgakaṅkāgakhagakākaka // 181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agādhajalasaṃcārī vikārī na ca rohitaḥ / gaṇḍūṣajalamātre tu śapharī pharpharāyate // 182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agādhahṛdayā bhūpāḥ kūpā iva durāsadāḥ / ghaṭakā guṇino no cet kathaṃ labhyeta jīvanam // 183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agādhenāpi kiṃ tena toyena lavaṇāmbudheḥ / janumātraṃ varaṃ vāri tṛṣṇācchedakaraṃ nṛṇām // 184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agāre'smin kānte giriśamaniśānāthaśakalaṃ bhujaṃgānuttuṅgān sakalamapi vātāyanapathe / nikuñjeṣu śyenānadhigṛhaśiro rāhuvalayaṃ likhantyā nīyante śiva śiva tayā hanta divasāḥ // 185	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aguṇakaṇo guṇarāśir dvayamapi daivena khalamukhe patitam / prasarati tailamivaikaḥ salile ghṛtavajjaḍatvametyanyaḥ // 186	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
agururiti vadatu loko gauravamatraiva punarahaṃ manye / darśitaguṇaikavṛttir yasya jane janitadāhe'pi // 187	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agurusurabhidhūpāśobhitaṃ keśapāśaṃ galitakusumamālaṃ dhunvatī kuñcitāgram / tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyāpy uṣasi śayanavāsaḥ kāminī kāmaśobhā // 188	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
agurorapi sata uccaiḥ praśaṃsanaṃ tadguṇā vitanvanti / agururjvalane'pyastaḥ saurabhamiṣato guṇān vamati // 189	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭravāsinaḥ / nayāpanayavettāyaḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ // 190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
agūḍhahāsasphuṭadantakesaraṃ mukhaṃ svidetadvikasannu paṅkajam / iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhīṃ vidāmbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ // 191	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
agniṃ prāpya yathā sadyas tūlarāśirvinaśyati / tathā gaṅgājalenaiva sarvapāpaṃ vinaśyati // 192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agniṃ stokamivātmānaṃ saṃdhukṣayati yo naraḥ / sa vardhamāno grasate mahāntamapi saṃcayam // 193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
agniḥ stoko vardhate cājyasikto bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasrameti / kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniyamya tasmādalpaṃ nāvamanyeta vittam // 194	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgl], śālinī [11: mttgg]
agnikuṇḍasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ / saṃgamena parastrīṇāṃ kasya no calate manaḥ // 195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnikumbhasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ / ubhayorapi saṃyogaḥ kasya viśvāsakārakaḥ // 196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnidāhe na me duḥkhaṃ chede na nikaṣe na vā / yattadeva mahadduḥkhaṃ guñjayā saha tolanam // 197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnido garadaścaiva śastrapāṇirdhanāpahaḥ / kṣetradārāpahārī ca ṣaḍete hyātatāyinaḥ // 198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agninā bhasmanā caiva stambhena ca janena ca / advāreṇaiva mārgeṇa paṅktitadoṣo na vidyate // 199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca / nityaṃ yatnena sevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // 200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnirgururdvijātīnāṃ varṇānāṃ pārthivo guruḥ / kulastrīṇāṃ gururbhartā sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ // 201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnirdahati tāpena sūryo dahati raśmibhiḥ / rājā dahati daṇḍena tapasā brāhmaṇo dahet // 202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnirdevo dvijātīnāṃ munīnāṃ hṛdi daivatam / pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra samadarśinaḥ // 203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnirhi devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvaṇaṃ ca tadātmakam / tasmāt suvarṇaṃ dadatā dattāḥ sarvāḥ sma devatāḥ // 204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
agniṣṭomādibhiryajñair vividhairāptadakṣiṇaiḥ / na tat phalamavāpnoti tīrthārthe gamanena yat // 205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agniśtejo mahalloke gūḍhastiṣṭhati dāruṣu / na copayuṅkte taddāru yāvanno dīpyate paraiḥ // 206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate / tadā tacca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahatyāśu tejasā // 207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evameva kule jātāḥ pāvakopamatejasaḥ / kṣamāvanto nirākārāḥ kāṣṭhe'gniriva śerate // 208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnihotraṃ gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ garbhirṇīṃ vṛddhabālakau / riktahastena nopeyād rājānaṃ devatāṃ gurum // 209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnihotraṃ trayo vedās tridaṇḍaṃ bhasmaguṇṭhanam / buddhipauruṣahīnānāṃ jīviketi bṛhaspatiḥ // 210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnihotraphalā vedāḥ śīlavṛttaphalaṃ śrutam / ratiputraphalā dārā dattabhuktaphalaṃ dhanam // 211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnihotramadhītaṃ vā dānādyāścākhilāḥ kriyāḥ / bhajante tasya vaiphalyaṃ yasya vākyamakāraṇam // 212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnihotreṣu viprāṇāṃ hṛdi devo manīṣiṇām / pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra viditātmanām // 213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agneryathā dāruviyogayogayor adṛṣṭato'nyatra nimittamasti / evaṃ hi jantorapi durvibhāvyaḥ śarīrasaṃyogaviyogahetuḥ // 214	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: rysj] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
agnau kriyāvatāṃ devo divi devo manīṣiṇām / pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ yogināṃ hṛdaye hariḥ // 215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnau dagdhaṃ jale magnaṃ hṛtaṃ taskarapārthivaiḥ / tatsarvaṃ dānamityāhur yadi klaibyaṃ na bhāṣate // 216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnau prāptaṃ pradhūyeta yathā tūlaṃ dvijottama / tathā gaṅgāvagāḍhasya sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pradhūyate // 217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnau prāstaṃ tu puruṣaṃ karmānveti svayaṃkṛtam / tasmāttu puruṣo yatnād dharmaṃ saṃcinuyācchanaiḥ // 218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityamupatiṣṭhate / ādityājjāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣr̥erannaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ // 219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
agnyākāraṃ kalayasi puraścakravākīva candraṃ baddhotkampaṃ śiśiramarutā dahyate padminīva / prāṇān dhatse kathamapi balādgacchataḥ śalyatulyāṃs tat kenāsau sutanu janito māmmathaste vikāraḥ // 220	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
agnyādhānena yajñena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ / lokān viśvāsayitvaiva tato lumpedyathā vṛkaḥ // 221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agracchāyā tṛṇāgniśca nīcasevā paṭe jalam / veśyārāgaḥ khalaprema sarvaṃ budbudasannibham // 222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato madhye pārśvato'tha samantataḥ / vidyuccakitavadbhāti sūryakoṭisamaprabhaḥ // 223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agrataścaturo vedān pṛṣṭhataḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ / ubhābhyāṃ ca samartho'haṃ śāpādapi śarādapi // 224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agrato vāmapādaṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ jātu kuñcitam / ālīḍhaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ hastadvayasavistaram // 225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agrasānuṣu nitāntapiśaṅgair bhūruhānmṛdukarairavalambya / astaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nu // 226	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
agrāhyaṃ śravaṇasya bhūṣaṇamalaṃkāro na bhāvocitaḥ kaṇṭhasyāñjanamujjvalaṃ nayanayoḥ sūkṣmatvamāvekṣitum / vaktrasya kṣaṇiko'dhivāsanavidhiḥ kānte priye nābhavas saubhāgyapratikarmanirmitamahāvidyaiva yenātmanaḥ // 227	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agrāhyā mūrdhajeṣvetāḥ striyo guṇasamanvitāḥ / na latāḥ pallavacchedam arhantyupavanodbhavāḥ // 228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agre kasyacidasti kaṃcidabhitaḥ kenāpi pṛṣṭe kṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ śiśubhāvayauvanajarābhārāvatārādayam / bālastaṃ bahu manyatāmasulabhaṃ prāptaṃ yuvā sevatāṃ vṛddhastadviṣyādbahiṣkṛta iva vyāvṛtya kiṃ paśyati // 229	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
agre kugrāmavargaḥ piśitarasalasaccaṇḍacaṇḍāyamānaḥ paścādvyādho vadhārtho niśitaśarakaraḥ pādamudrānapāyī / viṣvagdīpto vanāgnirvanamatigahanaṃ dhūmavātyā ca dṛṣṭeḥ saroddhī kāndiśīko hari hari hariṇaḥkaṃ śaraṇyaṃ prayātu // 230	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
agre gacchata dhenudugdhakalaśānādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ dugdhe vaskayaṇīkule punariyaṃ rādhā śanairyāsyati / ityanyavyapadeśaguptahṛdayaḥ kurvan viviktaṃ vrajaṃ devaḥ kāraṇanandasūnuraśivaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ // 231	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agre gītaṃ sarasakavayaḥ pārśvato dākṣiṇātyāḥ pṛṣṭhe līlāvalayaraṇitaṃ cāmaragrāhiṇīnām / yadyastyevaṃ kuru bhavarasāsvādane lampaṭatvaṃ no ceccetaḥ praviśa sahasā nirvikalpe samādhau // 232	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
agre taptajalā nitāntaśiśirā mūle muhurbāhubhir vyāmathyoparataprapeṣu pathikairmārgeṣu madhyaṃdine / ādhārāḥ plutabālaśaivaladalacchedāvakīrṇormayaḥ pīyante halamuktamagnamahiṣaprakṣobhaparyāvilāḥ // 233	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agre tiṣṭhati dāruṇākṛtirasau krodhoddhataḥ kesarī paścādudbhaṭadāvadūṣitadharāsaṃkrāntacaṇḍānilaḥ / kiṃ kurmaḥ sahasā vihāya kalabhānetān brajāmaḥ kathaṃ haṃho kūṇitalocaneti kariṇī cintākulā tābhyati // 234	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agre dhanuḥ śarakaraḥ svayamasti kāmaḥ paścāttvarā śaśadharodayasaṃśayotthā / dhvāntaṃ dināntavikasadvibhavaṃ samantāt kiṃ kevalā pathi vadhūrdayitābhisāre // 235	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
agre prastutanāśānāṃ mūkatā paramo guṇaḥ / tathāpi prabhubhaktānāṃ saudharmyādevamucyate // 236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaireva stutibhiḥ svāmī prāpyate vyasanāvaṭam / paścānmūkatvamāpannair ḍaddharttuṃ naiva śakyate // 237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agre māhiṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā madhye tu vṛṣalīpatim / ante vārdhuṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirāśāḥ pitaro gatāḥ // 238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agre yānti rathasya reṇuvadamī cūrṇībhavanto ghanāś cakrabhrāntirarāntareṣu janayatyanyāmivārāvalim / citranyastamivācalaṃ hayaśirasyāyāmavaccāmaraṃ yaṣṭyagre ca samaṃ sthito dhvajapaṭaḥ prānte ca vegānilāt // 239	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agre laghimā paścān mahatāpi pidhīyate na hi mahimnā / vāmana iti trivikramam abhidadhati daśāvatāravidaḥ // 240	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agre vikīrṇakurabaka- phalajālakahīyamānasahakāram / pariṇāmābhimukhamṛtor utsukayati yauvanaṃ cetaḥ // 241	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agre vyādhaḥ karadhṛtaśaraḥ pārśvato jālamālā pṛṣṭe vahnirdahati nitarāṃ saṃnidhau sārameyāḥ / eṇī garbhādalasagamanā bālakai ruddhapādā cintāviṣṭā vadati hi mṛgaṃ kiṃ karomi kva yāmiḥ // 242	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
agre śyāmalabindubaddhatilakairmadhye'pi pākānvaya- prauḍhībhūtapaṭolapāṭalatarairmūle manāgbabhrubhiḥ / vṛnte karkaśakīrapiccaharibhiḥ sthūlaiḥ phalairbandhurāḥ saṃpratyutsukayanti kasya na manaḥ pūgadrumāṇāṃ chaṭāḥ // 243	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agresarī kumārī tatpṛṣṭe puṅkhago yadā tāraḥ / siddhistadottamā syād dṛṣṭāpyādau varā durgā // 244	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
agre strīnakhapāṭalaṃ kuravakaṃ śyāmaṃ dvayorbhāgayor bālāśokamupoḍharāgasubhagaṃ bhedonmukhaṃ tiṣṭhati / īṣadbaddharajaḥkaṇāṃgrakapiśā cūte navā mañjarī mugdhatvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe madhye madhuśrīḥ sthitā // 245	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
agryo muktimatāṃ prayogasamaye mantreṣu pṛṣṭhaṃ gataḥ pākāgāragatastu pācakamanastoṣāya vācaspatiḥ / uccāyāṃ nirato rato'rthakagaṇe piṇḍeṣu dattādaro nānāśrāddhagaṇaikacālitamanā bhaddoṭṭamo rājate // 246	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ pacatyātmakāraṇāt / yajñaśiṣṭāśanaṃ hyetat satāmannaṃ vidhīyate // 247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aghaṭitaṃ ghaṭanāṃ nayati dhruvaṃ sughaṭitaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguratācalam / jagadidaṃ kurute sacarācaraṃ vidhiraho balavāniti me matiḥ // 248	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aghaṭitaghaṭitaṃ ghaṭayati sughaṭitaghaṭitāni jarjarīkurute / vidhireva tāni ghaṭayati yāni pumānnaiva cintayati // 249	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aghṛṣṭamiva māṇikyam amattamiva ca dvipam / aśūraṃ pārthivaṃ loko jātyamapyavamanyate // 250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkaṃ ke'pi śaśaṅkirejalanidheḥ paṅkaṃ pare menire sāraṅgaṃ katicicca saṃjagadire bhūmeśca bimbaṃ pare / indau yaddalitendranīlaśakalaśyāmaṃ darīdṛśyate tanmanye ravibhītamandhatamasaṃ kukṣisthamālakṣyate // 251	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅkanilīnagajānana- śaṅkākulabāhuleyahṛtavasanau / sasmitaharakarakalitau himagiritanayāstanau jayataḥ // 252	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅkanyāsairviṣamair māyāvanitālakāvalīkuṭilaiḥ / ko nāma kāmacāraiḥ kāyasthairmohito na janaḥ // 253	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅkamallavinodeṣu tathānyeṣūtsavādiṣu / antaḥpurapracāreṣu devapūjāpareṣu ca // 254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkādhiropitamṛgaś candramā mṛgalāñchanaḥ / kesarī niṣṭhurakṣiptamṛgayūtho mṛgādhipaḥ // 255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkurite pallavite korakite vikasite ca sahakāre / aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakito vikasitaśca madanaḥ // 256	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: Btyl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅkekṛtvottamāṅgaṃ plavagabalapateḥ pādamakṣasya hantur datvotsaṅge salīlaṃ tvaci kanakamṛgasyāṅgaśeṣaṃ nidhāya / bāṇaṃ rakṣaḥ kulaghanaṃ praguṇitamanujenādarāttīkṣṇamakṣṇaḥ koṇenāvekṣamāṇastvadanujavacane dattakarṇo'yamāste // 257	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅke vṛddhimupāgataṃ śiśutayā sarvāṅgamāliṅgitaṃ matsyaḥ śrīparirambhanirbharataravyākośakoṣonmukhaiḥ / āśāptaiḥ paripīyamānamaniśaṃ niḥspandamindindirair dūrādeva nimeṣaśūnyanayanaḥ padmaṃ samudvīkṣate // 258	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅkeṣu śūnyavinyāsād vṛddhiḥ syāttu daśādhikā / tasmājjñeyā viśeṣeṇa aṅkānāṃ vāmato gatiḥ // 259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkollakvāthatoyena miśritaṃ ghṛtamākṣikam / vasā kiṭikuṅgāṇām etaiḥ siktā mahīruhāḥ // 260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṅkollakvathitaṃ svinnaṃ nṛmāṃsaṃ chāgadugdhayuk / piṇyākasahitaṃ mūle sahakārasya nikṣipet // 261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkollatailabhāvitam uṣitaṃ gośakṛti kumudakandamalam / karakāmbukardamabhṛte kalaśe kusumaṃ samudvahati // 262	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅkollatailasūkara- śiśumāravasāsu bhāvitaṃ bījam / sadyo rohati nihitaṃ bhūmau karakāmbhasā siktam // 263	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅkollapatradhapena yadvā keśasamanvitaiḥ / saktubhiḥ kaṭutailāktair yāti matsyaviṣaṃ kṣayam // 264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅkollabījamajjānāṃ sūkṣmacūrṇaṃ vidhīyate / tilatailena taccūrṇaṃ samyakkṛtvā ca bhāvayet // 265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaṃ galitaṃ palitaṃ muṇḍaṃ dantavihīnaṃ jātaṃ tuṇḍam / karadhṛtakampitaśobhitadaṇḍaṃ tadapi na muñcatyāśā piṇḍam // 266	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
aṅgaṃ candanapaṅkapaṅkajabisacchedāvalīnaṃ muhus tāpaḥ śāpa ivaiṣa śoṣaṇapaṭuḥ kampaḥ sakhīkampanaḥ / śvāsāḥ saṃvṛtatārahārarucayaḥ saṃbhinnacīnāṃśukā jātaḥ prāgatidāhavedanamahārambhaḥ sa tasyā jvaraḥ // 267	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgaṃ candanapāṇḍu pallavamṛdustāmbūlatāmro'varo dhārāyantrajalābhiṣekakaluṣe dhautāñjane locane / antaḥpuṣpasugandhirārdrakabarī svacchaṃ tanīyo'mbaraṃ kāntānāṃ kamanīyatāṃ bidadhate grīṣme'parāhṇagame // 268	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgaṃ dakṣiṇamāruhya vāmenottarati sphuṭam / tadā hānikarī jñeyā vyatyayena tu lābhadā // 269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaṃ damanapattrābhamaṅge yasmin pratīyate / vidyāddamanavajraṃ tu tīkṣṇadhāraṃ mahāguṇam // 270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaṃ pratīyate yatra bahugranthisamanvitam / durlabhaṃ tanmahāmūlyaṃ granthivajrakamucyate // 271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaṃ bhūṣaṇanikaro bhūṣayatītyeṣa laukiko vādaḥ / aṅgāni bhūṣaṇānāṃ kāmapi suṣamāmajījanaṃstasyāḥ // 272	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aṅgaṃ yena rathīkṛtaṃ nayanayoryugmaṃ rathāṅgīkṛtaṃ patraṃ svaṃ rathakarmasāratthikṛtaṃ śvāsasturaṃgīkṛtāḥ / koda'ḍīkṛtamātmavīryamacirānmaurvīkṛtaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vāmāṅgaṃ viśikhīkṛtaṃ diśatu naḥ kṣemaṃ sa dhanvī pumān // 273	upajāti atidhṛti: śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg], ajñātam [19: rsjsttg], ajñātam [19: msysttg] atha vā śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgaṇaṃ tadidamunmadadvipa- śreṇiśoṇitavihāriṇo hareḥ / ullasattaruṇakelipallavāṃ sallakīṃ tyajati kiṃ mataṅgajaḥ // 274	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
aṅgaṇavedirvasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam / valmīkaśca sumeruḥ kṛtapratijñasya dhīrasya // 275	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅgadoṣaparityaktaś caturmārgakṛtaśramaḥ / jñātā kulakavādyasya rañjako vādakaḥ smṛtaḥ // 276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅganānāmivāṅgāni gopyante svaguṇā yadā / tadā te spṛhaṇīyāḥ syur ime hyatyantadurlabhāḥ // 277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅganāmaṅganāmantare mādhavo mādhavaṃ mādhavaṃ cāntareṇāṅganā / itthamākalpite maṇḍale madhyagaḥ saṃjagau veṇunā devakīnandanaḥ // 278	sragviṇī [12: rrrr]
aṅganyāsastataḥ kāryaḥ śivoktaḥ siddhimicchatā / ācāryeṇa ca śiṣyasya pāpaghno vighnanāśanaḥ // 279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgapratyaṅgajaḥ putro hṛdayāccāpi jāyate / tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvānna tu bāndhavaḥ // 280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgapratyaṅgabhāgena tataḥ piṇḍaḥ prajāyate / carmaṇācchāditaḥ sapta dhātavaḥ suyranukramāt // 281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgamaṅgena saṃpīḍya māṃsaṃ māṃsena tu striyaḥ / purāhamabhavaṃ prīto yattanmohavijṛmbhitam // 282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgamanaṅgakliṣṭaṃ sukhayedanyā na me karasparśāt / nocchvasiti tapanakiraṇaiś candrasyevāṃśubhiḥ kumudam // 283	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅgayuktaḥ kṛtāsraśca kurvan samyakpurovidhim / vijānan siddhasādhyādīn vairiṇo'strairna pīḍyate // 284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgasaṅgāt tathā jīvo bhajate prākṛtān guṇān / ahaṃkārābhibhūtaḥ san bhinnastebhyo'pi so'vyayaḥ // 285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgāḥ saṃjātabhaṅgādyanavanavasatiprāptaraṅgāḥ kaliṅgās tailaṅgāḥsvargagaṅgābhiṣavaṇamatayaḥ śīryadaṅgāśca vaṅgāḥ / lāṭāḥsvidyallalāṭāḥ padagamanadṛḍhāśvāsalolāśca colā jāyante śrīnijāma pṛthuraṇa bhavataḥ prauḍhaniḥsāṇanādāt // 286	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgākṛṣṭadukūlayā sarabhasaṃ gūḍhau bhujābhyāṃ stanāv ākṛṣṭe jaghanāṃśuke kṛtamadhaḥ saṃsaktamūrudvayam / nābhīmūlanibaddhacakṣuṣi mayi vrīḍānatāṅgyā tayā dīpaḥ sphūtkṛtavātavepitaśikhaḥ karṇotpalenāhataḥ // 287	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgākṛṣṭirvyathayati nakhāṅkeṣu vakṣojakumbhā- vāsyaṃ jṛmbhā daśanavasane dantadaṣṭaṃ dunoti / yāntyāḥ khedaṃ vrajati karajaśreṇiṣu śroṇibhāgaḥ prātaryāti praguṇataratāṃ vaiśasaṃ naiśamasyāḥ // 288	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aṅgāṅgamāgate śatrau kiṃ karoti paricchadaḥ / rāhuṇā grasite candre kiṃ kiṃ bhavati tārakaiḥ // 289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgāṅgibhāvamajñātvā kathaṃ sāmarthyanirṇayaḥ / paśya ṭiṭṭibhamātreṇa samudro vyākulīkṛtaḥ // 290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgānāmatitānavaṃ kuta idaṃ kampaśca kasmāt kuto mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvarepṛcchati / tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvata iti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara- vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā valitayā niḥśvasya mukto'nyataḥ // 291	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgāni khedayasi kiṃ śirīṣakusumaparipelavāni mudhā / ayamīhitakusumānāṃ saṃpādayitā tavāsti dāsajanaḥ // 292	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aṅgāni candanarajaḥparidhūsarāṇi tāmbūlarāgasubhago'dharapallavaśca / svacchāñjane ca nayane vasanaṃ tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇamidaṃ vibahvaśca śeṣaḥ // 293	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgāni dattvā hemāṅgi prāṇān krīṇāsi cen nṛṇām / yuktametan na tu punaḥ koṇaṃ nayanapadmayoḥ // 294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aṅgāni dhīpaṭutvaṃ śaktirdaśanāḥ śanairviśīryante / nikhilendriyāṇi yeṣāṃ cirāyuṣaste narā jñeyāḥ // 295	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅgāni nidrālasavibhramāṇi vākyāni kiṃcin madalālasāni / bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām // 296	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṅgāni me dahatu kāntaviyogavahniḥ samrakṣatu priyatamaṃ hṛdi vartate'sau / ityāśayā śaśimukhī jaladaśruvāri- dhārābhiruṣṇamabhiṣiñcati hṛtpradeśam // 297	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aṅgāni ślathaniḥ sahāni nayate mugdhālase vibhramaś- vāsotkampitakomalastanamuraḥ sāyāsasupte bhruvau / kiṃ cāndolanakautukavyuparatāvāsyeṣu vāmabhruvāṃ svedāmbhaḥ stapitākulālakalateṣvāvāsito manmathaḥ // 298	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgāmodasamocchaladghṛṇipatadbhṛṅgāvalīmālita- sphūrjallañchanasūtragumphitamilannīlotpalaśrīriva / niryatpādanakhonmukhāṃśuvisarasragdanturaḥ smaryatāṃ mañjuśrīḥ suramuktamañjariśikhāvarṣairivābhyarcitaḥ // 299	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgārapūrve gamane ca lābhaḥ some śanau dakṣiṇamarthalābham / budhe gurau paścimakāryasiddhī ravau bhṛgau cottaramarthalābhaḥ // 300	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṅgāraśūlāśmapalālakeśa- vistīrṇaviṭcarmamṛteṣu dṛṣṭaḥ / śvā mūtrayanyacchati kāryanāśaṃ dāridryamṛtyupramukhānanarthān // 301	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṅgārasadṛśī nārī ghṛtakumbhasamaḥ pumān / ye prasaktā vilīnāste ye sthitāste pade sthitāḥ // 302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgārasadṛśī yoṣit sarpiḥkumbhasamaḥ pumān / tasyāḥ parisare brahman sthātavyaṃ na kadācana // 303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgārahāsiṣu vilāsagṛhodareṣu talpeṣu tūlapaṭakalpitaveṣṭaneṣu / uṣṇeṣu ca praṇayinīkucamaṇḍaleṣu śāntiṃ jagāma śiśirasya tuṣāragarvaḥ // 304	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aṅgāraiḥ khaciteva bhūrviyadapi jvālākarālaṃ karais tigmāṃśoḥ kiratīva tīvramabhito vāyuḥ kukūlānalam / apyambhāṃsi nakhaṃpacāni saritāmāśā jvalantīva ca grīṣme'sminnavavahnidīpitamivāśeṣaṃ jagadvartate // 305	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgāraiḥ śākavṛkṣasya cūrṇitaiḥ saghṛtaistryaham / dattairnaśyatyatīsārastry ahaṃ pānīyavāraṇāt // 306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgāsaṅgimṛṇālakāṇḍamayate bhṛṅgāvalīnāṃ rucaṃ nāsāmauktikamindranīlasaraṇiṃ śvāsānilād gāhate / datteyaṃ himavālukāpi kucayordhatte kṣaṇaṃ dīpatāṃ taptāyaḥpatitāmbuvatkaratale dhārāmbu saṃlīyate // 307	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgīkuru tvamavadhīraya vā vayaṃ tu dāsāstaveti vacasaiva jayema lokān / etāvataiva sukaro nanu viśvamāta- ruddaṇḍadaṇḍadharakiṃkaramaulibhaṅgaḥ // 308	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aṅgīkurvanti bhaṅgīmakhilagirigaṇāstaptajāmbūnadīyāṃ dūrīkurvanti pūrīkṛtakanakagirisphāragavaṃ ca yasyāḥ / unmattadhvāntadhārāsuravarapaṭalīdāhasañjātakīrtiḥ seyaṃ prācī pradīptirdalayatu duritaṃ sarvadā sarvadā me // 309	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgīkurvannamṛtarucirāmutpatiṣṇossalīlaṃ chāyāmantastava maṇimayo mālyavāneṣa śailaḥ / śobhāṃ vakṣyatyadhikalalitāṃ śobhamānāmatīndor devasyāderupajanayato mānasādindubimbam // 310	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aṅgīkṛtatitikṣaḥ seḍ guṇī niṣṭhāparo yathā / mṛṣistathā vijayate śrīrāmo rājasattamaḥ // 311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aṅgīkṛttāḥ kṣatimimāmapi ye viṣahya goptuṃ guṇān kimiti vāñchasi tānmudhaiva / muktāmaṇervimalarūpatayā nitāntam ete tava svayamapi prakaṭībhavanti // 312	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgulibhaṅgavikalpana- vividhavivādapravṛttapāṇḍityaḥ / japacapaloṣṭhaḥ sajane dhyānaparo nagararathyāsu // 313	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam / mekhalābhirasakṛcca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīravāpa saḥ // 314	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
aṅgulībhiḥ kuraṅgākṣyāḥ śobhate mudrikāvaliḥ / proteva bāṇaiḥ pañceṣoḥ sūkṣmā lakṣyaparamparā // 315	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aṅgulībhiriva keśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ / kuḍmalīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī // 316	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
aṅgulyaḥ pañcame māse dṛṣṭikukṣau ca ṣaṣṭhame / saṃcāraḥ saptame māse aṣṭame nayaneṣu ca // 317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgulyaḥ pallavānyāsan kusumāni nakhārciṣaḥ / bāhū late vasantaśrīs tvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī // 318	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgulyagranakhena bāṣyasalilaṃ vikṣipya vikṣipya kiṃ tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi / yasyāste piśunopadeśavacanairmāne'tibhūmiṃ gate nirviṇṇo'nunayaṃ prati priyatamo madhyasthatāmeṣyati // 319	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgulyagranirodhatastanutarāṃ dhārāmiyaṃ tanvatī karkayā na paraṃ payo nipuṇikā dātuṃ prapāpālikā / viśliṣṭāṅgulinā kareṇa daśanāpāḍaṃ śanaiḥ pāntha he niśpandordhvavilocanas tvamapi hā jānāsi pātuṃ payaḥ // 320	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgulyagreṇa yajjaptaṃ yajjaptaṃ merulaṅghane / vyagracittena yajjaptaṃ trividhaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet // 321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭaṃ praharati kuṭile mādhavaḥ kiṃ vasanto no cakrī kiṃ kulālo na hi dharaṇidharaḥ kiṃ dvijihvaḥ phaṇīndraḥ / nāhaṃ ghorāhimardī kimasi khagapatirno hariḥ kiṃ kapīndraḥ ityevaṃ gopakanyāprativacanajitaḥ pātu vaścakrapāṇiḥ // 322	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
aṅguṣṭhatarjanībhyāṃ gā ghrāṇe saṃgṛhya nāmayet / mantreṇānena vaśyāḥ syuḥ paśavo'śvādayastathā // 323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅguṣṭhanakhadambhena pādayoḥ patitaḥ kimu / vibhāti vaktravijitaḥ śaśī vigatakalmaṣaḥ // 324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aṅguṣṭhanakhamūle tu tarjanyagraṃ susaṃsthitaṃ / matsarī sā ca vijñeyā citralakṣyasya vedhane // 325	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅguṣṭhākramavakritāṅguliradhaḥ pādārdhanīruddhabhūḥ pārśvādvegakṛto nihatya kaphaṇidvandvena daṃśānmuhuḥ / nyagjānudvayayantrayantritaghaṭīvaktrāntarālaskhalad dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi gopālakaḥ // 326	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅguṣṭhāgre tu tarjanyā mukhaṃ yatra niveśitaṃ / kākatuṇḍī ca vijñeyā sūkṣmalakṣyeṣu yojitā // 327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅguṣṭhe padagulphajānujaghane nābhau ca vakṣaḥstane kakṣākaṇṭhakapoladantavasane netrālike mūrdhani / śuklāśuklavibhāgato mṛgadṛśāmaṅgeṣvanaṅgasthitī- rūrdhvādhogamanena vāmapadagāḥ pakṣadvaye lakṣayet // 328	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅguṣṭhodaramātraṃ viśeṣavitprāpya padmarāgamaṇim / sukhasaṃvāhyamanuttaraṃ arthaṃ kiṃ tena nāpnoti // 329	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgena kenāpi vijetumasyā gaveṣyate kiṃ calapatrapatraṃ / na cedviśeṣāditaracchadebhyas tasyāstu kampastu kuto bhayena // 330	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṅgena gātraṃ nayanena vaktraṃ nyāyena rājyaṃ lavaṇena bhojyaṃ / dharmeṇa hīnaṃ khalu jīvitaṃ ca na rājate candramasā vinā niśā // 331	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅge'naṅgajvarahutavahaścakṣuṣi dhyānamudrā kaṇṭhe jīvaḥ karakisalaye dīrghaśāyī kapolaḥ / aṃse vīṇā kucaparisare candanaṃ vāci maunaṃ tasyāḥ sarvaṃ sthitamiti na tu tvāṃ vinā kvāpi cetaḥ // 332	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsrepyāsradrutamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena / aṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpaiste viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ // 333	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aṅgenāṅgamanupraviśya milato hastāvalepādibhiḥ kā vārtā yudhi gandhasindhurapatergandho'pi cetke dvipāḥ / jetavyo'sti hareḥ sa lāñchanamato vandāmahe tāmabhūd yadgabha śarabhaḥ svayaṃjaya iti śrutvāpi yo nāṅkitaḥ // 334	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṅgeṣu caturaśratvaṃ samapādau latākarau / prārambhe sarvanṛtyānām etatsāmānyamucyate // 335	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgeṣu mukhyā dvijamadhyasaṃsthā vāṇānusaṃdhāna parāsi nityaṃ / adhaṃ sthirapremarasā rasajñe narastutiṃ saṃtyaja karṇavat tvaṃ // 336	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṅgeṣvābharaṇaṃ karoti bahuśaḥ patre'pi saṃcāriṇi prāptaṃ tvāṃ pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyati / ityākalpavikalpatalparacanāsaṅkalpalīlāśata- vyāsaktāpi vinā tvayā varatanurnaiṣā niśāṃ neṣyati // 337	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṅgaiḥ sukumārataraiḥ sā kusumānāṃ śriyaṃ praharati / vikalayati kusumabāṇo bāṇālībhirmama prāṇān // 338	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aṅgairantarnihitavacanaiḥ sūcitaḥ samyagarthaḥ pādanyāso layamanugatastanmayatvaṃ raseṣu / śākhāyonirmṛdurabhinayastadvikalpānuvṛttau bhāvo bhāvaṃ nudati viṣayādrāgabandhaḥ sa eva // 339	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aṅghridaṇḍo harerūrdhvam utkṣipto balinigrahe / vidhiviṣṭarapadmasya nāladaṇḍo mude'stu vaḥ // 340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acakamata sapallavāṃ dharitrīṃ mṛdusurabhiṃ virahayya puṣpaśayyām / bhṛśamaratimavāpya tatra cāsyās tava sukhaśītamupaitumaṅkamicchā // 341	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
acañcalaṃ mugdhamudañcitaṃ dṛśor anunnataṃ śrīmaduro mṛgīdṛśaḥ / abhaṅgurākūtavatī gatirbhruvor abaddhalakṣyaṃ kvacidutkamāntaram // 342	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
acaturvadano brahmā dvibāhuraparo hariḥ / abhālalocanaḥ śaṃbhur bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ // 343	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acalaṃ caladiva cakṣuḥ prakṛtamapīdaṃ samudyadiva vakṣaḥ / atadiva tadapi śarīraṃ saṃprati vāmabhruvo jayati // 344	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
acalā kamalā kasya kasya mitraṃ mahīpatiḥ / śarīraṃ ca sthiraṃ kasya kasya vaśyā varāṅganā // 345	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acalā kamalā hi kasya kasya kṣitipālaḥ kila mitramasti loke / iha vaśyatamā ca kasya veśyā sthiramapyasti ca kasya dehamatra // 346	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
acintanīyā vidhivañcaneyaṃ yadambujākṣī sthavirasya bhartuḥ / svayaṃ samādāya karaṃ nidhāya vakṣojayugme svapiti śvasantī // 347	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
acintitāni duḥkhāni yathaivāyānti dehinām / sukhānyapi tathā manye daivamatrātiricyate // 348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintyamatiduḥsahaṃ trividhaduḥkhameno'rjitaṃ caturvidhagatiśritaṃ bhavabhṛtā na kiṃ prāpyate / śarīramasukhākaraṃ jagati gṛhṇatā muñcatā tanoti na tathāpyayaṃ viratimūrjitāṃ pāpataḥ // 349	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
acintyāḥ panthānaḥ kimapi mahatāmandhakaripor yadakṣṇo'bhūt tejastadakṛta kathāśeṣamadanam / munernetrādatreryadajani punarjyotirahaha pratene tenedaṃ madanamayameva tribhuvanam // 350	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
acirāt parātmaniṣṭhā bhavati yatastatkriyeta catureṇa kleśen kāmadamanaṃ dhigekadārañjayantamātmānam // 351	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acirādupakarturācared atha vātmaupayikīmupakriyām / pṛthuritthamathāṇurastu sā na viśeṣe viduṣāmiha grahaḥ // 352	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
acirādhiṣṭhitarājyaḥ śatruḥ prakṛtiṣvarūḍhamūlatvāt / navasaṃropaṇaśithilas taruriva sukaraḥ samuddhartum // 353	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
acireṇa parasya bhūyasoṃ viparītāṃ vigaṇayya cātmanaḥ / kṣayayuktimupekṣate kṛtī kurute tatpratikāramanyathā // 354	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
acireṇa rocate me divasānevaṃ vṛthātivāhayate / śritakṛṣṇapakṣagataye vayasya kāmyastanīvirahaḥ // 355	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
acumbi yā candanabindumaṇḍalī nalīyavaktreṇa sarojatarjinā / śriyaṃ śritā kācana tārakāsakhī kṛtāśaśāṅkasya tayāṅkavartinī // 356	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
acetanā api prāyo maitrīmevānubadhyate / svavṛddhāt kṣīyate kṣīrāt kṣīrāt prāgeva vāriṇā // 357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aceṣṭamānamāsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃcidupatiṣṭhati / kaścit karmāṇi kurvan hi na prāpyamadhigacchati // 358	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca / svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam // 359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
acchaprakāśavati candramasi priye'sminn āhlādakāriṇi sudhāvati pūrṇabimbe / dhātā vicintya manasākhiladṛṣṭipātaṃ hartuṃ cakāra kimu kajjalabinduyogam // 360	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
acchalaṃ mitrabhāvena satāṃ dārāvalokanam // 361	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
acchācchacandanarasārdrakarā mṛgākṣyo dhārāgṛhāṇi kusumāni ca kaumudī ca / mando marut sumanasaḥ śuci harmyapṛṣṭhaṃ grīṣme madaṃ ca madanaṃ ca vivardhayanti // 362	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
acchāsu haṃsa iva bālamṛṇālikāsu bhṛṅgo navāsviva madhudrumamañjarīṣu / ko'vantibharturaparo rasanirbharāsu pṛthvīpatiḥ sukavisūktiṣu baddhabhāvaḥ // 363	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
acchidramastu hṛdayaṃ paripūrṇamastu maukharyamastamitamastu gurutvamastu / kṛṣṇapriye sakhi diśāmi sadāśiṣaste yadvāsare murali me karuṇāṃ karoṣi // 364	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
acchinnaṃ nayanāmbu bandhuṣu kṛtaṃ cintā guruṣvarpitā dattaṃ dainyamaśeṣataḥ parijane tāpaḥ sakhīṣvāhitaḥ / adya śvaḥ paranirvṛtiṃ bhajati sā śvāsaiḥ paraṃ khidyate viśrabdho bhava viprayogajanitaṃ duḥkhaṃ vibhaktaṃ tayā // 365	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
acchinnamekhalamalabdhadṛḍhopagūḍham aprāptacumbanamavīkṣitavaktrakānti / kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ kṛtavipralambha- sambhogasakhyamiva pātu vapuḥ smarāreḥ // 366	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
acchinnāmṛtabinduvṛṣṭisadṛśīṃ prītiṃ dadatyā dṛśāṃ yātāyā vigalatpayodharabharāddraṣṭavyatāṃ kāmapi / asyāścandramasastanoriva karasparśāspadatvaṃ gatā naite yanmukulībhavanti sahasā padmāstadevādbhutam // 367	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
acchedyo'yamadāhyo'yam akledyo'śoṣya eva ca / nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo'yaṃ sanātanaḥ // 368	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acyutacaraṇataraṅgiṇi śaśiśekharamaulimālatīmāle / tvayi tanuvitaraṇasamaye haratā deyā na me haritā // 369	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
acyutabhaktivaśādiha samabhāvastatprasaṅgena / sā ramaterabhyudayati ratiriti naivādbhutaṃ kiṃcit // 370	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
acyutānantagovindanāmoccāraṇabheṣajāt / naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham // 371	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajani pratidinameṣā kardamaśeṣā madaṅgasaṅgena / pratiniśamapūri pampā dakṣiṇasaṃpātibhiḥ salilaiḥ // 372	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajani bhagavānasmādvedhāḥ śiraḥsu sudhābhujāṃ kṛtapadamidaṃ caitaddevyāḥ śriyo dhṛtimandiram / tadiha bhuvanābhogaślāghye saroruhi yacciraṃ śaśadhara tava dveṣārambhaḥ sa eṣa jaḍagrahaḥ // 373	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ajani rajaniranyā candramaḥ kāntivanyā- vipulacapalavīcivyācitā kācideva / satarugirisaridbhiḥ kiṃ haridbhiḥ sametaṃ dhavalimani dharitrīmaṇḍalaṃ magnametat // 374	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ajani śiśiraśīlaṃ śaivalaṃ sāgare yac cikuramakṛta kāmastanvi te kiṃ na tena / vahati kuṭilamenaṃ hetunā kena mūrdhnā vadanavidhurayaṃ cet sodaro nādasīyaḥ // 375	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ajanmā puruṣastāvad gatāsustṛṇameva vā / yāvanneṣubhirādatte viluptamaribhiryaśaḥ // 376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajanyakampāḥ śūrā ye nityamapyaparāṅmukhāḥ / darśayantyaparāgeṇa parebhyaścitrarūpavat // 377	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajarāmaravat prājño vidyāmarthaṃ ca cintayet / gṛhīta iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmamācaret // 378	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajavaccarvaṇaṃ kuryād gajavat snānamācaret / rājavat praviśedgrāmaṃ coravadgamanaṃ caret // 379	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajasya gṛhṇato janma nirīhasya hatadviṣaḥ / svapato jāgarūkasya yāthātmyaṃ veda kastava // 380	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajasraṃ lasatpadminī vṛndasaṅgaṃ madhūni prakāmaṃ pibantaṃ milindam / ravirmocayatyabjakārāgṛhebhyo dayālurhi no duṣṭavad doṣadarśī // 381	bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy]
ajasrabhūmītaṭakuṭṭanotthitair upāsyamānaṃ caraṇeṣu reṇubhiḥ / rayaprakarṣādhyayanārthamāgatair janasya cetobhirivāṇimāṅkitaiḥ // 382	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ajasramabhyāsamupeyuṣā samaṃ mudaiva devaḥ kavinā budhena ca / dadhau paṭīyān samayaṃ nayannayaṃ dineśvaraśrīrudayaṃ dine dine // 383	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ajasramārohasi dūradīrghāṃ saṃkalpasopānatatiṃ tadīyām / śvāsān sa varṣatyadhikaṃ punaryad dhyānāttava tvanmayatāṃ tadāpya // 384	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajā iva prajā mohād yo hanyāt pṛthivīpatiḥ / tasyaikā jāyate tṛptir na dvitīyā kathaṃcana // 385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajāgalasthastana uṣṭrapucchaṃ kakṣāntare keśamathāṇḍayugmam / tvāṃ saṃsṛjan sāyaṇamāyaṇādau brahmāgragaṇyo na babhūva pūjyaḥ // 386	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajāṅghrinirdattarajaścayāpi kapālinā baddharasāpi kāmam / tato'pyadhodhaḥ patitāpi nityaṃ gaṅgā kusaṅgāpi punāti lokān // 387	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajājījambāle rajasi maricānāṃ ca luṭhitāḥ kaṭutvāduṣṇatvājjanitarasanauṣṭhavyatikarāḥ / anirvāṇotthena prabalataratailāktatanavo mayā sadyo bhṛṣṭāḥ katipayakavayyaḥ kavalitāḥ // 388	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ajātamṛtamūrkhāṇāṃ varamādyau na cāntimaḥ / sakṛdduḥkhakarāvādyāv antimas tu pade pade // 389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajātamṛtamūrkhebhyo mṛtājātau sutau varam / yatastau svalpaduḥkhāya yāvajjīvaṃ jaḍo dahet // 390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajātaromāmatisundarāṅgīṃ śṛṅgāravallīmiva rājakanyām / bhuktvā drutaṃ kvāpi gato na cet syāḥ syātte tadānarthanipāta eva // 391	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajādhūliriva trastair mārjanīreṇuvajjanaiḥ / dīpakhaṭvotthacchāyeva tyajyate nirdhano janaḥ // 392	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ajānatā bhavetkaścid aparādhaḥ kuto yadi kṣantavyameva tasyāhuḥ suparīkṣya parīkṣayā // 393	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajānatī kāpi vilokanotsukā samīradhūtārdhamapi stanāṃśukam / kucena tasmai calate'karot puraḥ purāṅganā maṅgalakumbhasaṃbhṛtim // 394	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ajānan māhātmyaṃ patati śalabhas tīvradahane sa mīno'pyajñānād baḍiśayutamaśnātu piśitam / vijānanto'pyete vayamiha vipajjālajaṭilān na muñcāmaḥ kāmānahaha gahano mohamahimā // 395	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ajāmūtraṃ ca tadviṣṭhā sūkarasya tathaiva viṭ / budbudaṃ lepato hanyān maṇḍalikṣveḍasaṃbhavam // 396	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajāyantaitasmādamṛtaśaśilakṣmīprabhṛtayaḥ paritrātāścendrāt kulaśikhariṇaḥ pūrvayamunā / upetā ityevaṃ tava jalanidhe tīramadhunā vigarjābhiḥ kiṃ naḥ śrutipuṭamaho jarjarayasi // 397	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ajāyuddhamṛṣiśrāddhaṃ prabhāte meghaḍambaraḥ / dampatyoḥ kalahaścaiva bahvārambhe laghukriyā // 398	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajārajaḥ khararajas tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ / dīpakhaṭvotthacchāyā ca śakrasyāpi śriyaṃ haret // 399	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ajārajaḥ parvaṇi maithunāni śmaśānadhūmo maṭhabhojanāni / rajasvalānetranirīkṣaṇāni haranti puṇyāni divā kṛtāni // 400	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
ajāvigardabhoṣṭrāṇāṃ mārjāramūṣikasya ca / rajāṃsyetāni pāpāni sarvataḥ parivarjayet // 401	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ajāśvayormukhaṃ medhyaṃ gāvo medhyāstu pṛṣṭhataḥ / brāhmaṇāḥ pādato medhyāḥ striyo medhyāśca sarvataḥ // 402	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajā siṃhaprasādena vane carati nirbhayam / rāmamāsādya laṅkāyāṃ lebhe rājyaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 403	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajitendriyavargasya nācāreṇa bhavet phalam / kevalaṃ dehakhedāya durbhagasya vibhūṣaṇam // 404	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīm aniṣṭvā vividhairmakhaiḥ / adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham // 405	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajīyatāvartaśubhaṃyunābhyāṃ dorbhyāṃ mṛṇālaṃ kimu komalābhyām / niḥ sūtramāste ghanapaṅkamṛtsu mūrtāsu nākīrtiṣu tannimagnam // 406	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajīrṇaṃ tapasaḥ krodho jñānājīrṇamahaṃkṛtiḥ / parinindā kriyāṃjīrṇam annājīrṇaṃ viṣūcikā // 407	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajīrṇe bheṣajaṃ vāri jīrṇe vāri balapradam / bhojane cāmṛtaṃ vāri bhojanānte viṣāpaham // 408	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajeyaḥ subhagaḥ saumyaḥ tyāgī bhogī yaśonidhiḥ / bhavatyabhayadānena ciraṃjīvī nirāmayaḥ // 409	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajaiḍakāsūkaraviḍviḍaṅga- kiṇvopacāreṇa ca bījapūraḥ / bhūyośvamūtrāvilavārisiktaḥ phalāni dhatte subahūni śaśvat // 410	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyapāśritya kaṃcana / phalaśākamapi śreyo bhoktuṃ hyakṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe // 411	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñaṃ karmāṇi limpanti tajjñaṃ karma na limpati / lipyate rasanaivaikā sarpiṣā karavad yathā // 412	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñaḥ sukhamārādhyaḥ sukhataramārādhyate viśeṣajñaḥ / jñānalavadurvidagdhaṃ brahmāpi naraṃ na rañjayati // 413	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñatayā premṇā vā cūḍāmaṇimākalayya kācamaṇim / nṛpatirvaheta śirasā tenāsau nahyanarghyamaṇiḥ // 414	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñaścāśraddadhānaśca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati / nāyaṃ loko'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ // 415	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ajñastāvadahaṃ na mandadhiṣaṇaḥ kartuṃ manohāriṇīś cāṭūktīḥ prabhavāmiyāmibhavato yābhiḥ kṛpāpātratām / ārtenāśaraṇena kiṃ tu kṛpaṇenākranditaṃ karṇayoḥ kṛtvā satvarame hi dehi caraṇaṃ mūrdhanyadhanyasya me // 416	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñātakālocitakarmayogā rogā ivāharniśi paśyamānāḥ jagattraye devamanuṣyanāgāḥ / prajñādaridrāḥ khalu sarva eva // 417	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ajñātakulaśīlasya vāso deyo na kasyacit / mārjārasya hi doṣeṇa hato gṛdhro jaradgavaḥ // 418	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātakulaśīle'pi prītiṃ kurvanti vānarāḥ / ātmārthe ca na rodanti rodanti tvitare janāḥ // 419	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātadeśakālāś capalamukhā paṅgavo'pisa plutayaḥ / navavihagā iva mugdhā bhakṣyante dhūrtamārjāraiḥ // 420	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñātadoṣairdoṣajñair uddūṣyobhayavetanaiḥ / bhedyāḥ śatrorabhivyaktaśāsanaiḥ sāmavāyikāḥ // 421	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātanāmavarṇeṣv ātmāpi yayārpyate dhanāṃśena / tasyā api sadbhāvaṃ mṛgayante moghasaṃkalpāḥ // 422	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñātapāṇḍityarahasyamudrā ye kāvyamārge dadhate'bhimānam / te gāruḍīyānanadhītya mantrān hālāhalāsvādanamārabhante // 423	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ajñātabhāvicaurādi doṣairnityavināśinā / hāsyaikahetunā loke gaṇakasya dhanena kim // 424	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātamahimā vāṇī śivaṃ stautu rasonmadā / rasātirekādaucityabhaṅgaḥ strīṇāṃ kva labhyate // 425	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ajñātamātṛla lana- maiṇaśiśuṃ kaścidaṅkamāropya / adyāpi rakṣasi vidho dharmātmā konu bhavadanyaḥ // 426	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñātavīvadhāsāratoyasasyo vrajettu yaḥ pararāṣṭraṃ na bhūyaḥ sa svarāṣṭramadhigacchati // 427	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātaśāstrasadbhāvāñ chāstramātraparāyaṇān / tyajed dūrād bhiṣakpāśān pāśān vaivasvatāniva // 428	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātāḥ puruṣā yasya praviśanti mahīpateḥ / durgaṃ tasya na saṃdehaḥ praviśanti drutaṃ dviṣaḥ // 429	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñātāgamamīlitākṣiyugalaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñātosi prakaṭaprakampapulakairaṅgai sphuṭaṃ mugdhayā / muñcaināṃ jaḍa kiṃ na paśyasi galadbāṣpāmbudhau tānanāṃ sakhyaivaṃ gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhevalagno yuvā // 430	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñātenduparābhavaṃ parilasadvyālolanetrāñjanaṃ bhrāntabhrū latamaiṇanābhitilakaṃ śrīkhaṇḍapatrālakam / bandhūkādharasundaraṃ suramunivyāmohi vākyāmṛtaṃ trailokyādbhutapaṅkajaṃ varatanorāsyaṃ na kasya priyam // 431	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syād viyogo yadi kāraṇam / śoko dineṣu gacchatsu vardhatāmapayāti kim // 432	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānaṃ khalu kaṣṭaṃ krodhādibhyo'pi sarvapāpebhyaḥ / arthaṃ hitamahitaṃ vā na vetti yenāvṛto lokaḥ // 433	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñānaṃ yatphalaṃ tasya raso'dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / bhāvodakena saṃvṛddhis tasyāśraddhā ṛtuḥ priya // 434	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānatimirāndhasya jñānañjanaśalākyā / cakṣurun mīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // 435	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānaprabhavaṃ hīdaṃ yadduḥkhamupalabhyate / lobhaprabhavamajñānaṃ vṛddhaṃ bhūyaḥ pravardhate // 436	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānamiha nidānaṃ prāgrūpaṃ jananameva bhavaroge / pāripākaḥ saṃsaraṇaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ naiṣṭhikī śāntiḥ // 437	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajñānavaraṣaṇḍena prasupto naragarddabhaḥ / kaḥ samarthaḥ prabīddhuṃ taṃ jñānabherīśatairapi // 438	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānavalito bālye madamūḍhaśca yauvane / vārddhake vihvalāṅgaśca kadā kuśalabhāgjanaḥ // 439	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānājjñānato vāpi jambūryena praropitā / gṛhe'pi sa vasannityaṃ yatidharmeṇa yujyate // 440	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānāt kurute śrāddhaṃ yo'bhiśravaṇavarjitam / śrāddhahantā bhavetkartā nirāśāḥ pitaro gatāḥ // 441	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānājjñānato vāpi yadduruktamudāhṛtam / tat kṣantavyaṃ yuvābhyāṃ me kṛtvā prītiparaṃ manaḥ // 442	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānādyadi vā jñānāt kṛtvā karma vigarhitam / tasmād vimuktimanvicchan dvitīyaṃ na samācaret // 443	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānādyadi vādhipatyarabhasādasmatparokṣaṃ hṛtā sīteyaṃ pravimucyatāṃ śaṭha marutputrasya haste'dhunā / no cel lakṣmaṇamuktamārgaṇagaṇacchedocchalacchoṇita- cchatracchannadigantamantakapuraṃ putrairvṛto yāsyasi // 444	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñānāndhamabāndhavaṃ kavalitaṃ rakṣobhirakṣābhidhaiḥ kṣiptaṃ mohamahāndhakūpakuhare durhṛdbhirābhyntaraiḥ / krandantaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ gatadhṛtiṃ sarvāpadāmāspadaṃ mā māṃ muñca maheśa peśaladṛśā satrāsamāśvāsaya // 445	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ajñānānnirayaṃ yāti tathājñānena durgatim / ajñānāt kleśamāpnoti tathāpatsu nimajjati // 446	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānāmavanībhujāmaharaḥ svarṇābhiṣekotsavāj jñātuḥ śrīyuvaraṅgabhūparasikaślāghaiva saṃmānanā / sārāsāravivekaśūnyaramaṇīsaṃbhogasāmrājyataḥ sārajñendumukhīvilokakapaṭaścāturyayūnāṃ mude // 447	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ajñānāmavirāmalaukikavacobhājāmamīṣāṃ punar mantroccāraṇa eva paryavasitaṃ maunavrataṃ karmasu / grāmāyavyayalekhanena nayatāṃ kālānaśeṣānaho pāraṃparyata īdṛśāmiha nṛṇāṃ brāhmaṇyamanyādṛśam // 448	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavādāśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ kiṃ labdhaṃ śaṭha durnayena nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām / paśyaitaddayitākucavyatikaronmṛṣṭāṅgarāgāruṇaṃ vakṣaste malatailapaṅkaśabalairveṇīpadairaṅkitam // 449	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ajñānenāpihite vijñāne karma kiṃ kurute / vikale cakṣuṣi tamasā vyādāya mukhaṃ kimīkṣeta // 450	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
ajñānenāvṛto loko mātsaryānna prakāśate / lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargaṃ na gacchati // 451	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānenāvṛto loko lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ / saṅgana bahubhirnaṣṭas tena svargaṃ na gacchati // 452	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ajñānaikahato bālye yauvane gṛhatatparaḥ / vārdhake'patyacintārtaḥ karmabhirbadhyate punaḥ // 453	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñānopahato bālye yauvane madanāhataḥ / śeṣe kalatracintārtaḥ kiṃ karotu kadā janaḥ // 454	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñaścāśraddadhānaśca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati / nāyaṃ loko'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ // 455	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ajñāstaranti pāraṃ vijñā vijñāya drāṅnimajjanti / kathaya kalāvati keyaṃ tava nayanataraṅgiṇīrītiḥ // 456	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ajñebhyo granthinaḥ śreṣṭhā granthibhyo dhāriṇo varāḥ / dhāribhyo jñāninaḥ śreṣṭhā jñānibhyo vyavasāyinaḥ // 457	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajñeṣvajño guṇiṣu guṇavān paṇḍite paṇḍito'sau dīne dīnaḥ sukhini sukhavān bhogino bhogibhāvaḥ / jñātā jñāturyuvatiṣu yuvā vāgmināṃ tattvavettā dhanyaḥ so'yaṃ bhavati bhuvana yo'vadhūte'vadhūtaḥ // 458	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ajño jantuśca nīco'yam ātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā // 459	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajño na vitaratyarthān punardāridriyaśaṅkayā / prājño'pi vitaratyarthān punardāridriyaśaṅkayā // 460	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [tsgg, yBr]
ajño'pi tajjñatāmeti śanaiḥ śailo'pi cūrṇyate / bāṇo'pyeti mahālakṣyaṃ paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam // 461	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajño bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantradaḥ / ajñaṃ hi bāla ityāhuḥ pitetyeva tu mantradam // 462	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajño vā yadi vā viparyayagate jñāne'tha saṃdehabhṛd dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhi karma kurute yastasya goptā guruḥ / niḥ saṃdehaviparyaye sati punarjñāne viruddhakriyaṃ rājā cet puruṣaṃ na śāsti tadayaṃ prāptaḥ prajāviplavaḥ // 463	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
añcati rajanirudañcati timiramidaṃ cañcati mahobhūḥ / uktaṃ na tyaja yuktaṃ viracaya raktaṃ manastasmin// 464	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
añcalāntaritagurjarāṅganā- kuṅkmāruṇakucaprabhādharam / kokarāgapaṭalairnu rañjitaṃ bhānumantamudayantamāśraye // 465	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
añjanamustośīraiḥ sanāgakośātakāmalakacūrṇaiḥ / katakaphalasamāyuktaiḥ kūpe yogaḥ pradātavyaḥ // 466	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
añjanamiṣataḥ strīṇāṃ dṛśorviṣaṃ śaśvadāvasati / kathamanyathā tadīṣat pāte'pi hatā yuvānaḥ syuḥ // 467	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya ca saṃcayam / avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād dānādhyayanakarmabhiḥ // 468	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ praṇamya śirasā vadet / aśruprapātanaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā // 469	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ śirasā pādavandanam / āśākaraṇamityekaṃ kartavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā // 470	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
añjalirakāri lokair mlānimanāptaiva rañjitā jagatī / saṃdhyāyā iva vasatiḥ svalpāpi sakhe sukhāyaiva // 471	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
añjalisthāni puṣpāṇi vāsayanti karadvayam / aho sumanasāṃ vṛttir vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samā // 472	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
añjalau jalamadhīralocanā locanapratiśarīraśāritam / āttamāttamapi kāntamukṣituṃ kātarā śapharaśaṅkinī jahau // 473	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
aṭatā dhātrīmakhilām idamāścaryaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam / dhanado'pi nayananandana pariharasi yadugrasaṃparkam // 474	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aṭatkaṭakaghoṭakaprakaṭacāpaṭaṅkāravac caṭaccaṭaditi sphuṭaṃ sphuṭati medinī karparam / nijāmadharaṇīpatau valati kautukāḍambarād idaṃ bhuvanamaṇḍalaṃ daradarīdarīdaryaho // 475	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aṭanena mahāraṇye supanthā jāyate śanaiḥ / vedābhyāsāt tathā jñānaṃ śanaiḥ parvatalaṅghanam // 476	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭa vā vikaṭaḥ patatranādaiḥ kaṭuvācaṃ raṭa vāthavā divāndha / paruṣaṃ paripaśya saṃyataṃ tat paramaṃ naḥ puramāgato na cet tvam // 477	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
aṭavī kīdṛśī prāyo durgamā bhavati priye / priyasya kīdṛśī kāntā tanoti suratotsavam // 478	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭavyā drumapuṣpāṇi dūrasthā api bāndhavāḥ / kāntā cālekhyarūpā ca te kāle na pratiṣṭhitāḥ // 479	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ śivaśūlāścatuṣpathāḥ / keśaśūlāḥ striyo rājan bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // 480	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇimā mahimā caiva laghimā garimā tathā / prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ cāṣṭa siddhayaḥ // 481	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇukaṃ surataṃ nāma daṃpatyoḥ pārśvasaṃsthayoḥ / jāyante nibiḍāśleṣāḥ samībhūtaśarīrayoḥ // 482	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇunāpi praviśyāriṃ chidreṇa balavattaram / niḥśeṣaṃ majjayedrāṣṭraṃ yānapātramivodakam // 483	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇu dhanamapi na tyājyaṃ mama bhavatā jñāpite satyam / vittaṃ jīvitamagryaṃ jīvitahānirdhanatyāgaḥ // 484	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aṇupūrvaṃ bṛhat paścād bhavatyāryeṣu saṃgatam / viparītamanāryeṣu yathecchasi tathā kuru // 485	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇubhyaśca mahadbhyaśca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalo naraḥ / sarvatḥ sāramādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpadaḥ // 486	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇumātraṃ yathā śalyaṃ śarīre duḥkhadāyakam / tathātisū .. saṃyuktaṃ manaḥ saṃsāradāyakam // 487	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṇurapi nanu naiva kroḍabhūṣāsya kācit paribhajasi yadetattadvibhūtistathaiva / iha sarasi manojñe saṃtataṃ pātumambhaḥ śramaparibhavamagnāḥ ke na magnāḥ karīndrāḥ // 488	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aṇurapi maṇiḥ prāṇatrāṇakṣamo viṣabhakṣiṇāṃ śiśurapi ruṣā siṃhīsūnuḥ samāhvayate gajān / tanurapi taruskandhodbhūto dahatyanalo vanaṃ prakṛtimahatāṃ jātyaṃ tejo na mūrtimapekṣate // 489	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aṇurapyasatāṃ saṅgaḥ sadguṇaṃ hanti vistṛtam / guṇarupāntaraṃ yāti takrayogādyathā payaḥ // 490	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṇurapyupahanti vigrahaḥ prabhumantaḥ prakṛtiprakopajaḥ / akhilaṃ hi hinasti bhūdharaṃ taruśākhāntanigharṣajo'nalaḥ // 491	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān ātmāsya jantor nihito guhāyām / tamakratuḥ paśyati vītaśoko dhātuprasādānmahimānamātmanaḥ // 492	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān madhyo nitambaśca mama priyāyāḥ / yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ kiṃcāṅgarāgāruṇitaṃ priyāyāḥ // 493	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān yoge viyoge divaso'ṅganāyāḥ / yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ spṛṣṭvā sakhe satyamidaṃ bravīmi // 494	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṇḍaṃ kaṇḍūyamānena yat sukhaṃ tava bhūpate / khurjanānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhūyāttu tava vairiṇām // 495	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇḍajāḥ puṇḍarīkeṣu samudreṣu janārdanāḥ / nīlakaṇṭhāśca śaileṣu nivasantu na tena te // 496	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṇḍābhyāṃ lomaśābhyāṃ tu jātāṇḍo na hitaḥ smṛtaḥ / bharamābhāvaktrapucchaṃ ca kṛṣṇanīlaṃ parityajet / nindyaḥ kevalakṛṣṇastu sarvaśvetastu pūjitaḥ // 497	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṇvapi guṇāya mahatāṃ mahadapi doṣāya doṣiṇāṃ sukṛtam / tṛṇamapi dugdhāya gavāṃ dugdhamapi viṣāya sarpāṇām // 498	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ataḥ kavirnāmasu yāvadarthaḥ syādapramatto vyavasāyabuddhiḥ / siddhe'nyathā'rthe na yateta bhūyaḥ pariśramaṃ tatra samīkṣamāṇaḥ // 499	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi khaḍgalakṣaṇamuttamam / pradhānadehasaṃbhūtair daityāsthibhirariṃdam // 500	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāṃ śubham / sthūlaṃ na cātisūkṣmaṃ ca na pakvaṃ na kubhūmijam / hīnagranthividīrṇaṃ ca varjayedīdṛśaṃ śaram // 501	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: ysyt], ajñātam [12: yjtr], ajñātam [12: jrBt], ajñātam [12: jmjt]
ataḥ paramagamyo'yaṃ panthā viśramyatāmiti / pratyakṣiyugalaṃ tasyāḥ karṇau vaktumivāgatau // 502	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ praśaste nakṣatre śubhe vāre śuciṣmatā / auṣadhaṃ vidhivadgrāhyaṃ smṛtvā devīṃ ca suprabhām // 503	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ saṃdehadolāyāṃ ropaṇīyaṃ na mānasam / granthe'smiṃścāpacaturair cīracintāmaṇau kvacit // 504	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ataḥ samīkṣya kartavyaṃ viśeṣāt saṃgataṃ rahaḥ / ajñātahṛdayeṣvevaṃ vairībhavati sauhṛdam // 505	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ susthitacittena prasthātavyaṃ śubhe dine / smṛtvā kṣemaṃkarīṃ devīṃ paśyatā śakunāñśubhān // 506	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ata āhartumicchāmi pārvatīmātmajanmane / utpattaye havirbhoṃktur yajamāna ivāraṇim // 507	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ata eva hi necchanti sādhavaḥ satsamāgamam / yadviyogāsilūnasya manaso nāsti bheṣajam // 508	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataṭasthasvāduphala- grahaṇavyavasāyaniścayo yeṣām / te śokakleśarujāṃ kevalamupayānti pātratāṃ mandāḥ // 509	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
