atattvajño'si bālaśca dustoṣo'pūraṇo'nalaḥ / naiva tvaṃ vettha sulabhaṃ naiva tvaṃ vettha durlabham // 510	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atathyānyapi tathyāni darśayanti hi peśalāḥ / same nimnonnatānīva citrakarmavido janāḥ // 511	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atathyāstathyasaṃkāśās tathyāścātathyadarśanāḥ / dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmādyuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam // 512	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atathyenocyamānasya kaḥ kopo yanna tattathā / tathyenāpi hi kaḥ kopo yadanukte'pi mattathā // 513	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atanujvarapīḍitāsi bāle tava saukhyāya mato mamopavāsaḥ / rasamarpaya vaidyanātha nāhaṃ bhavadāveditalaṅghane samarthā // 514	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
atanunā navamambudamāmbudaṃ sutanurastramudastamavekṣya sā / ucitamāyataniḥśvasitacchalāc chvasanaśastramamuñcadamuṃ prati // 515	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
atantrī vāgvīṇā stanayugalamagrīvakalasā- vanabjaṃ dṛṅnīlotpaladalamapatrorukadalī / akāṇḍā dorvallī vadanamalakalaṅkaḥ śaśadharas tadasyāstāruṇyaṃ bhuvanaviparītaṃ ghaṭayati // 516	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atandracandrābharaṇā samuddīpitamanmathā / tārakātaralā śyāmā sānandaṃ na karoti kam // 517	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atandritacamūpatiprahitahastamasvīkṛta- praṇītamaṇipādukaṃ kimiti vismitāntaḥpuram / avāhanapariṣkriyaṃ patagarājamārohataḥ karipravarabṛṃhite bhagavatastvarāyai namaḥ // 518	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
atasīkusumopameyakāntir yamunālakukadambamūlavartī / navagopavadhūvinodaśālī vanamālī vitanotu maṅgalāni // 519	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [ssjtj, sjgg]
atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ khaṃ vīkṣya jaladāgame / ye viyoge'pi jīvanti na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam // 520	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataskarakaragrāhyam arājājñāvaśaṃvadam / adāyādavibhāgārhaṃ dhanamārjayatasthiram // 521	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atastu viparītasya nṛpaterajitātmanaḥ / saṃkṣipyate yaśo loke ghṛtabindurivāmbhasi // 522	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atastvaṣṭāṅgayā buddhyā nṛpatirnītiśāstravit / samarthaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām api jetuṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // 523	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atāḍayat pallavapāṇinaikāṃ puṣpoccaye rājavadhūmaśokaḥ / tacchedahetoralipaṅki bhaṅgyā vyākṛṣyate vāsilatā smareṇa // 524	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atikaluṣamāśunaśvaram āpātasphuraṇamanabhilāṣakaram / api hṛṣyanti janāḥ katham avalambya jñānakhadyotam // 525	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atikupitamanaske kopaniṣpattihetuṃ vidadhati sati śatrau vikriyāṃ citrarūpām / vadati vacanamuccairduḥśravaṃ karkaśādi kaluṣavikalatā yā tāṃ kṣamāṃ varṇayanti // 526	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atikupitā api sujanā yogena mṛdūbhavanti na tu nīcāḥ / hemnaḥ kaṭhinasyāpi dravaṇopāyo'sti na tṛṇānām // 527	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atikṛṣṇeṣvatigaureṣv atipīneṣvatikṛśeṣu manujeṣu / atidīrgheṣvatilaghuṣu prāyeṇa na vidyate'patyam // 528	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atikramyāpāṅgaṃ śravaṇapathaparyantagamana- prayāsenevākṣṇostaralataratāraṃ gamitayoḥ / idānīṃ rādhāyāḥ priyatamasamāyātasamaye papātasve dāmbuprasara iva harṣāśrunikaraḥ // 529	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atikrāntaṃ tu yaḥ kāryaṃ paścāccintayate naraḥ / taccāsya na bhavet kāryaṃ cintayā tu vinaśyati // 530	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atikrāntaḥ kālaḥ sucaritaśatāmodasubhago gatāḥ śuklā dharmā navanalinasūtrāṃśutanutām / parimlānaḥ prāyo budhajanakathāsāranipuṇo nirānandaṃ jātaṃ jagadidamatītotsavamiva // 531	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atikrāntaḥ kālo laṭabhalalanābhogasubhago bhramantaḥ śrāntāḥ smaḥ suciramiha saṃ sārasaraṇau / idānīṃ svaḥ sindhostaṭabhuvi samākrandanagiraḥ sutāraiḥ phūtkāraiḥ śiva śiva śiveti pratanumaḥ // 532	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atikrāntamatikrāntam anāgatamanāgatam / vartamānasukhabhrāntir navā bhogidaridrayoḥ // 533	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atikleśena yad dravyam atilobhena yatsukham / parapīḍā ca yā vṛttir naiva sādhuṣu vidyate // 534	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atikleśena ye'rthāḥ syur dharmasyātikrameṇa ca / arervā praṇipātena mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // 535	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atikleśe manaḥsthairyaṃ krameṇa sahanaṃ tathā / jayalābhāya hetū dvau sainyānāmadhikau viduḥ // 536	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atigambhīramanāvilam akṣobhyamadṛṣṭapāramavilaṅghyam / aviralataraṅgasaṃkulam ekṣiṣi vijñānasāgaraṃ mahatām // 537	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atigambhīre bhūpe kūpa iva janasya duḥkhatārasya / dadhati samīhitasiddhiṃ guṇavantaḥ pārthivā ghaṭakāḥ // 538	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aticapalakalatraṃ prātiveśmāticaura- stanayagatimāṃdhaṃ   bālaraṇḍā tanūjā / atiśaṭhamatha maitrī   vaśyatā sarvajanto ripubhayatanurogau cāṣṭaduḥkhaṃ narāṇām // 539	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aticārucandrarociḥ kurvan kusumeṣukeliketanatām / surabhiḥ kadānuyāsyati samukularucirastanīhāraḥ // 540	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aticirādanuṣaṅgavataḥ kaṇā- navanijān yadi hema jihāsasi / paṭupuṭajvalanajvaravedanā tava bhavatyapayāti ca gauravam // 541	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
atijīrṇamapakvaṃ ca jñātidhṛṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca / dagdhaṃ chidraṃ na kartavyaṃ bāhyābhyantarahastakam // 542	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atijīvati vittena sukhaṃ jīvati vidyayā / kiṃcijjīvati śilpena ṛte karma na jīvati // 543	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atitāmaso'jagandhiḥ kākaravo hrasvakūrcakaḥ pāpaḥ / bhīruḥ kudhīḥ piśāco rāsabhaliṅgastu vijñeyaḥ // 544	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atitṛṣṇā na kartavyā tṛṣṇāṃ naiva parityajet / atitṛṣṇābhibhūtasya śikhā bhavati mastake / 545	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atitejasvyapi rājā pānāsakto na sādhayatyarthān / tṛṇamapi dagdhuṃ śakto na vāḍavāgniḥ pibannaniśam // 546	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putraṃ prāpa kumudvatī / paścimādyāminīyāmāt prasādamiva cetanā // 547	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithiḥ kila pūjārhaḥ prākṛto'pi vijānatā // 548	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
atithiḥ dvāri tiṣṭheta āpo gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ / āpośanaṃ surāpānam annaṃ gomāṃsabhakṣaṇam // 549	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati / nānyastasmāt paro dharma iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // 550	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithiḥ pūjito yasya dhyāyate manasā śabham / na tat kratuśatenāpi tulyamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // 551	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithitvena varṇānāṃ deyaṃ śakyānupūrvaśaḥ / apraṇodyo'tithiḥ sāyam api vāgbhūtṛṇodakaiḥ // 552	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithirbālakaḥ patnī jananī janakastathā / pañcaite gṛhiṇaḥ poṣyā itare ca svaśaktitaḥ // 553	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithirbālakaścaiva rājā bhāryā tathaiva ca / asti nāsti na jānanti dehi dehi punaḥ punaḥ // 554	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithirbālakaścaīva strījano nṛpatistathā / ete vittaṃ na jānanti jāmātā caiva pañcamaḥ // 555	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
atithiryasya bhagnāśo gṛhātpratinivartate / sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // 556	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithiścāpavādī ca dvāvetau mama bāndhavau / apavādī haret pāpam atithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ // 557	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca / sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ sadbhir gṛhasthasya praśasyate // 558	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithīnāṃ na satkāro na ca sajjanasaṃgamaḥ / na yatra svātmavarṇāsthā sā gṛhāśramavañcanā // 559	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidarpe hatā laṅkā atimāne ca kauravāḥ / atidāne balirbaddhaḥ sarvamatyantagarhitam // 560	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidākṣiṇyayuktānāṃ śaṅkitānāṃ pade pade / parāpavādibhīrūṇāṃ na bhavanti vibhūtayaḥ // 561	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidānāddhataḥ karṇastv atilobhāt suyodhanaḥ / atikāmāddaśagrīvastv ati sarvatra varjayet // 562	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidānādbalirbaddho naṣṭo mānāt suyodhanaḥ / vinaṣṭo rāvaṇo lau lyād ati sarvatra varjayet // 563	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidānādbalirbaddho hyatimānāt suyodhanaḥ / atikāmāddaśagrīvo hyati sarvatra garhitaḥ // 564	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidāne balirbaddho atimāne ca kauravāḥ / atirūpe hṛtā sītā sarvamatyantagarhitam // 565	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atidīrghajīvidoṣād vyāsena yaśo'pahāritaṃ hanta / kairnocyeta guṇāḍhyaḥ sa eva janmāntarāpannaḥ // 566	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atidūrapathaśrāntāś chāyāṃ yānti ca śītalām / śitalāśca punaryānti kā kasya paridevanā // 567	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate / bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharṇyāmiva jaṅgamam // 568	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
atinīcāni vākyāni dṛṣṭimātrātinindakaḥ / kṣudrasaṃvādabhāṣī yo hyevaṃ duṣṭaḥ śaṭho janaḥ // 569	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atipakvakapitthena liptapātre suyāmitam / dugdhamastuvihīnaṃ syāc candrabimbopamaṃ dadhi // 570	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atipaṭalairanuyātāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayajvaraṃ vilumpantīm / mṛgamadaparimalalaharīṃ samīra pāmarapure kirasi // 571	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atiparamādbhutaveṣā kāpyeṣā jayati sṛṣṭirātmabhuvaḥ / tat kiṃ na vāñchitaṃ syād asyā yadi vidhuravīkṣaṇaḥ pātā // 572	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atiparigṛhītamaunā varjitamālyānulepanasnānā / dūrotsāritalajjā nirgranthagrantharacaneva // 573	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atiparicayādavajñā bhavati viśiṣṭe'pi vastuni prāyaḥ / lokaḥ prayāgavāsī kūpe snānaṃ samācarati // 574	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atiparicayādavajñā saṃtatagamanādanādaro bhavati / malaye bhillapurandhrī candanatarumindhanaṃ kurute // 575	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atiparicayādavajñety etad vākyaṃ mṛṣaiva tadbhāti / atiparicite'pyanādau saṃsāre'smin na jāyate'vajñā // 576	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atipātitakālasādhanā svaśarīrendriyavargatāpanī / janavanna bhavantamakṣamā nayasiddherapanetumarhati // 577	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
atipītāṃ tamorājīṃ tanīyān soḍhumakṣamaḥ / vamatīva śanaireṣa pradīpaḥ kajjalacchalāt // 578	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atipūjitatāreyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ śrutilaṅghanakṣamā sutanu / jinasiddhāntasthitiriva savāsanā kaṃ na mohayati // 579	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atipelavamatiparimita- varṇaṃ laghutaramudāharati śaṭhaḥ / paramārthataḥ sa hṛdayaṃ vahati punaḥ kālakūṭaghaṭitamiva // 580	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atipracaṇḍāṃ bahupākapākinīṃ vivādaśīlāṃ svayameva taskarīm / akrośabījāṃ paraveśmagāminīṃ tyajeta bhāryāṃ daśaputrasūrapi // 581	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atipracaṇḍā bahuduḥkhabhāginī vivādaśīlā paragehagāminī / bhartuḥ svayaṃ nindati yā ca taskarī tyajet svabhāryāṃ daśaputraputriṇīm // 582	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atiprauḍhā rātrirbahalaśikhadīpaḥ prabhavati priyaḥ premārabdhasmaravidhirasajñaḥ paramasau / sakhi svairaṃ svairaṃ suratamakarodvrīḍitavapur yataḥ paryaṅko'yaṃ ripuriva kaḍatkāramukharaḥ // 583	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atibalināmapi malinā- śayena balikarṇaputrāṇām / viśvāsopanatānāṃ vāsoputreṇa jīvitaṃ jahre // 584	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
atibahutaralajjāśṛṅkhalābaddhapādo madananṛpativāho yauvanonmattahastī / prakaṭitakucakumbho lomarājīkareṇa pibati sarasi nābhīmaṇḍalākhye payāṃsi // 585	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atibhīrumatiklībaṃ dīrghasūtraṃ pramādinam / vyasanād viṣayākrāntaṃ na bhajanti nṛpaṃ prajāḥ // 586	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atimandacandanamahīdharavātaṃ stabakābhirāmalatikātarujātam / api tāpasānupavanaṃ madanārtān madamañjuguñjadalipuñjamakārṣīt // 587	kalahaṃsa [13: sjssg]
atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānāmatīva nipuṇā dhīḥ / timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ // 588	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atimātrabhāsuratvaṃ puṣyati bhānuḥ parigrahādahnaḥ / adhigacchati mahimānaṃ candro'pi niśāparigṛhītaḥ // 589	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atimānaḥ śriyaṃ hanti puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ / garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛhavāsena ca dvijaḥ // 590	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atimāninamagrāhyam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ naram / krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano'pi narādhipam // 591	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atimṛdu navanītāccandrakāccātiramyaṃ bahulalitasudhāyāḥ svādataḥ sadrasāḍhyam / sakalalalitabhogāgārabhāgyaikayogyaṃ parilasati haviṣyaṃ kasya gallacchalena // 592	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atiyatnagṛhīto'pi khalaḥ khalakhalāyate / śirasā dhāryamāṇo'pi toyasyārdhaghaṭo yathā // 593	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiramaṇīye kāvye piśuno'nveṣayati dūśaṇānyeva / atiramaṇīye vapuṣi vraṇameva hi makṣikānikaraḥ // 594	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atirāgād daśagrīvo hyatilobhāt suyodhanaḥ / atidānād dhataḥ karṇo hyatiḥ sarvatra garhitaḥ // 595	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiricyate sujanmā kaścijjanakānnijena caritena / kumbhaḥ parimitamambhaḥ pibati papau kumbhasaṃbhavo'mbhodhim // 596	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atiruciraṅgajakṛttyā kṣobhitadakṣaṃ bhavantameva bhaje / yasmin prasādasumukhe sadyo vāmāpi bhavati mama tuṣṭyai // 597	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atirupavatī sītā atigarvī ca rāvaṇaḥ / atīva balavān rāmo laṅkāyena kṣayaṃ gatā // 598	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
atirūpād dhṛtā sītā atigarveṇa rāvaṇaḥ / atidānād balirbaddho hyati sarvatra garhitam // 599	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atirūpeṇa vai sītā atigarveṇa rāvanaḥ / atidānaṃ balirdattvā ati sarvatra varjayet // 600	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atilobho na kartavyaḥ kartavyastu pramāṇataḥ / atilobhajadoṣeṇa jambuko nidhanaṃ gataḥ // 601	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atilobho na kartavyo lobhaṃ naiva parityajet / atilobhābhibhūtasya cakraṃ bhramati mastake // 602	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atilohitakaracaraṇaṃ mañjulagorocanātilakam / haṭhaparivartitaśakaṭaṃ muraripumuttānaśāyinaṃ vande // 603	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
atilaulyaprasaktānāṃ vipattinairva dūrataḥ / jīvaṃ naśyati lobhena mīnasyāmiṣadarśane // 604	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ativādāṃstitikṣeta nābhimanyetkathaṃcana / krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet // 605	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ativādāṃstitikṣeta nāvamanyeta kaṃcana / na cemaṃ dehamāśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kenacit // 606	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ativādo'timānaśca tathātyāgo narādhipa / krodhaścātivivitsā ca mitradrohaśca tānī ṣaṭ // 607	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
eta evāsayastīkṣṇāḥ kṛntantyāyūṃṣi dehinām / etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyurbhadramastu te // 608	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ativāhitamatigahanaṃ vināpavādena yauvanaṃ yena / doṣanidhāne janmani kiṃ na prāptaṃ phalaṃ tena // 609	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ativitatagaganasaraṇi- prasaraṇaparimuktaviśramānandaḥ / marudullāsitasaurabha- kamalākarahāsakṛdravirjayati // 610	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ativipulaṃ kucayugalaṃ rahasi karairāmṛśan muhurlakṣmyāḥ / tadapahṛtaṃ nijahṛdayaṃ jayati hararmṛgayamāṇa iva // 611	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ativiśadānantapada- pravṛttadṛṣṭirna madhuravīkṣaṇataḥ / tṛpyatyañcitakāmaḥ prātastanakamalamukulavīkṣaṇataḥ // 612	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭiḥ śalabhāḥ mūṣaKāḥ śukāḥ / asatkaraśca daṇḍaśca paracakrāṇi taskarāḥ // 613	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājānīkapriyotsargo marakavyādhipīḍanam / paśūnāṃ maraṇaṃ rogo rāṣṭravyasanamucyate // 614	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ativyayo'napekṣā ca tathārjanamadharmataḥ / moṣaṇaṃ dūrasaṃsthānāṃ koṣavyasanamucyate // 615	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiśayitakadambo'yaṃ modakadambānilo vahati / viyadambudameduritaṃ me duritaṃ paśya nāgato dayitaḥ // 616	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
atiśaravyayatā madanena tāṃ nikhilapuṣpamayasvaśaravyayāt / sphuṭamakāri phalānyapi muñcatā tadurasi stanatālayugārpaṇam // 617	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
atiśaucamaśaucaṃ vā atinindā atistutiḥ / atyācāramanācāraṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mūrkhalakṣaṇam // 618	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiślathālambipayodhareyaṃ śubhrībhavatkāśavikāsikeśā / atītalāvaṇyajalapravāhā prāvṛṭ jarāṃ prāpa śaracchalena // 619	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atisaṃcayalubdhānāṃ vittamanyasya kāraṇam / anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnād anyaiśca madhu pīyate // 620	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atisaṃpadamāpannair bhetavyaṃ patanādbhūyaḥ / atyuccaśikharā meroḥ śakravajreṇa pātitāḥ // 621	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
atisajjanadurgatiḥ khalapaṅktisamunnatiḥ / yuvatistanavicyutiriti kiṃ vidhinirmitiḥ // 622	ajñātasamavṛtta [8: sslg]
atisatkṛtā api śaṭhāḥ sahabhuvamujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim / śirasā maheśvareṇā- 'pi nanu dhṛto vakra eva śaśī // 623	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atisāhasamatiduṣkaram atyāścaryaṃ ca dānamarthānām / yo'pi dadāti śarīraṃ na dadāti sa vittaleśamapi // 624	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atisāhasikaṃ śūrā mantriṇastaṃ nirūpakam / vinītaṃ guravo jajñur dhūrtamantaḥpurāṅganāḥ // 625	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiharitapatraparikara- saṃpannaspandanaikaviṭapasya / ghanavāsanairmayūkhaiḥ kusumbhakusumāyate taraṇiḥ // 626	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atītalābhasya surakṣaṇārthaṃ bhaviṣyalābhasya ca saṃgamārtham / āpatprapannasya ca mokṣaṇārthaṃ yanmantryate'sau paramo hi mantraḥ // 627	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atītānāgatānarthān viprakṛṣṭatirohitān / vijānāti yadā yogī tadā saṃviditi smṛtā // 628	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atītānāgatā bhāvā ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam / tān kālanirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñāṃ hātumarhasi // 629	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atītā śītārtiḥ prasarati śanairuṣmakaṇikā dināni sphāyante ravirapi rathaṃ mantharayati / himānīnirmuktaḥ sphurati nitarāṃ śītakiraṇaḥ śarāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kusumadhanuṣo na vyavahitaḥ // 630	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atītya bandhūnavalaṅghya mitrāṇy ācāryamāgacchati śiṣyadoṣaḥ / bālaṃ hyapatyaṃ gurave pradātur naivāparādho'sti piturna mātuḥ // 631	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atīndriyāyāṃ paralokavṛttāv ihaiva tīvrāśubhapākaśaṃsī / dṛṣyeta nāśo yadi nāma nāśu na kaḥ kukṛtyena yateta bhūtyai // 632	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atīva karkaśāḥ stabdhā hiṃsrajantubhirāvṛtāḥ / durāsadāśca viṣamā īśvarāḥ parvatā iva // 633	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa / gatāsurapi yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase // 634	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atīva balahīnaṃ hi laṅghanaṃ naiva kārayet / ye guṇā laṅghane proktās te guṇā laghubhojane // 635	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atīva saukhyaśubhadā yāmyā niśi bhavecchivā / pūrvasyāṃ tatpurādhyakṣam anyaṃ kuryādaharmukhe // 636	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atulitabaladhāmaṃ svarṇaśailābhadehaṃ danujavanakṛśānuṃ jñānināmagragaṇyam / sakalaguṇanidhānaṃ vānarāṇāmadhīśaṃ raghupativaradūtaṃ vātajātaṃ namāmi // 637	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atuṣṭaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu capalaṃ capalendriyam / nayanti nikṛtiprajñaṃ paradārāḥ parābhavam // 638	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atuṣṭidānaṃ kṛtapūrvanāśanam amānanaṃ duścaritānukīrtanam / kathāprasaṅgena ca nāmavismṛtir viraktabhāvasya janasya lakṣaṇam // 639	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
atuhinarucināsau kevalaṃ nodayādriḥ kṣaṇamuparigatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarva eva / navakaranikareṇa spaṣṭabandhūkasūna- stabakaracitamete śekharaṃ bibhratīva // 640	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati / akṣamāvān paraṃ doṣair ātmānaṃ caiva yojayet // 641	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atṛṇe satṛṇā yasmin satṛṇe tṛṇavarjitā mahī yatra / tasmiñśirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyaṃ vā dhanaṃ tatra // 642	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atogarīyaḥ kiṃ nusyād aśarma narakeṣvapi / yat priyasya priyaṃ kartum adhamena na śakyate // 643	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato nijabalonmānaṃ cāpaṃ syācchubhakārakam / devānāmuttamaṃ cāpaṃ tato nyūnaṃ ca mānavam // 644	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato'rthaṃ paṭhyate śāstraṃ kīrtirlokeṣu jāyate / kīrtimān pūjyate loke paratreha ca mānavaḥ // 645	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyanna vidyate / yatra durjana ityāha durjanaḥ sajjanaṃ svayam // 646	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
attuṃ vāñchati śāṃbhavo gaṇapaterākhuṃ kṣudhārttaḥ phaṇī taṃ ca krauñcaripoḥ śikhī girisutāsiṃho'pi nāgānanam / itthaṃ yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śaṃbhorapi syādgṛhe tatrānyasya kathaṃ na bhāvi jagatastasmāt svarūpaṃ hi tat // 647	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyacchaṃ sitamaṃśukaṃ śuci madhu svāmodamacchaṃ rajaḥ kārpuraṃ vidhṛtārdracandanakucadvandvāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ / dhārāveśma sapāṭalaṃ vicakilasragdāma candratviṣo dhātaḥ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ vṛthaiva tava na grīṣmo'bhaviṣyadyadi // 648	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atyadbhutamimaṃ manye svabhāvamamanasvinaḥ / yadupakriyamāṇo'pi prīyate na vilīyate // 649	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantaṃ kurutāṃ rasāyanavidhiṃ vākyaṃ priyaṃ jalpatu vārdheḥ pāramiyartu gacchatu nabho devādrimārohatu / pātālaṃ viśatu prasarpatu diśaṃ deśāntaraṃ bhrāmyatu na prāṇī tadapi prahartumanasā saṃtyajyate mṛtyunā // 650	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyantakaṇḍūtiparo narāṇām virodhakārī śunakaḥ sadaiva / syādūrdhvapādaḥ śunakaḥ śayānaḥ siddhipradaḥ kāryavidhau viduṣṭe // 651	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyantakṛṣṇaḥ sa vinirmalastvaṃ sa vāmanaḥ sarvata unnato'si / janārdano yat sa dayāparastvaṃ viṣṇuḥ kathaṃ vīra tavopamānam // 652	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyantakopaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī daridratā ca svajaneṣu vairam / nīcaprasaṅgaḥ kulahīnasevā cihnāni dehe narakasthitānām // 653	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyantacañcalasyeha pāradasya nibandhane / kāmaṃ vijñāyate yuktir na strīcittasya kācana // 654	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantanirgate caiva subaddhe naiva cāvile / praśaste vājināṃ netre madhvābhe kālatārake // 655	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantapariṇāhitvād atīva ślakṣṇatāvaśāt / na kāṃcidupamāṃ roḍhum ūrū śaknoti subhruvaḥ // 656	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantabhīmavanajīvagaṇena pūrṇaṃ durgaṃ vanaṃ bhavabhṛtāṃ manasāpyagamyam / caurākulaṃ viśati lobhavaśena martyo no dharmakarma vidadhāti kadācidajñaḥ // 657	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyantamatimedhāvī trayāṇāmekamaśnute / alpāyuṣo daridro vā hyanapatyo na saṃśayaḥ // 658	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantamanthanakadarthanamutsahante maryādayā niyamitāḥ kimu sādhavo'pi / lakṣmīsudhākarasudhādyupanīya śeṣe ratnākaro'pi garalaṃ kimu nojjagāra // 659	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyantamasadāryāṇām anālocitaceṣṭitam / atasteṣāṃ vivardhante satataṃ sarvasaṃpadaḥ // 660	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantavimukhe daive vyarthayatne ca pauruṣe / manasvino daridrasya vanādanyat kutaḥ sukham // 661	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantavyavadhānalabdhajanuṣo jātyāpi bhinnakramāḥ sāṃnidhyaṃ vidhinā kutūhalavatā kutrāpi saṃprāpitāḥ / gacchantyāmaraṇaṃ guṇavyatikṛtā bhedaṃ na bhūmīruhas te kāṣṭhādapi niṣṭhurā guṇagaṇairye naikatāṃ prāpitāḥ // 662	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyantaśītalatayā subhagasvabhāva satyaṃ na kaścidapi te tarurasti tulyaḥ / chāyārthināmapi punarvikaṭadvijihva- saṅgena candana viṣadrumanirviśeṣaḥ // 663	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyantaśuddhacinmātre pariṇāmaścirāya yaḥ / turyātītaṃ padaṃ tat syāt tatstho bhūyo na śocati // 664	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantasukhasaṃcārā madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ / divasāḥ subhagādityāś chāyāsaliladurbhagāḥ // 665	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantastimitāṅgānāṃ vyāyāmena sukhaiṣiṇām / bhrāntijñānāvṛtākṣāṇāṃ prahāro'pi sukhāyate // 666	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyantonnatapūrvaparvatamahāpīṭhe haraspardhayā dūrodañcitadhūmasaṃnibhatamastārāsphuliṇgākulam / nūnaṃ pañcaśaro'karocchaśimiṣāt svaṃ jvālaliṅgaṃ yato garvāccharvaparān dahenmunivarān sarvānakharvā śubhiḥ // 667	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyapūrvasya rāgasya pūrvapakṣāya pallavāḥ / padmāni pādayugmasya pratyudāharaṇāni ca // 668	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyambupānaṃ kaṭhināsanaṃ ca dhātukṣayo vegavidhāraṇaṃ ca / divāśayo jāgaraṇaṃ ca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ // 669	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyambupānāt prabhavanti rogāḥ alpāmbupāne ca tathaiva doṣāḥ / tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanāya muhurmuhurvāri pibedabhuri // 670	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jtjll], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyambupānād viṣamāśanācca divāśayājjāgaraṇacca rātrau / samrodhanān mūtrapurīṣayośca ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ prabhavanti rogāḥ // 671	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyambupānānna vipacyate'nnam anambupānācca sa eva doṣaḥ / tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanārthaṃ mahurmuhurvāri pibedabhūri // 672	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyarthavakratvamanarthakaṃ yā śūnyāpi sarvānyaguṇairvyanakti / aspṛśyatādūṣitayā tayā kiṃ tucchaśvapucchacchaṭayeva vācā // 673	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ pāpāny āpātamadhurāṇyalam / tadācara cirastheyaparalokāvalokanam // 674	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyalpasaṃpadaḥ santaḥ pumāniṣṭaśca duṣkule / lakṣmīranabhijātasya vedhasaḥ skhalitatrayam // 675	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyāgraho na kartavyo haṭhātkaścinna bhāṣate / yathāyathondati tathā bhāro bhavati kambalaḥ // 676	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atyājilabdhavijayaprasarastvayā kiṃ vijñāyate rucipadaṃ na mahīmahendraḥ / pratyarthidānavaśatāhitaceṣṭayāsau jīmūtavāhanadhiyaṃ na karoti kasya // 677	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyādarādadhyayanaṃ dvijānām arthopalabdhyā phalavadvidhāya / kratūnatucchānavituṃ tavaiṣā mīmāṃsakādyādhikṛtiḥ prasiddhā // 678	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyādareṇa nihitaṃ mayi yadbhavatyā tatpremahema kimabhūditi naiva jāne / utsṛjya kiṃ tadiha pātakamuttarāṇi prāṇā api priyatame katame bhaveyuḥ // 679	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyādaro dārasahodareṣu na mātṛpitrorna ca sodareṣu / mūrkhe niyogastanaye viyogaḥ paśyanti lokāḥ kalikautukāni // 680	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyādaro bhaved yatra kāryakāraṇavarjitaḥ / tatra śaṅkā prakartavyā pariṇāme'sukhāvahā // 681	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyāyatairniyamakāribhiruddhatānāṃ divyaiḥ prabhābhiranapāyamayairupāyaiḥ / śaurirbhujairiva caturbhiradaḥ sadā yo lakṣmīvilāsabhavanairbhuvanaṃ babhāra // 682	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyāyāsena nātmānaṃ kuryādatisamucchrayam / pāto yathā hi duḥkhāya nocchrāyaḥ sukhakṛt tathā // 683	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyāryamatidātāram atiśūramativratam / prajñābhimāninaṃ caiva śrīrbhayānnopasarpati // 684	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cātiguṇavatsveṣā nātyantaṃ nirguṇeṣu ca / naiṣā guṇānkāmayate nairguṇyāṃ nānurajyate / unmattā gaurivāndhā śrīḥ kvacidevāvatiṣṭhate // 685	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: mrym], ajñātam [12: yBtr], ajñātam [12: jyys], ajñātam [12: jsmt]
atyāśīviṣaśastraṃ hi vijitapralayānalam / tejo laṅghayituṃ śaktaḥ ko nu nāma dvijanmanām // 686	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyāsannā vināśāya dūrasthā na phalapradā / tasmādāhṛtya dātavyā bhūmiḥ pārthivasattama // 687	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyāsannā vināśāya dūrasthā na phalapradāḥ / sevyā madhyamabhāvena rājāvahnirguruḥ striyaḥ // 688	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyuktau yadi na prakupyasi mṛṣāvādaṃ na cenmanyase tadbrūmo'dbhutakīrtanāya rasanā keṣāṃ na kaṇḍūyate / deva tvattaruṇapratāpadahanajvālāvalīśoṣitāḥ sarve vāridhayastato ripuvadhūnetrāmbubhiḥ pūritāḥ // 689	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyuccastanaśailadurgamamuro nābhirgabhīrāntarā bhīmaṃ dehavanaṃ sphuradbhujalataṃ romālijālākulam / vyādhaḥ pañcaśaraḥ kiratyatitarāṃ tīkṣṇān kaṭākṣāśugāṃs- tanme brūhi manaḥkuraṅga śaraṇaṃ kiṃ sāṃprataṃ yāsyasi // 690	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyuccāḥ paritaḥsphuranti girayaḥ sphārāstathāmbhodhayas tānetānapi bibhratī kimapi na klāntāsi tubhyaṃ namaḥ / āścaryeṇa muhurmuhuḥ stutimimāṃ prastaumi yāvadbhuvas tāvadbibhrādimāṃ smṛtastava bhujo vācastato mudritāḥ // 691	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atyuccairatinīcair aślīlamayuktamanupayuktaṃ ca / na vadati nṛpatisabhāyā- mādaramīpsurmahāmanasām // 692	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atyucchrite mantriṇi pārthive ca viṣṭabhya pādāvupatiṣṭhate śrīḥ / sā strīsvabhāvādasahā bharasya tayordvayorekataraṃ jahāti // 693	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atyucchritonnatasitadhvajapaṅkticitrair nāgāśvapattirathasaṃkṣubhitairbalaughaiḥ / uddhūtacāmaravirājitagātraśobhāḥ puṇyena bhūmipatayo bhuvi saṃcaranti // 694	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyujjvalairavayavairmṛdutāṃ dadhānā muktā balaṃ vitarati smaradānadakṣā / snigdhāśāyā guruguṇagrathitā manojñā phīṇī navīnalalaneva mudaṃ dadāti // 695	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atyutsārya bahirviṭaṅkavaḍabhīgaṇḍasthalaśyāmikāṃ bhinnābhinnagavākṣajālaviralacchidraiḥ pradīpāṃśavaḥ / ārūḍhasya bhareṇa yauvanamiva dhvāntasya naktaṃ mukhe niryātāḥ kapilāḥ karālaviralaśmaśrūprarohā iva // 696	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyutsekena mahasā sāhasādhyavasāyinām / śrīrārohati saṃdehaṃ mahatāmapi bhūbhṛtām // 697	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyudāttagaṇeṣveṣā kṛtapuṇyaiḥ praropitā / śataśākhī bhavatyeva yāvanmātrāpi satkriyā // 698	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyudgāḍharayasthirākṛtighanadhvānabhramanmandara- kṣubdhakṣīradhivīcisaṃcayagataprāleyapādopamaḥ / śrīmatpotalake gabhīravivṛtidhvānapratidhvānite sāndrasvāṃśucayaśriyā valayito lokeśvaraḥ pātu vaḥ // 699	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalito'rivargaḥ kroḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ / ekatra janmani kṛtaṃ yadanena yūnā janmatraye tadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ // 700	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyunnatapadaṃ prāptaḥ pūjyān naivāvamānayet / nahuṣaḥ śakratāṃ prāptaś cyuto'gastyāvamānanāt // 701	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyunnatastanamuro nayane sudīrghe vakre bhruvāvatitarāṃ vacanaṃ tato'pi / madhyo'dhikaṃ tanuranūnagururnitambo mandā gatiḥ kimapi cādbhutayauvanāyāḥ // 702	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyunnatastanayugā taralāyatākṣī dvāri sthitā tadupayānamahotsavāya / sā pūrṇakumbhanavanīrajatoraṇasrak- saṃbhāramaṅgalamayatnakṛtaṃ vidhatte // 703	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyunnatiṃ prāpya naraḥ prāvāraḥ kīṭako yathā / sa vinaśyatyasaṃdeham āhaivamuśanā nṛpaḥ // 704	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyunnativyasaninaḥ śiraso'dhunaiṣa svasyaiva cātakaśiśuḥ praṇayaṃ vidhattām / asyaitadicchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu tāḥ svacchaśītamadhurāḥ kva nu nāma nāpaḥ // 705	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atyunnato'mbubhirmeghaś cātakān na dhinoti cet / marutā hṛtasarvasvaḥ sa paścāt kiṃ kariśyati // 706	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyupacittairupāyaiś cakrabhṛdeko bhujairiva caturbhiḥ / nṛpatiḥ śriyamapi suciraṃ haririva parirabhya nirbharaṃ ramate // 707	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyullasadbisarahasyayujā bhujena vaktreṇa śāradasudhāṃśusahodareṇa / pīyuṣapoṣasubhagena ca bhāṣitena tvaṃ cet prasīdasi mṛgākṣi kuto nidāghaḥ // 708	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atyuṣṇā jvariteva bhāskarakarairāpītasārā mahī yakṣmārtā iva pādapāḥ pramuṣitacchāyā davāgnyāśrayāt / vikrośantyavaśādivocchritaguhāvyāttānanāḥ parvatā loko'yaṃ ravipākanaṣṭahṛdayaḥ saṃyāti mūrchāmiva // 709	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atyuṣṇāt saghṛtādannād acchidrāccaiva vāsasaḥ / aparapreṣyabhāvācca bhūya icchan patatyadhaḥ // 710	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyeti rajanī yā tu sā na pratinivartate / yātyeva yamunā pūrṇā samudramudakārṇavam // 711	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atra caitrasamaye nirantarāḥ proṣitāhṛdayakīrṇapāvakāḥ / vānti kāmukamanovimohanā vyālalolamalayācalānilāḥ // 712	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
atra manmathamivātisundaraṃ dānavārimiva divyatejasam / śailarājamiva dhairyaśālinaṃ vedmi veṅkaṭapatiṃ mahīpatim // 713	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
atra yat patitaṃ varṇabindumātrāvisargakam / bhramapramādadoṣāddhi kṣantavyaṃ tat subuddhibhiḥ // 714	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrasto nijapakṣais tuṇḍavighātairjanānabhibhavantaḥ / kurvanti śatruvṛddhiṃ niśi virutavanto janavināśam // 715	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atrasthaḥ sakhi lakṣayojanagatasyāpi priyasyāgamaṃ vettyākhyāti ca dhikchukādaya ime sarve pathantaḥ sthitāḥ / matkāntasya viyogatāpadahanajvālāvalīcandanaḥ kākastena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare // 716	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrakaṇṭhaṃ viluṭha salile nirjalā bhūḥ purastāj jahyāḥ śoṣaṃ vadanavihitenāmalakyāḥ / phalena sthāne sthāne taditi pathikastrījana(ḥ) klāntagātrīṃ paśyan sītāṃ kimu na kṛpayā vardhito roditaśca // 717	ajñātasamavṛtta [17: ymBntgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atranugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttas taraṅgavātena vinītakhedaḥ / rahastvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu suptaḥ // 718	upajāti triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: Btjgl]
atrāntare kimapi vāgvibhavātivṛtta- vaicitryamullasitavibhramamāyatākṣyāḥ / tadbhūrisāttvikavikāramapāstadhairyam ācāryakaṃ vijayi mānmathamāvirāsīt // 719	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atrāntare ca kulaṭākulavartmaghāta- saṃjātapātaka iva sphuṭalāñchanaśrīḥ / vṛndāvanāntaramadīpayadṃśujālair diksundarīvadanacandanabindurinduḥ // 720	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atrāpi bhārataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jambudvīpe mahāmune / yato hi karmabhūreṣā ato'nyā bhogabhūmayaḥ // 721	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāyātaṃ pathika bhavatā karmaṇākāri pathyaṃ tathyaṃ brūmaḥ punarapi sakhe sāhasaṃ mā vidhāsīḥ / vāmākṣīṇāṃ nayananalinaprāntanirdhūtadhairyāḥ svāṃ maryādāmiha hi nagare yogino'pi tyajanti // 722	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
atrardracandanakucārpitasūtrahāra- sīmantacumbisicayasphuṭabāhumūlaḥ / dūrvāprakāṇḍarucirāsu gurūpabhogo gauḍāṅganāsu cirameṣa cakāsti veṣaḥ // 723	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atrāryaḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ nādānubandhodyame rundhāne bhuvanaṃ tvayā cakitayā yoddhā niruddhaḥ kṣaṇam / sasnehāḥ sarasāḥ sahāsarabhasāḥ sabhrū bhramāḥ saspṛhāḥ sotsāhāstvayi tadbale ca nidadhe dolāyamānā dṛśaḥ // 724	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrāvāsaparigrahaṃ gṛhapaterācakṣva caṇḍodyamaiḥ caṇḍālairupasevitāḥ sakhi dhanurhastaiḥ purastādimāḥ / utkālākulasārameyarasanālelihyamānonnata- dvārāgratvagavāsthisāsraśakalasragvallayaḥ pallayaḥ // 725	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrāśitaṃ śayitamatra nipītamatra sāyaṃ tayā saha mayā vidhivañcitena / ityādi hanta paricintayato vanānte rāmasya locanapayobhirabhūt payodhiḥ // 726	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atrāsīt kila nandasadma śakaṭasyātrābhavad bhañjanaṃ bandhacchedakaro'pidāmabhirabhūd baddho'tra dāmodaraḥ / itthaṃ māthuravṛddhavaktravigalatpīyūṣadhārāṃ pibann ānandāśrudharaḥ kadā madhupurīṃ dhanyaścariṣyāmyaham // 727	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrāsīt phaṇipāśabandhanavidhiḥ śaktyā bhavad devare gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi tāḍite hanumatā droṇādriratrāhṛtaḥ / divyairindrajidatra lakṣmaṇaśarairlokāntaraṃ prāpitaḥ kenāpyatra mṛgākṣi rākṣasapateḥ kṛttā ca kaṇṭhṭavī // 728	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atrāsthaḥ piśitaṃ śavasya kaṭhinairutkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ nakhair nagnasnāyukarālaghorakuharairmastiṣkadigdhāṅgaliḥ / saṃdaśyauṣṭhapuṭena bhugnavadanaḥ pretaścitāgnidrutaṃ sūtkārairnalakāsthikoṭaragataṃ majjānamākarṣati // 729	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrāsmin sutanu latāgṛhe'sti ramyaṃ mālatyāḥ kusumamanuccitaṃ pareṇa / ityuktvā mṛdukarapallavaṃ gṛhītvā mugdhākṣī rahasi nināya ko'pi dhanyaḥ // 730	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
atrilocanasaṃbhūtajyotirudgamabhāsibhiḥ / sadṛśaṇ śobhate'tyarthaṃ bhūpāla tava ceṣṭitam // 731	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atraiva dāsyasi vimuktimathāpi yāce mātaḥ śarīrapatanaṃ maṇikarṇikāyām / astu svakṛtyamanukampanamīśvarāṇāṃ dāsasya karmakarataiva tathā svakṛtyam // 732	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atraiva sarasi jātaṃ vikasitamatraiva nirbharaṃ nalinaiḥ / kālavaśāgatatuhinair vilīnamatraiva hā kaṣṭam // 733	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atraiṣa svayameva citraphalake kampaskhalallekhayā saṃtāpārtivinodanāya kathamapyālikhya sakhyā bhavān / bāṣpavyākulamīkṣitaḥ sarabhasaṃ cūtāṅkurairarcito mūrdhnā ca praṇataḥ sakhīṣu madanavyājena cāpahnutaḥ // 734	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
atrotpātaghanena mantrivikale śūnyāmbaravyāpinā dhṛṣṭasvaprakṛtikriyāsamucite grame tathā jṛmbhitam / rathyākardamavāhināmatiśucisvacchātmanāmantaraṃ nāpyajñāyi janairyathaughapayasāṃ srotojalānāmapi // 735	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atrodyāne mayā dṛṣṭā vallarī pañcapallavā / pallave pallave tāmrā yasyāṃ kusumamañjarī // 736	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atvarā sarvakāryeṣu tvarā kāryavināśinī / tvaramāṇena mūrkheṇa mayūro vāyasīkṛtaḥ // 737	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kālāgnirudrasya tṛtīyanayanotthitā / jvālā dahati tatsarvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ brahmaṇo yataḥ // 738	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kṛtakavihaṅgaiḥ pārthivoddūlayantais tumulamuparipātādambuvarṣāt trasantyaḥ avigalitasapatnīgātrasaṃmardaduḥkhāḥ praṇayinamabhipeturhāninādena devyaḥ // 739	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atha kena prayukto'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ / anicchannapi vārṣṇeya balādiva niyojitaḥ // 740	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ / mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhyenamiha vairiṇam // 741	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmenāvriyate vahnir yathādarśo malena ca / yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedamāvṛtam // 742	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kokila kuru maunaṃ jaladharasamaye'pi picchilā bhūmiḥ / vikasati kuṭajakadambe vaktari bheke kutastavāvasaraḥ // 743	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atha dhūkasvaro vāme yātrāyāṃ gacchataḥ śubhaḥ / dakṣiṇe mṛtaye kiṃcid duṣṭaṃ darśanamasya hi // 744	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha jagadavagāḍhaṃ vāsarāntāpacārāt timirapaṭalavṛddhāvapratīkārasattvam / śaśibhiṣaganupūrvaṃ śītahasto bhiṣajyann adhikaviśadavaktraḥ svairabhāvaṃ cakāra // 745	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atha dīrghatamaṃ tamaḥ pravekṣyan sahasā rugṇarayaḥ sa saṃbhrameṇa / nipatantamivoṣṇaraśmimurvyāṃ valayībhūtataruṃ dharāṃ ca mene // 746	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
atha dehaṃ sthirīrktuṃ yogināṃ siddhimicchatām / kathyante śuddhakarmāṇi yaiḥ siddhiṃ prāpuruttamāḥ // 747	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
atha nagaradhṛtairamātyaratnaiḥ pathi samiyāya sa jāyayābhirāmaḥ / madhuriva kusumaśriyā sanāthaḥ kramamilitairalibhiḥ kutūhalotkaiḥ // 748	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
atha nabhasi nirīkṣya vyāptadikcakravālaṃ sajalajaladajālaṃ prāptahaṛṣaprakarṣaḥ / vihitavipulabarhāḍambaro nīlakaṇṭho madamṛdukalakaṇṭho nāṭyamaṅgīcakāra // 749	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotiratreriva dyauḥ surasaridiva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtamaiśam / narapatikulabhūtyai garbhamādhatta rājñī gurubhirabhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ // 750	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atha nityamanityaṃ vā neha śocanti tadvidaḥ / nānyathā śakyate kartuṃ svabhāvaḥ śocatāmiti // 751	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha paṅktimatāmupeyivadbhiḥ sarasairvakrapathaśritairvacobhiḥ / kṣitibharturupāyanaṃ cakāra prathamaṃ tatparatasturaṅgamādyaiḥ // 752	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
atha pathikavadhūdahanaḥ śanakairudabhūnniśākarālokaḥ / kumudaprabodhadūto vyasanaguruścakravākīṇām // 753	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atha prasannendumukhīn sitāmbarā samāyayāvutpalapatralocanā / sapaṅkajā śrīriva gāṃ niṣevituṃ sahaṃsabālavyajanā śaradvadhūḥ // 754	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
athabaddhajeṭe rāme sumantre gṛhamāgate / tyakto rājā sutatyāgād aviśvastairivāsubhiḥ // 755	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
atha bhadrāṇi bhūtāṇi hīnaśaktirahaṃ param / mudaṃ tadāpi kurvīta hānirdveṣaphalaṃ yataḥ // 756	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha manasijadigjyābhiśaṃsī jaladharadugdubhirātatāna śabdam / tadanu tadanujīvibhiḥ kadambaiḥ kavacitamunmadaṣaṭpadacchalena // 757	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: nBry] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atha mantramimaṃ karne japeddaṃśaṃ spṛśet tathā / ekaviṃśativāraṃ ca vṛścikakṣveḍaśāntaye // 758	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha manmathavāhinīparāgaḥ kimapi jyotirudasphurat purastāt / timirasya jarā cakorakūraṃ kulaḍākelibanīdavānalārciḥ // 759	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
atha ratirabhasādalīkanidrā- madhuravighūrṇitalocanotpalābhiḥ / śayanatalamaśiśriyan vadhūbhiḥ saha madamanmathamantharā yuvānaḥ // 760	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
atha rājñā daraḥ kāryo na tu kasyāṃ cidāpadi / api cetasi dīrṇaḥ syān naiva varteta dīrṇavat // 761	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthatupakvāt kalato'vaśoṣitād vikṛṣya bījaṃ payasā niṣicya / viśoṣitaṃ pañcadināni sarpiṣā viḍaṅgamiśreṇa ca dhūpayet tataḥ // 762	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atharvavidhitattvajñair brāhmaṇairvijitendriyaiḥ / mantratantravidhānajñair dūrādunmūlayed ripūn // 763	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atharvāmnāyatattvajñas tantrajñaḥ kratukarmaṭhaḥ dhanurvedasya vettā ca purodhā rājasaṃmataḥ // 764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha lakṣmaṇānugatakāntavapur jaladhiṃ vilaṅghya śaśidāśarathiḥ / parivāritaḥ parita ṛkṣaganais timiraugharākṣasakulaṃ bibhide // 765	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
athavā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi narasya hi / pratikūle gate daive vināśe samupasthite // 766	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athavā procyate dhyānam anyadevātra yoginām / rahasyaṃ paramaṃ mukteḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ ca yat // 767	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athavā bhavataḥ pravartanā na kathaṃ piṣṭamiyaṃ pinaṣṭi naḥ / svata eva satāṃ parārthatā grahaṇānāṃ hi yathā yathārthatā // 768	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
athavābhiniviṣṭabuddhiṣu vrajati vyarthakatāṃ subhāṣitam / ravirāgiṣu śītarociṣaḥ karajālaṃ kamalākaroṣviva // 769	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
athavā mama bhāgyaviplavād aśaniḥ kalpita eṣa vedhasā / yadanena tarurna pātitaḥ kṣipatā tadviḍapāśrayā latā // 770	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
athavā mūlasaṃsthānām udghātaistu prabodhayet / suptāṃ kuṇḍalinīṃ śaktiṃ bisatantunibhākṛtim // 771	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athavā mṛdu vastu hiṃsituṃ mṛdunaivārabhate prajāntakaḥ / himasekavipattiratra me nalīnī pūrvanidarśanaṃ matā // 772	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [ssjB, tjr]
atha vāsavasya vacanena ruciravadanastrilocanam / klāntirahitamabhirādhayituṃ vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ // 773	udgatā = [10: sjsl] + [10: nsjg] + [11: Bnjlg] + [13: sjsjg]
atha saṃsārasaṃhāravāmanābandhavāsitaḥ / ajāyata vṛṣārūḍho bhairavo mahasāṃ nidhiḥ // 774	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sa lalitayoṣidbhrūlatācāruśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajya kaṇṭhe / sahacaramadhuhastanyastucūtāṅkurāstraś śatamakhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā // 775	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam / munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam // 776	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
atha sāndrasāṃdhyakiraṇāruṇitaṃ harihetihūti mithunaṃ patatoḥ / pṛthagutpapāta virahārtidalad- dhṛdayasrutāsṛganuliptamiva // 777	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
atha sāmānyaśṛṅgāre yuvatīnāṃ praśaṃsanam / strīpuṃsajātikathanaṃ tayoḥ saṃyogavarṇanam // 778	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha sphuranmīnavidhūtapaṅkajā vikaṅkatīraskhalitormisaṃhatiḥ / payo'vagāḍhuṃ kalahaṃsanādinī samājuhāveva vadhūḥ surāpagā // 779	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
atha svamādāya bhayena manthanāc ciratnaratnādhikamuccitaṃ cirāt / nilīya tasmin nivasannapāṃnidhir vane taḍāko dadṛśo'vanībhujā // 780	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
atha svasthāya devāya nityāya hatapāpmane / tyaktakramavibhāgāya caitanyajyotiṣe namaḥ // 781	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgatya bhuvaṃ rājñāṃ gatā vāhanatāṃ hayāḥ / teṣāṃ dharmārthakāmāṃśca sādhayantyupakāriṇaḥ // 782	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāṅgarājādavatārya cakṣur yāhīti janyāmavadat kumārī / nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag dṛṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucirhi lokaḥ // 783	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni hi vājinām / śubhāni varṇairāvartais tāni vidyādvicārataḥ // 784	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi hayārohaṇamuttamam / yena vijñātamātreṇa revantaḥ priyatāṃ vrajet // 785	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ / ratnākaraṃ vīkṣya mithaḥ sa jāyāṃ rāmābhidhāno harirityuvāca // 786	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athānandakaraṃ vakṣye ṣaḍartūnāṃ ca varṇanam / yadrasāsvādamuditā vibhānti vibudhālayaḥ // 787	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athānukramadvārāṇi viracyante'tra vāṅmaye / anyoktisūktamuktālīṃ samuddhṛtya śrutāmbudheḥ // 788	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
athāpi nāpasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu cārthavit / viṣayendriyasaṃyogān manaḥ kṣubhyati nānyathā // 789	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāpraśastāḥ kharatulyanādāḥ pradīptapucchāḥ kūnakhā vivarṇāḥ / nikṛttakarṇā dvipamastakāśca bhavanti ye vā sitatālujihvāḥ // 790	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jmjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
athāyatanasaṃnidhau bhagavato bhavānīpater manoharamacīkhanad bhuvanabhūṣaṇaṃ bhūpatiḥ / vigāhanakutūhalottaralapaurasīmantinī- payodharabharatruṭadvikaṭavīcimudraṃ saraḥ // 791	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
athāśuddhodbhavo grāmyanartaksyeva yo bhavet / kaitavasnehamāpanno bhavaḥ saṃkīrṇa ucyate // 792	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
athāśvānāṃ janmadeśān pravakṣyāmyanupūrvaśaḥ / uttamānāṃ ca madhyānāṃ hīnānāṃ yatra saṃbhavaḥ // 793	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāsasādāstamanindyatejā janasya dūrojjhitamṛtyubhīteḥ / utpattimadvastu vināśyavaśyaṃ yathāhamityevamivopadeṣṭum // 794	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athetare sapta raghupravīrā jyeṣṭhaṃ purojanmatayā guṇaiśca cakruḥ kuśaṃ ratnaviśoṣabhājaṃ saubhrātrameṣāṃ hi kulānusāri // 795	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathā vṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi / janasthāne śūnye vikalakaraṇairāryacaritair api grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam // 796	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
atheha kathyatesmābhiḥ karmanā yena bandhanam / chidyate sadupāyena śrutvā tatra pravartyatām // 797	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitat pūrṇamabhyātmaṃ yac ca netyanṛtaṃ vacaḥ / sarvaṃ netyanṛtaṃ brūyāt sa duṣkīrtiḥ svasan mṛtaḥ // 798	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atho gaṇapatiṃ vande mahāmodavidhāyinam / vidyādharagaṇairyasya pūjyate kaṇṭhagarjitam // 799	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athoccakairjaraṭhakapotakaṃdharā- tanūruhaprakaravipāṇḍuradyuti / balaiścalaccaraṇavidhūtamuccarad dhanāvalīrudacarata kṣamārajaḥ // 800	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
athocyate śvānarutasya sāraṃ sāraṃ samasteṣvapi śākuneṣu / vispaṣṭaceṣṭaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ ca śubhāśubhaṃ prāktanakarmapākam // 801	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athottarasyāṃ diśi khañjarīṭam ālokya ko'pi smitamādadhānaḥ / kasyāścidāsye smitacārubhāsi sabhāvayāmāsa vilocanāni // 802	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
athodyayau bālasuhṛt smarasya śayāmādhavaḥ śyāmalalakṣmabhaṅgyā / tārāvadhūlocanacumbanena līlāvilīnāñjanabindurinduḥ // 803	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
athopagūḍhe śaradā śaśāṅke prāvṛḍ yayau śāntataḍitkaṭākṣā / kāsāṃ na saubhāgyaguṇo'ṅganānāṃ naṣṭaḥ paribhraṣṭpayodharāṇām // 804	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adaḥ samitsaṃmukhavīrayauvata- traṭadbhujākambumṛṇālahāriṇī / dviṣadgaṇastraiṇadṛgambunirjhare yaśomarālāvalirasya khelati // 805	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adaṇḍanamadaṇḍyānāṃ daṇḍyānāṃ cāpi daṇḍanam / agrāhyāgrahaṇaṃ caiva grāhyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tathā // 806	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adaṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyāṃścaivāpyadaṇḍayan / ayaśo mahadāpnoti narakaṃ caiva gacchati // 807	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adattaṃ nādatte kṛtasukṛtakāmaḥ kimapi yaḥ śubhaśreṇistasmin vasati kalahaṃsīva kamale / vipat tasmād dūraṃ vrajati rajanīvāmbaramaṇer vinītaṃ vidyeva tridivaśivalakṣmīrbhajati tam // 808	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adattadoṣeṇa bhaved daridro daridradoṣeṇa karoti pāpam / pāpādavaśyaṃ narakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // 809	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adattabhuktamutsṛjya dhanaṃ sucirarakṣitam / mūṣakā iva gacchanti kadaryāḥ svakṣaye kṣayam // 810	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adattānāmupādānaṃ hiṃsā caivāvidhānataḥ / paradāropasevā ca śārīraṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam // 811	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adattetyāgatā lajjā datteti vyathitaṃ manaḥ / dharmasnehāntare nyastā duḥkhitāḥ khalu mātaraḥ // 812	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adanaspṛhayā durīśvarāṇāṃ sadandvāri vitardimāśrayantām / apunarbhavasādhanaṃ śarīraṃ jarayāmo vayamoṃ namaḥ śivāya // 813	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: ssjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adabhramabhropalapaṭṭakeṣu ye śitīkriyante madanena patriṇaḥ / taḍillatā tannikaṣotthapāvaka- sphuliṅgabhaṅgīṃ lalitāṅgi sevate // 814	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adambhā hi rambhā vilakṣā ca lakṣmīr ghṛtācī hriyā cīrasaṃcchāditāsyā / aho jāyate mandavarṇāpyaparṇā samākarṇya tasyā guṇasyaikadeśam // 815	bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy]
adayaṃ gharṣa śilāyāṃ daha vā dāhena bhindhi lauhena / he hemakāra kanakaṃ ma māṃ guñjāphalaistulaya // 816	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adaya daśasi kiṃ tvaṃ bimbabuddhyādharaṃ me bhava capala nirāśaḥ pakvajambūphalānām / iti dayitamavetya dvāradeśāptamanyā nigadati śukamuccaiḥ kāntadantakṣatauṣṭhī // 817	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
adarśanādāpatitaḥ punaścādarśanaṃ gataḥ / na tvāsau veda na tvaṃ taṃ kaḥ san kamanuśocasi // 818	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adarśanādāpatitāḥ punaścādarśanaṃ gatāḥ / na te tava na teṣāṃ tvaṃ tatra kā paridevanā // 819	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adarśane darśanamātrakāmā dṛṣṭau pariṣvaṅgarasaikalolā / āliṅgitāyāṃ punarāyatākṣyām āśāsmahe vigrahayorabhedam // 820	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adākṣiṇyādatīvogrāḥ pavanā iva durjanāḥ / gurūnapi pratikṣeptuṃ prayatante kṣamābhṛtaḥ // 821	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adātā puruṣastyāgī dātā tyāgī ca nityaśaḥ / iti jñātvā svayaṃ buddhayā dhanaṃ dadyāt punaḥ punaḥ // 822	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
adātā puruṣas dhanaṃ saṃtyajya gacchati / dātāraṃ kṛpaṇaṃ manye mṛto'pyarthaṃ na muñcati // 823	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
adātāraṃ dātṛpravaramanayaṃ viśvavinayaṃ virūpaṃ rūpāḍhyaṃ vigatajayinaṃ viśvajayinam / akulyaṃ kulyaṃ tvāmahamavadamāśāparavaśāt mṛṣāvādetyuktistvayi khalu mṛṣāvādini mayi // 824	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adātā vaṃśadoṣeṇa karmadoṣād daridratā / utmādo mātṛdoṣeṇa pitṛdoṣeṇa mūrkhatā // 825	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adātṛmānasaṃ kvāpi na spṛśanti kavergiraḥ / duḥkhāyaivātivṛddhasya vilāsāstaruṇīkṛtāḥ // 826	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adānamīṣad dānaṃ ca kiṃcit kopāya dardhiyām / saṃpūrṇadānaṃ prakṛtir virāmo vairakāraṇam // 827	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
adāntasyāvinītasya vṛthāpaṇḍitamāninaḥ / na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasyevājitātmanaḥ // 828	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adāhi yastena daśārdhabāṇaḥ purā purārernayanālayena / na nirdahaṃstaṃ bhavadakṣivāsī na vairaśuddheradhunādharmaṇaḥ // 829	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jtylg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
adīpte'gnau hato homo hatā bhuktirasākṣikā / upajīvyā hatā kanyā svārthe pākakriyā hatā // 830	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adīrghaṃ kālamāpannaḥ praśrayaṃ yuvateḥ smaraḥ / pragalbhyate manasyeva mughaṃ vapuṣi jāyate // 831	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bibhetyaṅgārpaṇe vācchatyālikhyātāṃ ratiṃ priye / uktapratyuktasaṃmūḍhā saṃmukhaṃ na nirīkṣate // 832	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratacūtaphalotpākarasaiḥ kāntaṃ na dhinvatī / bālā nidāghalakṣmīva tāpayatyeva kevalam // 833	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adīrghadarśibhiḥ krūrair mūḍhairindriyasāyakaiḥ / hamadbhiḥ kriyate karma rudadbhiranubhūyate // 834	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adīrghasūtraḥ smṛtimān kutajño nītiśāstravit / dhīmānāyatidarśī ca mantrī rājñaḥ susaṃnidhiḥ // 835	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adurgaviṣayaḥ kasya nāreḥ paribhavāspadam / adurgo'nāśrayo rājā potacyutamanuṣyavat // 836	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ mūḍho yastu parityajet / saptajanmani sa strītvaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // 837	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aduṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ yauvane yaḥ parityajet / sa jīvanānte strītvaṃ ca vandhyatvaṃ ca samāpnuyāt // 838	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
adūragamanaṃ tīrtham adehadamanaṃ tapaḥ / anambhaḥsaṃbhavaṃ snānaṃ mātuścaraṇapaṅkajam // 839	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣyanti purastena khelāḥ khañjanapaṅktayaḥ / asmayranta viniḥśvasya priyānayanavibhramāḥ // 840	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām / nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalmiṣṭaṃ pravartate // 841	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
adṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kaṇṭho'yaṃ kāntāyā bhuvantraye / yasmādviṇāninādasya samudbhūtirvibhāvyate // 842	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭapūrvamasmābhir yadetaddṛśyate'dhunā / viṣaṃ viṣadharaiḥ pītaṃ mūrchitāḥ pathikāṅganāḥ // 843	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭapūrvānādāya bhāvānapariśaṅkitān / iṣṭāniṣṭān manuṣyāṇām astaṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ // 844	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti vaśyāḥ / arthādvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavanti kāle svajano'pi śatruḥ // 845	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adṛṣṭamukhabhaṅgasya yuktamandhasya yācitum / aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ cakṣuṣmānapi yācate // 846	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭavyāpāraṃ gatavati dinānāmadhipatau yaśaḥ śeṣībhūte śaśini gatadhāmni grahagaṇe / tathāndhaṃ saṃjātaṃ jagadupanate meghasamaye yathāmī gaṇyante tamasi paṭavaḥ kīṭamaṇayaḥ // 847	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adṛṣṭe darśanotkaṇṭhā dṛṣṭe vicchedabhīrutā / tadṛṣṭena na dṛṣṭena bhatratā labhyate mukham // 848	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adeśakālārthamanāyatikṣamaṃ yadapriyaṃ lāghavakāri cātmanaḥ / vicintya buddhyā muhurapyavaimyahaṃ na tadvaco hālahalaṃ hi tadviṣam // 849	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaśca dīyate / asatkṛtamavajñātaṃ tattāmasamudāhṛdam // 850	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adeśastho hi ripuṇā svalpakenāpi hanyate / grāho'lpīyānapi jale jalendramapāi karṣati // 851	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpyadaivatam / lokapālān sṛjeyuśca lokānanyāṃstathā dvijaḥ // 852	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adoṣāddoṣādvā tyajti vipine tāṃ yadi bhavān abhradraṃ bhadraṃ vā tribhuvanapate tvāṃ vadatu kaḥ / idaṃ krūraṃ me smarati hṛdayaṃ yat kila tayā tvadartha kāntāre kulatilaka nātmāpi gaṇitaḥ // 853	ajñātasamavṛtta [14: mnsBlg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adbhiḥ śudhyanti vastrāṇi manaḥ satyena śudhyati / ahiṃsayā ca bhūtātmā buddhirjñānena śudhyati // 854	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adbhirgātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati / vidyātapobhyāṃ bhūtātmā buddhirjñānena śudhyati // 855	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
adbhutastakrpāthodhir agādhī yasya vardhakaḥ / akṣapādo'tamaḥspṛṣṭas tvakalaṅkaḥ kalānidhiḥ // 856	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
adbhyo 'gnirbrahmataḥkṣatram aśmano lohamutthitam / teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu sāmyati // 857	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyatano yoddhavye śakuno vihayāya yākrikavirudvaḥ / divasāntarite yuddhe kṣemaḥ prāsthānikaḥ śakunaḥ // 858	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adya dhārā sadādhārā sadālambā sarasvatī / paṇḍitā maṇḍitāḥ sarve bhojarāje bhuvaṃ gate // 859	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya prabhṛtyavanatāṅgi tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau / ahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte // 860	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adya bhomidinaṃ satyaṃ satyamaprastutaṃ tava / tathāpi dūti gantavyaṃ nārtaḥ kālamapekṣate // 861	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya me saphalamāyatanetre jīvitaṃ madanasaṃśrayabhāvam / āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmāt svāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda // 862	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
adya yāvadapi yena nibaddhau na prabhū vicalituṃ balivindhyau / āsthitāvitathatāguṇapāśas tvādṛśā sa viduṣā durapāsaḥ // 863	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
adya śītaṃ varivarti sarīsarti samīraṇaḥ / apatnīko marīmarti narīnarti kucoṣṇavān // 864	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
adya sa pravasatīti subhruvaḥ śrotrasīmani vijṛmbhite dhvanau / sadya eva nijapāṇigumphite puṣpadāmani mahoragabhramaḥ // 865	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
adya sundari kalindanandinī- tīrakuñjabhuvi kelilampaṭaḥ / vādayan muralikāṃ muhurmuhur mādhavo harati māmakaṃ manaḥ // 866	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
adya svargavadhūgaṇe guṇamaya tvatkīrtimindūjjavalām uccairgāyati niṣkalaṅkimadaśāmādāsyate candramāḥ / gītākarṇanamodamuktayavasagrāsābhilāṣo vada svāminnaṅkamṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dinānyetasya vartiṣyate // 867	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adya svāṃ jananīmakāraṇaruṣā prātaḥ sudūraṃ gatāṃ pratyānetumito gato gṛhapatiḥ kṣutvaiva madhyaṃdine / paṅgutvena śarīrajarjaratayā prāyaḥ sa lakṣyākṛtir dṛṣṭo'sau bhavatā na kiṃ pathika he sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ kathyatām // 868	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyāpi kokanadacārusarekhahastāṃ tāṃ śātakumbhakalaśastanacārugātrīm / bimbādharīṃ viṣamabāṇanipīḍitāṅgīṃ saṃcintaye dvyaṇukamadhyatanuprakāśām // 869	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi kopavimukhīkṛtagantukāmā noktaṃ vacaḥ pratidadāti yadaiva vaktram / cumbāmi rodati bhṛśaṃ patito'smi pāde dāsastava priyatame bhaja māṃ smarāmi // 870	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi cāṭuśatadurlalitocitārthaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi surataklamavihvalāyāḥ / avyaktaniḥsvanitakātarakthyamāna- saṃkīrṇavarṇarucitaṃ vacanaṃ priyāyāḥ // 871	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tatkanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍam āsyaṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge / āndolanaśramajalasphuṭasāndrabindu- muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ // 872	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tatkanakagaurakṛtāṅgarāgaṃ prasvedabinduvitataṃ vadnaṃ priyāyāḥ / ante smarāmi ratikhedavilolanetraṃ rāhūparāgaparimuktamivendubimbam // 873	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tatkanakareṇughanorudeśe nyastaṃ smarāmi nakharakṣatalakṣma tasyāḥ / ākṛṣṭahemarucirāmbarmutthitāyā lajjāvaśāt karadhṛtaṃ ca tato vrajantyāḥ // 874	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tatkamalareṇusugandhagandhi tatpremavāri makaradhvajapātakāri / prāpnomyahaṃ yadi punaḥ surataikatīrthaṃ prāṇāṃstyajāmi niyataṃ tadavāptihetoḥ // 875	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tatkṛtakacagrahamāgraheṇa dantairmayā daśanavāsasi khaṇḍyamāne / tasyā manāṅmukulitākṣamalakṣyamāṇa- sītkāragarbhamasakṛdvadanaṃ smarāmi // 876	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tattaralatārakitākṣamāsyam ālipracandanarasāhitaśobhamasyāḥ / kastūrikātilakatārakitābhirāma- gaṇḍasthaladyuti muhurmanasā smarāmi // 877	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tatpraṇayabhaṅguradṛṣṭipātaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi rativibhramagātrabhaṅgam / vastrāñcalaskhalanacārupayodharāntaṃ dantacchadaṃ daśanakhaṇḍanamaṇḍanaṃ ca // 878	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tatsapariveṣaśaśiprakāśam āsyaṃ smarāmi jaḍgātravivartaneṣu / tadveladujjvalakarāṅgulijālagumpha- doḥ kandalīyugalakaṃ dayitaṃ priyāyāḥ // 879	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tatsuratakelinirastrayuddhaṃ bandhopabandhapatanotthitaśūnyahastam / dantauṣṭhapīḍananakhakṣataraktasiktaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi ratibandhuraniṣṭhuratvam // 880	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tatsuratakelivimardakheda- saṃjātagharmakaṇavisphuritaṃ priyāyāḥ / āpāṇḍuraṃ taralatāranimīlitākṣaṃ vaktraṃ smarāmi paripūrṇaniśākarābham // 881	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tadvadanapaṅkajagandhalubdha- bhrāmyaddvirephacayacumbitagaṇḍayugmam / līlāvadhūtakarapallavakaṅkanānāṃ kvāṇo vimūrcchati manaḥ stutarāṃ madīyam // 882	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tadvikasitāmbujamadhyagauraṃ gorocanātilakabhāsuraphālarekham / īṣanmadālasavighūrṇitadṛṣṭipātaṃ tasyā mukhaṃ prati mano mama gacchatīdam // 883	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tannayanakajjalamujjvalāsyaṃ viśrāntakarṇayugalaṃ parihāsahetoḥ / paśye tavātmani navīnapayodharābhyāṃ kṣīṇaṃ vapuryadi vinaśyati no na doṣaḥ // 884	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tanmadanakārmukabhaṅgurabhru- dantadyutiprakarakarburitādharoṣṭham / karṇāvasaktapulakojjvaladantapatraṃ tasyāḥ punaḥ punarapīha mukhaṃ smarāmi // 885	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tanmanasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipālaputryā / jīveti maṅgalavacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtaṃ kanakapatramanālapantyā // 886	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kanakakaṅkaṇabhūṣitāgra- hastāṃ ca vaktrakamalena sunirjitendum / līlāvartīṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣīṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi madākulalālasāṅgīm // 887	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ kanakakāntimadālasāṅgīṃ vrīḍotsukāṃ nipatitāmiva ceṣṭamānām / aṅgāṅgasaṅgaparicumbanajātamohāṃ tāṃ jīvanauṣadhimiva pramadhāṃ smarāmi // 888	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kanakacampakadāmagaurīṃ phullāravindavadanāṃ tanuromarājīm / suptotthitāṃ madanavihvalasālasāṅgīṃ vidyāṃ pramādagalitāmiva cintayāmi // 889	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kanakapatrasanāthakarṇām uttuṅgakarkaśakucārpitatārahārām / kāñcīnipuñjitaviśālanitambabimbām uddānanūpuraraṇaccaraṇāṃ smarāmi // 890	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kaṭisamārpitavāmapāṇim ākuñcitaikacaraṇāgraniruddhabhūmim / stambhāvalambitabhujāṃ pathi māṃ vrajantaṃ paśyāmi bandhuritakaṃdharamīkṣamāṇām // 891	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kuṭilakuntalakeśapāśām untidratāmarasapatraviśālanetrām / uttuṅgapīvarapayodharakuṅmalāḍhyāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi yathaiva gurūpadeśam // 892	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kṣaṇaviyogaviṣopame yāṃ saṅge punarbahutarāmamṛtābhiṣekām / tāṃ jīvadhāraṇakarīṃ madanātapatrām uddhṛttakeśanivahāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi // 893	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ kṣititale varakāminīnāṃ sarvāṅgasundaratayā prathamaikarekhām / śṛṅgāranāṭakarasottamapānapātrīṃ kāntāṃ smarāmi kusumāyudhabāṇakhinnām // 894	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ gatinirākṛtarājahaṃsīṃ dhammillanirjitakalāpamayūkhabhāsām / mattaśriyā madacakoravilolanetrāṃ saṃcintayāmi kalakaṇṭjasamānakaṇṭhām // 895	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ gamanamityuditaṃ madīyaṃ śrutvaiva bhīruhariṇīmiva cañcalākṣīm / vācaḥ skhaladvigaladaśruhalākulākṣīṃ saṃcintayāmi guruśokavinamravaktrām // 896	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ galitabandhanakeśapāśāṃ srastasrajaṃ smitasudhāmadhurādharauṣṭhīm / pīnonnatastanayugoparicārucumban- muktāvalīṃ rahasi loladṛśaṃ smarāmi // 897	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ cirayite mayi tannivāsaṃ rātrau samāgatavatīṃ parivartamānām / gatvā smitaṃ kimapi caṇcalitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ sakhyā samāgatavatīmadhikaṃ smarāmi // 898	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaścic chaknotyadṛṣṭasadṛśīṃ ca parigrahaṃ me / dṛṣṭaṃ dvayoḥ sadṛśayoḥ khalu yena rūpaṃ śakto bhavedyadi sa eva naro na cānyaḥ // 899	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ jaghanadarśanalālasena kṛṣṭaṃ mayā nivasanāṃcalamekapārśvāt / pūjya sthitāmapi tato muhurākṛṣantīṃ mandākṣasaṃkucitanūtnamukhīṃ smarāmi // 900	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ jhaṭiti vakritakandharāgrāṃ nikṣiptapāṇikamalāṃ ca nitambamimbe / vāsāṃsapārśvalasadulbaṇakeśapāśāṃ paśyāmi māṃ prati dṛśaṃ bahuśaḥ kṣipantīm // 901	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ dhavalaveśmani ratnadīpa- mālāmayūkhapaṭalairdalitāndhakāre / prāptodyame rahasi saṃmukhadarśanārthaṃ lajjābhayārtanayanāmanucintayāmi // 902	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ nakhapadaṃ stanamaṇḍale yad dattaṃ mayāsyamadhupānavimohitena / udbhinnaromapulakairbahubhiḥ samantāj jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati smarāmi // 903	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ na khalu vedmi kimīśapatnī śāpaṃ gatā surapateratha kṛṣṇalakṣmīḥ / dhatraiva kiṃ nu jagataḥ parimohanāya sā nirmitā yuvatiratnadidṛkṣayā vā // 904	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ navavayaḥśriyaminduvaktrāṃ uttuṅgapīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām / saṃpīḍya bāhuyugalena pibāmi vaktrāṃ pronmattavanmadhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam // 905	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ nijavapuḥkṛśavedimadhyām uttuṅgasaṃbhṛtasudhāstanakumbhayugmām / nānāvicitrakṛtamaṇḍanamṇḍitāṅgīṃ suptotthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi // 906	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvanaklamaniḥsahāṅgīm āpāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakakuntalālīm / pracchannapāpakṛtamantarivāvahantīṃ kaṇṭhāvasaktamṛdubāhulatāṃ smarāmi // 907	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvane madhupānaraktāṃ līlādharāṃ kṛśatanuṃ capalāyatākṣīm / kāśmīrapaṅkamṛganābhikṛtāṅgarāgāṃ karpūrapūgaparipūrṇamukhīṃ smarāmi // 908	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ nibhṛtavaktrakamāpatantaṃ māṃ dvāri vīkṣya sahasaiva miṣeṇa suptām / mandaṃ mayi spṛśati kaṇṭakitāṅgayaṣṭim utphullagallaphalakāṃ bahuśaḥ smarāmi // 909	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ nṛpatiśekhararājaputrīṃ saṃpūrṇayauvanamadālasaghūrṇanetrīm / gandharvayakṣasurakinnarnāgakanyāṃ svargādaho nipatitāmiva cintayāmi // 910	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃpraṇayinīṃ mṛgaśāvakākṣīṃ pīyūṣapūrṇakucakumbhayugaṃ vahantīm / paśyāmyahaṃ yadi purnadivasāvasāne svargāpavarganararājasukhaṃ tyajāmi // 911	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ prathamato varasundarīṇāṃ snehaikapātraghaṭitāmavanīśaputrīm / haṃho janā mama viyogahutāśano'yaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyata iti praticintayāmi // 912	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ prathamameva gataṃ virāgaṃ nirbhartsya roṣaparuṣairvacanairmuhurmām / āndolanena ca nitambasahāyavṛttyā samcintayāmi ratye sudatīmabhīkṣṇam // 913	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ prathamasaṃgamajātalajjāṃ bālāṃ rasena patite mayi mandapīṭhe / phūrkārakampitaśikhātaralapradīpaṃ karṇotpalena vinivārayatīṃ smarāmi // 914	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ bhujalatārpitakaṇṭhapāśāṃ vakṣaḥsthalaṃ mama pidhāya payodharābhyām / īṣannimīlitasalīlavilocanāntāṃ paśyāmi mṛgdhavadanāṃ vadanaṃ pibantīm // 915	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ madanamandiravaijayantīm antargṛhe vivasanāṃ dadhatīṃ niśānte / aṅgairanaṅgavisarairmama gāḍhmaṅgam āliṅgya keliśayane śayitāṃ smarāmi // 916	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ mama manaḥparitāpaśāntyai cakṣurviśuddhataṭinīmalasālasāṅgīm / śrīkhaṇḍakhaṇḍakhacitācitagātrayiṣṭaṃ tanvīṃ sadā hṛdayaharṣanidhiṃ smarāmi // 917	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mayi kapāṭasamīpalīne manmārgadattadṛśamānanadattahastām madgotracihnitapadaṃ mṛdukākalībhiḥ kiṃcittaraṅgamanasaṃ manasā smarāmi // 918	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mayi kṛtāgasi dṛṣṭabhāvāṃ bhāṣāṃ lapatyapi muhurnigṛhītavācam / rāmāṃ viruddhaghanamanyusabāṣpakaṇṭhāṃ niḥśvāsaśuṣyadadharāṃ rudatīṃ smarāmi // 919	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mayi gate cirakopayantīṃ yāntīṃ samāgatavatīṃ parivartamānām / ūrdhvasthitāṃ kimapi mañcatalaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayyāṃ samāśratavatīmadhikaṃ smarāmi // 920	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mayi dṛśaṃ tudatīṃ smarāmi smerāṃ smaradvarakarāṃ madhurāṃ sutārām / atyudbalāṃ suratalāṃ kuṭilāṃ suśīlāṃ niṣpandamandasamadapramadaprasādām // 921	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mayi nimīlitacārunetre ko'yaṃ vadetyabhihitāṃ vadatīṃ sakhībhiḥ / mātarna vidya iti sasmitamullasantīm utphullagaṇḍaphalakāṃ nitarāṃ smarāmi // 922	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ masṛṇacandanapaṅkamiśra- kastūrikāparimalotthavisarpigandām / anyonyacañcupuṭacumbanalagnapakṣma- yugmābhirāmanayanāṃ śayane smarāmi // 923	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ mukhagatairaruṇaiḥ karāgrair āpṛcchyamānamapi māṃ na vibhāṣayantīm / tadvāṣpapūritadṛśaṃ bahu niḥśvasantīṃ cintākulāṃ kimapi namramukhīṃ smarāmi // 924	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ punaḥ kamalāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi pīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām / saṃpīḍya bāhuyugalena pibāmi vaktram unmattavanmadhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam // 925	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ yadi punaḥ śravaṇāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi dīrghavirahajvaritāṅgayaṣṭim / aṅgairahaṃ samupagūhma tato'tigāḍhaṃ nonmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi // 926	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ rahasi darpaṇamīkṣamāṇām dṛṣṭvā sphuṭaṃ pratinidhiṃ mayi pṛṣṭhalīne / paśyāmi vepathumatīṃ ca suvibhramāṃ ca lajjākulāṃ ca samudaṃ jitamanmathāṃ ca // 927	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ vidhṛtakajjalalolanetrāṃ pṛthvīṃ prabhūtakusumākulakeśapāśām / sindūrasaṃlulitamauktikadantakāntim ābaddhahemakaṭakāṃ rahasi smarāmi // 928	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ vidhṛtakakajjalalolanetrāṃ pṛthvīṃ prabhūtakusumākulakeśapāśām / sindūrasaṃlulitamauktikadantakāntim ābaddhahemakaṭakāṃ rahasi smarāmi // 929	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ virahavahri nipoḍitāṅgīṃ tanvīṃ kuraṅganayanāṃ surataikapātrīm / nānāvicitrakutamaṇḍanamāvahantīṃ tāṃ rājahaṃsagamanāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi // 930	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ vihasītāṃ kācabhāranamrāṃ muktākalāpadhavalīkṛtakaṇṭhadeśām / tatkelimandaragirau kusumāyudhasya kāntāṃ smarāmi rucirojjvalapuṣpaketum // 931	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ śaśimukhīṃ navayauvanāḍhyāṃ pīnastanīṃ punarahaṃ yadi gaurakāntim / paśyāmi manmathaśarānalapīḍitāṅgīṃ gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi suśītalāni // 932	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ śikharacāruvalakṣadantair mukhyāni kundamukulāni jitāṃ ca sādhvīm / saṃcintayāmi satataṃ pravilolicittāṃ kāmeṣunīrajadṛśaṃ vanajāvataṃsām // 933	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ samapanītanitambavastrāṃ śyāmāṃ ca sādhvasarasākulavihvalāṅgīm / ekena pāṇikamalena pidhāya gṛhyam anyena nābhikuharaṃ dadhatīṃ smarāmi // 934	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ salalitaślathakeśapāśām īṣatsamunmiṣitaghūrṇitavakranetrām / suptotthitāṃ vidadhatīṃ muhuraṅgabhaṅga paśyāmi daṣṭamadharaṃ bahuśaḥ spṛśantīm // 935	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ sunipuṇaṃ yatatā mayāpi dṛṣṭaṃ na yatsadṛśato vadanaṃ kadācit / saundaryanirjitarati dvijarājakānti kāntāmihātivimalatvamahāguṇena // 936	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ surataghūrṇanimīlitākṣīṃ srastāṅgayaṣṭagalitāṃśukakeśapāśām / śṛṅgāravāriruhakānanarāhahaṃsīṃ janmāntare'pi nidhane'pyanucintayāmi // 937	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suratajāgaraghūrṇamāna- tiryagvalattaralatārakdīrghanetrām / śṛṅgārasārakamalākararājahaṃsīṃ vrīḍāvinamravadanāmuṣasi smarāmi // 938	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhāraṃ durvāradarpajaghanaglapitāṅgayaṣṭim / aṅgaṃ rasaiḥ samupaguhya kaṭiṃ dadhānāṃ kiṃcinnimīlanayanāṃ manasā smarāmi // 939	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhārīṃ pūrṇendusundaramukhīṃ madavihvalāṅgīm / tanvīṃ viśālajaghanastanabhāranamrāṃ vyālolakuntalakalāpavatīṃ smarāmi // 940	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suratalabdhayaśaḥpatākāṃ lambālakāṃ virahapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittim / svapne'pi lolanayanāṃ kṣaṇadṛṣṭanaṣṭāṃ vidyāṃ pramādaguṇitāmiva saṃsmarāmi // 941	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ surabhinirbharadantabhājaṃ dhāvantamāsyakamalaṃ calacañcarīkam / kiṃciccalallalitakuñcitavāmanetrāṃ paśyāmi kelikamalena nivārayantīm // 942	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suvadanāṃ valabhau niṣaṇṇāṃ tadgehasaṃnidhipade mayi dṛṣṭamātre / vītottarāṃ priyasakhīṣu kutasmarāsu lajjāvilāsahasitāṃ hṛdi cintayāmi // 943	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suvadanāṃ stanabhāranabhrāṃ śyāmāṃ ca vāmanayanāṃ ramaṇīyagātrīm / nidrālasāmalakanirjitaṣaṭpadāliṃ saṃcintayāmi satataṃ smaravaijayantīm // 944	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāṃ suśayitāṃ kṣaṇaviprabuddhāṃ nidrālasāṃ hṛdi vahāmi kṛtāṅgabhaṅgām / jṛmbhāvatīrṇamukhamārutagandhalabdha- mughabhramadbhramaravibhramalolanetrām // 945	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāṃ stimitavastramivāṅgalagnāṃ prauḍhapratāpamadanānalataptadehām / bālāmanāthaśaraṇāmanukampanīyāṃ prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇamahaṃ na hi vismarāmi // 946	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāni smitamukhīṃ puruṣāyiteṣu lambālakākulakapolalatāṃ smarāmi / āndolanaśramajalākulavihvalāṅgīṃ śvāsottaraṃ ca nibhṛtaṃ ca muhurvadantīm // 947	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāni parivartitakaṃdharāṇi kiṃcitkṣutatruṭitakañcukajālakāni / tasyā bhujāgraluladudvalakuntalāni citte sphuranti mama vakravilocanāni // 948	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti karṇāntasaṃgatakaṭākṣanirīkṣitāni / tasyāḥ smarajvarakarāṇi madālasāni līlāvilāsabahulāni vilocanāni // 949	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti bimboṣṭhadeśaparikīrṇaśucismatāni / 950	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyāpi tāni mṛduvākyasubhāṣitāni tirthagvivarttinayanāntanirīkṣaṇāni līlālasāñcitagatāni śucismitāni tasyāḥ smarāmi madavibhramaceṣṭitāni // 951	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmanibhṛtakramamāgataṃ ca māṃ dvāri vīkṣya śayane nimiṣeṇa suptām / mandaṃ mayi spṛśati kaṇḍakitāṅgayaṣṭim utphullagaṇḍaphalakāṃ bahuśaḥ smarāmi // 952	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmanunayatyapi cāṭupūrvaṃ kopāt prākṛtamukhīṃ mayi sāparādhe / āliṅgati prasabhamutpulakāṅgayaṣṭiṃ māmete duḥsahamivoktavatīṃ smarāmi // 953	ajñātasamavṛtta [13: tBjjg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāmanunayatyapi mayyasaktāṃ vyāvṛttya keliśayane śayitāṃ parācīm / nidrākulāmiva mamābhimukhībhavantīṃ prātarmadaṅganihitaikabhujāṃ smarāmi // 954	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmabhiviśālanitambabimbāṃ gambhīranābhikuharāṃ tanumadhyabhāgām / amlānakomalamṛṇālasamānabāhuṃ līlālasāñcitagatiṃ manasā smarāmi // 955	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmaruṇayatyaruṇentarikṣam āpṛcchamānamapi nāma vidhārayantīm / utthāpya niścaladṛśau mama niḥśvasantīṃ cintākulāṃ kimapi namramukhīṃ smarāmi // 956	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmalamasīlitacārunetrāṃ loladbhujāvalayajhaṃkṛtimāvahantīm / vellatkarorukucamunnamitasvakarṇe kaṇḍūyanaṃ vidadhatīṃ hṛdi cintayāmi // 957	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmavahitāṃ manasācalena saṃcintayāmi yuvatīṃ mama jīvitāśām / nānyopabhuktanavayauvanabhārasārāṃ janmāntare'pi mama saiva gatiryathā syāt // 958	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmavigaṇayya kṛtāparādham āpādamūlapatitaṃ sahasā calantīm / vastrāñcalaṃ mama karānnijamākṣipantīṃ mā meti roṣaparuṣaṃ vadatīṃ smarāmi // 959	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmahamalajjitapūrvaghṛṣṭe śayyātale suśayitāṃ madanotsavāya / vīrṇāvatīṃ vikacacampakapuṣpanāsāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sadā nadatīṃ śubhāṅgīm // 960	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścād antarbahiḥ parita eva paribhramantīm / paśyāmi phullakanakāmbujasaṃnibhen vaktreṇa tiryagapavartitalocanena // 961	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāmupavane paricārayuktāṃ saṃcintayāmyupagatāṃ madanotsavāya / māṃ pārśvasaṃnihitalokabhayāt saśaṅkaṃ vyāvartitekṣaṇamanukṣaṇamīkṣamāṇām // 962	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tāmubhayapārśvagahāraramyāṃ vāsantikākusumabhāsittakañcukāṃ ca / rākābhirāmavidhumaṇḍalavalguvavatrāṃ lāvaṇyanirjjitarayāṃ satataṃ smarāmi // 963	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi tāmurasijadvayamunnamayya madhye valitritayalakṣitaromarājim / dhyāyāmi vellitabhujāṃ vihitāṅgabhaṅgaṃ vyājena nābhikuharaṃ mama darśayantīm // 964	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi tiṣṭhati dṛśoridamuttarīyaṃ dhartuṃ punaḥ stanataṭe galitaṃ pravṛttā / vācaṃ niśamya nayanaṃ nayanaṃ mameti kiṃcittadā yadkarot smitamāyatākṣī // 965	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi durnivāraṃ stutikanyā bhajati kaumāram / madbhyo na rocate sā- 'santo'pyasyai na rocante // 966	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
adyāpi dhāvati manaḥ kimahaṃ karomi sārdhaṃ sakhībhirapi vāsagṛhe sukānte / kāntāṅgasaṃgaparihāsavicitranṛtye krīḍābhirāma iti yātu madīyakālaḥ // 967	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi na sphurati kesarabhāralakṣmīr na preṅkhati dhvanitamadraguhāntareṣu / mattāstathāpi kariṇo hariṇādhipasya paśyanti bhītamanasaḥ padavīṃ vaneṣu // 968	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi nirmalaśaracchaśigaurakānti ceto munerapi haret kimutāsmadīyam / vaktraṃ sudhāmayamahaṃ yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmyavirataṃ vyathate mano me // 969	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi nānaṃ harakopavahnis tvayi jvalatyaurva ivāmburāśau / tvamanyathā manmatha madvidhānāṃ bhasmāvaśeṣaḥ kathamevamuṣṇaḥ // 970	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adyāpi rojjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭaṃ kūrmo bibharti dharaṇīṃ puṣṭhabhāge / ambhonidhirvahati duḥsahavāḍavāgniṃ aṅgīkṛtaṃ sukṛtinaḥ paripālayanti // 971	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi mārutavidhūtalatāvitānāṃ vīṇāvinodaracanāṃ mama jīviteśām / pañceṣurāṣṭrakamalāṃ śubhavedimadhyāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sartīṃ madanābhirāmām // 972	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adyāpi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti pūrṇendusundarasukhaṃ mama vallabhāyāḥ / lāvaṇyanirjitaratikṣatakāmadarpaṃ bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat // 973	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi me varatanormadhurāṇi tasyā yānyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni / nidrānimīlitadṛśo madamantharāyās tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi dhvananti // 974	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi ye na vihitā vipulāḥ prabandhā vidyotamānavibhavāḥ sukhayanti viśvam / so'yaṃ dviśuddhaguruvaṃśabhavaḥ prasiddho gopāladatta upameyapadaṃ kathaṃ syāt // 975	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi vāsagṛhato mayi nīyamāne durvārabhīṣaṇakarairyamadūtakalpaiḥ / kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ madarthe vaktuṃ na pāryata iti vyathate mano me // 976	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi vismayakarī tridaśān vihāya buddhirbalāccalati me kimahaṃ karomi / jānannapi pratimuhūrtamihāntakāle kānteti vallabhatareti mameti dhīrā // 977	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi śītadyutirātmabimbaṃ nirmāya nirmāya punarbhunakti / tasyā mukhenāyatalocanāyāḥ kartuṃ na śaktiḥ sadṛśaṃ priyāyāḥ // 978	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adyāpi śravasī na kuṇḍalacale kelikvaṇatkaṅkaṇau bāhū nāpi na hārihāravalayāluṇṭhā ca kaṇṭhāvaniḥ / asyāḥ paśya tathāpi paṅkajadṛśo viśvaṃ priyaṃ bhāvukaṃ paśyāmaḥ sphuṭatāvibhūṣaṇakarābhogaṃ vapurvaibhavam // 979	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyāpi sā mama manastaṭinī sadāste romāñcavīcivilasadvipulasvabhāvā / kādambakeśararuciḥ kṣatavīkṣaṇaṃ māṃ gātraklamaṃ kathayatī priyarājahaṃsī // 980	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi sundari tavānanacandrabimbaṃ bandīkṛtāmbujayugaṃ paricumbya cetaḥ / tvatsaṃgamodbhavasukhaṃ tanute tathāpi vairaṃ karoti karuṇāvikalo vivekaḥ // 981	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigiti krodhādivālohitaḥ / udyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇāt phullatkairavakośaniḥsaradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇaṃ śaśī // 982	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyāpi hariharādibhir amarairapi tattvato na vijñātāḥ / bhramavibhramabahumohā veśyāḥ saṃsāramāyāśca // 983	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adyāpi hi nṛśaṃsasya pituste divaso gataḥ / tamasā pihitaḥ panthā ehi putraka śevahe // 984	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāpyaśokanavapallavaraktahastāṃ muktāphalapracayacumbitacūcukāgrām / antaḥsmitocchvasitapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittiṃ tāṃ vallabhāmalasahaṃsagatiṃ smarāmi // 985	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyahaṃ calitacārunimīlitākṣam āsyaṃ smarāmi satataṃ suratāvasāne / tatkālaniśvasitaniḥsṛtakāntikāntaṃ svedodabinduparidanturitaṃ priyāyāḥ // 986	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyahaṃ varavadhūsuratopabhogaṃ jīvāmi nānyavidhinā kṣaṇamantareṇa / tadbhrātaro maraṇameva hi duḥkhaśāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavatastvaritaṃ lunīdhvam // 987	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyahaṃ vikacakundasamānadantaṃ tiryagvivartitaviśālavilocanāntam / tasyā mukhaṃ suvijitendu na vismarāmi codyaṃ kṛtajña iva sādhukṛtopakāram // 988	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyahaṃ sarasamañjulabhṛṅganādam īṣatsmarollasitarāgasupāṇḍugaṇḍam / paśyāmi pūrṇaśaradindusamānakānti tasyā mukhaṃ vikacapaṅkajapātranetram // 989	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyaho jagati sundaralakṣapūrṇe anyānyamuttamaguṇādhikasaṃprapanne / anyābhirapyupamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ rūpaṃ tadīyamiti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ // 990	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyāpyunmadayātudhānataruṇīcañ catkarāsphālana- vyāvalgannṛkapālatālaraṇitairnṛtyatpiśācāṅganāḥ / udgāyanti yaśāṃsi yasya vitatairnādaiḥ pracaṇḍānila- prakṣubhyatkarikumbhakūṭakuharavyaktai raṇakṣoṇayaḥ // 991	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyābhogini gāḍhamarmanivahe harmyāgravedījuṣāṃ sadyaścandanaśoṣiṇi stanataṭe saṅge kuraṅgīdṛśām / prāyaḥ praślathayanti puṣpadhanuṣaḥ puṣpākare niṣṭhite nirvedaṃ navamallikāsurabhayaḥ sāyaṃtanā vāyavaḥ // 992	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyāmbhaḥ paritaḥ patiṣyati bhuvastāpo'dya nirvāsyati kṣetreṣvadya yatiṣyate janapadaḥ sasyeṣu paryutsukaḥ / nartiṣyanti tavodaye'dya jalada vyālolapucchacchada- cchatracchāditamaulayo diśi diśi krīḍālasāḥ kekinaḥ // 993	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyārabhya kaṭhorakārmukalatāvinyastahastāmbujas tāvanna prakaṭīkaromi nayane śoṇe nimeṣodayān / yāvat sāyakakotipāṭitaripukṣmāpālamauliskhalan mallīmālyapatatparāgapaṭalairāmodinī medinī // 994	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyārabhya na hi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā bhājanaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ viṣarūpiṇaḥ śaṭhamaternāmāpi saṃkṣepataḥ / kiṃ tenaiva vinā śaśāṅkakiraṇaspaṣṭāṭṭahāsā niśā naiko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyān mama prāvṛṣi // 995	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyāśanaṃ śiśujanasya balena jātaṃ śvo vā kathaṃ nu bhaviteti vicintayantī / ityaśrupātamalinīkṛtagaṇḍadeśā neccheddaridragṛhiṇī rajanīvirāmam // 996	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyedaṃ śva idaṃ tathā parudidaṃ kṛtyaṃ parāri tvadaś cetaścintayasītthameva satataṃ nirvyākulaṃ re kutaḥ / tatkālaṃ vilasanmanorathalatākāntāradāvānalo yasmin daṇḍadharaṃ smariṣyasi sakhe so'pyasti kaścit kṣaṇaḥ // 997	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
