adyeśvarāścāraṇagāyanānāṃ sadaiva kalpadrumavat phalanti / sadbhyastu kiṃcid vacasaiva sāyaṃ dīpāya karpūramivārpayanti // 998	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adyaike prātarapare vitate'hni tathā pare / yānti niḥsīmni saṃsāre kaḥ sthātā nanu śocati // 999	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyaiva kuru yacchreyo mā tvā kālo'tyagādayam / akṛteṣveva kāryeṣu mṛtyurvai saṃprakarṣati // 1000	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyaiva kuru yacchreyo vṛddhaḥsan kiṃ kariṣyasi / svagātrāṇyapi bhārāya bhavanti hi viparyaye // 1001	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyaiva yat pratipadudgatacandralekhā- sakhyaṃ tvayā tanuriyaṃ gamitā varākyāḥ / kānte gate kusumasāyaka tat prabhāte bāṇāvalīṃ kathaya kutra vimokṣyasi tvam // 1002	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adyaiva śvaḥ paraśvastricaturadivasānantaraṃ sāyamahni prātaḥ prāhṇe parāhṇe kṣaṇamiha nivasa prasthito'bhyehi bhūyaḥ / itthaṃ rekātirekānaviditakapaṭaprakriyānarthisārthān atyarthaṃ vyarthayanti pratidivasamaho rājadhānyāṃ vadānyāḥ // 1003	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
adyaiva hasitaṃ gītaṃ krīḍitaṃ yaiḥ śarīribhiḥ / adyaiva te na dṛśyante paśya kālasya ceṣṭitam // 1004	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyotsaṅgavasadbhujaṃgakavalakleśādiveśācala- prāleyaplavanecchayānusarati śrīkhaṇḍaśailānilaḥ / kiṃ ca snigdharasālamaulimukulānyālokya harṣodayād unmīlanti kuhūḥkuhūriti kalottālāḥ pikānāṃ giraḥ // 1005	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyodyānagṛhāṅgaṇe sakhi mayā svapnena lākṣāruṇaḥ protkṣipto'yamaśokadohadavidhau pādaḥ kvaṇannūpuraḥ / tāvat kiṃ kathayāmi kelipaṭunā nirgatya kuñjodarād ajñātopanatena tena sahasā mūrdhnaiva saṃbhāvitaḥ // 1006	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adyonmīlanmalayapavanoddhūtacūtāṃkurāgra- grāsāsvādādadhikamadhurairuccaradbhirninādaiḥ / kvāpi kvāpi smarahutavahoddīpanāyādhvagānāṃ hotuṃ prāṇānṛcamiva pikaḥ sāmidhenīmadhīte // 1007	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
adrākṣīdapanidrakorakabharavyānamravallīskhalad- dhūlīdurdinasūditāmbaramasāvudyānamurvīpatiḥ / āsthānībhavanaṃ vasantanṛpaterdevasya cetobhuvaḥ satrāgāramanuttaraṃ madhulihāmekaṃ prapāmaṇḍapam // 1008	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adrākṣurye narendrā drupadatanubhuvaḥ keśapāśāvakṛṣṭiṃ cakrurvākārayan vā manasi kimaparaṃ ye'nvamanyanta mohāt / sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ samaramakhabhuvi krodhavahṇau juhoti dvitrairhuṃkāramntrairabhijanasamidho madhyamaḥ pāṇḍaveyaḥ // 1009	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adriṣvañjanapuñjakānti jaladraprāyaṃ ca mūle diśām ūrdhvaṃ nīlavitānakalpabhavanau jambālalepopamam / tīre nīranidhestamālaviṭapicchāyāṃ ca sāyaṃ śanair udgacchatyabhisārikāpriyatamapremānukūlaṃ tamaḥ // 1010	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adreḥ kiṃ svidvahati pavanaḥ śṛṅgamityunmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaścakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ / sthānādasmāt sarasaniculādutpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān // 1011	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
adrohaḥ śaucānām acāpalaṃ vrataviśeṣaniyamānām / paiśunyamapriyāṇāṃ vṛtticchedo nṛśaṃsacaritānām // 1012	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā / anugrahaśca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 1013	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adrohasamayaṃ kṛtvā munīnāmagrato hariḥ / jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva // 1014	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adrohe samayaṃ kṛtvā ciccheda namuceḥ śiraḥ / śakraḥ sā hi matā tasya ripau vṛttiḥ sanātanī // 1015	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adrau jīrṇadarīṣu saṃkaṭasarittīreṣu nimnonnate ūḍhā yena vṛṣeṇa dhūrbalavatā yūnā dvitīyena yā / tāṃ vṛddho'pi kṛśo'pi durvaha dhuraṃ voḍhuṃ sa eva kṣamo rathyābhaḍḍalakaiḥ sametya bahubhirnākṛṣyate'nyairvṛṣaiḥ // 1016	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
advitīyaṃ nijaṃ loke vilokya vahato mudam / pramadāvadanasyāyaṃ darpodreko na tu smitam // 1017	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
advisaṃvīkṣaṇaṃ cakṣur advisaṃmīlanaṃ manaḥ / advisaṃsparśanaḥ pāṇir adya me kiṃ kariṣyati // 1018	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adveṣapeśalaṃ kuryān manaḥ kusumakomalam / babhūva dveṣadoṣeṇa devadānavasaṃkṣayaḥ // 1019	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad viśrāmo hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ / kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yatsnehasāre sthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi tat prāpyate // 1020	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
advaitamekaṃ sukhamunnayantī vismārayantī jagadeva tanvi / muktāśritāmātmaruciṃ vadantī vedāntasiddhāntakatheva bhāsi // 1021	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
advaitoktipaṭūn vaṭūnapi vayaṃ bālān namaskurmahe ye tu dvandvavadāstadīyaśirasi nyasyāma vāmaṃ padam / siṃhaḥ svīyaśiśūn niveśya hṛdaye sāndrādarādāmṛśaty āveśena bhinatti saṃbhramapadaṃ mattebhakumbhasthalam // 1022	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
advaidhamānasaṃyuktaṃ śūraṃ dhīraṃ vipaścitam / na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityamiva raśmayaḥ // 1023	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaḥ karoti yadratnaṃ mūrdhnā dhārayate tṛṇam / doṣastasyaiva jaladhe ratnaṃ ratnaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam // 1024	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adhaḥ kurvanprajāḥ sarvā bahudhā mahimolbaṇaḥ / rājā parvaṇi kasmiṃścid bhavedahibhayākulaḥ // 1025	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaḥ kṣipanti kṛpaṇā vittaṃ tatra yiyāsavaḥ / santastu gurutīrthādau taduccaiḥpadakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 1026	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaḥ paśyan pārśvadvayavalitasācīkṛtaśirāḥ śanaiḥ pakṣasthairyāddivi masṛṇacakrākṛtigatiḥ / cirāccillastiryaktvaritataramāhāranipuṇo nipatyaivākasmāccalacaraṇamūrdhaṃ prapatati // 1027	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adhaḥ paśyasi kiṃ bāle patitaṃ tava kiṃ bhuvi / re re mūrkha na jānāsi gataṃ tāruṇyamauktikam // 1028	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaḥpuṣpī śaṅkhapuṣpī lajjālurgirikarṇikā / nīlinī sahadevā ca putramārjārikā tathā // 1029	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣṇukrāntā ca sarvāsāṃ jaṭā grāhyā raverdine / baddhā bhuje vilepādvā kāye śastraughavārikā // 1030	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaḥ śete śambhustava caraṇamādhāya hṛdaye bahirdvāre dauvārikapadamupetaḥ kamalajaḥ / viḍaujā vaiphalyaṃ bhajati nijavijñāpanakṛte tāvahaṃ dāsaḥ syāmiti manasi lajjā bhayamapi // 1031	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhaḥsthā ramate nārī uparisthaśca kāmukaḥ / prasiddhaṃ tadrataṃ jñeyaṃ grāmabālajanapriyam // 1032	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhanaṃ khalu jīvadhanaṃ dhanamardhadhanaṃ mahaddhanaṃ dhānyam / atidhanametat sundari vidyā ca tapaśca kīrtiśca // 1033	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhanā api te dhanyāḥ sādhavo gṛhamedhinaḥ / yadgṛhā hyarhavaryāmbutṛṇabhūmīśvarāvarāḥ // 1034	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhanā dhanamicchanti vācaṃ caiva catuṣpadāḥ / mānavāḥ svargamicchanti mokṣamicchanti devatāḥ // 1035	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vivitsatā / arthairarthā nibadhyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ // 1036	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhano dātukāmo'pi saṃprāpto dhanināṃ gṛham / manyate yācako'yaṃ dhig dāridryaṃ khalu dehinām // 1037	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhano'yaṃ dhanaṃ prāpya mādyannuccairna māṃ smaret / iti kāruṇiko nūnaṃ dhanaṃ me bhūri nādadat // 1038	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamaṃ bādhate bhūyo duḥkhavego na tattamam / pādadvayaṃ vrajatyāśu śītasparśo na cakṣuṣī // 1039	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamamitrakumitrasamāgamaḥ priyaviyogabhayāni daridratā / apayaśaḥ khalu lokaparābhavo bhavati pāpataroḥ phalamīdṛśam // 1040	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
adhamarṇaśavājīviśrāddhabhugduṣṭabhūbhujām / abhiprāyā na siddhyanti tenedaṃ dhriyate jagat // 1041	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamāḥ kalimicchanti saṃdhimicchanti madhyamāḥ / uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // 1042	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamā dhanamicchanti dhanamānau ca madhyamāḥ / uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // 1043	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhame saṃgatā lakṣmīr nopabhogāya kasyacit / kardame patitā chāyā sahakārataroriva // 1044	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamo mātukāraśca dhātukāraśca madhyamaḥ / dhātumātukriyākāra uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // 1045	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhamo lakṣaṇajñaḥ syān madhyamo lakṣyamācaret / lakṣyalakṣaṇasaṃyukta uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // 1046	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharaṃ kila bimbanāmakaṃ phalamasmāditi bhavyamanvayam / labhate'dharabimbamityadaḥ padamasyā radanacchadaṃ vadat // 1047	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
adharaḥ kisalayarāgaḥ komalaviṭapānukāriṇau bāhū / kusumamiva lobhanīyaṃ yauvanamaṅgeṣu saṃnaddham // 1048	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adharaḥ padmarāgo'yam anarghaḥ savraṇo'pi te / mugdhe hastaḥ kimartho'yam apārtha iha dīyate // 1049	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharadyutirastapallavā mukhaśobhā śaśikāntilaṅghinī / tanurapratimā ca subhruvo na vidherasya kṛtiṃ vivakṣati // 1050	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
adharamadhare kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe nidhāya bhujaṃ bhuje hṛdi ca hṛdayaṃ madhye madhyaṃ sarojadṛśo dṛḍham / sarabhasamaho corāvūruṃ padaṃ ca pade balād gamayati jano dhanyaḥ kaścit samāṃ śiśire niśām // 1051	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
adharamadhare kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhaṃ sacāṭu dṛśordṛśāv alikamalike kṛtvā gopījanena sasaṃbhramam / śiśuriti rudan kṛṣṇo vakṣaḥsthale nihito'cirān- nibhṛtapulakaḥ smeraḥ pāyāt smarālasavigrahaḥ // 1052	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
adharamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhunyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ drākṣāyāśca prasannarasaṃ phalam / sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyat svādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt // 1053	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
adharasya madhurimāṇaṃ kucakāṭhinyaṃ dṛśostathā taikṣṇyam / kavitāyāḥ paripākān anubhavarasiko vijānāti // 1054	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adharāmṛtapānena mamāsyamaparādhyatu / mūrdhno kimaparāddhaṃ yaḥ pādau nāpnoti cumbitum // 1055	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharāmṛtamādhurīdhurīṇo harilīlāmuralīnināda eṣaḥ / pratatāna manaḥpramodamuccair hariṇīnāṃ hariṇīdṛśaṃ munīnām // 1056	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adharāmṛtena pittaṃ naśyati vāyuḥ payodharayugena / anavarataratena kaphaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ vapurnāryāḥ // 1057	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhareṇa samāgamād radānām aruṇimnā pihito'pi śuklabhāvaḥ / hasitena sitena pakṣmalākṣyāḥ punarullāsamavāpa jātapakṣaḥ // 1058	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhareṇonnatibhājā bhujaṃgaparipīḍitena te dūti / saṃkṣobhitaṃ mano me jalanidhiriva mandarāgeṇa // 1059	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhare navavīṭikānurāgo nayane kajjalamujjvalaṃ dukūlam / idamābharaṇaṃ nitambanīnām itaradbhūṣaṇamaṅgadūṣaṇāya // 1060	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhare binduḥ kaṇṭhe maṇimālā stanayuge śaśaplutakam / tava sūcayanti ketaki kusumāyudhaśāstrapaṇḍitaṃ ramaṇam // 1061	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
adhare madhurā sarasvatīyaṃ nanu karṇe maṇikarṇikāpravāhaḥ / śirasi pratibhāti cāruveṇī kathameṇīnayanā na tīrtharājaḥ // 1062	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhare vinihitavaṃśaṃ campakakusumena kalpitottaṃsam / vinataṃ dadhānamaṃsaṃ vāmaṃ satataṃ namāmi jitakaṃsam // 1063	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
adharo'yamadhīrākṣyā bandhujīvaprabhāharaḥ / anyajīvaprabhāṃ hanta haratīti kimadbhutam // 1064	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharoṣṭhe ca ghoṇāyāṃ gaṇḍayościbuke tathā / muṣke nābhau trike kukṣāv āvartāstvatininditāḥ // 1065	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharo'sau kuraṅgākṣyāḥ śobhate nāsikātale / suvarṇanalikāmadhyān māṇikyamiva vicyutam // 1066	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmaṃ dharmamiti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā / sarvārthān viparītāṃśca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī // 1067	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadimaṃ lokasaṃkaram / abhipatsye śubhaṃ hitvā kriyāvidhivivarjitam / 1068	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaitad yad vyādhimaraṇaṃ gṛhe / yuddhe tu maraṇaṃ yat syāt so'sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 1069	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmaḥ surasastasya cotkaṭairmadhurāyate / yādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva suphalo lobhapādapaḥ // 1070	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmadaṇḍanaṃ loke yaśoghnaṃ kīrtināśanam / asvargyaṃ ca paratrāpi tasmāttat parivarjayet // 1071	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmadaṇḍanaṃsvargakīrtilokavināśanam / samyaktu daṇḍanaṃ rājñaḥ svargakīrtijayāvaham // 1072	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmadrohasaṃyukte mitrajāte'pyupekṣaṇam / ātmavanmitravarge tu prāṇānapi parityajet // 1073	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmapratiṣedhaśca nyāyamārgeṇa vartanam / upakāryopakāritvam iti vṛttaṃ mahīpateḥ // 1074	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmamanyatra mahītale'smin saṃkṣobhahetuṃ malinaṃ vicārya / niṣkāsanāyāsya ruṣeva deva sitaṃ yaśaḥ sarvadiśaḥ prayāti // 1075	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adharmarucayo mūḍhās tiryaggatiparāyaṇāḥ / kṛcchrāṃ yonimanuprāpya na sukhaṃ vindate janāḥ // 1076	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmasādhanaṃ budhā mudhā na jantuhiṃsanaṃ sṛjantu vedanindayā bhajantu kevalaṃ dayām / iti prabodhayan vidhiṃ vidhāya vaidikaṃ vidhiṃ viśuddhabodhabandhurantaredhi buddhadeva naḥ // 1077	pañcacāmara [16: jrjrjg]
adharmastu mahāṃstāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ / yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat // 1078	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmādarjitaṃ dravyam alpakālaṃ tu tiṣṭhati / tataḥ sapatnamayate samūlaṃ tena naśyati // 1079	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaścādharmeṇa pṛcchati / tayoranyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati // 1080	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmeṇaidhate tāvat tato bhadrāṇi paśyati / tataḥ sapatnāñ jayati samūlastu vinaśyati // 1081	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
adharmeṣu rasastasya utkledairmadhurāyate / tādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva saphalo lobhapādapaḥ // 1082	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmopacitaṃ vittaṃ harantyanye'lpamedhasaḥ / saṃbhojanīyāpadeśair jalānīva jalaukasaḥ // 1083	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
adharmopārjitairarthairyaḥ karotyaurdhvadehikam / na sa tasya phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte'rthasya durāgamāt // 1084	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharṣitānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ samareṣvanivartinām / dharṣaṇāmarṣaṇaṃ bhīru maraṇādatiricyate // 1085	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaśca dūrapātitvaṃ same lakṣyaṃ suniścitam / dṛḍhasphoṭaṃ prakurvīta ūrdhvasaṃsthānayogataḥ // 1086	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhastanaśvabhrabhuvo na yāti ṣaṇ- na sarvanārīṣu na sañjito'nyataḥ / na jāyate vyantaradevajātiṣu na bhāvanajyotiṣikeṣu sadruciḥ // 1087	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adhastācchidritaṃ carma durgandhiparipūritam / mūtraklinnaṃ ca tasyārthe mā rājan brāhmaṇān vadhīḥ // 1088	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhākṣīnno laṅkāmayamayamudanvantamatarad viśalyāṃ saumitrairayamupanināyauṣadhivarām / iti smāraṃ smāraṃ tvadarinagarībhittilikhitaṃ hanūmantaṃ dantairdaśati kupito rākṣasagaṇaḥ // 1089	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adhāri padmeṣu tadaṅghriṇā ghṛṇā kva tacchayacchāyalavo'pi pallave / tadāsyadāsye'pi gato'dhikāritāṃ na śāradaḥ pārvikaśarvarīśvaraḥ // 1090	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adhārmikāṃśca krūrāṃśca dṛṣṭadoṣān nirākṛtān / parebhyo'bhyāgatāṃścaiva dūrādetān vivarjayet // 1091	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhārmiko naro yo hi yasya cāpyanṛtaṃ dhanam / hiṃsāratiśca yo nityaṃ nehāsau sukhamedhate // 1092	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhikaḥ syāt pituḥ putro rūpavidyāparākramaiḥ / tiṣṭhan pitrārjitapade subrahmaṇyastu tādṛśaḥ // 1093	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adhikaratalatalpaṃ kalpitasvāpalīlā- parimilananimīlatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍapālī / sutanu kathaya kasya vyañjayatyañjasaiva smaranarapatilīlāyauvarājyābhiṣekam // 1094	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
adhikāra ṛṇaṃ garbhaś caturthaṃ śvānamaithunam / āgame paramaṃ saukhyaṃ nirgame duḥkhakāraṇam // 1095	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhikārābhiṣekeṣu mṛdaṅgavacanaṃ śṛṇu / baddhā daṇḍahatā riktā bhaviṣyasi yathā vayam // 1096	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhikāreṇa yo yuktaḥ kathaṃ tasyāsti khaṇḍanam / nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mudritam // 1097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhikonnatairapi sudāruṇānvitair asakṛdbhramatpaśugaṇāṅghripīḍitaiḥ / vidhisiddhanaikaguṇasasyasampadāṃ virasasvabhāvakaṭhinairalaṃ khalaiḥ // 1098	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
adhigaganamanekāstārakā rājyabhājaḥ pratigṛhamiha dīpā darśayanti prabhutvam / diśi diśi vilasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari paribhūte kiṃ na lokairvyaloki // 1099	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
adhigataparamārthān paṇḍitān māvamaṃsthās tṛṇamiva laghu lakṣmīrnaiva tān saṃruṇaddhi / abhinavamadalekhāśyāmagaṇḍasthalānāṃ na bhavati bisatanturvāraṇaṃ vāraṇānām // 1100	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
adhigatamahimā manuṣyaloke bata sutarāmavasīdati pramādī / gajapatiruruśailaśṛṅgavaṛṣmā gururavamajjati paṅkabhāṅna dāru // 1101	ajñātasamavṛtta [13: njjrg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhigatyedṛgetasyā hṛdayaṃ mṛdutāmucoḥ / pratīma eva vaimukhyaṃ kucayoryuktavṛttayoḥ // 1102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhigamanamanekāstārakā rājamānāḥ pratigṛhamapi dīpāḥ prāpnuvanti pratiṣṭhām / diśi diśi vikasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari udite'smin kiṃ nu lokairaloki // 1103	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
adhigamyāśu golakṣyam ekaḥ śāmyati mārgaṇaḥ / anurodhasthiratayā na ca śakyapratāraṇaḥ // 1104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adhidehali hanta hemavallī śaradinduḥ sarasīruhe śayānaḥ / adhikhañjanacañcu mauktikālī phalitaṃ kasya sujanmanastapobhiḥ // 1105	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhipañcavaṭīkuṭīravarti sphuṭitendīvarasundarorumūrti / api lakṣmaṇalocanaikalakṣyaṃ bhajata brahma saroruhāyatākṣam // 1106	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhibhillapalligallaṃ syādballavapallavo'pi vācālaḥ / nāgaranaravarapariṣadi kasya mukhādakṣaraṃ kṣarati // 1107	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhiyāmini gajagāmini kāmini saudāminīva yaṃ vrajasi / jaladeneva na jāne kati kati sukṛtāni tena vihitāni // 1108	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayeti ruṣā srajāvanaddhaḥ / padamapi calituṃ yuvā na sehe kimiva na śaktiharaṃ sasādhvasānām // 1109	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
adhirajani priayasavidhe kathmapi saṃveśitā balād gurubhiḥ / kiṃ bhaviteti saśaṅkaṃ paṅkajanayanā parāmṛśati // 1110	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhirajanimukhe yaḥ sāndralākṣānurāgair vyatikarita ivoccaiḥ pāṭalatvaṃ dadhānaḥ / uṣasi sa khalu dīpaḥ pānanirdhūtarāgaḥ sphuradadhara ivāyaṃ dhasaratvaṃ bibharti // 1111	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhirajani vyādhagṛhe sukhamananabhūtamanubhūya / apaśokakokamithunaṃ jīvanadānesamullasati / 1112	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite / ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // 1113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhilavaṅgamamī rajasādhikaṃ malinitāḥ sumanodalatālinaḥ / sphuṭamiti prasavena puro'hasat sapadi kundalatā dalatālinaḥ // 1114	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
adhiśrīrudyāne tvamasi bhavataḥ pallavacayo dhurīṇaḥ kalyāṇe tava jagati śākhā śramaharā / mude puṣpollekhaḥ phalamapi ca tuṣṭyai tanabhṛtāṃ rasāla tvāṃ tasmāc chrayati śataśaḥ kokilakulam // 1115	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adhiṣṭhānaṃ samicchanti hyacalaṃ nirbale sati / saṃsāre sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛṇabinduvadasthire // 1116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītapañcāśugabāṇavañcane sthitā madantarbahireṣi ceduraḥ / smarāśugebhyo hṛdaya bibhetu na praviśya tattvanmayasapuṭe mama // 1117	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jtnB], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] atha vā vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhītavidyairvigate śiśutve dhanorjite hāriṇi yauvane ca / sevyā nitambāstu vilāsinīnāṃ tatastadarthaṃ dharaṇīdharāṇām // 1118	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adhītasya ca taptasya karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya ca / ṣaṣṭhaṃ bhajati bhāgaṃ tu prajā dharmeṇa pālayan // 1119.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṣaḍbhāgasya na bhoktāsau rakṣate na prajāḥ katham // 1119.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
adhītibodhācaraṇapracāraṇair daśāścatasraḥ praṇayannupādhibhiḥ / caturdaśatvaṃ kṛtavān kutaḥ svayaṃ na vedmi vidyāsu caturdaśasvayam // 1120	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī / nādhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī // 1121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītya caturo vedān dharmaśāstrāṇyanekaśaḥ / paraṃ tattvaṃ na jānāti darvī pākarasāniva // 1122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītya caturo vedān vyākṛtyāṣṭādaśa smṛtīḥ / aho śramasya vaiphalyam ātmāpi kalito na cet // 1123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītya nītiṃ yasmācca nītiyukto na dṛśyate / anabhijñaśca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunā // 1124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītya vedān parisaṃstīrya cāgnīn iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāśca / gobrāhmaṇārthe śastrapūtāntarātmā hataḥ saṃgrame kṣatriyaḥ svargameti // 1125	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: tmyy], ajñātam [11: jtylg], bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy], vaiśvadevī [12: mmyy]
adhītya sakalaṃ śrutaṃ ceramupāsya ghoraṃ tapo yadicchasi phalaṃ tayoraha hi lābhapūjādikam / chinatsi tarupallavaprasarameva śūnyāśayaḥ kathaṃ samupalipsate surasamasya pakvaṃ phalam / 1126	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhītyedaṃ yathāśāstraṃ naro jānāti sattamaḥ / dharmopadeśavikhyātaṃ kāryākāryaṃ śubhāśubham // 1127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhīyate vijānanti virajyanti muhurmuhuḥ / nātyantāya nivartante narā vaṣamyato vidheḥ // 1128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
adhīyīta brāhmaṇo'tho yajeta dadyādiyāt tīrthamukhyāni caiva / adhyāpayedyājayeccāpi yājyān pratigrahān vā viditān pratīcchet // 1129	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: tttgl], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
tathā rājanyo rakṣaṇaṃ vai prajānāṃ kṛtvā dharmeṇāprayatto'tha dattvā / yajñairiṣṭvā sarvavedānadhītya dārān kṛtvā puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān // 1130	śālinī [11: mttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
vaiśyo'dhītya kṛṣigorakṣapaṇyair vittaṃ cinvan pālayannapramattaḥ / priyaṃ kurvan brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ dharmaśīlaḥ puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān // 1131	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: mntgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [12: rtjr]
paricaryāṃ vandanaṃ brāhmāṇānāṃ nādhīyīta pratiṣiddho'sya yajñaḥ / nityotthito bhūtaye'tandritahaḥ syād eṣa smṛtaḥ śūdradharmaḥ purāṇaḥ // 1132	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: tttlg], ajñātam [11: stmgg], ajñātam [12: myyy]
adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ kucelaḥ svayamāgataḥ / ete pañca na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā yadi // 1133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhīrākṣyāḥ pīnastanakalaśamāskandasi muhuḥ kramādūrudvandvaṃ kalayasi ca lāvaṇyalalitam / bhujāśliṣṭo harṣādanubhavasi hastāhatikalām idaṃ vīṇādaṇḍaṃ prakaṭaya phalaṃ kasya tapasaḥ // 1134	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
adhunā dadhimanthanānubandhaṃ kuruṣe kiṃ guruvibhramālasāṅgi / kalaśastani lālasīti kuñje muralīkomalakākalī murāreḥ // 1135	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
adhunā madhukarapatinā gilito'pyapakāradaṃpatī yena / trātaḥ sa pālayettvāṃ vikārarahito vināyako lakṣmyāḥ // 1136	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
adhṛtaparipatannicolabandhaṃ muṣitanakāramavakradṛṣṭipātaṃ / prakaṭahasitamunnatāsyabimbaṃ purasudṛśaḥsmaraceṣṭitaṃ smarāmi // 1137	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
adhṛta yadvirahoṣmaṇi sajjitaṃ manasijena tadūruyugaṃ tadā / spṛśati tatkadanaṃ kadalītarur yadi marujvaladūṣaradūṣitaḥ // 1138	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
adhogatiṃ ca samprāpya bisāḥ paṅkakalaṅkitāḥ / guṇino nirguṇairdāśaiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ svāṅkuradarśitāḥ // 1139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhodṛṣṭinairkṛtikaḥ svārthasādhanatatparaḥ / śaṭho mithyāvinītaśca bakavratacaro dvijaḥ // 1140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
adho'dhaḥ paśyataḥ kasya mahimā nopacīyate / uparyupari paśyantaḥ sarva eva daridrati // 1141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhomukhī strīstanatulyatāptaye pratapya tīvraṃ sumahattaraṃ tapaḥ / yadā na tāmāpa tadā hṛdi sphuṭaṃ vidīryate pakvamiṣeṇa dāḍimaḥ // 1142	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adhomukhaikadaṃṣṭreṇa viṣaśukrapravāhiṇā / anena duścikitsyena jagaddaṣṭaṃ bhagāhinā // 1143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adho'rdhe lakṣaṇaṃ yasya parārdhe naiva dṛśyate / adhamaḥ sa bhavet khaṅgaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhayāvahaḥ // 1144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adho'rdhe varṇa ekaḥ syād ūrdhvārdhe bhinnavarṇakaḥ / varṇasaṃkaravān khaḍgo nṛpāṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ // 1145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhovidhānāt kamalapravālayoḥ śiraḥsu dānādakhilakṣamābhujām / puredamūrdhvaṃ bhavatīti vedhasā padaṃ kimasyāṅkitamūrdhvarekhayā // 1146	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
adhyayanamitrasaṅga- praveśayātrāvivāhadāneṣu / śubhakāryeṣvakhileṣvapi śastaḥ somādhvagaḥ pavanaḥ // 1147	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhyastāndhyamapūrvamarthadhiṣaṇairgrāhyaṃ pumarthāspadaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedataḥ śrutigataṃ nirdhūtasādhyārthakam / āmnāyāntavibhātaviśvavibhavaṃ sarvāviruddhaṃ paraṃ satyaṃ jñānamanarthasārthavidhuraṃ brahma prapadye sadom // 1148	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhyākrāntā vasatiramunāpyāśramaṃ sarvabhogye rakṣāyogādayamapi tapaḥ pratyahaṃ saṃcinoti / asyāpi dyāṃ spṛśati vaśinaścāraṇadvandvagītaḥ puṇyaḥ śabdo muniriti muhuḥ kevalaṃ rājapūrvaḥ // 1149	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān / vismārayanti jātiṃ svāṃ varāṭāḥ pañcaṣāḥ kare // 1150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhyāpitasyośanasāpi nītiṃ prayuktarāgapraṇidhirdviṣaste / kasyārthadharmau vada pīḍayāmi sindhostaṭāvogha iva pravṛddhaḥ // 1151	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adhyāpito'si kenaitāṃ maśaka kṣudratāmiha / yasyaiva karṇe lagasi pīḍāṃ tasya karoṣi yat // 1152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
adhyāyodhanavedi mārgaṇakuśānāstīrya khaḍgasrucā hutvāreḥ palalaṃ caruṃ havirasṛk tanmastakasvastikaiḥ / saṃveṣṭyāhavanīyamānasadasi khyo'sau pratāpānalo- 'sthāpi drāgudakāñjalīkṛtacatuḥpāthodhinā śrīmatā // 1153	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhyāsāmāsuruttuṅgahemapīṭhāni yānyamī / tairūhe kesarikrāntatrikūṭaśikharopamā // 1154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhyāsite vayasyāyā bhavatā mahatā hṛdi / stanāvantarasaṃmāntau niṣkrāntau brūmahe bahiḥ // 1155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhyāsīnāśvavārairupajanitabhaye heṣamāṇaisturaṅgair garjatsphūrjanmahaujotkaṭakaraṭighaṭākoṭibhirduṣpraveśe / saṃgrāme kalpakalpe'pyarijanavisarairmārgaṇaśreṇibaddhe badhye'vadhye nṛpe'pi prabhavati yavasaṃ prāṇaviśrāṇanāya // 1156	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
adhyāsya śāntāṃ kukubhaṃ śrgālī narasya vāmā yadi rāraṭīti / tadarthalābhaṃ vitaratyavaśyam arthakṣayaṃ dakṣiṇato raṭantī // 1157	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhyāsya saurabheyaṃ mauktikaruciraṅgaṇeṣu vihitagatiḥ mānyaḥ sa eva hṛdi me gaurī vāmāṅgamāśritā yasya // 1158	ajñātasamavṛtta [8: trgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
adhyāhāraḥ smaraharaśiraścandraśeṣasya śeṣa- syāherbhūyaḥ phaṇasamucitaḥ kāyayaṣṭīnikāyaḥ / dugdhāmbhodhermuniculukanatrāsanāśābhyupāyaḥ kāyavyūhaḥ kva jagati na jāgartyadaḥ kīrtipūraḥ // 1159	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
adhyeti nṛtyati lunāti minoti nauti krīṇāti hanti vapate cinute bibheti / muṣṇāti gāyati dhinoti bibharti bhinte lobhena sīvyati paṇāyati yācate ca // 1160	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇavināśinā / dhruvaṃ yo nārjayeddharmaṃ sa śocyo mūḍhacetanaḥ // 1161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo'rjanam / sa paścāttapyate mūḍho mṛto gatvātmano gatim // 1162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhvaklāntatanurnavajvaravatī nṛtyaślathāṅgī tathā māsaikaprasavā dadāti surate ṣaṇmāsagarbhā sukham / vikhyātā virahasya saṃgamavidhau kruddhaprasanne ṛtu- sthāne nūtanasaṃgame madhumade rāgāspadaṃ yoṣitaḥ // 1163	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvani padagrahaparaṃ madayati hṛdayaṃ na vā na vā śravaṇam / kāvyamabhijñasabhāyāṃ mañjīraṃ kelivelāyām // 1164	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhvanīno'tithirjñeyaḥ śrotriyo vedapāragaḥ / mānyāvetau gṛhasthasya brahmalokamabhīpsataḥ // 1165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhvanyadhvani taravaḥ pathi pathi pathikairupāsyate chāyā / viralaḥ sa ko'pi viṭapī yamadhvago gṛhagataḥ smarati // 1166	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
adhvanyadhvani bhūruhaḥ phalabṛto namrānupekṣyādarād dūrādunnatisaṃśrayavyasaninaḥ pānthasya mugdhātmanaḥ / yanmūlaṃ samupāgatasya madhuracchāyāphalaiḥ kā kathā śīrṇenāpi hi nopayogamagamat parṇena tāladrumaḥ // 1167	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvanyasya vadhūrviyogavidhurā bhartuḥ smarantī yadi prāṇānujjhati kasya tanmahadaho saṃjāyate kilbiṣam / ityevaṃ pathikaḥ karoti hṛdaye yāvat tarormūrdhani prodghuṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭayā tava tavetyuccairvaco'nekaśaḥ // 1168	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvanyāḥ kila mūlagartamadhunāpyāpūrayantyaśrubhir vyākrośantyadhunā sabāndhavakulāḥ sāyaṃ muhūrtaṃ dvijāḥ / itthaṃ yāvadimāni bibhrati śucaṃ bhūtānyapi tvatkṛte tāvattvaṃ na gato'si pādapa ciraṃ kīrtyātmanā vartase // 1169	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvanyānāṃ śiśirasamaye caṇḍacāṇḍālakāṇḍa- prāyāḥ kāyānahaha pavanāḥ kleśayanto viśanti / badhnantyete sapadi sudṛśāṃ durbhagānāmapīha prauḍhāśleṣāślathitadayitaṃ mūrdhni saubhāgyapaṭṭam // 1170	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
adhvanyān kati rundhate kati dṛdhān bhindanti toyākarān kedārān kati yajjayanti kati ca vyāpāṭayanti drumān / vāhinyaḥ kṣaṇaluptavārivibhavā vanyā avanyāmimā yaḥ sindhuḥ sakalāśrayaḥ sa tu punaḥ kutreti na jñāyate // 1171	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvanyairmakarandaśīkarasurāmattakvaṇatkokile mārge mārganirodhinī parihṛtā śaṅke'śubhāśaṅkayā / pānthastrīvadhapātakādupagataṃ caṇḍālacihnaṃ madhor eṣā kiṅkiṇikeva ṣaṭpadamayī jhaṃkāriṇī saṃhatiḥ // 1172	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
adhvaśramāya caraṇau virahāya dārā abhyarthanāya vacanaṃ ca vapurjarāyai / etāni me vidadhatastava sarvadaiva dhātastrapā yadi na kiṃ na pariśramo'pi // 1173	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
adhvaśrāntamavijñātam atithiṃ kṣutpipāsitam / yastaṃ na pūjayed bhaktyā tamāhurbrahmaghātinam // 1174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhvāgrajāgrannibhṛtāpadandhur bandhuryadi syāt pratibandhumarhaḥ / joṣaṃ janaḥ kāryavidastu vastu pracchyā nijecchā padavīṃ mudastu // 1175	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā / asaṃbhogo jarā strīṇāṃ vākśalyaṃ manaso jarā // 1176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhvā jarā manuṣyāṇām anadhvā vājināṃ jarā / amaithunaṃ jarā strīṇām aśvānāṃ maithunaṃ jarā // 1177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhvānaṃ naikacakraḥ prabhavati bhuvanabhrāntidīrghaṃ vilaṅghya prātaḥ prāptuṃratho me punariti manasi nyastacintātibhāraḥ / saṃdhyākṛṣṭāvaśiṣṭasvakaraparikaraiḥ spaṣṭahemārapaṅkti vyākṛṣyāvasthito'stakṣitibhṛti nayatīvaiṣa dikcakramarkaḥ // 1178	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
adhvā na yadi nisaṅgapaṅkasaṃkulito bhavet / tataḥ kutaste dhaureya dhuryatā vyajyatāmiyam // 1179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
advāreṇa viśantyeva buddhimanto riporgṛham / akṛtvā dharṣaṇāṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ yuddhaṃ pravartate // 1180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anakṣaraṃ rūpamiha kṣarantī pañcāśadarṇairamṛtāmbupūrṇaiḥ / vyākīrṇavidhyamaṇḍamadantarālā   śabdātmikā māmavatāt samantāt // 1181	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anakṣarajñena janena sakhyaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ duṣprabhusevanaṃ ca / āliṅganaṃ lambapayodharāṇāṃ pratyakṣaduḥkhaṃ trayameva bhūmau // 1182	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anaṅkuritakūrcakaḥ sa tu sitopalāḍhyaṃ payaḥ sa eva dhṛtakūcakaḥ salavaṇāmbutakropamaḥ / sa eva sitakūrcakaḥ kvathitaguggulodvegakṛd bhavanti hariṇīdṛśāṃ priyatameṣu bhāvāstrayaḥ // 1183	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anaṅgaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpair viśvaṃ vyajayateṣubhiḥ / ityasaṃbhāvyamathavā vicitrā vastuśaktayaḥ // 1184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anaṅgatāpapraśamāya tasya kadarthyamānā muhurāmṛṇālam / madhau madhau nākanadīnalinyo varaṃ vahantāṃ śiśire'nurāgam // 1185	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
anaṅga palitaṃ mūrdhni paśyaitad vijayadhvajam / idānīṃ jitamasmābhis tavākiṃcitkarāḥ śarāḥ // 1186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgabāṇākulitasya śaṃbhoḥ śiro bhavānīcaraṇe'tinamram / vilokya kāciccaraṇe carantī pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam // 1187	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
anaṅgamaṅgalagṛhāpāṅgabhaṅgitaraṅgitaiḥ / āliṅgitaḥ sa tanvaṅgyā kārtārthyaṃ labhate kadā // 1188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgamaṅgalabhuvas tadapāṅgasya bhaṅgayaḥ / janayanti muhuryūnām antaḥsaṃtāpasaṃtatim // 1189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgamaṅgalārambhakumbhāviva payodharau / kasya nārtiharau tasyāḥ karapallavasaṃvṛtau // 1190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgaraṅgapīṭho'syāḥ śṛṅgārasvarṇaviṣṭaraḥ / lāvaṇyasārasaṃghātaḥ sā ghanā jaghanasthalī // 1191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgaraṅgapratimaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhaṅgībhiraṅgīkṛtamānatāṅgyāḥ / kurvanti yūnāṃ sahasā yathaitāḥ svāntāni śāntāparacintanāni // 1192	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anaṅgarasacāturīcapalacārucelāñcalaś calanmakarakuṇḍalasphuritakāntigaṇḍasthalaḥ / vrajollasitanāgarīnikararāsalāsyotsukaḥ sa me sapadi mānase sphuratu ko'pi gopālakaḥ // 1193	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anaṅgalaṅghanālagnanānātaṅkā sadaṅganā / sadānagha sadānanda natāṅgāsaṅgasaṃgata // 1194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgaśastrāṇi natāṅgi tīkṣṇatāṃ nayatyayaskāra ivāmbudāgamaḥ / malīmasāṅgārarucāṃ payomucāṃ tathāhi madhye jvalitastaḍicchikhī // 1195	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anaṅgīkṛtakāmānām anumānārhavarṣmaṇām / dhrtanirmalatīrthānāṃ bhūtilepo vibhūṣaṇam // 1196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
anaṅgenābalāsaṅgāj jitā yena jagattrayī / sa citracaritaḥ kāmaḥ sarvakāmaprado'stu vaḥ // 1197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgo'yamanaṅgatvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam / yadanena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavastava // 1198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anañjitāsitā dṛṣṭir bhrūranāvarjitā natā / arañjito'ruṇaścāyam adharastava sundari // 1199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṇuraṇanmaṇimekhala- mavirataśiñjānamañjumañjīram / parisaraṇamaruṇacaraṇe raṇaraṇakamakāraṇaṃ kurute // 1200	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anaticirojjhitasya jaladena cira- sthitabahubudbudasya payaso'nukṛtim / viralavikīrṇavajraśakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhautakaladhautamahī // 1201	pramadā [14: njBjlg]
anatiśayaṃ svarṇacayaṃ nivahan nitarāṃ pramodaye svānte / kiṃtu tavaiṣā saṃpat kasyopakṛte pratibrūhi // 1202	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anatiśithile puṃbhāvena pragalbhabalāḥ khalu prasabhamalayaḥ pāthojāsye niviśya niritvarāḥ / kimapi mukhataḥ kṛtvānītaṃ vitīrya sarojinī- madhurasamuṣoyoge jāyāṃ navānnamacīkaran // 1203	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anadhigatamanorathasya pūrvaṃ śataguṇiteva gatā mama triyāmā / yadi tu tava samāgame tathaiva prasarati subhrutataḥ kṛtī bhaveyam // 1204	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddhamarhati / evamaśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotumarhati // 1205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anadhītya svajaśāstraṃ yo'nyaśāstraṃ samīhate vaktum / so'heḥ padāni gaṇayati niśi tamasi jale ciragatasya // 1206	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anadhītyārthaśāstraṇi bahavaḥ paśubuddhayaḥ / prāgalbhyādvaktumicchanti mantreṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ // 1207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anadhyavasitāvagāhanamanalpadhīśaktināpy adṛṣṭaparmārthatattvamadhikābhiyogairapi / mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jarām // 1208	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anadhvanyāḥ kāvyeṣvalasagatayaḥ śāstragahaneṣv aduḥkhajñā vācāṃ pariṇatiṣu mūkāḥ paraguṇe / vidagdhānāṃ goṣṭhīṣvakṛtaparicaryāśca khalu ye bhaveyuste kiṃ vā parabhaṇitikaṇḍūtinikaṣāḥ // 1209	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃcana / mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃcana // 1210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantakopādicatuṣṭayodaye tribhedamithyātvamalodaye tathā / durantamithyātvaviṣaṃ śarīriṇām anantasaṃsārakaraṃ prarohati // 1211	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anantakhyātisaṃpannaḥ śuddhasattvaḥ sadhībalaḥ / dhatte bahumukhaṃ bhogaṃ śrutidṛṣṭisthirāśayaḥ // 1212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantatattvaṃ parigṛhya dhātrā vinirmito'syāḥ kila madhyabhāgaḥ / aṇuḥ paraṃ yogidṛśānulakṣyaḥ saccitkalāsthairyabalāvanaddhaḥ // 1213	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anantanāmadheyāya sarvākāravidhāyine / samastamantravācyāya viśvaikapataye namaḥ // 1214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantapadavinyāsaracanā sarasā kaveḥ / budho yadi samīpastho na kujanyaḥ puro yadi // 1215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantapāraṃ kila śabdaśāstraṃ svalpaṃ tathāyurbahavaśca vighnāḥ / yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃsairyathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt // 1216	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anantaratnaprabhavasya yasya himaṃ na saubhāgyavilopi jātam / eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣvivāṅkaḥ // 1217	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anantaramariṃ vadyād arisevinameva ca areranantaraṃ mitram udāsīnaṃ tayoḥ param // 1218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantavibhavabhraṣṭā daurbbhāgyaparitāpinī / śocyati prāpya jīvatvaṃ bhartṛhīneva nāyikā // 1219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantaśāstraṃ bahulāśca vidyāḥ svalpaśca kālo bahuvidhnatā ca / yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt // 1220	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anantāsau kīrtiḥ kavikumudabandhoḥ kṣitipates trilokīyaṃ kṣudrā tadiha kathamasyāḥ sthitiriti / mudheyaṃ vaḥ śaṅkā kalayata kiyaddarpaṇatalaṃ viśālā kiṃ tatra sphurati na kavīndrapratikṛtiḥ // 1221	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anantodbhūtabhūtaughasaṃkule bhūtale'khile / śastre śāstre tricaturāś caturā yadi mādṛśāḥ // 1222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ananyakṣuṇṇaśrīrmalayavanajanmāyamanilo nipīya svedāmbu smaramakarasaṃbhukttavibhavam / vidarbhāṇāṃ bhūri priyatamaparīrambharabhasa- prasaṅgādeṅgāni dviguṇapulakāsañji tanute // 1223	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ananyaśobhābhibhaveyamākṛtir vimānanā subhru kutaḥ piturgṛhe / parābhimarśo na tavāsti kaḥ karaṃ prasārayet pannagaratnasūcaye // 1224	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ananyasādhāraṇakāntikānta- tanoramuṣyāḥ kimu madhYadeśaḥ / jagattrayījanmabhṛtāṃ niṣaṇṇā cittāvalīyaṃ trivalīmiṣeṇa // 1225	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jtngg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ananyasādhāraṇasaurabhānvitaṃ dadhānamatyujjvalapuṣpasaṃpadaḥ / na campakaṃ bhṛṅgagaṇaḥ siṣeve kathaṃ sugandhermalinātmanāṃ ratiḥ // 1226	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ananyasāmānyatayā prasiddhas tyāgīti gīto jagatītale yaḥ / abhūdahaṃpūrvikayā gatānām atīva bhūmiḥ smaramārgaṇānām // 1227	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ananyālambanatvena prema bhāgavataṃ bhaja / nṛṇāṃ premeti kā mātrā prāptaṃ prema prabhoryadi // 1228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ananyāścintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryuṃpāsate / teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yogakṣemaṃ vahāmyaham // 1229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ananyāśritacittena sevito'pi ca vāridaḥ / siṃñcenna cet tadā manye cātakasyaiva pātakam // 1230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anapekṣitaguruvacanā sarvān granthīn vibhedayati samyak / prakaṭayati pararahasyaṃ vimarśaśakttirnijā jayati // 1231	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anabhijñāya śāstrārthān puruṣāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ / prāgalbhyādvaktumicchanti mantreṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ // 1232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhijño guṇānāṃ yo na bhṛtyaiḥ so'nugamyate / dhanāḍhyo'pi kulīno'pi kramāyāto'pi bhūpatiḥ // 1233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhidhyā parasveṣu sarvasattveṣu sauhṛdam / karmaṇāṃ phalamastīti trividhaṃ manasā caret // 1234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhilaṣataḥ śrīlīlābje parāgavilepanaṃ tridaśakariṇaḥ pātuṃ dānapravāhamavāñchataḥ / tridaśasumanogandhāsaktiṃ vimuktavataḥ sakhe bata khalu śivā saṃtuṣṭasya dvirepha tava sthitiḥ // 1235	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anabhyāsahatotsāhā pareṇa paribhūyate / yā lajjājananī jāḍyāt kiṃ tayā mandavidyayā // 1236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhyāsahatā vidyā hato rājavirodhakṛt / jīvanārthaṃ hataṃ tīrthaṃ jīvanārthaṃ hataṃ vratam // 1237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhyāsena vidyānām asaṃsargeṇa dhīmatām / anigraheṇa cākṣāṇāṃ jāyate vyasanaṃ nṛṇām // 1238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhyāsena vedānām ācārasya ca varjanāt / ālasyādannadoṣācca mṛtyurviprān jighāṃsati // 1239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anamyāsairhatā vidyā nityahāsairhatāḥ striyaḥ / kubījena hataṃ kṣetraṃ bhṛtyadoṣairhatā nṛpāḥ // 1240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anabhravṛṣṭiḥ śravaṇāmṛtasya sarasvatī vibhramajanmabhūmiḥ / vaidarbharītiḥ kṛtināmudeti saubhāgyalābhapratibhūḥ padānām // 1241	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anabhrevidyutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśamāśritām / rātrāvindradhanuścāpi jīvitaṃ dvitrimāsikam // 1242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anamrākramaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dhanaṃ nijabhujārjitam / bhāryā rūpānurūpā ca puruṣasyeha yujyate // 1243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayanapathe priye na vyathā yathā dṛśya eva duṣprāpe / mlānaiva kevalaṃ niśi tapanaśilā vāsare jvalati // 1244	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anayaśca nayaścāpi daivāt saṃpadyate naraiḥ / tadvaśāt kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalaṃ pumān // 1245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayā kṛtamanyabhuktayā vasudhāgocarayā viraktayā / atiśāyi mahendrayoṣitāṃ vapuṣā kiṃ na tavāvarodhanam // 1246	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anayā jaghanābhogabharamantharayānayā / anyato'pi vrajantyā me hṛdaye nihitaṃ padam // 1247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayā tava rūpasīmayā kṛtasaṃskāravibodhanasya me / ciramapyavalokitādya sā smṛtimārūḍhavatī śucismitā // 1248	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anayānukramaṇikayā muktāmaṇayo mayābhihitāḥ / ekaiko'pi hi bhāsvān kiṃ punareṣāṃ nigadyate nikaraḥ // 1249	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
anayā ratnasamṛddhyā sāgara lahalahasi kimiha laharībhiḥ / tvadvallabhā varākyo vahanti varṣāsu vārīṇi // 1250	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anayā surakāmyamānayā saha yogaḥ sulabhastu na tvayā / ghanasaṃvṛtayāmbudāgame kumudeneva niśākaratviṣā // 1251	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anayeneva rājyaśrīr dainyeneva manasvitā / mamlau sātha viṣādena padminīva himāmbhasā // 1252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayoranavadyāṅgi stanayorjṛmbhamāṇayoḥ / avakāśo na paryāptas tava bāhulatāntare // 1253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayo vinayastasya vidhiryasyānuvartate / nayaḥ samyakprayukto'pi bhāgyahīnasya durnayaḥ // 1254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarghyaṃ saundaryaṃ jagadupari mādhuryalaharī- parītaṃ saurabhyaṃ diśi diśi rasaikavyasanitā / iti prītyāsmābhistvayi khalu rasāle vyavasitaṃ ka evaṃ jānīte yadasi kaṭukīṭairupahataḥ // 1255	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anarghyamapi māṇikyaṃ hemāśrayamapekṣate / anāśrayā na śobhante paṇḍitā vanitā latāḥ // 1256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarghyalāvaṇyanidhānabhūmir na kasya lobhaṃ laṭabhā tanoti / avaimi puṣpāyudhayāmiko'syām aviśvasan na kṣaṇameti nidrām // 1257	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
anarghyāṇyapi ratnāni labhyante vibhavaiḥ sukham / durlabho ratnakoṭyāpi kṣaṇo'pi hi gatāyuṣaḥ // 1258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthakaṃ vipravāsaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ pāpaiḥ saṃdhiṃ paradārābhimarśam / dambhaṃ stainyaṃ paiśunaṃ madyapānaṃ na sevate yaḥ sa sukhī sadaiva // 1259	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
anarthamakarāgārād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt / uḍḍīyate nirudvegaṃ sarvatyāgena putraka // 1260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthamarthataḥ paśyann arthaṃ caivāpyanarthataḥ / indriyaiḥ prasṛto bālaḥ suduḥkhaṃ manyate sukham // 1261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthāṃ ścārtharūpeṇa arthāṃścānartharūpataḥ / arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃcid dhananāśo bhavatyuta // 1262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthā hyartharūpāśca arthāścānartharūpiṇaḥ / bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya rocate // 1263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthitarpaṇaṃ vittaṃ cittamadhyānadarpaṇam / atīrthasarpaṇaṃ dehaṃ paryante śocyatāṃ vrajet // 1264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayāt parijanasya ca / maryādāyāmamaryādāḥ striyastiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // 1265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anarthe caiva niratam arthe caiva parāṅmukham / na taṃ bhartāramicchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patimiva striyaḥ // 1266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anartho'pyartharūpeṇa tathārtho'nartharūpabhāk / utpadyate vināśāya tasmāduktaṃ parīkṣayet // 1267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
analaṃkṛto'pi mādhava harasi mano me sadā prasabham / kiṃ punaralaṃkṛtastvaṃ saṃprati nakharakṣataistasyāḥ // 1268	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
analaḥ śītanāśāya viṣanāśāya gāruḍam / viveko duḥkhanāśāya sarvanāśāya durmatiḥ // 1269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
analaḥ salilājjātaḥ kārttikeyo'pi vahnitaḥ / gūḍhaṃ hi mahatāṃ janma paricchettuṃ ka īśvaraḥ // 1270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
analasajavāpuṣpotpīḍacchavi prathamaṃ tataḥ samadayavanīgaṇḍacchāyaṃ punarmadhupiṅgalam / tadanu ca navasvarṇādarśaprabhaṃ śaśinastatas taruṇatagarākāraṃ bimbaṃ vibhāti nabhastale // 1271	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
analastambhanavidyāṃ subhaga bhavān niyatameva jānāti / manmathaśarāgnitapte hṛdi me kathamanyathā vasasi // 1272	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
analpaṃ jalpantaḥ kati bata gatā no yamapuraṃ purastādasmākaṃ vidhṛtanayanā vyāttavadanāḥ / atītā yadyevaṃ na hi nijahitaṃ cetasi vayaṃ vahāmo hā mohād viṣayaviṣajātādavasitāḥ // 1273	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
analpaṃ saṃtāpaṃ śamayati manojanmajanitaṃ tathā śītaṃ sphītaṃ himavati niśīthe glapayati / tadevaṃ ko'pyūṣmā ramaṇaparirambhotsavamilat- purandhrīnīrandhrastanakalaśajanmā vijayate // 1274	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
analpacintābharamohaniścalā vilokyamānaiva karoti sādhvasam / svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari // 1275	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
analpatvāt pradhānatvād vaṃśasyevetare svarāḥ / vijigīṣornṛpatayaḥ prayānti parivāratām // 1276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anavadyamavadyaṃ syād vāruṇīleśamātrataḥ / tadvacchiṣyo viruddhārthād viguroreva naśyati // 1277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavaratakanakavitaraṇa- jalalavabhṛtakarataraṅgitārthitateḥ / bhaṇitiriva matirmatiriva ceṣṭā ceṣṭeva kīrtirativimalā // 1278	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anavaratadhanurjyāsphālanakrūrapūrvaṃ ravikiraṇasahiṣṇu svedaleśairabhinnam / apacitamapi gātraṃ vyāyatatvādalakṣyaṃ giricara iva nāgaḥ prāṇasāraṃ bibharti // 1279	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anavaratanayanavigalita- jalalavaghaṭitākṣasūtravalayena / mṛtyuṃjayamiva japati tvadgotraṃ virahiṇī bālā // 1280	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anavaratanayanavigalita- jalalavaparimuṣitapattralekhāntam / karatalaniṣaṇṇamabale vadanamidaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati // 1281	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anavarataparopakaraṇa- vyagrībhavadamalacetasāṃ mahatām / āpātakāṭavāni sphuranti vacanāni bheṣajānīva // 1282	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anavaratarasena rāgabhājā karajaparikṣatilabdhasaṃstavena / sapadi taruṇapallavena vadhvā vigatadayaṃ khalu khaṇḍitena mamle // 1283	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
anavasare ca yadukttaṃ subhāṣitaṃ tacca bhavati hāsyāya / rahasi prauḍhavadhūnāṃ ratisamaye vedapāṭha iva // 1284	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anavasthitacittasya na jane na vane sukham / jane dahati saṃsargo vane saṅgavivarjanam // 1285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavasthitacittānāṃ prasādo'pi bhayaṃkaraḥ / sarpī hanti kila snehād apatyāni na vairataḥ // 1286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavahitaḥ kimaśaktto vibudhairabhyarthitaḥ kimatirasikaḥ / sarvaṃkaṣo'pi kālas tirayati sūktāni na kavīnām // 1287	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyate / amitrāśca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // 1288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavekṣitamaryādaṃ nāstikaṃ vipralumpakam / arakṣitāramattāraṃ nṛpaṃ vidyādadhogatim // 1289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavyaye vyayaṃ yāti vyaye yāti suvistṛtim / apūrvastava kośo'yaṃ vidyākośeṣu bhārati // 1290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anasi sīdati saikatavartmani pracurabhārabharakṣapitaukṣake / gurubharoddharaṇoddhurakaṃdharaṃ smarati sārathireṣa dhuraṃdharam // 1291	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anasūyaḥ kṛtaprajñaḥ śobhanānyācaran sadā / akṛcchrāt sukhamāpnoti sarvatra ca virājate // 1292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā / kāmakrodhaparityāgaḥ śiṣṭācāranidarśanam // 1293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anasūyārjavaṃ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā / damaḥ satyamanāyāso na bhavanti durātmanām // 1294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anastamitasārasya tejasastadvijṛmbhitam / yena pāṣāṇakhaṇḍasya mūlyamalpaṃ vasuṃdharā // 1295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
// (1296)	upajāti ...: ajñātam [0: ]
anākalitamānuṣyāḥ kṣamāsaṃsparśavarjitāḥ / pratibuddhairna sevyante pūrvadevavirodhinaḥ // 1297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anākāśe candraḥ sarasijadaladvandvasahito gṛhītaḥ paścārdhe kuṭilakuṭilaiḥ so'pi timiraiḥ / sudhāṃ muñcatyuccairaniśamatha saṃmohajananīṃ kimutpātālīyaṃ vadata jagataḥ kartumuditā // 1298	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anākūtaireva priyasahacarīṇāṃ śiśutayā vacobhiḥ pāñcālīmithunamadhunā saṃgamayitum / upādatte no vā viramati na vā kevalamiyaṃ kapolau kalyāṇī pulakamukulairdanturayati // 1299	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anākṛṣṭasya viṣayair vidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ / tasya dharmaraterāsīd vṛddhatvaṃ jarasā vinā // 1300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgataṃ bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā nītiśāstraviśāradaḥ / avasanmūṣakastatra kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam // 1301	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgataṃ yaḥ kurute sa śobhate sa śocate yo na karotyanāgatam / vane vasanneva jarāmupāgato bilasya vācā na kadāpi hi śrutā // 1302	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anāgataṃ hi budhyeta yacca kāryaṃ puraḥ sthitam / na tu buddhikṣayāt kiṃcid atikrāmet prayojanam // 1303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavartīṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā yastu prahṛṣyati / sa tiraskāramāpnoti bhagnabhāṇḍo dvijo yathā // 1304	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavatīṃ cintāṃ yo naraḥ kartumicchati / sa bhūmau pāṇḍuraḥ śete somaśarmapitā yathā // 1305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiśca yaḥ / dvaveva sukhamedhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati // 1306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavidhātāram apramattamakopanam / sthirārambhamadīnaṃ ca naraṃ śrīrupatiṣṭhati // 1307	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ viṣaye nṛpaiḥ / āgamaścāpi kartavyas tathā doṣo na jāyate // 1308	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubhamicchatā / āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā // 1309	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgatopadhaṃ hiṃsraṃ durbuddhimabahuśrutam / tyakttopāttaṃ madyapānadyūtastrīmṛgayāpriyam // 1310.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kārye mahati yuñjāno hīyate'rthapatiḥ śriyā // 1310.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhair anāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam / akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhokttāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ // 1311	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anātapatro'pyayamatra lakṣyate sitātapatrairiva sarvato vṛtaḥ / acāmaro'pyeṣa sadaiva vījyate vilāsabālavyajanena ko'pyayam // 1312	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anāturotkaṇṭhitayoḥ prasidhyatā samāgamenāpi ratirna māṃ prati / parasparaprāptinirāśayorvaraṃ śarīranāśo'pi samānurāgayoḥ // 1313	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anātmavān nayadveṣī vardhayannarisaṃpadaḥ / prāpyāpi mahadaiśvaryaṃ saha tena vinaśyati // 1314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāthānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ bālavṛddhatapasvinām / anyāyaparibhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ // 1315	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāthānāṃ nātho gatiragatikānāṃ vyasanināṃ vinetā bhītānāmabhayamadhṛtīnāṃ bharavaśaḥ / suhṛdbandhuḥ svāmī śaraṇamupakārī varaguruḥ pitā mātā bhrātā jagati puruṣo yaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ // 1316	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anāthān rogiṇo yaśca putravat paripālayet / guruṇā samanujñātaḥ sa bhiṣakcchabdamaśnute // 1317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādaraparo vidvān īhamānaḥ sthirāṃ śriyam / agneḥ śeṣamṛṇāccheṣaṃ śatroḥ śeṣaṃ na śeṣayet // 1318	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādarahatāṃ sevāṃ dāmpatyaṃ premavarjitam / maitrīṃ ca hetusāpekṣāṃ ce tanā nādhikurvate // 1319	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādarālokavivṛddhaśokaḥ pituḥ priyāvākyavaśaṃgatasya / auttānapādirjagatāṃ śaraṇyam ārādhya viṣṇuṃ padamagryamāyāt // 1320	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anādāyī vyayaṃ kuryād asahāyī raṇapriyaḥ / āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃvinaśyati // 1321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādidhāvisvaparaṃparāyā hetusrajaḥ srotasi veśvare vā / āyattadhīreṣa janastadāryāḥ kimīdṛśaḥ paryanuyogayogyaḥ // 1322	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anādiṣṭopi bhūpasya dṛṣṭvā hānikaraṃ ca yaḥ / yatate tasya nāśāya sa bhṛtyo'rho mahībhujām // 1323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādṛtyaucityaṃ hriyamavigaṇayyātimahatīṃ yadetasyāpyarthe dhanalavadurāśātaralitāḥ / alīkāhaṃkārajvarakuṭilitabhrūṇi dhanināṃ mukhāni prekṣyante dhigidamatiduṣpūramudaram // 1324	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anādeyaṃ nādadīta parikṣīṇo'pi pārthivaḥ / na cādeyaṃ samṛddho'pi sūkṣmamapyarthamutsṛjet // 1325	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādeyasya cādānād ādeyasya ca varjanāt / daurbalyaṃ khyāpyate rājñaḥ sa pretyeha ca naśyati // 1326	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām / vināśayati saṃbhūtā ayonija ivānalaḥ // 1327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāptapuṇyopacayairdurāpā phalasya nirdhūtarajāḥ savitrī / tulyā bhavaddarśanasaṃpadeṣā vṛṣṭerdivo vītabalāhakāyāḥ // 1328	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anāmnāyamalā vedā brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malam / malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ puruṣasyānṛtaṃ malam // 1329	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti bahunāyakāḥ / strīnāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti śiśunāyakāḥ // 1330	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bahunāyake / strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bālanāyake // 1331	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāyavyayakartā ca anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ / āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati // 1332	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāyāsakṛśaṃ madhyam aśaṅkatarale dṛśau / abhūṣaṇamanohāri vapurvayasi subhruvaḥ // 1333	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāyi deśaḥ katamastvayādya vasantamuktasya daśāṃ vanasya / tvadāptasaṃketatayā kṛtārthā śravyāpi nānena janena saṃjñā // 1334	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyagviniyogasatkriyāḥ / phalantyupāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr upetya saṃgharṣamivārthasaṃpadaḥ // 1335	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anārataṃ pratidiśaṃ pratideśaṃ jale sthale / jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi // 1336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāratapariskhalannayanavāridhārāśata- pravṛddhapathanimnagāsalilaruddhayānodyamā / tvadīyaripukāminī bahuvideśayānaiṣiṇī vinindati valaddṛśā gururuṣāśrupaṃ prāvṛṣam // 1337	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anārabdhākṣepaṃ paramakṛtavāṣpavyatikaraṃ nigūḍhāntastāpaṃ hṛdayavinipītaṃ vyavasitam / kṛśāṅgyā yatpāpe vrajati mayi nairāśyapiśunaṃ ślathairaṅgairuktaṃ hṛdayamidamunmūlayati tat // 1338	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anārabhyā bhavantyarthāḥ kecin nityaṃ tathāgatāḥ / kṛtaḥ puruṣakāro'pi bhavedyeṣu nirarthakaḥ // 1339	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anārambhastu kāryāṇāṃ prathamaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam / ārabdhasyāntagamanaṃ dvitīyaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam // 1340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anārādhya kālīmanāsvādya gauḍī- mṛte mantratantrādvinā śabdacauryāt / prabandhaṃ pragalbhaṃ prakartuṃ pravaktuṃ viriñciprapañce madanyaḥ kaviḥ kaḥ // 1341	bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy]
anārogyamanāyuṣyam asvargyaṃ cātibhojanam / apuṇyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet // 1342	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāryatā niṣṭhuratā krūratā niṣkriyātmatā / puruṣaṃ vyañjayantīha loke kaluṣayonijam // 1343	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāryaprajñānāmiha janavadhūnāṃ hi manaso mahāśalyaṃ karṇe tava kanakajambūkisalayaḥ / bhraman bhikṣāhetoradhinagari buddho'si na mayā tvayaitāvadveṣaḥ pathika na vidheyaḥ punarapi // 1344	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anāryamapyācaritaṃ kumāryā bhavān mama kṣāmyatu saumya tāvat / haṃso'pi devāṃśatayāsi vandyaḥ śrīvatsalakṣmeva hi matsyamūrtiḥ // 1345	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anāryavṛttamaprājñam asūyakamadhārmikam / anarthāḥ kṣipramāyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā // 1346	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāryeṇa kṛtaghnena saṃgatirme na yujyate / vināśamapi kāṅkṣanti jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā // 1347	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anālokya vyayaṃ karttā anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ / āturaḥ sarvakṣetreṣu naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati // 1348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanādṛtya suhṛdas tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale saṃprati kṛtaḥ / samākṛṣṭā hyete pralayadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ // 1349	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anāvartī kālo vrajati sa vṛthā tanna gaṇitaṃ daśāstāstāḥ soḍhā vyasanaśatasaṃpātavidhurāḥ / kiyadvā vakṣyāmaḥ kimiva bata nātmanyupakṛtaṃ vayaṃ yāvattāvat punarapi tadeva vyavasitam // 1350	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anāvarjitacittāpi dhruvaṃ sarvān pradhāvati / phalaṃ na labhate kiṃcit tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva kāminī // 1351	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāvilaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte viṣayāṇāmanutsukaḥ / utsuko labdharokeṇa tatra śokena śīryate // 1352	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāvṛtanavadvārapañjare vihagānilaḥ / yattiṣṭhati tadāścaryaṃ viyoge tasya kā kathā // 1353	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāvṛtāḥ svavarṇeṣu sarvasādhāraṇāḥ purā / nāryo babhūvurnirvairo yataḥ sarvo'bhavajjanaḥ // 1354	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anāvṛṣṭihate deśe sasye ca pralayaṃ gate / dhanyāstāta na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam // 1355	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāśritā dānapuṇyaṃ vedapuṇyamanāśritāḥ / rāgadveṣavinirmuktā vicarantīha mokṣiṇaḥ // 1356	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāśrite dṛptagurau avajñāṃ kalayen nṛpaḥ / saṃvartena maruttastu nirastamakarodgurum // 1357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāsthā vastūnāmabhimataguṇānāmupahṛtau ghano garvastanvyā ruṣi ca vihitāḍambaravidhiḥ / prahāraḥ pādābhyāṃ yamanamapi kāñcyā caraṇayoḥ priyāyā vibbokaṃ tadidamiti dhanyo'nubhavati // 1358	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anāsvāditasaṃbhogāḥ patantu tava śatravaḥ / bālavaidhavyadagdhānāṃ kulastrīṇāṃ stanā iva // 1359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāsvādyamavikreyam anādeyamanīpsitam / dattaṃ nirupakāraṃ yad vandhyadānena tena kim // 1360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahsraguḥ / surāpo vṛṣalībhartā braḥmahā gurutalpagaḥ // 1361	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
asatpratigrahe yukttaḥ stenaḥ kutsitayājakaḥ / adoṣastyaktumanyonyaṃ karmasaṃkaraniścayāt // 1362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāhūtaḥ praviśati apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate / viśvasityapramatteṣu mūḍhacetā narādhamaḥ // 1363.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāhūtaḥ samāyātaḥ anāpṛṣṭastu bhāṣate / paranindātmanaḥ stutiś catvāri laghulakṣaṇam // 1363.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
anāhūtapraviṣṭasya dṛṣṭasya kruddhacakṣuṣā / svayamevopaviṣṭasya varaṃ mṛtyurna bhojanam // 1364	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anahūtāḥ svayaṃ yānti rasāsvādavilolupāḥ / nivāritā na gacchanti makṣikā iva bhikṣukāḥ // 1365	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāhūto viśedyastu apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate / ātmānaṃ manyate prītaṃ bhūpālasya sa durmatiḥ // 1366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāhvāne praveśaśca apṛṣṭe paribhāṣaṇam / ātmastutiḥ pare nindā catvāri laghulakṣaṇam // 1367	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anicchato'pi duḥkhāni yathehāyānti dehinaḥ / sukhānyapi tathā manye cintādainyena ko guṇaḥ // 1368	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniḥsarantīmapi gehagarbhāt kīrtiṃ pareṣāmasatīṃ vadanti / svairaṃ bhramantīmapi ca trilokyāṃ tvatkīrtimāhuḥ kavayaḥ satīṃ tu // 1369	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anicchanto'pi vinayaṃ vidyābhyāsena bālakāḥ / bheṣajeneva nairujyaṃ prāpaṇīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // 1370	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anicchannapi cittena videśastho'pi mānavaḥ / svakarmotpātavātena nīyate yatra tatphalam // 1371	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anijyayā vivāhaiśca vedasyotsādanena ca / kulānyakulatāṃ yānti dharmasyātikrameṇa ca // 1372	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityaṃ nisrāṇaṃ jananamaraṇavyādhikalitaṃ jaganmithyātvārthairahamahamikāliṅgitamidam / vicintyaivaṃ santo vimalamanaso dharmamatayas tapaḥ kartuṃ vṛttāstadapasṛtaye jainamanagham // 1373	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ / aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyedeṣu na paṇḍitaḥ // 1374	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityatāsamākhyānaṃ viṣayādiviḍambanam / paścāttāpasya kathanaṃ kālasya caritaṃ tathā // 1375	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anityate jagannindye vandanīyāsi saṃprati / yā karoṣi prasaṅgena duḥkhānāmapyanityatām // 1376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityatve kṛtamatir mlānamālyena śocati / nityatve kṛtabuddhistu bhinnabhāṇḍe'nuśocati // 1377	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityamiti jānanto na bhavanti bhavanti ca / atha yenaiva kurvanti naiva jātu bhavanti te // 1378	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityasya śarīrasya sarvadoṣamayasya ca / durgandhasya ca rakṣārthaṃ nāhaṃ pāpaṃ karomi vai // 1379	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ / nityaṃ saṃnihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // 1380	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anitye priyasaṃvāse saṃsāre cakravadgatau / pathi saṃgatamevaitad bhrātā mātā pitā sakhā // 1381	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anityo vijayo yasmād dṛśyate yudhyamānayoḥ / parājayaśca saṃgrāme tasmādyuddhaṃ vivarjayet // 1382	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anidro duḥsvapnaḥ prapatanamanadri drumataṭaṃ jarāhīnaḥ kampastimirarahitastrāsasamayaḥ / anāghātaṃ duḥkhaṃ vigatanigaḍo bandhanavidhiḥ sajīvaṃ jantūnāṃ maraṇamavanīśāśrayarasaḥ // 1383	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anidhāya mukhe patraṃ pūgaṃ khādati yo naraḥ / saptajanmadaridratvam ante viṣṇusthitiśca na // 1384	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anindā parakṛtyeṣu svadharmaparipālanam / kṛpaṇeṣu dayālutvaṃ sarvatra madhurā giraḥ // 1385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāṇairapyupakāritvaṃ mitrāyāvyabhicāriṇe / gṛhāgate pariṣvaṅgaḥ śaktyā dānaṃ sahiṣṇutā // 1386	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bandhubhirbaddhasaṃyogaḥ sujane caturaśratā / taccittānuvidhāyitvam iti vṛttaṃ mahātmanām // 1387	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anindyamapi nindanti stuvantyastutyamuccakaiḥ / svāpateyakṛte martyāḥ kiṃ kiṃ nāma na kurvate // 1388	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anibandhanakacabandhanam anidānaṃ dānamuttarīyasya / ākasmikamandasmitam apahastayatīva bālyametasyāḥ // 1389	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anibhālita eva kevalaṃ khanigarbhe nidhireṣa jīryatu / na tu sīdatu mūlyahānito vaṇijālokanagocarīkṛtaḥ // 1390	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
animiṣamavirāmā rāgiṇāṃ sarvarātraṃ navanidhuvanalīlāḥ kautukenātivīkṣya / idamudavasitānāmasphuṭālokasaṃpan nayanamiva sanidraṃ ghūrṇate daipamarciḥ // 1391	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aniyataruditasmitaṃ virājat- katipayakomaladantakuḍmalāgram / vadanakamalakaṃ śiśoḥ smarāmi skhaladasamañjasamugdhajalpitaṃ te // 1392	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aniyuktā hi sācivye yadvadanti manīṣiṇaḥ / anurāgadravasyaitāḥ praṇayasyātibhūmayaḥ // 1393	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirākṛtatāpasaṃpadaṃ phalahīnāṃ sumanobhirujjhitām / khalatāṃ khalanāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ // 1394	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anirīkṣaṇameva dṛṣṭirārdrā parihāsālapanāni maunameva / avadhīraṇameva cābhiyogo vinigūḍho'pi hi lakṣyate'nurāgaḥ // 1395	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
anirghātaṃ dhārādharamaśamanīyaṃ nidhirapām akāṭhinyaṃ cintāmaṇimajaḍabhūtaṃ suratarum / abhittvopādāya prabhurapaśuvṛttiṃ ca surabhiṃ parārthaikasvārthānakṛta puruṣānādipuruṣaḥ // 1396	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anirjayena dviṣatāṃ yasyāmarṣaḥ praśāmyati / puruṣoktiḥ kathaṃ tasmin brūhi tvaṃ hi tapodhana // 1397	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtaṃ puruṣaśabdena jātimātrāvalambinā / yo'ṅgīkṛtaguṇaiḥ ślādhyaḥ savismayamudāhṛtaḥ // 1398	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grasamānamivaujāṃsi sadasā gauraveritam / nāma yasyābhinanadanti dviṣo'pi sa pumānpumān // 1399	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
anirdayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ katham / kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam // 1400	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirloḍitakāryasya vāgjālaṃ vāgmino vṛthā / nimittādaparāddheṣor dhānuṣkasyeva valgitam // 1401	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvācyamanirbhinnam aparicchinnamavyayam / brahmeva sujanaprema duḥkhamūlanikṛntanam // 1402	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvṛtaṃ tathā mandaṃ paralokaparāṅmukham / narakāya na sadgatyaṃ kuputrālambijanma vai // 1403	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ cañcurme lohasaṃnibhā / ahorātrāṇi dīrghāṇi samudraḥ kiṃ na śuṣyati // 1404	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ duḥkhanāśe sukhasya ca / mahān bhavatyanirviṇṇaḥ sukhaṃ cātyantamaśnute // 1405	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham / anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ // 1406	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ / karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yacca karoti saḥ // 1407	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anila nikhilaviśvaṃ prāṇiti tvatprayuktaṃ sapadi ca vinimīlatyākulaṃ tvadviyogāt / vapurasi parameśasyācitaṃ nocitaṃ te surabhimasurabhiṃ vā yatsamaṃ svīkaroṣi // 1408	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aniśaṃ nayanābhirāmayā ramayā saṃmadino mukhasya te / niśi niḥsaradindiraṃ kathaṃ tulayāmaḥ kalayāpi paṅkajam // 1409	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
aniśaṃ mataṅgajānāṃ bṛṃhitamākarṇyate yathā vipine / manye tathā na jīvati gajendrapalakavalanaḥ siṃhaḥ // 1410	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aniśamapi makaraketur manaso rujamāvahannabhimato me / yadi madirāyatanayanāṃ tāmadhikṛtya praharatīti // 1411	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aniścitairadhyavasāyabhīrubhir yatheṣṭasaṃlāparatiprayojanaiḥ / phale visaṃvādamupāgatā giraḥ prayānti loke parihāsavastutām // 1412	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aniṣṭaḥ kanyakāyā yo varo rūpānvito'pi yaḥ / yadi syāttasya no deyā kanyā śreyo'bhivāñchatā // 1413	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniṣṭadaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhūkampaḥ saṃdhyayordvayoḥ / digdāhaḥ pītavarṇatvād rājñāṃ cāniṣṭadaḥ paraḥ // 1414	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniṣṭayogāt priyaviprayogataḥ parāpamānāddhanahīnajīvitāt / anekajanmavyasanaprabandhato bibheti no yastapaso bibheti saḥ // 1415	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aniṣṭasamprayogācca viprayogātpriyasya ca / mānuṣā mānasairduḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ // 1416	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniṣṭādiṣṭalābhe'pi na gatirjāyate śubhā / yatrāste viṣasaṃsargo'mṛtaṃ tadapi mṛtyave // 1417	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniṣpannāmapi kriyāṃ nayopetāṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ / phaladāṃ hi prakurvanti mahāsenāpatiryathā // 1418	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anīrṣyāḥ śrotāro mama vacasi cedvacmi tadahaṃ svapakṣādbhetavyaṃ bahu na tu viprapakṣāt prabhavataḥ / tamasyākrāntaśe kiyadapi hi tejovayavinaḥ svaśaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti satyeva na punaḥ // 1419	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāc cokṣaḥ syādaghṛṇī nṛpaḥ / striyaṃ seveta nātyarthaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ muñjīta nāhitam // 1420	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī priyaṃvadaḥ / ślakṣṇo madhuravākstrīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet // 1421	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anīśāya śarīrasya hṛdayaṃ svavaśaṃ mayi / stanakampakriyālakṣyair nyastaṃ niḥśvasitairiva // 1422	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anīśvaro'yaṃ puruṣo bhavābhave sūtraprotā dārumayīva yoṣā / dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kilāyaṃ tasmādvada tvaṃ śravaṇe dhrto'ham // 1423	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anukartumapahnotum ativartitumīkṣitum / aśakye tejasāṃ patyau mitratānumatikṣamā // 1424	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anukurutaḥ khalasujanāv agrimapāścātyabhāgayoḥ sūcyāḥ / vidadhāti randhrameko guṇavānanyastvapidadhāti // 1425	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anukūlakalatro yas tasya svarga ihaiva hi / pratikūlakalatrasya narako nātra saṃśayaḥ // 1426	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anukūlamarthyamavirodhi hitaṃ śravaṇīyamāgamarahasyayutam / vacanaṃ madīyamapakarṇayati kva manobhavaḥ kva guṇasaṃgrahaṇam // 1427	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
anukūlavarapuraṃdhriṣu puruṣāṇāṃ baddhamūlarāgāṇām / nayati mano duḥśīlaḥ kusumāstro hīnapātreṣu // 1428	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anukūlavidhāyidaivato vijayī syān nanu kīdṛśo nṛpaḥ / virahiṇyapi jānakī vane nivasantī mudamādadhau kutaḥ // 1429	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anukūlāṃ vimalāṅgīṃ kulajāṃ kuśalāṃ suśīlasaṃpannām / pañcalakārāṃ bhāryāṃ puruṣaḥ puṇyodayāllabhate // 1430	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anukūlā sadā tuṣṭā dakṣā sādhvī vicakṣaṇā / ebhireva guṇairyuktā śrīriva strī na saṃśayaḥ // 1431	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anukūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ pūrayitā hariḥ / pratikūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ hariṣyati // 1432	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anukūle sati dhātari bhavatyaniṣṭādapīṣṭamavilambam / pītvā viṣamapi śaṃbhur mṛtyuṃjayatāmavāpa tatkālam // 1433	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anukṛtagaṇḍaśailamadamaṇḍitagaṇḍataṭa- bhramadalimaṇḍalīniviḍaguṅgumaghoṣajuṣaḥ / dalayati helayaiva harirugrakarānkariṇa- strijagati teja eva guru no vikṛtākṛtitā // 1434	narkuṭaka [17: njBjjlg]
anukṣaṇamanukṣaṇaṃ kṣitipa rakṣyamāṇā tvayā prayāti vidiśo daśa prabalakīrtirekākinī / iyaṃ niyatamarthiṣu pratidinaṃ vitīrṇā ramā jahāti na tavāntikaṃ dvitayametadatyadbhutam // 1435	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anugataparitoṣitānujīvī madhuravacāścaritānuraktalokaḥ / sunipuṇaparamāptasaktatantro bhavati ciraṃ nṛpatiḥ pradīptaraśmiḥ // 1436	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
anugantuṃ satāṃ vartma kṛtsnaṃ yadi na śakyate / svalpamapyanugantavyaṃ mārgastho nāvasīdati // 1437	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anugamya śmaśānāntaṃ nivartantīha bāndhavāḥ / agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdastathā // 1438	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anugṛhāṇa śiśūnabhilaṅghitā śabaravārivihāravanasthalī / visṛja kātaratāmidamagrato harini kāruṇikasya tapovanam // 1439	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anugrahavidhau devyā mātuśca mahdantaram / mātā gāḍhaṃ nibadhnāti bandhaṃ devī nikṛntati // 1440	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anugrahādeva divaukasāṃ naro nirasya mānuṣyakameti divyatām / ayovikāre svaritatvamiṣyate kuto'yasāṃ siddharasaspṛśāmapi // 1441	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anucarati śaśāṅkaṃ rāhudoṣe'pi tārā patati na vanavṛkṣe yāti bhūmiṃ latā ca / tyjati na ca kareṇuḥ paṅkalagnaṃ gajendraṃ vrajatu caratu dharmaṃ bhartṛnāthā hi nāryaḥ // 1442	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anucitakarmārambhaḥ svajanavirodho balīyasā spardhā / pramadājanaviśvāso mṛtyordvārāṇi catvāri // 1443	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anucitaphalābhilāṣī nityaṃ vidhinā nivāryate puruṣaḥ / drākṣāvipākasamaye mukhapāko bhavati kākānām // 1444	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anucitamucitaṃ vā karma ko'yaṃ vibhāgo bhagavati paramāstāṃ bhaktiyogo draḍhīyān / kirati viṣamahīndraḥ sāndrapīyūṣamindur dvayamapi sa maheśo nirviśeṣaṃ bibharti // 1445	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anucitamevācaritaṃ paśupatinā yadvidheḥ śiraśchinnam / chinno na cāsya hasto yenāyaṃ durlipiṃ likhati // 1446	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anucite yadi karmaṇi yujyate śaṭhadhiyā prabhuṇā saguṇo janaḥ / bhavati nāsya guṇāpacayastataḥ padagatasya kirīṭamaṇeriva // 1447	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anuccanīcacalatām aṅgānāṃ calapādatām / kaṭikūrparaśīrṣāṃśakarṇānāṃ samarūpatām // 1448	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ramyāṃ pratīkaviśrāntim urasaśca samunnatim / abhyāsābhyarhitaṃ prāhuḥ sauṣṭhavaṃ nṛtyavedinaḥ // 1449	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anucchiṣṭo devairaparidalito rāhudaśanaiḥ kalaṅkenāspṛṣṭo na khalu paribhūto dinakṛtā / kuhūbhirno lupto na ca yuvativaktreṇa vijitaḥ kalānāthaḥ ko'yaṃ kanakalatikāyāmudayate // 1450	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anujaguratha divyaṃ dundubhidhvānamāśāḥ surakusumanipātairvyomni lakṣmīrvitene / priyamiva kathayiṣyannāliliṅga sphurantīṃ bhuvamanibhṛtavelāvīcibāhuḥ payodhiḥ // 1451	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anujjhitasuhṛdbhāvaḥ suhṛdāṃ durhṛdāmapi / sama ityeva bhāvyo'pi nama ityabhibhāṣyate // 1452	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anutkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vātha dāruṇi / varṇā yathā maṣīkalke tathā sarge sthitāḥ pare // 1453	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuttamānubhāvasya parairapihitaujasaḥ / akāryasuhṛdo'smākam apūrvāstava kīrtayaḥ // 1454	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anutthāne dhruvo nāśaḥ prāptasyānāgatasya ca / prāpyate phalamutthānāl labhate cārthasaṃpadam // 1455	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ saha / parjanyamiva bhūtāni svādudrumamivāṇḍajāḥ // 1456	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anutsūtrapadanyāsā sadvṛttiḥ sannibandhanā / śabdavidyeva no bhāti rājanītirapaspaśā // 1457	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuditasaṭāvaṃsau nātisphuṭāḥ karajāṅkurā daśanamukulodbhedaḥ stoko mukhe mṛdu garjitam / mṛgapatiśiśornāstyadyāpi kriyā svakulocitā madakṛtamahāgandhasyāndhyaṃ vyapohati dantinām // 1458	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anudinamatitīvraṃ rodiṣīti tvamuccaiḥ sakhi kila kuruṣe tvaṃ vācyatāṃ me mudhaiva / hṛdayamidamanaṅgāṅgārasaṅgādvilīya prasarati bahirambhaḥ susthite naitadaśru // 1459	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anudinamadhikaṃ te kampate kāyavallī śiva śiva nayanāntaṃ nāśrudhārā jahāti / kathaya kathaya ko'yaṃ yatkṛte komalāṅgi tyajati na pariṇaddhaṃ pāṇḍimānaṃ kapolaḥ // 1460	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anudinamanukūlamācarantaṃ vihitamatiḥ pratikūlamācaret kaḥ / śamitagaralajātakaṇṭhadāhaṃ śitikaṇṭhaḥ śaśinaṃ śirahsu dhatte // 1461	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: nnry] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anudunamanuraktaḥ padminīcakravāle navaparimalamādyaccañcarīkānukarṣī / kalitamadhurapadmaḥ ko'pi gambhīravedī jayati mihirakanyākūlavanyākarīndraḥ // 1462	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anudinamabhyāsadṛḍhaiḥ soḍhuṃ dīrgho'pi śakyate virahaḥ / pratyāsannasamāga ma- muhūrtavighno'pi durviṣaḥ // 1463	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anudehamāgatavataḥ pratimāṃ pariṇāyakasya gurumudvahatā / mukureṇa vepathubhṛto'tibharāt kathamapyapāti na vadhūkarataḥ // 1464	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
anudghuṣṭaḥ śabdairatha ca ghaṭanātaḥ sphuṭarasaḥ padānāmarthātmā ramayati na tūttānitarasaḥ / yathā dṛśyaḥ kiṃcitpavanacalacīnāṃśukatayā stanābhogaḥ strīṇāṃ harati na tathonmudritatanuḥ // 1465	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
anunayagurorgoṣṭhībandho mukhāsavasaṃpadāṃ śapathavivaraṃ visrabdhānāṃ dhiyāṃ prathamātithiḥ / avinayavacovādasthānaṃ puraṃdhriṣu paprathe madavilasitasyaikācāryaściraṃ rativibhramaḥ // 1466	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anunayati patiṃ na lajjamānā kathayati nāpi sakhījanāya kiṃcit / prasarati malayānile navoḍhā vahati paraṃtu cirāya śūnyamantaḥ // 1467	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
anunayamagṛhītvā vyājasuptā parācī rutamatha kṛkavākostāramākarṇya kalye / kathamapi parivṛttā nidrayāndhā kila strī mukulitanayanaivāśliṣyati prāṇanātham // 1468	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anunetuṃ māninyā dayitaścaraṇe sarāgacaraṇāyāḥ / yāvat patitaḥ sa tayā tatkṣaṇamavadhīritaḥ kasmāt // 1469	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anupāyena karmāṇi viparītāni yāni ca kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣyaprayateṣviva // 1470	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anupālayatāmudeṣyatīṃ prabhuśaktiṃ dviṣatāmanīhayā / apayāntyacirānmahībhujāṃ jananirvādabhayādiva śriyaḥ // 1471	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
anupoṣya trirātrāṇi tirthānyanabhigamya ca / adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāśca daridro nāma jāyate // 1472	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuprāsini sandarbhe gonandanasamaḥ kutaḥ / yathārthanāmataivāsya yadvā vadati cārutām // 1473	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam / mohādārabhyate karma yattattāmasamucyate // 1474	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubandhaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vipākāṃścaiva karmaṇām / utthānamātmanaścaiva dhīraḥ kurvīta vā na vā // 1475	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubandhānavekṣeta sānubandheṣu karmasu / saṃpradhārya ca kurvīta na vegena samācaret // 1476	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubhavaṃ vadanendurupāgaman niyatameṣa yadasya mahātmanaḥ / kṣubhitamutkalikātaralaṃ manaḥ paya iva stimitasya mahodadheḥ // 1477	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anubhavata dadata vittaṃ mānyān mānayata sajjanān bhajata / atiparuṣapavanavilulita- dīpaśikhācañcalā lakṣmīḥ // 1478	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anubhavata yuvatyo bhāgyavatyo nitāntaṃ kusumavalayavelāsaṅgakhelāsukhāni / mama tu madhukarāṇāṃ vāṭapāṭaccarāṇāṃ sapadi patati dhāṭī puṣpavāṭīniveśe // 1479	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anubhavannavadolamṛtūtsavaṃ paṭurapi priyakaṇṭhajighṛkṣayā / anyadāsanarajjuparigrahe bhujalatāṃ jalatāmabalājanaḥ // 1480	drutavilambita [12: nBBr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anubhāvavatā guru sthiratvād avisaṃvādi dhanurdhanaṃjayena / svabalavyasane'pi pīḍyamānaṃ guṇavanmitramivānatiṃ prapede // 1481	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
anubhūtacareṣu dīrghikāṇām upakaṇtheṣu gatāgataikatānāḥ / madhupāḥ kathayanti padminīnāṃ salilairantaritāni korakāṇi // 1482	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
anubhūtabhavavyavasthitir janatākānaratābhilāṣiṇī / tadavaimi sukhena saṃsṛtau kalitānaṅgatayaiva nisṛtiḥ // 1483	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: ssjl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anubhūtamidaṃ loke yadbadhvā balavattaraiḥ / īśvarairdurbalaḥ kṛṣyaḥ kratau paśurivābalaḥ // 1484	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anumatamivānetuṃ joṣaṃ tamītamasāṃ kulaṃ diśi diśi dṛśo vinyasyantyaḥ śriyāṅkuritāñjanāḥ / madanahutabhugdhūmacchāyaiḥ paṭairasitairvṛtāḥ prayayurarasadbhūṣairaṅgaiḥ priyānabhisārikāḥ // 1485	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anumatisarasaṃ vimucya cūtaṃ navanavamañjulamañjarīparītam / api pikadayite kathaṃ matiste ghaṭayati niśphalapippale'valepam // 1486	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
anumamāra na māra kathaṃ nu sā ratiratiprathitāpi pativratā / iyadanāthavadhūvadhapātakī dayitayāpi tayāsi kimujjñitaḥ // 1487	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anumaraṇe vyavasāyaṃ strīdharme kaḥ karoti savivekaḥ / saṃsāramuktyupāyaṃ daṇḍagrahaṇaṃ vrataṃ hitvā // 1488	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anuyayau vividhopalakuṇḍala- dyutivitānakasaṃvalitāṃśukam / dhṛtadhanuvalayasya payomucaḥ śabalimā balimānamuṣo vapuḥ // 1489	drutavilambita [12: nBBr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anuyātāne kajanaḥ parapuruṣairuhyate'sya nijadehaḥ / adhikārasthaḥ puruṣaḥ śava iva na śṛṇoti vīkṣate kumatiḥ // 1490	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anuyāti na bhartāraṃ yadi daivāt kathaṃcana / tathāpi śīlaṃ saṃrakṣyaṃ śīlabhaṅgāt patatyadhaḥ // 1491	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anuyāsyan munitanayāṃ sahasā vinayena vāritaprasaraḥ / sthānādanuccalannapi gatveva punaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ // 1492	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anuyukto dasyuvadhe raṇe kuryāt parākramam / nāsya kṛtyamataḥ kiṃcid anyad dasyunibarhaṇāt // 1493	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anuraktajanaviraktā namrotsiktā viraktarāgiṇyaḥ / vañcakavacanāsaktā nāryaḥ sadbhāvaśaṅkinyaḥ // 1494	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anuraktena hrṣṭena tuṣṭena jagatīpatiḥ / alpenāpi svasainyena bhūmiṃ jayati bhūmipaḥ // 1495	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anurañjitā api guṇair na namanti prakṛtayo vinā daṇḍāt / aṅkagatāpi na vīṇā kalamadhuramatāḍitā kvaṇati // 1496	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anurañjaya rājānaṃ mā jānan jātu kopayeḥ prakṛtīḥ / etaddvayānurāga- sthirayā tiṣṭha pratiṣṭhayāśliṣṭaḥ // 1497	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anurāgaṃ jano yāti parokṣe guṇakīrtanam / na bibhyati ca sattvāni siddherlakṣaṇamuttamam // 1498	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anurāgavatī saṃdhyā divasastatpuraḥsaraḥ / aho daivagatiścitrā tathāpi na samāgamaḥ // 1499	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anurāgavantamapi locanayor dadhataṃ vapuḥ sukhamatāpakaram / nirakāsayadravimapetavasuṃ viyadālayādaparadiggaṇikā // 1500	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
anurāgavartinā tava viraheṇogreṇa sā gṛhītāṅgī / tripuraripuṇeva gaurī varatanurardhāvaśiṣṭeva // 1501	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anurāgādabhisarato laṅghitajaladheḥ kalādhināthasya / rajanīmukhacumbanataḥ śithilitamalakaṃ kalaṅkamākalaye // 1502	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anurāgo vṛthā strīṣu strīṣu garvo vṛthā tathā / pṛiyo'ham sarvadā hyasyā mamaiṣā sarvadāpriyā // 1503	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
anurūpamidaṃ kūpa chadmacchannasya kiṃ na te / sanmārgavibhramānmārgapāto'yaṃ yannipātitaḥ // 1504	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anurūpeṇa saṃsargaṃ prāpya sarvo'pi modate / dinaṃ tejonidhiryadvad ratriṃ doṣākaras tathā // 1505	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anulepanāni kusumānyabalāḥ kṛtamanyavaḥ patiṣu dīpaśikhāḥ / samayena tena cirasuptamano- bhavabodhanaṃ samamabodhiṣata // 1506	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
anulomena balinaṃ pratilomena durjanam / ātmatulyabalaṃ śatruṃ vinayena balena vā // 1507	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
