anuvanaṃ vanarājivadhūmukhe bahalarāgajavādharacāruṇi / vikacabāṇadalāvalayo'dhikaṃ rurucire rucirekṣaṇavibhramāḥ // 1508	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
anuvanamanuyāntaṃ bāṣpavāri tyajantaṃ muditakamaladāmakṣāmamālokya rāmam / dinamapi ravirocistāpamantaḥ prapede rajanirapi ca tārābāṣpabindūn babhāra // 1509	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anuvanamanuśailaṃ tāmanālokya sītāṃ pratidinamatidīnaṃ vīkṣya rāmaṃ virāmam / giriraśanimayo'yaṃ yastadā na dvidhābhūt kṣitirapi na vidīrṇā sāpi sarvaṃsahaiva / 1510	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
anuvādayitā vādyaṃ nṛtyasi yattvayi sureśvaraḥ sākṣāt / pakṣaśca te'javandyas tadasi kalāpin paraṃ dhanyaḥ // 1511	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anuvelaṃ nihanyante yasya sindhorivodyamāḥ / taṃ pramathya śriyaṃ ko'pi vipakṣo bhūbhṛduddharet // 1512	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuśayavatyevoktā proṣyatpatikā na bhedato bahubhiḥ / paradeśādāgacchat- patikāpi yathā pramuditaiva // 1513	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anuśāsaddhi dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa saṃsthayā / nyāyena ca caturthena caturantāṃ mahīṃ jayet // 1514	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuśīlitakuñjavāṭikāyāṃ jaghanālaṃkṛtapītaśāṭikāyām / muralīkalakūjite ratāyāṃ mama ceto'stu kadambadevatāyām // 1515	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
anuśocanamastavicāramanā vigatasya mṛtasya ca yaḥ kurute / sa gate salile tanute varaṇaṃ bhujagasya gatasya gatiṃ kṣipati // 1516	toṭaka [12: ssss]
anuṣṭhānena rahitāṃ pāṭhamātreṇa kevalam / rañjayatyeva yā lokaṃ kiṃ tayā śukavidyayā // 1517	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuṣṭhitaṃ tu yad devair ṛṣibhiryadanuṣṭhitam / nānuṣṭheyaṃ manuṣyaistu taduktaṃ karma ācaret // 1518	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuṣṭhiteṣu kāryeṣu yo guhyaṃ na prakāśayet / sa tatra labhate siddhiṃ jalamadhye kapiryathā // 1519	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anusarati karikapolaṃ bhramaraḥ śravaṇena tāḍyamāno'pi / gaṇayati na tiraskāraṃ dānāndhavilocano nīcaḥ // 1520	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anusara sarastīraṃ vairaṃ kimatra sahātmanā katipayapayaḥpāṇam mānin samācara cātaka / pralayapavanairastaṃ nītaḥ purātanavārido yadayamadayaṃ kīlājālaṃ vimuñcati nūtanaḥ // 1521	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā / patanti pitaras tasya svargasthā api tairguṇaiḥ // 1522	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anūnavegādayamadvitīyaś cchāyāturaṅgādiva lajjamānaḥ / khuroddhutairvīra turaṅgamaste rajobhirahṇanāṃ patimāvṛṇoti // 1523.1	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anrjutvamasadbhāvaṃ kārpaṇyaṃ calacittatā / puṃsāṃ mitreṣu ye doṣās te veśyāsu guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 1523.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmi ca paiśunam / guroścālīkanirbandhaḥ samāni brahmahatyayā // 1524	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anṛtaṃ cāṭuvādaśca dhanayogo mahānayam / satyaṃ vaiduṣyamityeṣa yogo dāridryakārakaḥ // 1525	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anṛtaṃ satyamityāhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam / iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣairiha // 1526	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anṛtaṃ sāhasaṃ māyā mūrkhatvamatilubdhatā / aśaucatvaṃ nirdayatvaṃ strīṇāṃ doṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ // 1527	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
anṛtapaṭutā kraurye cittaṃ satāmavamānitā matiravinaye dharme śāṭhyaṃ guruṣvapi vañcanam / lalitamadhurā vākpratyakṣe parokṣavibhāṣiṇī kaliyugamahārājasyaitāḥ sphuranti vibhūtayaḥ // 1528	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
anrtamanṛtametadyastudhāsūtirindur niyatamayamanāryo nirgataḥ kālakūṭāt / hṛdayadahanadakṣā dāruṇā cānyatheyaṃ vada sakhi madhuratve mohaśaktiḥ kuto'sya // 1529	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anṛte dharmabhagne ca na śuśrūṣati cāpriye / na priyaṃ na hitaṃ vācyaṃ sadbhireveti ninditāḥ // 1530	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekagaticitritaṃ vividhajātibhedākulaṃ sametya tanumadgaṇaḥ pracuracitraceṣṭodyataḥ / purārjitavicitrakarmaphalabhugvicitrāṃ tanuṃ pragṛhya naṭavat sadā bhramati janmaraṅgāṅgaṇe // 1531	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anekacittamantraśca dveṣyo bhavati mantriṇām / anavasthitacittatvāt karye taiḥ samupekṣyate // 1532	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekajanmasaṃbhūtaṃ pāpaṃ puṃsāṃ praṇaśyati / snānamātreṇa gaṅgāyāṃ sadyaḥ puṇyasya bhājanam // 1533	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekajīvaghātotthaṃ mlecchocchiṣṭaṃ malāvilam / malāktapātranikṣiptaṃ kiṃ śaucaṃ lihato madhu // 1534	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekadoṣaduṣṭasya kāyasyaiko mahān guṇaḥ / yo yathā vartayatyenaṃ taṃ tathaivānuvartate // 1535	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekadoṣaduṣṭasya madhuno'pāstadoṣatām / yo brūte tadrasāsaktaḥ so'satyāmbudhirastadhīḥ // 1536	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekadheti praguṇena cetasā vivicya mithyātvamalaṃ sadūṣaṇam / vimucya jainendramataṃ sukhāvahaṃ bhajanti bhavyā bhavaduḥkhabhīravaḥ // 1537	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anekaparyāyaguṇairupetaṃ vilokyate yena samastatattvam / tadindriyānindriyabhedabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ jinendrairgaditaṃ hitāya // 1538	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anekabhavasaṃcitā iha hi karmaṇā nirmitāḥ priyāpriyaviyogasaṃgamavipattisaṃpattayaḥ / bhavanti sakalāsvimā gatiṣu sarvadā dehināṃ jarāmaraṇavīcike jananasāgare majjatām // 1539	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anekamalasaṃbhave kṛmikulaiḥ sadā saṃkule vicitrabahuvedane budhavinindite duḥsahe / bhramannayamanārataṃ vyasanasaṃkaṭe dehavān purārjitavaśo bhave bhavati bhāminīgarbhake // 1540	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anekamukhapāpātmā chadmasaṃdarśitāśramaḥ / karburaprakṛtiḥ kaścit kāpeyakalahocitaḥ / 1541.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekayuddhavijayī saṃdhānaṃyasya gacchati / tatpratāpena tasyāśu vaśaṃ gacchanti vidviṣaḥ // 1541.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekarājyāntaritam atikṣiptaṃ na yudhyate / antargatāmitraśalyam antaḥśalyaṃ hi na kṣamam // 1542	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)

anekavarṇapadatāṃ vāgvidyudiva bibhratī / abhrānteṣu sadā sārasaṅgiṣu syāt sphuradguṇā // 1544	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekavidvajjanaratnapūrṇaṃ ve dodakanyāyataraṅgaramyam / alaṅghanīyaṃ gurutīrthamekaṃ sabhāsamudraṃ śirasā namāmi // 1545	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anekaśāstraṃ bahu veditavyam alpaśca kālo bahavaśca vighnāḥ / yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsitavyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt // 1546	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

anekasuṣiraṃ vādyaṃ kāntaṃ ca ṛṣisaṃjñitam / cakriṇā ca sadārādhyaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ // 1549	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aneke phaṇinaḥ santi bhekahbakṣaṇatatparāḥ / eka eva hi śeṣo'yaṃ dharaṇīdharaṇakṣamaḥ // 1550	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anekairnāyakaguṇaiḥ sahitaḥ sakhi me patiḥ / sa eva yadi jāraḥ syāt saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet // 1551	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam / prasādamākāṅkṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate // 1552	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anena kasyāpi kulāṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaivam / kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryād yasyāyamaṅgāt kṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ // 1553	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ māṃsasya parivarjanam / yatpāṭitaṃ tṛṇenāpi svamaṅgaṃ paridūyate // 1554	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena kumbhadvayasaṃniveśa- saṃlakṣyamāṇena kucadvayena unmajjatā yauvanavāraṇena vāpīva tanvaṅgi taraṅgitāsi // 1555	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena tanumadyayā mukharanūpurārāviṇā navāmburuhakomalena caraṇena saṃbhāvitaḥ / aśoka yadi sadya eva kusumairna saṃpatsyase vṛthā vahasi dohadaṃ lalitakāmisādhāraṇam // 1556	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
anena tava putrasya prasuptasya vanāntare / śikhāmāruhya hastena khaḍgena nihataṃ śiraḥ // 1557	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena tvaṃ svarūpeṇa puṣpabāṇaiśca pañcabhiḥ / mohayan puruṣān strīśca kuru sṛṣṭiṃ sanātanīm // 1558	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena dharmaḥ saviśeṣamadya me trivargasāraḥ pratibhāti bhāvini / tvayā manonirviṣayārthakāmayā yadeka eva pratigṛhya sevyate // 1559	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anena puruṣo dehān upādatte vimuñcati / harṣaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cānena vindati // 1560	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena bhavati śreṣṭho mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ / kartārameno gacchecca nindyo yatra hi nindyate // 1561	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anena martyadehena yallokadvayaśarmadam / vicintya tadanuṣṭheyaṃ heyaṃ karma tato'nyathā // 1562	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccin manaso ruciste / siprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartumudyānaparaṃparāsu // 1563	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena yogarājena dhūpitāmbarabhūṣaṇaḥ / dhūpitāṅgastribhuvanaṃ manujaḥ kurute vaśam // 1564	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anena yogena vivṛddhatejā nijāṃ parasmai padavīmayacchan / samācarācāramupāttaśastro japopavāsābhiṣavairmunīnām // 1565	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
anena rambhoru bhavanmukhena tuṣārabhānostulayā jitasya / ūnasya nūnaṃ paripūraṇāya tārāḥ sphuranti pratimānakhaṇḍāḥ // 1566	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena vītarāgeṇa buddhenevādhareṇa te / dūti nirvyājamākhyātā sarvavastuṣu śūnyatā // 1567	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena sarvārthikṛtārthitā kṛtā hṛtārthinau kāmagavīsuradrumau / mithaḥpayaḥsecanapallavāśanaiḥ pradāya dānavyasanaṃ samāpnutam // 1568	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
anena sārdhaṃ tava yauvanena koṭiṃ parāmacchiduro'dhyarohat / premāpi tanvi tvayi vāsavasya guṇo'pi cāpe sumanaḥśarasya // 1569	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśes tīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu / dvīpāntarānītalavaṅgapuṣpair apākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ // 1570	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anena sidhyati hyetanmamāpyeṣa parākramaḥ / evaṃ jñātvā caredyastu saphalāstasya buddhayaḥ // 1571	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anenaiva prakāreṇa trayo grīvāśritāḥ śubhāḥ / lalāṭe yugalāvartau candrārkau śubhakārakau // 1572	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaiśvarye tṛṣā bhāryā pathi kṣetre tridhā kṛṣiḥ / lambakaḥ sākṣiṇaścaiva pañcānarthā asaṃkṛtāḥ // 1573	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaucityādṛte nānyad rasabhaṅgasya kāraṇam / prasiddhaucityabandhastu rasasyopaniṣat parā // 1574	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaucityena kanyāsu purastrīṣu ca yā ratiḥ / sa kāmo hi kṣitīndrāṇām ariṣaḍvargapūrvajaḥ // 1575	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥkaṭurapi laghurapi sadvṛttaṃ yaḥ pumān na saṃtyajati / sa bhavati sadyo vandyaḥ sarṣapa iva sarvalokasya // 1576	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antaḥkaṭu sadā prema mānuṣaṃ parilakṣyate / hatāśān na karotyasmān daivapremaiva kevalam // 1577	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥkapālavivare jihvāmākuñcya cārpayet / bhrūmadhyadṛṣṭiramṛtaṃ pibet khecaramudrayā // 1578	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
antaḥkaraṇatattvasya dampatyoḥ snehasaṃśrayāt / ānandagranthireko'yam apatyamiti kathyate // 1579	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥkaraṇavikāraṃ guruparijanasaṃkaṭe'pi kulaṭānām / jānanti tadabhiyuktā bhrūbhaṅgāpāṅgamadhuradṛṣṭena // 1580	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
antaḥkaraṇaśūnyo'pi tṛṇapūlakapūruṣaḥ satkṛtaḥ kṣetrapatinā samartho mṛgavārane // 1581	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
antaḥ kiṃcit kiṃcin muktānāmahaha vibhramaṃ vahasi / dūrāddarśayasi punaḥ kṣārodgāraṃ jaḍādhīśaḥ // 1582	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antaḥ kuṭilatāṃ bibhrac chaṅkhaḥ sa khalu niṣṭhuraḥ / huṃkaroti yadā dhmātas tadaiva bahu gaṇyatām // 1583	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥkūjadudārakaṇṭhamasakṛnmuñceti lolekṣaṇaṃ prāyaḥ smerakapolamūlamamṛtaprasyandi bimbādharam / ādhūtāṅgulipallavāgramalamityānartitabhrūlataṃ pītaṃ yena mukhaṃ tvadīyamabale so'haṃ hi dhanyo yuvā // 1584.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antaḥ kecana kecanāpi hi dale kecit tathā pallave mūle kecana kecana tvaci phale puṣpe ca ke'pi drumāḥ / saurabhyaṃ nitarāṃ bibhartyavikalaḥ śrīkhaṇḍaṣaṇḍīkṛtaḥ sarvāṅge surabhirna ko'pi dadṛśe muktvā bhavantaṃ kvacit // 1584.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antaḥkopakaṣāyite'pi hṛdaye sādhorasacceṣṭitair bhadrāṇyeva bahiḥ kriyāsu vacanānyāvirbhavantyarthataḥ / madhye'tyantakarālavāḍavaśikhāśoṣe'pi vārāṃnidheḥ kallolāḥ prakaṭībhavanti satataṃ muktāphalodgāriṇaḥ // 1585	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
// (1586)	upajāti ...: ajñātam [0: ]
antaḥkrūrāḥ saumyamukhā agādhahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ / antarviṣā bahiḥsaumyā bhakṣyā viṣakṛtā iva // 1587	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!), 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥ krodhojjihānajvalanabhavaśikhākārajihvāvalīḍha- prauḍhabrahmāṇḍabhāṇḍaḥ pṛthubhuvanaguhāgarbhagambhīranādaḥ / dṛpyatpārīndramūrtirmurajidavatu vaḥ suprabhāmaṇḍalībhiḥ kurvannirdhūmadhūmadhvajanicitamiva vyoma romacchaṭānām // 1588	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
antaḥkhedamivodvahan yadaniśaṃ ratnākaro ghūrṇate yacca dhyānamivāsthito na kanakakṣoṇīdharaḥ syandate / jāne dānavilāsadānarabhasaṃ śauryaṃ ca te śuśruvān eko manthavighaṭṭanāstadaparaṣṭaṅkāhatīḥ śaṅkate // 1589	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antaḥpuracaraiḥ sārdhaṃ yo na mantraṃ samācaret / na kalatrairnarendrasya sa bhaved rājavallabhaḥ // 1590	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥpuradhanādhyakṣair vairidūtairnirākṛtaiḥ / saṃsargaṃ na vrajed rājam vinā pārthivaśāsanāt // 1591	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥpurāṇāṃ vihitavyavasthaḥ pade pade'haṃ skhalitāni rakṣan / jarāturaḥ saṃprati daṇḍanītyā sarvaṃ nṛpasyānukaromi vṛttam // 1592	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
antaḥpurīyasi raṇeṣu sutīyasi tvaṃ pauraṃ janaṃ tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ / dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiramṛtadyutidarśamindra- saṃcāramatra bhuvi saṃcarasi kṣitīśa // 1593	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaḥpure pitṛtulyaṃ mātṛtulyaṃ mahānase / goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayameva kṛṣiṃ vrajet // 1594	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥprakāśamicchantaḥ sadasacca vivecitum / snehaṃ sūktipradīpe'smin vardhayantu subuddhayaḥ // 1595	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥprataptamarusaikatadahyamāna- mūlasya campakataroḥ kva vikāsacintā / prāyo bhavatyanucitasthitideśabhājāṃ śreyaḥ svajīvaparipālanamātrameva // 1596	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaḥ praviśya yuvacihnamuro'balānāṃ yena krameṇa bata loḍayate manīṣin / āśritya taṃ hi niyamaṃ tata unnayete etau kucau sapadi hanti vidīrṇamadhyāt // 1597	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaḥśarīrapariśoṣamudagrayantaḥ kīṭakṣatasrutibhirasramivodvamantaḥ / chāyāviyogamalinā vyasane nimagnā vṛkṣāḥ śmaśānamupagantumiva pravṛttāḥ // 1598	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaḥsaṃtoṣacittānāṃ saṃpadasti pade pade / antarmalinacittānāṃ sukhaṃ svapne'pi durlabham // 1599	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsaṃtoṣavāṣpaiḥ sthagayati na dṛśastābhirākarṇayiṣyann aṅgenānastiromā racayati pulakaśreṇimānandakandām / na kṣoṇībhaṅgabhīruḥ kalayati ca śiraḥkampanaṃ tanna vidmaḥ śṛṇvannetasya kīrtīḥ kathamuragapatiḥ prītimāviṣkaroti // 1600	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
antaḥsamutthavirahānalatīvratāpa- saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam / dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ // 1601	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaḥ sametyāpi bahiḥ prayāti spṛṣṭā vidhatte tvavagūhanāni / dattvādharaṃ roditi śuṣkameva saivaṃ vilāsaistapasāpyalabhyā // 1602	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
antaḥsāravihīnānāṃ sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati / malaye'pi sthito veṇur veṇureva na candanaḥ // 1603	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsāravihīnānām upadeśo na jāyate / malayācalasaṃsargān na veṇuścandanāyate // 1604	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsārairakuṭilais susnigdhaiḥ suparīkṣitaiḥ / mantribhirdhāryate rājyaṃ sustambhairiva mandiram // 1605	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsāro'pi niryāti nūnamarthitayā saha / anyathā tadavasthasya mahimā kena dehinām // 1606	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsthasuratārambhā bhilāṣamapi gopayat / anyonyaṃ mithunaṃ vetti netre dṛṣṭvaiva cañcale // 1607	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsthenāviruddhena suvṛttenāticāruṇā / antarbhinnena saṃprāptaṃ mauktikenāpi bandhanam // 1608	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥsvīkṛtajāhnavījalamatisvacchandaratnāṃkura- śreṇīśoṇabhujaṅganāyakaphaṇācakrollasatpallavam / bhūyādabhyudayāya mokṣanagaraprasthānabhājāmitaḥ pratyūhapraśamaikapūrṇakalaśaprāyaṃ śiro dhūrjaṭeḥ // 1609	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtatāpadaḥ / iti tyājye bhave bhavyo muktāvruttiṣṭhate janaḥ // 1610	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antakaḥ śamano mṛtyuḥ pātālaṃ vaḍavāmukham / kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ // 1611	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antakāya dadatā tvayā priyā- kāyakāncanalatāpratigraham / dīyate bata madīyajīvanaṃ dakṣiṇānila kuto na dakṣiṇā // 1612	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
antakāle ca māmeva smaranmuktvā kalevaram / yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // 1613	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ / [rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā] // 1614	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antako'pi hi jantūnām antakālamapekṣate / na kālaniyamaḥ kaścid uttamarṇasya vidyate // 1615	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaraṃ kiyadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ / antaraṃ tāvadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ // 1616	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaraṅgamanaṅgasya śṛṅgārakuladaivatam / aṅgīkaroti tanvaṅgī sā vilāsamayaṃ vayaḥ // 1617	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaraṅgā hi ye rājñaḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ / bhṛtyā bhavanti prāyeṇa tebhyo rakṣedimāḥ prajāḥ // 1618	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
antarāyatimiropaśāntaye śāntapāvanamacintyavaibhavam / taṃ naraṃ vapuṣi kuñjaraṃ mukhe manmahe kimapi tundilaṃ mahaḥ // 1619	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
antargatamalo duṣṭas tīrthasnānaśatairapi / na śudhyati yathā bhāṇḍaṃ surāyā dāhitaṃ ca sat // 1620	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antargatā madanavahniśikhāvalī yā sā bāghyate kimiha candanapaṅkalepaiḥ / yatkumbhakārapacanopari paṅkalepas tāpāya kevalamasau na ca tāpaśāntyai // 1621	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antargatairguṇaiḥ kiṃ dvitrā api yatra sākṣiṇo viralāḥ / sa guṇo gīteryadasau vanecaraṃ hariṇamapi harati // 1622	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antargato yadi haristapasā tataḥ kiṃ nāntargato yadi haristapasā tataḥ kim / antarbahiryadi haristapasā tataḥ kiṃ nāntarbahiryadi haristapasā tataḥ kim // 1623	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antargāḍhaṃ cihnahīnaṃ viśālaṃ madhye sthūlaṃ sthūladhārātitīkṣṇam / rakṣovakṣaśchedanārthaṃ mahāntaṃ kṛtvā khaṅgaṃ devarājotihṛṣṭaḥ // 1624	śālinī [11: mttgg]
antargūḍhānarthān avyañjayataḥ prasādarahitasya / saṃdarbhasya nadasya ca na rasaḥ prītyai rasajñānām // 1625	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antargṛhaṃ nayati vardhitaromaharṣaṃ sparśena sītkaraṇagarbhamukhīḥ karoti / kiṃcādharavraṇavatīḥ kurute puranghrīḥ kiṃ vallabhaḥ kimuta haimana eṣa vātaḥ // 1626	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antargṛhe kṛṣṇamavekṣya cauraṃ baddhvā kavāṭaṃ jananīṃ gataikā / ulūkhale dāmanibaddhamenaṃ tatrāpi dṛṣṭvā stimitā babhūva // 1627	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
antarjalāvāritamūrti yāto bālāpariṣvaṅgasukhāya patyuḥ / vighnāya vaimalyamapāṃ babhūva vyarthaḥ prasādo hi jalāśayānām // 1628	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
antardadhānāpi kaṭhorabhāvaṃ svacchadyutiḥ sā nijamādhurībhiḥ / bhuktā rasaṃ svāduvidāṃ tanoti guṇopagūḍhā sitaśarkareva // 1629	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
antarduṣṭaḥ kṣamāyuktaḥ sarvānarthakaraḥ kila / śakuniḥ śakaṭāraśca dṛṣṭāntāvatra bhūpate // 1630	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antardhṛtaguṇaireva pareṣāṃ sthīyate hṛdi / arthaṃ samarthayantyenaṃ samagraṃ kusumasrajaḥ // 1631	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarnāḍīniyamitamarullaṅghitabrahmarandhraṃ svānte śāntipraṇayini samunmīladānandasāndram / pratyagjyotirjayti yaminaḥ spaṣṭalālāṭanetra- vyājavyaktīkṛtamiva jagadvāpi candrārdhamauleḥ // 1632	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
antarnidahyamānena śaktihīnena śatruṣu / saṃtatiḥ kriyate yena nindyaṃ dhiktasya jīvitam // 1633	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarnibaddhagurumanyuparaṃparābhir iccocitaṃ kimapi vaktumaśaknuvatyāḥ / avyktahūṃkuticalatkucamaṇḍalāyās tasyāḥ smarāmi muhurardhavilokitāni // 1634	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
antarbalānyahamamuṣya mṛgādhipasya vācā nigadya kathamadya laghūkaromi / jānanti kiṃ na karajakṣatakumbhikumbhā- dāmuktamauktikamayāni digantarāṇi // 1635	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antarbhāvanigūdheyaṃ vākte prakṛtipeśalā / vikārādyanabhijñeyā viṣadigdheva vāruṇī // 1636	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarbhūto nivasati jaḍe jaḍaḥ śiśiramahasi hariṇa iva / ajaḍe śaśīva tapane sa tu praviṣṭo'pi niḥsarati // 1637	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antarbhūya prabhoḥ prāpyo viśeṣaḥ sarvathā budhaiḥ / ko hi nāma na kurvīta kevalodarapūraṇam // 1638	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarmagnakareṇavaḥ kalabhakavyārugṇakandāṅkuraiḥ sāmodāḥ paritaḥ pramattamahiṣaśvāsollasadvīcayaḥ / saṃmodaṃ janayanti śailasaritaḥ succhāyakacchasthalī- sīmāno jalasekaśītalaśilānidrāṇarohidgaṇāḥ // 1639	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antarmanyuvibhinnadīrgharasitaprodbhūtakaṇṭhavyathair ākruṣṭāstaṭinīṣu kokamithunairyāvanniśīthaṃ mithaḥ / śītojjāgarajambukaughamukharagrāmopakaṇṭhasthalāḥ kṛcchreṇoparamanti pānthagṛhiṇīcintāyatā rātrayaḥ // 1640	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antarmalinadehena bahirāhlādakāriṇā / mahākālaphaleneva kaḥ khalena na vañcitaḥ // 1641	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarmalinasaṃsargāc chrutavānapi duṣyati / yaccakṣuḥsaṃnikarṣeṇa karṇo'bhūt kuṭilāśrayaḥ // 1642	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

antarmārarasārdrā guruguṇabaddhānukūlatāṃ dhatte / niṣṭhurabāhyākārā dṛtiriva patisaṃnidhau navyā // 1644	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antarmohanamaulighūrṇanacalanmandāravibhraṃśanaḥ stambhākarṣaṇadṛptiharṣaṇamahāmantraḥ kuraṅgīdṛśām / dṛpyaddānavadūyamānadiviṣaddurvāraduḥkhāpadāṃ bhraṃśaḥ kaṃsariporvilopayatu vo'śreyāṃsi vaṃśīravaḥ // 1645	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antarye satataṃ luthantyagaṇitāstāneva pāthodharair āttānāpatatastaraṅgavalayairāliṅgya gṛhṇannasau / vyaktaṃ mauktikaratnatāṃ jalakaṇānsaṃprāpayatyambudhiḥ prāyo'nyena kṛtādaro laghurapi prāpto'rcyate svāmibhiḥ // 1646	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antarlīnabhujaṃgamaṃ gṛhamivāntaḥsthograsiṃhaṃ vanaṃ grāhākīrṇamivābhirāmakamalacchāyāsanāthaṃ saraḥ / kālenāryajanāpavādapiśunaiḥ kṣudrairanāryaiḥ śritaṃ duḥkhena pravigāhyate sacakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam // 1647	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antarlīnasya duḥkhāgner adyoddāmaṃ jvaliṣyataḥ / utpīḍa iva dhūmasya mohaḥ prāgāvṛṇoti mām // 1648	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarvasati mārjārī śunī vā rājaveśmani / bahirbaddho'pi mātaṅgas tataḥ kiṃ laghutāṃ gataḥ // 1649	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarvahasi kaṣāyaṃ bāhyākāreṇa madhuratāṃ yāsi / sahakāra māyiviṭapin yuktaṃ lokairbahirnītaḥ // 1650	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antarbahistrijagatīrasabhāvavidvān yo nartayatyakhiladehabhṛtāṃ kulāni / kṣemaṃ dadātu bhagavān paramādidevaḥ śṛṅgāranāṭakamahākavirātmajanmā // 1651	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antarvāṇiṃ manyamānaḥ khalo'yaṃ paurobhāgyaṃ sūktimuktāsu dhatte / sarvānandinyaṅgake kāminīnām īrma mārgatyeṣa vai bambharāliḥ // 1652	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: rttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
antarviśati mārjārī śunī vā rājaveśmani / bahiḥsthasya gajendrasya kimarthaḥ parihīyate // 1653	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarviṣamayā hyetā bahiścaiva manoramāḥ / guñjāphalasamākārā yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ // 1654	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarviṣṇostrilokī nivasati phaṇināmīśvare so'pi śete sindhoḥ so'pyekadeśe tamapi culukayāṃ kumbhayoniścakāra / dhatte khadyotalīlāmayamapi nabhasi śrīnṛsiṃhakṣitīndra tvatkīrteḥ karṇanīlotpalamidamapi ca prekṣaṇīyaṃ vibhāti // 1655	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
antarhite śaśini saiva kumudvatī me dṛṣṭiṃ na nandayati saṃsmaraṇīyaśobhā / iṣṭapravāsajanitānyabalājanena duḥkhāni nūnamatimātradurudvahāni // 1656	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
antaśchidrāṇi bhūyaṃsi kaṇṭakā bahavo bahiḥ / kathaṃ kamalanālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurā guṇāḥ // 1657	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaśchidrairiyamadhigatā dustyajā duṣṭavaṃśair atyāsaktirnijakulaśubhodarkalābhāya na syāt / kiṃ tu grīṣmaśvasanajanitānyonyasaṃgharṣavahni- jvālāmālājaṭilavapuṣāmātmanāṃ nāśanāya // 1658	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
antastava sa jvalano bhīmā makarāśca sarvato vikaṭāḥ / atha bata viṣamayamaṅgam taditi niṣevyaḥ kathaṃ bhaverjaladhe // 1659	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
antastāraṃ taralitatalāḥ stokamutpīḍabhājaḥ pakṣmāgreṣu grathitapṛṣataḥ kīrṇadhārāḥ krameṇa / cittātaṅkaṃ nijagarimataḥ samyagāsūtrayanto niryāntyasyāḥ kuvalayadṛśo bāṣpavārāṃ pravāhāḥ // 1660	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
antastimiranāśāya śābdabodho nirarthakaḥ / na naśyati tamo nāma kṛtayā dīpavārtayā // 1661	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antastṛṣṇopataptānāṃ dāvadāhamayaṃ jagat / bhavatyakhilajantūnāṃ yadantastadbahiḥ sthitam // 1662	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antikāntikagatenduvisṛṣṭe jihmatāṃ jahati dīdhitijāle / niḥsṛtastimirabhāranirodhād ucchvasanniva rarāja digantaḥ // 1663	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
antenārjunatāṃ dadhāti nayanaṃ madhye tathā kṛṣṇatāṃ dvairūpyaṃ dadhatāmunā viracitaḥ karṇena te vigrahaḥ / tatkarṇārjunakṛṣṇavigrahavatī sākṣāt kurukṣetratāṃ yātāsi tvadavāptireva taruṇi śreyaḥ paraṃ gaṇyate // 1664	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anteṣu remire dhīrā nate madhyeṣu remire / antaprāptiṃ sukhāmāhur duḥkhamantaramantayoḥ // 1665	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ante santoṣadaṃ viṣṇuṃ smaret hantāramāpadām / śaratalpagato bhīṣmaḥ sasmāra garuḍadhvajam // 1666	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anto nāścaryajātasya jatato dṛśyate kvacit / kṣudrāhaṃbhāvasīmāyā yāvatīṃ muktimāpnumaḥ / āścaryāṇi hi tāvanti prakāśāni bhavanti naḥ // 1667	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jmtm], ajñātam [12: yrBr], ajñātam [12: rryt], ajñātam [12: mrBj]
anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham / tasmāt saṃtoṣameveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ // 1668	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antyajo'pi naraḥ pūjyo yasyāsti vipulaṃ dhanam / api brahmakule jāto nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate // 1669	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antyajo'pi yadā sākṣī vivāde saṃprajāyate / na tatra yujyate divyaṃ kiṃ punarvanadevatāḥ // 1670	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antyāvasthāgato'pi mahān svaguṇāñjahāti na śuddhatayā / na śvetabhāvamujjhati śaṅkhaḥ śikhibhuktamukto'pi // 1671	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
antraprotabṛhatkapālanalakakrūrakvaṇatkaṅkaṇa- prāyapreṅkhitabhūribhūṣaṇaravairādhoṣayantyambaram / pītaccharditaraktakardamaghanaprāgbhāraghorollasad vyālolastanabhārabhairavavapurdarpoddhataṃ dhāvati // 1672	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antrākalpacalatpayodharabharavyāviddhameghacchaṭā- sṛkvasthāmiṣagṛdhnugṛdhragarudāsphāloccalanmūrdhajā / vyādāyānanamaṭṭahāsavikaṭaṃ dūreṇa tārāpathāt trasyatsiddhapuraṃdhrivṛndarabhasonmuktādupakrāmati // 1673	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antraiḥ kalpitamaṅgalapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpala- vyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ pinahya sahasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkasrajaḥ / etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibanty asthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅganāḥ // 1674	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
antraiḥ svairapi saṃyatāgracaraṇo mūrcchāvirāmakṣaṇe svādhīnavraṇitāṅgaśastranicito romodgamaṃ varmayan / bhagnānudvalayannijān parabhaṭān saṃtarjayan niṣṭhuraṃ dhanyo dhāma jayaśriyaḥ pṛthuraṇastambhe patākāyate // 1675	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
andūmuddhūya baddhāṃ nijamapi sahasā sūtamunmathya sadyo niryātastrastavājivrajakṛtaninadākarṇanakruddhacetāḥ / saṃrambhārambhabhagnadrumaviṭapaśataiḥ prothayannāpanasthān āyāti vyālanāgastvaritamiha janāḥ sāvadhānā bhavantu // 1676	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
andhaṃ tamaścedayi bādhate tvāṃ sarojanetraṃ jagadekasūtram / sudhācaritram paramaṃ pavitraṃ kuruṣva mitraṃ vasudevaputram // 1677	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
andhaṃ daridritamapi priyayā vihīnaṃ vīkṣyeśvare vadati yā ca varaṃ tvamekam / netre na nāpi vasu no vanitāṃ sa vavre chatrābhirāmasutadarśanamityuvāca // 1678	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
andhaṃ patiṃ prāpya vilāsinīnāṃ kaṭākṣabāṇā viphalā bhavanti / tadvat kujādityaśanaiścarāṇāṃ na vāradoṣāḥ prabhavanti rātrau // 1679	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
andhaḥ sa eva śrutavarjito yaḥ śaṭhaḥ sa evārthinirarthako yaḥ / mṛtaḥ sa evāsti yaśo na yasya dharme na dhīryasya sa eva śocyaḥ // 1680	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
andhaḥ syādandhavelāyāṃ bādhiryamapi cāśrayet / kuryāt tṛṇamayaṃ cāpaṃ śayīta mṛgaśāyikām // 1681	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāntvādibhirupāyaistu hanyācchatruṃ vaśe sthitam / dayā tasmin na karttavyā śaraṇāgata ityuta // 1682	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhakaṃ kubjakaṃ caiva kuṣṭhāṅgaṃ vyādhipīḍitam / āpadgataṃ ca bhartāraṃ na tyajet sā mahāsatī // 1683	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva tristanī rājakanyakā / trayo'pyanyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite // 1684	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva rājakanyā ca tristanī / anayo'pi nayaṃ yāti yāvacchrīrbhajate naram // 1685	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva rājakanyā ca tristanī / sānukūle jagannāthe viparītaḥ suyugbhavet // 1686	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
andhakāragaralaṃ yato jagan- mohakāri bhṛśamatti nityaśaḥ / ujjvalaṃ jaṭharamoṣadhīpater añjanābhamabhavat tataḥ priye // 1687	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
andhakārāṅkuro jajñe vavṛdhe cāvilambitam / bhīmena ramamāṇāyā hiḍimbāyā ivātmajaḥ // 1688	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhatvamandhasamaye badhiratvaṃ bahdirakāla ālambya / śrīkeśavayoḥ praṇayī parameṣṭhī nābhivāstavyaḥ // 1689	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
andhadvaye mahānandho viṣayāndhīkṛtekṣaṇaḥ / cakṣuṣāndho na jānāti viṣayāndho na kenacit // 1690	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhasya darpaṇeneva hiteneva hataśruteḥ / duḥkhābhitaptaḥ śokena nekṣate na śṛṇoti ca // 1691	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
andhasya panthā badhirasya panthāḥ striyaḥ panthā vaivadhikasya panthāḥ / rājñaḥ panthā brāhmaṇenāsametya sametya tu brāhmaṇasyaiva panthāḥ // 1692	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
andhasya me hṛtavivekamahādhanasya caurairvibho balibhirindriyanāmadheyaiḥ / mohāndhakūpakuhare vinipātitasya deveśa dehi kṛpaṇasya karāvalambam // 1693	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
andhā iva na paśyanti yogyāyogyaṃ hitāhitam / pathā tenaiva gacchanti nīyante yena pārthivāḥ // 1694	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhā iva badhirā iva mūkā iva mohabhāja iva / paṅgava ivānabhimate nṛpaternivasanti sādhavaḥ sadasi // 1695	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
andhā vidvajjanairhīnā mūkā kavibhirujjhitā / badhirā gāyanairhīnā sabhā bhavati bhūbhṛtām // 1696	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andhīkaromi bhuvanaṃ badhirīkaromi dhīraṃ sacetanamacetanatāṃ nayāmi / kṛtyaṃ na paśyati na yena hitaṃ śṛṇoti dhīmānadhītamapi na pratisaṃdadhāti // 1697.1	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
andhe tamasi majjāmaḥ paśubhirye yajāmahe / ahiṃsāyāḥ paro dharmo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // 1697.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ando'pyanyoktapatho daṇḍadhṛganyopacaraṇīyaḥ / rājatvapratihatair janānurāgairbharati bhūpaḥ // 1698	ajñātasamavṛtta [8: yngg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
andho matsyānivāśnāti sa naraḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ saha / yo bhāṣate'rthavaikalyam apratyakṣaṃ sabhāṃ gataḥ // 1699	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andho vā vadhiro vātha kuṣṭī vāpyantyajo'pi vā / parigṛhṇātu tāṃ kanyāṃ salakṣāṃ syād videśagaḥ // 1700	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
andho hi rājā bhavati yastu śāstravivarjitaḥ / andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // 1701	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anghrīnīranghrapīnastanataṭaluṭhanāyāsamandapracārāś cārūnullāsayanto draviḍanaravadhūhāridhammillabhārān / jighrantaḥ siṃhalīnāṃ mukhakamalamalaṃ keralīnāṃ kapolaṃ cumbanto vānti mandaṃ malayaparimalā vāyavo dākṣiṇātyāḥ // 1702	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
annaṃ kiṃśukapuṣpapuñjasadṛśaṃ pāṣāṇajālairyutaṃ dhūmyaṃ gandhayutaṃ ca jālamakhilaṃ bhagnāśca dantālayaḥ / ājyaṃ dūrataraṃ na cāpi lavaṇaṃ na śrūyate tintriṇī bhakṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ ca nāsti hi sakhe tadbhojanaṃ varṇaye // 1703	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
annaṃ dadyādatithaye śraddhayā svargadaṃ hi tat / sakuṭumbo diśannannaṃ saktuprastho divaṃgataḥ // 1704	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
annaṃ dhānyaṃ vasu vasumatītyuttareṇottareṇa vyākṛṣyante paramakṛpaṇāḥ pāmarā yadvadityam / bhūmiḥ khaṃ dyaurdruhiṇagṛhamityuttareṇottareṇa vyāmohyante vimalamatayo'pyasthireṇaiva dhāmnā // 1705	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
annaṃ nāstyudakaṃ nāsti nāsti tāmbūlacarvaṇam / mandireṣumahotsāhaḥ śuṣkacarmasya   tāḍanam // 1706	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annaṃ muktāsuvarṇaṃ dravaguṇarahitāḥ svarṇarūpāśca sūpāḥ sāmodāḥ śākabhedāḥ phalaguḍamilitāḥ pāyasam ... / yāvadbhojyaṃ tadājyaṃ dadhi kathinataraṃ naikarūpāstvapūpāḥ bhujyante bhūsuraudhairmahati tava gṛhe rāmacandrasya tṛptyai // 1707	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
annaṃ vidhātrā vihitaṃ martyānāṃ jīvadhāraṇam / tadanādṛtya matimān prārthayenna tu kiṃcana // 1708	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
annaṃ saṃprokṣya gāyatryā satyaṃ tvarteti mantrataḥ / ṛtaṃ tveti ca sāyaṃ tu pariṣiñcet pradakṣiṇam // 1709	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annaṃ hi prāṇināṃ prāṇā ārtānāṃ śaraṇaṃ tvaham / dharmo vittaṃ nṛṇāṃ pretya santo'rvāg bibhyato'raṇam // 1710	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annajā bhuvi martyānāṃ śramajā vā kathaṃcana / saiṣā bhavati lokasya nidrā sarvasya laukikī // 1711	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annadātā bhayatrātā kanyādātā tathaiva ca / janitā copanetā ca pañcaite pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ // 1712	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annadānaṃ mahādānaṃ vidyādānaṃ mahattaram / annena kṣaṇikā tṛptir yāvajjīvaṃ tu vidyayā // 1713	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annadānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati / annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagadetaccarācaram // 1714	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annadāhe harenmāṃsam ambudāhe ca śoṇitam / kāmadāhe harennetram anidrā rogakāriṇī // 1715	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annado jaladaścaiva āturasya cikitsakaḥ / trayaste svargamāyānti vinā yajñena bhārata // 1716	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annapānaṃ viṣādrakṣed viśeṣeṇa mahīpateḥ / yogakṣemau tadāyattau dharmādyā yannibandhanāḥ // 1717	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annapānādibhiścaiva vastrālaṃkārabhūṣaṇaiḥ / gandhamālyairvicitraiśca guruṃ tatra prapūjayet // 1718	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāśca bhakṣitāḥ / tasminnevodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nāma na vijīryate // 1719	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annapraṇāśe sīdanti śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ / āhārāt sarvabhūtāni saṃbhavanti mahītale // 1720	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
annamūlaṃ balaṃ puṃsāṃ balamūlaṃ hi jīvanam / tasmād yatnena saṃrakṣed balaṃ ca kuśalo bhiṣak // 1721	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annavastrasuvarṇāni ratnāni vividhāni ca / brāhmaṇebhyo nadītīre dadāti vraja satvaram // 1722	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annahīno dahedrāṣṭraṃ mantrahīnaśca ṛtvijaḥ / yajamānaṃ dānahīno nāsti yajñasamo ripuḥ // 1723	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
annādaṣṭaguṇaṃ piṣṭaṃ piṣṭādaṣtaguṇaṃ payaḥ / payaso'ṣṭaguṇaṃ māṃsaṃ māṃsādaṣṭaguṇaṃ ghṛtam // 1724	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annādivargaṃ phalapuṣpamāṃsa- matsyādibhiḥ pūrṇamukhaḥ sadaiva / syāddṛṣṭamātro'bhimatārthasiddhyai mṛṣṭānnabhojyāya mude ca kākaḥ // 1725	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
annādiviṣṭhānavagomayāni na vā vidhunvan vadane sadaiva / vāmopasavyo'pyavalokyamāno manorathaṃ pūrayate dhruvaśca // 1726	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
annādiviṣṭhāpiśitādibhiryaḥ pūrṇānano'bhīṣṭaphalaprado'sau / mantrādisiddhyai vaṇigādilābhe śasto vivāhādividhau ca kākaḥ // 1727	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi annena abhiśaṃsati / stenaḥ pramukto rājani yācannanṛtasaṃkare // 1728	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryāpacāriṇī / gurau śiṣyaśca yājyaśca steno rājani kilbiṣam // 1729	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annādbhavanti bhūtāni parjanyādannasaṃbhavaḥ / yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ // 1730	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annādraktaṃ ca śuklaṃ cāpy ato jīvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ / indriyāṇi ca buddhiśca tṛpyantyannena nityaśaḥ // 1731	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annābhāve mṛtyuḥ śālibhirannāni śālayo vṛṣṭyā / vṛṣṭistapaseti vadann amṛtyave tattapaścaratu // 1732	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
annāśane syāt paramāṇumātraḥ praśakyate śodhayituṃ tapobhiḥ / māṃsāśane parvatarājamātro no śakyate śodhayituṃ mahattvāt // 1733	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagadetaccarācaram / annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ // 1734	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anne pāne ca tāmbūle phale puṣpe vibhūṣaṇe / vastre vilepane dhūpe śayyāyāmāsaneṣu ca // 1735	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyaṃ kānanamāśu gaccha tarasā vanyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva re dhanyaṃ dhāma vibhāti te na hi tathā puṇyaṃ jaghanyaṃ kuru / etasminkariśāva mā vraja vane jalpāmi tathyaṃ vaco jānāsyeva karīndradarpadalano nidrāti pañcānanaḥ // 1736	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyaṃ manuṣyaṃ hṛdayena kṛtvā anyaṃ tato dṛṣṭibhirāhvayanti / anyatra muñcanti madaprasekam anyaṃ śarīreṇa ca kāmayante // 1737	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyaḥ kaḥ kṣāravārdhe tvamiva niyamito vānarairvā narairvā vipreṇaikena ko'nyaḥ karakuharapuṭīpātramātre nipītaḥ / jalpannitthaṃ pṛthūrmighvanibhiravataratphenakūṭāṭṭahāsaiḥ spardhāṃ dhatte payodheradhikamadhipuraṃ nirmito yattaṭākaḥ // 1738	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
anyaḥ karoti vyāpāraṃ lipto bhavati lekhakaḥ / bhagaliṅgaprasaṅgena chinnā bhavati nāsikā // 1739	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyaḥ ko'pi sa kumbhasaṃbhavamunerāstāṃ śikhī jāṭharo yaṃ saṃcintya dukūlavahnisadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ / vandyaṃ tajjaṭharaṃ sa mīnamakaragrāhāvalistoyadhiḥ paścātpārśvamapūritāntaraviyadyatra svanan bhrāmyati // 1740	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anya ityanupajātayantraṇaṃ drāgudañcitavatī vilocanam / māmavetya cakitā vṛtānanā dantadaṣṭarasanā manāgabhūt // 1741	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
anyakarmavimūḍho ya ātmakarmaviśāradaḥ / yathā paśya na jānāti stanapānetaracchiśuḥ // 1742	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyakālaparihāryamajasraṃ taddvayena vidadhe dvayameva / dhṛṣṭatā rahasi bhartṛṣu tābhir nirdayatvamitarairabalāsu // 1743	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
anyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puṇyakṣetre vinaśyati / puṇyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ vajralepo bhaviṣyati // 1744	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyato naya muhūrtamānanaṃ candra eṣa sarale kalāmayaḥ / mā kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya samatāṃ sa neṣyati // 1745	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
anyato yadi nijopacikīrṣā mānahāniriti bhītiranītiḥ / śrīdharo'pi hi bale śriyamicchan mānamātanuta vāmanameva // 1746	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
anyatkṛtyaṃ manujaś cintayati divāniśaṃ viśuddhadhiyā / vedhā vidadhātyanyat svāmīva na śakyate dhartum // 1747	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anyatra deśe ghaṭitā jaganti grasiṣyate viśvasṛjeti matvā / saṃkocayitvā kimu pādamūla- dvayāntarāle nihitāsti yoniḥ // 1748	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyatra bhīṣmād gāṅgeyād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ / hariṇīkhuramātreṇa carmaṇā mohitaṃ jagat // 1749	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyatra yāpitaniśaṃ parilohitāṅgam anyāṅganāgatamivāgatamuṣṇaraśmim / prātarnirīkṣya kupiteva hi padminīyam utphullahallakasulohitalocanābhūt // 1750	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyatra yūyaṃ kusumāvacāyaṃ kurudhvamatrāsmi karomi sakhyaḥ / nāhaṃ hi dūraṃ bhramituṃ samarthā prasīdatāyaṃ racito'ñjalirvaḥ // 1751	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyatra vrajatīti kā khalu kathā nāpyasya tādṛk suhṛd yo māṃ necchati nāgataśca hahahā ko'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ / ityalpetarakalpanākavalitasvāntā niśāntāntare bālā vṛttavivartanavyatikarā nāpnoti nidrāṃ niśi // 1752	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyathā cintitā hyarthā naraistāta manasvibhiḥ / anyathaiva hi gacchanti daivāditi matirmama // 1753	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā paridṛṣṭāni munibhirvedadarśibhiḥ / anyathā parivartante vegā iva nabhasvataḥ // 1754	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathāliṅgyate kāntā bhāvena duhitānyathā / manaso bhidyate vṛttir abhinneṣvapi vastuṣu // 1755	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā varttamānānām arthī bhūto'yamanyathā / asmābhiryadanuṣṭheyaṃ gandharvaistadanuṣṭhitam // 1756	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā vedaśāstrāṇi jñānapāṇḍityamanyathā / anyathā tatpadaṃ śāntaṃ lokāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā // 1757	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā śāstragarbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīro'rthamīhate / svāmīva prāktanaṃ karma vidadhāti tadanyathā // 1758	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathaiva vicintyante puruṣeṇa manorathāḥ / daivenāhitasadbhāvāḥ karmaṇāṃ gatayo'nyathā // 1759	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathaivasatī putraṃ cintayedanyathā patim / yathā yathā svabhāvasya mahābhāga udāhṛtam // 1760	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathaiva hi manyante puruṣāstāni tāni ca / anyathaiva prabhustāni karoti vikaroti ca // 1761	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathaiva hi sauhārdaṃ bhavetsvacchāntarātmanaḥ / pravartate'nyathā vāṇī śāṭhyopahatacetasaḥ // 1762	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyadasmi bhavatīṃ na yācitā vāramekamadharaṃ dhayāmi te / ityasisvadadupāṃśukākuvāk sopamardahaṭhavṛttireva tam // 1763	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
anyadābhāṣitaṃ pūrvaṃ dattamanyattato'lpakam / yatsadoṣamayogyaṃ vā kūṭadānena tena kim // 1764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjeva yoṣitaḥ / parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva // 1765	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anyadīyamavicintya pātaka nirghṛṇo harati jīvitopamam / dravymatra kitavo vicetanas tena gacchati kadarthanāṃ ciram // 1766	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anyaduḥkhena yo duḥkhī yo'nyaharṣeṇa harṣataḥ / sa eva jagatāmīśo nararūpadharo hariḥ // 1767	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyaducchṛṅkhalaṃ sattvam anyacchāstraniyantritam / sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hi tejastimirayoḥ kutaḥ // 1768	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyaduptaṃ jātamanyad ityetannopapadyate / upyate yaddhi yadbījaṃ tattadeva prarohati // 1769	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyadoṣamiva sa svakaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayet kathamadhṛṣṭatājaḍaḥ / ucyate sa khalu kāryavattayā dhigvabhinnabudhasetumarthitām // 1770	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
anyadgopucchakaṃ jñeyaṃ śuddhakāṣṭhavinirmitam / mukhe ca lohakaṇṭhena vedhyaṃ tryaṅgulasaṃmitam // 1771	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyapūrvāṃ striyaṃ sādhvīṃ kāmayeta na garvataḥ / sādhvīricchan mahādevaḥ ṣaṇḍo'bhūddārukāvane // 1772	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyapratāpamāsādya yo dṛḍhatvaṃ na gacchati / jātuṣābharaṇasyeva rūpeṇāpi hi tasya kim // 1773	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyamāśrayate lakṣmīs tvanyamanyaṃ ca medinī / ananyagāminī puṃsāṃ kīrtirekā pativratā // 1774	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyayānyavanitāgatacittaṃ cittanāthamabhiśaṅkitavatyā / pītabhūrisurayāpi na mede nirvṛtirhi manaso madahetuḥ // 1775	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
anyayā yauvane martyo buddhyā bhavati mohitaḥ / madhye'nyayā jarāyāṃtu so'nyāṃ rocayate matim // 1776	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyavarṇaṃ śiro yasya pucchaṃ vā yasya vājinaḥ / pucchena śirasā vāpi nānāvarṇaḥ sa ninditaḥ // 1777	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyavarṇaparāvṛttyā bandhacihnanigūhanaiḥ / anākhyātaḥ satāṃ madhye kaviścoro vibhāvyate // 1778	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyastrīspṛhayālavo jagati ke padbhyāmagamyā ca kā ko dhāturdaśane samastamanujaiḥ kā prārthyate'harniśam / dṛṣṭvaikāṃ yavaneśvaro nijapure padmānanāṃ kāminīṃ mitraṃ prāha kimādareṇa sahasā yārānadīdaṃśamā // 1779	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyasmāllabdhoṣmā kśudraḥ prāyeṇa duḥsaho bhavati / ravirapi na dahati tādṛg yādṛghyuttaptavālukānikaraḥ // 1780	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anyasminnapi kāle dayitāvirahaḥ karoti saṃtāpam / kiṃ punaraviralajaladhara- gurutararasiteṣu divaseṣu // 1781	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anyasmin preṣyamāṇe tu purastādyaḥ samutpatet / ahaṃ kiṃ karavāṇīti sa rājavasatiṃ vaset // 1782	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyasya lagati karṇe jīvitamanyasya harati bāṇa iva / hṛdayaṃ dunoti piśunaḥ kaṇṭaka iva pādalagno'pi // 1783	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anyasyai saṃpratīyaṃ kuru madanaripo svāṅgadānaprasādaṃ nāhaṃ soḍhuṃ samarthā śirasi suranadīṃ nāpi saṃdhyāṃ praṇantum / ityuktvā kopaviddhāṃ vighaṭayitumumāmātmadehaṃ pravṛttāṃ rundhānaḥ pātu śambhoḥ kucakalasahaṭhasparśakṛṣṭo bhujo vaḥ // 1784	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
anyāṅganābhiradhikaṃ sa karoti keliṃ tvaṃ tena mā kuru viṣādamadabhrarūpe / pepīyate madhukaraḥ kva na taṃ marandaṃ no jātu vismarati paṅkajinīṃ tathāpi // 1785	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyā jagaddhitamayī manasaḥ pravṛttir anyaiva kāpi racanā vacanāvalīnām / lokottarā ca kṛṭirākṛtirārtahṛdyā vidyāvatāṃ sakalameva girāṃ davīyaḥ // 1786	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyādānākulāntaḥkaraṇavaśavipadbādhitapretaraṅkaṃ grāsabhraśyatkarālaślathapiśitaśavāgragrahe muktanādam / sarvaiḥ krāmadbhirulkānanakavalarasavyāttavaktraprabhābhir vyaktaistaiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇamaparamiva vyomni vṛttaṃ śmaśānam // 1787	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
anyānapi tarūn ropya phalapuṣpopayoginaḥ / ratnadhenusahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // 1788	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyā nirarthikā cintā balatejaḥpraṇāśinī / nāśayet sarvasaukhyaṃ tu rūpahāniṃ nidarśayet // 1789	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu vā teṣu na taiśca kiṃcit / cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti // 1790	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu kāleṣu na taiśca kiṃcit / cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti // 1791	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyānparivadan sādhur yathā hi paritapyate / tathā parivadannanyāṃs tuṣṭo bhavati durjanaḥ // 1792	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyānyopamitaṃ yugaṃ nirupamaṃ te'yugmamaṅgeṣu yat so'yaṃ sikthakamāsyakāntimadhunastanvaṅgi candrastava / tvadvācāṃ svaramātrikāṃ madakalaḥ puṃskokilo ghoṣayaty abhyāsasya kimastyagocaramiti pratyāśayā mohitaḥ // 1793	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyā prakāmasurataśramakhinnadehā rātriprajāgaravipāṭalanetrapadmā / śayyāntadeśalulitākulakeśapāśā nidrāṃ prayāti mṛdusūryakarābhitaptā // 1794	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā / kūrpāsakaṃ paridadhāti nakhakṣatāṅgī vyālambinīlalalitālakakuñcitākṣī // 1795	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyābhyo vanyābhyo mālati dhanyāsi vallarībhyastvam / yat kila tavaiva savidhe krīḍati madhupaḥ sadaiva mudito'yam // 1796	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ / asaṃtuṣṭāḥ pramuhyanti saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ // 1797	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāyaḥ prauḍhavādena nīyate nyāyatāṃ yayā / nyāyaścānyāyatāṃ lobhāt kiṃ tayā kṣudravidyayā // 1798	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāyakarabhogaiśca yo hi jīvati nityaśaḥ / virāgādeva lokānāṃ bhraṃśate sa hi pārthivaḥ // 1799	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāyadraviṇādāneṣv udyamaḥ kriyate vṛthā / lubdhānāṃ satyasaṃkocāt saṃkucantyeva saṃpadaḥ // 1800	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāyavittena kṛto'pi dharmaḥ savyāja ityāhuraśeṣalokāḥ / nyāyārjitārthena sa eva dharmo nirvyāja ityāryajanā vadanti // 1801	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyāyasamupāttena dānadharmo dhanena yaḥ / kriyate na sa kartāraṃ trāyate mahato bhayāt // 1802	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyā yā vasanottamaṃ tadadhunā saṃgṛhya mānyaṃ punar yanmāṃ darśayasi priyaṃ priyatamaṃ toṣāya roṣāya no / sarvasaiva sataśca rītiriyatī pūrvaṃ śrutā vṛddhataḥ prāyaḥ prāpya nijaprakarṣamakhilaṃ mitraṃ mudādarśayat // 1803	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ daśavarṣāṇi tiṣṭhati / prāpte caikādaśe varṣe samūlaṃ ca vinaśyati // 1804	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyam arthadūṣaṇamucyate / apātradānaṃ pātrārtha haraṇaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam // 1805	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyārthamaṅgīkṛtavāripāṇau viśaṅkamānāstava dānanīram / parasparaṃ dīnamukhā na ke vā devāḥ sumeruṃ śuśucuḥ svabhūmim // 1806	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyā vihāya patigṛha- mavicintitakulakalaṅkajanagarhāḥ / rāgoparaktahṛdayā yānti digantaṃ manuṣyā āsajya // 1807	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anyāściraṃ suratakelipariśrameṇa khedaṃ gatāḥ praśithilīkṛtagātrayaṣṭyaḥ / saṃhṛṣyamāṇavipulorupayodharārtā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ // 1808	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyāsāṃ na kimasti veśmani vadhūḥ kaivaṃ niśi prāvṛṣi praiti prāntataḍāgamamba gṛhiṇi svasthāsi me'vasthayā / bhagno'yaṃ valayo ghaṭo vighaṭitaḥ kṣaṇṇā tanuḥ kaṇṭakair ākrāntaḥ sa tathā bhujaṅgahatakaḥ kaṣṭaṃ na yaddaṣṭavān // 1809	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyā sādhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa mānagraho yāte locanagocaraṃ priyatame saṃpratyapakrāmati / asmākaṃ punarugrapūruṣaśatāśleṣapragalbhātmanām etādṛśyanabhijñapūruṣapariṣvaṅge kutaḥ sādhvasam // 1810	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyā sā sarasī marāla munibhiryattīrasopānikā- vinyastān balitaṇḍulān kavalayan dṛṣṭo'si hṛdyairmukhaiḥ / eṣā pakkaṇavāpikā kamalinīkhaṇḍe'tra guptātmabhir vyādhaistvadvidhamugdhabandhanavidhau kiṃ nāma nāsūtryate // 1811	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyāsu tāvadupamardasahāsu bhṛṅga lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu / mughdāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle vyarthaṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamallikāyāḥ // 1812	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā saṃbhārāḥ khalu te'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā / śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca // 1813	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyāstā malayādrikānanabhuvaḥ svacchasravannirjjharās tṛṣṇā yāsu nivartate tanubhṛtāmālokamātrādapi / rūkṣadhvāṅkṣaparigraho marurayaṃ sphārībhavadbhrāntayaḥ tā etā mṛgatṛṣṇikā hariṇa he nedaṃ payo gamyatām // 1814	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyūnaṃ guṇamamṛtasya dhārayantī saṃphullasphuritasaroruhāvataṃsā / preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā raktatvaṃ vyadhita vadhūdṛśaṃ surā ca // 1815	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
anyūnonnatayo'timātrapṛthavaḥ pṛthvīdharaśrībhṛtas tanvantaḥ kanakāvalībhirupamāṃ saudāmanīdāmabhiḥ / varṣantaḥ śamamānayannupalasacchṛṅgāralekhāyudhāḥ kāle kāliyakāyakālavapuṣaḥ pāṃsūn gajāmbhomucaḥ // 1816	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anye ca bahavo rāgā jātā deśaviśeṣataḥ / mārūprabhṛtayo loke te ca tad deśikāḥ smṛtāḥ // 1817	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anye cet prākṛtā lokā bahupāpāni kurvate / pradhānapuruṣeṇāpi kāryaṃ tatpṛṣṭhato nu kim // 1818	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anye te jaladāyino jaladharāstṛṣṇāṃ vinighnanti ye bhrātaścātaka kiṃ vṛthātiraṭitaiḥ khinno'si viśrāmyatām / meghaḥ śārada eṣa kāśadhavalaḥ pānīyariktodaro garjatyeva hi kevalaṃ bhṛśataraṃ no bindumapyujjhati // 1819	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anye te vihagāḥ payoda parito dhāvanti tṛṣṇāturā vāpīkūpataḍāgasāgarajale majjanti dattādarāḥ / māmadyāpi na vetsi cātakaśiśuṃ yacchuṣkakaṇṭho'pi san nānyaṃ vāñchati nopasarpati na ca prastauti na dhyāyati // 1820	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anye te sumanolihaḥ prahasadapyambhojamujjhanti ye vātāndolanakelicañcaladalaprāntairapi trāsitāḥ / anyaḥ ko'pi sa eṣa ṣaṭpadabhaṭaḥ saṃsahya karṇāhatīr yenānekapagaṇḍagaṇḍalamiladdānāmbuni krīḍitam // 1821	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyenāpi svamāṃsena chidyamānena dūyate / tathāpi paramāṃsāni svādūnīti samaśnute // 1822	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anye'pi santi guṇinaḥ kati no jagatyāṃ hāra tvameva guṇināmuparisthito'si / eṇīdṛśāmurasi nityamavasthito'si sadvṛttatā ca śucitā ca na khaṇḍitā te // 1823	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anye'pi santi bata tāmarasāvataṃsā haṃsāvalīvalayino jalasaṃniveśāḥ / ko'pyāgraho gururayaṃ bata cātakasya pauraṃdarīṃ yadabhivāñchati vāridhārām // 1824	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyeyaṃ rūpasaṃpattir anyā vaidagdhyadhoraṇī / naiṣā nalinapatrākṣī sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī vidheḥ // 1825	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyeṣāṃ yo na pāpāni cintayatyātmano yathā / tasya pāpāgamastāta hetvabhāvānna vidyate // 1826	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā manasā vācā parapīḍāṃ karoti yaḥ / tadbījaṃ janma phalati prabhūtaṃ tasya cāśubham // 1827	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anyeṣāmapi naśyanti suhṛdaśca dhanāni ca / paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājannāpadamātmanaḥ // 1828	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyeṣvarthakṛtā maitrī yāvadarthaviḍambanam / puṃbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsviva ṣaṭpadaiḥ // 1829	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anye hi duḥkhamṛtavaḥ prathayantyahobhiḥ sūryāṃśuluptatimirairabhisārikāṇām / hemanta eṣa himaruddhasahasradhāmā kāmaṃ karoti divaseṣvapi śarma tāsām // 1830	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyaiḥ sākaṃ virodhena vayaṃ pañcottaraṃ śatam / parasparavirodhena vayaṃ pañca ca te śatam // 1831	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyocchiṣṭeṣu pātreṣu bhuktvaiteṣu mahībhujaḥ / kasmānna lajjāmavahañ śaucacintāṃ na vā dadhuḥ // 1832	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anyo dhanaṃ pretagatasya bhuṅkte vayāṃsi cāgniśca śarīradhātūn / dvābhyāmayaṃ saha gacchatyamutra puṇyena pāpena ca veṣṭyamānaḥ // 1833	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tBtgl], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

anyonyaṃ daśanacchadeṣu daśatoranyonyamāliṅgator anyonyaṃ nakharaiḥ kharairvilikhatoranyonyamācumbatoḥ / autsukyena navaṃ navaṃ nidhuvanaprāgalbhyamabhyasyatoḥ śrānte pañcaśare'pi na praṇayinoḥ prāpto'pakarṣaṃ rasaḥ // 1835	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyonyaṃ matimāsthāya yatra sampratibhāṣyate / na caikamatye śreyosti mantraḥ so'dhama ucyate // 1836	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

anyonyagopyaṃ viduṣāṃ tu lakṣaṃ yadasya tulyāḥ prabhavo bhavanti / parasparāliṅganatatparāṇāṃ na kānta saukhyaṃ yuvatījanānām // 1839	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyonyagrathitāruṇāṅgulinamatpāṇidvayasyopari nyasyocchavāsavikampitādharadalaṃ nirvedaśūnyaṃ mukham / āmīlannayanāntavāntasalilaṃ ślādhyasya nindyasya vā kasyedaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ pratidinaṃ dīnaṃ tvayā smaryate // 1840	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

anyonyaprakaṭānurāgarabhasādudbhūtaromāñcayor utkaṇṭhāparikhedaduḥsahatayā kṣāmībhavadgātrayoḥ / naktaṃ daivavaśāt kṣaṇaṃ gurujanātsvāyattatāṃ prāptayor yāto durlabhasaṃgamotsavavidhiryūnorjanākhyeyatām // 1842	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]

anyonyalakṣaṇairyuktāṃ nārīṃ saṃkīrṇakāṃ viduḥ / yā nijaireva saṃyuktā cihnaistāṃ kevalāṃ jaguḥ // 1846	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyonyalāvaṇyavilokanāntaṃ netradvayaṃ syātsatataṃ kilāsyāḥ / ityeva nāsā vihitā vidhātrā madhye tayordarśanavighnakartrī // 1847	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyonyavārighaṭitau dhanavāripātād bhītau bhṛśaṃ mṛgavadhūrmṛgayūthapaśca / vittastayā ghaṭanayā kṛtasaukhyamohau naivāmbuvāhajalaśīkarapātapīḍām // 1848	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyonyaviparītāni matāni manasaḥ sadā / avidyāyāṃ punaḥ satye jñānasyoccatarasya hi / aṅgāni nikhilāni syuḥ pūrayanti parasparam // 1849	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jrtm], ajñātam [12: mssB], ajñātam [12: tsBB], ajñātam [12: ytBr]
anyonyaśvasitāśanaiḥ phaṇadharairāviśya sattvānbahir bhuñjānaiḥ paricārakaistṛṇagaṇairānandinā nandinā / bhikṣānnopacitaiśca dāratanayaiḥ puṣṇāti viśvāni yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate // 1850	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
anyonyasaṃgamavaśādadhunā vibhātāṃ tasyāpi te'pi manasī vikasadvilāse / sraṣṭuṃ punarmanasijasya tanuṃ pravṛttam ādāviva dvyaṇukakṛtparamāṇuyugmam // 1851	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
anyonyasaṃbhinnadṛśāṃ sakhīnāṃ tasyāstvayi prāganurāgacihnam / kasyāpi ko'pīti niveditaṃ ca dhātreyikāyāścaturaṃ vacaśca // 1852	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyonyasaṃvalitamāṃsaladantakānti sollāsamāviralasaṃ valitārdhatāram / līlāgṛhe pratikalaṃ kilakiñciteṣu vyāvartamānavinayaṃ mithunaṃ cakāsti // 1853	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

anyonyasya niyantraṇāparibhavādaprauḍhaśītātapāḥ puṣpyatkiṃśukacūtanūtanadalāvirbhūtaśoṇaśriyaḥ / padmollāsitagandhavāsitavahadvātāvadātatviṣo modonmādajuṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ vāsantikā vāsarāḥ // 1856	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]

anyonyākṣinipātajātamadayoranyonyaceṣṭāśata- spṛṣṭāntaḥpadayormanobhavaśaravyāghātasaṃbhrāntayoḥ / syādeva dviradendrayoriva tayorāliṅganaṃ prāṅgaṇe dhairyastambhaviḍambinī balavatī lajjā na cedargalā // 1859	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]

anyonyeṣāṃ puṣkarairāmṛśanto dānodbhedānuccakairbhugnavālāḥ / unmūrdhānaḥ saṃnipatyāparāntaiḥ prāyudhyanta spaṣṭadantadhvanībhāḥ // 1863	śālinī [11: mttgg]
anyopabhogakaluṣā mānavatī premagarvitā muditā / saundaryagarvitā ca premaparādhīnamānasānūḍhā // 1864	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anyo'pi candanatarormahanīyamūrteḥ sekārthamutsahati tadguṇabaddhatṛṣṇaḥ / śākhoṭakasya punarasya mahāśayoyam ambhoda eva śaraṇaṃ yadi nirguṇasya // 1865	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

apāre kāvyasaṃsāre kavireva prajāpatiḥ / yathā vai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate // 2000	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

apīḍayan balaṃ śatrūñ jigīṣurabhiṣeṇayet / sukhasādhyaṃ dviṣāṃ sainyaṃ dīrghaprayāṇapīḍitam // 2087	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
apītakṣībakādambam asaṃmṛṣṭāmalāmbaram / aprasāditaśuddhāmbu jagadāsīnmanoharam // 2088	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aputratvaṃ bhavacchreyo na tu syādviguṇaḥ sutaḥ / jīvannapyavinīto'sau mṛta eva na saṃśayaḥ // 2089	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca / tasmāt putramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavet paścāddhi tāpasaḥ // 2090	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aputrasya gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ diśaḥ śūnyāstvabāndhavāḥ / mūrkhasya hṛdayaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā // 2091	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aputrasya gṛhaṃ śocyaṃ śocyaṃ rājyamarājakam / nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyā śocyaṃ maithunamaprajam // 2092	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apunardehiśabdārtham apratyupakṛtikṣamam / arthinaṃ kurute kaścit punarāvṛttivarjitam // 2093	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apuṣyata ghanāvalī bhuvanajīvanairyatkarair avardhyata sudhārucirbahubudhālisaṃtarpaṇaḥ / tamandhatamasacchidaṃ ravimavekṣya jājvalyase tvameva ravikāntatāmayasi hanta kiṃ kurmahe // 2094	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
apūjitaivāstu girīndrakanyā kiṃ pakṣapātena manobhavasya / yadyasti dūtī sarasoktidakṣā dāsaḥ patiḥ pādatale vadhūnām // 2095	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
apūjito'tithiryasya gṛhādyāti viniḥśvasan / gacchanti pitarastasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ // 2096	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā / trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam // 2097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāmapyamānanā / tava daivakṛto daṇḍaḥ sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ // 2098	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrṇe naiva martavyaṃ saṃpūrṇe naiva jīvati / tasmāddhairyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ hantavyā paravāhinī // 2099	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvaṃ cauryamabhyastaṃ tvayā cañcalalocane / divāpi jāgratāṃ puṃsāṃ ceto harasi dūrataḥ // 2100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ jagad grāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharāt sārayati ca / kramāt prakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati tat sarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate // 2101	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
apūrvaḥ ko'pi kopāgniḥ sajjanasya khalasya ca / ekasya śāmyati snehād vardhate'nyasya vāritaḥ // 2102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvaḥ ko'pi kośo'yaṃ vidyate tava bhārati / vyayato vṛddhimāyāti kṣayamāyāti saṃcayāt // 2103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvaḥ ko'pi tanvaṅgyā mama mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ / yogaṃ cintayato yena rāga eva vivardhate // 2104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvakarmacaṇḍālam api mugdhe vimuñca mām / śritāsi candanabhrāntyā durvipākaṃ viṣadrumam // 2105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvadeśādhigame yuvarājābhiṣecane / putrajanmani vā mokṣo bandhanasya vidhīyate // 2106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvamadhurāmodapramoditadiśastataḥ / āyayurbhṛṅgamukharāḥ śiraḥ śekharaśālinaḥ // 2107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
apūrvayeva tatkālasamāgamasakāmayā / dṛṣṭena rājan vapuṣā kaṭākṣairvijayaśriyā // 2108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apūrvā rasanāvyālī khalānanabileśayā / karṇamūle daśatyanyaṃ haratyanyasya jīvitam // 2109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvāhlādadāyinya uccaistarapadāśrayāḥ / atimohāpahāriṇyaḥ sūktayo hi mahīyasām // 2110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrviṇā na kartavyaṃ karma loke vigarhitam / kṛtapūrviṇastu tyajato mahān dharma iti śrutiḥ // 2111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
apūrveyaṃ dhanurvidyā bhavatā śikṣitā kutaḥ / mārgaṇaughaḥ samāyāti guṇo jāti digantaram // 2112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvo dṛśyate vahniḥ kāminyāḥ stanamaṇḍale / dūrato dahate gātraṃ gātralagnaḥ suśītalaḥ // 2113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvo bhāti bhāratyāḥ kāvyāmṛtaphale rasaḥ / carvaṇe sarvasāmānye svāduvit kevalaṃ kaviḥ // 2114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvo'yaṃ kānte jvalati mukhadīpastava ciraṃ tamo draṣṭ ṇāṃ yo janayatitarāṃ yāti sutano / adhastādyatreyaṃ bata surabhidhūmālakatatir yadīyā vārtaiva jvalayati pataṃgāniva janān // 2115	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
apūrvo'yaṃ dhanurvedo manmathasya mahātmanaḥ / śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ // 2116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvo'yaṃ panthāḥ śiva tava vibhutvasya katamo jagadbandho yatte padayugamakāmaṃ praṇamatām / prayāti pradhvaṃsaṃ na khalu duritaṃ kevalamidaṃ ciropāttaṃ sadyaḥ sukṛtamapi sarvaṃ vigalati // 2117	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
apūrvo'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ kamalalocane / śo'ntaraṃ yo vijānāti sa vidvannātra saṃśayaḥ // 2118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛcchaṃ putradārādīṃs tairukto'haṃ raghattama / pāpaṃ tavaiva tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ tu phalabhāginaḥ // 2119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭastasya na brūyād yaśca necchet parābhavam / eṣa eva satāṃ dharmo viparīto'satāṃ mataḥ // 2120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭastu naraḥ kiṃcid yo brūte rājasaṃsadi / na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanām // 2121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭena na vaktavyaḥ sacivena vipaścitā / nānuśiṣyādapṛcchantaṃ mahadetaddhi sāhasam // 2122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭenāpi vaktavyaṃ sacivenātra kiṃcana / pṛṣṭena tu viśeṣeṇa vācyaṃ pathyaṃ mahīpateḥ // 2123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭo'trāpradhāno yo brūte rājñaḥ puraḥ kudhīḥ / na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanam // 2124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛṣṭvaiva bhavenmūḍhajñānaṃ manasi cintanāt / apūrṇaḥ kurute śabdaṃ na pūrṇaḥ kurute ghaṭaḥ // 2125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apekṣante na ca snehaṃ na pātraṃ na daśāntaram / sadā lokahitāsaktā ratnadīpā ivottamāḥ // 2126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apetāḥ śatrubhyo vayamiti viṣādo'yamaphalaḥ pratīkārastveṣāmaniśamanusaṃdhātumucitaḥ / jarāsaṃdhādbhagnaḥ saha halabhṛtā dānavaripur jaghānainaṃ paścānna kimanilasūnuḥ priyasakhaḥ // 2127	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
apehi hṛdayādvā me vāme darśanamehi vā / adūravirahotkaṇṭhāduḥkhaṃ duḥkena sahyate // 2128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyakhilālaṃkārā- nākalayanto'pi rasavidaścitram / kalayanti sarasakāvye nālaṃkāraṃ kadācidapi // 2129	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apyagraṇīrmantrakṛtāmṛṣīṇāṃ kuśāgrabuddhe kuśalī guruste / yatastvayā jñānamaśeṣamāptaṃ lokena caitanyamivoṣṇaraśmeḥ // 2130	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
apyatiśayitamanarthaṃ śamayatyarthaṃ samarpayan nṛpatiḥ / tamanarpayan nirarthaṃ prāṇena samaṃ parityajatyartham // 2131	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
apyatyucco bhūmisamaḥ pārthivo'pi na pārthivaḥ / mānārthaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya kṛte māne na jīvati // 2132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!), 3,4: pathyā)
apyanārabhamāṇasya vibhorutpāditāḥ paraiḥ / vrajanti guṇatāmarthāḥ śabdā iva vihāyasaḥ // 2133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyanāvarjitāḥ svena phalarāgeṇa saṃnatāḥ / arbhakairapi gṛhyante sādhusaṃtānaśākhinaḥ // 2134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyanekairupacitair durvinītaiḥ sutairalam / nidarśanaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ śataṃ duryodhanādayaḥ // 2135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
apyabhīṣṭā na labhyante saṃtyaktā na tyajanti ca / vāsanā iva saṃsāre mohanaikaparāḥ striyaḥ // 2136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyaśakyaṃ tvayā dattaṃ duḥkhaṃ śakyantarātmani / bāṣpo vāhīkanārīṇāṃ vegavāhī kapolayoḥ // 2137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyākarasamutpannamaṇijātirasaṃskṛtā / jātarūpeṇa kalyāṇi na hi saṃyogamarhati // 2138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyātmano vināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ paravyasanahṛṣṭaḥ / prāyo mastakanāśe samaramukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ // 2139	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apyāpatsamayaḥ sādhoḥ prayāti ślāghanīyatām / vidhorvidhuṃtudāskandavipatkālo'pi sundaraḥ // 2140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyāmīlitapaṅkajāṃ kamalinīmapyullasatpallavāṃ vāsantīmapi saudhabhittipatitāmātmapraticchāyikām / manvānaḥ prathamaṃ priyeti pulakasvedaprakampākulaṃ prītyāliṅgati nāsti seti na punaḥ khedottaraṃ mūrcchati // 2141	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
apyutkaṭe ca raudre ca śatrau yasya na hīyate / dhairyaṃ prāpte mahīpasya na sa yāti parābhavam // 2142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyunnatapadārūḍhaḥ pūjyān naivāpamānayet / nahuṣaḥ śakratāṃ prāpya cyuto'gastyāvamānanāt // 2143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyunmattāt pralapato bālācca parisarpataḥ / sarvataḥ sāramādadyād aśmabhya iva kāñcanam // 2144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyupāyaistribhistāta yo'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate / tasya vikramakālāṃstān yuktānāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // 2145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyuddāmavyasanasaraṇeḥ saṃgame kāmukānāṃ bhadraṃ bhadre bhuvanajayinastvatkalākaulaśasya / apyutsāhapracurasuhṛdaḥ kāmakelīnivāsāḥ prauḍhotsāhāstava suvadane svastimanto vilāsāḥ // 2146	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
apyekavaṃśajanuṣoḥ paśyata pūrṇatvatucchatābhājoḥ / jyākārmukayoḥ kaścid guṇabhūtaḥ kaścidapi bhartā // 2147	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apyetadrajanīmayaṃ jagadatho nidrāmayī sā niśā nidrā svapnamayī bhavedatha ca sa svapno mṛgākṣīmayaḥ / seyaṃ mānamayī mama priyatamā taccāṭuceṣṭāmayo mādṛk kveti samīhitaikavidhaye saṃkalpa tubhyaṃ namaḥ // 2148	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
apyeva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ / rājadoṣaparāmṛṣṭās tiṣṭhante nāparādhinaḥ // 2149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apyautsukye mahati dayitaprārthanāsu pratīpāḥ kāṅkṣantyo'pi vyatikarasukhaṃ kātarāḥ svāṅgadāne / ābādhyante na khalu madanenaiva labdhāntaratvād ābādhante manasijamapi kṣiptakālāḥ kumāryaḥ // 2150	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aprakaṭavartitastana- maṇḍalikānibhṛtacakradarśinyaḥ / āveśayanti hṛdayaṃ smaracaryāguptayoginyaḥ // 2151	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aprakaṭīkṛtaśaktiḥ śakto'pi janāt tiraskriyāṃ labhate / nivasannantardāruṇi laṅghyo vahnirna tu jvalitaḥ // 2152	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apragalbhasya yā vidyā kṛpaṇasya ca yaddhanam / yacca bāhubalaṃ bhīror vyarthametat trayaṃ bhuvi // 2153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apragalbhāḥ padanyāse jananīrāgahetavaḥ / santyeke bahulālāpāḥ kavayo bālakā iva // 2154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apraṇodyo'tithiḥ sāyaṃ sūryoḍho gṛhamedhinā / kāle prāptastvakāle vā nāsyānaśnan gṛhe vaset // 2155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apraṇādyo'tithiḥ sāyaṃ sūryoḍho gṛhamedhinām / pūjayā tasya devatvaṃ prayānti gṛhamedhinaḥ // 2156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apratikṛtyātmānaṃ sahasānartheṣu na pravarteta / śirasi dhṛte'mṛtakiraṇe viṣamaghasadviṣamanetro'pi // 2157	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apratibuddhe śrotari vakturvākyaṃ prayāti vaiphalyam / nayanavihīne bhartari lāvaṇyamiveha khañjanākṣīṇām // 2158	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
apratiṣṭhāśca ye kecid adharmaśaraṇāśca ye / teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhā gaṅgeha śaraṇaṃ śarma varma ca // 2159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
apratyakṣāṇi śāstrāṇi vivādastatra kevalam / pratyakṣaṃ jyautiṣaṃ śāstraṃ candrārkau yatra sākṣiṇau // 2160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apratyākalitaprabhāvavibhave sarvāśrayāmbhonidhau vāso nālpatapaḥphalaṃ yadaparaṃ doṣo'yameko mahān / śambūko'pi yadatra durlabhatarai ratnairanarghaiḥ saha spardhāmekanivāsakāraṇavaśādekāntato vāñchati // 2161	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
apradātā samṛddho'sau daridraśca mahāmanāḥ / aśrutaśca samunnaddhas tamāhurmūḍhacetasam // 2162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apradīpā yathā rātrir anādityaṃ yathā nabhaḥ / tathāsāṃvatsaro rājā bhramatyandha ivādhvani // 2163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apradhānaḥ pradhānaḥ syāt pārthivaṃ yadi sevate / pradhāno'pyapradhānaḥ syād yadi sevāvivarjitaḥ // 2164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprabhūtamatanīyasi tanvī kāñcidhāmni pihitaikataroru / kṣaumamākulakarā vicakarṣa krāntapallavamabhīṣṭatamena // 2165	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
apramattaśca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ / kṛtajño dharmaśīlaśca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // 2166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apramatte'pi puruṣe hitakāryāvalambini / daivamunmārgarasikam anyathaiva pramadyate // 2167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
apramādaśca kartavyas tvayā rājñaḥ samāśraye / tvadīyasya śarīrasya vayaṃ bhāgyopajīvinaḥ // 2168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprasannamaparāddhari patyau kopadīptamurarīkṛtadhairyam / kṣālitaṃ nu śamitaṃ nu vadhūnāṃ drāvitaṃ nu hṛdayaṃ madhuvāraiḥ // 2169	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
aprasādo'nadhiṣṭhānaṃ deyāṃśaharaṇaṃ ca yat / kālayāpo'pratīkāras tad vairāgyasya kāraṇam // 2170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprastāvastutibhiraniśaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ karoti svaṃ dāridryaṃ vadati vasanaṃ darśayatyeva jīrṇam / chāyābhūtaścalati na puraḥ pārśvayornaiva paścān niḥsvaḥ khedaṃ diśati dhanināṃ vyādhivadduścikitsyaḥ // 2171	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
aprākṛtaḥ sa kathamastu na vismayāya yasminnuvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca / lakṣmīśca sāttvikaguṇajvalitaṃ ca tejo dharmaśca mānavinayau ca parākramaśca // 2172	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aprākṛtasya cāritātiśayasya bhāvair atyadbhutairmama hṛtasya tathāpyanāsthā / ko'pyeṣa vīraśiśukākṛtiraprameya- sāmarthyasārasamudāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ // 2173	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aprākṛtasyāhavadurmadasya nivāryamasyāstrabalena vīryam / alpīyaso'pyāmayatulyavṛtter mahāpakārāya riporvivṛddhiḥ // 2174	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aprājñena ca kātareṇa ca guṇaḥ syād bhaktiyuktena kaḥ prajñāvikramaśālino'pi hi bhavet kiṃ bhaktihīnāt phalam / prajñāvikramabhaktayaḥ samuditā yeṣāṃ guṇā bhūtaye te bhṛtyā nṛpateḥ kalatramitare saṃpatsu cāpatsu ca // 2175	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aprāptakālaṃ vacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan / labhate buddhyavajñānam avamānaṃ ca bhārata // 2176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāptakālavacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan / prāpnuyād buddhiśaithilyam apamānaṃ ca śāśvatam // 2177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāptakālo yo mūrkho haset svecchānusārataḥ / prāpnuyād buddhyavajñānaṃ sabhāyāṃ caiva śāśvatam // 2178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāptakelisukhayoratimānaruddha- saṃdhānayo rahasi jātaruṣorakasmāt / yūnormitho'bhilaṣatoḥ prathamānunītiṃ bhāvāḥ prasādapiśunāḥ kṣapayanti nidrām // 2179	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aprāptapuṣpodgamavibhramaiva ruddhā bhujaṅgena tathā yatheyam / na śakyate spraṣṭumapīhamānair āmodinī candanaśākhikeva // 2180	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aprāptaprathamāvakartanaruṣā vyānamramūkībhavad- vakreṣvanyaśiraḥsu yasya dahane chinnaṃ śiro juhvataḥ / uccārya svayameva mantramakaronnāsyāhamityātmanas tyāgaṃ paṅktimukhaḥ sa vikramasuhṛdvīraḥ kathaṃ varṇyate // 2181	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aprāptayauvanā nārī na kāmāya na śāntaye / saṃprāpte ṣoḍaśe varṣe gardabhī cāpsarāyate // 2182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāptavallabhasamāgamanādhikāyāḥ sakhyāḥ puro'tra nijacittavinodabuddhyā / ālāpaveṣagatihāsyavikatthanādyaiḥ prāṇeśvarānukṛtimākalayanti līlām // 2183	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aprāpye'pi yathā kāme dharme cintā na kiṃ tathā / alābhe'pi dvayorekā bhayadā śivadāparā // 2184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāpyeṣurudāsitāsiraśanerārāt kutaḥ śaṅkutaś cakravyutkramakṛt parokṣaparaśuḥ śūlena śūnyā yayā / mṛtyurdaityapateḥ kṛtaḥ sa sadṛśaḥ pādāṅgulīparvataḥ pārvatyā pratipālyatāṃ tribhuvanaṃ niḥśalyakalyaṃ tayā // 2185	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanam / sarvatra cānavasthānam etannāśanamātmanaḥ // 2186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprārthanamasaṃsparśam asaṃdarśanameva ca / puruṣasyeha niyamo bhavedrāgaprahāṇaye // 2187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aprārthitaṃ yathā duḥkhaṃ tathā sukhamapi svayam / prāṇinaṃ pratipadyeta sarvaṃ niyatiyantritam // 2188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyaṃ na hi bhāṣeta na virudhyeta kenacit / kāryasiddhiṃ samīheta kāryabhraṃśo hi mūrkhatā // 2189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyaṃ puruṣa cāpi paradrohaṃ parastriyam / adharmamanṛtaṃ caiva dūrāt prājño vivarjayet // 2190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caret / acireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo'priyaḥ priyamācaret // 2191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyamuktāḥ puruṣāḥ prayatante dviguṇamapriyaṃ vaktum / tasmādavācyamapriyam apriyamaśrotukāmena // 2192	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apriyavacanadaridraiḥ priyavacanāḍhyaiḥ svadāraparituṣṭaiḥ / paraparivādanivṛttaiḥ kvacit kvacin maṇḍitā vasudhā // 2193	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apriyavacanāṅgārair dagdho'pi na vipriyaṃ vadatyāryaḥ / kiṃ dahyamānamagaru svabhāvasurabhiṃ parityajati // 2194	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
apriyasyāpi vacasaḥ pariṇāmāvirodhinaḥ / vaktā śrotā ca yatrāsti ramante tatra saṃpadaḥ // 2195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyāṇyapi kurvantaḥ svārthāyodyata ceṣṭitāḥ / paṇḍitā nopalabhyante vāyasairiva kokilāḥ // 2196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo niṣṭhurāṇyapi ca bruvan / cetaḥ prahlādayatyeva sarvāvasthāsu vallabhaḥ // 2197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ / dagdhamandirasāre'pi kasya vahnāvanādaraḥ // 2198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyāṇyapi pathyāni ye vadanti nṛṇāmiha / ta eva suhṛdaḥ proktā anye syurnāmadhārakāḥ // 2199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati / ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati // 2200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ priyaiścāpi vinābhavaḥ / asadbhiḥ saṃprayogaśca tadduḥkhaṃ cirajīvinām // 2201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyairapi niṣpiṣṭaiḥ kiṃ syāt kleśāsahiṣṇubhiḥ / ye tadunmūlane śaktā jigīṣā teṣu śobhate // 2202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apriyo'pi hi pathyaḥ syād iti vṛddhānuśāsanam / vṛddhānuśāsane tiṣṭhan priyatāmupagacchati // 2203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprītāṃ rogiṇīṃ nārīm antarvatnīṃ dhṛtavratām / rajasvalāmakāmāṃ ca na kāmeta balāt pumān // 2204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apsu plavante pāṣāṇā mānuṣā ghnanti rākṣasān / kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ // 2205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apsvātmānaṃ na vīkṣeta nāvagāhet payorayam / saṃdigdhanāvaṃ nārohen na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret // 2206.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aphalaṃ śrāddham apātre dhanam aphalaṃ yat na dattamarthibhyaḥ / yauvanamaphalaṃ yaminaś śrutamaphalaṃ durvinītasya // 2206.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aphalasyāpi vṛkṣasya chāyā bhavati śītalā / nirguṇo'pi varaṃ bandhur yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ // 2207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aphalāni durantāni samavyayaphalāni ca / aśakyāni ca kāryāṇi nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ // 2208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abandhuṣvapi bandhutvaṃ snehāt samupajāyate / bandhuṣvapi ca bandhutvam alokajñeṣu hīyate // 2209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abalaḥ pronnataṃ śatruṃ yo yāti madamohitaḥ / yuddhārthaṃ sa nivarteta śīrṇadanto yathā gajaḥ // 2210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abalasvakulāśino jhaṣān nijanīḍadrumapīḍinaḥ khagān / anavadyatṛṇārdino mṛgān mṛgayāghāya na bhūbhujāṃ ghnatām // 2211	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abalāṃ balinā nītāṃ daśāmimāṃ makaraketunā rakṣa / āpatpatitoddhṛtaye bhavati hi śubhajanmanāṃ janma // 2212	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abalā api vīreśān yatsāhāyyamupāśritāḥ / parābhavanti dṛkkoṇapātenaiva sa manmathaḥ // 2213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abalāḍhyavigrahaśrīr amartyanatirakṣamālayopetaḥ / pañcakramoditamukhaḥ pāyāt parameśvaro muhuranādiḥ // 2214	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
abalābuddhihīnāyā doṣaṃ kṣantuṃ sadārhasi / mūḍhasya satataṃ doṣaṃ kṣamāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ // 2215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abalā yatra prabalā śiśuravanīśo nirakṣaro mantrī / nahi nahi tatra dhanāśā jīvita āśāpi durlabhā bhavati // 2216	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
abalāvanapara eko bhuvanatritaye'pi cettadā bharttā / kathamanyathā sudhākara- candanamukhyāpriyatvaṃ syāt // 2217	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abalā viṣaheta kathaṃ dṛḍhaśaktimamuṣya ratirasaprasaram / madanatulitānurāgo na vidadhyādyadi balādhānam // 2218	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abalāsu vilāsino'nvabhūvan nayanaireva navopagūhanāni / marudāgamavārtayāpi śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddha eva // 2219	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
abaleti parīvādo vṛthā hi hariṇīdṛśām / yāsāṃ netranipātena naṭavad ghūrṇyate jagat // 2220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abale salile vyavasyatā te mukhabhāvo gamito na paṅkajena / kathamādimavarṇatāntyajasya dvijarājena kṛtorunigrahasya // 2221	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
abalo'si na jitakāśī- pratibhaṭarāśīn parāpata kṣitipa / jātāmbhaḥkaṇapātaḥ kva vinaśyatyanalasaṃghātaḥ // 2222	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abālarucire bhruvau na ca marālamandā gatir dṛgañcalamacañcalaṃ hṛdayabhūdabhūto dayā  / sudhā na khalu vākpathātithirathāpi yūnāṃ mano manojaśarajarjjarannayati mohamasyāstanuḥ // 2223	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
abudhā ajaṃgamā api kayāpi gatyā paraṃ padamavāptāḥ / mantriṇa iti kīrtyante nayabalaguṭikā iva janena // 2224	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abudhaiḥ kṛtamānasaṃvidas tava pārthaiḥ kuta eva yogyatā / sahasi plavagairupāsitaṃ na hi guñjāphalameti soṣmatām // 2225	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abudhairarthalābhāya paṇyastrībhiriva svayam / ātmā saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya paropakaraṇīkṛtaḥ // 2226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abuddhimāśritānāṃ ca kṣantavyamaparādhinām / na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityaṃ sulabhaṃ puruṣeṇa vai // 2227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha ced buddhijaṃ kṛtvā brūyuste tadabuddhijam / pāpān svalpe'pi tān hanyād aparādhe tathānṛjūn // 2228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abuddhvā cittamaprāpya viśrambhaṃ prabhaviṣṇuṣu / na svecchaṃ vyavahartavyam ātmano bhūtimicchatā // 2229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abodhi no hrīnibhṛtaṃ madiṅgitaṃ pratītya vā nādṛtavatyasāviti / lunāti yūnaḥ sma dhiyaṃ kiyadgatā nivṛtya bālādaradarśaneṣuṇā // 2230	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
abjaṃ tvajjamathābjabhūstata idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍāt punar viśvaṃ sthāvarajaṃgamaṃ taditarat tvanmūlamitthaṃ payaḥ / dhik tvāṃ caura iva prayāsi nibhṛtaṃ nirgatya jālāntarair badhyante vivaśāstvadekaśaraṇāstvāmāśritā jantavaḥ // 2231	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abdāyanartuṣvatha māsapakṣa- dināni kārye'pyavadhau vidadhyāt / hīnāvadhiryena bhavatyasatyaḥ sarvo'pi loke śakuno gṛhītaḥ // 2232	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abdebhakumbhe nirbinne vidyutkhaḍgalatāhate / svacchamuktāphalasthūlā nipetustoyabindavaḥ // 2233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abdairvārijighṛkṣayārṇavagataiḥ sākaṃ vrajantī muhuḥ saṃsargādvaḍavānalasya samabhūdāpannasattvā taḍit / manye deva tayā krameṇa janito yuṣmatpratāpānalo yenārātivadhūvilocanajalaiḥ sikto'pi saṃvardhate // 2234	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abdhinā saha mitratve dāridryaṃ yadi jāyate / lāñchanaṃ sāgarasyaiva maitrīkarturna lāñchanam // 2235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abdhirna tṛpyati yathā saritāṃ sahasrair no cendhanairiva śikhī bahudhopanītaiḥ / jīvaḥ samastaviṣayairapi tadvadevaṃ saṃcintya cārudhiṣaṇastyajatīndriyārthān // 2236	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abdhiryadyavadhīrito na tu tadā tasmānnipīyāmbudair vāntān yācasi kākubhirjalalavānuttānacañcūpuṭaḥ / tatte nistrapanīcataivamucitā nirvaktumetat kathaṃ vidmaḥ kena guṇena māniṣu punaḥ sāraṅga saṃgīyate // 2237	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abdhī ratnamadho dhatte dhatte vā śirasā tṛṇam / abdhereva hi doṣo'yaṃ ratnaṃ ratnaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam // 2238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abdherambhaḥ sthagitabhuvanābhogapātālakukṣeḥ / potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghane'pi kṣamante / āho riktaḥ kathamapi bhavedeṣa daivāt tadānīṃ ko nāma syādavaṭakuharālokane'pyasya kalpaḥ // 2239	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
abdhau majjanti mīnā iva phaṇina iva kṣauṇirandhraṃ viśanti krāmantyadrīn vihaṅgā iva kapaya iva kvāpyaraṇye caranti / deva kṣmāpālaśakra prasaradanupamatvaccamūcakravāha- vyūhavyādhūtadhūlīpaṭalahatadṛśaḥ kāndiśīkāḥ kṣitīśāḥ // 2240	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
