abravīcca bhagavan mataṅgajair yadbṛhadbhirapi karma duṣkaram / tatra nāhamanumantumutsahe moghavṛtti kalabhasya ceṣṭitam // 2241	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
abhakṣyaṃ bhakṣayennityaṃ suvāsomadyapā gṛhe / kuṣṭhī bhavati vitteśo veśyādoṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ // 2242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhagnavṛttāḥ prasabhād ākṛṣṭā yauvanoddhataiḥ / cakranduruccakairmuṣṭigrāhyamadhyā dhanurlatā // 2243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ / dānaṃ damaśca yajñaśca svādhyāyastapa ārjavam // 2244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyamakrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntirapaiśunam / dayā bhūteṣvaloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīracāpalam // 2245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā / bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata // 2246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dambho darpo'timānaśca krodhaḥ pāruṣyameva ca / ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadamāsurīm // 2247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daivī saṃpadvimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā // 2248	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaścarate muniḥ / tasyāpi sarvabhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // 2249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ / abhayaṃ tasya bhūtāni dadatītyanuśuśrumaḥ // 2250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ / tasya dehavimuktasya kṣaya eva na vidyate // 2251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhayamabhayaṃ deva brūmastavāsilatāvadhūḥ kuvalayadalaśyatmā śatroruraḥsthalaśāyinī / samayasulabhāṃ kīrtiṃ bhavyāmasūta sutāmasāv api ramayituṃ rāgāndheva bhramatyakhilaṃ jagat // 2252	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhayasya hi yo dātā sa pūjyaḥ satataṃ nṛpaḥ / satraṃ hi vardhate tasya sadaivābhayadakṣiṇam // 2253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahatphalam / na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate // 2254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhavadabhinavaprarohabhājāṃ chaviparipāṭiṣu yaḥ purāṅgakānām / ahaha virahavaikṛte sa tasyāḥ kraśimani saṃprati dūrvayā vivādaḥ // 2255	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhavyajīvo vacanaṃ paṭhannapi jinasya mithyātvaviṣaṃ na muñcati / yathā viṣaṃ raudraviṣo'ti pannagaḥ saśarkaraṃ cāru payaḥ pibannapi // 2256	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
abhāvi sindhvā saṃdhyābhrasadṛgrudhiratoyayā / hṛte yoddhuṃ janaḥ pāṃśau sa dṛgrudhi rato yayā // 2257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhāve na narastasmād bhāvaḥ sarvatra kāraṇam / cittaṃ śodhaya yatnena kimanyairbāhyaśodhanaiḥ // 2258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhāve paṭṭasūtrasya hāriṇī snāyuriṣyate / guṇārthamathavā grāhyāḥ snāyavo mahiṣīgavām // 2259.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhigamyāste sadbhir vyapagatamānāvamānadoṣāśca / ye svagṛhamupagatānāṃ śramamupacārairvyapanayanti // 2259.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhijanavato bhartuḥ ślāghye sthitā gṛhiṇīpade vibhavagarubhiḥ kṛtyairasya pratikṣaṇamākulā / tanayamacirāt prācīvārkaṃ prasūya ca pāvanaṃ mama virahajāṃ na tvaṃ vatse śucaṃ gaṇayiṣyasi // 2260	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhijātajanavyathāvahā bahaloṣmaprasarā vidāhinaḥ / prakhalā iva dṛṣṭimāgatā bhuvi tāpāya nidāghavāsarāḥ // 2261	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhitāpasaṃpadamathoṣṇarucir nijatejasāmasahamāna iva / payasi prapitsuraparāmbunidher adhiroḍhumastagirimabhyapatat // 2262	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
abhitigmaraśmi ciramāviramā- davadhānakhinnamanimeṣatayā / vigalanmadhuvratakulāśrujalaṃ nyamimīladabjanayanaṃ nalinī // 2263	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
abhito nitarāṃ salilaṃ jalade dātuṃ samudyate bhavati / tadapi bahulamalpaṃ vā pātrādhīnaṃ mataṃ patanam // 2264	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhittāvutthite citre dṛśyate bhittirātatā / aho vicitrā māyeyaṃ bhagnaṃ tuṇḍaṃ śilāplutā // 2265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
abhidroheṇa bhūtānām arjayan gatvarīḥ śriyaḥ / udanvāniva sindhūnām āpadāmeti pātratām // 2266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ / bhavato'bhimanāḥ samīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām // 2267	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhidhāvati māṃ mṛtyur ayamudgūrṇamudgaraḥ / kṛpaṇaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa māṃ śaraṇāgatam // 2268	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhidhyālu parasveṣu neha nāmutra nandati / tasmādabhidhyā saṃtyājyā sarvadābhīpsatā sukham // 2269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
abhinayaśastau hastau pādau paribhūtakisalayau salayau / aṅgaṃ rañjitaraṅgaṃ nṛttaṃ puṃbhāvaśāli samavṛttam // 2270	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
abhinayān paricetumivodyatā malayamārutakampitapallavā / amadayat sahakāralatā manaḥ sakalikā kalikāmajitāmapi // 2271	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhinavaṃ galitāṃśukadarśitaṃ dadhati yatstanayoruparisthitam / vasanamaṇḍalamaṇḍanamaṅganās tadadhikaṃ pratipakṣamanojvaram // 2272	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhinavakuśasūtraspardhi karṇe śirīṣaṃ kuravakaparidhānaṃ pāṭalādāma kaṇṭhe / tanusarasajalārdronmīlitaḥ sundarīṇāṃ dinapariṇatijanmā ko'pi veśaścakāsti // 2273	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavajavāpuṣpaspardhī tavādharapallavo hasitakusumonmeṣacchāyādaracchuritāntaraḥ / nayanamadhupaśreṇīṃ yūnāmanāratamāharaṃs taruṇi tanute tāruṇyaśrīrvilāsavataṃsatām // 2274	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhinavanalinīkisalaya- mṛṇālavalayādi davadahanarāśiḥ / subhaga kuraṅgadṛśo'syā vidhivaśatastvadviyogapavipāte // 2275	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
abhinavanalinīvinodalubdho mukulitakairaviṇīviyogabhīruḥ / bhramati madhukaro'yamantarāle śrayati na paṅkajinīṃ kumudvatīṃ vā // 2276	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhinavanavanītaprītamātāmranetraṃ vikacanalinalakṣmīspardhi sānandavaktram / hṛdayabhavanamadhye yogibhirdhyānagamyaṃ navagaganatamālaśyāmalaṃ kaṃcidīḍe // 2277	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavanavanītasnigdhamāpītadugdhaṃ dadhikaṇaparidigdhaṃ mugdhamaṅgaṃ murāreḥ / diśatu bhuvanakṛcchraccheditāpicchagucchac chavi navaśikhipicchālāñchitaṃ vāñchitaṃ vaḥ // 2278	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavapallavaraśanā śiśirataratuṣārajalamaṅgalasnātā / puṣpavatī cūtalatā priyeva dadṛśe phalābhimukhī // 2279	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhinavapulakālīmaṇḍitā gaṇḍapālī nigadati vinigūḍhānandahindolicetaḥ / sudati vadati puṇyaiḥ kasya dhanyairmanoja- prasaramasakṛdetaccāpalaṃ locanasya // 2280	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavamukhamudraṃ kṣudrakūpopavītaṃ praśithilavipulatvaṃ jvālakocchavāsipālam / pariṇatiparipāṭivyākṛtenāruṇimnā hataharitimaśeṣaṃ nāgaraṅgaṃ cakāsti // 2281	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
abhinavayavasaśrīśālini kṣmātale'smin atiśayaparabhāgaṃ bhejire jiṣṇugopāḥ / kuvalayaśayanīye mugdhamugdhekṣaṇāyā maṇaya iva vimuktāḥ kāmakeliprasaṅgāt // 2282	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavavadhūroṣasvādaḥ karīṣatanūnapād asaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ / galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā raver virahivanitāvaktraupamyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ // 2283	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhinavaviṣavallīpādapadmasya viṣṇor madanamathanamaulermālatīpuṣpamālā / jayati jayapatākā kāpyasau mokṣalakṣmyāḥ kṣapitakalikalaṅkā jāhnavī naḥ punātu // 2284	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhinavasevakavinayaiḥ prāghuṇakoktairvilāsinīruditaiḥ / dhūrtajanavacananikarair iha kaścidavañcito nāsti // 2285	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhinaṣati vainateyaṃ cāmarasahitaḥ sasatyabhāmo yaḥ / nārāyaṇaḥ sa sākṣād vibudhasamarcyaḥ sadā jayatu // 2286	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhinnavelau gambhīrāv amburāśirbhavānapi / asāvañjanasaṃkāśas tvaṃ tu cāmīkaradyutiḥ // 2287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhinneṣvapi kāryeṣu bhidyate manasaḥ kriyā / anyathaiva stanaṃ putraś cintayatyanyathā patiḥ // 2288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhipatati ghanaṃ śṛṇoti garjāḥ sahati śilāḥ sahate taḍittaraṅgān / vidhuvati garutaṃ rutaṃ vidhatte jalapṛṣate kiyate'pi cātako'yam // 2289	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhiprāyaṃ yo viditvā tu bhartuḥ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi karotyatandrīḥ / vaktā hitānāmanurakta āryaḥ śaktijña ātmeva hi so'nukampyaḥ // 2290	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
vākyaṃ tu yo nādriyate'nuśiṣṭaḥ pratyāha yaścāpi niyujyamānaḥ / prajñābhimānī pratikūlavādī tyājyaḥ sa tādṛktvarayaiva bhṛtyaḥ // 2291	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhiprāyānusāreṇa prakaṭīkurute priyam / aho mahāprabhāvānāṃ bhūpatīnāṃ vasuṃdharā // 2292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ pūjito yaḥ surairapi / sarvavighnacchide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ // 2293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhibhavati manaḥ kadambavāyau madamadhure ca śikhaṇḍināṃ nināde / jana iva na dhṛteścacāla jiṣṇur na hi mahatāṃ sukaraḥ samādhibhaṅgaḥ // 2294	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhibhūto'pi notsāhaṃ jahyājjātu svasiddhaye / naṣṭāṅgo'pi grasatyeva saiṃhikeyo muhurdviṣau // 2295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhibhūto'pyavajñāto yo rājñāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhati / sa tu rājñāṃ śriyaṃ bhuṅkte nābhimānī kadācana // 2296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhibhūya vibhūtimārtavīṃ madhugandhātiśayena vīrudhām / nṛpateramarasragāpa sā dayitorustanakoṭisusthitam // 2297	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhibhūya satāmavasthitiṃ jaḍajeṣu pratipādya ca śriyam / jagatīparitāpakṛt kathaṃ jaladhau nāvapatedasau raviḥ // 2298	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhimataphaladātā tvaṃ ca kalpadrumaśca prakaṭamiha viśeṣaṃ kaṃcanodāharāmaḥ / kathamiha madhuroktipremasaṃmānamiśraṃ tulayati suraśākhī deva dānaṃ tvadīyam // 2299	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhimataphalasiddhisiddhamantrā- vali balijitparameṣṭhinorupāsye / bhagavati madanārināri vande nikhilanagādhipabhartṛdārike tvām // 2300	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhimatamabhitaḥ kṛtāṅgabhaṅgā kucayugamunnativittamunnamayya / tanurabhilaṣitaṃ klamacchalena vyavṛṇuta vellitabāhuvallarīkā // 2301	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhimatamahāmānagranthiprabhedapaṭīyasī gurutaraguṇagrāmāmbhojasphuṭojjvalacandrikā / vipulavilasallajjāvallīvidārakuṭhārikā jaṭharapiṭharī duḥpūreyaṃ karoti viḍambanām // 2302	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhimatavastūpahṛtā- vapi gurugarvādanādarastanvyāḥ / skhalite'pi priyasya saṃ- yamatāḍanamityeva bibbokaḥ // 2303	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhimatasiddhiraśeṣā bhavati hi puruṣasya puruṣakāreṇa / daivamiti yadapi kathayasi puruṣaguṇaḥ so'pyadṛṣṭākhyaḥ // 2304	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhimantrya śucividhānād ājyāḍhyaṃ hastikarṇajaṃ cūrṇam / yo'śnāti sa hi naraḥ syād yatheṣṭaceṣṭo'pi dīrghāyuḥ // 2305	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhimānadhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ciraṃ jīvanti te narāḥ / abhimānavihīnānāṃ kiṃ dhanena kimāyuṣā // 2306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhimānadhanasya gatvarair asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaścicīṣataḥ / acirāṃśuvilāsacañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalamānuṣaṅgikam // 2307	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhimānavatāṃ puṃsām ātmasāramajānatām / andhānāmiva dṛśyante patanāntāḥ pravṛttayaḥ // 2308	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhimānavatāṃ brahman yuktāyuktavivekinām / yujyate'vaśyabhogyānāṃ duḥkhānāmaprakāśanam // 2309	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhimānavato manasvinaḥ priyamuccaiḥ padamārurukṣataḥ / vinipātanivartanakṣamaṃ matamālambanamātmapauruṣam // 2310	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhimānitabhūtena sānubandharasena tu / yataḥ sarvendriyaprītiḥ sa kāmaḥ procyate budhaiḥ // 2311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhimāninamudbhrāntam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ śaṭham / krodhanaṃ caiva nṛpatiṃ vyasane ghnanti vairiṇaḥ // 2312	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
abhimukhagate yasminneva priye bahuśo vadaty avanatamukhaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthitaṃ mṛganetrayā / atha kila balāllīlālolaṃ sa eṣa tathekṣitaḥ kathamapi yathā dṛṣṭyā manye kṛtaṃ śrutilaṅghanam // 2313.1	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
abhimukhamadhuratarebhyaḥ parāṅmukhākrośanāt kuśīlebhyaḥ / abhyantarakaluṣebhyo bhetavyaṃ mitraśatrubhyaḥ // 2313.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhimukhanihatasya satas tiṣṭhatu tāvajjayo'tha vā svargaḥ / ubhayabalasādhuvādaḥ śravaṇamukho'styeva cātyartham // 2314	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhimukhapatayālubhirlalāṭa- śramasalilairavidhautapatralekhaḥ / kathayati puruṣāyitaṃ vadhūnāṃ mṛditahimadyutidurmanāḥ kapolaḥ // 2315	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhimukhapatitairguṇaprakarṣād avajitamuddhatimujjvalāṃ dadhānaiḥ / tarukisalayajālamagrahastaiḥ prasabhamanīyata bhaṅgamaṅganānām // 2316	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhimukhamupayāti māṃ sma kiṃcit tvamabhidadhāḥ paṭale madhuvratānām / madhusurabhimukhābjagandhalabdher adhikamadhi tvadanena mā nipāti // 2317	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhimukhāgatamārgaṇadhoraṇi- dhvanitapallavitāmbaragahvare / vitaraṇe ca raṇe ca samudyate bhavati ko'pi paraṃ viralaḥ paraḥ // 2318	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam / vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ // 2319	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyā ghanamarutā jaghanāṃśukaikadeśe / cakitamavasanoru satrapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīrapi vismayaṃ nināya // 2320	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhiyāti naḥ satṛṣa eṣa cakṣuṣo harirityakhidyata nitambinījanaḥ / na viveda yaḥ satatamenamīkṣate na vitṛṣṇatāṃ vrajati khalvasāvapi // 2321	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
abhiyuktaṃ balavatā durlabhaṃ hīnasādhanam / hṛtasvaṃ kāminaṃ coram āviśanti prajāgarāḥ // 2322	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiyukto balavatā tiṣṭhan durge prayatnavān / tadbalīyastarāhvānaṃ kurvītātmavimuktaye // 2323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāṃcid gatimātmanaḥ / yudhyamānastadā prājño mriyate ripuṇā saha // 2324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiyoktā balī yasmād alabdhvā na nivartate / upahārādṛte tasmāt saṃdhiranyo na vidyate // 2325	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhirāme'bhiniveśaṃ vidadhānā vividhalābhanirapekṣā / upahasyase sumadhye vidagdhavārāṅganāvāraiḥ // 2326	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhilakṣyaṃ sthiraṃ puṇyaṃ khyātaṃ sadbhirniṣevitam / seveta siddhimanvicchañ ślāghyaṃ vindhyamiveśvaram // 2327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhilaṣata upāyaṃ vikramaṃ kīrtilakṣmyor asugamamarisainyairaṅkamabhyāgatasya / janaka iva śiśutve supriyasyaikasūnor avinayamapi sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ // 2328	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhilaṣati na khalu puruṣaḥ śriyamapi kīrtyā vinākṛtāṃ kuśalaḥ / kṣaṇikāya vastune kas tyajatīha cirasthiraṃ śreyaḥ // 2329	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhilaṣati padmayonau niḥsvavadhūnāṃ sutān sraṣṭum / svaṃ svaṃ viśaṅkamānā vepante krakacavarttino lokāḥ // 2330	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
abhilaṣatoranubhāvān tilottamāyāḥ kilottamānubhayoḥ / sundopasundayorapi nāśo bhedādudāhriyate // 2331	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhilaṣanti tavādharamādhurīṃ tadiha kiṃ hariṇākṣi mudhā budhāḥ / surasudhāmadharīkurute yatas tvadadharo'dharatāmagamat tataḥ // 2332	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhilaṣasi yadīndo vaktralakṣmīṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ punarapi sakṛdabdhau majja saṃkṣālayāṅkam / suvimalamatha bimbaṃ pārijātaprasūnaiḥ surabhaya vada no cet tvaṃ kva tasyā mukhaṃ kva // 2333	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
abhilaṣitādhikavarade praṇipatitajanārtihāriṇi śaraṇye / caraṇau namāmyahaṃ te vidyādharadevate gauri // 2334	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhivarṣati yo'nupālayan vidhibījāni vivekavāriṇā / sa sadā phalaśālinīṃ kriyāṃ śaradaṃ loka ivādhitiṣṭhati // 2335	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
abhivādanaśīlasya nityaṃ vṛddhopasevinaḥ / catvāri tasya vardhanta āyuḥ prajñā yaśo balam // 2336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhivādayeta vṛddham āsanaṃ cāsya darśayet / kṛtāñjalirupāsīta gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato'nviyāt // 2337	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
abhivādya yathā vṛddhān santo gacchanti nirvṛtim / evaṃ sajjanamākruśya mūrkho bhavati nirvṛtaḥ // 2338	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhivīkṣya sāmikṛtamaṇḍanaṃ yatīḥ kararuddhanīvigaladaṃśukāḥ striyaḥ / dadhire'dhibhitti paṭahapratisvanaiḥ sphuṭamaṭṭahāsamiva saudhapaṅktayaḥ // 2339	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
abhiśaptaḥ puṇyakārye pravṛtto'pi na siddhibhāk / bhartrānugamanodyuktā reṇukā janamārikā // 2340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiśastavat prapaśyanti daridraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam / dāridryaṃ pātikaṃ loke kastacchaṃsitumarhati // 2341	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣuṃ bhuvanāni yaḥ smaramivākhyata lodhrarajaścayaḥ / kṣubhitasainyaparāgavipāṇḍura- dyutirayaṃ tirayannudabhūddiśaḥ // 2342	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhiṣekārdraśirasā rājā rājyāvalokinā / sahāyavaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ tatra rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // 2343	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadapyalpataraṃ karma tadapyekena duṣkaram / puruṣeṇāsahāyena kimu rājyaṃ mahodayam // 2344	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhisaraṇaparā sadā varākī samaramahādhvasu raktapaṅkileṣu / hṛdi dharaṇibhujāmiyaṃ nṛpaśrīr nihitapadaiva kalaṅkamātanoti // 2345	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhisaraṇamayuktamaṅganānām iti tava sundari mā sma bhūdvitarkaḥ / nanu patimagamat svayaṃ nadīnāṃ saridapi śaṃbhujaṭāmuhūrtamālā // 2346	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhisaraṇarasaḥ kṛśāṅgayaṣṭer ayamaparatra na vīkṣitaḥ śruto vā / ahimapi yadiyaṃ nirāsa nāṅghrer nibiḍatanūpuramātmanīnabuddhyā // 2347	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
abhisāre sarojākṣi yadi gantuṃ samīhase / samācchādya mukhaṃ yāhi prayatnena priyaṃ prati // 2348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhihanti hanta kathameṣa mādhavaṃ sukumārakāyamanavagrahaḥ smaraḥ / acireṇa vaikṛtavivartadāruṇaḥ kalabhaṃ kaṭhora iva kūṭapākalaḥ // 2349	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
abhihitāpyabhiyogaparāṅmukhī prakaṭamaṅgavilāsamakurvatī / upari te puruṣāyitumakṣamā navavadhūriva śatrupatākinī // 2350	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
abhīkṣṇamuccairdhvanatā payomucā ghanāndhakārīkṛtaśarvarīṣvapi / taḍitprabhādarśitamārgabhūmayaḥ prayānti rāgādabhisārikāḥ striyaḥ // 2351	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
abhīkṣṇamuṣṇairapi tasya soṣmaṇaḥ surendrabandīśvasitānilairyathā / sacandanāmbhaḥkaṇakomalaistathā vapurjalārdrāpavanairna nirvavau // 2352	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
abhīpsāṃ svātmano rakṣā'virataṃ susthiraṃ tathā / yatnamātiṣṭha dhairyeṇa tataḥ siddhirbhaved dhruvam // 2353	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhīṣṭaphalasaṃsiddhis tuṣṭiḥ kāmyā susaṃpadaḥ / dvitribhirbahubhi sārdhaṃ bhojanena prajāyate // 2354	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
abhīṣṭamāsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛtāśaṃ kamanī cakāśe / yoṣinmanojanmasukhodayeṣu samuddhṛtāśaṅkamanīcakāśe // 2355	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhuktāyāṃ yasyāṃ kṣaṇamapi na yātaṃ nṛpaśatair bhuvas tasyā lābhe ka iva bahumānaḥ kṣitibhujām / tadaṃśasyāpyaṃśe tadavayavaleśe'pi patayo viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam // 2356	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
abhuktvāmalakaṃ pathyaṃ bhuktvā tu badarīphalam / kapitthaṃ sarvadā pathyaṃ kadalī na kadācana // 2357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhuñjatāṃścādadatāṃ dhanaṃ caurā haranti hi / saraghāṇāṃ yathā sarvaṃ mākṣikaṃ vanacāriṇaḥ // 2358	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhūtapūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ ca duḥkham / kiṃ tu tvadagre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parābhavo nātha na te'nurūpam // 2359	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhūtamāsajya viruddhamīhitaṃ balādalabhyaṃ tava lipsate nṛpaḥ / vijānato'pi hyanayasya raudratāṃ bhavatyapāye parimohinī matiḥ // 2360	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
abhūt prācī piṅgā rasapatiriva prāśya kanakaṃ gatacchāyaścandro budhajana iva grāmyasadasi / kṣaṇāt kṣīṇāstārā nṛpataya ivānudyamaparā na dīpā rājante draviṇarahitānāmiva guṇāḥ // 2361	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
abhūdambhorāśeḥ saha vasatirāsīt kamalayā guṇānāmādhāro nayanaphalaminduḥ prathayati / kathaṃ siṃhīsūnustamapi tudati prauḍhadaśanair guṇānāmāsvādaṃ piśunarasanā kiṃ rasayati // 2362	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
abhūvannadbhutoṣmāṇaḥ śītavyāpte jagattraye / kucotsaṅgāḥ kṛśāṅgīṇāṃ sthānaṃ manmathatejasaḥ // 2363	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhedenaiva yudhyeran rakṣeyuśca parasparam / phalgu sainyasya yat kiṃcin madhye vyūhasya tadbhavet // 2364	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhedenopāste kumudamudare vā sthitavato vipakṣādambhojādupagatavato vā madhulihaḥ / aparyāptaḥ ko'pi svaparaparicaryāparicaya- prabandhaḥ sādhūnāmayamanabhisaṃdhānamadhuraḥ // 2365	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
abhedyo'nuddhataḥ stabdhaḥ sūnṛtaḥ priyadarśanaḥ / bahuśrutaḥ kālavedī jitagrantho'rthakarmavit // 2366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
abhogasubhagā bhūtir adainyadhavalaṃ kulam / adarpaviśadā vidyā bhavatyunnatacetasām // 2367	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhoginau maṇḍalinau tatkṣaṇānmuktakañcukau / varamāśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu patnyāḥ payodharau // 2368	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyaktaṃ rahasi gataṃ vicittamanyena mantrayantaṃ vā / ucitapraṇayamapi nṛpaṃ sahasāryā nopasarpanti // 2369	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyaktamiva snātaḥ śuciraśucimiva prabuddha iva suptam / baddhamiva strairagatir janamiha sukhasaṅginamavaimi // 2370	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyaghāni municāpalāt tvayā yanmṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ / akṣamiṣṭa tadayaṃ pramādyatāṃ saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣamajñatā // 2371.1	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
abhyantaragatā bāhyā bāhyāścābhyataraṃ gatāḥ / yairnarā nidhanaṃ yānti yathā rājā kacadrumaḥ // 2371.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyarthaye kimapi jīvitajanmatastvām utkaṇṭhatodgati niḥsara tāvadeva / kānte dṛgantapathalambini jīvatīti yāvanna karṇapathameti janāpavādaḥ // 2372	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
abhyarthya sapraṇati mandiramabhyupetā devī svayaṃ bhagavatī pṛthageva tāsām / āsannavallabhasamāgamasūcanāni saṃjīvanāni vacanānyapi vācitāni // 2373	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyastāḥ sphuṭameva śāstragatayaḥ samyakkavitvodadheḥ pāraṃ cādhigataṃ satāṃ pariṣadi prāptaḥ pratiṣṭhodayaḥ / nirviṇṇasya mamādhunā nanu paraḥ panthā na dainyaṃ vinā netuṃ vāñchati vāsanā suradhunītīre'nurūpaṃ vayaḥ // 2374	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyaste'pi nitambabhāraphalake khedālaseyaṃ gatiḥ kiṃcit saṃvalitārdhapakṣmaviralālokā dṛśo'ntargatāḥ / tanmanye nibhṛtaṃ tvayādya hṛdaye kaściddhṛto vallabho niśvāsāḥ kathamanyathā dviguṇatāmete tavaivaṃ gatāḥ // 2375	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyaste'pi hi nāma vastuni cirādajñānasaṃbhāvanaṃ śaucāśaucāvivāditā viśakalasmṛtyakṣarāvartanam / vāraṃ vāramṛṇopaghātakathanaṃ ko'pyeṣa ḍambhātmanāṃ prāyo dagdhadurīśavañcanavidhau jāgartyapūrvaḥ kramaḥ // 2376	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
abhyasya pavanavijayaṃ vyākhyāya ca śaivasaṃhitāḥ sakalāḥ / maraṇasamaye gurūṇāṃ pardavadasavo viniṣkrāntāḥ // 2377	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyasya vedamavadhāya ca pūrvatantram ālakṣya śiṣṭacaritāni pṛthagvidhāni / adhyāpanādibhiravāpya dhanaṃ ca bhūri karmāṇi mātaralasāḥ kathamācareyuḥ // 2378	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyasya smaradaṃśakauśalamupādhyāyīrupāsyāvayoḥ krīḍāmnāyarahasyavastuni mitho'pyāsījjigīṣā sakhi / utkampotpulakāṅgasaṃbhṛtaghanasvedāvilastanmayā sadyo niṣpratibhaḥ sa manmathakathāvaitaṇḍikaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ // 2379	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyasyādau śrutimatha gṛhaṃ prāpya labdhvā mahārthān iṣṭvā yajñairjanitatanayaḥ pravrajedāyuṣo'nte / ityācaṣṭe ya iha sa manuryājñavalkyo'pi vā me tāvat kālaṃ pratibhavati cedāyuṣastatpramāṇam // 2380	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
abhyāyāntaṃ jhaṭiti gilituṃ vāyumapyāyatāsye bhīmākāre prakṛtikuṭile baddhanirvyājavaire / prāyeṇetthaṃ kṛtaparicaye pāpini krūrasarpe bhadraśrībhiḥ paricitikathā kīdṛśī mādṛśānām // 2381	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
abhyāvahati kalyāṇaṃ vividhā vāksubhāṣitā / saiva durbhāṣitā rājann anarthāyopapadyate // 2382	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ samyag utpādayati kauśalam / vidhinā tāvadabhyastaṃ yāvat sṛṣṭā mṛgekṣaṇā // 2383	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsakāraṇā vidyā lakṣmīḥ puṇyānusāriṇī / dānānusāriṇī kīrtir buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī // 2384	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsarahitā vidyā nirudyogā nṛpaśriyaḥ / veṣayoṣāśca rāgiṇyo hāsyāyatanamaṅgane // 2385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsaśchandasāṃ daṇḍo jvaradaṇḍaśca laṅghanam / yamadaṇḍo viṣṇubhaktiḥ śatrudaṇḍaḥ śubhā gatiḥ // 2386	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
abhyāsasthitacūtaṣaṇḍagahanasthānādito gehinī grāmaṃ kaṃcidavṛkṣakaṃ virahiṇī tūrṇaṃ vadhūrnīyatām / atrāyāntyacireṇa kokilakulavyāhārajhaṃkāriṇaḥ panthastrījanajīvitaikaharaṇaprauḍhāḥ puro vāsarāḥ // 2387	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyāsāttu sthirasvānta ūrdhvaretāśca jāyate / parānandamayo yogī jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ // 2388	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsāddhāryate vidyā kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate / guṇena jñāyate tvāryaḥ kopo netreṇa gamyate // 2389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsāddhāryate vidyā kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate / guṇairmitrāṇi dhāryante akṣṇā krodhaśca dhāryate // 2390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsānusarī vidyā buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī / udyogānusarī lakṣmīḥ phalaṃ bhāgyānusāri ca // 2391	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsena sthiraṃ cittam abhyāsenānilacyutiḥ / abhyāsena parānando hyabhyāsenātmadarśanam // 2392	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāsenānyasaṃcāro hyabhyāsenānyarūpatā / abhyāsena samutkrāntir abhyāsenāṇimādayaḥ // 2393	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāso ratihetor bhavati narāṇāṃ na vastusadguṇataḥ / satyapi māṃsopacaye rāgāya kucau sphijau na punaḥ // 2394	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyāso hi karmaṇāṃ kauśalamāvahati / na hi sakṛnnipātamātreṇoda- bindurapi grāvaṇi nimnatāmādadhāti // 2395	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyukṣito'si salilairna balāhakānāṃ cāṣāgrapakṣasadṛśaṃ bhṛśamantarāle / mithyaitadānanamidaṃ bhavatastathā hi hemantapadmamiva niṣprabhatāmupaiti // 2396	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyutthānamupāgate gṛhapatau tadbhāṣaṇe namratā tatpādārpitadṛṣṭirāsanavidhistasyopacaryā svayam / supte tatra śayīta tatprathamato jahyācca śayyāmiti prācyaiḥ putri niveditaḥ kulavadhūsiddhāntadharmāgamaḥ // 2397	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ krīḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ / ekatra janmani kṛtaṃ tadanena yūnā janmatraye yadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ // 2398	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyudyatkavalagrahapraṇayinaste śallakīpallavās taccāsphālasahaṃ saraḥ kṣitidhṛtāmityasti ko nihnute / dantastambhaniṣaṇṇaniḥsahakaraḥ śvāsairatiprāṃśubhir yenāyaṃ virahī tu vāraṇapatiḥ svāmin sa vindhyo bhavān // 2399	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
abhyunnatastanayugā taralāyatākṣī dvāri sthitā tadupayānamahotsavāya / sā pūrṇakumbhanavanīrajatoraṇasrak saṃbhāramaṅgalamayatnakṛtaṃ vidhatte // 2400	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyunnatāṅguṣṭhanakhaprabhābhir nikṣepaṇādrāgamivodgirantau / ājahratustaccaraṇau pṛthivyāṃ sthalāravindaśriyamavyavasthām // 2401	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhyunnatānāmaṇurapyudāraṃ paścāt prakopaṃ janayedarīṇām / taṃ cāpramattaḥ prasamīkṣya yāyān- na nāśayed dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭahetoḥ // 2402	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhyunnatā purastād avagāḍhā jaghanagauravāt paścāt / dvāre'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktirdṛśyate'bhinavā // 2403	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyunnate'pi jalade jagadekasāra- sādhāraṇapraṇayahāriṇi hā yadete / ullāsalāsyalalitaṃ taravo na yānti he dāvapāvaka sa tāvaka eva doṣaḥ // 2404	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyunnatevāṅghrinakhāṅkurāṇāṃ dyutirvireje hariṇī dṛśo'syāḥ / puṅkhāvalī pañcaśarā yudhānāṃ lāvaṇyadarpadviguṇīkṛteva // 2405	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
abhyunnato'si salilaiḥ paripūrito'si tvāmarthayanti vihagāstṛṣitāstathaite / kālaḥ payodhara paropakṛtestavāyaṃ caṇḍānilavyatikare kva bhavān kva te vā // 2406	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyupayuktāḥ sadbhir gatāgatairaharahaḥ prakhindānāḥ / kṛpaṇajanasaṃnikarṣaṃ prāpyārthāḥ prasvapantīva // 2407	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhyullasanti vinivāritacandanānām eṇīdṛśāṃ vapuṣi kuṅkumapatralekhāḥ / abhyāgatāḥ karasarojapadāravinda- saṃrakṣaṇāya kiraṇā iva tigmabhānoḥ // 2408	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
abhyuṣṇāt saghṛtādannād acchidrāccaiva vāsasaḥ / aparapreṣyabhāvācca bhūya icchan patatyadhaḥ // 2409	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyetya yācito'pi tyaktvā lajjāṃ mayā vigatalajjaḥ / cicchedaiṣa mamāśāṃ sahasā pratiṣedhaśastreṇa // 2410	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhracchāyā khalaprītiḥ samudrānte ca medinī / alpenaiva vinaśyanti yauvanāni dhanāni ca // 2411	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhracchāyā khalaprītir navasasyāni yoṣitaḥ / kiṃcitkālopabhogyāni yauvanāni dhanāni ca // 2412	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhracchāyā khalaprītir veśyārāgo vibhūtayaḥ / mahībhujāṃ prasādaśca pañcaite cañcalāḥ smṛtāḥ // 2413	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhracchāyā tṛṇādagniḥ khalaprītiḥ sthale jalam / veśyārāgaḥ kumitraṃ ca ṣaḍete budbudopamāḥ // 2414	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhracchāyā tṛṇādagniḥ parādhīnaṃ ca yat sukham / ajñāneṣu ca vairāgyaṃ kṣiprametad vinaśyati // 2415	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhradhvānairmukharitadiśaḥ śreṇayastoyadānāṃ dhārāsārairdharaṇivalayaṃ sarvataḥ plāvayanti / tena snehaṃ vahati vipulaṃ matsakhīyuktametat tvam niḥsneho yadasi tadidaṃ nātha me vismayāya // 2416	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
abhrapuṣpamapi ditsati śītaṃ sārthinā vimukhatā yadabhāji / stokakasya khalu cañcupuṭena mlānirullasati tadghanasaṃghe // 2417	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
abhravṛndaṃ viśākhāntaṃ prasūtyantaṃ ca yauvanam / rājyāntaṃ narakaṃ tadvad yācanāntaṃ hi gauravam // 2418	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭamadarāgaṃ mṛgekṣaṇam / idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava tadguṇabhūṣitam // 2419	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amajjadākaṇṭhamasau sudhāsu priyaṃ priyāyā vacanaṃ nipīya / dviṣanmukhe'pi svadate stutiryā tanmiṣṭatā neṣṭamukhe tvameyā // 2420	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amadayanmadhugandhasanāthayā kisalayādharasaṃgatayā manaḥ / kusumasaṃbhṛtayā navamallikā smitarucā tarucāruvilāsinī // 2421	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
amanaskaṃ gate citte jāyate karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ / yathā citrapaṭe dagdhe dahyate citrasaṃcayaḥ // 2422	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amantramakṣaraṃ nāsti nāsti mūlamanauṣadham / ayogyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yojakastatra durlabhaḥ // 2423	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amantramakṣaraṃ nāsti nāsti mūlamanauṣadham / nirdhanā pṛthivī nāsti hyāmnāyāḥ khalu durlabhāḥ // 2424	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amandataravāryagradhārāhatamahībhṛtaḥ / citracāpadharā vīrā vidyotante ghanā iva // 2425	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amandamaṇinūpurakvaṇanacārucārīkramaṃ jhaṇajjhaṇitamekhalāskhalitatārahāracchaṭam / idaṃ taralakaṅkaṇāvaliviśeṣavācālitaṃ mano harati subhruvaḥ kimapi kandukakrīḍitam // 2426	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
amandamattamātaṅga āsārābhyudayānvitaḥ / ityādilakṣaṇopetaḥ skandhāvāraḥ praśasyate // 2427	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amandānandaniṣyandam apāstānyakriyākramam / jagajjanmotsave tasyāḥ pītāmṛtamivābhavat // 2428	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amandānandānāṃ galadalaghusaṃtāpavipadāṃ padāmbhojadvandvaṃ śirasi dadhatāminduśirasaḥ / kadā naḥ kālindīsalilaśabalairambarasarit taraṅgairaṅgārībhavati bhavabandhendhanacayaḥ // 2429	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amanyatāsau kusumeṣu garbhagaṃ parāgamandhaṃkaraṇaṃ viyoginām / smareṇa mukteṣu purā purāraye tadaṅgabhasmeva śareṣu saṃgatam // 2430	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amaratarukusumasaurabha- sevanasaṃpūrṇasakalakāmasya / puṣpāntaraseveyaṃ bhramarasya viḍambanā mahatī // 2431	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amarayuvatigītodgrīvasāraṅgaśṛṅgo- llikhitaśaśisudhāmbhaḥśādvalārāmaramyām / surapatigajagaṇḍasraṃsidānāmbudhārā prasavasurabhimāśāṃ vāsavīyāṃ namāmi // 2432	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
amarīmukhasīdhumādhurīṇāṃ laharī kācana cāturī kalānām / taralīkurute mano madīyaṃ muralīnādaparaṃparā murāreḥ // 2433	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
amarukakavitvaḍamaruka- nādena vinuhnutā na saṃcarati / śṛṅgārabhaṇitiranyā dhanyānāṃ śravaṇavivareṣu // 2434	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amarairamṛtaṃ na pītamabdher na ca hālāhalamulbaṇaṃ hareṇa / vidhinā nihitaṃ khalasya vāci dvayametad bahirekamantaranyat // 2435	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
amarairgataṃ madhukaraiścalitaṃ pravaraiḥ prayātamapi padmadṛśām / vibhave gate sakalameva gataṃ dhruvamekamañcati yaśaḥ sarasaḥ // 2436	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
amartyāḥ santu martyā vā cetanāḥ santvacetanāḥ / dānameva puraskṛtya stūyante bhuvanaistribhiḥ // 2437	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amarṣiṇā kṛtyamiva kṣamāśrayaṃ madoddhateneva hitaṃ priyaṃ vacaḥ / balīyasā tadvidhineva pauruṣaṃ balaṃ nirastaṃ na rarāja jiṣṇunā // 2438	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amarṣopagṛhītānāṃ manyusaṃtaptacetasām / parasparāpakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ // 2439	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amalamṛṇālakāṇḍakamanīyakapolaruces taralasalīlanīlanalinapratiphulladṛśaḥ / vikasadaśokaśoṇakarakāntibhṛtaḥ sutanor madalulitāni hanta lalitāni haranti manaḥ // 2440	narkuṭaka [17: njBjjlg]
amalātmasu pratiphalannabhitas taruṇīkapolaphalakeṣu muhuḥ / visasāra sāndrataramindurucām adhikāvabhāsitadiśāṃ nikaraḥ // 2441	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
amalīmasamacchidram akrauryamatisundaram / adeyamapratigrāhyam aho jñānaṃ mahādhanam // 2442	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātyaḥ śūra eva syād yuddhasaṃpanna eva ca / tasmādapi bhayaṃ rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojanam // 2443	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātyarāṣṭradurgāṇi kośo daṇḍaśca pañcamaḥ / etāḥ prakṛtayastajjñair vijigīṣorudāhṛtāḥ // 2444	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātyādyāḥ prakṛtayo mitrāntā rājyamucyate / aśeṣarājyavyasanāt pārthivavyasanaṃ guru // 2445	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
amātye daṇḍa āyatto daṇḍe vainayikī kriyā / nṛpatau koṣarāṣṭre tu dūte saṃdhiviparyayau // 2446	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpathamāśritaḥ / nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // 2447	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātyo yuvarājaśca bhujāvetau mahīpateḥ / mantrī netraṃ hi tadbhinna etasminnapi tadvadhaḥ // 2448	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amātsaryaṃ budhāḥ prāhur dānaṃ dharme ca saṃyamam / avasthitena nityaṃ ca satyenāmatsarī bhavet // 2449	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amānitaṃ hi yudhyeta kṛtamānārthasaṃgraham / na vimānimatyarthaṃ pradīptakrodhapāvakam // 2450	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
amānuṣaṃ sattvamantar yoginaṃ praviśedyadi / vāyvagnidhāraṇā cainaṃ dehasaṃsthaṃ vinirdahet // 2451	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
amānenāpi bhavatā dānamānādibhirguṇaiḥ / āśritaḥ sarva evāyaṃ samānaḥ kriyate janaḥ // 2452	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
amāyayaiva varteta na kathaṃcana māyayā / budhyetāriprayuktāṃ ca māyāṃ nityaṃ susaṃvṛtaḥ // 2453	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amāvāsyāmaṣṭamīṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ caturdaśīm / brahmacārī bhavennityam apyṛtau snātako dvijaḥ // 2454	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitaṃ madhu tatkathā mama śravaṇaprāghuṇakīkṛtā janaiḥ / madanānalabodhane bhavet khaga dhāyyā dhigadhairyadhāriṇaḥ // 2455	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
amitaḥ samitaḥ prāptair utkarṣairharṣada prabho / ahitaḥ sahitaḥ sādhuyaśobhirasatāmasi // 2456	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitaguṇo'pi padārtho doṣeṇaikena nindito bhavati / nikhilarasāyanamahito gandhenogreṇa laśuna iva // 2457	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amitadyutirākarāt prasūtiḥ pariśuddhā ca mahāmaṇerviśeṣaḥ / makuṭe caraṇāṅgulīyake vā viniveśaḥ punarasya śilpitantram // 2458	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca / karma cārabhate duṣṭaṃ tamāhurmūḍhacetasam // 2459	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca / śubhaṃ vettyaśubhaṃ pāpaṃ bhadraṃ daivahato naraḥ // 2460	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti vaḥ / mitrāṇi tasya naśyanti amitraṃ naṣṭameva ca // 2461	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitraṃ naiva muñceta bruvantaṃ karuṇānyapi / duḥkhaṃ tatra na kurvīta hanyāt pūrvāpakāriṇam // 2462	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitramapi ceddīnaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇamāgatam / vyasane yo'nugṛhṇāti sa vai puruṣasattamaḥ // 2463	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitrapramitā hyetā gataśraddhāḥ sudāruṇaḥ / mūlapravādena viṣaṃ prayacchanti jighāṃsavaḥ // 2464	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
amitravyasanānmitram utthitaṃ yadvirajyati / arivyasanasiddhyā tac chatruṇaiva prasidhyati // 2465	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitrāṇāṃ vadhe yukto mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahe rataḥ / trivargaphalabhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate // 2466	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitrādunnatiṃ prāpya nonnato'smīti viśvaset / tasmāt prāpyonnatiṃ naśyet prāvāra iva kīṭakaḥ // 2467	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitrānapi kurvīta mitrānyupacayāvahān / ahite vartamānāni mitrāṇyapi parityajet // 2468	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitre viśvāsaḥ śvapacakarake saumikarasaḥ kapāle gaṅgāmbhaḥ khalapariṣadaṅke sujanatā / parikṣīṇācāre śrutamanupanīte ca nigamaḥ svataḥsiddhāṃ śuddhiṃ tyajati viparītaṃ ca phalati // 2469	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amitro na vimoktavyaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahvapi bruvan / kṛpā tasmin na kartavyā hanyādevāpakāriṇam // 2470	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amitro mitratāṃ yāti mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati / sāmarthyayogāt kāryāṇāṃ tadgatyā hi sadā gatiḥ // 2471	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
amī kārāgāre niviḍanalinīnālanigaḍair nibadhyantāṃ haṃsāḥ prathamavisakandāṅkurabhidaḥ / nave vāsantīnāmudayini vane garbhakalikā- cchido nirdhāryantāṃ parabhṛtayuvāno madakalāḥ // 2472	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amī taṭasamīpanirjharataraṅgariṅgatpayo- jaḍīkṛtapaṭīrabhūruhakuṭīrasaṃcāriṇaḥ / mano vidhurayanti me malayamekhalāmedurāḥ durāsadavanapriyapriyatamārutā mārutāḥ // 2473	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
amī tilāḥ tailika nūnametāṃ snehādavasthāṃ bhavatopanītāḥ / dveṣo'bhaviṣyadyadamīṣu nūnaṃ tadā na jāne kimivākariṣyaḥ // 2474	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amī pānakarambhābhāḥ saptāpi jalarāśayaḥ / tvadyaśorāja haṃsasya pañjaraṃ bhuvanatrayam // 2475	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amī purasthāḥ sakalāḥ sunidritā na nūpuraṃ muñca sukhena yāsyasi / vrajatyapi śrīpatiraṅghrimāśritaṃ hare tavākhyātiriyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 2476	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amī pṛthustambabhṛtaḥ piśaṅgatāṃ gatā vipākena phalasya śālayaḥ / vikāsi vaprāmbhasi gandhasūcitaṃ namanti nighrātumivāsyatotpalam // 2477	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amībhiḥ saṃsiktestava kimu phalaṃ vāridaghaṭe yadete'pekṣante salilamavaṭebhyo'pi taravaḥ / ayaṃ yukto vyaktaṃ nanu sukhayituṃ cātakaśiśur yadeṣa grīṣme'pi spṛhayati na pāthastvadaparān // 2478	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amībhirākaṇṭhamabhoji tadgṛhe tuṣāradhārāmṛditeva śakarā / hayadviṣadvaṣkayaṇīpayaḥ sutaṃ sudhāhradāt paṅkamivoddhṛtaṃ dadhi // 2479	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
amī vyarthārambhā duradhigamabhūbhṛtparisare viṣaktā lakṣyante vayamiva hatāśā jaladharāḥ / mamevāntaśceṣṭāviphalavipulākāravibhavāḥ svabhūmau yāntīmāḥ pariṇatimasaṃkhyāśca saritaḥ // 2480	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amī śirīṣaprasavāvataṃsāḥ prabhraṃśino vārivihāriṇīnām / pāriplavāḥ srotasi nimnagāyāḥ śaivālalolāṃśchalayanti mīnān // 2481	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amīṣāṃ jantūnāṃ katipayanimeṣasthitijuṣāṃ viyoge dhīrāṇāṃ ka iha paritāpasya viṣayaḥ / kṣaṇādutpadyante vilayamapi yānti kṣaṇamamī na ke'pi sthātāraḥ suragiripayodhiprabhṛtayaḥ // 2482	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ tulitabisinīpatrapayasāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāsmābhirvigalitavivekairvyavasitam / yadāḍhyānāmagre draviṇamadaniḥsaṃjñamanasāṃ kṛtaṃ vītavrīḍairnijaguṇakathāpātakamapi // 2483	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāṃ mañjuśrīruciravadanaśrīkṛtarucāṃ śrutaṃ no nāmāpi kva nu khalu himāṃśuprakṛtayaḥ / mamābhyarṇe dhārṣṭyāccarati punarindīvaramiti krudhevedaṃ prāntāruṇamavatu vo locanayugam // 2484	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāṃ maṇḍalābhogaḥ stanānāmeva śobhate / yeṣāmupetya sotkampā rājāno'pi karapradāḥ // 2485	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amīṣāṃ mohādvā dharaṇidharacūḍāñcalabhuvām abhāgyādvā kaiścinmarakatamaṇiścenna gaṇitaḥ / tathāsau rathyāyāmapi nipatitaḥ kiṃ na kurute samunmīlannīladyutilahariliptā iva diśaḥ // 2486	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāmāmodapraṇayasubhagaṃ saṃgatamabhūt prasūnairunnidraiḥ saha bahubhireva prativanam / udanyā na kvāpi vyaramadaravinde paramamī pibanti svacchandaṃ rasamudarapūraṃ madhulihaḥ // 2487	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāmārūḍhaprasavavivarāṇāṃ madhulihāṃ dhvaniḥ pānthastrīṇāṃ prasarati viyogajvara iva / drumālīnāṃ yūnormana iva sarāgaṃ kisalayaṃ parāgaḥ puṣpāṇāṃ patati madanasyeva viśikhaḥ // 2488	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amīṣāmuṣṇāṃśoḥ kiraṇanikarāṇāṃ paricayāt sarastīkṣṇaṃ mābhūstava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā / durātmāno hyete katipayapayobindurasikān nirasyantaḥ pānthāṃstvayi kimapi śoṣaṃ vidadhati // 2489	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amī samuddhūtasarojareṇunā hṛtā hṛtāsārakaṇena vāyunā / upāgame duścaritā ivāpadāṃ gatiṃ na niścetumalaṃ śilīmukhāḥ // 2490	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amī hi vastrāntaniruddhavaktrāḥ prayānti me dūrataraṃ vayasyāḥ / paro'pi bandhuḥ sukhasaṃsthitasya mitraṃ na kaścid viṣamasthitasya // 2491	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amī hi vṛkṣāḥ phalapuṣpaśobhitāḥ kaṭhoraniṣpandalatopaveṣṭitāḥ / nṛpājñayā rakṣijanena pālitā narāḥ sadārā iva yānti nirvṛtim // 2492	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amī helonmeṣavyasaniṣu palāśeṣu paritaḥ pibanti svacchandaṃ madhu madhuliho mādyati janaḥ / ayaṃ ca pratyagraṃ daśati sahakāraṃ parabhṛto yadīdaṃ marmāntarvidalati ka eṣa vyatikaraḥ // 2493	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṃ kālakṣepaṃ tyaja jalada gambhīramadhuraiḥ kimebhirnirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam / aye paśyāvasthāmakaruṇasamīravyatikara- sphuraddāvajvālāvalijaṭilamūrterviṭapinaḥ // 2494	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto'sau vṛṣabhadhvajena / yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ // 2495	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amuṃ sahāsaprahitekṣaṇāni vyājārdhasaṃdarśitamekhalāni / nālaṃ vikartuṃ janitendraśaṅkaṃ surāṅganāvibhramaceṣṭitāni // 2496	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amuktāṃ bhūṣayantu svāṃ tanuṃ saṃsārasindhugaiḥ / maṇikarṇī tāmraparṇī muktimuktāphalairjanāḥ // 2497	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
amudrakumudatviṣaḥ sphuritaphenalakṣmīspṛśo marālakulavibhramāḥ śapharaphālalīlābhṛtaḥ / jayanti girijāpatestaralamaulimandākinī- taraṅgacayacumbinastuhinadīdhiteraṃśavaḥ // 2498	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
amudro'pi varaṃ kūpaḥ samudreṇāpi tena kim / susvādu salilaṃ yatra pīyate pathikaiḥ pathi // 2499	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amunā marukūpena ke ke nāma na vañcitāḥ / rudatpathikanetrāmbupicchilaprāntabhūminā // 2500	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amunā yamunājalakelikṛtā sahasā tarasā parirabhya bhṛtā / hariṇā hariṇī mṛganetravatī navayauvanayauvanabhāravatī // 2501	toṭaka [12: ssss]
amunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanā / navapallavasaṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanuṃ vibhāvasau // 2502	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
amunaiva pathāgatāgataṃ kṛtavānadya manoharo hariḥ / sakhi durjanabhītayā mayā hatayā hanta ciraṃ na vīkṣitaḥ // 2503	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
amuṣminnārāme tarubhirabhirāme viṭapinaḥ sphuṭaṃ nṛtyadbhṛṅgī vividhanavasaṃgītakalanāt / parānandaiḥ pūrṇāḥ ka iva tava varṇāvalipada- kramaśrotā vettā dvijavara śuka śrāmyasi kutaḥ // 2504	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣminnudyānadrumakuharanīrandhrabharite tamaḥkhaṇḍe piṇḍīkṛtabahalakālāyasaghane / yatāmadyāsmākaṃ kathamapi puronyastacaraṇaṃ nimeṣe'pyunmeṣe nahi nahi viśeṣo nayanayoḥ // 2505	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣminnudyāne vihagakhala eṣa pratikalaṃ vilolaḥ kākolaḥ kvaṇati khalu yāvat kaṭutaram / sakhe tāvat kīra draḍhaya hṛdi vācaṃ ca sakalāṃ na maunena nyūno bhavati guṇabhājāṃ guṇagaṇaḥ // 2506	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣmin pañceṣostribhuvanajigīṣoḥ sahacare mukhaṃ rātreratrestanubhuvi rahaścumbati sati / jvalantīrṣyāroṣodayamayatayevoṣadhilatāḥ patadbhṛṅgībhaṅgyā dadhati kumudinyaḥ kaluṣatām // 2507	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣmin saṃnaddhe jalamuci samabhyasya katicit kakārān paryantadviguṇamatarephaprasavinaḥ / sa mādyandātyūhaścalavipulakaṇṭhaḥ prasarati kramodañcattāraḥ kramavaśanamanmandamadhuraḥ // 2508	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣmin saṃsāre parikalitasāretaratayā tadā vidyotkarṣaḥ pariṇatimupaiti śrutividām / yadā mandākinyā madhuravamarālīkalakala- praṇālīvācāle parisarataṭe yānti divasāḥ // 2509	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣmiṃllāvāṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛthujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ / yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ prathamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ // 2510	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣmai caurāya pratinihatamṛtyupratibhiye prabhuḥ prītaḥ prādāduparitanapādadvayakṛte / suvarṇānāṃ koṭīrdaśa daśanakoṭikṣatagirīn gajendrānapyaṣṭau madamuditakūjanmadhulihaḥ // 2511	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣya dorbhyāmaridurgaluṇṭhane dhruvaṃ gṛhītārgaladīrghapīnatā / uraḥśriyā tatra ca gopurasphurat- kapāṭadurdharṣatiraḥprasāritā // 2512	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amuṣya dhīrasya jayāya sāhasī tadā khalu jyāṃ viśikhaiḥ sanāthayan / nimajjayāmāsa yaśāṃsi saṃśaye smarastrilokīvijayārjitānyapi // 2513	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amuṣya muṣitā lakṣmīś cakṣuṣeti na nūtanam / na vedmi kathayatyasyāḥ karṇe lagnaṃ kimutpalam // 2514	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amuṣya vidyā rasanāgranartakī trayīva nītāṅgaguṇena vistaram / agāhatāṣṭādaśatāṃ jigīṣayā navadvayadvīpapṛthagjayaśriyām // 2515	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amuṣyāṃ saṃkrāntau tava taruṇi tāruṇyataraṇe smaro dātā devastrivalitaṭinītīranikaṭe / amū te vakṣojau sakhi sughaṭitau hāṭakaghaṭau mahādānaṃ kasmai vada bhavatu sāraṅganayane // 2516	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣyā lāvaṇyaṃ mṛdulamṛdulānapyavayavān manolaulyaṃ dhātuḥ karakaṭhinatāṃ me vimṛśati / padaṃ citte dhatte matiriti purā paṅkajabhuvā dhruvaṃ kalyāṇīyaṃ kalitasukṛtaireva racitā // 2517	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amuṣyorvībharttuḥ prasṛmaracamūsindhurabhavair avaimi prārabdhe vamathubhiravaśyāyasamaye / na kampantāmantaḥ pratinṛpabhaṭā mlāyatu na tad vadhūvaktrāmbhojaṃ bhavatu na sa teṣāṃ kudivasaḥ // 2518	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
amūni gacchanti yugāni na kṣaṇaḥ kiyat sahiṣye na hi mṛtyurasti me / sa māṃ na kāntaḥ sphuṭamantarujjhitā na taṃ manastacca na kāyavāyavaḥ // 2519	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
amūrkho yo manuṣyāṇāṃ manyusaṃtaptacetasām / parasparopakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ // 2520	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amūrhi bhittvā jaladāntarāṇi paṅkāntarāṇīva mṛṇālasūcyaḥ / patanti candravyasanādvimuktā divo'śrudhārā iva vāridhārāḥ // 2521	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amūlyasya mama svarṇatulākoṭidvayaṃ kiyat / iti kopādivātāmraṃ pādayugmaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ // 2522	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ kirati himāṃśur viṣameva phaṇī samudgirati / guṇameva vakti sādhur doṣamasādhuḥ prakāśayati // 2523	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuśca dvayaṃ dehe pratiṣṭhitam / mṛtyumāpadyate mohāt satyenāpadyate'mṛtam // 2524	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ tadadharabimbe vacaneṣvamṛtaṃ vilokane'pyamṛtam / amṛtabhṛtau kucakumbhau satyaṃ sā sṛṣṭiraparaiva // 2525	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amṛtaṃ durlabhaṃ n ṇāṃ devānāmudakaṃ tathā / pit ṇāṃ durlabhaḥ putras takraṃ śakrasya durlabham // 2526	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amṛtaṃ nāma yat santo mantrajihveṣu juhvati / śobhaiva mandarakṣubdhakṣubhitāmbhodhivarṇanā // 2527	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ bhujyate vidye bhavatīmāśritaiḥ param / anye tu bata dūyante saṃsaranta itastataḥ // 2528	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam / amṛtaṃ guṇavadbhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam // 2529	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ priyadarśanam / amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam // 2530	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣaṇam / amṛtaṃ svapriyā bhāryā hyamṛtaṃ svāmigauravam // 2531	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ svāmigauram / bhāryāmṛtaṃ guṇavatī dhāroṣṇamamṛtaṃ payaḥ // 2532	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: na-vipulā)
amṛtaṃ sadguṇā bhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam / amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ mānabhojanam // 2533	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtajaladheḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ payāṃsi payodharaḥ kirati karakāstārākārā yadi sphaṭikāvanau / tadiha tulanāmānīyante kṣaṇaṃ kaṭhināḥ punaḥ satatamamṛtasyandodgārā giraḥ pratibhāvatām // 2534	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
amṛtadravamādhurīdhurīṇāṃ giramākarṇya kuraṅgalocanāyāḥ / muhurabhyasanaṃ kaṣāyakaṇṭhī kalakaṇṭhī kurute kuhūrutena // 2535	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
amṛtadravairvidadhadabjadṛśām apamārgamoṣadhipatiḥ sma karaiḥ / parito visarpi paritāpi bhṛśaṃ vapuṣo'vatārayati mānaviṣam // 2536	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
amṛtanidhānaṃ ruciraṃ saṃtāpanivartate sadā niratam / candramukhaṃ tava sundari susmitabhāsā vikāsate paritaḥ // 2537	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
amṛtamadhuraiḥ kāñcīnādaiḥ kṛtābhayaḍiṇḍime trivalilaharīlāvaṇyāmbhaḥkaṇotkarakarbure / viṣamanayanajvālājālāvalīḍhaparākramo luṭhati madanastanvaṅgīnāṃ nitambaśilātale // 2538	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
amṛtamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhūnyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ cūtasyāpi prasannarasaṃ phalam / sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyatsvādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt // 2539	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraṃ candraṃ ratiṃ ca ratiṃ tathā prathitamatayaḥ kāmaṃ brūyurmadhūni madhūnyapi / yadi na subhagāsparśāmodaṃ vinā pramude tataḥ sakalamakalaṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ bravīmi punaḥ priye // 2540	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandrastathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi / iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ tadiyamabalā dhatte lakṣmīṃ kathaṃ sakalātmikām // 2541	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
amṛtamayamanaṅgakṣmāruhasyālavālaṃ mṛtadivasakapālaṃ kālakāpālikasya / jayati makaraketoḥ śāṇacakraṃ śarāṇām amarapurapurandhrīdarpaṇaḥ śvetabhānuḥ // 2542	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
amṛtarasavisaravitaraṇa- maraṇottāritasure sati payodhau / kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣmataḍākā bhuvi varākāḥ // 2543	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amṛtarasasārabhūtaḥ sakalakalo makaraketusarvasvam / akhilajananayanasukhakṛt kathamindurvāsare'bhyuditaḥ // 2544	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amṛtavacanalīlāvibhramairannapānaṃ racaya catura kīra bhrāntacitteṣu teṣu / akalitaparasevātāpapāpaḥ piko'sau bhajatu vipinavāṭīmeṣa pīyūṣakaṇṭhaḥ // 2545	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
amṛtasiktamivāṅgamidaṃ yadi bhavati tanvi tavādbhutavīkṣitaiḥ / adharamindukarādapi śubhrayanty aruṇayantyaruṇādapi kiṃ dṛśam // 2546	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
amṛtasyandikiraṇaś candramā nāmato mataḥ / anya evāyamarthātmā viṣaniṣyandidīdhitiḥ // 2547	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtasyandinaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇameghaṃ dvijaḥ smaran / udanyayā na veśantam udanvantaṃ ca vīkṣate // 2548	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtasya pravāhaiḥ kiṃ kāyakṣālanasaṃbhavaiḥ / cirānmitrapariṣvaṅgo yo'sau mūlyavivarjitaḥ // 2549	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtasyeva kuṇḍāni sukhānāmiva rāśayaḥ / rateriva nidhānāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ // 2550	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtasyeva tṛpyeta apamānasya yogavit / viṣavacca jugupseta saṃmānasya sadā dvijaḥ // 2551	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya vai dvijaḥ / sukhaṃ hyavamataḥ śete yo'vamantā sa naśyati // 2552	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtāṃśoḥ kiraṇebhyo- 'jāyata vṛddhirmahodadherudare / kathayanti hāramaṇayo hṛdi tāpamuṣaḥ spṛśanto'pi // 2553	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
amṛtātmani padmānāṃ dveṣṭari snigdhatārake / mukhendau tava satyasmin apareṇa kimindunā // 2554	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtādamṛtaṃ na tāvakād aparaṃ yat tripurārirādarāt / avalambya śiraḥsthalena tad dhṛtahālāhāla eṣa jīvati // 2555	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
amṛtādhmātajīmūtasnigdhasaṃhananasya te / pariṣvaṅgīya vātsalyād ayamutkaṇṭhate janaḥ // 2556	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtāpyāyināṃ n ṇāṃ saṃtoṣo naiva jāyate / gāvastṛṇamivāraṇye prārthayanti navaṃ navam // 2557	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtāyatāmiti vadet pīte bhukte kṣute ca śataṃ jīva / choṭikayā saha jṛmbhā- samaye syātāṃ cirāyurānandau // 2558	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
amṛtā vigataprāṇā sāntaḥ śalyākṛtavraṇā / abaddhā niścalevāste kūṭasaṃsthe mṛge mṛgī // 2559	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtotprekṣaṇe cārur aśeṣajanasajjanaḥ / kavirgaruḍavanmānya indravajrādivṛttakṛt // 2560	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtonmathitaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇair mṛdamutpādya nidhāya nābhicakre / akaronnavaromarājiyaṣṭyā kucakumbhau kusumeṣukumbhakāraḥ // 2561	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
amedhyapūrṇe kṛmijālasaṃkule svabhāvadurgandhini śaucavarjite / kalevare mūtrapurīṣabhājane ramanti mūḍhā viramanti paṇḍitāḥ // 2562	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ameyo mitalokastvam anarthī prārthanāvahaḥ / ajito jiṣṇuratyantam avyakto vyaktakāraṇam // 2563	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amoghakrodhaharṣasya svayaṃ kṛtyānvavekṣiṇaḥ / ātmapratyayakośasya vasudheyaṃ vasuṃdharā // 2564	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amoghā vāsare vidyud amoghaṃ niśi garjitam / amoghā munīnāṃ vāṇī amoghaṃ devadarśanam // 2565	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
amauktikamasauvarṇaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vibhūṣaṇam / devatānāṃ pit ṇāṃ ca bhāgo yena pradīyate // 2566	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ambaraṃ vinayataḥ priyapāṇer yoṣitaśca karayoḥ kalahasya / vāraṇāmiva vidhātumabhīkṣṇaṃ kakṣyayā ca valayaiśca śiśiñje // 2567	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ambaraṃ stimitamambudhārayā vyakta eṣa paritaḥ payodharaḥ / prāvṛṣā kimapi lajjamānayā mīlite ravividhūvilocane // 2568	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
ambaramanūrulaṅghyaṃ vasuṃdharā sāpi vāmanaikapadā / abdhirapi potalaṅghyaḥ satāṃ manaḥ kena tulyaṃ syāt // 2569	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambaramapanaya mugdhe vrajatu vikāśaṃ digambaratā / hārāvalisurataṭinī nakhaśaśimaṇḍalasya kucaśambhoḥ // 2570	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ambaramambuni patramarātiḥ pītamahīnagaṇasya dadāha / yasya vadhūstanayaṃ gṛhamabjā pātu sa vo haralocanavahniḥ // 2571	dodhaka [11: BBBgg]
ambarameṣa ramaṇyai yāminyai vāsaraḥ preyān / adhikaṃ dadau nijāṅkād atha saṃkucitaḥ svayaṃ tasthau // 2572	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
ambaravipinamidānīṃ timiravarāho'vagāhate jaladheḥ / romasu yadasya lagnās tārakajalabindavo bhānti // 2573	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambarāntamavalambitukāmam andhyayā samabhivīkṣya tu kāmam / andhakāramatha gamya tanūnaṃ lajjayeva niragamyata nūnam // 2574	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ambare'mbubharalambipayode mattabarhirucire'drinitambe / puṣpadhāmani kadambakadambe kā gatiḥ pathika kālavilambe // 2575	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
amba śrāmyasi tiṣṭha gorasamahaṃ mathnāmi manthānakaṃ prālambya sthitamīśvaraṃ sarabhasaṃ dīnānano vāsukiḥ / sāsūyaṃ kamalālayā suragaṇaḥ sānandamudyadbhayaṃ rāhuḥ praikṣata yaṃ sa vo'stu śivado gopālabālo hariḥ // 2576	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambā kupyati tāta mūrdhni vidhṛtā gaṅgeyamutsṛjyatāṃ vidvan ṣaṇmukha kā gatirmama ciraṃ mūrdhni sthitāyā vada / kopāveśavaśādaśeṣavadanaiḥ pratyuttaraṃ dattavān ambhodhirjaladhiḥ payodhirudadhirvārāṃ nidhirvāridhiḥ // 2577	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambā tuṣyati na mayā na snuṣayā sāpi nāmbayā na mayā / ahamapi na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣo'yam // 2578	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambāmathārghajalapātrabhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya dūrādapāsaradasau janatā vihastā / pūrṇādivāndhatamasāni tuṣārakānter āryāt pṛthagjanaśatāni hi saṃbhramanti // 2579	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambāyāśca pituśca sadguṇagaṇo yasminnabhivyajyate tasmin svapratibimbiteva nikhilā saivākṛtiḥ sā dyutiḥ / sā vāṇi vinayaḥ sa eva sahajaḥ puṇyānubhāvaḥ sa ca ślāghāyāḥ sadanaṃ sukhasya vasatistenaiva putrī pitā // 2580	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ambā yena sarasvatī sutavatī tasyārpayantī rasān nānācāṭumukhī sa durlaḍitavān khelābhirucchṛṅkhalaḥ / jihvādurvyasanairupadravarujaḥ kurvanti ye duḥsutām tān dṛṣṭvārthamitastato nikhanati svaṃ niḥsvamātanvatī // 2581	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambā śete'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇīratra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tatheha / asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ yuvatyā kathitamabhimataṃ vyāhṛtivyājapūrvam // 2582	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ambujamambuni jātaṃ nahi dṛṣṭaṃ jātamambujādambu / adhunā tadviparītaṃ caraṇasarojādvinirgatā gaṅgā // 2583	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ambujamambuni magnaṃ trāsādākāśamāśritaścandraḥ / samprati kaḥ paripanthī yaṃ prati kopāruṇaṃ vadanam // 2584	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambudaḥ kṛtapado nabhastale toyapūraparipūritodadhiḥ / goṣpadasya bharaṇe'pmaśaktimān ityasatyamabhidhīyate katham // 2585	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
ambudherudagamadvidhubhaṅgyā nūnamaurvaśikhibhāsmanapiṇḍaḥ / yatkilāsya ghaṭate nahi tṛptiḥ khaṇḍitājanadṛgambusaridbhiḥ // 2586	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ambeyaṃ neyamambā nahi kharakapiśaṃ śmaśru tasyā mukhārdhe tāto'yaṃ naiṣa tātaḥ stanamurasi piturdṛṣṭavānnāhamatra / keyaṃ ko'yaṃ kimetadyuvatiratha pumān vastu kiṃ syāt tṛtīyaṃ śaṃbhoḥ saṃvīkṣya rūpādapasarati guhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ pātu yuṣmān // 2587	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ambhaḥ kardamatāmupaiti sahasā paṅkadravaḥ pāṃśutāṃ pāṃśurvāraṇakarṇatālapavanair dikprāntanīhāratām / nimnatvaṃ girayaḥ samaṃ viṣamatāṃ śūnyaṃ janasthānakaṃ niryāte tvayi rājyapāla bhavati tyaktasvabhāvaṃ jagat // 2588	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhaḥ kumbhāmbhoruha- cāmarabhṛṅgārahemarūpyāṇi / phalatāmbūlavarāmbara- madirāmīnājyabhojyāni // 2589	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambhaḥsaṃbhṛtimantharāmbudaravaiḥ śālūragarjābhara- prārabdhapriyaviprayuktayuvatījīvagrahe bhīṣaṇāḥ / vidyuddanturitāndhakārapaṭalā gāmbhīryabaddhārava- sthairyonmūlanaśaktayaḥ kathamamī niryānti varṣāniśāḥ // 2590	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhasaḥ parimāṇena unnataṃ kamalaṃ bhavet / svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ // 2591	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ambhasaḥ prasṛtīraṣṭau ravāvanudite pibet / vātapittakaphān hatvā jīvedvarṣaśataṃ sukhī // 2592	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambhasā bhidyate setus tathā mantro'pyarakṣitaḥ / paiśunyād bhidyate sneho vāgbhirbhidyeta kātaraḥ // 2593	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambhasā śamamāyāti muṣṭimeyaśikhaḥ śikhī / pravṛddho'dhaḥsthitaiḥ paścāt saṃtaptaireva dṛśyate // 2594	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambhasi taraṇisutāyāḥ stambhitataraṇiḥ sa devakīsūnuḥ / ātaravirahitagopyāḥ kātaramukhamīkṣate smeraḥ // 2595	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ambhastattvaṃ bhūmitattvaṃ ca vāyos tattvaṃ tejastattvamākāśatattvam / pañcaitāni prāṇavāyuṃ militvā nāḍīyugme prāṇināṃ saṃcaranti // 2596	śālinī [11: mttgg]
ambhāṃsi jalajantūnāṃ durgaṃ durganivāsinām / svabhūmiḥ śvāpadādīnāṃ rājñāṃ sainyaṃ paraṃ balam // 2597	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambhojagarbhasukumāratanustadāsau kaṇṭhagrahe prathamarāgaghane vilīya / sadyaḥ patanmadanamārgaṇarandhramārgair manye mama priyatamā hṛdayaṃ praviṣṭā // 2598	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambhojapatrāyatalocanānām ambhodhidīrghāsviha dīrghikāsu / samāgatānāṃ kuṭilairapāṅgair anaṅgabāṇaiḥ prahatā yuvānaḥ // 2599	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ambhojaprakaro'tha ketakakulaṃ kundotkaraḥ kairava- vrāto malligaṇo'tha campakacayo jātīgaṇo vāthavā / no cedādaramātanoti pika tatkhedaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthā yasmāt kvāpi kadāpi ko'pi bhavitā yastvadguṇaṃ jñāsyati // 2600	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhojākṣyāḥ puravanalatā dhāmni saṃketabhājaś cetonāthe cirayati bhṛśaṃ mohanidrāṃ gatāyāḥ / svacchaṃ nābhihradavalayitaṃ kāntaratnāṃśujālaṃ toyabhrāntyā pibati hariṇī vismayaṃ ca prayāti / 2601	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
ambhojāni ghanāghanavyavahito'pyullāghayatyaṃśumān dūrastho'pi payodharo'tiśiśirasparśaṃ karotyātapam / śaktiḥ kāpyaparikṣatāsti mahatāṃ svairaṃ daviṣṭhānyaho yanmāhātmyavaśena yānti ghaṭanāṃ kāryāṇi niryantraṇām // 2602	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhojinīvanavilāsanivāsameva haṃsasya hanti nitarāṃ kupito vidhātā / na tvasya dugdhajalabhedavidhau prasiddhāṃ vaidagghyakīrtimapahartumasau samarthaḥ // 2603	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambhodastanitaṃ niśamya kariṇāṃ bṛṃheti raṃhoyutas sadyastyaktamahīdhrakandaragṛhaḥ kautūhalī nirgataḥ / etasmin kṣaṇa eva caṇḍamaśanerākarṇya śabdaṃ krudhā taṃ pratyutpatati svagarjitajitaṃ dhīro mṛgāṇāṃ patiḥ // 2604	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhodhiḥ sthalatāṃ sthalaṃ jaladhitāṃ dhūlīvalaḥ śailatāṃ merurmṛtkaṇatāṃ tṛṇaṃ kuliśatāṃ vajraṃ tṛṇaklībatām / vahniḥ śītalatāṃ himaṃ dahanatāmāyāti yasyecchayā līlādurlalitādbhutavyasanine daivāya tasmai namaḥ // 2605	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhodhikṣiptamuktāruciharicaraṇodgīrṇagaṅgāmbutulyaṃ kālindīphenakāntisphuritaphaṇadharonmuktanirmokarociḥ / karṇāṭīkuntalāntarvigalitasumanodāmaramyaṃ samantāc chrīkhaṇḍālepalakṣmīmupanayati yaśo yasya khaḍgaprasūtam // 2606	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ambhodhīnāṃ tamālaprabhavakisalayaśyāmavelāvanānām ā pārebhyaścaturṇāṃ caṭulatimikulakṣobhitāntarjalānām / mālevāmlānapuṣpā tava nṛpatiśatairuhyate yā śirobhiḥ sā mayyeva skhalantī kathayati vinayālaṃkṛtaṃ te prabhutvam // 2607	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ambhodhereva jātāḥ kati jagati na te hanta santīha śaṅkhā yān saṃgṛhya bhramanti pratibhavanamamī bhikṣavo jīvanāya / ekaḥ śrīpāñcajanyo hariharakamalakroḍahaṃsāyamāno yasyādhvānairamānairasuravaravadhūvargagarbhā galanti // 2608	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ambhodherjalayantramandiraparispande'pi nidrāṇayoḥ śrīnārāyaṇayorghanaṃ vighaṭayatyūṣmā samāliṅganam / kiṃ cottaptaviyatkapālaphalake kaṅkālaśeṣaśriyaṃ candraṃ marmarayanti parpaṭamiva krūrā raveraṃśavaḥ // 2609	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhodhervaḍavāmukhānalajhalājvālopagūḍhāntarā vyāmohādapibannapaḥ sphuṭamamī tarṣeṇa paryāvilāḥ / uddeśasphuradindracāpavalayajvālāpadeśādaho dahyante kathamanyathārdhamalināṅgāradyutastoyadāḥ // 2610	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhodhau viharantamantarahitaiḥ kīrtiṃ vahantaṃ guṇais taṃ mainākamavajragarvaviṣayau pakṣau dadhānaṃ numaḥ / āsanne suralokamānuṣajagatpātālapārātyaye yaḥ pāthonidhilaṅghinaḥ pathi marutsūnorvyanaiṣīt klamam // 2611	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhonidheranavagītaguṇaikarāśer uccaiḥśravaprabhṛtiṣu prasabhaṃ hṛteṣu / āśvāsanaṃ yadavakṛṣṭamabhūnmaharṣe toyaṃ tvayā tadapi niṣkaruṇena pītam // 2612	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambho'pi pravahatsvabhāvamaśanairāśyānamaśmāyate grāvāmbhaḥ sravati dravatvamuditodrekeṣu cāveyuṣaḥ / kālasyāskhalitaprabhāvarabhasaṃ bhāti prabhutve'dbhute kasyāmutra vidhātṛśaktighaṭite mārge nisargaḥ sthiraḥ // 2613	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhobindugrahaṇarabhasāṃścātakān vīkṣamāṇāḥ śreṇībhūtāḥ parigaṇanayā nirdiśanto valākāḥ / tvāmāsādya stanitasamaye mānayiṣyanti siddhāḥ sotkampāni priyasahacarīsaṃbhramāliṅgitāni // 2614	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
ambho bhajasva ciramasya yathābhilāṣam etanna tāṇḍavaya sairibha kānanaṃ ca / duśceṣṭitena yadanena bhṛśaṃ tavaiṣa dhvastāśayo bhavati niṣkaluṣastaḍāgaḥ // 2615	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambhobhistanakumbhayostava ghanaśleṣāt samutkīrṇatāṃ yātāyā śukavakrimapraṇayinī seyaṃ na luptā lipiḥ / kiṃ caitāṃ kusumeṣu kuñjaraśironakṣatramālāṃ tiro- dhitsurniṣphalameva majjasi nabhaḥ svacche sarovāriṇi // 2616	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhomucāṃ salilamudgiratāṃ niśīthe tāḍīvaneṣu nibhṛtasthitakarṇatālāḥ / ākarṇayanti kariṇo'rdhanimīlitākṣā dhārāravaṃ daśanakoṭiniṣaṇṇahastāḥ // 2617	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambhorāśirivāsi sattvanilayo no mandarakṣo bhavān kalyāṇaprakṛtiḥ sumeruriva kiṃ devaḥ surāpāśrayaḥ / sacchāyo na tu rūḍhadustaralatastvaṃ kalpavṛkṣo yathā taiḥ kurvanti tulāṃ tathāpi bhavato mūḍhāḥ kavīnāṃ dhiyaḥ // 2618	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ambhoruhaṃ vadanamambakamindukāntaḥ pāthonidhiḥ kusumacāpabhṛto vikāraḥ / prādurbabhūva subhaga tvayi dūrasaṃsthe caṇḍālacandradhavalāsu niśāsu tasyāḥ // 2619	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ambhoruhamaye snātvā vāpīpayasi kāminī / dadāti bhaktisaṃpannā puṣpasaubhāgyakāmyayā // 2620	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambhoruhākṣi śaṃbhoś caraṇāvārādhitau kena / yasmai vicalitavadanā madanākūtaṃ vibhāvayasi // 2621	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
ambhovāhamuradviṣo nivasanaṃ dhvāntādridivyauṣadhī kandarpasya vilāsacampakadhanurvarṣālatāmañjarī / lekhā vyomakaśopale viracitā cāmīkarasya sphurad dhāmnaḥ pānthivilāsinījanamanaḥ kampāya śampābhavat // 2622	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
amlānapaṅkajā mālā kaṇṭhe rāmasya sītayā / mudhā budhā bhramantyatra pratyakṣe'pi kriyāpade // 2623	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amlānamālyābharaṇāmbarasya varāṅganānandanamandirasya / nityaprakāśotsavasevitasya svargasya vittasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ // 2624	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amlānastabakanti kuntalabhare sīmantasīmāsvimāḥ sindūranti kapolabhittiṣu milanmaireyarāganti ca / prauḍherṣyādyutiviśramanti nayanopānte kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ bimboṣṭhe kṣitipāla bālataraṇerlākṣārasanti tviṣaḥ // 2625	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
amlānirāmodabharaśca divyaḥ puṣpeṣu bhūyādbhavadaṅgasaṅgāt / dṛṣṭaṃ prasūnopamayā mayānyan na dharmaśarmobhayakarmaṭhaṃ yat // 2626	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
amlāno balavāñśūraś chāyevānugataḥ sadā / satyavādī mṛdurdāntaḥ sa rājavasatiṃ vaset // 2627	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ kanakanirmitaḥ sakalabhūdharādunnataḥ sahasranayanāśrayaḥ sapadi labdhabhāgyodayaḥ / kucopari parisphurattaruṇicārucelāñcalaṃ manāgapi nivāraya tyajatu garvamurvīdharaḥ // 2628	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ayaṃ kāṇaḥ śukro viṣamacaraṇaḥ sūryatanayaḥ kṣatāṅgo'yaṃ rāhurvikalamahimā śītakiraṇaḥ / ajānānasteṣāmapi niyatakarmasvakaphalaṃ grahagrāmagrastā vayamiti jano'yaṃ pralapati // 2629	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ kāmo nijāmo vā tvayā kimavadhāritam / iti dṛṣṭiriva praṣṭuṃ śrutiṃ śrayati subhruvām // 2630	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ khalu mṛṇālinīnavavilāsavaihāsikas tviṣāṃ vitapate patiḥ sapadi dṛśyamānā nijāḥ / stanau pulakayanti cotpaladṛśāṃ priyoraḥsthale viparyasitavṛttayo ghusṛṇapaṅkapatrāṅkurāḥ // 2631	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ayaṃ ca suratajvālaḥ kāmāgniḥ praṇayendhanaḥ / narāṇāṃ yatra hūyante yauvanāni dhanāni ca // 2632	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ jyotsnājānistava vadanadūno'mbaraguhāṃ praviṣṭastatrāpi prasṛtamidamenaṃ dṛḍhatamaḥ / iti trāsodrekakramagalitasattvaḥ kṣayagadī vidhirdagdho dīnaṃ vyathayati nidānaṃ hi mṛdutā // 2633	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ tasyā rathakṣobhād aṃsenāṃso nipīḍitaḥ / ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre'smiñ śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ // 2634	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ tāvad bāṣpastruṭita iva muktāmaṇisaro visarpan dhārābhirluṭhati dharaṇīṃ jarjarakaṇaḥ / niruddho'pyāvegaḥ sphuradadharanāsāpuṭatayā pareṣāmunneyo bhavati ca bharādhmātahṛdayaḥ // 2635	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ / karoti kasya no bāle pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ // 2636	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ nidhānaṃ madhuradhvaniḥ / rekhātrayamitīvāsyāḥ sūtritaṃ kaṇṭhakandale // 2637	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ daridro bhaviteti vaidhasīṃ lipiṃ lalāṭe'rthijanasya jāgratīm / mṛṣā na cakre'lpitakalpapādapaḥ praṇīya dāridryadaridratāṃ nalaḥ // 2638	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayaṃ dūtārthasaṃkṣepaḥ pratyarthaniyatā giraḥ / prayojanaṃ kriyotpādi kiyacchakyeta bhāṣitum // 2639	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ dūrabhrāntaḥ paṭutarapipāsākulamanāḥ kapole te mattadvipa nipatitaḥ ṣaṭpadayuvā / tvamapyetāṃ pīnaśravaṇadaradolāvyasanitāṃ vimuñca svācchandyādapanayatu tāvat tṛṣamimām // 2640	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ dvīpī priyāṃ leḍhi jihvāgreṇa punaḥ punaḥ / prītimāyāti ca tayā lihyamānaḥ svakāntayā // 2641	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ dhārāvāhastaḍidiyamiyaṃ dagdhakarakā sa cāyaṃ nirghoṣaḥ sa ca ravavaśo bhekanicayaḥ / itīva pratyaṅgaprathitamadanāgniṃ kṛśatanur ghanaśvāsotkṣepairjvalayati muhurmṛtyuvaśinī // 2642	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ dhūrto māyāvinayamadhurādasya caritāt sakhi pratyūṣi tvaṃ prakṛtisarale paśyasi na kim / kapole yallākṣārasabahalarāgapraṇayinīm imāṃ dhatte mudrāmanaticiravṛttāntapiśunām // 2643	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ nijaḥ paro veti gaṇanā laghucetasām / udāracaritānāṃ tu vasudhaiva kuṭumbakam // 2644	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ netrādatrerajani rajanīvallabha iti bhramaḥ ko'yaṃ prajñāparicayaparādhīnamanasām / sudhānāmādhāraḥ sa khalu ratibimbādharasudhā- rasāsekasnigdhādajani nayanāt puṣpadhanuṣaḥ // 2645	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ paṭaḥ sūtradaridratāṃ gato hyayaṃ paṭaśchidraśatairalaṃkṛtaḥ / ayaṃ paṭaḥ prāvarituṃ na śakyate hyayaṃ paṭaḥ saṃvṛta eva śobhate // 2646	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayaṃ paṭo me pituraṅgabhūṣaṇaṃ pitāmahādyairupabhuktayauvanaḥ / alaṃkariṣyatyatha putrapautrakān mayādhunā puṣpavadeva dhāryate // 2647	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayaṃ padmāsanāsīnaś cakravāko virājate / yugādau bhagavān vedhā vinirmitsuriva prajāḥ // 2648	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ pīnastanābhogasaubhāgyavibhavocitaḥ / draviṇopārjanasyaiva kālaḥ kuvalayekṣaṇe // 2649	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ puraḥ pārvaṇaśarvarīśaḥ kiṃ darpaṇo'yaṃ rajanīramaṇyāḥ / yatastadīyaṃ pratibimbamasmin saṃlakṣyate lāñchanakaitavena // 2650	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ayaṃ prabhurayaṃ bhṛtya iti yā jagataḥ sthitiḥ / phalaṃ vijayate tatra śrīprasādāprasādayoḥ // 2651	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraścāyaṃ mamāyamayamanyataḥ / iti brahmanna jānāmi tena jīvāmyanāmayaḥ // 2652	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ mandadyutirbhāsvān astaṃ prati yiyāsati / udayaḥ patanāyeti śrīmato bodhayan narān // 2653	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ mama dahatyaṅgam ambhojadalasaṃstaraḥ / hutāśanapratinidhir dāhātmā nanu yujyate // 2654	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam / kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano'sāviti ciraṃ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ // 2655	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ mukhasaroruhabhramaravibhramaḥ subhruvāṃ kucasthalakuraṅgakaḥ pṛthunitambalīlāśikhī / na yauvanamadodayaścarati cārukānticchaṭā- kulatrivalikūlinīpulinarājahaṃsaściram // 2656	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ayaṃ mṛgaḥ samāyāti mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate / tato vegāt palāyasva tvaritaistvaritaiḥ padaiḥ // 2657	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ meghavyūhe balini paripanthinyapasṛte śarajjanyāḥ svairaṃ hasitamiva harṣādaviratam / payaḥpūrabhraṃśakramajanitasopānasikate nadītīre dhīraṃ carati viśadaḥ khañjanagaṇaḥ // 2658	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ me vāggumpho viśadapadavaidagdhyamadhuraḥ sphuradbandho vandhyaḥ parahṛdi kṛtārthaḥ kavihṛdi / kaṭākṣo vāmākṣyā daradalitanetrāntagalitaḥ kumāre niḥsāraḥ sa tu kimapi yūnaḥ sukhayati // 2659	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ ratnākaro'mbhodhir ityasevi dhanāśayā / dhanaṃ dūre'stu vadanam apūri kṣāravāribhiḥ // 2660	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ rasālaḥ sukṛtaikasālaḥ pravālamālollasadālavālaḥ / mudaḥ pradātā bhavitā kathaṃ me varāṅganetyaśrumukhī śuśoca // 2661	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
ayaṃ revākuñjaḥ kusumaśarasevāsamucitaḥ samīro'yaṃ velāvanavidaladelāparimalaḥ / iyaṃ prāvṛḍ dhanyā navajaladavinyāsacaturā smarādhīnaṃ cetaḥ sakhi kimapi kartuṃ mṛgayate // 2662	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ lolanmuktāvalikiraṇamālāparikaraḥ sphuṭasyendorlakṣmīṃ kṣapayitumalaṃ manmathasuhṛt / viśālaḥ śyāmāyāḥ skhalitaghananīlāṃśukavṛtiḥ stanābhogaḥ snihyanmasṛṇaghusṛṇālepasubhagaḥ // 2663	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ vahati dhātāraṃ yadvā devīṃ sarasvatīm / pakṣadvayamapi sthāne rājahaṃsasya nirmalam // 2664	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ vārāmeko nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito'smābhistṛṣṇātaralitamanobhirjalanidhiḥ / ka evaṃ jānīte nijakarapuṭīkoṭaragataṃ kṣaṇādenaṃ tāmyattimimakaramāpāsyati muniḥ // 2665	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ vipāko vada kasya yūnaḥ kalyāṇi kalyāṇaparaṃparāṇām / yadakṣikoṇasravadacchadhārā hārāvatāro guṇamantareṇa // 2666	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ayaṃ śūnyo grāmaḥ surasadanametannu patitaṃ puraḥ śuṣkā vāpī tarurayamitaḥ śīrṇaviṭapaḥ / vayaṃ caite pānthāḥ parikṛśadaśābhāgyagatayaḥ samānaḥ saṃyogaḥ kaṭurapi mano me ramayati // 2667	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto dhārttarāṣṭropajīvinām / niveṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra prāṇānaparirakṣatā // 2668	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ sa te tiṣṭhati saṃgamotsuko viśaṅkase bhīru yato'vadhīraṇām / labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyaṃ śriyo durāpaḥ kathamīpsito bhavet // 2669	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayaṃ sa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṃkaro bibharti vapuṣādhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm / anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ // 2670	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ / nābhyūrujaghanasparśī nīvīvisraṃsanaḥ karaḥ // 2671	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati / sāmarthyakṛdamitrāṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ ca nṛpātmajaḥ // 2672	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ senottaṃsaḥ karakṛtakṛpāṇo raṇabhuvi dviṣadbhūmīpālāḥ kimapasarata prāṇakṛpaṇāḥ / kimabhyarthyaḥ pṛthvīdharakuharavāso'dya bhavatāṃ na kiṃ hṛdyā vidyādharanagaranīlotpaladṛśaḥ // 2673	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ snigdhaśyāmo ya iha viharatyambujavane vinidre vyāguñjanmadhupa iti taṃ jalpatu janaḥ / ahaṃ śaṅke paṅkeruhakuharavāsavyasaninīṃ śriyaṃ bhṛṅgacchadmā muraripurupeto ramayitum // 2674	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ svata eva yat para- śramāpanodapravaṇaṃ mahātmanām / sudhāṃśureṣa svayamarkakarkaśa- prabhābhitaptāmavati kṣitiṃ kila // 2675	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayaṃ svārthaḥ parārtho'yam ityevaṃ vā na kalpayet / vibudhā naiva manyante svaṃ paraṃ vā pṛthak pṛthak / niyuñjīta parasyārthe protsaheta svakarmaṇi // ayaṃ hi tīvreṇa jaganti tejasā 2676	upajāti atiśakvarī: ajñātam [15: yrrmj], ajñātam [15: jtytt], ajñātam [15: Bjtjr], ajñātam [15: BtmrB]
pratāpya bhāsāṃ patirastamāgataḥ / pratāpamātropanatā vibhūtayaś ciraṃ na tiṣṭhanti paropatāpinām // 2677	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayaṃ hi dehino deho dravyajñānakriyātmakaḥ / dehino vividhakleśasaṃtāpakṛdudāhṛtaḥ // 2678	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ hi prathamo rāgaḥ samastajanarañjane / yasya nāsti dvitīyo'pi sa kathaṃ pañcamo bhavet // 2679	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaḥpiṇḍa ivottapte khalānāṃ hṛdaye kṣaṇāt / patitā api nekṣyante guṇāstoyakanā iva // 2680	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayathāvihitānāṃ yan manojñatāsaṃpādau na staḥ / kathayāmyatastarūṇāṃ ropavidhānaṃ yathoddiṣṭam // 2681	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: sll] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayane viṣuve caiva ṣaḍaśītimukheṣu ca / candrasūryoparāge ca dattamakṣayamaśnute // 2682	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayamakṣuṇṇakāntaśrīr adharo hariṇīdṛśaḥ / pravālapadmarāgāder upari pratigarjati // 2683	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayamaṅkurabhāva eva tāvat kucayoḥ karṣati lokalocanāni / itaretarapīḍanīmavasthāṃ gatayoḥ śrīranayoḥ kathaṃ bhavitrī // 2684	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ayamatijaraṭhāḥ prakāmagurvīr alaghuvilambipayodharoparuddhāḥ / satatamasumatāmagamyarūpāḥ pariṇatadikkarikāstaṭīrbibharti // 2685	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ayamaparalatāyāḥ sādaraṃ hanta pītvā madhu mama makarandaṃ pātumāyāti bhṛṅgaḥ / iti manasi viṣādaṃ mallike mā kuru tvaṃ bata vada madhupānāṃ mānase ko vivekaḥ // 2686	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamapi kharayoṣitkarṇakāṣāyamīṣad visṛmaratimirorṇājarjaropāntamarciḥ / madakalakalaviṅkīkākunāndīkarebhyaḥ kṣitiruhaśikharebhyo bhānumānuccinoti // 2687	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamapi puruhūtapreyasīmūrdhni pūrṇaḥ kalaśa iva sudhāṃśuḥ sādhurullālasīti / madanavijayayātrākālavijñāpānāya sphurati jaladhimadhye tāmrapātrīva bhānuḥ // 2688	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayamabhinavameghaśyāmalottuṅgasānur madamukharamayūrīmuktasaṃsaktakekaḥ / śakuniśabalanīḍānokahasnigdhavarṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśmā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ // 2689	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnām amṛtamayaśarīraḥ kāntiyukto'pi candraḥ / bhavati vigataraśmirmaṇḍalaṃ prāpya bhānoḥ parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti // 2690	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnāṃ śatabhiṣaganuyātaḥ śaṃbhumūrdhāvataṃsaḥ / virahayati na cainaṃ rājayakṣmā śaśāṅkaṃ hatavidhiparipākaḥ kena vā laṅghanīyaḥ // 2691	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamayamasāvākarṇyārāt pratidvipaḍiṇḍimaṃ madakaluṣite netre mārjannudastakarārgalaḥ / agaṇitasṛṇiḥ krodhastabdhāyataśrutipallavaḥ praviśati nṛpasyāntaḥkakṣāṃ javādarimudgaraḥ // 2692	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ayamayogivadhūvadhapātakair mramimavāpya divaḥ khalu pātyate / śitiniśādṛṣadi sphuṭadutpatat- kaṇagaṇādhikatārakitāmbaraḥ // 2693	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayamaravivarebhyaścātakairniṣpatadbhir haribhiracirabhāsāṃ tejasā cānuliptaiḥ / gatamupari ghanānāṃ vārigarbhodarāṇāṃ piśunayati rathastaṃ śīkaraklinnanemiḥ // 2694	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamalaghuvisārisphārijihvākalāpo jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavo havyavāhaḥ / muhurupacitasāro vāribhirnimnagānāṃ tribhuvanamapi kiṃ na plāvayatyamburāśiḥ // 2695	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamavasaraḥ saraste salilairupakartumarthināmaniśam / idamapi ca sulabhamambho bhavati purā jaladharābhyudaye // 2696	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayamavasara upakṛtaye prakṛticalā yāvadasti saṃpadiyam / vipadi sadābhyudayinyāṃ punarupakartuṃ kuto'vasaraḥ // 2697	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayamavicāritacārutayā saṃsāro bhāti ramaṇīyaḥ / atra punaḥ paramārthadṛśāṃ na kimapi sāramaṇīyaḥ // 2698	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayamasau gaganāṅgaṇadīpakas taralakālabhujaṃgaśikhāmaṇiḥ / kṣaṇaviḍambitavāḍavavigrahaḥ patati vārinidhau vidhuro raviḥ // 2699	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayamasau bhagavānuta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitamavāṅmuninā śaśimaulinā / samadhirūḍhamajena nu jiṣṇunā sviditi vegavaśānmumuhe gaṇaiḥ // 2700	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayamaho rajanīcarakesarī giridarīśayanāt sahasotthitaḥ / timiravāraṇakumbhavidāraṇoc- chvalitaraktabharairiva lohitaḥ // 2701	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayamātmā svayaṃ sākṣād guṇaratnamahārṇavaḥ / sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk sārvaḥ parameṣṭhī nirañjanaḥ // 2702	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayamāndolitaprauḍhacandanadrumapallavaḥ / utpādayati sarvasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ // 2703	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayamālohitacchāyo madena mukhacandramāḥ / saṃnaddhodayarāgasya candrasya pratigarjati // 2704	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayamiha mugdho madhupaḥ parihṛtasahakāramañjarīpuñjaḥ / asaralamarasamasāraṃ śākhoṭakaviṭapamanusarati // 2705	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayamudayati kokīśokaśalyairmayūkhaiḥ śatamakhapuranārīnetragaṇḍūṣapeyaḥ / udayagirimṛgendrodgārabhinnāṅkaraṅku- śravaṇarudhiradhārāpāṭalaḥ pārvaṇenduḥ // 2706	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamudayati candraścandrikādhautaviśvaḥ pariṇatavimalimni vyomni karpūragauraḥ / ṛjurajataśalākāspardhibhiryasya pādair jagadamalamṛṇālīpañjarasthaṃ vibhāti // 2707	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamudayati candro vāridherambugarbhād amṛtakaṇakarālairaṃśubhirdīpyamānaḥ / bhujagaśayanavakṣoharmyadeśe lalantyā vadanamiva yadṛcchottānitaṃ viśvamātuḥ // 2708	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam / virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan kupitakapikapolakroḍatāmrastamāṃsi // 2709	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamudayamahīdhradhāturāgair aruṇakarāruṇitāmbarābhirāmaḥ / vitarasi na dṛśau kṛśāṅgi tārām iva divi vanditumindurabhyupaiti // 2710	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ayamudayamahībhṛnmūrdhni pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā divasapatirahauṣīdindupādān havīṃṣi / aruṇakiraṇavahnau kanyakā pauruhūtī haridapi kimakārṣīt tārakālājahomam // 2711	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamudito himaraśmir vanitāvadanasya kīdṛśaḥ sadṛśaḥ / nīlādikopalambhaḥ sphurati pratyakṣataḥ kasya // 2712	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayamupagatakṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇasārākṣipātair vikasitanavanīlāmbhojavaktraścakāsti / jalayuvatikucānuprāsitottuṅgakumbha- sthalamadakalagarjannīranāgastaṭākaḥ // 2713	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamuṣasi vinidradrāviḍītuṅgapīna- stanaparisarasāndrasvedabindūpamardī / srutamalayajavṛkṣakṣīrasaurabhyasabhyo vahati sakhi bhujaṅgībhuktaśeṣaḥ samīraḥ // 2714	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me / nava vāridharodayādahobhir bhavitavyaṃ ca nirātapatvaramyaiḥ // 2715	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ayameko'hameketi jñānaṃ tatsaṃgame na me / rāga evādhikastatra haridrācūrṇayoriva // 2716	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayameva paro dharmo hyayameva paraṃ tapaḥ / patiśuśrūṣaṇaṃ yatra tat strīṇāṃ svargahetukam // 2717	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaśaḥ prāpyate yena yena cādhogatirbhavet / svārthācca bhraśyate yena tat karma na samācaret // 2718	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaśasyam anāyuṣyaṃ paradārābhimarśanam / arthakṣayakaraṃ ghoraṃ pāpasya ca punarbhavam // 2719	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaśobhidurāloke kopadhāmaraṇādṛte / ayaśobhidurā loke kopadhā maraṇādṛte // 2720	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaścaṇakacarvaṇaṃ phaṇiphaṇāmaṇeḥ karṣaṇaṃ kareṇa giritolanaṃ jalanidheḥ padā laṅghanam / prasuptaharibodhanaṃ niśitakhaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ kadācidakhilaṃ bhavenna ca śaṭhāddhanasyārjanam // 2721	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ayastu kākatuṇḍena carma ārāmukhena hi / mṛtpiṇḍaṃ ca ghaṭaṃ caiva vidhyet sūcīmukhena hi // 2722	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayācataḥ sīdataśca sarvopāyairnimantraya / ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo'yācate yat pradīyate // 2723	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
