ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaśca na yacchati / sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhiruccṛṅkhalo nṛṇām // 2724	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayācitāraṃ nahi devadevam adriḥ sutāṃ grāhayituṃ śaśāka / abhyarthanābhaṅgabhayena sādhur mādhyasthamiṣṭe'pyavalambate'rthe // 2725	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ayācito mayā labdho matpreṣitaḥ punargataḥ / yatrāgatastatra gatas tatra kā parivedanā // 2726	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ayācyaṃ caiva yācante'bhojyān vyāhārayanti ca / utkocairvañcanābhiśca kāryāṇi ghnanti cāsyati // 2727	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayājyayājanaiścaiva nāstikyena ca karmaṇām / kulānyāśu vinaśyanti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ // 2728	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayi kaṭhora yaśaḥ kila te priyaṃ kimayaśo nanu ghoramataḥparam / kimabhavadvipine hariṇīdṛśaḥ kathaya nātha kathaṃ bata manyase // 2729	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi kānta paśya meghaṃ nahi nahi pāpaṃ tavātipuṇyāyāḥ / nahi nahi paśya payodharam apasāraya kañcukīmurasaḥ // 2730	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi kiṃ guṇavati mālati jīvati bhavatīṃ vinā madhupāḥ / atha yadi jīvati jīvatu jīvanamapi jīvanābhāsaḥ // 2731	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
ayi kuraṅgi tapovanavibhramād upagatāsi kirātapurīmimām / iha na paśyasi dāraya māraya grasa pibeti śukānapi jalpataḥ // 2732	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi kuraṅgi turaṅgamavikrame tyaja vanaṃ javanaṃ gamanaṃ kuru / iha vane vicaranti hi nāyakāḥ surabhilohitalohitasāyakāḥ // 2733	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi kulanicūlamūloc- chedanaduḥśīlavīcivācāle / bakavighasapaṅkasārā na cirāt kāveri bhavitāsi // 2734	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi kṣudro mābhūn matimahimagarvo manasi vaḥ karī yāto bandhaṃ yadiha vinayastatra vijayī / ayaṃ krodhādhmātastyajati vinayaṃ cen madavaśāt tataḥ skandhāvāraṃ na kimakhilamevākulayati // 2735	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayi khalu badhirādhirāja kīraṃ tudasi śalākanipātanena mohāt / aniśamapi sudhānidhānavāṇīṃ racayatu maunamukho'stu vā samaste // 2736	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ayi khalu viṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ / haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādāḥ // 2737	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ayi cakitamugdhacātaka marubhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kimudgrīvam / grīṣme davāgnivalitas tāpiccho'yaṃ na vidyutvān // 2738	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi cakorakuṭumbini kātare tiraya pakṣapuṭena kuṭumbakam / bahu gataṃ kiyadapyavaśiṣyate vyapagataṃ timirairuditaḥ śaśī // 2739	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindumanilaścet / dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ // 2740	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi citta vittaleśe sahajapremṇā kiyannu lubdhamasi / na tathāpi tadviyogaḥ kevalamāste śivenāpi // 2741	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi cetovihaga tvaṃ viṣayāraṇye bhramannasi śrāntaḥ / viśrāmakāmanā cec chivakalparuhe ciraṃ tiṣṭha // 2742	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi jalada yadi na dāsyasi katicit tvaṃ cātakāya jalakaṇikāḥ / tadayamacireṇa bhavitā salilāñjalidānayogyaste // 2743	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi tyaktāsi kastūri pāmaraiḥ paṅkaśaṅkayā / alaṃ khedena bhūpālāḥ kiṃ na santi mahītale // 2744	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayi dayite tava vadanaṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ manobhavo garjan / smitamavalambya tamisrāsv api hatakān hanta no hanti // 2745	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi daladaravinda syandamānaṃ marandaṃ tava kimapi lihanto mañju guñjantu bhṛṅgāḥ / diśi diśi nirapekṣastāvakīnaṃ vivṛṇvan parimalamayamanyo bāndhavo gandhavāhaḥ // 2746	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi dīnadayārdranātha he mathurānātha kadāvalokyase / hṛdayaṃ tvadalokakātaraṃ dayita bhrāmyati kiṃ karomyaham // 2747	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ayi durjanagarjitena kiṃ sarale namramukhī viṣīdasi tvam / paripanthini devakīsute parivādo'pi tapobhirunnataiḥ // 2748	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: ssjg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayi duṣkṛtakena kena vatse halikadvāri lavaṅgi puṣpitāsi / stabakāstava pāṃsubhiḥ parītāḥ paritaḥ prāṅgaṇasīmni yal luṭhanti // 2749	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ayi dūti sakhī tvameva me madano hanti śitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ / dayitaṃ tamupānayāśu tat suśako jīvitanirgamo'nyathā // 2750	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ayi nandatanūja kiṃkaraṃ patitaṃ māṃ viṣame bhavāmbudhau / kṛpayā tava pādapaṅkaja- sthitadhūlīsadṛśaṃ vibhāvaya // 2751	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ayi pataṅgi lavaṅgalatāvane piba madhūni vidhūya madhuvratān / iha vane ca vanecarasaṃkule na ca satāmasātāṃ ca nirūpaṇam // 2752	drutavilambita [12: nBBr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayi parāri parunmalayānilā vavuramī jagureva ca kokilāḥ / kalamalotkalitaṃ tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthaiva yathaiṣamaḥ // 2753	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi pibata cakorāḥ kṛtsnamunnāmikaṇṭha- kramasaralitacañcaccañcavaścandrikāmbhaḥ / virahavidhuritānāṃ jīvitatrāṇahetor bhavati hariṇalakṣmā ye na tejodaridraḥ // 2754	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi bata guru garvaṃ mā sma kastūri yāsīr akhilaparimalānāṃ maulinā saurabheṇa / girigahanaguhāyāṃ līnamatyantadīnaṃ svajanakamamunaiva prāṇahīnaṃ karoṣi // 2755	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi makarandasyandini padmini manye tavaiva subhagatvam / puṣpavatīmapi bhavatīṃ tyajati na vṛddhaḥ śucirhaṃsaḥ // 2756	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi madana na dagdhastvaṃ kimīśena kopāt kimuta rativiyoge nānvabhūrmūrkha duḥkham / aviditaparapīḍo yena māmutpalākṣī- rahitamahitapātraiḥ patrivarṣairdunoṣi // 2757	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi manmathacūtamañjari śravaṇāyatalocane priye / apahṛtya manaḥ kva yāsi me kimarājakamatra vartate // 2758	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: ssjl]
ayi mamaiṣa cakoraśiśurmuner vrajati sindhupibasya na śiṣyatām / aśitumabdhimadhītavato'sya ca śaśikarāḥ pibataḥ kati śīkarāḥ // 2759	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi malayaja mahimāyaṃ kasya girāmastu viṣayaste / udgirato yadgaralaṃ phaṇinaḥ puṣṇāsi parimalodgāraiḥ // 2760	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
ayi mālati saurabhasāravinir- jitasaṃvikasatkamalānilaye / madhupānavidhau madhupasya punar bhuvane bhavatīmahamākalaye // 2761	toṭaka [12: ssss]
ayi mṛgākṣi tavādharapallave dayitadantapadaṃ na bhavatyadaḥ / bhuvanamohanamantrapadāṅkitaṃ kimuta yantramidaṃ smarayoginaḥ // 2762	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi roṣamurīkaroṣi no cet kimapi tvāṃ prati vāridhe vadāmaḥ / jaladena tavārthinā vimuktāny api toyāni mahān na hā jahāsi // 2763	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ayi laṅghitamaryāda smara smara harānalam / dagdhaṃ dagdhumayuktaṃ te janaṃ virahakātaram // 2764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayi varoru hatasmaradīpike yadi gatāsi madīkṣaṇagocarāt / asamasāyakasāyakakīlitā vada gamiṣyasi me hṛdayāt katham // 2765	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi vijahīhi dṛḍhopagūhanaṃ tyaja navasaṃgamabhīru vallabham / aruṇakarodgama eṣa vartate varatanu saṃpravadanti kukkuṭāḥ // 2766	mālatī [12: njjr]
ayi vidhuṃ paripṛccha guroḥ kutaḥ sphuṭamaśikṣyata dāhavadānyatā / glapitaśaṃbhugalād garalāt tvayā kimudadhau jaḍa vā vaḍavānalāt // 2767	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ayi śākunika kṛto'ñjalir itare na katīha jīvanopāyāḥ / hatvā śukān kimetad vipinamasārasvataṃ kuruṣe // 2768	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi saṃprati dehi darśanaṃ smara paryutsuka eṣa mādhavaḥ / dayitāsvanavasthitaṃ nṛṇāṃ na khalu prema calaṃ suhṛjjane // 2769	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivo'pi tava pādayornipatito'ham / śiva iti kathaṃ hi jalpasi sarudhiragajacarmasaṃvītaḥ // 2770	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āyi sakhi kuru kṣipraṃ rambhādalaiḥ śiśirānilaṃ sahacari tanau satkarpūraṃ drutaṃ parilepaya / sarasabisinīpatraistalpaṃ priye parikalpaya sphuṭamiti vibho tasyā gehe bhavanti kiloktayaḥ // 2771	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ayi sakhi niśā kiṃ vā ghasraḥ śaśī kimu bhāskaraḥ sphurati purataḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ vā mamāsti sa vallabhaḥ / pratipalamiti prāṇādhīśa priyā virahāturā kathayati muhurmandaṃ mandaṃ sakhīṃ savidhasthitām // 2772	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ayi sakhi paridoṣo jāyate cumbane kiṃ kimu kucaparirambhe kiṃ rate brūhi tathyam / itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā // 2773	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi sakhi mama prāṇādhīśo gato viṣayāntaraṃ kusumaviśikhastasmāduccairdunoti tanuṃ śaraiḥ / laghu kuru tathā yatnaṃ yena smarādhinivāraṇe paṭutaramatestasyāśu syādihāgamanaṃ tataḥ // 2774	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ayi sakhi śastaḥ sakhivat patiriti kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi / śasto'tisakhivadupapatir ityāli kathaṃ tvayāpi nābodhi // 2775	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
ayi sarasija sāyaṃ saṃnidhānaṃ tvadīyaṃ bhramara upagato'yaṃ cūtamālāṃ vihāya / anupamamadhulobhād dūrataḥ sāṃprataṃ tad idamanucitametan mudraṇaṃ yanmukhasya // 2776	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi sarale tāvadimā upadeśagiro viśanti karṇāntaḥ / yāvannāntarbhūtaṃ taccetasi māmakaṃ cetaḥ // 2777	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi sutanuśarīre talpamāruhya tūrṇaṃ viracaya mama kaṇṭhe bandhanaṃ bāhuvallyā / itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā // 2778	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ayi sundari tava vadanaṃ nityaṃ pūrṇaṃ sudhānidhirmatvā / hanta patatyupariṣṭān madhye'mbudhi nityamevāsau // 2779	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi sundari saṃprati paśya puraś caramācalamastakameti raviḥ / samupaiti tamaḥpaṭalījaṭilā rajanī kuru kāmakalāḥ sakalāḥ // 2780	toṭaka [12: ssss]
ayi svayūthyairaśanikṣatopamaṃ mamādya vṛttāntamimaṃ batoditā / mukhāni lolākṣi diśāmasaṃśayaṃ daśāpi śūnyāni vilokayiṣyasi // 2781	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayi hastagataiḥ prāṇair amībhiḥ kandukairiva / aparyantarasaṃ mugdhe kiyat krīḍitumicchasi // 2782	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayi hāralate saṃhara harahuṃkṛtidagdhadehasaṃkṣobham / sadbhāvajānuraktir nahi ramyā paṇyanārīṇām // 2783	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayi hṛdaya dayāṃ mayi kuru kuraṅganayanāṃ vinā badhāna dhṛtim / ṭasaditi jhaṭiti sphuṭa vā sphuṭamidamuktaṃ gatirnānyā // 2784	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣante yatra kutrāpi śerate / nagnā vikṣipya gātrāṇi sajjarā iva madyapāḥ // 2785	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayuktaṃ yuktaṃ vā yadabhihitamajñena vibhunā stuyādetannityaṃ jaḍamapi guruṃ tasya vinuyāt / vivatsurnaiḥspṛhyaṃ kathamapi sabhāyāmabhinayet svakāryaṃ saṃtuṣṭe kṣitibhṛti rahasyeva kathayet // 2786	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayuktaṃ svāmino yuktaṃ yuktaṃ nīcasya dūṣaṇam / amṛtaṃ rāhave mṛtyur viṣaṃ śaṃkarabhūṣaṇam // 2787	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko'lasaḥ / viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate // 2788	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayuktacāraṃ durdarśam asvādhīnaṃ narādhipam / varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkamiva dvipāḥ // 2789	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayuktarūpaṃ kimataḥparaṃ bhavet trinetravakṣaḥ sulabhaṃ tavāpi yat / stanadvaye'smin haricandanāspade padaṃ citābhasmarajaḥ kariṣyati // 2790	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayutaṃ niyutaṃ vāpi pradiśantu prākṛtāya bhogāya / krīṇanti na bilvadalaiḥ kaivalyaṃ paccaṣairmūḍhāḥ // 2791	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ayudhyamānasyotpādya brāhmaṇasyāsṛgaṅgataḥ / duḥkhaṃ sumahadāpnoti pretyāprājñatayā naraḥ // 2792	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aye kīraśreṇīparivṛḍha vṛthā vāsaraśataṃ tarorasya skandhe gamayati phalāśārabhasataḥ / yadā puṣpārambhe mukhamalinimā kiṃśukataros tadaivābhijñātaṃ phaliparicayo durlabha itaḥ // 2793	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye keyaṃ dhanyā dhavalagṛhavātāyanagatā tulākoṭikvāṇairviṣamaviśikhaṃ jāgarayati / purā yā prāṇeśe gatavati kṛtā puṣpadhanuṣā śarāsārai rātriṃdivamakṛpamujjāgarakṛśā // 2794	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye keyaṃ līlādhavalagṛhavātāyanatale tulākoṭikvāṇaiḥ kusumadhanuṣaṃ jāgarayati / aho netradvandvaṃ vilasati vilaṅghya śrutipathaṃ kathaṃ na trailokyaṃ jayati madanaḥ smeravadanaḥ // 2795	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye kelīgṛhastambha kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ tvayā / paryaṅke vallabhaṃ tyaktvā tvāmāliṅgati māninī // 2796	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aye ko jānīte nijapuruṣasaṅgo hi na tathā yathā cetaḥ strīṇāṃ parapuruṣasaṅgo ramayate / api svairaṃ bhuktā divasamakhilaṃ vāsarakṛtā karasparśādindormukulayati netrāṇi nalinī // 2797	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye ko'yaṃ vṛddho gṛhaparivṛḍhaḥ kiṃ tava pitā na me bhartā kiṃtu vyapagatadṛganyacca badhiraḥ / huhuṃ śrānto'dyāhaṃ śiśayiṣurihaivāpavarake kva yāminyāṃ yāmi svapimi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake // 2798	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye jaladhinandinīnayananīrajālambana- jvalajjvalanajitvarajvarabharatvarābhaṅguram / prabhātajalajonnamadgarimagarvasarvaṃkaṣair jagattritayarocanaiḥ śiśirayāśu māṃ locanaiḥ // 2799	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aye tāla vrīḍāṃ vraja gurutayā bhāti na bhavān phale na cchāyā no kaṭhinaparivāro hi bhavataḥ / iyaṃ dhanyā dhanyā saralakadalī sundaradalā parātmānaṃ manye sukhayati phalenāmṛtavatā // 2800	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye diṣṭyā naṣṭo mama gṛhapiśācīparicayaḥ parāvṛttaṃ mohāt sphurati ca manāg brahmaṇi manaḥ / vikāro'pyakṣāṇāṃ galita iva nirbhāti viṣayāt tathāpi kṣetrajñaḥ spṛhayati vanāya prati muhuḥ // 2801	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye dūrabhrāntaṃ viṣayaviṣamāraṇyavipathe paribhrāntaṃ ceto mama vidhuritaṃ svairamadhunā / nirāvarte nitye sthiraniravadhānabhramamaye vivekaprabhraśyadvikṛtiparamānandajaladhau // 2802	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye nīlagrīva kva kathaya sakhe te'dya munayaḥ paraṃ toṣaṃ yeṣāṃ tava varavilāso vitanute / amī dūrāt krūrāḥ kvaṇitamidamākarṇya sahasā tvarante hantuṃ tvāmahaha śabarāḥ puṅkhitaśarāḥ // 2803	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye nṛpatimaṇḍalīmukuṭaratna yuṣmadbhujā- mahoṣmatatisaṃjuṣā bata bhavatpratāpārciṣā / dviṣāmatibhṛśaṃ yaśaḥ prakaṭapārado dhmāpanād udusphuṭata tārakāḥ kapaṭato vihāyastaṭe // 2804	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aye pāthovāha sthagaya kakubho'nyāstata itas tyajaitāṃ sīmānaṃ vasati munirasyāṃ kalaśabhūḥ / udañcatkope'smin sa jaladhirapi sthāsyati na te yataḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ salilamiha śauryaṃ prathayasi // 2805	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye madhupa mā kṛthā bata vṛthā manodīnatāṃ tuṣārasamaye latāśataniṣevaṇavyākulaḥ / iyaṃ purata eva te sarasapuṣpamāsodaye rasālanavamañjarī madhujharī jarījṛmbhate // 2806	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aye mamodāsitameva jihvayā dvaye'pi tasminnanatiprayojane / garau giraḥ pallavanārthalāghave mitaṃ ca sāraṃ ca vaco hi vāgmitā // 2807	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aye mātardṛṣṭvā mukhamamṛtabhānubhramavaśāt kacacchadmā rāhurvasati kimu tṛṣṇātaralitaḥ / kimevaṃ kandarpāntakataruṇi sindūrasaraṇic- chalādbhoktuṃ bhūyo bahiriva rasajñāṃ kalayati // 2808	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye mātastātaḥ kva gata iti yadvairiśiśunā darīgehe līnā nibhṛtamiha pṛṣṭā svajananī / kareṇāsyaṃ tasya drutamatha niruddhyāśrubhṛtayā viniḥśvasya sphāraṃ śiva śiva dṛśaivottarayati // 2809	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye muktāratna prasara bahiruddyotaya gṛhān api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svānapi guṇān / kimatraivātmānaṃ jarayasi mudhā śuktikuhare mahāgambhīro'yaṃ jaladhiriha kastvāṃ gaṇayati // 2810	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye yadi samīhase parapurāvarodhaṃ prabho tadākalaya madvacaḥ kimapi darpanārāyaṇa / pratīpanṛpanāgarīnayananīrakallolinī- samuttaraṇacāturīṃ turagarājimadhyāpaya // 2811	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aye lājā uccaiḥ pathi vacanamākarṇya gṛhiṇī śiśoḥ karṇau yatnāt supihitavatī dīnavadanā / mayi kṣīṇopāye yadakṛta dṛśāvaśrubahule tadantaḥśalyaṃ me tvamasi punaruddhartumucitaḥ // 2812	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye vāpīhaṃsā nijavasatisaṃkocapiśunaṃ kurudhvaṃ mā ceto viyati calato vīkṣya vihagān / amī te sāraṅgā bhuvanamahanīyavratabhṛtāṃ nirīhāṇāṃyeṣāṃ tṛṇamiva bhavantyambunidhayaḥ // 2813	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye vārāṃ rāśe katipayapayobinduvibhavair amībhirmā garvaṃ vaha niravalepā hi kṛtinaḥ / na kiṃ lopāmudrāsahacarakarakroḍakuhare bhavān dṛṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ pracalajalajantuvyatikaraḥ // 2814	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye vārāṃ rāśe kuliśakarakopapratibhayād ayaṃ pakṣapremṇā giripatisutastvāmupagataḥ / tvadantarvāstavyo yadi punarayaṃ vāḍavaśikhī pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ glapayati tataḥ ko'sya śaraṇam // 2815	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye sudhākairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhādhāmani bandhubhāvaḥ / janāpavādaḥ paritaḥ prayātaḥ samāgamo hanta na jātu jātaḥ // 2816	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
aye'stamayate śaśī nahi kṛśībhavatyāgraho vinaśyati tamo haṭhaṃ kimaṇumapyapāste manaḥ / sakhi prakaṭito'ruṇo na karuṇodayaste manāk prayāti khalu yāminī na vimanīkṛthā nāyakam // 2817	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aye svargaḥ svargaḥ katidivasamārgaḥ pravasatāṃ purastuṅgau syātāṃ yadi na kucakumbhau mṛgadṛśaḥ / ayācaṃ pātheyaṃ sulabha[mubhayaṃ] mūlaphalayoḥ payaḥ sthāne sthāne pathi pathi ca viśrāmataravaḥ // 2818	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aye helāvelātulitakulaśaile jalanidhau kuto vārāmoghaṃ bata jalada moghaṃ vitarasi / samantāduttālajvaladanalakīlākavalana- klamopetānetānupacara payobhirviṭapinaḥ // 2819	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ayogajāmanvabhavaṃ na vedanāṃ hitāya me'bhūdiyamunmadiṣṇutā / udeti doṣādapi doṣalāghavaṃ kṛśatvamajñānavaśādivainasaḥ // 2820	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ayogyavastubharaṇāt bhajedyogyo'pi duṣṭatām / rakṣaṇāyendradattāsiṃ vahan vyādho'bhavanmuniḥ // 2821	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayodhyāmaṭavībhūtāṃ pitrā bhrātrā ca varjitām / pipāsārto'nudhāvāmi kṣīṇatoyāṃ nadīmiva // 2822	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayyayi sāhasakāriṇi kiṃ tava caṅkramaṇena / ṭasaditi bhaṅgamavāpsyasi kucayugabhārabhareṇa // 2823.1	ajñātasamavṛtta [7: ssl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
arakte na sukhaṃ vetti nārakto duḥkhamaśnute / duḥkhānāṃ ca sukhānāṃ ca rakta evāspadaṃ sadā // 2823.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arakṣitaṃ tiṣṭhati daivarakṣitaṃ surakṣitaṃ daivahataṃ vinaśyati / jīvatyanātho'pi vane visarjitaḥ kṛtaprayatno'pi gṛhe na jīvati // 2824	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
arakṣitaṃ bhavet satyaṃ daivaṃ tameva rakṣati / daivena nāśitaṃ yattu tasya rakṣā na dṛśyate // 2825	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
arakṣitā gṛhe ruddhāḥ puruṣairāptakāribhiḥ / ātmānamātmanā yāstu rakṣeyustāḥ surakṣitāḥ // 2826	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam / tamāhuḥ sarvalokasya samagramalahārakam // 2827	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arakṣyamānāḥ kurvanti yatkiṃcit kilviṣaṃ prajāḥ / tasmāttu nṛpaterardhaṃ yasmād gṛhṇātyasau karān // 2828	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
araṇyaṃ rakṣitaṃ siṃhāt tasmāt siṃhaḥ surakṣitaḥ / ityanyonyasyopakāre mitratvaṃ tannibandhanam // 2829	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
araṇyaṃ sāraṅgairgirikuharagarbhāśca haribhir diśo diṅmātaṅgaiḥ salilamuṣitaṃ paṅkajavanaiḥ / priyācakṣurmadhyastanavadanasaundaryavijitaiḥ satāṃ māne mlāne maraṇamathavā dūragamanam // 2830	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
araṇyabījāñjalidānalālitās tathā ca tasyāṃ hariṇā viśaśvasuḥ / yathā tadīyairnayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puraḥ sakhīnāmamimīta locane // 2831	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
araṇyaruditaṃ kṛtaṃ śavaśarīramudvartitaṃ sthale'bjamavaropitaṃ suciramūṣare varṣitam / śvapucchamavanāmitaṃ badhirakarṇajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtāndhamukhamaṇḍanā yadabudho janaḥ sevitaḥ // 2832	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
araṇyahariṇagrāmam ācakrāma hutāśanaḥ / indoḥ kroḍamṛgaṃ dhartum iva dhūmo nabho yayau // 2833	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
araṇyānī kveyaṃ dhṛtakanakasūtraḥ kva ca mṛgaḥ kva muktāhāro'yaṃ kva ca sa patagaḥ kveyamabalā / kva tatkanyāratnaṃ lalitamahibhartuḥ kva ca vayaṃ svamākūtaṃ dhātā kimapi nibhṛtaṃ pallavayati // 2834	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
araṇye puṣpitā vṛkṣā dūrasthāne ca bāndhavāḥ / samṛddhenāpi kiṃ tena yaḥ kāle nopatiṣṭhati // 2835	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aratiriyamupaiti māṃ na nidrā gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān / vigalati rajanī na saṃgamāśā vrajati tanustanutāṃ na cānurāgaḥ // 2836	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aratnālokasaṃhāryam avāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ / dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ // 2837	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arayo'pi hi mitratvaṃ yānti daṇḍavato dhruvam / daṇḍaprāyo hi nṛpatir bhunaktyākramya medinīm // 2838	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
arayo'pi hi saṃdheyāḥ sati kāryārthagaurave / ahimūṣakavad devā hyarthasya padavīṃ gataiḥ // 2839	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aralūvṛkṣapatrāṇāṃ lepo gomukharogahṛt / gonāsasaṃbhavaḥ kṣāro hanti puṣpaṃ cirodbhavam // 2840	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aravindamidaṃ vīkṣya khelatkhañjanamañjulam / smarāmi vadanaṃ tasyāś cāru cañcalalocanam // 2841	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aravindavṛndamakarandatundilo marudeti mandamiha mandarācalāt / suratāntatāntasudatīmatallikā- kabarīparīmalajharī parīvṛtaḥ // 2842	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
aravindeṣu kundeṣu ramitaṃ kālayogataḥ / aye mākanda jānīhi tavaivāyaṃ madhuvrataḥ // 2843	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
araśmi bimbaṃ sūryasya vahniṃ caivāṃśumālinam / dṛṣṭvaikādaśamāsāttu naro norddhvaṃ tu jīvati // 2844	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arasāpi hi vāg bhāti proktāvasara eva hi / sarvacittapramodāya gālidānaṃ karagrahe // 2845	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arasikajanabhāṣaṇato rasikajanaiḥ saha varaṃ kalahaḥ / lambakucāliṅganato likucakucāpādatāḍanaṃ śreyaḥ // 2846	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
arājake jīvaloke durbalā balavattaraiḥ / bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhutvamiha kasyacit // 2847	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arājake tu loke'smiṃs tasmād rājā vidhīyatām / rājā rājye ciraṃ rakṣāṃ kṛtvā svargamavāpnuyāt // 2848	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmo na hyavatiṣṭhate / parasparaṃ ca bādhante sarvathā dhigarājakam // 2849	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arājake hi loke'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt / rakṣārthamasya sarvasya rājānamasṛjat prabhuḥ // 2850	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arātibhiryudhi sahayudhvano hatāñ jighūkṣavaḥ śrutaraṇatūryaniḥsvanāḥ / akurvata prathamasamāgamocitaṃ cirojjhitaṃ suragaṇikāḥ prasādhanam // 2851	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
arātivikramālokavikasvaravilocanaḥ / kṛpāṇodagradordaṇḍaḥ sa sahasrāyudhīyati // 2852	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arālakeśyā alake vidhātrā vidhīyamāne calatūlikāgrāt / cyutasya bindorasitasya mārga- rekheva reje navaromarājī // 2853	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arāvapyucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛhamāgate / chettumapyāgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ // 2854	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ariṃ mitramudāsīnaṃ madhyasthaṃ sthaviraṃ gurum / yo na budhyati mandātmā sa ca sarvatra naśyati // 2855	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ariṇā saha saṃvāsād viṣeṇa saha bhojanāt / pāpmanā saha sauhārdān maraṇaṃ pratipadyate // 2856	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arito'bhyāgato doṣaḥ śatrusaṃvāsakāritaḥ / sarpasaṃvāsadharmitvān nityodvegena dūṣitaḥ // 2857	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāyate plakṣabījāśāt kapotādiva śālmaleḥ / udvegajanano nityaṃ paścādapi bhayāvahaḥ // 2858	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aripakṣāśrite mitre marmavedipriyaṃvade / viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ yadi sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // 2859	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aribhirjitairaśaktair vijñāpyaṃ sevakaiḥ prabhornītiḥ / viṣayairjito'smi śaṃbho tava yacchlāghyaṃ tadāracaya // 2860	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arivadhadehaśarīraḥ sahasā rathisūtaturagapādātaḥ / bhāti sadānatyāgaḥ sthiratāyāmavanitalatilakaḥ // 2861	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ariśca mitraṃ bhavati mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati / anityacittaḥ puruṣas tasmin ko nāma viśvaset // 2862	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ariṣaṅvarga evāyam asyāstāta padāni ṣaṭ / teṣāmekamapi cchindan khañjaya bhramarīṃ śriyam // 2863	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ariṣṭāni mahārāja śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tāni te / yeṣāmālokanān mṛtyuḥ nijaṃ jānāti yogavit // 2864	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aruṃtudaṃ paruṣaṃ rūkṣavācaṃ vākkaṇṭakairvitudantaṃ manuṣyān / vidyādalakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ mukhe nibaddhāṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam // 2865	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tBtgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arucirniśayā vinā śaśī śaśinā sāpi vinā mahattamaḥ / ubheyena vinā manobhava- sphuritaṃ naiva cakāsti kāminoḥ // 2866	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: sBrlg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aruṇakiraṇajālairantarikṣe gatarkṣe calati śiśiravāte mandamandaṃ prabhāte / yuvatijanakadambe nāthamuktauṣṭhabimbe caramagirinitambe candrabimbaṃ lalambe // 2867	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aruṇakiraṇe vahnau lājānuḍūni juhoti yā pariṇayati tāṃ saṃdhyāmetāmavaimi maṇirdivaḥ / iyamiva sa evāgnibhrāntiṃ karoti purāyataḥ karamapi na kastasyaivotkaḥ sakautukamīkṣitum // 2868	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aruṇajalajarājīmugdhahastāgrapādā bahulamadhupamālākajjalendīvarākṣī / anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇāṃ vyāharantī rajanimacirajātā pūrvasaṃdhyā suteva // 2869	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aruṇadalanalinyā snigdhapādāravindā kaṭhinatanudharaṇyāṃ yātyakasmāt skhalantī / avani tava suteyaṃpādavinyāsadeśe tyaja nija kaṭhinatvaṃ jānakī yātyaraṇyam // 2870	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aruṇanayanaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ darasphuritādharaṃ sutanu śaśinaḥ kliṣṭāṃ kāntiṃ karotu tavānanam / kṛtamanunayaiḥ kopo'yaṃ te manasvini vardhatām iti gaditayāśliṣṭo devyā śivāya śivo'stu vaḥ // 2871	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aruṇamapi vidrumadruṃ mṛdulataraṃ cāpi kisalayaṃ bāle / adharīkaroti nitarāṃ tavādharo madhurimātiśayāt // 2872	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aruṇarāganiṣedhibhiraṃśukaiḥ śravaṇalabdhapadaiśca yavāṅkuraiḥ / parabhṛtāvirutaiśca vilāsinaḥ smarabalairabalaikarasāḥ kṛtāḥ // 2873	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aruṇitākhilaśailavanā muhur vidadhatī pathikān paritāpinaḥ / vikacakiṃśukasaṃhatiruccakair udavahaddavahavyavahaśriyam // 2874	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham / mukhamānataṃ ca sakhite jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ // 2875	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
aruṇodayavelāyāṃ daśāhena phalaṃ labhet / govisarjanavelāyāṃ sadyaḥ phalada iṣyate // 2876	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arundhatīkāmapuraṃdhrilakṣmī- jambhadviṣaddāranavāmbikānām / caturdaśīyaṃ tadihocitaiva gulphadvayāptā yadadṛśyasiddhiḥ // 2877	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vindati / duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyatyevāpamārṣṭi vai // 2878	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arūpo'pi surūpo'pi āḍhyo'pi dravyavarjitaḥ / duḥśīlaḥ śīlayukto vā strīṇāṃ bhartādhidevatā // 2879	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
are cetomatsya bhramaṇamadhunā yauvanajale tyaja tvaṃ svacchandaṃ yuvatijaladhau paśyasi na kim / tanūjālījālaṃ stanayugalatumbīphalayutaṃ manobhūḥ kaivartaḥ kṣipati ratitantu pratimuhuḥ // 2880	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
are daiva tvadāyattaṃ kāmaṃ vittādi gacchatu / mamāyattaṃ punarvṛttaṃ hartuṃ kasyeha yogyatā // 2881	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
are yamabhaṭāḥ śaṭhāḥ kapaṭavigrahe tūdbhaṭā nivedayata vo yamaṃ na ca tavādhikāro mayi / ahaṃ ca śivasundarīcaraṇayugmapaṅkeruha- skhalanmadhusudhārasaṃ samapibaṃ na jānītha re // 2882	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
are rāmāhastābharaṇa bhasalaśreṇiśaraṇa smarakrīḍāvrīḍāśamana virahiprāṇadamana / sarohaṃsottaṃsa pracaladala nīlotpala sakhe sakhedo'haṃ mohaṃ ślathaya kathaya kvenduvadana // 2883	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
are vada harernāma kṣemadhāma kṣaṇe kṣaṇe / bahiḥ sarati niḥśvāse viśvāsaḥ kaḥ pravartate // 2884	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
araiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhir nābhau cārāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ / svāmisevakayorevaṃ vṛtticakraṃ pravartate // 2885	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arodi madhupairbhṛśaṃ kamalamālayā mīlitaṃ vyakampi jalavīcibhirvidalitaṃ mukhaṃ kairavaiḥ / vilokya rajanau hrade virahikokaśokaṃ ghanaṃ paravyasanakātarāḥ kimiva kurvate sādhavaḥ // 2886	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
arkakarpāsayormūlaṃ jalapītaṃ jayedviṣam / paṭolamūlanasyena kāladaṣṭo'pi jīvati // 2887	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arkacchāyaṃ tirayati sudhāliptavidyunmatallī cakraprakhyaṃ mahati suṣamāmaṇḍale dūramagnam / raktādarśapratiphalamiva śrīsadaṅgaṃ vahantī dṛṣṭā kācit taralanayanā devateva smarasya // 2888	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
arkāḥ kiṃ phalasaṃcayena bhavatāṃ kiṃ vaḥ prasūnairnavaiḥ kiṃ vā bhūrilatācayena mahatā gotreṇa kiṃ bhūyasā / yeṣāmekatamo babhūva sa punarnaivāsti kaścit kule chāyāyāmupaviśya yasya pathikāstṛptiṃ phalaiḥ kurvate // 2889	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arkāḥ kecana kecidakṣataravaḥ keciddalakṣmāruhāḥ nimbāḥ kecana kecidatra vipine krūrāḥ karīradrumāḥ / mākando makarandatundilamiladbhṛṅgāliśṛṅgāritaḥ ko'pyatrāsti na mitra yatra tanute karṇāmṛtaṃ kokilaḥ // 2890	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arkābhimukhyasalilasthitisādhanāni raktāmbujasya phalitānyadhunā tapāṃsi / yadbhīru tasya paribhūtikaraṃ padaṃ tvaṃ lākṣārasāntaritarāgamidaṃ karoṣi // 2891	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arghāyāmbudhirindumaṇḍalamapi śrīcandanaṃ taṇḍulās tārā bilvadalaṃ nabhaḥsuradhunī dhūpaḥ pradīpo raviḥ / kheṭāḥ pañcaphalāni kiṃ ca kakubhastāmbūlamārātrikaṃ meruḥ śrījagatīpate tava yaśoyogeśvarasyārcane // 2892	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arghyaṃ dattvātha devāya bhāskarāya samāhitaḥ / tato'laṃkṛtagātraḥ san vṛttamālokya mantravat // 2893	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arghyamarghyamiti vādinaṃ nṛpaṃ so'navekṣya bharatāgrajo yataḥ / kṣatrakopadahanārciṣaṃ tataḥ saṃdadhe dṛśamudagratārakām // 2894	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
arcakasya tapoyogād arcanasyātiśāyanāt / ābhirūpyācca mūrtīnāṃ devaḥ sāṃnidhyamṛcchati // 2895	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arcāmaḥ satataṃ gaṇādhipamathāpyākhūn nihanmaḥ śataṃ dhyāyāmo hṛdi bhairavaṃ tadapi tu protsārayāmaḥ śunaḥ / bhūteśaṃ praṇumastathāpi śataśo bhūtān nigṛhṇīmahe nahyekasya guṇaḥ parasya mahato doṣānapi prorṇute // 2896	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arcāmīti dhiyā yadeva kusumaṃ kṣiptvā jano mucyate vidhyāmīti dhiyā tadeva vikiran bhasmīkṛto manmathaḥ / ityābhyantaravṛttimātrarasiko bāhyānapekṣaśca yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate // 2897	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arcirmālākarālāddivamabhilihato dāvavahneradūrād uḍḍīyoḍḍīya kiṃcicchalabhakavalanānandamandapracārāḥ / agre'gre saṃraṭantaḥ pracurataramasīpātadurlakṣadhūmrā dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapamamī niṣṭhurāḥ svasthalīṣu // 2898	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
arciṣmanti vidārya vaktrakuharāṇyāsṛkkaṇo vāsukes tarjanyā viṣakarburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya dantāṅkurān / ekaṃ trīṇi navāṣṭa sapta ṣaḍiti vyastāstasaṃkhyākramā vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśavakalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam // 2899	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arcye viṣṇau śilādhīrguruṣu naramatirvaiṣṇave jātibuddhir viṣṇorvā vaiṣṇavānāṃ kalimalamathane pādatīrthe'mbubuddhiḥ / śrīviṣṇornāmni mantre sakalakaluṣahe śabdasāmānyabuddhir viṣṇau sarveśvareśe taditarasamadhīryasya vā nārakī saḥ // 2900	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
arjayejjñānamarthāṃśca pumānamaravat sadā / keśeṣviva gṛhītaḥ san mṛtyunā dharmamācaret // 2901	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyamāśritya kaṃcana / phalaśākamapi śreyo bhoktuṃ hyakṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe // 2902	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parasya nu gṛhe bhoktuḥ paribhūtasya nityaśaḥ / sumṛṣṭamapi na śreyo vikalpo'yamataḥ satām // 2903	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃyuktaḥ karṇaṃ yatrānudhāvati / tannetraṃ tu kurukṣetram iti mugdhe mṛśāmahe // 2904	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunaḥ phalgunaḥ pārthaḥ kirīṭī śvetavāhanaḥ / bībhatsurvijayī kṛṣṇaḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ // 2905	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunasya ime bāṇā neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ / sīdanti mama gātrāṇi māghamā segavā iva // 2906	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunasya pratijñe dve na dainyaṃ na palāyanam / āyū rakṣati marmāṇi āyurannaṃ prayacchati // 2907	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunānte varārohe bhīmānte ca varānane / pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhavyaṃ rakṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ // 2908	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arjunīyati yadarjane jano varjanīyajanatarjanādibhiḥ / maṅkṣu naśyati cirāya saṃcitā vañcitā jagati ke na saṃpadā // 2909	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
arthaṃ dhigastu bahuvairikaraṃ narāṇāṃ rājyaṃ dhigastu bhayadaṃ bahu cintanīyam / svargaṃ dhigastu punarāgamanapravṛttiṃ dhig dhik śarīramapi rogasamāśrayaṃ ca // 2910	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arthaṃ mahāntamāsādya vidyāmaiśvaryameva vā / vicaratyasamunnaddho yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate // 2911	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthaṃ sapratibandhaṃ prabhuradhigantuṃ sahāyavāneva / dṛśyaṃ tamasi na paśyati dīpena vinā sacakṣurapi // 2912	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthaḥ kāmo dharmo mokṣaḥ sarve bhavanti puruṣasya / tāvadyāvat pīḍāṃ jāṭharavahnirna vidadhāti // 2913	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthaḥ sukhaṃ kīrtirapīha mā bhūd anartha evāstu tathāpi dhīrāḥ / nijapratijñāmanurudhyamānā mahodyamāḥ karmasamārabhante // 2914	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
artha eva hi keṣāṃcid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām / arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ // 2915	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthagrahaṇe na tathā dunoti kaṭukūjitairyathā piśunaḥ / rudhirādānādadhikaṃ dunoti karṇe kvaṇan maśakaḥ // 2916	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthajñāt saṃśayacchettā tataḥ śreyān svakarmakṛt / muktasaṅgastato bhūyān adogdhā dharmamātmanaḥ // 2917	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthatyāgo hi kāryaḥ syād arthaṃ śreyāṃsamicchatā / bījaupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūdatra saṃśayaḥ // 2918	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthadharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmamanuvartate / evamāpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // 2919	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthanāśaṃ manastāpaṃ gṛhe duścaritāni ca / vañcanaṃ cāpamānaṃ ca matimān na prakāśayet // 2920	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthapatau bhūmipatau bāle vṛddhe tapo'dhike viduṣi / yoṣiti mūrkhe guruṣu ca viduṣā naivottaraṃ deyam // 2921	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthapraśnakṛtau loke sulabhau tau gṛhe gṛhe / dātā cottaradaścaiva durlabhau puruṣau bhuvi // 2922	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthaprāṇavināśasaṃśayakarīṃ prāpyāpadaṃ dustarāṃ pratyāsannabhayo na vetti vibhavaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣati / uttīrṇastu tato dhanārthamaparāṃ bhūyo viśatyāpadaṃ prāṇānāṃ ca dhanasya cādhamadhiyāmanyonyahetuḥ paṇaḥ // 2923	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthapriyatayātmānam apriyāya dadāti yā / kāmātmanyapi niḥsnehāṃ ko'nurakteti manyate // 2924	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthamanarthaṃ bhāvaya nityaṃ nāsti tataḥ sukhaleśaḥ satyam / putrādapi dhanabhājāṃ bhītiḥ sarvatraiṣā vihitā rītiḥ // 2925	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
arthayuktasya karaṇam anarthasya ca varjanam / nyāyataśca karādānaṃ svayaṃ ca pratimokṣaṇam // 2926	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthayuktimavijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim / mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ // 2927	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthayedeva mitrāṇi sati vāsati vā dhane / nānarthayan vijānāti mitrāṇāṃ sāraphalgutām // 2928	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
artharakṣāparo bhṛtyaḥ kṛtyākṛtyavivekavit / sāndhivigrahikaḥ kāryo rājñā nayaviśāradaḥ // 2929	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthavantaḥ praśasyante nindyante tadvinākṛtāḥ / āgemeṣvapi cedevam adbhutaṃ kiṃ śarīriṣu // 2930	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthavānarthamarthibhyo na dadātyatra ko guṇaḥ / ekaiva gatirarthasya dānamanyā vipattayaḥ // 2931	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthavāneva loke'smin pūjyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ / arthahīnastu puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ // 2932	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
arthavān duṣkulīno'pi loke pūjyatamo naraḥ / śaśinastulyavaṃśo'pi nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate // 2933	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthaścet sarvathā rakṣya iti kaiścidudāhṛtam / tatkathaṃ na hariścandro'rakṣat kuśikanandane // 2934	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dharmastu rakṣitaḥ sarvair api dehavyayena ca / śibiprabhṛtibhūpālair dadhīcipramukhairdvijaiḥ // 2935	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasaṃpadvimohāya bahuśokāya caiva hi / tasmādarthamanarthakyaṃ śreyo'rthī dūratastyajet // 2936	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasaṃpādanārthaṃ ca pīḍyamānasya śatrubhiḥ / sādhuṣu vyapadeśārthaṃ dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ // 2937	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasiddhiṃ parāmicchan dharmamevāditaścaret / nahi dharmādapaityarthaḥ svargalokādivāmṛtam // 2938	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasya niścayo dṛṣṭo vicāreṇa hitoktitaḥ / na snānena na dānena prāṇāyāmaśatena vā // 2939	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasya puruṣo dāsaḥ sa ca jātu na kasyacit / yadarjanaparā loke sarve'pi bhuvanatraye // 2940	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsastvartho na kasyacit / iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho'smyarthena kauravaiḥ // 2941	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasya mūlaṃ prakṛtirnayaśca dharmasya kāruṇyamakaitavaṃ ca / kāmasya vittaṃ ca vapurvayaśca mokṣasya sarvārthanivṛttireva // 2942	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthasya saṃgrahe caināṃ vyaye caiva niyojayet / śauce dharme'nnapaktyāṃ ca pāriṇāhyasya cekṣaṇe // 2943	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasya sadotthānaṃ niyamaparīpālanaṃ kriyājñānam / sthānatyāgaḥ paṭutā- 'nudvegaḥ strīṣvaviśvāsaḥ // 2944	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthasya sādhane siddha utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye / nāśopabhoga āyāsas trāsaścintā bhramo nṛṇām // 2945	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasyānarthapūrṇasya ko'vasīdatu saṃgrahe / tatsaṃtuṣṭairnnacediṣṭair duṣṭaiḥ syānnayanotsavaḥ // 2946	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasyopārjanaṃ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamasya gṛhāgamaḥ / tasyāgatasya bandhubhyo viniyogaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // 2947	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasyopārjanaṃ kṛtvā naivābhāgyaḥ samaśnute / araṇyaṃ mahadāsādya mūḍhaḥ somilako yathā // 2948	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā / nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt // 2949	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthahīno'pi madhuraḥ śabdo lokapriyaṃkaraḥ / vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgādīny atrodāharaṇāni naḥ // 2950	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthāṃśca durlabhāṃlloke kleśāṃśca sulabhāṃstathā / duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate // 2951	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthāṃstyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān / priyaṃ priyebhyaścarata rājā hi tvarate jaye // 2952	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām / asamṛddhāstvapi sadā mohayantyavicakṣaṇān // 2953	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
arthāḥ pādarajopamā girinadīvegopamaṃ yauvanaṃ mānuṣyaṃ jalabindulolacapalaṃ phenopamaṃ jīvanam / dharmaṃ yo na karoti niścalamatiḥ svargārgalodghāṭanaṃ paścāttāpahato jarāpariṇataḥ śokāgninā dahyate // 2954	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthāḥ sādhāraṇā eva viyujyante svabhāvataḥ / mamatāṃ tyajatāṃ teṣu mahadutpadyate yaśaḥ // 2955	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthākṛṣṭadhiyaḥ padaṃ racayataḥ śabdāvadhānātmanaḥ saṃdhicchedavidhānanirgamavidhivyāpāramātanvataḥ / mā māṃ kaścidiha grahīditi muhuḥ sāśaṅkamāpaśyataś caurasyeva kaverbhayaṃ bhavati yattadvidviṣāmastu vaḥ // 2956	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthāgamo nityamarogitā ca priyā ca bhāryā priyavādinī ca / vaśyaśca putro'rthakarī ca vidyā ṣaḍ jīvalokasya sukhāni rājan // 2957	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthā gṛhe nivartante śmaśāne caiva bāndhavāḥ / sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi gacchantamanugacchati // 2958	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛn na bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā / vidyāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na vapurna tejaḥ // 2959	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthāt palāyate jñānaṃ mārjārānmūṣiko yathā / vakavat jñāyatāmarthaḥ siṃhavacca jayedripum // 2960	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāścāpi te'sukhāḥ / duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayet // 2961	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthāddharmaśca kāmaśca svargaścaiva narādhipa / prāṇayātrā hi lokasya vinārthaṃ na prasidhyati // 2962	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthād bhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchet satyād mraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca / yogād bhraṣṭaḥ satyadhṛtiṃ ca gacched rājyād bhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca // 2963	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate / ghātayanti hi karyāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // 2964	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānarthau viniścitya vyavasāyaṃ bhajeta ha / guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatastu visarjayet // 2965	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthā na santi na ca muñcati māṃ durāśā tyāge ratiṃ vahati durlalitaṃ mano me / yācñā ca lāghavakarī svavadhe ca pāpaṃ prāṇāḥ svayaṃ vrajata kiṃ paridevanena // 2966	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arthā na syuryadi vijahimo dharmamarthaikasādhyaṃ kāyakleśaiḥ katikatividhaḥ sādhanīyo na dharmaḥ / kāyaḥ śrānto yadi bhavati kastāvatā dharmalopaś cittaṃ dattvā sakṛdiva śive cintitaṃ sādhayāmaḥ // 2967	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
arthānāmadhikānāṃ rājñā caureṇa vā nāśaḥ / anne khalvatibhukte vamanaṃ vā syādvireko vā // 2968	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
arthānāmananuṣṭhātā kāmacārī vikatthanaḥ / api sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kṣiprameva vinaśyati // 2969	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānāmarjanaṃ kāryaṃ vardhanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tathā / bhakṣyamāṇo nirādāyaḥ sumerurapi hīyate // 2970	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānāmarjane duḥkham arjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe / nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhigarthāḥ kaṣṭasaṃśrayāḥ // 2971	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānāmārjanaṃ kāryaṃ vardhanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tathā / bhakṣyamāṇo nirādāyaḥ kṣīyate himavānapi // 2972	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vayamapi ca girāmīśmahe yāvaditthaṃ śūras tvaṃ vāgmidarpajvaraśamanavidhāvakṣayaṃ pāṭavaṃ naḥ / sevante tvāṃ dhanāndhā matimalahataye māmapi śrotukāmā mayyapyāsthā na te cet tvayi mama sutarāmeṣa rājan gato'smi // 2973	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
arthānāmīśvaro yaḥ syād indriyāṇāmanīśvaraḥ / indriyāṇāmanaiśvaryād aiśvaryād bhraśyate hi saḥ // 2974	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānāharato'narthāḥ samāyānti pramādinaḥ / apramattastato mārge nityamevāstu vittavān // 2975	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthānulāpān vrajasundarīṇām akṛtrimāṇāṃ ca sarasvatīnām / ārdrāśayena śravaṇāñcalena saṃbhāvayantaṃ taruṇaṃ gṛṇīmaḥ // 2976	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthān kecidupāsate kṛpaṇavat kecit tvalaṃkurvate veśyāvat khalu dhātuvādina ivodbadhnanti kecid rasān / arthālaṃkṛtisadrasadravamucāṃ vācāṃ praśastispṛśāṃ kartāraḥ kavayo bhavanti katicit puṇyairagaṇyairiha // 2977	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthān brūyān na cāsatsu guṇān brūyān na cātmanaḥ / ādadyān na ca sādhubhyo nāsatpuruṣamāśrayet // 2978	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthā bhāgyodaye jantuṃ viśanti śataśaḥ svayam / digbhyo'bhyupetya sarvābhyaḥ sāyaṃ tarumivāṇḍajāḥ // 2979	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthābhāve tu yajjñānaṃ pratyakṣamiva dṛśyate / gandharvanagarākāraṃ svapnaṃ tadupalakṣayet // 2980	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthābhāve mṛdutā kāṭhinyaṃ bhavati cārthabāhulye / naikatrārthamṛdutve prāyaḥ śloke ca loke ca // 2981	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthārthinā priyā eva śrīharṣodīritā giraḥ / sārasvate tu saubhāgye prasiddhā tadviruddhatā // 2982	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthārthinī devapūjāspapnopaśrutitatparā / sadā gaṇakagehaṃ sā praṣṭuṃ yāti grahasthitim // 2983	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ jvalantamupasarpati / kṣīṇakṣīrāṃ nirājīvyāṃ vatsastyajati mātaram // 2984	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ śmaśānamapi sevate / janitāramapi tyaktvā niḥsvaṃ gacchati dūrataḥ // 2985	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthārthī yāni kaṣṭāni mūḍho'yaṃ sahate janaḥ / śatāṃśenāpi mokṣārthī tāni cen mokṣamāpnuyāt // 2986	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthārthī yāni kaṣṭāni sahate kṛpaṇo janaḥ / tānyeva yadi dharmārthī na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // 2987	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthālābhe'pi mahati svādhyāyaṃ na samutsṛjet / kulānyakulatāṃ yānti svādhyāyasya vivarjanāt // 2988	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthāharaṇakauśalyaṃ kiṃ stumaḥ śāstravādinām / avyayebhyo'pi ye cārthān niṣkarṣanti sahasraśaḥ // 2989	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthā hasantyucitadānavihīnacittaṃ bhūmirnaraṃ ca mama bhūmiriti bruvāṇam / jārā hasanti tanayānupalālayantaṃ mṛtyurhasatyavanipaṃ raṇaraṅgabhīrum // 2990	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arthiko vyādhito mūrkhaḥ pravāsī parasevakaḥ / jīvanto'pi mṛtāḥ pañca pañcaite dukhabhāginaḥ // 2991	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthitā vibhavastyāgaḥ svātantryamucitajñatā / iti pañcaguṇopatem āśrayedāśrayaṃ naraḥ // 2992	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
arthitve prakaṭīkṛte'pi na phalaprāptiḥ prabhoḥ pratyuta druhyan dāśarathirviruddhacarito yuktastayā kanyayā / utkarṣaṃ ca parasya mānayaśasorvisraṃsanaṃ cātmanaḥ strīratnaṃ ca jagatpatirdaśamukho dṛptaḥ kathaṃ mṛṣyate // 2993	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthinastvaritadānena tṛptirbhavati yādṛśī / bahudānaṃ vilambena na tādṛk tṛptikārakam // 2994	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt / tadavasthā punardeva nānyasya mukhamīkṣate // 2995	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthināṃ mitravargasya vidviṣāṃ ca parāṅmukhaḥ / yo na yāti pitā tena putrī mātā ca vīrasūḥ // 2996	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthināmupapannānāṃ pūrvaṃ cāpyupakāriṇām / āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ // 2997	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthini kavayati kavayati paṭhati ca paṭhati stavonmukhe stauti / paścādyāmītyukte maunī dṛṣṭiṃ nimīlayati // 2998	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthine na tṛṇavaddhanamātraṃ kiṃ tu jīvanamapi pratipādyam / evamāha kuśavajjaladāpī dravyadānavidhiruktividagdhaḥ // 2999	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
arthino jaṭharajvālādagdhā vāk kaṃcidañcati / tāṃ cāśamayato vittaṃ kinnimittaṃ na vidmahe // 3000	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthipratyarthilakṣairapy aparāṅmukhacetasam / tvāṃ parāṅmukhatāṃ ninyuḥ kevalaṃ parayoṣitaḥ // 3001	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthibhuktāvaśiṣṭaṃ yat tadaśnīyān mahāśayaḥ / śveto'rthirahitaṃ bhuktvā nijamāṃsāśano'bhavat // 3002	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthibhyaḥ kanakasya dīpakapiśā viśrāṇitā rāśayo vāde vādiviṣāṇināṃ pratihatāḥ śāstroktigarvā giraḥ / utkhātapratiropitairnṛpatibhiḥ śārairiva krīḍitaṃ kartavyaṃ kṛtamarthitā yadi vidhestatrāpi sajjā vayam // 3003	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthibhyaśca dviṣadbhyaśca vaimukhyaṃ yasya nāstyasau / mahodāraḥ sadā śāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ ko'pi durlabhaḥ // 3004	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthibhraṃśabahūbhavatphalabharavyājena kubjāyitaḥ satyasminnatidānabhāji kathamapyāstāṃ sa kalpadrumaḥ / āste nirvyayaratnasaṃpadudayodagraḥ kathaṃ yācaka- śreṇīvarjanaduryaśonibiḍitavrīḍastu ratnācalaḥ // 3005	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthī karoti dainyaṃ labdhārtho garvamaparitoṣaṃ ca / naṣṭadhanaśca saśokaḥ sukhamāste niḥspṛhaḥ puruṣaḥ // 3006	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthī yenārthakṛtyena saṃvrajatyavicārayan / tamarthamarthaśāstrajñāḥ prāhurarthyāśca lakṣmaṇa // 3007	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthī lāghavamucchrito nipatanaṃ kāmāturo lāñchanaṃ lubdho'kīrtimasaṃgaraḥ paribhavaṃ duṣṭo'nyadoṣe ratim / niḥsvo vañcanamunmanā vikalatāṃ śokākulaḥ saṃśayaṃ durvāgapriyatāṃ durodaravaśaḥ prāpnoti kaṣṭaṃ muhuḥ // 3008	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena tena rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena / mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhādhikamatsareṇa // 3009	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arthena parihīṇaṃ tu naramaspṛśyatāṃ gatam / tyajanti bāndhavāḥ sarve mṛtaṃ sattvamivāsavaḥ // 3010	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthena rakṣitamidaṃ rājyaṃ punararthamarpayati / arthaikaparo nṛpatiḥ pariharati punaḥ kṣaṇādubhayam // 3011	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
arthena hi vihīnasya puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ / vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā // 3012	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthena hīnaḥ puruṣas tyajyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ / tyaktalokakriyāhāraḥ parāsuriva niṣprabhaḥ // 3013	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ / ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // 3014	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthenopārjyate dharmo dharmeṇārtha upārjyate / anyonyāśrayaṇaṃ hyetad ubhayotpattisādhanam // 3015	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthendriyārthābhidhyānaṃ sarvārthāpahnavo nṛṇām / bhraṃśito jñānavijñānād yenāviśati mukhyatām // 3016	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthe pratyupalabdhe ca paradoṣe ca kīrtite / ātmānaṃ sādhu kartavyaṃ śīlavṛttamabhīpsitam // 3017	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthebhyo hi vivṛttebhyaḥ saṃbhṛtebhyastatastataḥ / kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // 3018	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
artheṣu kāmamupalabhya manoratho me strīṇāṃ dhaneṣvanucitaṃ praṇayaṃ karoti / māne ca kāryakaraṇe ca vilambamāno dhig bhoḥ kulaṃ ca puruṣasya daridratāṃ ca // 3019	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
artheṣvalabhyeṣvakṛtaprayatnaṃ kṛtādaraṃ nityamupāyavatsu / jitendriyaṃ nānutapanti rogās tatkālayuktaṃ yadi nāsti daivam // 3020	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthe hyavidyamāne'pi saṃsṛtirna nivartate / dhyāyato viṣayānasya svapne'narthāgamo yathā // 3021	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthairanekairjananīmamuṣyāś cittaṃ ca dattvā cirakālacintyam / saṃtoṣayeyaṃ sahasaiva bhadre na cet kathaṃ syād iha naḥ praveśaḥ // 3022	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthairarthā nibaghyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ / na hyanarthavatā śakyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kartumīhayā // 3023	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthairvihīnaḥ puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ / dharmārthavidyārjanato matiryasya nivartate // 3024	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
artho girāmapihitaḥ pihitaśca kaścit saubhāgyameti marahaṭṭavadhūkucābhaḥ / nāndhrīpayodhara ivātitarāṃ prakāśo no gurjarīstana ivātitarāṃ nigūḍhaḥ // 3025	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
arthotkaṇṭhāvakuṇṭhapramuṣitavinayairluṭhyatāṃ nākiśuṇṭhaiḥ pratno ratnoccayaḥ kiṃ tvativiṣamadaśāṃ tāmanudhyāya khidye / sindho manthādrimanthāt taralatarabṛhadbhaṅgasaṃghātaghāta- prabhraśyanmūlavelāgirigaṇapatanoddāmadhāmandhamīkā // 3026	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
artho narāṇāṃ patiraṅganānāṃ varṣā nadīnāmṛturāṭ tarūṇām / svadharmacārī nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ gataṃ gataṃ yauvanamānayanti // 3027	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
artho na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaścin na vidyā kācidarjitā / na tapaḥ saṃcitaṃ kiṃcid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ // 3028	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
artho nāma janānāṃ jīvitamakhilakriyākalāpaśca / tamapi harantyatidhūrtāḥ chagalagalā gāyanā loke // 3029	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
arthopacayavijñānam asti yasya sa paṇḍitaḥ / saraḥ salilasaṃpūrṇam āśrayanti vihaṅgamāḥ // 3030	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthopārjanadakṣaśca kṣāntiśīlaḥ sadā bhavet / na tatra parakāryāṇi vidvānāpi viśeṣayet // 3031	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
artho'pyarthena cet sādhyaḥ kā vārtā dharmakāmayoḥ / arthaḥ sarvajaganmūlam anartho'rthaviparyayaḥ // 3032	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
artho vinaivārthanayopasīdan nālpo'pi dhīrairavadhīraṇīyaḥ / mānyena manye vidhinā vitīrṇaḥ sa prītidāyo bahu mantumarhaḥ // 3033	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
arthoṣmā pitṛlālanaṃ viṭaghaṭāmelaḥ priyaṃmanyatā tāruṇyaṃ nagare sthitistaralatā dhīḥ kāmaśāstraṃ prati / saṃgītaṃ rajanī vidhurmadhumadaḥ spardhā sapatnaistathā veśyānāmanuraktavittaharaṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam // 3034	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
artho'sti cenna padaśuddhirathāsti sāpi no rītirasti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā / sāpyasti cenna navavakragatistadetad vyarthaṃ vinā rasamaho gahanaṃ kavitvam // 3035	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
artho hi kanyā parakīya eva tāmadya saṃpreṣya parigrahītuḥ / jāto mamāyaṃ viśadaḥ prakāmaṃ pratyarpitanyāsa ivāntarātmā // 3036	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
artho hi naṣṭakāryārthair ayatnenādhigamyate / utsāho balavānārya nāstyutsāhāt paraṃ balam // 3037	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthaucityavatā sūktir alaṃkāreṇa śobhate / pīnastanasthiteneva hāreṇa hariṇekṣaṇā // 3038	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhaṃ kalaṅkarahitā karuṇaiva śaṃbhor ardhaṃ guṇāstaditare sakalāḥ sametāḥ / ityamba saṃprati kila sphuritaṃ rahasyaṃ saṃpaśyato mama bhavanmayamaiśamardham // 3039	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ardhaṃ jitaṃ tripuramamba tava smitaṃ ced ardhāntareṇa ca tathā bhavitavyameva / taccintaye janani kāraṇasūkṣmarūpa- sthūlātmakatripuraśāntikṛte smitaṃ te // 3040	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ardhaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśādardhamapyutprakopād ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyastameva / ekaṃ dhyānānnimīlatyaparamavikasadvīkṣate netramitthaṃ tulyānicchāvidhitsā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvidhāne // 3041	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ardhaṃ dānavavairiṇā girijayāpyardhaṃ śivasyāhṛtaṃ devetthaṃ jagatītale puraharābhāve samunmīlati / gaṅgā sāgaramambaraṃ śaśikalā nāgādhipaḥ kṣmātalaṃ sarvajñatvamadhīśvaratvamagamat tvāṃ māṃ tu bhikṣāṭanam // 3042	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ardhaṃ nītvā niśāyāḥ sarabhasasuratāyāsasaṃśleṣayogaiḥ prodbhūtāsahyatṛṣṇo madhumadanirato harmyapṛṣṭhe vivikte / saṃbhogaklāntakāntāśithilabhujalatāvarjitaṃ karkarīto jyotsnābhinnācchadhāraṃ na pibati salilaṃ śāradaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ // 3043	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ardhaṃ premanibaddhamardhamaparaṃ lajjāśritaṃ mānasaṃ evaṃ netrasaroruhaṃ priyamukhe cānyad gavākṣe'rpitam / paryaṅke padamekameva dharaṇau pṛṣṭhe ca kṛtvāparaṃ sthātuṃ gantumapi prabhātasamaye śaknoti naivābalā // 3044	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ardhaṃ bhāryā manuṣyasya bhāryā śreṣṭhatamaḥ sakhā / bhāryā mūlaṃ trivargasya bhāryā mitraṃ mariṣyataḥ // 3045	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhaṃ sajjanasaṃparkād avidyāyā vinaśyati / caturbhāgastu śāstrārthaiś caturbhāgaṃ svayatnataḥ // 3046	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhaṃ striyastribhuvane sacarācare'sminn ardhaṃ pumāṃsa iti darśayituṃ bhavatyā / strīpuṃsalakṣaṇamidaṃ vapurādṛtaṃ yat tenāsi devi viditā trijagaccharīrā // 3047	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ardhacandraṃ ca cakraṃ ca śakaṭaṃ makaraṃ tathā / kamalaṃ śreṇikāṃ gulmaṃ vyūhānevaṃ prakalpayet // 3048	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhacandravadākāraṃ strīnāmārthaṃ ca tryakṣaram / nakārādi rikārāntaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ // 3049	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhacandrasamāyuktaṃ puṃnāma caturakṣaram / kakārādi lakārāntam iha jānāti paṇḍitaḥ // 3050	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhacandrākṛtiryasmin khaṅge svābhāvikī bhavet / api doṣasahasrāṇi hanti candrastamo yathā // 3051	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhapañcamahastaṃ tu śreṣṭhaṃ cāpaṃ prakīrtitam / tadvijñeyaṃ dhanurdivyaṃ śaṃkareṇa dhṛtaṃ purā // 3052	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhapītamadirā maṇipārī śobhatāṃ kathamatīva taruṇyāḥ / cumbitairadhikapāṭalabhāsā pūritādharamayūkhabhareṇa // 3053	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ardhapītastanaṃ mātur āmardākliṣṭakesaram / prakrīḍituṃ siṃhaśiśuṃ balātkāreṇa karṣati // 3054	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ardhapuruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvatasaṃnibhaśca pāṣāṇaḥ / mṛdbhavati tatra nīlā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ ca bahutoyam // 3055	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ardhaprothasthitā rekhā dṛśyante yasya vājinaḥ / tasya mṛtyuḥ samuddiṣṭo daśamaṃ prāpya vatsaram // 3056	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhapluṣṭaṃ bahubhyaḥ śavapiśitamupāhṛtya hṛṣṭaścitābhyo jātagrāsātirekaḥ sphuṭataradhamanīnaddhaśuṣkārdrakāyaḥ / pretaḥ saṃtarjya dṛṣṭyā kuṭilaparuṣayā majjaniṣkarṣaśuṣkair āhantyāhāralubdhānmuhurabhipatato jambukānasthikhaṇḍaiḥ // 3057	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ardhamīlitavilolatārake sā dṛśau nidhuvanaklamālasā / yanmuhūrtamavahanna tatpunas tṛptirāsta dayitasya paśyataḥ // 3058	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
tatklamastamadidīkṣata kṣaṇaṃ tālavṛntacalanāya nāyakam / tadvidhā hi bhavadaivataṃ priyā vedhaso'pi vidadhāti cāpalam // 3059	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
ardharātre dinasyārdhe tvardhacandre'rdhabhāskare / rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā kṛṣṇapakṣe sitāṣṭamī // 3060	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhasiddheṣu kāryeṣu ātmaguhyaṃ prakāśayet / sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti bakaḥ karkaṭakādyathā // 3061	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhasmitena vinimantrya daśārdhabāṇam ardhaṃ vidhūya vasanāñcalamardhamārge / ardhena netraviśikhena nivṛtya sārdham ardhārdhameva taruṇī taruṇaṃ cakāra // 3062	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ardhahastena hīnastu bhavenmadhyasturaṅgamaḥ / tato hastena hīnaśca hīna eva smṛto hayaḥ // 3063	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhāṅganāpuṃvapuṣaḥ purārer mūrttiḥ śriyaṃ nauriva vastanotu / premātibhārādaparaṃ yadardhaṃ mamajja śṛṅgārarasāmburāśau // 3064	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ardhāṅgāhitapaurvakīrtivanitādīvyatsitāṃśuprabhaṃ kailāsīkṛtadikkarīndraśirasi nyastasvapādāmbujam / viśvavyāpyavināśi śaṃkarapadaṃ yāyāttvadīyaṃ yaśo na syādasya yadi kṣitīśa bhavato dānādikebhyo janiḥ // 3065	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ardhāṅgulaparīṇāhajihvāgrāyāsabhīravaḥ / sarvāṅgakleśajananam abudhāḥ karma kurvate // 3066	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ardhācitā satvaramutthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī / kasyāścidāsīd raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭhamūlārpitasūtraśeṣā // 3067	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ardhādhītāśca yairvedās tathā śūdrānnabhojanāḥ / te dvijāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti nirviṣā iva pannagāḥ // 3068	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhāsane samadhiropya suradvipasya śakro'pi yadyudhi śacīṃ kavacīkaroti / dhīrasya tasya sahate daśakandharasya kaḥ sāhasaikarasikaḥ karavāladhārām // 3069	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ardhena jaladaśyāmam ardhenātapapiṅgalam / ardhanārīśvarākāraṃ na ko manyeta vāsaram // 3070	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhokte bhayamāgato'si kimidaṃ kaṇṭhaśca kiṃ gadgadaś cāṭorasya na ca kṣaṇo'yamanupakṣipteyamāstāṃ kathā / brūhi prastutamastu saṃprati mahat karṇe sakhīnāṃ mukhais tṛptirnirbharamebhirakṣarapadaiḥ prāgeva me saṃbhṛtā // 3071	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ardhodgatena kadalī mṛdutāmratalena garbhakoṣeṇa / pibati nidāghajvaritā ghanadhārāṃ karapuṭenaiva // 3072	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ardhonmīlitalocanasya pibataḥ paryāptamekaṃ stanaṃ sadyaḥ prasnutadugdhadigdhamaparaṃ hastena saṃmārjataḥ / mātrā cāṅgulilālitasya vadane smerāyamāne muhur viṣṇoḥ kṣīrakaṇorudhāmadhavalā dantadyutiḥ pātu vaḥ // 3073	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arpayati pratidivasaṃ priyasya pathi locane bālā / nikṣipati kamalamālāḥ komalamiva kartumadhvānam // 3074	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
arpayantyarthine prāṇān na praṇāmamarātaye / na nāstītyuttaraṃ jātu suhṛde sumanojanāḥ // 3075	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arpitaṃ rasitavatyapi nāma- grāhamanyayuvaterdayitena / ujjhati sma madamapyapibantī vīkṣya madyamitarā tu mamāda // 3076	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
arpitāḥ prathamatastvayi gāvo gopaśāvaka iti praṇayena / dīyate punaridaṃ dhanahīnair vetanaṃ garuḍaketana cetaḥ // 3077	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
arvāgabhyetya garvādiva saridavarā seyamityuddidhīrṣāḥ kālindīṃ kopavegākalitahalahaṭhotkṣepiṇaḥ kṣemahetuḥ / tālāṅkasyāśu dālārasavivaśahṛdaḥ sraṃsadaṃsottarīyaṃ tiryagvyastāḍghri bhūyaḥ suvalanamatha laghūtthānamādhāvanaṃ tat // 3078	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
arvācīnavacaḥ prapañcasukhināṃ duḥśikṣitānāṃ puro gambhīraṃ kavipuṅgavasya kimaho sarvasvamuddhāṭyate / vyarthaṃ kardamagandhagauravahṛtagrāmīṇagoṣṭhīmukhe ko'yaṃ nāma sacetano'sti ya iha prastauti kastūrikām // 3079	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
arvāñcatpañcaśākhaḥ sphuraduparijaṭāmaṇḍalaḥ saṃśritānāṃ nityāparṇo'pi tāpatritayamapanayan sthāṇuravyādapūrvaḥ / yaḥ pronmīlatkapardaiḥ śirasi viracitābālabandhe dyusindhoḥ pāthobhirlabdhasekaḥ phalati phalaśataṃ vāñchitaṃ bhaktibhājām // 3080	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
alaṃkaroti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva na madhyamaḥ / alaṃ karoti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva namadhyamaḥ // 3081	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃkaroti hi jarā rājāmātyabhiṣagyatīn / viḍambayati paṇyastrīmallagāyanasevakān // 3082	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃkartuṃ karṇau bhṛśamanubhavantyā navarujaṃ sasītkāraṃ tiryagvalitavadanāyā mṛgadṛśaḥ / karābjavyāpārānatisukṛtasārān rasayato januḥ sarvaślāghyaṃ jayati lalitottaṃsa bhavataḥ // 3083	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkākaranarakapālaṃ parijano viśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahuvayāḥ / avastheyaṃ sthāṇorapi bhavati sarvāmaraguror vidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punaramī // 3084	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
alaṃkārapriyo viṣṇur jaladhārāpriyaḥ śivaḥ / namaskārapriyo bhānur brāhmaṇo bhojanapriyaḥ // 3085	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃkārabhṛto rītimantaḥ siddhā rasonnatau / lakṣaṇairlakṣitātmānaḥ kṛtino nanu kecana // 3086	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā / duṣkaraṃ tacca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ // 3087	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yādṛśī vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsāmaviśeṣataḥ / kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ // 3088	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat // 3089	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
alaṃkṛtaḥ kāñcanakoṭimūlyair mahārharatnairgajavājivāhaiḥ / nimeṣamātraṃ labhate na jīvaṃ kālena kāle śikhayā gṛhītaḥ // 3090	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alaṃkriyante śikhinaḥ kekayā madaraktayā / vācā vipaścito'tyarthaṃ mādhuryaguṇayuktayā // 3091	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃkriyā śaktisamanvitānāṃ tapodhanānāṃ balaśaktiragryā / vyāpādadāvānalavāridhārā pratyeha ca kṣāntiranarthaśāntiḥ // 3092	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alaṃ tridivavārtayā kimiti sārvabhaumaśriyā vidūrataravartinī bhavatu mokṣalakṣmīrapi / kalindagirinandinītaṭanikuñjapuñjodare mano harati kevalaṃ navatamālanīlaṃ mahaḥ // 3093	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
alaṃ nalaṃ roddhumamī kilābhavan guṇā vivekapramukhā na cāpalam / smaraḥ sa ratyāmaniruddhameva yat sṛjatyayaṃ sarganisarga īdṛśaḥ // 3094	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ / kṛmirhi kośakārastu badhyate svaparigrahāt // 3095	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vā bahu yo brūte hitavākyāvamāninaḥ / sa tasmāllabhate doṣaṃ kapeḥ sūcīmukho yathā // 3096	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vā bahuvādena yatra yatrānurajyase / tatra tatraiva te duḥkhadāvapāvakapaṅktayaḥ // 3097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vilaṅghya priyavijña yācñāṃ kṛtvāpi vāmyaṃ vividhaṃ vidheye / yaśaḥpathādāśravatāpadotthāt khalu skhalitvāstakhaloktikhelāt // 3098	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alaṃ vilambya tvarituṃ hi velā kārye kila sthairyasahe vicāraḥ / gurūpadeśaṃ pratibheva tīkṣṇā pratīkṣate jātu na kālamartiḥ // 3099	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ / mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate // 3100	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
alaṃ sthitvā śmaśāne'smin gṛdhragomāyusaṃkule / kaṅkālabahule ghore sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkare // 3101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na punarjīvitaḥ kaścit kāladharmamupāgataḥ / priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśī // 3102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ himānīparidīrṇagātraḥ samāpitaḥ phālgunasaṃgamena / atyantamākāṅkṣitakṛṣṇavartmā bhīṣmo mahātmājani māghatulyaḥ // 3103	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alakatamaḥ paripītaṃ susmitasuṣamāpuraskṛtaṃ madhuram / ko na sudhānidhisahajaṃ sumukhi mukhaṃ hanta saṃmanutām // 3104	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alakāśca khalāścaiva mūrdhni bhīrujanairdhṛtāḥ / uparyupari satkāre'pyāviṣkurvanti vakratām // 3105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alakeṣu cūrṇabhāsaḥ svedalavābhān kapolaphalakeṣu / navaghanakautukinīnāṃ vārikaṇān paśyati kṛtārthaḥ // 3106	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alaktako yathā rakto naraḥ kāmī tathaiva ca / hṛtasārastathā so'pi pādamūle nipātyate // 3107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaktako yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā / abalābhirbalād raktaḥ pādamūle nipātyate // 3108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alakṣitakucābhogaṃ bhramantī nṛtyabhūmiṣu / smareṇāpi sarojākṣī na lakṣyīkriyate śaraiḥ // 3109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alakṣitagatāgataiḥ kulavadhūkaṭākṣairiva kṣaṇānunayaśītalaiḥ praṇayakelikopairiva / suvṛttamasṛṇonnatairmṛgadṛśāmurojairiva tvadīyaturagairidaṃ dharaṇicakramākramyate // 3110	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
alakṣmīrāviśatyenaṃ śayānamalasaṃ naram / niḥsaṃśayaṃ phalaṃ labdhvā dakṣo bhūtimupāśnute // 3111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaghutā jaṭharasya kucau gatā caraṇacañcalatā nayane gatā / sakhi vilokaya me tanuceṣṭitaṃ vinimayapragataṃ navayauvanam // 3112	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
alaghūpalapaṅktiśālinīḥ parito ruddhanirantarāmbarāḥ / adhirūḍhanitambabhūmayo na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ // 3113	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
alaṅghyaṃ tattadudvīkṣya yadyaduccairmahībhṛtām / priyatāṃ jyāyasīṃ mā gān mahatāṃ kena tuṅgatā // 3114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṅghyaṃ sarveṣāmiha khalu phalaṃ karmajanitaṃ vipat karmapraiṣyā vyathayati na jātāsi hṛdayam / yadajñāḥ kurvanti prasabhamupahāsaṃ dhanamadād idaṃ tvantargāḍhaṃ paramaparitāpaṃ janayati // 3115	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
alabdhaṃ caiva lipseta labdhaṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ / rakṣitaṃ vardhayeccaiva vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet // 3116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhadugdhādiraso rasāvahaṃ tadudbhavo nimbarasaṃ kṛmiryathā / adṛṣṭajainendravacorasāyanas tathā kutattvaṃ manute rasāyanam // 3117	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
alabdhamiccheddaṇḍena labdhaṃ rakṣedavekṣayā / rakṣitaṃ vardhayed vṛddhyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet // 3118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhamīheddharmeṇa labdhaṃ yatnena pālayet / pālitaṃ vardhayennītyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet // 3119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhalipsā nyāyena labdhasya ca vivardhanam / parivṛddhasya vidhivat pātre saṃpratipādanam // 3120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
alabdhavetano lubdho mānī cāpyavamānitaḥ / kruddhaśca kopito'kasmāt tathā bhītaśca bhīṣitaḥ // 3121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathābhilaṣitaiḥ kāmair bhindyādetāṃścaturvidhān / parapakṣe svapakṣe ca yathāvat praśamaṃ nayet // 3122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhāntaḥ praveśasya tāramākrandato bahiḥ / prabho karuṇayā karṇe kriyantāṃ kṛpaṇoktayaḥ // 3123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhe rāgiṇo lokā aho labdhe virāgiṇaḥ / hemante tāpamīhante hanta grīṣme himaṃ punaḥ // 3124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhvāpi dhanaṃ rājñaḥ saṃśritā yānti saṃpadam / mahāhradasamīpasthaṃ paśya nīlaṃ vanaspatim // 3125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabdhvā yadi vā labdhvā nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ / ānantaryaṃ cārabhate na prāṇānāṃ dhanāyate // 3126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!))
alabhanta nabhaḥkṣetre tārāstaralakāntayaḥ / tviṣaṃ tuṣārabījānāṃ nūtanāṅkuraśālinām // 3127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabhyaṃ lapsyamānena tattvaṃ jijñāsunā ciram / jigīṣuṇā hriyaṃ tyaktvā kāryaṃ kolāhalo mahān // 3128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabhyaṃ labdhukāmasya janasya gatirīdṛśī / alabdheṣu manastāpaḥ saṃcitārtho vinaśyati // 3129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alabhyalābhāya ca labdhavṛddhaye yathārhatīrthapratipādanāya ca / yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇameva vāsaya // 3130	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
alamaticapalatvāt svapnamāyopamatvāt pariṇativirasatvāt saṃgamenāṅganāyāḥ / iti yadi śatakṛtvas tattvamālocayāmas tadapi na hariṇākṣīṃ vismaratyantarātmā // 3131	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alamathavā bahuvādair viracaya lokānurāganirbandham / tatraikatra samagraṃ tannihitaṃ yanna jātu saṃnihitam // 3132	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
alamandha bhujāyaṣṭibhrāntyā bhrātarjaḍasya te / daṃśāya daṃdaśūko'yaṃ daṃśamudrāṃ na muñcati // 3133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alamanyathā gṛhītvā na khalu manasvini mayā prayuktamidam / prāyaḥ samānavidyāḥ parasparayaśaḥpurobhāgāḥ // 3134	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alamanyairupālambhaiḥ kīrtitaiśca vyatikramaiḥ / peśalaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kartavyaṃ hitamātmanaḥ // 3135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alamapriyāṇyuditvā rucirārthāḥ kimiha na sthitā vācaḥ / amṛtamiti vacasi satyapi viṣamiti hi kimucyate vāri // 3136	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alamabhimukhairbaddhairbhogairalaṃ bhramibhirdṛśor alamaviralairgarjodgārairalaṃ viṣavṛṣṭibhiḥ / kimiha bhujagāḥ kopāvegairamībhiramudritair nanu bhagavatastārkṣyasyaite vayaṃ stutipāṭhakāḥ // 3137	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
alamalamaghṛṇasya tasya nāmnā punarapi saiva kathā gataḥ sa kālaḥ / kathaya kathaya vā tathāpi dūti prativacanaṃ dviṣato'pi mānanīyam // 3138	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam / calitamapi niroddhuṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi // 3139	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alamalamativṛddhyā sthīyatāṃ tasya paśyasy akaruṇa karabhororbhajyate madhyametat / iti gurujaghanājñācoditā romarājiḥ stanayugamasitākṣyā vaktumārohatīva // 3140	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alamalamanugamya prasthitaṃ prāṇanāthaṃ prathamavirahaśoke na pratīkāra eṣaḥ / sapadi ramaṇayātrā śreya ityāraṭantyā caraṇapatanapūrvaṃ sā niruddheva kāñcyā // 3141	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alamalamiyameva prāṇināṃ pātakānāṃ nirasanaviṣaye yā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti vāṇī / yadi bhavati mukunde bhaktirānandasāndrā viluṭhati caraṇābje mokṣasāmrājyalakṣmīḥ // 3142	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alamātmīyaṃ viditaṃ viditaṃ dhanikasya yācako'vahitaḥ / candraṃ bravīti caṭakaṃ caṭakaṃ candraṃ ca lobhalolamanā // 3143	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
alamādivarāheṇa vaṭudāsaṃ paraṃ stumaḥ / jagaduddharatā yena na vakrīkṛtamānanam // 3144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alamudakena tṛṇairvā manasvinā prāṇadhāraṇā kāryā / nāsaṃskṛtaśca puruṣaḥ prākṛtasattvaḥ praṇayitavyaḥ // 3145	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alalitagatiruccaiḥ sthūlavakrāṅgulīkaṃ vahati caraṇa yugmaṃ kandharāṃ hrasvapīnām / kapilakacakalāpā krūraceṣṭātipīnā dviradamadavigandhiḥ svāṅkake'naṅkake ca // 3146	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
dviguṇakaṭukaṣāyaprāyabhug vītalajjā luladativipuloṣṭhī duḥkhasādhyā prayoge / bahirapi bahuromātyantamantarviśālaṃ vahati jaghanarandhraṃ hastinī gadgadoktiḥ // 3147	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alasaṃ mukharaṃ stabdhaṃ krūraṃ vyasaninaṃ śaṭham / asaṃtuṣṭamabhaktaṃ ca tyajed bhṛtyaṃ narādhipaḥ // 3148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alasaṃ vapuṣi ślathaṃ dukūle capalaṃ cetasi dhūsaraṃ kapole / cakitaṃ nayane stane vilolaṃ tava nāmaśravaṇaṃ tanūdarīṇām // 3149	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
alasaṃ vikramaśrāntaṃ vihatopāyaceṣṭitam / kṣayavyayapravāsaiśca śrameṇa viparidrutam // 3150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhīruṃ mūrkhaṃ striyaṃ bālaṃ dhārmikaṃ durjanaṃ paśum / maitrīpradhānaṃ kalyāṇabuddhiṃ sāntvena sādhayet // 3151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
alasabhujalatābhirnādṛto nāgarībhir bhavanadamanakānāṃ nātithirvā babhūva / tvadarinagaramadhye saṃcaraṃścaitrajanmā jaradajagarapītaḥ kṣīyate gandhavāhaḥ // 3152	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alasamadhurā snigdhā dṛṣṭirghanatvamupāgatā kisalayarucirnistāmbūlasvabhāvadharodharaḥ / trivalivalayā lekhonneyā ghaṭanta ivaikataḥ prakṛtisubhagā garbheṇāsau kimapyupapāditā // 3153	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
alasamukulitākṣaṃ vaktramālokya tasyā mayi vilulitacitte mūkabhāvaṃ prapanne / śravaṇakuvalayāntaścāriṇā ṣaṭpadena kṣaṇamanugatanādaṃ gītamantaḥ smarāmi // 3154	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alasayati gātramadhikaṃ bhramayati cetastanoti saṃtāpam / mohaṃ ca muhuḥ kurute viṣamaviṣaṃ vīkṣitaṃ tasyāḥ // 3155	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alasalulitamugdhānyadhvasaṃpātakhedād aśithilaparirambhairdattasaṃvāhanāni / parimṛditamṛṇālīdurbalānyaṅgakāni tvamurasi mama kṛtvā yatra nidrāmavāptā // 3156	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alasavalitaiḥ premārdrārdrairmuhurmukulīkṛtaiḥ kṣaṇamabhimukhairlajjālolairnimeṣaparāṅmukhaiḥ / hṛdayanihitaṃ bhāvākūtaṃ vamadbhirivekṣaṇaiḥ kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate // 3157	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
alasavilasanmugdhasnigdhasmitaṃ vrajasundarīm adanakadanasvinnaṃ dhanyaṃ mahadvadanāmbujam / taruṇamaruṇajyotsnākārtsnyasmitasnapitādharaṃ jayati vijayaśreṇīmeṇīdṛśāṃ madayanmahaḥ // 3158	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
alasavilasitānāmullasadbhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistāritānām / pratinayananipāte kiṃcidākuñcitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām // 3159	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
alasasya kuto vidyā avidyasya kuto dhanam / adhanasya kuto mitram amitrasya kutaḥ sukham // 3160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alasasyālpadoṣasya nirvidyasyākṛtātmanaḥ / pradānakāle bhavati mātāpi hi parāṅmukhī // 3161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
alasānapi n n rakṣen na kṛtaghnān kadācana / dviṣato'pi guṇāḥ kāmyāḥ suhṛdo'pi na durguṇāḥ // 3162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
alasāruṇalocanāravindāṃ paribhogocitadhūsaraikacelām / śithilākulaveṇibandharamyām abalāmantikaśāyinīṃ didṛkṣe // 3163	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
alasairmadena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ svagṛhān prati pratiyayuḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / alaghuprasāritavilocanāñjali- drutapītamādhavarasaughanirbharaiḥ // 3164	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
alaso mandabuddhiśca sukhī ca vyādhipīḍitaḥ / nidrāluḥ kāmukaścaiva ṣaḍete śāstravarjitāḥ // 3165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alābuṃ vartulākāraṃ vārtākaṃ kundasaṃnibham / prāṇānte'pi na cāśnīyān masūrānnaṃ savalkalam // 3166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alābubījaṃ trapusasya bījaṃ tasyaiva toyena ca tanniṣiktam / ālepanādyairvidhivat prayuktaṃ hanyādviṣaṃ takṣakasaṃbhavaṃ ca // 3167	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alābhāt puruṣāṇāṃ hi bhayāt parijanasya ca / vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ // 3168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alikulamañjulakeśī parimalabahulā rasāvahā tanvī / kiśalayapeśalapāṇiḥ kokilakalabhāṣiṇī priyatamā me // 3169	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
alinīlālakalataṃ kaṃ na hanti ghanastani / ānanaṃ nalinacchāyanayanaṃ śaśikānti te // 3170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alipaṭalairanuyātāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayajvaraṃ vilumpantīm / mṛgamadaparimalalaharīṃ samīra pāmarapure kirasi // 3171	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alibhirañjanabindumanoharaiḥ kusumapaṅktinipātibhiraṅkitaḥ / na khalu śobhayati sma vanasthalīṃ na tilakastilakaḥ pramadāmiva // 3172	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aliyuvā vilalāsa cirāya yas tridaśaśaivalinīkamalodare / vidhiviyoganiyogavaśīkṛto gatatarau sa marau ramate katham // 3173	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aliranusarati parimalaṃ lakṣmīranusarati nayaguṇasamṛddhim / nimnamanusarati salilaṃ vidhilikhitaṃ buddhiranusarati // 3174	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alirayaṃ nalinīdalamadhyagaḥ kamalinīmakarandamadālasaḥ / vidhivaśāt paradeśamupāgataḥ kuṭajapuṣparasaṃ bahu manyate // 3175	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
alirmṛgo vā netraṃ vā yatra kiṃcid vibhāsate / aravindaṃ mṛgāṅko vā mukhaṃ vedaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ // 3176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alivalayairalakairiva kusumastabakaiḥ stanairiva vasante / bhānti latā lalanā iva pāṇibhiriva kisalayaiḥ sapadi // 3177	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alīka eva tvadbhāvo madbhāvo'līka eva ca / anubhūto'pyasadrūpaḥ svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā // 3178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alīkarūpo yadi madhyabhāgaḥ payodharākārabhṛtaśca keśāḥ / utsaṅgaśobhāpi saroruhākṣyāḥ karasya śobhāṃ kalayenna kasmāt // 3179	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alīkavyāmuktapracurakabarībandhanamiṣād udañcaddorvallīdvayadhṛtaparīveśanihitaḥ / ayaṃ jṛmbhārambhasphaṭikaśucidantāṃśunicayo mukhendurgaurāṅgyā galitamṛgajñakṣmā vijayate // 3180	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
alīnāṃ mālābhirviracitajaṭābhāramahimā parāgaiḥ puṣpāṇāmuparacitabhasmavyatikaraḥ / vanānāmābhoge kusumavati puṣpoccayaparo marun mandaṃ mandaṃ vicarati parivrājaka iva // 3181	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aluptasattvakośānāṃ mahattvaṃ mahatāṃ hi kim / ākarṇitāṃ parasyārtiṃ na cecchindanti tatkṣaṇam // 3182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alubdhaiḥ saha sauhārdaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathā / uttamaiḥ saha saṅgaśca vidheyāḥ sukhamicchatā // 3183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alobhaḥ paramaṃ vittam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ / amāyā paramā vidyā niravadyā manīṣiṇām // 3184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alomaśaṃ pūrṇaśaśāṅkaśobhaṃ mukhaṃ tu yūnāṃ katicid dināni / jāte tataḥ śmaśruviśālajāle śevālalīnābjatulāṃ bibharti // 3185	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alaukikamahālokaprakāśitajagattrayaḥ / stūyate deva sadvaṃśamuktāratnaṃ na kairbhavān // 3186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaulyamārogyamaniṣṭhuratvaṃ gandhaḥ śubho mūtrapurīṣamalpam / kāntiḥ prasādaḥ svarasaumyatā ca yogapravṛtteḥ prathamaṃ hi cihnam // 3187	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alpaṃ kiṃcicchriyaṃ prāpya nīco garvāyate laghu / padmapatratale bheko manyate daṇḍadhāriṇam // 3188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpaṃ darpabalaṃ daitya sthiramakrodhaja balam / hatastvaṃ darpajairdoṣair hitvā yo bhāṣase kṣamām // 3189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
alpaṃ nirmitamākāśam anālocyaiva vedhasā / idamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stanajṛmbhanam // 3190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpato'dhikataḥ sādhyaṃ laghunaiva prasādhayet / bhūpradakṣiṇato'halyāṃ gautamaḥ kapilāṃ bhraman // 3191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpatoyaścalatkumbho hyalpadugdhāśca dhenavaḥ / alpavidyo mahāgarvī kurūpī bahuceṣṭitaḥ // 3192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpaprabhostu sevāyāṃ bhuktimātraṃ prayojanam / anugrahamajāmūlyaṃ nigrahaṃ prāṇasaṃkaṭam // 3193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpamapyavamanyeta na śatrurbaladarpitaḥ / rāmeṇa rāmaḥ śiśunā brāhmaṇyadayayojjhitaḥ // 3194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
alpaśrutalava eva prāyaḥ prakaṭayati vāgvibhavamuccaiḥ / sarvatra kunaṭa eva hi nāṭakamadhikaṃ viḍambayati // 3195	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alpasāro'pi yo mohād vistāraṃ kartumicchati / paścācchocati durbuddhir nālikerabako yathā // 3196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpākṣararamaṇīyaṃ yaḥ kathayati niścitaṃ sa khalu vāgmī / bahuvacanamalpasāraṃ yaḥ kathayati vipralāpī saḥ // 3197	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alpānāmapi vastūnāṃ saṃhatiḥ kāryasādhikā / tṛṇairguṇatvamāpannair badhyante mattadantinaḥ // 3198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpāpakāramapi pārśvagataṃ nihanti nīco na dūramasamāgasamapyarātim / śvā nirdaśatyupalamantikamāpatantaṃ tattyāginaṃ na tu vidūragamugraroṣaḥ // 3199	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
alpāyāṃ vā mahatyāṃ vā senāyāmiti niścayaḥ / harṣo yodhagaṇasyaiko jayalakṣaṇamucyate // 3200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpāśca guṇāḥ sphītā bhavanti guṇasamuditeṣu puruṣeṣu / śvetagiriśikharakeṣviva niśāsu candrāṃśavaḥ patitāḥ // 3201	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alpāśrayaṃ samāsādya mahānapyalpako bhavet / gajendraḥ parvatākāro yathā darpaṇamāśritaḥ // 3202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpīyaḥskhalanena yatra patanaṃ kṛcchreṇa yatronnatir dvāre vetralatāvitānagahane kaṣṭaḥ praveśakramaḥ / he sāraṅga manoramā vanabhuvastyaktvā viśeṣārthinā kiṃ bhūbhṛtkaṭakasthitivyasaninā vyarthaṃ khurāḥ śātitāḥ // 3203	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
alpīyasāmeva nivāsabhūmi- tyāgādvipattirmahatāṃ na jātu / ratnākarāt sanmaṇayo'bhiyānti rājñāṃ śiraḥ kākamukhāni bhekāḥ // 3204	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
alpīyasaiva payasā yatkumbhaḥ pūryate prasiddhaṃ tat / brāhmaṃ tejaḥ paśyata kumbhodbhūtaḥ papau vārdhim // 3205	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alpecchurdhṛtimān prājñaś chāyevānugataḥ sadā / ādiṣṭo na vikalpeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset // 3206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpena vibhavenaiva vyayādhikyaṃ na yuktitaḥ / kṣīṇena vāsasācchanne pādavistāraṇaṃ yathā // 3207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpenāpi suraktena sādhanena prayojanam / oṣṭhadvayasahāyena kāntāsyena jagajjitam // 3208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpenaiva guṇena hi kaścilloke prasiddhimupayāti / ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa // 3209	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
alpe'pi nṛpatidatte pratiśrute vāpi dātumetena / utthāyāśīrdeyā kvacidupaviśyāpi pariṣadaucityāt // 3210	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
alpe'pyapakṛte mohān na śāntimupagacchati / tādṛśaiḥ saṃgataṃ nīcair nṛśaṃsairakṛtātmabhiḥ / niśāmya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā vidvān dūrād vivarjayet // 3211	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: tstB], ajñātam [12: jjtm], ajñātam [12: ymtr], ajñātam [12: ysjB]
alpe vayasi he bāle kucayoḥ patanaḥ kutaḥ / adhastāt khanane mūḍha girayo na patanti kim // 3212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpo'pi hyariratyantaṃ vardhamānaparākramaḥ / valmīko mūlaja iva grasate vṛkṣamantikāt // 3213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
avaṃśapatito rājā mūrkhaputraśca paṇḍitaḥ / adhanī hi dhanaṃ prāpya tṛṇavanmanyate jagat // 3214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avakāśaḥ suvṛttānāṃ hṛdayāntarna yoṣitām / itīva vihitau dhātrā suvṛttau tadbahiḥ kucau // 3215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avakeśino'sya yuktaṃ jānāmi taroraśoka iti nāma / phalapākavidhuritātmā yato'nyathāsau saśokaḥ syāt // 3216	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avakrastārakādhīśaḥ paripūrṇapriyodayaḥ / prācīṃ diśamatikramya patanaṃ pratipadyate // 3217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avakre māṃsahīne ca vājijaṅghe suśobhane / kūrcaṃ samaṃ susaṃdhi syād granthivraṇavivārjitam // 3218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avagacchati mūḍhacetanaḥ priyanāśaṃ hṛdi śalyamarpitam / sthiradhīstu tadeva manyate kuśaladvāratayā samuddhṛtam // 3219	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
avagamya kathīkṛtaṃ vapuḥ priyabandhostava niṣphalodayaḥ / bahule'pi gate niśākaras tanutāṃ duḥkhamanaṅga mokṣyati // 3220	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
avacanaṃ vacanaṃ priyasaṃnidhāv anavalokanameva vilokanam / avayavāvaraṇaṃ ca yadañcala- vyatikareṇa tadaṅgasamarpaṇam // 3221	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
