avacayaparibhogavanti hiṃsraiḥ sahacaritānyamṛgāṇi kānanāni / abhidadhurabhito muniṃ vadhūbhyaḥ samuditasādhvasaviklavaṃ ca cetaḥ // 3222	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avacitakusumā vihāya vallīr yuvatiṣu komalamālyamālinīṣu / padamupadadhire kulānyalīnāṃ naparicayo malinātmanāṃ pradhānam // 3223	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avacitabalipuṣpā vedisaṃmārgadakṣā niyamavidhijalānāṃ barhiṣāṃ copanetrī / giriśamupacacāra pratyahaṃ sā sukeśī niyamitaparikhedā tacchiraścandrapādaiḥ // 3224	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
avajitamadhunā tavāhamakṣṇo ruciratayetyavanamya lajjayeva / śravaṇakuvalayaṃ vilāsavatyā bhramararutairupakarṇamācacakṣe // 3225	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avajñayā dīyate yat tathaivāśraddhayāpi ca / tadāhuradhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥ // 3226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cillīlayāpi vā / avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // 3227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avajñayā yadahasaduccakairbalaḥ samullasaddaśanamayūkhamaṇḍalaḥ / ruṣāruṇīkṛtamapi tena tatkṣaṇaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ punaranayannijāṃ rucim // 3228	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
avajñāto'pi duṣṭena guṇo doṣo na manyate / nahi campakasaugandhyaṃ pūtirbhṛṅgāvahelayā // 3229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avajñānasahasraistu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarā dhane / dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhairvidhīyate // 3230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avajñāsphuṭitaṃ prema samīkartuṃ ka īśvaraḥ / saṃdhiṃ na yāti sphuṭitaṃ lākṣālepena mauktikam // 3231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
avatārā hyasaṃkheyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ / yathā vidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ // 3232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avati nikhilalokaṃ yaḥ pitevādṛtātmā dahati duritarāśiṃ pāvako vendhanaukam / vitarati śivasaukhyaṃ hanti saṃsāraśatruṃ vidadhatu śubhabuddhyā taṃ budhā dharmamatra // 3233	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
avatu vaḥ savitusturagāvalī sphurati madhyagatāruṇanāyakā / samabhilambhitatuṅgapayodharā marakataikalateva nabhaḥśriyaḥ // 3234	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
avadyajambālagaveṣaṇāya kṛtodyamānāṃ khalasairibhāṇām / kavīndravāṅnirjaranirjhariṇyāṃ saṃjāyate vyarthamanorathatvam // 3235	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avadyamukte pathi yaḥ pravartate pravartayatyanyajanaṃ ca niḥspṛhaḥ / sa sevitavyaḥ svahitaiṣiṇā guruḥ svayaṃ taraṃstārayituṃ kṣamaḥ param // 3236	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avadhānena maunena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ / viśvāsayitvā dveṣṭāram avalumped yathā vṛkaḥ // 3237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
avadhāraya dharmeṣu pradhānamavadhānataḥ / nirbharānandakandāya govindāya mano'rpaya // 3238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhārya kāryagurutāmabhavan na bhayāya sāndratamasaṃtamasam / sutanoḥ stanau ca dayitopagame tanuromarājipathavepathave // 3239	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avadhidināvadhijīvāḥ prasīda jīvantu pathikajanajāyāḥ / durlaṅghyavartmaśailau stanau pidhehi prapāpāli // 3240	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avadhidivasaḥ prāptaścāyaṃ tanorvirahasya vā ravirayamupaityastaṃ sakhyo mamāpi ca jīvitam / tadalamaphalairāśābandhaiḥ prasīda namo'stu te hṛdaya sahasā pākotpīḍaṃ viḍambaya dāḍimam // 3241	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
avadhidivasaḥ so'yaṃ nātrāgataḥ kimiyat kṣaṇaṃ vitara nayane paśyaitanme puraḥ sakhi sāhasam / iyamiyamahaṃ rūḍhajvālākarālitarodasīṃ malayajarasābhyaktairaṅgaiḥ patāmyabhi kaumudīm // 3242	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
avadhīraṇāṃ kṛtavatī bhavatī mayi yatkukarmamahimā sa hi me / yadi cātako na labhate'mbu ghanād vacanīyatā bhavati kāmbumucaḥ // 3243	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avadhīraya dhanavikalaṃ kuru gauravamakṛśasaṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ / asmādṛśaṃ hi mugdhe dhanasiddhyai rūpanirmāṇam // 3244	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avadhūtapraṇipātāḥ paścāt saṃtapyamānamanaso'pi / nibhṛtairvyapatrapante dayitānunayairmanasvinyaḥ // 3245	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avadhūyāribhirnītā hariṇaistulyavṛttitām / anyonyasyāpi jihrīmaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sahavāsinām // 3246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhehi kṣaṇamehi bhrātarbhāvajña bhāvaya giraṃ naḥ / carame cakāsti cetasi mūkasvapnopamo bhāvaḥ // 3247	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avadhau divasāvasānakāle bhavanadvāri vilocane dadhānā / avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva // 3248	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
avadhyaṃ vāthavāgamyam akṛtyaṃ nāsti kiṃcana / loke buddhimatāmatra tasmāttāṃ yojayāmyaham // 3249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo striyo bālāśca jñātayaḥ / yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ // 3250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhyairindupādānām asādhyaiścandanāmbhasām / dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi kāmāturaṃ manaḥ // 3251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk / yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuktāni ye ca syuḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // 3252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk / vihitā vyaṅgitā teṣām aparādhe garīyasi // 3253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avanatavadanenduricchatīva vyavadhimadhīratayā yadasthitāsmai / aharata sutarāmato'sya cetaḥ sphuṭamabhibhūṣayati striyastrapaiva // 3254	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avanataśirasaḥ prayāma śīghraṃ pathi vṛṣabhā iva varṣatāḍitākṣāḥ / mama hi sadasi gauravapriyasya kulajanadarśanakātaraṃ hi cakṣuḥ // 3255	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avanamya vakṣasi nimagnakuca- dvitayena gāḍhamupagūḍhavatā / dayitena tatkṣaṇacaladraśanā- kalakiṃkiṇīravamudāsi vadhūḥ // 3256	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avanau śanaiḥ śanaistvaṃ nidadhāsi padadvayaṃ svasya / lakṣyaṃ paśyasi na vadasi bhajasi jalaṃ baka tato'si sitaḥ // 3257	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
avantiḥ kāvyamānarca bharcormaukhariśekharaḥ   / śiṣyo bāṇaśca saṃkrāntakāntavedyavacāḥ kaviḥ // 3258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avantinātho'yamudagrabāhur viśālavakṣāstanuvṛttamadhyaḥ / āropya cakrabhramamuṣṇatejās tvaṣṭreva yatnollikhito vibhāti // 3259	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avanti ye janakasamā munīśvarāś caturvidhaṃ gaṇamanavadyavṛttayaḥ / svadehavaddalitamadāṣṭakārayo bhavantu te mama guravo bhavāntakāḥ // 3260	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād dharmataḥ kāmato'rthataḥ / gate hi divase tasmiṃs tadūnaṃ tasya jīvitam // 3261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avandhyakopasya vihanturāpadāṃ bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayameva dehinaḥ / amarṣaśūnyena janasya jantunā na jātahārdena na vidviṣādaraḥ // 3262	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avamānahataṃ yacca dattamaśraddhayā dhanam / ūṣare niṣphalaṃ bījaṃ kṣiptamakṣiptameva tat // 3263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avamānāraṇimathitaṃ durvāgindhanavivardhitajvālam / satpuruṣāḥ kopāgniṃ jñānāmbughaṭaiḥ praśamayanti // 3264	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avamānena mahatāṃ praharṣakrodhavismayaiḥ / tapāṃsi kṣayamāyānti yaśāṃsīva sudurnayaiḥ // 3265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avamuktamapakrāntamukhyaṃ tanna kṣamaṃ yudhi / pitṛpaitāmahaṃ maulaṃ tat kruddhaṃ sāntvitaṃ kṣamam // 3266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avayaḥ kevalakavayaḥ kīrāḥ syuḥ kevalaṃ dhīrāḥ / vīrāḥ paṇḍitakavayas tānavamantā tu kevalaṃ gavayaḥ // 3267	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
avayaveṣu parasparabiṃbiteṣv atulanirmalakāntiṣu tattanoḥ / ayamayaṃ pravibhāga iti sphuṭaṃ jagati niścinute caturo'pi kaḥ // 3268	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
avalambitaviṣṇupadaḥ karṣitajanacakṣuratulagatiḥ / patramayo'pi padārthaḥ pataṅgatāmeti guṇayogāt // 3269	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
avalipteṣu mūrkheṣu raudrasāhasikeṣu ca / tathaivāpetadharmeṣu na maitrīmācared budhaḥ // 3270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avalepamanaṅgasya vardhayanti balāhakāḥ / karśayanti tu dharmasya mārutoddhūtaśīkarāḥ // 3271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avalokanamapi sukhayati kuvalayadalacārucapalanayanāyāḥ / kiṃ punaralakacaladdyuti- sarabhasamāliṅganaṃ tanvyāḥ // 3272	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avalokitamanumodita- māliṅgitamaṅganābhiranurāgaiḥ / adhivṛndāvanakuñjaṃ marakatapuñjaṃ namasyāmaḥ // 3273	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avalokya nartitaśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalair navanīradairniculitaṃ nabhastalam / divase'pi vañjulanikuñjamitvarī viśati sma vallabhavataṃsitaṃ rasāt // 3274	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
avalokya stanau vadhvā guñjāphalavibhūṣitau / niḥśvasya roditi kliṣṭā kuto vyādhakaṭumbinī // 3275	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśendriyacittānāṃ hastisnānamiva kriyā / durbhagābharaṇaprāyo jñānaṃ bhāraḥ kriyāṃ vinā // 3276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ kopāgnistava sutanu nirvāsyati cirāt svaśobhāmārūḍhaṃ mukhamapi ca te hāsyati śucam / bhavadgoṣṭhīśūnyā mama tu divasā yānti ya ime na teṣāmāvṛttiḥ punarapi mano dūyata iti // 3277	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avaśyaṃ nidhanaṃ sarvair gantavyamiha mānavaiḥ / avaśyabhāvinyarthe vai saṃtāpo neha vidyate // 3278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
avaśyaṃ piturācāraṃ putraḥ samanuvartate / nahi ketakavṛkṣasya bhavatyāmalakīphalam // 3279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathābalam // 3280	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ bhāvinaṃ nāśaṃ bhāvitvād vidhyupasthitam / ayameva hi te kālaḥ pūrvamāsīdanāgataḥ // 3281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanti mahātamapi / nagnatvaṃ nīlakaṇṭhasya mahāhiśayanaṃ hareḥ // 3282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃbhāvibhāvānāṃ pratīkāro bhaved yada / tadā duḥkhairna bādhyante nalarāmayudhiṣṭhirāḥ // 3283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvāpi viṣayā viyoge ko bhedastyajati na jano yat svamamūn / vrajantaḥ svātantryādatulaparitāpāya manasaḥ svayaṃ tyaktā hyete śamasukhamanantaṃ vidadhati // 3284	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ / ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpamivārtavam // 3285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyakāraṇaiḥ prāṇān dhārayatyeva cātakaḥ / prārthanābhaṅgabhīto'pi śakrādapi na yācate // 3286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyagatvaraiḥ prāṇair mṛtyukāle mahātmanām / paropakāraścet kaścit sidhyet tadamṛtaṃ mṛtam // 3287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
avaśyaniṣpattimahāphalāḍhyām adīrghasūtrāṃ pariṇāmakalyām / kāmaṃ vyayāyāsakarīmupeyān na tveva jātu kṣayadoṣayuktām // 3288	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avaśyabhavyeṣvanavagrahagrahā yayā diśā dhāvati vedhasaḥ spṛhā / tṛṇena vātyeva tayānugamyate janasya cittena bhṛśāvaśātmanā // 3289	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avaśyamāyānti vaśaṃ vipaścitām upāyasaṃdaṃśabalena saṃpadaḥ / bhavatyudāraṃ vidhivat prayojite phalaṃ hi rājñāṃ kvacidarthasiddhaye // 3290	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avaśyamindriyaistāta vartitavyaṃ svagocare / caṇḍarāgastu yastatra taṃ budhaḥ parivarjayet // 3291	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ karmaṇāṃ tvakṣayaṃ phalam / nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma kalpakoṭiśatairapi // 3292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham / kṛtakarmakṣayo nāsti kalpakoṭiśatairapi // 3293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyāyakaṇaiḥ prāṇān saṃdhārayati tittiriḥ / yācñābhaṅgabhayād bhīto na daivamapi yācate // 3294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayāti yat kiṃcit / cāṣaḥ prayāṇasamaye kharaninado maṅgalo bhavati // 3295	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayātyasūktamapi / kṣudhi kadaśanamapi nitarāṃ bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu // 3296	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avasarapaṭhitā vāṇī guṇagaṇarahitāpi śobhate puṃsām / ratisamaye ramaṇīnāṃ bhūṣaṇahānistu bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavati // 3297	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
avasaramadhigamya taṃ harantyo hṛdayamayatnakṛtojjvalasvarūpāḥ / avaniṣu padamaṅganāstadānīṃ nyadadhata vibhramasaṃpado'ṅganāsu // 3298	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
avasitaṃ hasitaṃ prasitaṃ mudā vilasitaṃ hrasitaṃ smarabhāsitam / na samadāḥ pramadā hatasaṃmadāḥ purahitaṃ vihitaṃ na samīhitam // 3299	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
avaskandapradānasya sarve kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / vyasane vartamānasya śatrocchidrānvitasya ca // 3300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaskandabhayād rājā prajāgarakṛtaśramam / divāsuptaṃ sadā hanyān nidrāvyākulasainikam // 3301	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avasthā pūjyate rājan na śarīraṃ śarīriṇām / tadā vanacaro rāma idānīṃ nṛpatāṃ gataḥ // 3302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avākiran vayovṛddhās taṃ lājaiḥ paurayoṣitaḥ / pṛṣatairmandaroddhūtaiḥ kṣīrormaya ivācyutam // 3303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avākṣirāstamasyandhe kilbiṣī narakaṃ patet / yaḥ praśnaṃ vitathaṃ brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharmaniścaye // 3304	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avācyavādāṃśca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ / nindantastava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim // 3305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avāpa sāpatrapatāṃ sa bhūpatir jitendriyāṇāṃ dhuri kīrtitasthitiḥ / asaṃvare śambaravairivikrame krameṇa tatra sphuṭatāmupeyuṣi // 3306	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avāpustāpamatyarthaṃ śapharyaḥ palvalodake / putrakṣetrādisaktena mamatvena yathā gṛhī // 3307	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāṅkasya vapuṣi / amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyandaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi // 3308	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avāptairdrāghimṇā paricayamudanvattaṭabhuvām asau bhāti śyāmadyutibhirudakairmekhalabhuvaḥ / agastyasyākārṣīd vacanamiti kopādudadhinā gṛhītaḥ keśeṣu prasabhamiva vindhyakṣitidharaḥ // 3309	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avāpyate vā kimiyadbhavatyā cittaikapadyāmapi vidyate yaḥ / yatrāndhakāraḥ kila cetaso'pi jihmetarairbrahma tadapyavāpyam // 3310	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avāpyān kāmayasvārthān nānavāpyān kadācana / pratyutpannānanubhavan mā śucastvamanāgatān // 3311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
avāmabhāgena yadā valitvā śvā pṛṣṭhakaṇḍūtimapākaroti / tadahni tatraiva kṛtāntagehe rogābhibhūto niyataṃ prayāti // 3312	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avālukāślakṣṇamṛdā pūrite gartaśodhanam / kodaṇḍārdhamite khāte jalasikte vapettarum / kadalīkṣīriṇau ropyau mūle dattvā tu gomayam // 3313	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: srjy], ajñātam [12: jtyj], ajñātam [12: ymtr], ajñātam [12: jmBm]
avāhitā vinaśyanti sarvakarmakṣamā api / kṛśā vyādhiparītāṅgā jāyante'tyantavāhanāt // 3314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avikāriṇamapi sajjanam aniśamanāryaḥ prabādhate'tyartham / kamalinyā kimiha kṛtaṃ himasya yattāṃ sadā dahati // 3315	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avikṛtakṛtabhaumaravā susthānasthā suceṣṭitā vāme / yātrāsu dṛṣṭamātrā durgā durgāṇi tārayati // 3316	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avikriyāṃ caiva samāśritāḥ samaṃ haranti jālaṃ mama pakṣiṇo hyamī / vivādameṣyanti parasparaṃ yadā samāgamiṣyanti ca madvaśaṃ tadā // 3317	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avikreyaṃ lavaṇaṃ pakvamannaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca / tilā māṃsaṃ mūlaphalāni śākaṃ raktaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagandhā guḍaśca // 3318	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgl], śālinī [11: mttgg]
avigrahasyāpyatulena hetunā sametabhinnadvayamūrti tiṣṭhataḥ / tavaiva nānyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddhaveṣābharaṇasya kāntatā // 3319	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avicārayato yuktikathanaṃ tuṣakhaṇḍanam / nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mūtritam // 3320	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avicāreṇa yat karma kṛtaṃ tanmarmakṛntanam / prasahya sītāharaṇād atītā rāvaṇaśriyaḥ // 3321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
avijitya ya ātmānam amātyān vijigīṣate / amitrān vājitāmātyaḥ so'vaśaḥ parihīyate // 3322	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātaprabandhasya vaco vācaspaterapi / vrajatyaphalatāmeva nayadruha ivehitam // 3323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātaprayuktena dharṣitā mama vāsasā / saṃvṛtā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva śobhate // 3324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātaviśeṣasya sarvatejo'pahāriṇaḥ / svāmino nirvivekasya tamasaśca kimantaram // 3325	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya ca niścayaḥ / ārambhaḥ karmaṇāṃ śaśvad ārabdhasyāntadarśanam // 3326	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya viniścayaḥ / arthadvaidhasya saṃdehac chedanaṃ śeṣadarśanam // 3327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātāvasaktena dūṣitā mama vāsasā / chāditā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva dṛśyate // 3328	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñāte pare tattve śāstrādhītistu niṣphalā / vijñāte'pi pare tattve śāstrādhītistu niṣphalā // 3329	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñāto dhṛtaḥ khaṅgaḥ śubhasaṃpattināśakaḥ / vijñātaḥ sakalaiśvaryadāyako bhavati prabhoḥ / tasmāt teṣāṃ guṇān vakṣye yathoktaṃ munipuṃgavaiḥ // 3330	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jmBt], ajñātam [12: yrtj], ajñātam [12: rsym], ajñātam [12: yrBr]
avijñānād rājño bhavati matihīnaḥ parijanas tatastatprādhānyād bhavati na samīpe budhajanaḥ / budhaistyakte rājye bhavati hi na nītirguṇavatī pranaṣṭāyāṃ nītau sanṛpamavaśaṃ naśyati kulam // 3331	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avijñāya phalaṃ yo hi karma tvevānudhāvati / sa śocet phalavelāyāṃ yathā kiṃśukasecakaḥ // 3332	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñāyānyasāmarthyaṃ svasāmarthyaṃ pradarśayet / upahāsamavāpnoti tathaivāyamihācalaḥ // 3333	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avitathamanorathapatha- prathaneṣu praguṇagarimagītaśrīḥ / suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavān abhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya // 3334	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
avitṛptatayā tathāpi me hṛdayaṃ nirṇayameva dhāvati / avasāyayituṃ kṣamāḥ sukhaṃ na vidheyeṣu viśeṣasaṃpadaḥ // 3335	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
avidagdhaḥ patiḥ strīṇāṃ prauḍhāṇāṃ nāyako guṇī / guṇināṃ tyāgināṃ stoko vibhavaśceti duḥkhakṛt // 3336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidagdhaḥ śramakaṭhino durlabhayoṣidyuvā jaḍo vipraḥ / apamṛtyurupakrāntaḥ kāmivyājena me rātrau // 3337	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviditaguṇāntarāṇāṃ no doṣaḥ prāptadeśavāsānām / svādhīnakuṅkumā api yadvidadhati bahumatiṃ nīle // 3338	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviditaguṇāpi satkavi- bhaṇitiḥ karṇeṣu vamati madhudhārām / anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā // 3339	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviditaparamānando vadati jano viṣayameva ramaṇīyam / tilatailameva miṣṭaṃ yena na dṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ kvāpi // 3340	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviditaparavedano manobhūr dhruvamayamevamanaṅga eva nityam / yadi punarabhaviṣyadasya cāṅgaṃ na khalu tadā vyathayiṣyadanyadeham // 3341	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aviditaśaṣasaviśeṣā vāṇī niḥsarati vaktrato yeṣām / gudavadanavivarabhedo radanairanumīyate teṣām // 3342	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviditasukhaduḥkhaṃ nirguṇaṃ vastu kiṃcij jaḍamatiriha kaścin mokṣa ityācacakṣe / mama tu matamanaṅgasmeratāruṇyaghūrṇan madakalamadirākṣīnīvimokṣo hi mokṣaḥ // 3343	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviditvātmanaḥ śaktiṃ parasya na samutsukaḥ / gacchannabhimukho vahnau nāśaṃ yāti pataṅgavat // 3344	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidyaṃ jīvanaṃ śūnyaṃ dikśūnyā cedabāndhavā / putrahīnaṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā // 3345	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidyaḥ puruṣaḥ śocyaḥ śocyaṃ mithunamaprajam / nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyāḥ śocyaṃ rāṣṭramarājakam // 3346	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidyākāmakarmādipāśabandhaṃ vimocitum / kaḥ śaknuyād vinātmānaṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi // 3347	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidyānāśinī vidyā bhāvanā bhavanāśinī / dāridryanāśanaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ durgatināśanam // 3348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidyābījavidhvaṃsād ayamārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā / kālau bhūtabhaviṣyantau vartamānamavīviśat // 3349	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidvāṃścaiva vidvāṃśca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat / praṇītaścāpraṇītaśca yathāgnirdaivataṃ mahat // 3350	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidvāṃsamalaṃ loke vidvāṃsamapi vā punaḥ / pramadā hyutpathaṃ netuṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugam // 3351	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidvānapi bhūpālo vidyāvṛddhopasevayā / parāṃ śriyamavāpnotijalāsannataruryathā // 3352	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidheye jane puṃsāṃ kopaḥ kimupajāyate / vidheye'pi ca kaḥ kopas tanniveśitajīvite // 3353	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avidheyo bhṛtyajanaḥ śaṭhāni mitrāṇyadāyakaḥ svāmī / vinayarahitā ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri // 3354	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avinayabhuvāmajñānānāṃ śamāya bhavannapi prakṛtikuṭilādvidyābhyāsaḥ khalatvavivṛddhaye / phaṇibhayabhṛtāmastūcchedakṣamastamasāmasau viṣadharaphaṇāratnāloko bhayaṃ tu bhṛśāyate // 3355	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
avinayaratamādarādṛte vaśamavaśaṃ hi nayanti vidviṣaḥ / śrutavinayanidhiṃ samāśritas tanurapi naiti parābhavaṃ kvacit // 3356	aparavaktra = [11: nnrlg] 1,3 + [12: njjr] 2,4
avināśi tu tadviddhi yena sarvamidaṃ tatam / vināśamavyayasyāsya na kaścit kartumarhati // 3357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avināśinamagrāmyam akarot sātavāhanaḥ / viśuddhajātibhiḥ kośaṃ ratnairiva subhāṣitaiḥ // 3358	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avinītaḥ suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na dahanātmakaḥ / vinītastu suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na puruṣottamaḥ // 3359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avinītasya yā vidyā sā ciraṃ naiva tiṣṭhati / markaṭasya gale baddhā maṇīnāṃ mālikā yathā // 3360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avinīto bhṛtyajano nṛpatiradātā śaṭhāni mitrāṇi / avinayavatī ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri // 3361	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avibhāviteṣuviṣayaḥ prathamaṃ madano'pi nūnamabhavat tamasā / udite diśaḥ prakaṭayatyamunā yadadharmadhāmni dhanurācakṛṣe // 3362	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avibhāvyatārakamadṛṣṭahima- dyutibimbamastamitabhānu nabhaḥ / avasannatāpamatamisramabhād apadoṣataiva viguṇasya guṇaḥ // 3363	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avibhramālokanadurbhagāṇi pravyaktavaktrastanamaṇḍalāni / aṅgāni re pāmarakāminīnām apuṇyatāruṇya kimāśritāni // 3364	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avimṛṣyametadabhilaṣyati sa dviṣatāṃ vadhena viṣayābhiratim / bhavavītaye nahi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanaṃ kva ca vimuktipathaḥ // 3365	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
avirataṃ parakāryakṛtāṃ satāṃ madhurimātiśayena vaco'mṛtam / api ca mānasamambunidhiryaśo vimalaśāradacandiracandrikā // 3366	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aviratakusumāvacāyakhedān nihitabhujālatayaikayopakaṇṭham / vipulataranirantarāvalagna- stanapihitapriyavakṣasā lalambe // 3367	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aviratataruṇīsahasramadhya- sthitivigalatpuruṣavratā ivaite / pratipadamatikātarāḥ kṣitīśāḥ parikalayanti bhayaṃ samantato'pi // 3368	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aviratamaklamamuddhṛta- dharātalaṃ susmitollasadvadanam / jagadānandavidhāyinam upaimi śaraṇaṃ prabhuṃ śeṣam // 3369	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviratamadhupānāgāramindindirāṇām abhisaraṇanikuñjaṃ rājahaṃsīkulasya / pravitatabahuśālaṃ sadma padmālayāyā vitarati ratimakṣṇoreṣa līlātaḍāgaḥ // 3370	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviratamidamambhaḥ svecchayoccālayantyā vikacakamalakāntottānapāṇidvayena / parikalita ivārghyaḥ kāmabāṇātithibhyaḥ salilamiva vitīrṇaṃ bālalīlāsukhānām // 3371	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
avirataratalīlāyāsajātaśramāṇām upaśamamupayāntaṃ niḥsahe'ṅge'ṅganānām / punaruṣasi viviktairmātariśvāvacūrṇya jvalayati madanāgniṃ mālatīnāṃ rajobhiḥ // 3372	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviratavirutakapotīm arpitarasamāvṛṇoti ghanavalanaḥ / navalatikāmatikātara- taralitamadiradvayīṃ mudiraḥ // 3373	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviratāmbujasaṃgatisaṃgalad- bahalakesarasaṃvaliteva yā / lalitavastuvidhānasukhollasat- tanuruhā tanurātmabhuvo'vatāt // 3374	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aviralakamalavikāsaḥ sakalālimadaśca kokilānandaḥ / ramyo'yameti saṃprati lokotkaṇṭhākaraḥ kālaḥ // 3375	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviralakaravālakampanair bhrukuṭītarjanagarjanairmuhuḥ / dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt // 3376	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aviraladhārānikaraṃ jaladairjalamutsṛjadbhiratimātram / mānivadhūhṛdayebhyaḥ kāluṣyamaśeṣato mṛṣṭam // 3377	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviralapatadbāṣpotpīḍaprasiktakapolayā vacanaviṣayaḥ saṃdeśo'nyastayā vihito na te / manasi kimapi dhyāyantyā tu kṣaṇaṃ tava kāntayā pathika nihitā dṛṣṭiḥ kaṣṭaṃ nave karuṇāṅkure // 3378	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aviralaparāgasaikata- makarandataraṅgiṇīmanuvanāntam / pikayuvatijānudaghnīṃ gāhante madhupayoṣitastṛṣitāḥ // 3379	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aviralaparivāhairaśruṇaḥ sāraṇīnāṃ smaradahanaśikhoṣṇaśvāsapūraiśca tasyāḥ / subhaga bata kṛśāṅgyāḥ spardhayānyonyamebhiḥ kriyata iva puro bhūḥ paṅkilā pāṃsulā ca // 3380	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviralapulakaḥ saha vrajantyāḥ pratipadamekataraḥ stanastaruṇyāḥ / ghaṭitavighaṭitaḥ priyasya vakṣas- taṭamuvi kandukavibhramaṃ babhāra // 3381	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aviralaphalinīvanaprasūnaḥ kusumitakundasugandhigandhavāhaḥ / guṇamasamayajaṃ cirāya lebhe viralatuṣārakaṇastuṣārakālaḥ // 3382	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aviralamadajalanivahaṃ bhramarakulānīkasevitakapolam / abhimataphaladātāraṃ kāmeśaṃ gaṇapatiṃ vande // 3383	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviralamadadhārādhautakumbhaḥ śaraṇyaḥ phaṇivaravṛtagātraḥ siddhasādhyādivandyaḥ / tribhuvanajanavighnadhvāntavidhvaṃsadakṣo vitaratu gajavaktraḥ saṃtataṃ maṅgalaṃ vaḥ // 3384	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviralamiva dāmnā pauṇḍarīkeṇa naddhaḥ snapita iva ca dugdhasrotasā nirbhareṇa / kavalita iva kṛtsnaścakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabhamamṛtamegheneva sāndreṇa siktaḥ // 3385	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aviralavigalanmadajala- kapolapālīnilīnamadhupakulaḥ / udbhinnanavaśmaśru- śreṇiriva dvipamukho jayati // 3386	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviralavilolajaladaḥ kuṭajārjunanīpasurabhivanavātaḥ / ayamāyātaḥ kālo hanta mṛtāḥ pathikagehinyaḥ // 3387	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviruddhaṃ sukhasthaṃ yo duḥkhamārge niyojayet / janmajanmāntare duḥkhī sa naraḥ syādasaṃśayam // 3388	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avilambi suvṛttaṃ ca udaraṃ cātipūjitam / nātidīrghaṃ samaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kiṃcicca vinataṃ śubham // 3389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avilambe kṛtyasiddhau māntrikairāpyate yaśaḥ / vilambe karmabāhulyaṃ vikhyāpyāvāpyate dhanam // 3390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviviktāvatistabdhau stanāvāḍhyāvivādṛtau / viviktāvānatāveva daridrāviva garhitau // 3391	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avivekamatirnṛpatir mantrī guṇavatsu vakritagrīvaḥ / yatra khalāśca prabalās tatra kathaṃ sajjanāvasaraḥ // 3392	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avivekavṛthāśramāvivārthaṃ kṣayalobhāviva saṃśritānurāgam / vijigīṣumivānayapramādāv avasādaṃ viśikhau vininyatustam // 3393	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
aviveki kucadvaṃdvaṃ hantu nāma jagattrayam / śrutipraṇayinorakṣṇor ayuktaṃ janamāraṇam // 3394	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avivekini bhūpāle naśyanti guṇināṃ guṇāḥ / pravāsarasike kānte yathā sādhvyāḥ stanonnatiḥ // 3395	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avivekini bhūpe yaḥ karotyāśāṃ samṛddhaye / yāsyāmyahamaneneti karotyāśāṃ sa mṛddhaye // 3396	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviveko hi sarveṣām āpadāṃ paramaṃ padam / vivekarahito loke paśureva na saṃśayaḥ // 3397	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśadacalaṃ netraprāntāvalokanamasphuṭaṃ cakitacakitā vācaḥ sparśaḥ kvacijjanasaṃkule / iti tava mayā premārambhe ya eva nirīkṣitāḥ kaṭhinamanaso dṛṣṭā bhāvāsta eva virajyataḥ // 3398	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aviśīrṇakāntapātre navyadaśe sumukhi saṃbhṛtasnehe / madgehadīpakalike kathamupayātāsi nirvāṇam // 3399	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviśuddhakulotpannā dehārpaṇajīvikā śaṭhācaraṇā / kvāhaṃ rūpājīvā kva bhavantaḥ ślāghanīyajanmaguṇāḥ // 3400	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aviśrānto vāto dahana iva soyaṃ janayati prasaktaṃ sātatyād dalayati kulādrīnapi jalam / prasūte kṛtyeṣu vyavasitiranirvyūḍhasudṛḍhā phalāvāptiṃ loke pratikalamasaṃbhāvyavibhavām // 3401	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aviśrāmaṃ vahed bhāraṃ śītoṣṇaṃ ca na vindati / sasaṃtoṣastathā nityaṃ trīṇi śikṣeta gardabhāt // 3402	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśrāmamapātheyam anālambhamadeśakam / tamaḥkāntāramadhvānaṃ kathameko gamiṣyasi // 3403	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśvasan dhūrtadhuraṃdharo'pi naraḥ puraṃdhrīpurato'ndha eva / aśeṣaśikṣākuśalo'pi kākaḥ pratāryate kiṃ na pikāṅganābhiḥ // 3404	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
aviśvastā striyaḥ sarvā adhamottamamadhyamāḥ / yaḥ kaścid viśvaset tāsāṃ paścāttāpaiḥ sa dahyate // 3405	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśvāsaṃ sadā tiṣṭhet saṃdhinā vigraheṇa ca / dvaidhībhāvaṃ samāśritya pāpe śatrau balīyasi // 3406	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśvāsavidhānāya mahāpātakahetave / pitāputravirodhāya hiraṇyāya namo'stu te // 3407	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviṣaṃ viṣamityāhur brahmasvaṃ viṣamucyate / viṣaṃ hanti kilaikaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ putrapautrakam // 3408	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avisaṃvādako dakṣaḥ kṛtajño matimānṛjuḥ / api saṃkṣīṇakośo'pi labhate parivāraṇam // 3409	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avisaṃvādanaṃ dānaṃ samayasyāvyatikramaḥ / āvartayanti bhūtāni samyakpraṇihitā ca vāk // 3410	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avisṛṣṭo'pi san prājñaḥ sarveṇa ca samaṃ vrajet / praviśedapyanāhūtas tvanyadā bhartturājñayā // 3411	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avismṛtopakāraḥ syān na kurvīta kṛtaghnatām / hatvopakāriṇaṃ vipro nāḍījaṅghamadhaścyutaḥ // 3412	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avīro'pi camūvīrasāhāyyena dviṣo jayet / camūsāhāyyaśūnyānāṃ jayaśrīrvyākulāyate // 3413	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avṛttiṃ vinayo hanti hantyanarthaṃ parākramaḥ / hanti nitayṃ kṣamā krodham ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam // 3414	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
avṛttikaṃ tyajed deśaṃ vṛttiṃ sopadravāṃ tyajet / tyajen māyāvinaṃ mitraṃ dhanaṃ prāṇaharaṃ tyajet // 3415	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avṛttikaṃ prabhuṃ bhṛtyā apuṣpaṃ bhramarāstarum / ajalaṃ ca saro haṃsā muñcantyapi ciroṣitam // 3416	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avṛttirbhayamantyānāṃ madhyānāṃ maraṇād bhayam / uttamānāṃ tu martyānām avamānāt paraṃ bhayam // 3417	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avṛttivyādhiśokārtān anuvarteta śaktitaḥ / ātmavatsatataṃ paśyed api kīṭapipīlakāḥ // 3418	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avekśya svātmānaṃ viguṇamaparānicchati tathā phalatyetanno ced vilapati na santīha guṇinaḥ / nimārṣṭuṃ śaptuṃ vā paribhavitumudyacchati tato'py aho nīce ramyā saguṇavijigīṣā vidhikṛtā // 3419	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avemavyāpārākalanamaturīsparśamacirād anunmīlattantuprakaraghaṭanāyāsamasakṛt / viṣīdatpāñcālīvipadapanayaikapraṇayinaḥ paṭānāṃ nirmāṇaṃ patagapatiketoravatu naḥ // 3420	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
avaiti tattvaṃ sadasattvalakṣaṇaṃ vinā viśeṣaṃ viparītarocanaḥ / yadṛcchayā mattavadastacetano jano jinānāṃ vacanāt parāṅmukhaḥ // 3421	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avaitu śāstrāṇi naro viśeṣataḥ karotu citrāṇi tapāṃsi bhāvataḥ / atattvasaṃsaktamanāstathāpi no vimuktisaukhyaṃ gatabādhamaśnute // 3422	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avaimi caināmanagheti kiṃ tu lokāpavādo balavān mato me / chāyā hi bhūmeḥ śaśino malatve- nāropitā śuddhimataḥ prajābhiḥ // 3423	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avaimi te sāramataḥ khalu tvāṃ kārye guruṇyātmasamaṃ niyokṣye / vyādiśyate bhūdharatāmavekṣya kṛṣṇena dehodvahanāya śeṣaḥ // 3424	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avaimi pūtamātmānaṃ dvayenaiva dvijottamāḥ / mūrdhni gaṅgāprapātena dhautapādāmbhasā ca vaḥ // 3425	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaimi saubhāgyamadena vañcitaṃ tava priyaṃ yaścaturāvalokinaḥ / karoti lakṣyaṃ ciramasya cakṣuṣo na vaktramātmīyamarālapakṣmaṇaḥ // 3426	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
avaimi haṃsāvalayo valakṣās tvatkāntikīrteścapalāḥ pulākāḥ / uḍḍīya yuktaṃ patitāḥ sravantī- veśantapūraṃ paritaḥ plavante // 3427	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avaiṣṇavo hato vipro hataṃ śrāddhamadakṣiṇam / abrahmaṇyaṃ hataṃ kṣetram anācāraṃ kulaṃ hatam // 3428	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyaktamakṣaramupāsya babhūva kaścit svaṃ labdhavarṇamavagatya kṛtārthamānī / sadyastribhaṅgalalitasphuraṇādamanda- nandotthayā jaḍatayaiva vayaṃ kṛtārthāḥ // 3429	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata / avyaktanidhanānyeva tatra kā paridevanā // 3430	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyayavato'pi dhaninaḥ svajanasahasraṃ bhavet padasthasya / bhraṣṭadhanasya hi satataṃ bandhurapi mukhaṃ na darśayati // 3431	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avyaye vyayamāyāti vyaye yāti suvistaram / apurvaḥ ko'pi bhāṇḍāras tava bhārati dṛśyate // 3432	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyavasāyinamalasaṃ daivaparaṃ sahasācca parihīṇam / pramadeva hi vṛddhapatiṃ necchatyavagūhituṃ lakṣmīḥ // 3433	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avyavasthitacittasya prasādo'pi bhayaṃkaraḥ / vyavasthitaprasannātmā kupito'pyabhayaṃkaraḥ // 3434	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyavasthitavṛttānām abhinnaśruticakṣuṣām / adharmārjitabhogānām āśīrapyahitocitā // 3435	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jayaparājayau // 3436	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
avyākaraṇamadhītaṃ bhinnadroṇyā taraṅgiṇītaraṇam / bheṣajamapathyasahitaṃ trayamidamakṛtaṃ varaṃ na kṛtam // 3437	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anyākṣepo bhaviṣyantyāḥ kāryasiddherhi lakṣaṇam // 3438	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
avyākhyeyāṃ vitarati parāṃ prītimantarnimagnā kaṇṭhe lagnā harati nitarāṃ yāntaradhvāntajālam / tāṃ drākṣādyairapi bahumatāṃ mādhurīmudgirantīṃ kṛṣṇetyākhyāṃ kathaya rasane yadyasi tvaṃ rasajñā // 3439	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
avyājasundaramanuttaramaprameyam aprākṛtaṃ paramamaṅgalamaṅghripadmam / saṃdarśayedapi sakṛdbhavatī dayārdrā draṣṭāsmi kena tadahaṃ tu vilocanena // 3440	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
avyājasundarīṃ tāṃ vijñānena lalitena yojayatā / parikalpito vidhātrā bāṇaḥ kāmasya viṣadigdhaḥ // 3441	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
avyāt sa vo yasya nisargavakraḥ spṛśatyadhijyasmaracāpalīlām / jaṭāpinaddhoragarājaratna- marīcilīḍhobhayakoṭirinduḥ // 3442	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avyāt svarlokacūḍāmaṇipaṭalaśikhāśreṇiśoṇīkṛtāṅghriḥ kṣoṇībhāraṃ vinetuṃ jaṭharajuṣi jagadbāndhave devakī vaḥ / rājñāmuddāmadoṣṇāṃ raṇaśirasi raṇatkīkasacchedabhīmāḥ śastrāṇāṃ khaṇṇakārāḥ pratihatiguravo yacchruterdohado'bhūt // 3443	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
avyād vo vajrasārasphuradurunakharakrūracakrakramāgra- prodbhinnendrārivakṣaḥsthalagaladasṛgāsārakāśmīragauraḥ / prasphūrjatkeśarāgragrathitajaladharaśreṇinīlābjamālyaḥ sūryācandrāvataṃso naraharirasamābaddhaśṛṅgāralīlaḥ // 3444	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
avyād vo valitāṅghripātavicaladbhūgolahelonmukha- bhrāmyaddikkarikalpitānukaraṇo nṛtyan gaṇagrāmaṇīḥ / yasyoddaṇḍitaśuṇḍapuṣkaramarudvyākṛṣṭasṛṣṭaṃ muhus tārācakramudaktaśīkarapṛṣallīlāmivābhyasyati // 3445	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
avyād vo vāmano yasya kaustubhapratibimbitā / kautukālokinī jātā jāṭharīva jagattrayī // 3446	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyādhigātramanukūlataraṃ kalatraṃ veśma prasiddhavibhavaṃ niśitā ca vidyā / ślāghyaṃ kulaṃ caramakālagatiḥ samartho mātuḥ kaṭākṣapariṇāmavibhūtayas te // 3447	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
avyādhijaṃ kaṭukaṃ śīrṣarogaṃ pāpānubandhaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇamugram / satāṃ peyaṃ yanna pibantyasanto manyuṃ mahārāja piba praśāmya // 3448	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [12: ttyy], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
avyādhinā śarīreṇa manasā ca nirādhinā / pūrayannarthināmāśāṃ tvaṃ jīva śaradāṃ śatam // 3449	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyāpareṣu vyāpāraṃ yo naraḥ kartumicchati / sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti kīlotpaṭīva vānaraḥ // 3450	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
avyāpāraratā vasantasamaye grīṣme vyavāyapriyāḥ saktāḥ pramṛṣi palvalāmbhasi nave kūpodakadveṣiṇaḥ / kaṭvamloṣṇaratāḥ śaradyadhibhujo hemantanidrālasāḥ svairdoṣairapacīyamānavapuṣo naśyantu te śatravaḥ // 3451	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
avyāhati na śakyā gaur vinā daṇḍena rakṣitum / iti pratyeti mugdho'pi vallavaḥ kimu rājakam // 3452	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtācchreya āhuḥ satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taddvitīyam / priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tattṛtīyaṃ dharmyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taccaturtham // 3453	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg]
avyutpannasvabhāvānāṃ nārīṇamiva sāṃpratam / sītkārācāryakaṃ kartum ayaṃ prāpto himāgamaḥ // 3454	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyutpanne śrotari vaktṛtvamanarthakaṃ puṃsām / netravihīne bhartari lāvaṇyamanarthakaṃ strīṇām // 3455	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
avratasyāpi te dharmaḥ kārya evāntarāntarā / medhībhūto'pi hi bhrāmyan ghāsagrāsaṃ karoti gauḥ // 3456	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaktaḥ satataṃ sādhuḥ kurūpā ca pativratā / vyādhito devabhaktaśca nirdhanā brahmacāriṇaḥ // 3457	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaktastaskaraḥ sādhuḥ kurūpā cet pativratā / rogī ca devatābhakto vṛddhā veśyā tapasvinī // 3458	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaktastu bhavet sādhur brahmacārī va nirdhanaḥ / vyādhito devabhaktaśca vṛddhā nārī pativratā // 3459	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaktāḥ śaktimātmīyāṃ ślāghante ye ca durjanāḥ / te bhavantyupahāsāya mahatāmeva saṃnidhau // 3460	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśakte raudratātaikṣṇyaṃ tīvrapāpeṣu dhīratā / chadmadhīrvāci pāruṣyaṃ nīcānāṃ śauryamīdṛśam // 3461	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaktairbalinaḥ śatroḥ kartavyaṃ prapalāyanam / saṃśritavyo'thavā durgo nānyā teṣāṃ gatirbhavet // 3462	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśakto yaḥ kṣāntiṃ satatamapakāriṇyapi jane vidhatte so'vaśyaṃ bhujaga iva daṃṣṭrāvirahitaḥ / prabhuḥ satyāṃ śaktau kṣamata iha yasmāt sucaritaḥ sa tejasvī lokadvitayavijigīṣurvijayate // 3463	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aśaknuvan soḍhumadhīralocanaḥ sahasraraśmeriva yasya darśanam / praviśya hemādriguhāgṛhāntaraṃ nināya bibhyad divasāni kauśikaḥ // 3464	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet / asatyaṃ naiva vaktavyam ālasyaṃ naiva kārayet // 3465	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājño akāryaṃ naiva kārayet / yathādeśagataṃ dharmaṃ yathākālaṃ ca jīvayet // 3466	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai / antaḥsvabhāvairgītaistair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam // 3467	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aśakyārambhavṛttīnāṃ kutaḥ kleśādṛte phalam / ākāśamāsvādayataḥ kutastu kavalagrahaḥ // 3468	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
aśaṅkitamatiḥ svastho na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati / na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ // 3469	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aśaṅkitebhyaḥ śaṅketa śaṅkitebhyaśca sarvaśaḥ / aśaṅkyādbhayamutpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati // 3470	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaṅkyamapi śaṅketa nityaṃ śaṅketa śaṅkitāt / bhayaṃ hi śaṅkitājjātaṃ samūlamapi kṛntati // 3471	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaṭhamalolamajihmaṃ tyāginamanurāgiṇaṃ viśeṣajñam / yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā tatra // 3472	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśaṭhahṛdayaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sānukrośaḥ sthitaḥ satāṃ mārge / aparāpavādakarmā śucikarmarataḥ sa khalvāryaḥ // 3473	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśanaṃ me vasanaṃ me jāyā me bandhuvargo me / iti me me kurvāṇaṃ kālavṛko hanti puruṣājam // 3474	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aśanaṃ vasanaṃ vāso yasya kāśyāmamārgataḥ / kīkaṭena samā kāśī gaṅgāpyaṅgāravāhinī // 3475	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśanamātrakṛtajñatayā guror na piśuno'pi śuno labhate tulām / api bahūpakṛte sakhitā khale na khalu khelati khe latikā yathā // 3476	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aśanādindriyāṇīva syuḥ kāryāṇyakhilānyapi / etasmāt kāraṇād vittaṃ sarvasādhanamucyate // 3477	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśanairaśanairbālye yauvane ghasmarāt smarāt / kalyavaikalyataḥ śeṣe sphuṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ vayo nṛṇām // 3478	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaraṇaśaraṇapramodabhūtair vanatarubhiḥ kriyamāṇacārukarma / hṛdayamiva durātmanāmaguptaṃ navamiva rājyamanirjitopabhogyam // 3479	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aśarmadahanajvalatkaṭukaṭākṣarūkṣekṣaṇa- kṣaṇakṣapitaśātrave jayati sindhurādhīśvare / vayaṃ na bahu manmahe nijabhujānamadgāṇḍiva- cyutāstraśikhitāṇḍavajvalitakhāṇḍavaṃ pāṇḍavam // 3480	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā naraḥ saṃjāyate kharaḥ / kṛmiḥ strīvadhakarttā ca bālahantā ca jāyate // 3481	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśastrapūtamavyājaṃ puruṣāṅgopakalpitam / vikrīyate mahāmāṃsaṃ gṛhyatāṃ gṛhyatāmidam // 3482	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśāntahutabhukśikhākavalitaṃ jaganmandiraṃ sukhaṃ viṣamavātabhugnasanavaccalaṃ kāmajam / jalasthaśaśicañcalā bhuvi vilokya lokasthitiṃ vimuñcata janāḥ sadā viṣayamūrchanāṃ tattvataḥ // 3483	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aśāntāntastṛṣṇā dhanalavaṇavārivyatikarair gatacchāyaḥ kāyaściravirasarūkṣāśanatayā / anidrā mando'gnirnṛpasalilacaurānalabhayāt kadaryāṇāṃ kaṣṭaṃ sphuṭamadhanakaṣṭādapi param // 3484	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aśāśvatamidaṃ sarvaṃ cintyamānaṃ hi bhārata / kadalīsaṃnibho lokaḥ samo hyasya na vidyate // 3485	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśāsaṃstaskarān yastu baliṃ gṛhṇāti pārthivaḥ / tasya prakṣubhyate rāṣṭraṃ svargācca parihīyate // 3486	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśāstracakṣunṛpatir andha ityabhidhīyate / varamandho na cakṣuṣmān madādākṣiptasatpathaḥ // 3487	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryamahitaṃ vacaḥ / arthaśāstrānabhijñānāṃ vipulāṃ śriyamicchatām // 3488	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśikṣitānāṃ kāvyeṣu śāstrābhyāso nirarthakaḥ / kimastyanupanītasya vājapeyādibhirmakhaiḥ // 3489	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśithilaparispandaḥ kunde tathaiva madhuvrato nayanasuhṛdo vṛkṣāścaite na kuḍmalaśālinaḥ / dalati kalikā cautī nāsmiṃstathā mṛgacakṣuṣām atha ca hṛdaye mānagranthiḥ svayaṃ śithilāyate // 3490	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
aśithilamaparāvasajya kaṇṭhe dṛḍhaparirabdhabṛhadbahiḥ stanena / hṛṣitatanuruhā bhujena bhartur mṛdumamṛdu vyatividdhamekabāhum // 3491	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
aśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryo lalāṭe brahmaghātinaḥ / asambhāṣyaśca kartavyas tan manoranuśāsanam // 3492	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhāvatā / ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evaṃkarmāsmi śādhi mām // 3493	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśiṣyaṃ śāsti yo rājan yaśca śūnyamupāsate / kadaryaṃ bhajate yaśca tamāhurmūḍhacetasam // 3494	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśītāstaraṇo māghe phālgune paśupakṣiṇau / caitre jalacarāḥ sarve vaiśākhe naravānarau // 3495	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśītenāmbhasā snānaṃ payaḥpānaṃ varāḥ striyaḥ / etadvo mānuṣāḥ pathyaṃ snigdhamuṣṇaṃ ca bhojanam // 3496	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśīmahi vayaṃ bhikṣām āśāvāso vasīmahi / śayīmahi mahīpṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kimīśvaraiḥ // 3497	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśīlā bhinnamaryādā nityasaṃkīrṇamaithunāḥ / alpāyuṣo bhavantīha tathā nirayagāminaḥ // 3498	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśucitānilayaṃ pralayaṃ śriyām ayaśasāṃ vibhavaṃ prabhavaṃ rujām / sukṛtanirdalanaṃ calanaṃ dhṛteḥ pariharet paravallabhayā ratam // 3499	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
aśucirvacanād yasyaśucirbhavati pūruṣaḥ / śuciścaivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṃ rājā na daivatam // 3500	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśucīkṣaṇe'śrupāte kalahe śvāsakāsayoḥ / rathyāprasarpaṇe'bhyaṅge kṣute narmaṇyupaspṛśet // 3501	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
aśuddhaprakṛtau rājñi janatā nānurajyate / yathā gṛdhrasamāsannaḥ kalahaṃsaḥ samācaret // 3502	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśuddhā tu bhaven nārī yāvacchalyaṃ na muñcati / niḥsṛte tu tataḥ śalye rajasā śudhyate tataḥ // 3503	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśuddhīnāṃ tu sarvāsām ālayāḥ kutsitāḥ striyaḥ / sadā śaucaṃ na kurvanti bhuñjate'nnaṃ tathāvidhāḥ // 3504	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśubhapuṣi kalāvapyapramattāḥ svadharmād anudinamupakārānācarante budhānām / bahujanaparipuṣṭā baddhadīkṣāsta ete tanusukhamapi hitvā tanvate rājasevām // 3505	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
aśubhodaye janānāṃ naśyati buddhirna vidyate rakṣā / suhṛdo'pi santi ripavo viṣamaviṣaṃ jāyate'pyamṛtam // 3506	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśṛṇvannapi boddhavyo mantribhiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ / yathā svadoṣanāśāya vidureṇāmbikāsutaḥ // 3507	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśeṣacakṣuḥśravaṇaṃ pratikūlo bhavannapi / vinatānandaheturyaḥ sa pumānāptanandanaḥ // 3508	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśeṣadoṣāpagamaprakāśa- mitrāgamotsāhamahotsavārham / vikāsaśobhāṃ janayatyajasraṃ dhanaṃ janānāṃ dinamambujānām // 3509	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśeṣalaṅkāpatisainyahantā śrīrāmasevācaraṇaikakartā / anekaduḥkhāhatalokagoptā tvasau hanūmāṃstava saukhyakartā // 3510	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśeṣavighnapratiṣedhadakṣa- mantrākṣatānāmiva diṅmukheṣu / vikṣepalīlā karaśīkarāṇāṃ karotu vaḥ prītimibhānanasya // 3511	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgam ākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram / muktākalāpīkṛtasinduvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī // 3512	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśoke śokārtaḥ kimasi bakule'pyākulamanā nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārairna ramase / kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yadiha bhajase kaṇṭakaśatair asaṃdigdhaṃ dagdhabhramara bhavitāsi kṣatavapuḥ // 3513	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aśocyaḥ śocate śocyaṃ kiṃ vā śocyo na śocyate / kaśca kasyeha śocyo'sti dehe'smin budbudopame // 3514	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśocyānanvaśocastvaṃ prajñāvādāṃśca bhāṣase / gatāsūnagatāsūṃśca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ // 3515	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśocyānīha bhūtāni yo mūḍhastāni śocati / tadduḥkhāllabhate duḥkhaṃ dvāvanarthau niṣevate // 3516	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśocyo nirdhanaḥ prājño'śocyaḥ paṇḍitabāndhavaḥ / aśocyā vidhavā nārī putrapautrapratiṣṭhitā // 3517	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśnāti yaḥ saṃskurute nihanti dadāti gṛhṇātyanumanyate ca / ete ṣaḍapyatra vinindanīyā bhramanti saṃsāravane nirantam // 3518	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśnāti yo māṃsamasau vidhatte vadhānumodaṃ trasadehabhājām / gṛhṇāti repāṃsi tatastapasvī tebhyo durantaṃ bhavameti jantuḥ // 3519	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśnābhyācchādayāmīti prāpaśyan pāpapūruṣaḥ / nāmarṣaṃ kurute yastu puruṣaḥ so'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // 3520	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśnīta pibata khādata jāgrata saṃviśata tiṣṭhata vā / sakṛdapi cintayatāhnaḥ sāvadhiko dehabandha iti // 3521	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aśmanā sādhayellohaṃ lohenāśmānameva ca / bilbāniva kare bilvair mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādhayet // 3522	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśmātakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate'hinilayo vā / ṣaḍbhirudagvāsya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣatraye toyam // 3523	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśmānamapyupāyena lohaṃ vā jarayen naraḥ / na tu kaścid upāyo'sti brahmasvaṃ yena jīryate // 3524	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśmāpyahṛdayo yasya guṇasāraṃ parīkṣate / ucitaiva suvarṇasya tasyāgnipatane ruciḥ // 3525	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat / asadityucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha // 3526	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśraddhādarśanaṃ bhāntir duḥkhaṃ ca trividhaṃ tataḥ / daurmanasyamayogyeṣu viṣayeṣu ca yogatā // 3527	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi yad bhavet / yathā vānarasaṃgītaṃ tathaiva plavate śilā // 3528	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśrāntaṃ dṛḍhayantraṇena kucayoratyaktakāṭhinyayor ābaddhasphuṭamaṇḍalonnatimilaccolaṃ vimucyorasaḥ / nīvīvicchuritaṃ vidhāya tamamuṃ vāmastanālambinīṃ veṇīṃ pāṇinakhāñcalaiḥ śithilayatyākramya pīṭhaṃ padā // 3529	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aśrāntaviśrāṇitayajñayūpa- stambhāvalīrdrāgavalambamānaḥ / yasya svabhāvād bhuvi saṃcacāra kālakramādekapado'pi dharmaḥ // 3530	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśrāntaśrutipāṭhapūtarasanāvirbhūtabhūristavā- jihmabrahmamukhaughavighnitanavasvargakriyākelinā / pūrvaṃ gādhisutena sāmighaṭitā muktā nu mandākinī yatprāsādadukūlavalliranilāndolairakheladdivi // 3531	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aśrāntirbandhutāṃ dhatte kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭasya naśvaraḥ / skandhena paṅgunā paṅgur nahi vartmani nīyate // 3532	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇavītanidrair aśnan puro haritakaṃ mudamādadhānaḥ / grīvāgralolakalakiṅkiṇikānināda- miśraṃ dadhaddaśanacarcuraśabdamaśvaḥ // 3533	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aśrucchalena sudṛśo hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ / aprāpya mānamaṅge vigalati lāvaṇyavāripūra iva // 3534	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
aśrutamiva khalajalpitam adṛṣṭamiva gurumukhendumālinyam / agaṇitanijāpamānaṃ bhāmini bhavadarthamacyutaḥ sahate // 3535	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aśrutaśca samunnaddho daridraśca mahāmanāḥ / arthāścākarmaṇā prepsur mūḍha ityucyate budhaiḥ // 3536	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśrubhiḥ pādyamākalpya praṇīya hṛdayāsanam / upete dayite kāntā pariṣvaṅgamupānayat // 3537	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvaṃ naiva gajaṃ naiva vyāghraṃ naiva ca naiva ca / ajāputraṃ baliṃ dadyād devo durbalaghātakaḥ // 3538	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvaṃ snātaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kāmamohitam / śūdramakṣarasaṃyuktaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet // 3539	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvaḥ śastraṃ śāstraṃ vīṇā vāṇī naraśca nārī ca / puruṣaviśeṣaṃ prāptā bhavantyayogyāśca yogyāśca // 3540	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśvaḥ supto gajo matto gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ / antaḥpuragato rājā dūrataḥ parivarjayet // 3541	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvagandhāpalaṃ triṃśac cūrṇayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ / vṛddhadārukacūrṇena samabhāgaṃ ca kārayet // 3542	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvatthacalapatrāgralīnatoyakaṇopame / sthirāśā jīvite yasya tatsamo nāstyacetanaḥ // 3543	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvatthamekaṃ picumandamekaṃ nyagrodhamekaṃ daśa ciñciṇīkāḥ / kapitthabilvāmalakatrayaṃ ca pañcāmravāpī narakaṃ na paśyet // 3544	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśvatthasya mahattvaṃ ko nanu vaktuṃ naraḥ prabhavet / savitari yatrālakṣmīr mande lakṣmīramandāste // 3545	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
aśvatthāmā balirvyāso hanūmāṃśca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / kṛpaḥ paraśurāmaśca saptaite cirajīvinaḥ // 3546	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvatthāmā hata iti yudhi giramanṛtāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro'vādīt / punaranutāpamavāpat pāpaṃ kṛtvānutapyeta // 3547	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aśvapṛṣṭhaṃ gajaskandho nārīṇāṃ ca payodharaḥ / dantadhāvanaśastraṃ ca yathā sthūlaṃ tathā sukham // 3548	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvapraśaṃsā vikhyātā dhanurvedastataḥparam / gāndharvaśāstramaparaṃ vṛkṣāyurveda eva ca // 3549	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aśvaplutaṃ vāsavagarjitaṃ ca strīṇāṃ ca cittaṃ puruṣasya bhāgyam / avarṣaṇaṃ cāpyativarṣaṇaṃ ca devo na jānāti kṛto manuṣyaḥ // 3550	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aśvamadhye kṛtaravā śivā yuddhaprapañcakṛt / śivā saptasvarā grāhyā bahuśabdāśca niṣphalāḥ // 3551	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam / atyaricyata satyaṃ ca iti vedavido viduḥ // 3552	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam / aśvamedhasahasrāddhi satyameva viśiṣyate // 3553	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam / tulayitvā tu paśyāmi satyamevātiricyate // 3554	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam / nābhijānāmi yadyasya satyasyārdhamavāpnuyāt // 3555	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ satyaṃ tulāntare / dhṛtvā saṃloḍyate rājan satye bhavati gauravam // 3556	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret / nāsau padamavāpnoti madbhaktair yadavāpyate // 3557	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvayānaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaścaiva prasūtikāḥ / tathā cāntaḥpure dāsīṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet // 3558	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvaśālāṃ samāsādya yadāntarmadhumakṣikāḥ / madhujālaṃ prabadhnanti mriyante'śvāstadā dhruvam // 3559	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvasya lakṣaṇaṃ vego mado mātaṅgalakṣaṇam / cāturyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāryā udyogaḥ puruṣalakṣaṇam // 3560	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aśvānāṃ ca patākānāṃ bālānāṃ paṇyayoṣitām / vidūṣakapaṭānāṃ ca cāpalyamatimaṇḍanam // 3561	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvā nāgāḥ syandanānāṃ ca saṅghā mantrāḥ siddhā daivataṃ cānukūlam / etānyāhuḥ sādhanāni sma rājñāṃ yebhyaśceyaṃ buddhirutkṛṣyate me // 3562	śālinī [11: mttgg]
aśvā yasya jayastasya yasyāśvāstasya medinī / aśvā yasya yaśas tasya yasyāśvās tasya kāñcanam // 3563	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvārūḍhaṃ payaḥpānaṃ gajārūḍhaṃ tu maithunam / śibikīmardanaṃ caiva pādacārī tu bhojanam // 3564	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvārūḍhaṃ yatiṃ dṛṣṭvā khaṭvārūḍhāṃ rajasvalām / sakeśāṃ vidhavāṃ dṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret // 3565	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvāścatuṣkoṭimitā lakṣāṇyekādaśaiva ca / saptatriṃśatsahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam // 3566	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptatiścaiva saṃkhyātāḥ procyante pattayastataḥ / ṣaṭkoṭyo'śītilakṣāṇi pañcādhikamitāni ca // 3567	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dviṣaṣṭi ca sahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam / pañcāśaditi saṃkhyātā mahākṣauhinikā budhaiḥ // 3568	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvinīmaitrarevatyo mṛgo mūlaṃ punarvasuḥ / puṣyo jyeṣṭhā tathā hastaḥ prasthāne śreṣṭha ucyate // 3569	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvinī sūyate vatsaṃ kāmadhenusturaṃgamam / tathaiva sāgaro vahniṃ yathā rājā tathā prajā // 3570	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasyāśīviṣāṇāṃ kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītirātyantikī / kṣīṇe'rthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe lokāpavāde śanair jñeyā kāmijaneṣu saiva gaṇikāvargasya naisargikī // 3571	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aśve javo vṛṣe dhauryaṃ maṇau kāntiḥ kṣamā nṛpe / hāvabhāvau ca veśyāyāṃ gāyake madhurasvaraḥ // 3572	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dātṛtvaṃ dhanike śauryaṃ sainike bahudugdhatā / goṣu damastapasviṣu vidvatsu vāvadūkatā // 3573	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
sabhyeṣvapakṣapātastu tathā sākṣiṣu satyavāk / ananyabhaktirbhṛtyeṣu suhitoktiśca mantriṣu // 3574	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
maunaṃ mūrkheṣu ca strīṣu pātivratyaṃ subhūṣaṇam / mahādurbhūṣaṇaṃ caitad viparītamamīṣu ca // 3575	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvairyānaṃ yānaṃ strībhir līlaiva procyate līlā / māṃsāṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ cānyad ayānamalīlābhuktam // 3576	upajāti anuṣṭubh: ajñātam [8: jygg], ajñātam [8: mrgg], vidyumālā [8: mmgg] atha vā vidyumālā [8: mmgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṣṭakulācalasaptasamudrā brahmapuraṃdaradinakararudrāḥ / na tvaṃ nāhaṃ nāyaṃ lokas tadapi kimarthaṃ kriyate śokaḥ // 3577	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
aṣṭadhā devatāyonis tiryagyoniśca pañcadhā / ekadhā mānuṣī yonir ime bhūtāścaturdaśa // 3578	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭapādaścatuṣkarṇo dvimukhī dvimukhastathā / rājadvāre paṭhed ghoro na ca devo na rākṣasaḥ // 3579	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭamaṃ brahmarandhraṃ syāt paraṃ nirvāṇasūcakam / taddhyātvā sūcikāgrābhaṃ dhūmākāraṃ vimucyate / tacca jālaṃdharaṃ jñeyaṃ mokṣadaṃ līnacetasām // aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā varjanīyā caturdaśī / 3580	upajāti aṣṭi: ajñātam [16: rrmyjg], ajñātam [16: mrmmjg], ajñātam [16: rrtmjg], ajñātam [16: rsmyjg]
pūrṇimārdhadinaṃ yāvan niṣiddhā sarvakarmasu // 3581	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
aṣṭamī hantyupādhyāyaṃ śiṣyaṃ hanti caturdaśī / āmāvāsyo'bhayaṃ hanti pratipat pāṭhanāśinī // 3582	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭame dvādaśe vāpi śākaṃ yaḥ pacate gṛhe / kumitrāṇyanapāśritya kiṃ vai sukhataraṃ tataḥ // 3583	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭāṅgayogapariśīlanakīlanena duḥsādhasiddhisavidhaṃ vidadhad vidūre / āsādayannabhimatāmadhunā viveka- khyātiṃ samādhidhanamaulimaṇirvimuktaḥ // 3584	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aṣṭāṅgulasya kathito vāyormāno vicakṣaṇaiḥ / caturaṅgulamānaṃ ca tejastattvaṃ nigadyate // 3585	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭādaśa tathā madhye hīne caiva caturdaśa / saptāṅgulaḥ khuraḥ prokta uttamāśvasya paṇḍitaiḥ // 3586	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu vyāsasya vacanadvayam / paropakāraḥ puṇyāya pāpāya parapīḍanam // 3587	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aṣṭādaśāpi smṛtayo vadanti yasyāparādhaḥ khalu tasya daṇḍaḥ / svasyāparādhaḥ khalu nābhimūle śiraḥ kuto muṇḍayate mṛgākṣi // 3588	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ saṃbhavatyaṃśato nṛpaḥ / tasmādabhibhavatyeṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā // 3589	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭābhiḥ kila daṇḍanītinipuṇaiḥ satprāḍvivākaiḥ samaṃ madhyesaudhamanuttamāsanagataḥ kāryāṇi kurvan nṛṇām / viṣṇurbhūpavapurvidhāya kimasau dikpālayuk pālayaty evaṃ bhrāntimato manāṅ na kurute kāskānayaṃ mādhavaḥ // 3590	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṣṭāvaṅgāni yogasya yamo niyama āsanam / prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhāraṇā dhyānatanmayaḥ // 3591	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṣṭāvimāni harṣasya navanītāni bhārata / vartamānāni dṛśyante tānyeva susukhānyapi // 3592	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāgamaśca sakhibhir mahāṃścaiva dhanāgamaḥ / putreṇa ca pariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃnipātaśca maithune // 3593	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
samaye ca priyālāpaḥ svayūtheṣu ca saṃnatiḥ / abhipretasya lābhaśca pūjā ca janasaṃsadi // 3594	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭottaraśataṃ ślokaṃ cāṇakyena yathoditam / yasya vijñānamātreṇa n ṇāṃ prajñā pravardhate // 3595	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aṣṭau guṇāḥ puruṣaṃ dīpayanti prajñā ca kaulyaṃ ca damaḥ śrutaṃ ca / parākramaścābahubhāṣitā ca dānaṃ yathāśakti kṛtajñatā ca // 3596	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tBtgl], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aṣṭau tānyavrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ / havirbhrāhmaṇakāmyā ca gurorvacanamauṣadham // 3597	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭau nṛpemāni manuṣyaloke svargasya lokasya nidarśanāni / catvāryeṣāmanvavetāni sadbhiś catvāryeṣāmanvavayanti santaḥ // 3598	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
yajño dānamadhyayanaṃ tapaśca catvāryetānyanvavetāni sadbhiḥ / damaḥ satyamārjavamānṛśaṃsyaṃ catvāryetānyanvavayanti santaḥ // 3599	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mjjgl], ajñātam [11: mtjgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: yjjgg]
aṣṭau pūrvanimittāni narasya vinaśiṣyataḥ / brāhmaṇān prathamaṃ dveṣṭi brāhmaṇaiśca virudhyate // 3600	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇasvāni cādatte brāhmaṇāṃśca jighāṃsati / ramate nindayā caiṣāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nābhinandati // 3601	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naitān smarati kṛtyeṣu yācitaś cābhyasūyati / etān doṣān naraḥ prājño buddhyā buddhvā vivarjayet // 3602	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭau māsān yathādityas toyaṃ harati raśmibhiḥ / tathā haret karaṃ rāṣṭrān nityamarkavrataṃ hi tat // 3603	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭau yadā tu dṛśyante samantād devayonayaḥ / upasargaṃ tamityāhur daivamunmattavad budhāḥ // 3604	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭau yasya diśo dalāni vipulaḥ kośaḥ suvarṇācalaḥ kāntaṃ kesarajālamarkakiraṇā bhṛṅgāḥ payodāvalī / nālaṃ śeṣamahoragaḥ pravitataṃ vārāṃnidherlīlayā tadvaḥ pātu samuddharan kuvalayaṃ kroḍākṛtiḥ keśavaḥ // 3605	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aṣṭau hāṭakakoṭayastrinavatirmuktāphalānāṃ tulāḥ pañcāśanmadhugandhamattamadhupāḥ krodhoddhatāḥ sindhurāḥ / aśvānāmayutaṃ prapañcacaturaṃ vārāṅganānāṃ śataṃ dattaṃ pāṇḍyanṛpeṇa yautakamidaṃ vaitālikāyārpyatām // 3606	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asaṃkalpājjayet kāmaṃ krodhaṃ kāmavivarjanāt / arthānarthekṣayā lobhaṃ bhayaṃ tattvāvamarśanāt // 3607	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃkalpitameveha yadakasmāt pravartate / nivartyārambhamārabdhaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // 3608	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃkhyapuṣpo'pi manobhavasya pañcaiva bāṇārthamayaṃ dadāti / evaṃ kadaryatvamivāvadhārya sarvasvamagrāhi madhorvadhūbhiḥ // 3609	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃkhyāḥ paradoṣajñā guṇajñā api kecana / svayameva svadoṣajñā vidyante yadi pañcaṣāḥ // 3610	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃgatenonnatimāgatena calena vakreṇa malīmasena / sā durjaneneva samastametaṃ prabādhate bhrūyugalena lokam // 3611	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃgṛhītasya punar mantrasya śṛṇu yatphalam / ahīnaṃ dharmakāmābhyām arthaṃ prāpnoti kevalam // 3612	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃcayādapūrvasya kṣayāt pūrvārjitasya ca / karmaṇo bandhamāpnoti śārīraṃ na punaḥ punaḥ // 3613	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtuṣṭasya viprasya tejo vidyā tapo yaśaḥ / sravantīndriyalaulyena jñānaṃ caivāvakīryate // 3614	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtuṣṭā dvijā naṣṭāḥ saṃtuṣṭāśca mahībhṛtaḥ / salajjā gaṇikā naṣṭā nirlajjāśca kulāṅganā // 3615	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtuṣṭāścyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ / svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpyupahatāḥ paraiḥ // 3616	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtuṣṭo'sakṛllokān āpnotyapi sureśvaraḥ / akiṃcano'pi saṃtuṣṭaḥ śete sarvāṅgavijvaraḥ // 3617	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham / sukhārthī puruṣas tasmāt saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataḥ bhavet // 3618	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ pāpam ityāha bhagavān hariḥ / lobhaḥ pāpasya bījo'yaṃ moho mūlaṃ ca tasya vai / asatyaṃ tasya hi skandho mahāśākhā suvistarā // 3619	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jmtm], ajñātam [12: mrjt], ajñātam [12: yrrB], ajñātam [12: yrtr]
asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ / asantoṣasya nāstyantas tuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham // 3620	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtoṣo'sukhāyaiva lobhādindriyavibhramaḥ / tato'sya naśyati prajñā vidyevābhyāsavarjitā // 3621	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtāmapāpāṃs tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvāt / śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvāt tasmāt pāpaiḥ saha saṃdhiṃ na kuryāt // 3622	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], vātormī [11: mBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
asaṃdadhāno mānāndhaḥ samenāpi hato bhṛśam / āmakumbhamivābhittvā nāvatiṣṭheta śaktimān // 3623	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃdigdhamanā bhūtvā vadedikṣuraso yathā / vikṣubdho vacasā yo hi vākyaśalyena hanyate // 3624	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃpattau paro lābho guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā / āpadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitrasyaitat phalatrayam // 3625	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃpannaḥ kathaṃ bandhur asahiṣṇuḥ kathaṃ prabhuḥ / anātmavit kathaṃ vidvān asaṃtuṣṭaḥ kathaṃ sukhī // 3626	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃpādayataḥ kaṃcidarthaṃ jātikriyāguṇaiḥ / yadṛcchāśabdavatpuṃsaḥ saṃjñāyai janma kevalam // 3627	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃprāptarajā gaurī prāpte rajasi rohiṇī / avyañjanā bhavet kanyā kucahīnā ca nagnikā // 3628	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhavaṃ hemamṛgasya janma tathāpi rāmo lulubhe mṛgāya / prāyaḥ samāpannavipattikāle dhiyo'pi puṃsāṃ malinā bhavanti // 3629	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃbhavaguṇastutyā jāyate svātmanastrapā / karṇikāraṃ sugandhīti vadan ko nopahasyate // 3630	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhāvyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi dṛśyate / śilā tarati pānīyaṃ gītaṃ gāyati vānaraḥ // 3631	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhāṣyaṃ na bhāṣeta bhāṣase yadi tattathā / pareṣāṃ hi samudvege nātmanaśca śubhaṃ phalam // 3632	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgayaṣṭer anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya / kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede // 3633	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃbhedyaḥ śucirdakṣaḥ kṛtānnasya parīkṣakaḥ / sūdānāṃ ca viśeṣajñaḥ sūdādhyakṣo vidhīyate // 3634	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhogena sāmānyaṃ kṛpaṇasya dhanaṃ paraiḥ / asyedamiti saṃbandho hānau duḥkhena gamyate // 3635	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃbhramo vilajjatvam avajñā prativādini / hāso rājñaḥ stavaśceti pañcaite jayahetavaḥ // 3636	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃmataḥ kastava muktimārgaṃ punarbhavakleśabhayāt prapannaḥ / baddhaściraṃ tiṣṭhatu sundarīṇām ārecitabhrūcaturaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ // 3637	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃmāne tapovṛddhiḥ saṃmmānācca tapaḥkṣayaḥ / pūjayā puṇyahāniḥ syān nindayā sadgatirbhavet // 3638	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃmukhālokanamābhimukhyaṃ niṣedha evānumatiprakāraḥ / pratyuttaraṃ mudraṇameva vācāṃ navāṅganānāṃ nava eva panthāḥ // 3639	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaṃvibhāgī duṣṭātmā kṛtaghno nirapatrapaḥ / tādṛṅnarādhamo loke varjanīyo narādhipa // 3640	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃvṛtasya kāryāṇi prāptānyapi viśeṣataḥ / niḥsaṃśayaṃ vipadyante bhinnaplava ivodadhau // 3641	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃvṛtākāratayā bhinnamantrasya bhūpateḥ / sakṛcchidraghaṭasyeva na tiṣṭhatyudayodakam // 3642	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ / satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ // 3643	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asaṃśayaṃ nyastamupāntaraktatāṃ yadeva roddhuṃ rāmaṇībhirañjanam / hṛte'pi tasmin salilena śuklatāṃ nirāsa rāgo nayaneṣu na śriyam // 3644	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam / abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate // 3645	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asaṃśayaṃ vijānīhi kāle sarvaṃ phaliṣyati / dhṛtiṃ dhāraya visrabdhaṃ bhavet sarvaṃ samañjasam // 3646	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asakalakalikākulīkṛtāli- skhalanavikīrṇavikāsikeśarāṇām / marudavaniruhāṃ rajo vadhūbhyaḥ samupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi // 3647	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
asakalanayanāvalokanena smitaparihāsamanoharairvacobhiḥ / kamalamukhi murārirevamevaṃ kathaya kiyanti dināni vañcanīyaḥ // 3648	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
asakalanayanekṣitāni lajjā gatamalasaṃ paripāṇḍutā viṣādaḥ / iti vividhamiyāya tāsu bhūṣāṃ prabhavati maṇḍayituṃ vadhūranaṅgaḥ // 3649	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
asakṛdasakṛnnaṣṭāṃ naṣṭāṃ mṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikāṃ śramaparigato'pyutpakṣmākṣaḥ paraiti punaḥ punaḥ / gaṇayati na tanmāyātoyaṃ hataḥ salilāśayā bhavati hi matistṛṣṇāndhānāṃ vivekaparāṅmukhī // 3650	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
asakṛn na ne'ti sāvadhi- niṣedhabodhiśrutirmayā kalitā / gamayati paramanavarataṃ yā tamakhaṇḍārtharūpamānandam // 3651	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
asakṛdekarathena tarasvinā harihayāgrasareṇa dhanurbhṛtā / dinakarābhimukhā raṇareṇavo rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām // 3652	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asakṛd yudhi vijitādapi bhīto bārhadrathājjale durgam / kṛtvā harirnyavātsīd vijito'pyāśaṅkanīyo'riḥ // 3653	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asakṛn na vadedāśāṃ prārthayed devatāṃ sakṛt / nālāyanī pañca patīn prāpoccārya punaḥ punaḥ // 3654	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
asaktamārādhayato yathāyathaṃ vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā / guṇānurāgādiva sakhyamīyivān na bādhate'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam // 3655	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asaṅgasaṃgadoṣeṇa satyāśca mativibhramaḥ / ekarātraprasaṅgena kāṣṭhaghaṇṭāviḍambanā // 3656	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asajjanaḥ sajjanasaṅgisaṅgāt karoti duḥsādhyamapīha sādhyam / puṣpāśrayācchaṃbhuśiro'dhirūḍhā pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam // 3657	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asajjanāyāśu varaṃ na dadyāt prītito nṛpaḥ / varaṃ bhasmāsurāyeśaḥ dattvā nīliphalaṃ gataḥ // 3658	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asajjanāścen madhurairvacobhiḥ śakyanta eva pratikartumāryaiḥ / tatketakīreṇubhiramburāśer bandhakriyāyāmapi kaḥ prayāsaḥ // 3659	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asajjanena saṃparkād anayaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ / madhuraṃ śītalaṃ toyaṃ pāvakaṃ prāpya tapyate // 3660	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asataḥ śrīmadāndhasya dāridryaṃ paramāñjanam / ātmaupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ paramīkṣate // 3661	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ ca parikṣepaḥ satāṃ ca parigūhanam / abhūtānāṃ ca hiṃsānām adharmāṇāṃ ca varjanam // 3662	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ dharmabuddhiścet satāṃ saṃtāpakāraṇam / upoṣitasya vyāghrasya pāraṇaṃ paśumāraṇam // 3663	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asatāṃ pragrahaḥ kāmaḥ kopaścāvagrahaḥ satām / vyasanaṃ doṣabāhulyād atyantamubhayaṃ matam // 3664	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ bata sattāpi na nyāyānugatā yadā / tatastebhyorthapūrttyāśā sudhālipseva bhoginaḥ // 3665	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa satī yāti matirbhramam / ekarātripravāsena kāṣṭhaṃ muñje pralambitam // 3666	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa sādhavo yānti vikriyām / duryodhanaprasaṅgena bhīṣmo goharaṇe gataḥ // 3667	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ saṅgamutsṛjya satsu saṅgaṃ samācaret / asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa māṇḍavyaḥ śūlamāptavān // 3668	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāṃ sahajo bhāvaś channaḥ kenāpi hetunā / saṃskāra iva bījānāṃ phalena saha jāyate // 3669	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatāmupabhogāya durjanānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ / picumandaḥ phalāḍhyo'pi kākairevopabhujyate // 3670	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatā saha saṅgena ko na yātyadhamāṃ gatim / payo'pi śauṇḍanīhaste madyamityabhidhīyate // 3671	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatīcaritaṃ tadvad vasantādeścavarṇanam / grīṣmādervarṇanaṃ tadvad varṣāderapi varṇanam // 3672	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati / dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ // 3673	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asato'pi bhavati guṇavān sadbhyo'pi paraṃ bhavantyasadvṛttāḥ / paṅkādudeti kamalaṃ krimayaḥ kamalādapi bhavanti // 3674	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asato vā sato vāpi svayaṃ svān varṇayan guṇān / hāsyatāṃ yāti śakro'pi kiṃ punaḥ prākṛto janaḥ // 3675	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatkāryarato'dhīra ārambhī viṣayī ca yaḥ / sa rājaso manuṣyeṣu mṛto janmādhigacchati // 3676	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatpratigrahītā ca narake yātyadhomukhe / eko miṣṭānnabhug yaḥ sa yāti pūyavahaṃ naraḥ // 3677	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatpralāpaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyamanṛtaṃ tathā / catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet // 3678	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asatyaḥ sarvaloke'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ / bhartāraṃ nānumanyaṃte vinipātagataṃ striyaḥ // 3679	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyatā niṣṭhuratākṛtajñatā bhayaṃ pramādo'lasatā viṣāditā / vṛthābhimāno'pi ca dīrghasūtratā tathāṅganākṣādi vināśanaṃ śriyaḥ // 3680	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asatyamapratyayamūlakāraṇaṃ kuvāsanāsadmasamṛddhivāraṇam / vipannidānaṃ paravañcanorjitaṃ kṛtāparādhaṃ kṛtibhirvivarjitam // 3681	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asatyametad viditaṃ samastam akāryakārīti mṛṣā prapañcaḥ / kucāpalāpakramameva kartum ācchādanaṃ te hṛdayasya śaśvat // 3682	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asatyaśīlā vikṛtā durgrāhyahṛdayāḥ sadā / yuvatyaḥ pāpasaṃkalpāḥ kṣaṇamātrād virāgiṇaḥ // 3683	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyasaṃdhasya sataś calasyāsthiracetasaḥ / naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // 3684	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asatyasya vaṇigmūlaṃ śākhāstasya varāṅganāḥ / kāyasthāḥ patrapuṣpāṇi phalāni dyūtakāriṇaḥ // 3685	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyāḥ satyasaṃkāśāḥ satyāścāsatyarūpiṇaḥ / dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmād yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam // 3686	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyā ca hatā vāṇī tathā paiśunyavādinī / saṃdigdho'pi hato mantro vyagracitto hato japaḥ // 3687	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyātmaguṇe śastraṃ hastābhyāṃ vinivāryate / eṣāpi na gatiḥ kṣemyā na cānyā vidyate kvacit // 3688	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatyenaiva jīvanti veśyāḥ satyavivarjitāḥ / etāḥ satyena naśyanti madyeneva kulāṅganāḥ // 3689	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatsaṃparkadoṣeṇa adhastād yānti sādhavaḥ / mārgastimiradoṣeṇa samo'pi viṣamāyate // 3690	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asatsaṅgād guṇajño'pi viṣayāsaktamānasaḥ / akasmāt pralayaṃ yāti gītarakto yathā mṛgaḥ // 3691	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asadṛśajaneṣu yācñā mahatāṃ nahi lāghavāya suhṛdarthe / harirapi pāṇḍusutebhyaḥ svayamarthī dhārtarāṣṭreṣu // 3692	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asaddharmastvayaṃ strīṇām asmākaṃ bhavati prabho / pāpīyaso narān yadvai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe // 3693	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asadbhiḥ sevito rājā svayaṃ sannapi dūṣyate / kiṃ sevyo bhogisaṃvīto gandhavānapi candanaḥ // 3694	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asadbhirasatāmeva bhujyante dhanasaṃpadaḥ / phalaṃ kimpākavṛkṣasya dhvāṅkṣā bhakṣanti netare // 3695	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asadvṛtto nāyaṃ na ca sakhi guṇaireṣa rahitaḥ priyo muktāhārastava caraṇamūle nipatitaḥ / gṛhāṇainaṃ mugdhe vrajatu tava kaṇṭhapraṇayitām upāyo nāstyanyo hṛdayaparitāpopaśamane // 3696	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asanto'bhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiṃcitkāryaṃ kadācana / manyante santamātmānam asantamapi vitaśrum // 3697	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
asanto ye nivartante vedebhya iva nāstikāḥ / narakaṃ bhajamānāste pratipadyanti kilbiṣam // 3698	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asanthitapadā suvihvalāṅgī madaskhalitaceṣṭitairmanojñā / kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam // 3699	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
asabhyaḥ piśunaścaiva kṛtaghno dīrghavairiṇaḥ / catvāraḥ karmacaṇḍālāḥ jāticaṇḍālapañcamāḥ // 3700	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamagravilokitena kiṃ te dayitaṃ paśya varoru nirviśaṅkam / nahi jātu kuśāgrapītamambhaḥ sucireṇāpi karotyapetatṛṣṇam // 3701	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
asamañjasamasamañjasa- masañjasametadāpatitam / vallavakumārabuddhyā hari hari harirīkṣataḥ kutukāt // 3702	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
asamarthaṃ parityajya samarthāḥ paribhuñjate / nṛpāṇāṃ nāsti dāyādyaṃ vīrabhogyā vasundharā // 3703	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamaye matirunmiṣati dhruvaṃ karagataiva gatā yadiyaṃ kuhūḥ / punarupaiti nirudhya nivāsyate sakhi mukhaṃ na vidhoḥ punarīkṣyate // 3704	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asamarthāḥ prakurvanti munayo'pyarthasaṃcayam / kiṃ na kurvanti bhūpālā yeṣāṃ kośavaśāḥ prajāḥ // 3705	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamartho bhavet sādhur nirdhano brahmacāryapi / vyādhimān devapūjī ca kurūpā ca pativratā // 3706	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamasamarasampallampaṭānāṃ bhaṭānām avadhiravadhi yuddhe yena hampīravīraḥ / sa kila sakaladṛptakṣatranakṣatralakṣmī- haraṇakiraṇamālī kasya na syān namasyaḥ // 3707	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asamasāhasasuvyavasāyinaḥ sakalalokacamatkṛtikāriṇaḥ / yadi bhavanti na vāñchitasiddhayo hatavidherayaśo na manasvinaḥ // 3708	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asamāne samānatvaṃ bhavitā kalahe mama / iti matvā dhruvaṃ mānī mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate // 3709	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamāpitakṛtyasaṃpadāṃ hatavegaṃ vinayena tāvatā / prabhavantyabhimānaśālināṃ madamuttambhayituṃ vibhūtayaḥ // 3710	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
asamāptajigīṣasya strīcintā kā manasvinaḥ / anākramya jagat kṛtsnaṃ no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ // 3711	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamaiḥ samīyamānaḥ samaiśca parihīyamāṇasatkāraḥ / adhuri viniyujyamānas tribhirarthapatiṃ tyajati bhṛtyaḥ // 3712	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asamyagupayuktaṃ hi jñānaṃ sukuśalairapi / upalabhyāpyaviditaṃ viditaṃ cāpyanuṣṭhitam // 3713	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asahāyaḥ pumānekaḥ kāryāntaṃ nādhigacchati / tuṣeṇāpi vinirmuktas taṇḍulo na prarohati // 3714	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati / rāmaḥ sugrīvasāhāyyāt laṅkāṃ nirdagdhavān purā // 3715	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvyapi karoti kim / nivāte patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati // 3716	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyaḥ samartho'pi na kāryaṃ kartumarhati / tuṣeṇāpi parityaktā na prarohanti taṇḍulāḥ // 3717	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyaḥ sahāyārthī māmanudhyātavān dhruvam / pīḍyamānaḥ śaraistīkṣṇair droṇadrauṇikṛpādibhiḥ // 3718	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyasya kāryāṇi siddhiṃ nāyānti kānicit / tasmāt samastakāryeṣu sahāyo bhūpatergatiḥ // 3719	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāyo'samartho vā tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati / atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyate // 3720	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahāścaiva vijñeyāḥ prabhāvanto videhajāḥ / aṅgadeśodbhavāstīkṣṇāḥ suhastāḥ sudṛḍhāstathā // 3721	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahyavātoddhatareṇumaṇḍalā pracaṇḍasūryātapatāpitā mahī / na śakyate draṣṭumapi pravāsibhiḥ priyāviyogānaladagdhamānasaiḥ // 3722	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asahyānyapi soḍhāni gaditānyapriyāṇyapi / sthitaḥ paragṛhadvāri tṛṣṇe nivṛttimāpnuhi // 3723	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
asādhanā vittahīnā buddhimantaḥ suhṛnmatāḥ / sādhayantyāśu kāryāṇi kākakūrmamṛgākhuvat // 3724	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhuḥ sādhurvā bhavati khalu jātyaiva puruṣo na saṅgād daurjanyaṃ na hi sujanatā kasyacidapi / prarūḍhe saṃsarge maṇibhujagayorjanmajanite maṇirnāherdoṣān spṛśati na tu sarpo maṇiguṇān // 3725	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asādhu parigantavyaṃ na ca sādhu ca saṃvalam / saṃvalaṃ kuru yatnena maraṇaṃ dhruvaniścayam // 3726	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet / anṛtaṃ naiva jalpeta abhakṣyaṃ naiva bhakṣayet // 3727	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhyaṃ śatrumālokya dāyādaṃ tasya bhedayet / rājyakāmaṃ samarthaṃ ca yathā rāmo vibhīṣaṇam // 3728	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhyaṃ sādhumantrāṇāṃ tīvraṃ vāgviṣamutsṛjat / dvijihvaṃ vadanaṃ dhatte duṣṭo durjanapannagaḥ // 3729	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhyamanyathā doṣaṃ paricchidya śarīriṇām / yathā vaidyastathā rājā śastrapāṇirviṣahyati // 3730	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asādhyāyāḥ sukhaṃ siddhiḥ siddhāyāścānurañjanam / raktāyāśca ratiḥ samyak kāmaśāstraprayojanam // 3731	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāmānyollekhaṃ virasahatahevākinamalaṃ vidhiṃ vande nindāmyuta bata na jāne kimucitam / anarghaṃ nirmāṇaṃ lalitatanu yasyeha bhavatī na yaḥ kṛtvāpi tvāṃ pariharati sargavyasanitām // 3732	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam / adarpaṃ kandarpaṃ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ // 3733	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāraḥ saṃsāraḥ sarasakadalīsārasadṛśo lasadvidyullekhācakitacapalaṃ jīvitamidam / yadetat tāruṇyaṃ nagagatanadīvegasadṛśam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ puṃsāṃ tadapi viṣayān dhāvati manaḥ // 3734	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāraḥ sarvataḥ sāro vācā sārasamuccayaḥ / vācā sā calitā yena sukṛtaṃ tena hāritam // 3735	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asārabhūte saṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā / tadarthaṃ dhanamicchanti tattyāge ca dhanena kim // 3736	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asārabhūte saṃsāre sārabhūtā nitambinī / iti saṃcintya vai śaṃbhur ardhāṅge kāminīṃ dadhau // 3737	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asārāḥ santyete virativirasā vātha viṣayā jugupsantāṃ yad vā nanu sakaladoṣāspadamiti / tathāpyantastattvapraṇihitadhiyāmapyatibalas tadīyo'nākhyeyaḥ sphurati hṛdaye ko'pi mahimā // 3738	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram / kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete śivaḥ śete himālaye // 3739	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram / haro himālaye śete viṣṇuḥ śete mahodadhau // 3740	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre khalu saṃsāre sārametaccatuṣṭayam / kāśyāṃ vāsaḥ satāṃ saṅgo gaṅgāmbhaḥ śaṃbhusevanam // 3741	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre khalu saṃsāre sukhabhrāntiḥ śarīriṇām / lālāpānamivāṅguṣṭhe bālānāṃ stanyavibhramaḥ // 3742	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre bata saṃsāre karmatantraḥ śarīriṇām / jāyante priyasaṃyogā viyoge hṛdayacchidaḥ // 3743	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre saṃsāre viṣamaviṣapāke nṛpasukhe kṛtāntenācānte prakṛticapale jīvitabale / dhruvāpāye kāye viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇāhatahṛdaḥ kṣaraprāṇaiḥ prāṇānahaha parimuṣṇanti kudhiyaḥ // 3744	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāre saṃsāre sumatiśaraṇe kāvyakaraṇe yatheṣṭaṃ ceṣṭante kati na kavayaḥ svasvarucayaḥ / paraṃ dugdhasnigdhaṃ madhuraracanaṃ yastu vacanaṃ prasūte brūte vā bhavati viralaḥ ko'pi saralaḥ // 3745	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāro nirguṇo vakraś citrarūpatayānvitaḥ / avāpa na cirād bhraṃśaṃ śakracāpaḥ khalo yathā // 3746	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāvadhāne pāṇḍityaṃ krayakrītaṃ ca maithunam / bhojanaṃ ca parādhīnaṃ tisraḥ puṃsāṃ viḍambanāḥ // 3747	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāvanāsthāparayāvadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā namannapi / upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ sahāmbhasā manobhuvā tapta ivābhipāṇḍutām // 3748	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asāvanupanīto'pi vedānadhijage guroḥ / svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sphaṭiko na saṃskāramapekṣate // 3749	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
asāvantaścañcadvikacanavalīlābjayugala- stalasphūrjatkamburvilasadalisaṃghāta upari / vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhi te // 3750	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asāvahaṃ lohamayī sa yasyāḥ krūraḥ sakhi prastara eṣa kāntaḥ / ākarṣakadrāvakacumbakeṣu naiko'pyasau bhrāmaka ityavaihi // 3751	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
