asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ / rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ // 3752	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāvudvelalāvaṇyaratnākarasamudbhavaḥ / jagadvijayamāṅgalyaśaṅkhaḥ kusumadhanvanaḥ // 3753	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāvekadvitriprabhṛtiparipāṭyā prakaṭayan kalāḥ svairaṃ svairaṃ navakamalakandāṅkurarucaḥ / purandhrīṇāṃ preyovirahadahanoddīpitadṛśāṃ kaṭākṣebhyo bibhyannibhṛtamiva candro'bhyudayate // 3754	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asiḥ śarā varma dhanuśca noccakair vivicya kiṃ prārthitamīśvareṇa te / athāsti śaktiḥ kṛtameva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatāṃ svayaṃgrahaḥ // 3755	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asijīvī maṣījīvī devalo grāmayājakaḥ / dhāvakaḥ pācakaścaiva ṣaḍ viprāḥ śūdrajātayaḥ // 3756	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asitakhuracatuṣkaḥ śyāmalagranthipādaḥ sravati karasamīpe mūtradhārāṃ savegām / daśanacalakhalīnaḥ kukkuṭaskandhabandhaḥ kiṭivarakaṭhinorurdūragaḥ syāt turuṅgaḥ // 3757	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asitagirisamaṃ syāt kajjalaṃ sindhupātre surataruvaraśākhā lekhanī patramurvī / likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālaṃ tadapi tava guṇānāmīśa pāraṃ na yāti // 3758	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asitanayanalakṣmīṃ lakṣayitvotpaleṣu kvaṇitakanakakāñcīṃ mattahaṃsasvaneṣu / adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ // 3759	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asitabhujagabhīṣaṇāsipatro ruharuhikāhitacittatūrṇacāraḥ / pulakitatanurutkapolakāntiḥ pratibhaṭavikramadarśane'yamāsīt // 3760	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
asitabhujagaśiśuveṣṭitam abhinavamābhāti ketakīkusumam / āyasavalayālaṃkṛta- viṣāṇamiva dantinaḥ patitam // 3761	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asitamekasurāśitamapyamūn na punareṣa vidhurviśadaṃ viṣam / api nipīya surairjanitakṣayaṃ svayamudeti punarnavamārṇavam // 3762	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asitavasanasragsaṃvītā ghanāgurusāravan mṛgamadamaṣīsnātā jātāṃ tvameva tamasvinī / abhisara sukhaṃ dantoddyotaṃ na tanvi vikāsayeḥ śvasitamathavā muñceścañcaddvirephaghanodgamam // 3763	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
asitātmā susaṃnaddhaḥ samāviṣkṛtacāpalaḥ / bhujaṃgakuṭilas tasyā bhrūvikṣepaḥ khalāyate // 3764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asiddhasādhanaṃ sadbhiḥ śāsanaṃ daṇḍa ucyate / taṃ yuktyaiva nayed daṇḍaṃ yuktadaṇḍaḥ praśasyate // 3765	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asidhārāṃ viṣaṃ vahniṃ samatve yaḥ prapaśyati / mālāsudhātuṣārāṇāṃ sa yogī kathyate budhaiḥ // 3766	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asidhārākramakrītā varamekāpi kākiṇī / na parabhrūvinirdiṣṭā sāgarāntāpi medinī // 3767	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asidhārāpathe nātha śatruśoṇitapicchile / ājagāma kathaṃ lakṣmīr nirjagāma kathaṃ yaśaḥ // 3768	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asidhenuriyaṃ vibhāti te jitasarvakṣitipālamaṇḍalā / pralaye jagatīmivāśituṃ sphuratī kālakarālajihvakā // 3769	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
asindūreṇa sīmanto mā bhūnno yoṣitāmiti / ataḥ pariharantyājāv asiṃ dūreṇa te'rayaḥ // 3770	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asimātrasahāyasya prabhūtāriparābhave / anyatucchajanasyeva na smayo'sya mahādhṛteḥ // 3771	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asīvyad dehe sve paśupatirumāṅkaṃ samaghano vigupto gopībhirduhitaramayāt sā kamalabhūḥ / yadādeśādetaj jagadapi mṛgīdṛkparavaśaṃ sa vaśyaḥ kasya syādahaha viṣamo manmathabharaḥ // 3772	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asukhamatha sukhaṃ vā karmaṇāṃ paktivelāsv ahaha niyatamete bhuñjate dehabhājaḥ / tadiha purata eva prāha mauhurtikaścet kathaya phalamamīṣāmantataḥ kiṃ tataḥ syāt // 3773	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asukhaiśca vinālāpo guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā / vipadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitratāyāḥ phalatrayam // 3774	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asubhiraśubhaṃ tyaktvā dehaṃ nijaṃ kila yogavid viśati viśadaṃ jñānālokāt parasya kalevaram / nayanavivaraiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sākṣādaho tava naipuṇaṃ viśasi hṛdayaṃ draṣṭuṃ spaṣṭaṃ bahiśca viceṣṭase // 3775	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
asubhṛtāṃ vadhamācarati kṣamād vadati vākyamasahyamasūnṛtam / parakalatradhanānyapi vāñchati na kurute kimu madyamadākulaḥ // 3776	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asuraracitaprayatnād vijñātā diviravañcanā yena / saṃrakṣitā matimatā ratnavatī vasumatī tena // 3777	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asurasamaradakṣairvajrasaṃdhṛṣṭacāpair anupamabalavīryaiḥ svaiḥ kulaistulyavīryaḥ / raghuriva sa narendro yajñaviśrāntakośo bhava jagati guṇānāṃ bhājanaṃ bhrājitānām // 3778	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
asurasuranareśāṃ yo na bhogeṣu tṛptaḥ kathamiha manujānāṃ tasya bhogeṣu tṛptiḥ / jalanidhijalapāne yo na jāto vitṛṣṇas tṛṇaśikharagatāmbhambhaḥpānataḥ kiṃ sa tṛpyet // 3779	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asurahitamapyādityotthaṃ vipattimupāgataṃ ditisutaguruḥ prāṇairyoktuṃ na kiṃ kacavat tamaḥ / paṭhati luṭhatīṃ kaṇṭhe vidyāmayaṃ mṛtajīvanīṃ yadi na vahate saṃdhyāmaunavratavyayabhīrutām // 3780	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
asuro hitamupadiṣṭaḥ prahlādo nāradena garbhasthaḥ / tattvaviduṣāṃ varo'bhūd- dhitopadeśaṃ sadā śṛṇuyāt // 3781	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asulabhā sakalendumukhī ca sā kimapi cedamanaṅgaviceṣṭitam / abhimukhīṣviva vāñchitasiddhiṣu vrajati nirvṛtimekapade manaḥ // 3782	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
asuhṛtsasuhṛccāpi saśatrur mitravānapi / saprajñaḥ prajñayā hīno daivena labhate sukham // 3783	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asūcibhedyāmāsādya bālāṃ prauḍhābhilāpiṇīm / hā kaṣṭaṃ muṣito'smīti prabhāte vakti kāmukaḥ // 3784	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asūcīsaṃcāre tamasi nabhasi prauḍhajalada- dhvaniprājñaṃmanye patati pṛṣatānāṃ nicaye / idaṃ saudāminyāḥ kanakakamanīyaṃ vilasitaṃ mudaṃ ca mlāniṃ ca prathayati pathi svairasudṛśām // 3785	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asūta sadyaḥ kusumānyaśokaḥ skandhāt prabhṛtyeva sapallavāni / pādena nāpaikṣata sundarīṇāṃ saṃparkamāśiñjitanūpureṇa // 3786	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asūta sā nāgavadhūpabhogyaṃ mainākamambhonidhibaddhasakhyam / kruddhe'pi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrāv avedanājñaṃ kuliśakṣatānām // 3787	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asūyako dandaśūko niṣṭhuro vairakṛnnaraḥ / sa kṛcchraṃ mahadāpnoti nacirāt pāpamācaran // 3788	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asūyayā hatenaiva pūrvopāyodyamairapi / kart ṇāṃ gṛhyate saṃpat suhṛdbhirmantribhistathā // 3789	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
asūyāviṣṭe manasi yadi saṃpat pravartate / tuṣāgniṃ vāyusamyogam iva jānīhi suvrata // 3790	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!), 3,4: pathyā)
asūyaikapadaṃ mṛtyur ativādaḥ śriyo vadhaḥ / aśuśrūṣā tvarā ślāghā vidyāyāḥ śatravastrayaḥ // 3791	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asekato'tyantaniṣekataśca śākhāviśoṣaṃ phalino nirūpya / saptāhamātraṃ śṛtameva sarpir viḍaṅgadugdhāmbu niṣecanīyam // 3792	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asevake cānuraktir dānaṃ sapriyabhāṣaṇam / anuraktasya cihnāni doṣe'pi guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // 3793	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aseviteśvaradvāram adṛṣṭavirahavyatham / anuktaklībavacanaṃ dhanyaṃ kasyāpi jīvitam // 3794	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asoḍhā tatkālollasadasahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānāṃ viśrambheṣvatha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ / pramodaṃ vo diśyāt kapaṭabaṭuveṣāpanayane tvarāśathilyābhyāṃ yugapadabhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ // 3795	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asau gataḥ saugata eva yasmāt kuryān nirālambanatāṃ mamaiva / sakhi priyaste kṣaṇikaḥ kimanyan nirātmakaḥ śūnyatamaḥ sa vandyaḥ // 3796	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau gireḥ śītalakandarasthaḥ pārāvato manmathacāṭudakṣaḥ / dharmālasāṅgīṃ madhurāṇi kūjan saṃvījate pakṣapuṭena kāntām // 3797	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asaujanyañcetobhavasamucitaṃ bhāvayati tad vṛthā saṃsāre'sminnahaha samayaṃ kiṃ gamayasi / cirād bhūyo bhūyaḥ kalayasi sakhedo bhavasukhaṃ tato manye tyāgāt prabhavati parā nirvṛtiriti // 3798	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asau nāstīvenduḥ kvacidapi raviḥ proṣita iva grahoḍūnāṃ cakraṃ nabhasi likhitaproñchitamiva / aharvā rātrirvā dvayamapi praluptapravicayaṃ ghanairbaddhavyūhaiḥ kimidamatighoraṃ vyavasitam // 3799	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asau bibhrattāmratviṣamudayaśailasya śirasi skhalan prāleyāṃśuryadi bhavati matto haladharaḥ / tadānīmetat tu pratinavatamāladyutiharaṃ tamo'pi vyālolaṃ vigalati tadīyaṃ nivasanam // 3800	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asaubhāgyaṃ dhatte paramasukhabhogāspadamayaṃ vicitraṃ tadgehaṃ bhavati pṛthukārtasvaramayam / niviṣṭaḥ palyaṅke kalayati sa kāntārataraṇaṃ prasādaṃ kopaṃ vā janani bhavatī yatra tanute // 3801	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asau maruccumbitacārukesaraḥ prasannatārādhipamaṇḍalāgraṇīḥ / viyuktarāmāturadṛṣṭivīkṣito vasantakālo hanumānivāgataḥ // 3802	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asau mahākālaniketanasya vasannadūre kila candramauleḥ / tamisrapakṣe'pi saha priyābhir jotsnāvato nirviśati pradoṣān // 3803	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau mahendradvipadānagandhis trimārgagāvīcivimardaśītaḥ / ākāśavāyurdinayauvanotthān ācāmati svedalavān mukhe te // 3804	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau mahendrādrisamānasāraḥ patirmahendrasya mahodadheśca / yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ // 3805	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau rasaucityaguṇojjvalo'pi gumpho na kāvyavyapadeśayogyaḥ / dhatte khalasyāpi na durviṣahya- dveṣagrahotsāraṇamantratāṃ yaḥ // 3806	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau vidyāśālī śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanād ihāyātaḥ saṃpratyavikalaśaraccandravadanaḥ / yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva // 3807	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
asau samarasāhasaṃ vitanute'grimaśreyase mukundamamumātmani sthirayituṃ na kiṃ vāñchati / ataḥ parataraṃ kutaḥ prataraṇāya vārāṃnidher nidānamiha saṃsṛteḥ sukhasṛteśca kiṃ kāraṇam // 3808	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
asau samālokitakānanāntare vikīrṇavispaṣṭamarīcikesaraḥ / vinirgataḥ siṃha ivodayācalād gṛhītaniṣpandamṛgo niśākaraḥ // 3809	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
asau hi dattvā timirāvakāśam astaṃ vrajatyunnatakoṭirinduḥ / jalāvagāḍhasya vanadvipasya tīkṣṇaṃ viṣāṇāgramivāvaśiṣṭam // 3810	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ rahogatam / ratena śatrau ramayet parena vā no cedudeṣyatyaruṇaḥ puro ripuḥ // 3811	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asau hi saṃketasamutsukābhir vilāsinībhirmadanāturābhiḥ / saroṣadṛṣṭaḥ sphuritādharābhir drutaṃ ravirbhīta ivāstameti // 3812	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
astaṃgatabhāraviravi kālavaśāt kālidāsavidhuvidhuram / nirvāṇabāṇadīpaṃ jagadidamadyoti ratnena // 3813	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
astaṃ gatavati savitari pāyasapiṇḍaṃ sudhākaraṃ prācī / vyaracayadambarakuśabhuvi carati kalaṅkastadantare kākaḥ // 3814	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
astaṃ gatavati savitari bhartari madhupaṃ niveśya kośānte / kamalinyo'pi ramante kimatra citraṃ mṛgākṣīṇām // 3815	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
astaṃgate divānāthe nalinī madhupacchalāt / gilanti svavināśāya guṭikāṃ kālakūṭajām // 3816	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astaṃgate nijaripāvapi kumbhayonau saṃkocamāpa jaladhirna tu mādyati sma / gambhīratāguṇacamatkṛtaviṣṭapānāṃ śatrukṣaye'pi mahatāmucitaṃ hyadaḥ syāt // 3817	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astaṃgate bhāsvati nāndhakārān śanaiścaro hanti vidhau budhaśca / piturguṇairna pratibhāti putro guṇānvito yaḥ sa guṇena bhāti // 3818	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
astaṃgato'yamaravindavanaikabandhur bhāsvānna laṅghayati ko'pi vidhipraṇītam / he cakra dhairyamavalambya vimuñca śokaṃ dhīrāstaranti vipadaṃ na tu dīnacittāḥ // 3819	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astaṃ bhāsvati lokalocanakalāloke gate bhartari strīlokocitamācaranti sukṛtaṃ vahnau vilīya tviṣaḥ / apyetāstu cikīrṣayeva tapasāṃ tārākṣamālā diśo manye khañjanakaṇṭhakomalatamaḥkṛṣṇājinaṃ bibhrati // 3820	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astaṃ muktirupaitu yatra na tanūsādhyā harerbhaktayas tannaḥ saṃsṛtiredhatāṃ niravadhiryasyāḥ prasādodayāt / mūrdhni śrīpuruṣottamapraṇatayaḥ śrīrāmanāmānane hṛddeśe yadunandanasya jaladaśyāmābhirāmākṛtiḥ // 3821	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astaṃ yatāpi kila mastakavartināsāv astācalo'himarucā rucimapyalambhi / prāyaḥ paropakṛtaye kṛtino'nepekṣya svārthaṃ vipatkavalitā api bhāvayanti // 3822	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
astaṃ yātastimirapaṭalīdattabhaṅgaḥ pataṃgaḥ prāpto naivodayagiriśiromūlameṇāvacūlaḥ / tatte kālaṃ katipalamayaṃ bhāti khadyotapota dyotaṃ dyotaṃ punarapi punardyotatāṃ ko vilambaḥ // 3823	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
astaṃ śaśī yāti śaśāṅkavadane mānaṃ vimuñcādhunā kiṃ mānena mudhā natabhru gaganād bhraśyantyamūstārakāḥ / itthaṃ tvāmanuśikṣayan kṣititalādunnamya pādaṃ śanaiḥ kṣīṇāṃ vīkṣya niśāṃ nisargasubhagaṃ gāyatyasau kukkuṭaḥ // 3824	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
astagrastagabhastimatkaratatinyaṅnītacañcūpuṭī pāṭīrādrimatho himācalamadhaḥ prakṣipya pakṣadvayam / paścādunnatapucchapuñjamudayatprācīprakāśacchalād aṇḍaṃ maṇḍalamaindavaṃ janayati vyaktaṃ bakoṭīviyat // 3825	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astapratyupakāragandhamakṛtasvaprārthanāpekṣama- pyambhobhirbhuvamārdrayanti jaladā jīvantyamī jantavaḥ / daivajñaḥ punarasti vṛṣṭiriti vāgekā mayokteti yad viśvaṃ krītamivādhigacchati tadevāghūrṇate marmaṇi // 3826	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astabdhaḥ pūjayen mānyān gurūn sevedamāyayā / arced devānnadambhena śriyamicchedakutsitām // 3827	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astabdhatāmacāpalyaṃ vairāṇāṃ cāpyakartṛtām / pratyakṣato vijānīyād bhadratāṃ kṣudratāmapi // 3828	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astabdhamaklībamadīrghasūtraṃ sānukrośaṃ ślakṣṇamahāryamanyaiḥ / arogajātīyamudāravākyaṃ dūtaṃ vadantyaṣṭaguṇopapannam // 3829	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
astamastakaparyastasamastārkāṃśusaṃstarā / pīnastanasthitātāmrakamravastreva vāruṇī // 3830	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astamitaviṣayasaṅgā mukulitanayanotpalā mṛduśvasitā / dhyāyati kimapyalakṣyaṃ nityaṃ yogābhiyukteva // 3831	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
astamīyuṣi niśākare satī rāgato'tividhurā kumudvatī / ṣaṭpadaṃ garalamagrahīn mukhe saṃmukhe'pi khagaśabdavāritā // 3832	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
astavyastamitastataḥ pathi patan madyaṃ mahādudvaman hastābhyāṃ mukhamakṣikāḥ pariṇudan gālīrgadan gadgadan / uttālaiḥ śiśubhirbhṛśaṃ valayito bībhatsamūrtirmahān matto dakṣiṇataḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣipa dṛśaṃ matto'yamāgacchati // 3833	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astavyastasamīrakampitatayā dṛṣṭestiraskāriṇīṃ hastenālakavallarīmakuṭilāmānīya karṇāntikam / udvīkṣya priyamārgamadhvagavadhūrastaṃ gate bhāsvati chinnāśā svaniveśameti śanakaiḥ svapnekṣaṇāśaṃsinī // 3834	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astavyastān kramatatagatīn patrimālātaraṅgān veṇīdaṇḍāniva dhṛtavatī muktasaṃdhyāṅgarāgā / dhvāntamlānāṃśukaparicayacchannalāvaṇyaśocyā dyauḥ pratyagradyumaṇivirahādvāntamakṣṇorna yāti // 3835	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
astādripārśvamupajagmuṣi tigmabhāsi jānīta śītakiraṇo'bhyudito na veti / cārā ivātha rajanītimiraprayuktāś ceruściraṃ caraṇabhūmiṣu cañcarīkāḥ // 3836	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astādriśirovinihita- ravimaṇḍalasarasayāvaghaṭṭāṅkam / nayatīva kālakaulaḥ kvāpi nabhaḥsairibhaṃ siddhyai // 3837	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
astābhimukhe sūrye udite saṃpūrṇamaṇḍale candre / gamanaṃ budhasya lagne uditāstamite ca ketau // 3838	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astāvalambiravibimbatayodayādri- cūḍonmiṣatsakalacandratayā ca sāyam / saṃdhyāpranṛttaharahastagṛhītakāṃsya- tāladvayeva samalakṣyata nākalakṣmīḥ // 3839	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astāvilarūkṣākṣyo mūṣakanayanāśca na śubhadā gāvaḥ / pracalaccipiṭaviṣāṇā karaṭāḥ kharasadṛśavarṇāśca // 3840	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asti kāraṇamavyaktaṃ sarvavyāpi parāparam / sāṃnidhyādapi durgrāhyaṃ viśvamūrtyopalakṣitam // 3841	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti ko'pi timirastanaṃdhayaḥ kiṃcidañcitapadaṃ sa gāyati / yanmanāgapi niśamya kā vadhūr nāvadhūtahṛdayopajāyate // 3842	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
asti grīvā śiro nāsti dvau bhujau karavarjitau / sītāharaṇasāmarthyo na rāmo na ca rāvaṇaḥ // 3843	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti jalaṃ jalarāśau kṣāraṃ tat kiṃ vidhīyate tena / laghurapi varaṃ sa kūpo yatrākaṇṭhaṃ janaḥ pibati // 3844	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asti putro vaśe yasya bhṛtyo bhāryā tathaiva ca / abhāve sati saṃtoṣaḥ svargastho'sau mahītale // 3845	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti bhayamasti kautukam asti ca mandākṣamasti cotkaṇṭhā / bālānāṃ praṇayijane bhāvaḥ ko'pyeṣa naikarasaḥ // 3846	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asti yadyapi sarvatra nīraṃ nīrajarājitam / modate na tu haṃsasya mānasaṃ mānasaṃ vinā // 3847	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti śrīstanapatrabhaṅgamakarīmudrāṅkitoraḥsthalo devaḥ sarvajagatpatirmadhuvadhūvaktrābjacandrodayaḥ / krīḍākroḍatanornavenduviśade daṃṣṭrāṅkure yasya bhūr bhāti sma pralayābdhipalvalatalotkhātaikamustākṛtiḥ // 3848	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asti svarṇamayo'drirasti viṣayaḥ kṣuttṛḍbharāvarjitaḥ santi kṣīraghṛtākarā jaladhayaḥ santi drumāḥ kāmadāḥ / kiṃ nastaccaritādbhutaśravaṇataḥ sādhyaṃ kṣudhā tāmyatāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yatsavidhe vidhehi sumate tatraiva sarvaṃ śramam // 3849	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asti svāduphalaṃ kimasti kimathāghrātuṃ kṣamaḥ korakas tadviśrāmyatu nāma bhoktumucitaṃ patraṃ kimastyantataḥ / sevyo hanta yadīdṛśo'pi manujairvṛkṣādhamaḥ pippalo duḥsvātantryamidaṃ vidheḥ kathaya tat kasyāgrato rudyatām // 3850	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astītyeva kṛṣiṃ kuryāt asti nāstīti vāṇijam / nāstītyeva ṛṇaṃ dadyāt nāhamasmīti sāhasam // 3851	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astu tāvadagastyena jahnormahimanihnavaḥ / kā kathā tasya bālasya viśvagrāse'pyatṛpyataḥ // 3852	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astu svastyayanāya digdhanapate kailāsaśailāśraya- śrīkaṇṭhābharaṇenduvibhramadivānaktaṃbhramatkaumudī / yatrālaṃ nalakūbarābhisaraṇārambhāya rambhāsphurat pāṇḍimnaiva tanostanoti virahavyagrāpi veśagraham // 3853	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aste śivā paścimāyāṃ paracakrabhayāya sā / śubhā kuberadiśyaste grāmāntaḥ śūnyakāriṇī // 3854	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
astokavismayamapasmṛtapūrvavṛttam udbhūtanūtanabhayajvarajarjaraṃ naḥ / ekakṣaṇatruṭitasaṃghaṭitapramoham ānandaśokaśabalatvamupaiti cetaḥ // 3855	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astodayācalavilambiravīndubimba- vyājāt kṣaṇaṃ śravaṇayornihitāravindā / tārācchalena kusumāni samutkṣipantī saṃdhyeyamāgatavatī pramadeva kācit // 3856	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astodayādrigatamarkaśaśāṅkabimbam ahno'tivārdhakadaśāmavalambitasya / tārākṣarāṇi paṭhituṃ tapanīyaśaila- nāsāvasaktamupanetramivābabhāse // 3857	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astopadhānavinihita- ravibimbaśironikuñcitadigaṅgaḥ / vaste'ndhakārakambalam ambaraśayane dinādhvanyaḥ // 3858	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
astyatraiva kilārṇave tadamṛtaṃ tatraiva hālāhalaḥ santyasmin malaye paṭīrataravastatraiva vātāśanāḥ / yadyadvastvabhijātamasti savidhe tattad durāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ prāptavyaṃ rasanāñcale karatale bhāle ca vedhā nyadhāt // 3859	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astyadyāpi catuḥsamudraparikhāparyantamurvītalaṃ vartante'pi ca tatra tatra rasikā goṣṭhīṣu saktā nṛpāḥ / ekastatra nirādaro bhavati cedanyo bhavet sādaro vāgdevī vadanāmbuje vasati cet ko nāma dīno janaḥ // 3860	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astyapratisamādheyaṃ stanadvandvasya dūṣaṇam / sphuṭatāṃ kañcukānāṃ yan nāyātyāvaraṇīyatām // 3861	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyuttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā himālayo nāma nagādhirājaḥ / pūrvāparau toyanidhī vagāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyā iva mānadaṇḍaḥ // 3862	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
astyekaṃ bhuvanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ kṣamadhve yatra vīkṣitum / viṣayāṃścitravidyāyāś citrāṇāṃ calatāṃ tathā // 3863	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāṭakākhyāyikānāṃ ca śakyān sarvavidhānapi / sphuraṇā jāyate prāyas tata eva kalākṛtām // 3864	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyeva bhūbhṛtāṃ mūrdhni divi vā dyotate'mbudaḥ / marudbhirbhajyamāno'pi sa kimeti rasātalam // 3865	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyevoddāmadāvānalavikalataraṃ kānanaṃ yatra tatra prauḍhottāpābhibhūtaṃ jagadapi sakalaṃ nirjalā eva nadyaḥ / kiṃ re nirlajja garjaṃ kalayasi bahuśastarjayan pānthabālāḥ parjanya tvāmamī kiṃ kvacidapi gaṇayantyambudatvena lokāḥ // 3866	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
astraṃ vimucya sakalaṃ prathamaprayoge bhūyo'pi hantumabalāṃ vihitodyamasya / puṣpāyudhasya vapureva tadīyamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ ca hanta śaradhiśca tadā babhūva // 3867	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astraṃ strī vāmano martyaḥ paśurebhyo'thavetaraḥ / vidhiyogād bhavet kāmaṃ pauruṣaṃ na parityajet // 3868	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astrajvālāvalīḍhapratibalajaladherantaraurvāyamāṇe senānāthe sthite'smin mama pitari gurau sarvadhanvīśvarāṇām / karṇālaṃ saṃbhrameṇa vraja kṛpa samaraṃ muñca hārdikyaśaṅkāṃ tāte cāpadvitīye vahati raṇadhuraṃ ko bhayasyāvakāśaḥ // 3869	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
astraprayogakhuralīkalahe gaṇānāṃ sainyairvṛto'pi jita eva mayā kumāraḥ / etāvatāpi parirabhya kṛtaprasādaḥ prādādimaṃ priyaguṇo bhagavān gururme // 3870	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
astravyastaśirastraśastrakaṣaṇaiḥ kṛttottamāṅge kṣaṇaṃ vyūḍhāsṛksariti svanatpraharaṇe varmodvamadvāhnini / āhūyājimukhe sa kosalapatirbhagne pradhāne bale ekenaiva rumaṇvatā śaraśatairmattadvipastho hataḥ // 3871	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astrāṇi plavagādhipena vihitāḥ paulastyavakṣaḥsthalī- saṃghaṭṭānaladattadāvavipadaḥ sīdanti bhūmīruhāḥ / utpāṭya prahitaśca śailaśikharo laṅkendrahastāvalī- niṣpiṣṭo nijakuñjanirjharajalairjambālapiṇḍāyate // 3872	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astrāmāsa tṛṇaṃ priyādruhi tṛṇāmāsa smarārerdhanur dārāmāsa muneḥ śilāpi nṛvarāmāsa svayaṃ pādukā / kulyāmāsa mahārṇavo'pi kapayo yodhāṃbabhūvustadā paulastyo maśakībabhūva bhagavaṃstvaṃ mānuṣāmāsithāḥ // 3873	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astraughaprasareṇa rāvaṇirasau yaṃ duryaśobhāginaṃ cakre gautamaśāpayantritabhujasthemānamākhaṇḍalam / kacchāvartakulīratāṃ gamayatā vīra tvayā rāvaṇaṃ tatsaṃmṛṣṭamaho viśalyakaraṇī jāgarti satputratā // 3874	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
astvakṣaragrahavidhirjanuṣāṃ sahasrair āpātato bhavatu vāpi tato'rthabodhaḥ / durvādikalpitavikalpataraṅgasāndrān duṣpūrvapakṣajaladhīn kathamuttareyuḥ // 3875	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asthānagāmibhiralaṃkaraṇairupetā bhūyaḥ padaskhalananihnutiraprasannā / vāṇīva kāpi kukaverjanahasyamānā drāṅnirgatā nijagṛhād vanitā madāndhā // 3876	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asthānābhiniveśitā ratipateraucityabhaṅgo rater vaiyarthyaṃ navayauvanasya kimapi premṇaḥ kalaṅkāṅkuraḥ / saubhāgyasya vimānanā viguṇatā saundaryasāraśriyaḥ śṛṅgārasya viḍambanā kimaparaṃ veśyāratāḍambaraḥ // 3877	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asthānābhiniveśī prāyo jaḍa eva bhavati no vidvān / bālādanyaḥ ko'mbhasi jighṛkṣatīndoḥ sphuradbimbam // 3878	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asthāne gamitā layaṃ hatadhiyāṃ vāgdevatā kalpate dhikkārāya parābhavāya mahate tāpāya pāpāya vā / sthāne tu vyayitā satāṃ prabhavati prakhyātaye bhūtaye cetonirvṛtaye paropakṛtaye prānte śivāvāptaye // 3879	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asthāne janasaṃkaṭe mayi manāk kāñcīṃ samāskandati vyālole raśanāṃśuke vigalite nīte ca nābheradhaḥ / dhanyo'yaṃ sa karaḥ kuraṅgakadṛśā tasminnavasthāntare kampātaṅkakaraṃbitāṅgalatayā yasyāvakāśaḥ kṛtaḥ // 3880	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asthāne tāḍito vājī bahūn doṣānavāpnuyāt / tāvadbhavanti te doṣā yāvajjīvatyasau hayaḥ // 3881	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthāne'bhiniviṣṭān mūrkhānasthāna eva saṃtuṣṭān / anuvartante dhīrāḥ pitara iva krīḍato bālān // 3882	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asthāne hyapi ca sthāne satataṃ cānugāmini / kruddho daṇḍān praṇayati vividhāṃstejasā vṛtaḥ // 3883	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asthikṣodavatīva kundamukulaiḥ phullaiḥ palāśadrumaiḥ sāṅgāraprakareva dhūmakaluṣevotpātibhiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ / raktākṣadyutibhiḥ saśeṣadahanālāteva puṃskokilair dṛṣṭā prāṇasamāciteva pathikairārād vanāntasthalī // 3884	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asthi nāsti śiro nāsti bāhurasti niraṅguliḥ / nāsti pādadvayaṃ gāḍham aṅgamāliṅgati svayam // 3885	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthiraṃ jīvitaṃ loke yauvanaṃ dhanamasthiram / asthiraṃ putradārādi dharmaḥ kīrtirdvayaṃ sthiram // 3886	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthiraḥ kulasaṃbandhaḥ sadā vidyā vivādinī / mado mohāya mithyaiva muhūrtanidhanaṃ dhanam // 3887	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthiramanekarāgaṃ guṇarahitaṃ nityavakraduṣprāpam / prāvṛṣi surendracāpaṃ vibhāvyate yuvaticittamiva // 3888	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret / avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghūrṇakā iva // 3889	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthivad dadhivaccaiva śaṅkhavad bakavat tathā / rājaṃstava yaśo bhāti punaḥ saṃnyāsidantavat // 3890	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthiṣvarthāḥ sukhaṃ māṃse tvaci bhogāḥ striyo'kṣiṣu / gatau yānaṃ svare cājñā sarvaṃ sattve pratiṣṭhitam // 3891	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanam / carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ // 3892	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!), 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanamāturam / rajasvalamanityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsamimaṃ tyajet // 3893	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vā śakuniryathā / tathā tyajannimaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate // 3894	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asthīni majjā śuklaṃ ca pituraṃśāstrayo matāḥ / raktaṃ romāṇi palalam aṃśā māturamī matā // 3895	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asthīnyasthīnyajinamajinaṃ bhasma bhasmendurindur gaṅgā gaṅgoraga uraga ityākulāḥ saṃbhrameṇa / bhūṣāveṣopakaraṇagaṇaprāpaṇavyāpṛtānāṃ nṛttārambhapraṇayini śive pāntu vāco gaṇānām // 3896	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
asnātāśī malaṃ bhuṅkte ajapī pūyabhakṣaṇam / ahutāśī viṣaṃ bhuṅkte adātā viṣamaśnute // 3897	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aspṛśyasaṃgatimiha pravidhāya soḍhā daṇḍāhatīḥ paṭaha bandhamapi prapadya / doṣaṃ prakāśayasi yatpratirathyameva lokasya tadvimukhatāṃ prakaṭīkaroṣi // 3898	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
aspṛśyo'stu malīmaso'stvaniyatāhāro'stvato'pyudbhaṭair doṣairastu paraḥśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ kākastataḥ kā kṣatiḥ / bhuṅkte bhojyamupasthitaṃ samupahūyaiva svayaṃ bāndhavān yaḥ sīdan kṣudhayā vicintaya tato dhanyaśca puṇyaśca kaḥ // 3899	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
aspṛṣṭe rāhubhītyāhani niśi ca same kalmaṣacchāyayone hāsatrāsād vidūre samupacitavibhāvaibhave hṛdyagandhe / pāthodācchādahīne dharaṇitalagatādurlabhe sarvalokā- hlādaṃ cāpyādadhāne sumukhi tava mukhaupamyaleśaḥ sudhāṃśau // 3900	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
asmatpūrvaiḥ surapatihṛtaṃ draṣṭukāmaisturaṅgaṃ bhittvā kṣoṇīmagaṇitabalaiḥ sāgaro vardhitātmā / satkārārthaṃ tava yadi girīnādiśed guptapakṣā na śrānto'pi praṇayamucitaṃ naiva bandhorvihanyāḥ // 3901	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
asmatprayāṇasamaye kuru maṅgalāni kiṃ rodiṣi priyatame vada kāraṇaṃ me / bhoḥ prāṇanātha virahānalatīvratāpa- dhūmena vāri galitaṃ mama locanānām // 3902	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmadīśvaraviśvāsapramāṇena prabhoḥ kṛpā / vidhātuṃ prabhavet kāryaṃ sāhāyyaṃ ca tathaiva naḥ // 3903	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmadripūṇāmanilāśanānāṃ datto nivāsaḥ khalu candanena / itīva roṣād vyajanasya vāyur vyaśoṣayaccandanamaṅgasaṃstham // 3904	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmadvairī śaśabhṛdamunā jīyate hyandhakāraḥ sāraṅgākṣyā mukhamanugataḥ keśapāśacchalena / taṃ saṃśrutya pragalitamahāḥ śītaraśmistadaiva prāptaḥ sevāghaṭanavidhaye mālatīdāmabhaṅgyā // 3905	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
asmākaṃ jalajīvināṃ jalamidaṃ sadvājirājivrajaiḥ pātavyaṃ pararaktaraktamanasāṃ tṛptiḥ patīnāṃ kṣayaḥ / matvaivaṃ kila rājarāja nṛpate tvajjaitrayātrotsave matsī roditi makṣikā ca hasati dhyāyanti vairistriyaḥ // 3906	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmākaṃ paramandirasya caritaṃ yadyapyavācyaṃ bhavet svāmī tvaṃ kathayāmi tena bhavataḥ kiṃcit priyādūṣaṇam / śrīmad rāma nṛpa tvayā raṇamukhe pāṇigrahaḥ sādaraṃ yasyāḥ sāsilatā parasya hṛdaye dṛṣṭā luṭhantī mayā // 3907	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmākaṃ bata maṇḍale prathamataḥ patyā karaḥ pātyate kāñcīkuntalamadhyadeśaviṣayān saṃtyajya bhūriśriyaḥ / ityālokya kucau payoruhadṛśāṃ jātau sunīlānanau no nīco'pi parābhavaṃ viṣahate kiṃ tādṛśāvunnatau // 3908	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmākaṃ vadarīcakraṃ badarī ca tavāṅgaṇe / vādarāyaṇasambandhād yūyaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ vayam // 3909	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmākaṃ vratametadeva yadayaṃ kuñjodare jāgaraḥ śuśrūṣā madanasya vaktramadhubhiḥ saṃtarpaṇīyo'tithiḥ / nistriṃśāḥ śataśaḥ patantu śirasaśchedo'thavā jāyatām ātmīyaṃ kulavartma putri na manāgullaṅghanīyaṃ tvayā // 3910	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmākaṃ sakhi vāsasī na rucire graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ no vakrā gatiruddhataṃ na hasitaṃ naivāsti kaścinmadaḥ / kintvanye'pi janā vadanti subhago'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭiṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam // 3911	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmākamaṅgamaṅgaṃ paṇyopanataṃ mahādhananidhānam / dāsīsutāḥ kimete svādanti viṭāḥ prasaṅgena // 3912	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asmākamadhyāsitametadantas tāvadbhavatyā hṛdayaṃ cirāya / bahistvayālaṃkriyātamidānī- muro muraṃ vidviṣataḥ śriyeva // 3913	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jtBgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmākamātmabhūrbhūtvā hantāsmāneva haṃsi yat / re re kandarpa tannityam anaṅgatvaṃ sadāstu te // 3914	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmākamekapada eva marudvikīrṇa- jīmūtajālarasitānukṛtirninādaḥ / gambhīramaṅgalamṛdaṅgasahasrajanmā śabdāntaragrahaṇaśaktimapākaroti // 3915	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmāt paraṃ bata yathāśruti saṃbhṛtāni ko naḥ kule nivapanāni niyacchatīti / nūnaṃ prasūtivikalena mayā prasiktaṃ dhautāśruśeṣamudakaṃ pitaraḥ pibanti // 3916	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmādṛśāṃ nūnamapuṇyabhājāṃ na svopayogī na paropayogī / sannapyasadrūpatayaiva vedyo dāridryamudro guṇaratnakoṣaḥ // 3917	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmānavehi kalamānalamāhatānāṃ yeṣāṃ pracaṇḍamusalairavadātataiva / snehaṃ vimucya sahasā khalatāṃ prayānti ye svalpapīḍanavaśānna vayaṃ tilāste // 3918	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmān mā bhaja kālakūṭabhagini svapne'pi padmālaye vyādhībhūya kadarthayanti bahuśo mātarvikārā ime / yaccakṣurna nirīkṣatecchaviṣayaṃ naivaṃ śṛṇoti śrutiḥ prāṇā eva varaṃ prayānti na punarniryānti vāco bahiḥ // 3919	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmān vicitravapuṣaścirapṛṣṭhalagnān ko vā vimuñcati sakhe yadi vā vimuñca / hā hanta kekivara hāniriyaṃ tavaiva bhūpālamūrdhani punarbhavitā sthitirnaḥ // 3920	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmān sādhu vicintya saṃyamadhanānuccaiḥ kulaṃ cātmanas tvayyasyāḥ kathamapyabāndhavakṛtāṃ snehapravṛttiṃ ca tām / sāmānyapratipattipūrvakamiyaṃ dāreṣu dṛśyā tvayā bhāgyāyattamataḥparaṃ na khalu tadvācyaṃ vadhūbandhubhiḥ // 3921	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmābhiḥ kalitaṃ purā na bhavatī bhuktā nṛbhiḥ kairapi prauḍhā mānavaśālinīti calitaṃ cetaḥ sakāmaṃ tvayi / dhik tvāṃ saṃprati sadbhujaṅgajanatāsaṃśleṣamātanvatī gamyā sarvajanasya vāravanitevotkṣepaṇīyāsi naḥ // 3922	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmābhiḥ smayalolamauliphalakairmuktāvisārādhipaṃ vedoddhāraparaḥ karastava paraṃ dānāmbupūtaḥ stutaḥ / kintu kṣmātilaka kṣamasva kavibhiḥ kiṃ nāma nālokyate dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭataraṃ tavāpi nibhṛtaḥ pāṇau sa vaisāriṇaḥ // 3923	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmābhiścaturamburāśiraśanāvacchedinīṃ medinīṃ bhrāmyadbhirna sa ko'pi nistuṣaguṇo dṛṣṭo viśiṣṭo janaḥ / yasyāgre cirasaṃcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā saṃjalpya kṣaṇamekamardhamathavā niḥśvasya viśrāmyate // 3924	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmāllokādūrdhvamamuṣya cādho mahattamastiṣṭhati hyandhakāram / tadvai mahāmohanamindriyāṇāṃ budhyasva mā tvāṃ pralabheta rājan // 3925	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmiṃścandramasi prasannamahasi vyākoṣakundatviṣi prācīnaṃ khamupeyuṣi tvayi manāgdūraṃ gate preyasi / śvāsaḥ kairavakorakīyati mukhaṃ tasyāḥ sarojīyati kṣīrodīyati manmatho dṛgapi ca drāk candrakāntīyati // 3926	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmiṃste śirasi tadā kānte vaidūryasphaṭikasuvarṇāḍhye / śobhāṃ svāṃ na vahati tāṃ baddhā suśliṣṭā kuvalayamāleyam // 3927	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: mnyg]
asmiñ jagati mahatyapi kimapi na tadvastu vedhasā vihitam / animittavatsalāyā bhavati yato māturupakāraḥ // 3928	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asmiñ jaḍe jagati ko nu bṛhatpramāṇa- karṇaḥ karī nanu bhaved duritasya pātram / ityāgataṃ tamapi yo'linamunmamātha mātaṅga eva kimataḥparamucyate'sau // 3929	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmiñ jarāmaraṇamṛtyumahātaraṅga- miśrodadhau mahati saṃparivartamānaḥ / puṇyaplavena sukṛtena narāstarantaḥ saṃprāpya tīramabhayaṃ sukhamāpnuvanti // 3930	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin kaḥ prabhavedyogo hyasaṃdhārye'mitātmani / laṅghane kaḥ samarthaḥ syād ṛte devaṃ maheśvaram // 3931	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin karīndrakaranirgalitāravinda- kandānukāriṇi ciraṃ rucicakravāle / kasmai phalāya kulaṭākulakoṭihomaṃ haṃho mṛgāṅka kuruṣe karuṇāmapāsya // 3932	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin kāle tu yadyuktaṃ tadidānīṃ vidhīyatām / gataṃ tu nānuśocanti gataṃ tu gatameva hi // 3933	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin kuñje vināpi pracalati pavanaṃ vartate ko'pi nūnaṃ paśyāmaḥ kiṃ na gatvetyanusarati gaṇe bhītabhīte'rbhakāṇām / tasmin rādhāsakho vaḥ sukhayatu vilasan krīḍayā kaiṭabhārir vyātanvāno mṛgāriprabalavuraghurārāvaraudroccanādān // 3934	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
asmin kuṭilakalloladolāvikṣobhite'mbhasi / hāsyahetuḥ kathaṃ setuḥ sikatāmuṣṭibhirbhavet // 3935	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin kelivane sugandhapavane krīḍatpuraṃdhrījane guñjadbhṛṅgakule viśālabakule kūjatpikīsaṃkule / unmīlannavapāṭalāparimale mallīprasūnākule yadyekāpi na mālatī vikasitā tatkiṃ na ramyo madhuḥ // 3936	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmin digvijayodyate patirayaṃ me stāditi dhyāyati kampaṃ sāttvikabhāvañcati ripukṣoṇīndradārā dharā / asyaivābhimukhaṃ nipatya samare yāsyadbhirūrdhvaṃ nijaḥ panthā bhāsvati dṛśyate bilamayaḥ pratyarthibhiḥ pārthivaiḥ // 3937	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asmin naktamaharvivekavikale kālādhame nīradaiḥ saṃnaddhairabhito niruddhagaganābhogāsu digbhittiṣu / bhānorna prasarantu nāma kiraṇāḥ kiṃ tvasya tejasvinaḥ sattāmātraparigraheṇa vikasantyadyāpi padmākarāḥ // 3938	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīlam ābaddhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ / vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣadhirīśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ // 3939	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asminnabhyudite jagattrayadiśāmullāsahetau diśām āsyamlānihare sudhārasanidhau deve niśāsvāmini / vaktraṃ mudritamambujanma bhavatā cet kiṃ tataḥ śāśvataṃ naitasyeśvaramaulimaṇḍanamaṇergāyanti viśve yaśaḥ // 3940	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmin na nirguṇaṃ gotre apatyamupajāyate / ākare padmarāgāṇāṃ janma kācamaṇeḥ kutaḥ // 3941	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asminnambhodavṛndadhvanijanitaruṣi prekṣamāṇe'ntarikṣaṃ mā kāka vyākulo bhūstaruśirasi śavakravyaleśānaśāna / dhatte mattebhakumbhavyatikarakarajagrāmavajrāgrajāgrad grāsavyāsaktamuktādhavalitakavalo na spṛhāmatra siṃhaḥ // 3942	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
asminnīṣadvalitavitatastokavicchinnabhugnaḥ kiṃcillīlopacitavibhavaḥ puñjitaścotthitaśca / dhūmodgārastaruṇamahiṣaskandhanīlo davāgneḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān // 3943	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
asmin parasparadveṣaparuṣe puruṣāyuṣe / kevalaṃ madhurā vāṇī dadātyānīya sauhṛdam // 3944	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin prakīrṇapaṭavāsakṛtāndhakāre dṛṣṭo manāṅmaṇivibhūṣaṇaraśmijālaiḥ / pātālamudyataphaṇākṛtiśṛṅgako'yaṃ māmadya saṃsmarayatīva bhujaṅgalokaḥ // 3945	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin prakṛtimanojñe lagnā prāyeṇa mānmathī dṛṣṭiḥ / sundari yato bhavatyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyate madhyaḥ // 3946	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asmin bhūvalaye janasya mahimā bhāgyena saṃjāyate no tatrāsti hi kāraṇaṃ prayatatā naivātha kaścid guṇaḥ / kākāyāśucibhojine hi vitaratyuccaistu loko baliṃ muktāhāraparāyaṇāya śucaye no hanta haṃsāya yat // 3947	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmin marau kimaparaṃ vacasāmavācyaṃ mā muñca pāntha muhurāśritavatsalo bhūḥ / etat tvayā jalalavāmiṣalālasena dṛṣṭaṃ jvalatparikaraṃ sikatāvitānam // 3948	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin mahatyanavadhau kila kālacakre dhanyāstu ye katipaye śukayogimukhyāḥ / līnāstvadaṅghriyugale pariśuddhasattvās tānātmanastava nakhānavadhārayāmaḥ // 3949	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin mahāmohamaye kaṭāhe sūryāgninā rātridinendhanena / māsartudarvīparighaṭṭanena bhūtāni kālaḥ pacatīti vārtā // 3950	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yatkāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri nirannayā tadadhunā kiṃcin mukhe dīyatām / ityukte jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśca dhārāśrubhiḥ // 3951	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asmin vasante na narāḥ sahante vadhūviyogaṃ ca balāsarogam / kuraṅganābhidravalepabhābhir bhajantu dṛptāḥ pramadāḥ praliptāḥ // 3952	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmin sakhe nanu maṇitvamahāsubhikṣe cintāmaṇe tvamupalo bhava mā maṇirbhūḥ / adyedṛśā hi maṇayaḥ prabhavanti loke yeṣāṃ tṛṇagrahaṇakauśalameva bhūṣā // 3953	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asmin sthite vipadabhūd iti saṃcintya varjyate / mūḍhaiḥ parivṛḍhairāpatsevako maṅgalecchubhiḥ // 3954	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmi vīrajananīti jananyām asmi vīraramaṇīti ramaṇyām / saṃmadaṃ vyadadhadutsukacetās tāratūryataralaścalito'nyaḥ // 3955	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
asmi vīratanayā varavīra- preyasī ca kuru vīrasavitrīm / adya hṛdyasamarairiti mātā kācidāha tilakākṣatapūrvam // 3956	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
asmai karaṃ pravitarantu nṛpā na kasmād asyaiva tatra yadabhūt pratibhūḥ kṛpāṇaḥ / daivād yadā pravitaranti na te tadaiva nedaṃkṛpā nijakṛpāṇakaragrahāya // 3957	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asya kṣoṇipateḥ parārdhaparayā lakṣīkṛtāḥ saṃkhyayā prajñācakṣuravekṣyamāṇatimiraprakhyāḥ kilākīrttayaḥ / gīyante svaramaṣṭamaṃ kalayatā jātena vandhyodarān mūkānāṃ prakareṇa kūrmaramaṇīdugdhodadheḥ rodhasi // 3958	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyatyuccaiḥ śakalitavapuścandano nātmagandhaṃ nekṣuryantrairapi madhuratāṃ pīḍyamāno jahāti / yadvat svarṇaṃ na calati hitaṃ chinnaghṛṣṭopataptaṃ tadvat sādhuḥ kujananihato'pyanyathātvaṃ na yāti // 3959	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
asya dagdhodarasyārthe kiṃ na kurvanti paṇḍitāḥ / vānarīmiva vāgdevīṃ nartayanti gṛhe gṛhe // 3960	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asya pracaṇḍabhujadaṇḍabhavaḥ kṛśānuś caṇḍāṃśucaṇḍakarajit sumahāpratāpaḥ / pratyarthibhūpatipalāśavanaṃ vidahya prauḍhāsu dikṣu bahudāhamurīkaroti // 3961	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asya prayāṇeṣu samagraśakter agresarairvājibhirutthitāni / kurvanti sāmantaśikhāmaṇīnāṃ prabhāprarohāstamayaṃ rajāṃsi // 3962	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asya śrībhojarājasya dvayameva sudurlabham / śatrūṇāṃ śṛṅkhalairlohaṃ tāmraṃ śāsanapatrakaiḥ // 3963	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asya snigdhasya varṇasya vipattirdāruṇā katham / idaṃ ca mukhamādhuryaṃ kathaṃ dūṣitamagninā // 3964	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāṃ netrapathaṃ manye gatāyāṃ lolacakṣuṣi / bhavanti pañcabāṇasya svabāṇā eva vairiṇaḥ // 3965	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāṃ prāvṛṣi cātakairjalakaṇā labdhā na cet kiṃ tato bhāviprāvṛṣi dāsyate dviguṇamityabhra tvayā gamyate / ete'dyaiva layaṃ vrajanti pṛthukairetat kulīno na ced ekaḥ prāṇiti tāvataiva kṛtamastyatraiva naḥ saṃśayaḥ // 3966	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāṃ munīnāmapi mohamūhe bhṛgurmahān yatkucaśailaśīlī / nānāradāhlādi mukhaṃ śritorur vyāso mahābhāratasargayogyaḥ // 3967	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāṃ vapurvyūhavidhānavidyāṃ kiṃ dyotayāmāsa navāṃ sa kāmaḥ / pratyaṅgasaṅgasphuṭalabdhabhūmā lāvaṇyasīmā yadimāmupāste // 3968	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāṃ sakhe badhiralokanivāsabhūmau kiṃ kūjitena khalu kokila komalena / ete hi daivahatakāstadabhinnavarṇaṃ tvāṃ kākameva kalayanti kalānabhijñāḥ // 3969	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyāḥ kacānāṃ śikhinaśca kiṃnu vidhiṃ kalāpau vimateragātām / tenāyamebhiḥ kimapūji puṣpair abhartsi dattvā sa kimardhacandram // 3970	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ kararuhakhaṇḍita- kāṇḍapaṭaprakaṭanirgatā dṛṣṭiḥ / paṭavigalitaniṣkaluṣā svadate pīyūṣadhāreva // 3971	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asyāḥ karaspardhanagardhanarddhir bālatvamāpat khalu pallavo yaḥ / bhūyo'pi nāmādharasāmyagarvaṃ kurvan kathaṃ vāstu na sa pravālaḥ // 3972	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ karṇāvataṃsena jitaṃ sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam / tathaiva śobhate'tyartham asyāḥ śravaṇakuṇḍalam // 3973	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāḥ kāntasya rūpasya savaupamyātiśāyinaḥ / ekaiva gacchet sādṛśyaṃ svacchāyā darpaṇāśritā // 3974	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asyāḥ kāmanivāsaramyabhavanaṃ vaktraṃ vilokyādarān niścityeva sudhākaraṃ priyatamaṃ bhūmīgataṃ śobhanam / nāsāmauktikakaitavena rucirā tārāpi sā rohiṇī manye tadvirahāsahiṣṇuhṛdayā tatsaṃnidhiṃ sevate // 3975	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāḥ kuśeśayadṛśaḥ śaśiśubhraśubhraṃ nāsāgravarti navamauktikamācakāsti / kailāsamānasasarovararājahaṃsyā niḥkṣiptamaṇḍamiva jāgrati puṇḍarīke // 3976	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyāḥ khalu granthinibaddhakeśa- mallīkadambapratibimbaveṣāt / smarapraśastī rajatākṣareyaṃ pṛṣṭhasthalīhāṭakapaṭṭikāyām // 3977	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ padau cārutayā mahantāv apekṣya saukṣmyāllavabhāvabhājaḥ / jātā pravālasya mahīruhāṇāṃ jānīmahe pallavaśabdalabdhiḥ // 3978	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ pāṭalapāṇijāṅkitamuro nidrākaṣāye dṛśau nirdhauto'dharaśoṇimā vilulitasrastasrajo mūrdhajāḥ / kāñcīdāma daraślathāñcalamiti prātarnikhātairdṛśor ebhiḥ kāmaśaraistadadbhutamabhūd yanme manaḥ kīlitam // 3979	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāḥ pīṭhopaviṣṭāyā abhyaṅgaṃ vitanotyasau / lasacchroṇi caladveṇi naṭadgurupayodharam // 3980	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāḥ pīnastanavyāpte hṛdaye'smāsu nirdaye / avakāśalavo'pyasti nātra kutra bibhartu naḥ // 3981	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāḥ saṃyamavān kaco madhukarairabhyarthyamāno muhur bhṛṅgīgopanajābhiśāpamacirādunmārṣṭukāmo nijam / sīmantena kareṇa komalarucā sindūrabinducchalād ātaptāyasapiṇḍamaṇḍalamasāvādātumākāṅkṣati // 3982	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāḥ sa cārurmadhureva kāruḥ śvāsaṃ vitene malayānilena / amūni sūnairvidadhe'ṅgakāni cakāra vācaṃ pikapañcamena // 3983	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ sapakṣaikavidhoḥ kacaughaḥ sthāne mukhasyopari vāsamāpa / pakṣasthatāvadbahucandrako'pi kalāpināṃ yena jitaḥ kalāpaḥ // 3984	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntaprabhaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ / vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhaven manoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ // 3985	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatiraho candro na saṃbhāvyate no devaḥ kusumāyudho na ca madhurdūre viriñcaḥ prabhuḥ / etanme matamutthiteyamamṛtāt kācit svayaṃ sindhunā yā manthācalaloḍitena haraye dattvā śriyaṃ rakṣitā // 3986	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāḥ sugandhinavakuṅkumapaṅkadatto mugdhaścakāsti tilako madirekṣaṇāyāḥ / āviṣṭarāgamabhirāmamukhāravinda- niṣyandalagnamiva me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyam // 3987	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyāḥ svedāmbubinducyutatilakatayā vyaktavaktrendukānter vāraṃvāreṇa vegaprahaṇanagaṇanākelivācālitāyāḥ / tatpātotpātatālakramanamitadṛśastāṇḍavottālatālī- lālityāllobhitāḥ smaḥ pratipadamamunā kandukakrīḍitena // 3988	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
asyāṅke kaṣapaṭṭabhāsicapalā śrīḥ svarṇarekhāyate dhārāsāraghanaṃ sudarśanamadaścakraṃ jagatpaśyati / prodañcadvanamālamañjanarucā dehena pītāmbaraṃ dūronnītaśikhaṇḍamaṇḍalamidaṃ rūpaṃ harerambudaḥ // 3989	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyā dhāmasarovare bhujabise vaktrāravinde bhraman netrabhrūbhramare suyauvanajale kastūrikāpaṅkile / vakṣojapratikumbhikumbhadalanakrodhādupetya drutaṃ magnaścittamataṃgajaḥ kathamasāvutthāya niryāsyati // 3990	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyānanasya bhavataḥ khalu koṭireṣā kaṇṭārikā yadi bhavedaviśīrṇaparṇā / yogyā kva te karabha kalpatarorlatāyās te pallavā vimalavidrumabhaṅgabhājaḥ // 3991	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyābhyāsād granthavaryasya śiṣyaḥ sarvajñaḥ syād visphuraccārubuddhiḥ / arthaṃ kāmaṃ vetti dharmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ niḥsaṃdehaṃ śīlituṃ paṇḍito'pi // 3992	śālinī [11: mttgg]
asyā manoharākārakabarībhāratarjitāḥ / lajjayeva vane vāsaṃ cakruścamarabarhiṇaḥ // 3993	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāmapūrva iva ko'pi kalaṅkariktaś candro'paraḥ kimuta tanmakaradhvajena / romāvalīguṇamilatkucamandareṇa nirmathya nābhijaladhiṃ dhruvamuddhṛtaḥ syāt // 3994	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyā mukhaṃ himarucirnanu yadvidhātrā saṃpūrya sarvamavaśeṣatayātra muktaḥ / āśyānatāmupagato'sya rucā cakāsti nāsāgramauktikamiṣādamṛtasya binduḥ // 3995	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyā mukhaśrīpratibimbameva jalācca tātānmukurācca mitrāt / abhyarthya dhattaḥ khalu padmacandrau vibhūṣaṇaṃ yācitakaṃ kadācit // 3996	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyā mukhasyāstu na pūrṇamāsyaṃ pūrṇasya jitvā mahimā himāṃśum / bhrūlakṣmakhaṇḍaṃ dadhadardhamindur bhālastṛtīyaḥ khalu yasya bhāgaḥ // 3997	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyā mukhena lokānāṃ hṛtapaṅkajakāntinā / niśāsu nāśitā nidrā kumudānāmivendunā // 3998	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyā mukhenaiva vijitya nitya- spardhī milatkuṅkumaroṣabhāsā / prasahya candraḥ khalu nahyamānaḥ syādeva tiṣṭhatpariveṣapāśaḥ // 3999	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyā mukhendāvadharaḥ sudhābhūr bimbasya yuktaḥ pratibimba eṣaḥ / tasyāthavā śrīrdrumabhāji deśe saṃbhāvyamānāsya tu vidrume sā // 4000	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāmoṣadhayo jvalantu dadhatu jyotīṃṣi kīṭā api pronmīlantu bhujaṅgamaulimaṇayaḥ krīḍantu dīpāṅkurāḥ / praṣṭavyāḥ khalu yūyameva yadi ko'pyastaṃ gate bhāsvati prauḍḥadhvāntapayodhimagnajagatīhastāvalambakṣamaḥ // 4001	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asyā yadaṣṭādaśa saṃvibhajya vidyāḥ śrutī dadhraturardhamardham / karṇāntarutkīrṇagabhīrarekhaḥ kiṃ tasya saṃkhyaiva navā navāṅkaḥ // 4002	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyā yadāsyena purastiraśca tiraskṛtaṃ śītarucāndhakāram / sphuṭasphuradbhaṅgikacacchalena tadeva paścādidamasti baddham // 4003	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāriprakaraḥ śaraśca nṛpateḥ saṃkhye patantāvubhau sītkāraṃ ca na saṃmukhau racayataḥ kampaṃ ca na prāpnutaḥ / tadyuktaṃ na punarnivṛttirubhayorjāgarti yanmuktayor ekastatra bhinatti mitramaparaścāmitramityadbhutam // 4004	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyā lalāṭe racitā sakhībhir vibhāvyate candanapatralekhā / āpāṇḍurakṣāmakapolabhittāv anaṅgabāṇavraṇapaṭṭikeva // 4005	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyā vapuṣi tāruṇyaṃ śaiśavaṃ vā kṛtāspadam / jātiḥ kāpālikasyeva na kenāpyavadhāryate // 4006	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyā vapuṣi tulāyāṃ śaiśavaguñjāṃ ca yauvanaṃ hema / tulayati kutukini kāme na namati madhyānmanaḥsūcī // 4007	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
asyāścedalakāvalī kṛtamaliśreṇībhireṇīdṛśaḥ saundaryaṃ yadi cakṣuṣostaralayoḥ kiṃ manmathasyāyudhaiḥ / kā prītiḥ kanakāravindamukule pīnau stanau cedato manye kācidiyaṃ manobhavakṛtā māyā jaganmohinī // 4008	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāśced gatisaukumāryamadhunā haṃsasya garvairalaṃ saṃlāpo yadi dhāryatāṃ parabhṛtairvācaṃyamatvavratam / aṅgānāmakaṭhoratā yadi dṛṣatprāyaiva sā mālatī kāntiścet kamalā kimatra bahunā kāṣāyamālambatām // 4009	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāsirbhujagaḥ svakośasuṣirākṛṣṭaḥ sphuratkṛṣṇimā kamponmīladarālalīlavalanasteṣāṃ bhiye bhūbhujām / saṃgrāmeṣu nijāṅgulīmayamahāsiddhauṣadhīvīrudhaḥ parvāsye viniveśya jāṅgulikatā yairnāma nālambitā // 4010	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāstanimā madhye prathimā kucayordṛśośca cāñcalyam / ūrvoḥ krameṇa vṛtto- nnāhaśca tulyatāṃ dadhati // 4011	ajñātasamavṛtta [4: tl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
asyāstanusyandanasaṃsmito vai sa mīnaketurjagatīṃ vijetum / sakuṅkumālekhamiṣeṇa vīro vyamocayaccārutarāṃ patākām // 4012	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyāstanau virahatāṇḍavaraṅgabhūmau svedodabindukusumāñjalimāvikīrya / nāndīṃ papāṭha pṛthuvepathuvepamāna- kāñcīlatākalaravaiḥ smarasūtradhāraḥ // 4013	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
asyāstuṅgamiva stanadvayamidaṃ nimneva nābhiḥ sthitā dṛśyante viṣamonnatāśca valayo bhittau samāyāmapi / aṅge ca pratibhāti mārdavamidaṃ snigdhasvabhāvaściraṃ premṇā manmukhacandramīkṣata iva smereva vaktīti ca // 4014	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyāstrāṇamaho viyogaduritādasmāsu kṛtvā kṛtī svairaṃ gacchasi tattu kiṃ vimṛśasi trāsāvahaṃ hanta naḥ / vācāleṣu dineṣu kokilarutairutpañcamaprakramaiḥ sajyotsnāsu ca yāminīṣvaśaraṇāḥ kiṃ nāma kurmo vayam // 4015	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asyaikasyāpi kāyasya sahajā asthikhaṇḍakāḥ / pṛthak pṛthag gamiṣyanti kimutānyaḥ priyo janaḥ // 4016	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyaiva rambhoru tāvananasya dṛśaiva saṃjīvitamanmathasya / vanaṃ vidhātā nanu nīrajānāṃ nīrājanārthaṃ kimu nirmimīte // 4017	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ttBgl], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyaiva sargāya bhavatkarasya sarojasṛṣṭirmama hastalekhaḥ / ityāha dhātā hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ kiṃ hastalekhīkṛtayā tayāsyām // 4018	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyodarasya pratitulyaśobhaṃ nāstīti dhātrā bhuvanatraye'pi / saṃkhyānarekhā iva saṃprayuktās tisro virejurvalayaḥ sudatyāḥ // 4019	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asyorvīramaṇasya pārvaṇavidhudvairājyasajjaṃ yaśaḥ sarvāṅgojjvalaśarvaparvatasitaśrīgarvanirvāsi yat / tatkambupratibimbitaṃ kimu śaratparjanyarājiśriyaḥ paryāyaḥ kimu dugdhasindhupayasāṃ sarvānuvādaḥ kimu // 4020	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asraṃ locanakoṇa eva kṛpaṇadravyāyate sarvadā kaṇṭhe kākuvacaḥ prasuptakamalakroḍasthabhṛṅgāyate / hā rāvo hṛdaye viyogikulajākāmābhilāṣāyate vaidehīvirahajvaro raghupaterāpākatāpāyate // 4021	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asramajasraṃ moktuṃ dhiṅ naḥ karṇāyate nayane / draṣṭavyaṃ paridṛṣṭaṃ tatkaiśoraṃ vrajastrībhiḥ // 4022	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
asrasrotastaraṅgabhramiṣu taralitā māṃsapaṅke luṭhantaḥ sthūlāsthigranthibhaṅgairdhavalabisalatāgrāsamākalpayantaḥ / māyāsiṃhasya śaureḥ sphuradaruṇahṛdambhojasaṃśleṣabhājaḥ pāyāsurdaityavakṣaḥsthalakuharasarorājahaṃsā nakhā vaḥ // 4023	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
asrākṣīnnavanīlanīrajadalopāntātisūkṣmāyata- tvaṅmātrāntaritāmiṣaṃ yadi vapurnaitat prajānāṃ patiḥ / pratyagrakṣaradasravisrapiśitagrāsagrahaṃ gṛhṇato gṛdhradhvāṅkṣavṛkāṃstanau nipatataḥ ko vā kathaṃ vārayet // 4024	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ kāryāḥ puruṣaiḥ svairdivāniśam / viṣayeṣu ca sajjantyaḥ saṃsthāpya hyātmano vaśe // 4025	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asvādhyāyaḥ pikānāṃ madanamakhasamārambhaṇasyādhimāso nidrāyā janmalagnaṃ kimapi madhulihāṃ ko'pi durbhikṣakālaḥ / ṛṣṭiryātrotsukānāṃ malayajamarutāṃ pānthakāntākṛtāntaḥ prāleyonmūlamūlaṃ samajani samayaḥ kaścidautpātiko'yam // 4026	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ahaṃkāra kvāpi vraja vṛjina he mā tvamiha bhūr abhūmirdarpāṇāmahamapasara tvaṃ piśuna he / are krodha sthānāntaramanusarānanyamanasāṃ trilokīnātho naḥ sphurati hṛdi devo harirasau // 4027	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ahaṃkāro dhiyaṃ brūte mainaṃ suptaṃ prabodhaya / utthite paramānande na tvaṃ nāhaṃ na vai jagat // 4028	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ kimambā kimabhīṣṭatāpade taveti māturdhuri tātapṛcchayā / pralobhyatulyaṃ pravadantamarbhakaṃ mudā hasañ jighrati mūrdhni puṇyabhāk // 4029	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ahaṃkṛteḥ paricchedān avidyāmacitiṃ tathā / jahi yenopalabdhiste kāpi syānnistulādbhutā // 4030	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca rājendra lokanāthāvubhāvapi / bahuvrīhirahaṃ rājan ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo bhavān // 4031	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca devanandī ca kuśāgrīyadhiyāvubhau / naiva śabdāmbudheḥ pāraṃ kimanye jaḍabuddhayaḥ // 4032	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tanīyānatikomalaśca stanadvayaṃ voḍhumalaṃ na tāvat / itīva tatsaṃvahanārthamasyā valitrayaṃ puṣyati madhyabhāgaḥ // 4033	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
ahaṃ tāvan mahārāje pitṛtvaṃ nopalakṣaye / bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuśca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // 4034	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tenāhūtā kimapi kathayāmīti vijane samīpe cāsīnā saralahṛdayatvādavahitā / tataḥ karṇopānte kimapi vadatāghrāya vadanaṃ gṛhītvā dhammillaṃ mama sakhi nipīto'dhararasaḥ // 4035	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ahaṃ na cet syāṃ mayi duṣṭabhāvanām ime vrajeyurna nirāśrayā janāḥ / tadenasā yojayataḥ parān svayaṃ mamaiva yuktā khalu nanvapatrapā // 4036	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ahaṃ nayanajaṃ vāri niroḍhumapi na kṣamaḥ / rāmaḥ sītāviyogārto babandha saritāṃ patim // 4037	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ naśyāmi mānena mānena kalahaṃ kṛthāḥ / virodhametya kāntena kānte na paritapyate // 4038	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃbhāvātyayo jātu sukaro na kathaṃcana / cetanāyāmahambhāvo bhautikyāṃ vijitaḥ sakṛt / ādhyātmikyāṃ punaścaiṣa sphītaḥ sphurati no'grataḥ // 4039	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: msym], ajñātam [12: ymnr], ajñātam [12: jjtm], ajñātam [12: yrBj]
ahaṃ mametyeva bhavasya bījaṃ na me na cāhaṃ bhavabījaśāntiḥ / bīje pranaṣṭe kuta eva janma nirindhano vahnirupaiti śāntim // 4040	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ahaṃ mahānasāyātaḥ kalpito narakastava / mayā māṃsādikaṃ bhuktaṃ bhīmaṃ jānīhi māṃ baka // 4041	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃyuvaravarṇinījanamadāyatodavrata- sphuraccaturapañcamasvarajitānyapakṣivrajaḥ / rasālataruṇā kṛtāmasamatulyatāmātmano vihantumiha kokilaḥ phalinamanyamudvīkṣate // 4042	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ahaṃ rathāṅganāmeva priyā sahacarīva me / ananujñātasaṃparkā dhāriṇī rajanīva nau // 4043	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vo rakṣitetyuktvā yo na rakṣati bhūmipaḥ / sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śveva sonmāda āturaḥ // 4044	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ sadā prāṇasamaṃ mahībhujām ayaṃ tu māṃ vetti nṛpastṛṇopamam / itīva karṇeṣu suvarṇamarthināṃ svakhedamākhyātumabhūt kṛtāspadam // 4045	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ahaṃ hi saṃmato rājño ya evaṃ manyate kudhīḥ / balīvardaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣāṇaparivarjitaḥ // 4046	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahanyahani boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam / dattaṃ vā dāpitaṃ vāpi vāksāhyamapi vākkṛtam // 4047	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahanyahani bhūtāni gacchanti caramālayam / śeṣāḥ sthāvaramicchanti kimāścaryamataḥparam // 4048	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahanyahani bhūtāni sṛjatyeva prajāpatiḥ / adyāpi na sṛjatyekaṃ yo'rthinaṃ nāvamanyate // 4049	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahanyahani yācantaṃ ko'vamanyed guruṃ yathā / mārjanaṃ darpaṇasyeva yaḥ karoti dine dine // 4050	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahanyahanyātmana eva tāvaj jñātuṃ pramādaskhalitaṃ na śakyam / prajāsu kaḥ kena pathā prayātīty aśeṣato veditumasti śaktiḥ // 4051	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ahamapi pare'pi kavayas tathāpi mahadantaraṃ parijñeyam / aikyaṃ ralayoryadyapi tat kiṃ karabhāyate kalabhaḥ // 4052	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahamasmi nīlakaṇṭhas tava khalu tuṣyāmi śabdamātreṇa / nāhaṃ jaladhara bhavataś cātaka iva jīvanaṃ yāce // 4053	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahamahamikābaddhotsāhaṃ ratotsavaśaṃsini prasarati muhuḥ prauḍhastrīṇāṃ kathāmṛtadurdine / kalitapulakā sadyaḥ stokodgatastanakorake valayati śanairbālā vakṣaḥsthale taralāṃ dṛśam // 4054	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ahamiva dinalakṣmīḥ proṣitaprāṇanāthā tvamiva pathika panthā muktapānthānubandhaḥ / ayamapi paradeśaḥ so'pi yatrāsi gantā madanamadhuramūrte kiṃ vṛthā satvaro'si // 4055	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahamiva śūnyamaraṇyaṃ vayamiva tanutāṃ gatāni toyāni / asmākamivocchvāsā divasā dīrghāśca taptāśca // 4056	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahamiha kṛtavidyo veditā satkalānāṃ dhanapatirahameko rūpalāvaṇyayuktaḥ / iti kṛtagurugarvaḥ khidyate kiṃ jano'yaṃ katipayadinamadhye sarvametanna kiṃcit // 4057	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahamiha sthitavatyapi tāvakī tvamapi tatra vasannapi māmakaḥ / na tanusaṃgatamārya susaṃgataṃ hṛdayasaṃgatameva susaṃgatam // 4058	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ahameko na me kaścin nāhamanyasya kasyacit / na taṃ paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ na hi so'sti na yo mama // 4059	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahametya pataṅgavartmanā punaraṅkāśrayaṇī bhavāmi te / caturaiḥ surakāminījanaiḥ priya yāvanna vilobhyase divi // 4060	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānām iti hālāhala tāta mā sma dṛpyaḥ / nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhūyo bhuvane'smin vacanāni durjanānām // 4061	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ahameva balī na cāpara iti buddhiḥ pralayaṃkarī nṛṇām / nahi santi mahītale kati prabalairye vijitā baloddhatāḥ // 4062	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ahameva mato mahīpater iti sarvaḥ prakṛtiṣvacintayat / udadheriva nimnagāśateṣv abhavannāsya vimānanā kvacit // 4063	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
aharan kasyacid dravyaṃ yo naraḥ sukhamāvaset / sarvataḥ śaṅkitaḥ steno mṛgogrāmamivāgataḥ // 4064	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aharniśaṃ jāgaraṇodyato janaḥ śramaṃ vidhatte viṣayecchayā yathā / tapaḥśramaṃ cet kurute tathā kṣaṇaṃ kimaśnute'nantasukhaṃ na pāvanam // 4065	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aharniśā veti ratāya pṛcchati kramoṣṇaśītānnakarārpaṇād viṭe / hriyā vidagdhā kila tanniṣedhinī nyadhatta saṃdhyāmadhure'dhare'ṅgulim // 4066	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ahalyākelikāle'bhūt kandarpāṇāṃ śatadvayam / tatpañcabāṇabhinnākṣaḥ sahasrākṣo'ndhatāṃ gataḥ // 4067	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahastāni sahastānām apadāni catuṣpadām / phalgūni tatra mahatāṃ jīvo jīvasya jīvanam // 4068	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ahaha karmakarīyati bhūpatiṃ narapatīyati karmakaraṃ naraḥ / jalanidhīyati kūpamapāṃ nidhiṃ gatajalīyati madyamadākulaḥ // 4069	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ahaha kimadhunā mudhaiva badhnāsy anucitakāriṇi karṇadantapatram / nanu tava caṭulabhru karṇapālir bhuvanavilocanakālasārapāśaḥ // 4070	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ahaha gṛhī kva nu kuśalī baddhaḥ saṃsārasāgare kṣiptaḥ / kathamapi labhate potaṃ tenāpi nimajjati nitāntam // 4071	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahaha caṇḍa samīraṇa dāruṇaṃ kimidamācaritaṃ caritaṃ tvayā / yadiha cātakacañcupuṭodare patati vāri tadeva nivāritam // 4072	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ahaha nayane mithyādṛgvat sadīkṣaṇavarjite śravaṇayugalaṃ duṣputro vā śrṇoti na bhāṣitam / skhalati caraṇadvandvaṃ mārge madākulalokavad vapuṣi jarasā jīrṇe varṇo vyapaiti kalatravat // 4073	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ahaha sahajamohā dehagehaprapañce navaratamatimagnā kāminīvigrahāptiḥ / tadahamiha vihartuṃ saṃtatāmodamugdhā svahitamahitakṛtyaṃ hanta nāntaḥ smarāmi // 4074	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahānyastamayāntāni udayāntā ca śarvarī / sukhasyāntaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ sadā sukham // 4075	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahāpayan nṛpaḥ kālaṃ bhṛtyānāmanuvartinām / karmaṇāmānurūpyeṇa vṛttiṃ samanukalpayet // 4076	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahāryaḥ sarvamadhyasthaḥ kāñcanadyutimudvahan / satpradakṣiṇayogyatvam upayāti mahonnataḥ // 4077	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahāryeṇa kadāpyanyair asaṃhāryeṇa kenacit / titikṣākavacenaiva sarvaṃ jayati saṃvṛtaḥ // 4078	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃ nṛpaṃ ca śārdūlaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca bālakaṃ tathā / paraśvānaṃ ca mūrkhaṃ ca sapta suptān na bodhayet // 4079	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsayaiva bhūtānāṃ kāryaṃ śreyo'muśāsanam / vāk caiva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmamicchatā // 4080	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā dhāma dharmasya duḥkhasyāyatanaṃ spṛhā / saṅgatyāgaḥ padaṃ mukter yogābhyāsaḥ padaṃ śucaḥ // 4081	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramā gatiḥ / ahiṃsā paramā prītis tvahiṃsā paramaṃ padam // 4082	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paro damaḥ / ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ // 4083	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā paramo yajñas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ balam / ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitram ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham / ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyam ahiṃsā paramaṃ śrutam // 4084	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: ysjt], ajñātam [12: ysBr], ajñātam [12: jrBt], ajñātam [12: ystm]
ahiṃsā paramo dharmo hyahiṃsaiva paraṃ tapaḥ / ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ityāhurmunayaḥ sadā // 4085	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsāpūrvako dharmo yasmāt sarvahite rataḥ / yūkāmatkuṇadaṃśādīṃs tasmāt tānapi rakṣayet // 4086	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā prathamaṃ puṣpaṃ dvitīyendriyanigraham / tṛtīyaṃ tu dayā puṣpaṃ turīyaṃ dānapuṣpakam // 4087	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ tyāgo maithunavarjanam / pañcasveteṣu vākyeṣu sarve dharmāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // 4088	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryaparigrahaḥ / iṣṭāniṣṭaparā cintā yama eṣa prakīrtitaḥ // 4089	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ / etaṃ sāmāsikaṃ dharmaṃ cāturvarṇye'bravīnmanuḥ // 4090	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ / dānaṃ damo dayā kṣāntiḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam // 4091	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtānukampanam / śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ // 4092	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam / kṣamā caivāpramādaśca yasyaite sa sukhī bhavet // 4093	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā / etat tapo vidurdhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam // 4094	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣamā / varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // 4095	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsāsūnṛtāsteyabrahmākiṃcanatāratam / supātraṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ rājadveṣavivarjitam // 4096	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahiṃsrasya tapo'kṣayyam ahiṃsro yajate sadā / ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā // 4097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyājjalpanti ye narāḥ / avekṣya mantrabāhyāste kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ // 4098	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahitahitavicāraśūnyabuddheḥ śrutisamayairbahubhirbahiṣkṛtasya / udarabharaṇamātrakevalecchoḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ // 4099	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
ahitāt pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam / vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam // 4100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahitādanapatrapastrasann atimātrojjhitabhīranāstikaḥ / vinayopahitastvayā kutaḥ sadṛśo'nyo guṇavānavismayaḥ // 4101	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ahituṇḍikadṛṣṭīnām aśeṣā bhoginaḥ padam / na saṃvartāgnisārathye sthātā yanmukhamārutaḥ // 4102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahite pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam / vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam // 4103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahite hitabuddhiralpadhīr avamanyeta matāni mantriṇām / capalaḥ sahasaiva saṃpatann arikhaṅgābhihataḥ prabudhyate // 4104	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
ahite hitamicchanti nisargāt sarasāstu ye / pīḍito'pīkṣudaṇḍo hi rasameva dadātyaram // 4105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahibhavanavidhānānyāyudhīkṛtya śailān amarajayini sainye rakṣasāmāttakakṣye / kathamiva raṇabhūmau vartate vānarāṇām upavanataruvallīpallavonmāthi yūtham // 4106	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahibhūṣaṇo'pyabhayadaḥ sukalitahālāhalo'pi yo nityaḥ / digvasano'pyakhileśas taṃ śaśadharaśekharaṃ vande // 4107	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahiraṇyamadāsīkaṃ gṛhaṃ gorasavarjitam / pratikūlakalatraṃ ca narakasyāparo vidhiḥ // 4108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahirahiriti saṃbhramapadam itarajanaḥ kimapi kātaro bhavatu / vihagapaterāhāraḥ sa tu saralamṛṇāladalaruciraḥ // 4109	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahirājaḥ puruṣe'smin dhūmrā dhātrī kulatthavarṇo'śmā / māhendrī vahati śirā bhavati saphenaṃ sadā toyam // 4110	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ahiripupatikāntātātasaṃbaddhakāntā- haratanayanihantṛprāṇadātṛdhvajasya / sakhisutasutakāntātātasampūjyakāntā- pitṛśirasi patantī jāhnavī naḥ punātu // 4111	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahiriva janayogaṃ sarvadā varjayed yaḥ kuṇamiva vasu nārīṃ tyaktakāmo virāgī / viṣamiva viṣayārthān manyamāno durantāñ jayati paramahaṃso muktibhāvaṃ sameti // 4112	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ahirbiḍālo jāmātā eḍakā ca saputriṇī / ātmabhāgyaṃ na paśyanti bhāgineyastu pañcamaḥ // 4113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahīnakālaṃ rājārthaṃ svārthaṃ priyahitaiḥ saha / parārthaṃ deśakāle ca brūyād dharmārthasaṃhitam // 4114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahīnabhujagādhīśavapurvalayakaṅkaṇam / śailādinandicaritaṃ kṣatakandarpadarpakam // 4115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vṛṣapuṃgavalakṣmāṇaṃ śikhipāvakalocanam / sasarvamaṅgalaṃ naumi pārvatīsakhamīśvaram // 4116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahīndrān pātālād viṣamiva nimajjyoddharati yaḥ ya āruhya svargaṃ kavalayati sendrān suragaṇān / mahīṃ bhrāntvā bhrāntvā raghunalanṛpā yena vijitāḥ sa mṛtyuḥ kālaṃ na kṣamata iti mā kārṣṭa manasi // 4117	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ahṛtahṛdayāḥ santaḥ satyaṃ bravīmi niśamyatāṃ vipinamadhunā gatvā vāso mṛgaiḥ saha kalpyatām / sujanacaritadhvaṃsinyasmin khalodayaśālini prabhavati kalau nāyaṃ kālo gṛheṣu bhavādṛśām // 4118	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yas tasya nāsti pratikriyā / sa hi snehātmakastantur antarbhūtāni sīvyati // 4119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahetu bhrūkuṭiṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ / vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyān rājā dharmeṇa pālayet // 4120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aheriva guṇādbhīto miṣṭānnādyā viṣādiva / rākṣasībhya iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati // 4121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho anaucitīyaṃ te hṛdi śuddhe'pyaśuddhavat / aṅkaḥ khalairivākalpi nakhaistīkṣṇamukhairmama // 4122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ yadahaṃ vīkṣito'nayā / bālayā trastasāraṅgacapalāyatanetrayā // 4123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho ahīnāmapi lehanaṃ syād duḥkhāni nūnaṃ nṛpasevanāni / eko'hinā daṣṭamupaiti mṛtyuṃ kṣmāpena daṣṭastu sagotramitraḥ // 4124	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aho ahobhirna kalervidūyate sudhāsudhārāmadhuraṃ pade pade / dine dine candanacandraśītalaṃ yaśo yaśo dātanayasya gīyate // 4125	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho ahobhirmahimā himāgame- 'pyabhiprapede prati tāṃ smarārditām / tapartupūrtāvapi medasāṃ bharā vibhāvarībhirvibharāṃbabhūvire // 4126	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho aiśvaryamattānāṃ mattānāmiva māninām / asaṃbaddhā giro rūkṣāḥ kaḥ sahetānuśāsitā // 4127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kathamasīmedaṃ himanāma vijṛmbhate / caratyeva sahasrāṃśau dhavalaṃ timirāntaram // 4128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kanakamāhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ kenāpi śakyate / nāmasāmyādaho citraṃ dhattūro'pi madapradaḥ // 4129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kālasya sūkṣmo'yaṃ ko'pyalakṣyakramaḥ kramaḥ / yatpākapariṇāmena sarvaṃ yātyanyarūpatām // 4130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kimapi te śuddhaṃ yaśaḥkusumamudgatam / yasyāyamamṛtasyandī bālendurbāhyapallavaḥ // 4131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kuṭilabuddhīnāṃ durgrāhyamasatāṃ manaḥ / anyadvacasi kaṇṭhe'nyad anyadoṣṭhapuṭe sthitam // 4132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kenedṛśī buddhir dāruṇā tava nirmitā / triguṇā śrūyate buddhir na tu dārumayī kvacit // 4133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho khalabhujaṃgasya vicitro'yaṃ vadhakramaḥ / anyasya daśati śrotram anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate // 4134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho khalabhujaṃgasya viparīto vadhakramaḥ / karṇe lagati cānyasya prāṇairanyo viyujyate // 4135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho guṇāḥ saumyatā ca vidvattā janma satkule / dāridryāmbudhimagnasya sarvametanna śobhate // 4136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho guṇānāṃ prāptyarthaṃ yatante bahudhā naraḥ / muktā yadarthaṃ bhagnāsyā itareṣāṃ ca kā kathā // 4137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana / rājā cenna bhavelloke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // 4138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho'tinirmohi janasya citraṃ paraṃ caritraṃ gadituṃ na yogyam / mukhe hi cānyaddhṛdi bhāvamanyat devo na jānāti kuto manuṣyaḥ // 4139	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aho'tibalavaddaivaṃ vinā tena mahātmanā / yadasāmarthyayukte'pi nīcavarge jayapradam // 4140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho tṛṣṇāveśyā sakalajanatāmohanakarī vidagdhā mugdhānāṃ harati vivaśānāṃ śamadhanam / vipaddīkṣādakṣāsahataralatāraiḥ praṇayinī- kaṭākṣaiḥ kūṭākṣaiḥ kapaṭakuṭilaiḥ kāmakitavaḥ // 4141	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho dānamaho vīryam aho dhairyamakhaṇḍitam / udāravīradhīrāṇāṃ hariścandro nidarśanam // 4142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho divyaṃ cakṣurvahasi tava sāpi praṇayinī parākṣṇāmagrāhyaṃ yuvatiṣu vapuḥ saṃkramayati / samānābhijñānaṃ kathamitarathā paśyati puro bhavānekastasyāḥ pratikṛtimayīreva ramaṇīḥ // 4143	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho duḥkhamahoduḥkhamaho duḥkhaṃ daridratā / tatrāpi putrabhāryāṇāṃ bāhulyamatiduḥkhadam // 4144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho durantā jagato vimūḍhatā vilokyatāṃ saṃsṛtiduḥkhadāyinī / susādhyamapyannavidhānatastapo yato jano duḥkhakaro'vamanyate // 4145	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho durantā saṃsāre bhogatṛṣṇā yayā hṛtāḥ / anaucityādakīrteśca devā api na bibhyati // 4146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho durjasaṃsargān mānahāniḥ pade pade / pāvako lohasaṅgena mudgarairabhihanyate // 4147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
aho durjanasarpasya sarpasya mahadantaram / karṇamanyasya daśati anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate // 4148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aho dainyamaho kaṣṭaṃ pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ / yannopakuryādasvārthair martyaḥ svajñātivigrahaiḥ // 4149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aho dhanamadāndhastu paśyannapi na paśyati / yadi paśyatyātmahitaṃ sa paśyati na saṃśayaḥ // 4150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
aho dhanānāṃ mahatī vidagdhatā sukhoṣitānāṃ kṛpaṇasya veśmani / vrajanti na tyāgadaśāṃ na bhogyatāṃ parāṃ ca kāṃcit prathayanti nirvṛtim // 4151	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho dhanuṣi naipuṇyaṃ manmathasya mahātmanaḥ / śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ // 4152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dhātrā puraḥ sṛṣṭaṃ sāhasaṃ tadanu striyaḥ / naitāsāṃ duṣkaraṃ kiṃcin nisargādiha vidyate // 4153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dhārṣṭyamasādhūnāṃ nindatāmanaghāḥ striyaḥ / muṣṇatāmiva caurāṇāṃ tiṣṭha caureti jalpatām // 4154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho nakṣatrarājasya sābhimānaṃ viceṣṭitam / parikṣīṇasya vakratvaṃ saṃpūrṇasya suvṛttatā // 4155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho nu kaṣṭaṃ satataṃ pravāsam tato'tikaṣṭaḥ paragehavāsaḥ / kaṣṭādhikā nīcajanasya sevā tato'tikaṣṭā dhanahīnatā ca // 4156	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhāstantubhiradrayaḥ / avidyamānā yāvidyā tayā sarve vaśīkṛtāḥ // 4157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aho pūrṇaṃ saraḥ spaṣṭam asi nātra vicāraṇā / luṭhantastvayi yat sarve snānti jātu kathaṃcana // 4158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho prakṛtisādṛśyaṃ śleṣmaṇo durjanasya ca / madhuraiḥ kopamāyāti kaṭukair upaśāmyati // 4159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho pracchāditākāryanaipuṇyaṃ paramaṃ khale / yattuṣāgnirivānarcir dahannapi na lakṣyate // 4160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho prabhāvo vāgdevyā yanmātaṃgadivākaraḥ / śrīharṣasyābhavat sabhyaḥ samo bāṇamayūrayoḥ // 4161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho pramādī bhagavān prajāpatiḥ kṛśātimadhyā ghaṭitā mṛgekṣaṇā / yadi pramādādanilena bhajyate kathaṃ punaḥ śakṣyati kartumīdṛśam // 4162	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho bata khalaḥ puṇyair mūrkho'pyaśrutapaṇḍitaḥ / svaguṇodīraṇe śeṣaḥ paranindāsu vākpatiḥ // 4163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītamidaṃ jagat / yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhustena tuṣyati // 4164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bata vicitrāṇi caritāni mahātmanām / lakṣmīṃ tṛṇāya manyante tadbhāreṇa namanti ca // 4165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bata sabhā sabhyair iyaṃ maunādadhaḥ kṛtā / santo vadanti yatsatyaṃ sabhāṃ na praviśanti vā // 4166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bata saritpateridamanāryarūpaṃ paraṃ yadujjvalarucīn maṇīn suciracarcitāsthāguṇān / jaḍairanupayogibhiḥ parata etya labdhāspadaiḥ kṣapatyaniśamūrjitairjhagiti tanmayatvaṃ gataḥ // 4167	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
aho bāṇasya saṃdhānaṃ śaradi smarabhūpateḥ / api so'yaṃ tviṣāmīśaḥ kanyārāśimupāgataḥ // 4168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho brahmaṇyadevasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇyatā mayā / yaddaridratamo lakṣmīm āśliṣṭo bibhratorasi // 4169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bhavati sādṛśyaṃ mṛdaṅgasya ca khalasya ca / yāvanmukhagatau tau hi tāvanmadhurabhāṣiṇau // 4170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bhāryā aho putraḥ aho ātmā aho sukham / aho mātā aho bhrātā paśya māyāvimohitam // 4171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho bhuvaḥ saptasamudravatyā dvīpeṣu varṣeṣvadhipuṇyametat / gāyanti yatratyajanā murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇyavatāravanti // 4172	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
aho madāvalepo'yam asārāṇāṃ durātmanām / kauravāṇāṃ mahīpatvam asmākaṃ kila kālajam // 4173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho mahaccitramidaṃ kālagatyā duratyayā / ārurukṣatyupānadvai śiro mukuṭasevitam // 4174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho mahattvaṃ mahatāmapūrvaṃ vipattikāle'pi paropakāraḥ / yathāsyamadhye patito'pi rāhoḥ kalānidhiḥ puṇyacayaṃ dadāti // 4175	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
aho mahīyasāṃ puṃsām uparyupari pauruṣam / rāmeṇājagavaṃ śaṃbhor bhagnamambhojanālavat // 4176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho māyājālaṃ hṛdayahariṇo yatra patitaḥ samutthātuṃ bhūyaḥ prabhavati na kiṃcit kathamapi / na cet tasya cchettā paramaguruvākyopanamito nijātmajñānākhurvividhadṛḍhasadyuktidaśanaiḥ // 4177	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho māyābalaṃ viṣṇoḥ snehabaddhamidaṃ jagat // 4178	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
kva deho bhautiko'nātmā kva cātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ / kasya ke patiputrādyā moha eva hi kāraṇam // 4179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho me saubhāgyaṃ mama ca bhavabhūteśca bhaṇitaṃ ghaṭāyāmāropya pratiphalati tasyāṃ laghimani / girāṃ devī sadyaḥ śrutikalitakalhārakalikā- madhūlīmādhuryaṃ kṣipati paripūrtyai bhagavatī // 4180	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho mohaḥ puṃsāmiha jagati jātiḥ kila śubhā jarāmṛtyuvyādhīnapi jayati yā niṣprabhatayā / parasmājjātānāṃ vyasanaśatamete'pi dadhati svayaṃ sutvā tebhyo vidiśati sutān sā viśasitum // 4181	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho moho varākasya kākasya yadasau puraḥ / sarīsarti narīnarti yadayaṃ śikhihaṃsayoḥ // 4182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho yeṣāṃ varaṃ janma sarvaprāṇyupajīvanam / sujanasyeva yeṣāṃ vai vimukhā yānti nārthinaḥ // 4183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho raghuśiromaṇerabhinavapratāpāvali- pracaṇḍakiraṇaprathāprasarasādhvasādāśvayam / surādhipatirambudān kamalamindirā sevate himāṃśurapi candramāḥ satatamambhudhau majjati // 4184	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ahorātramaye loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaran / mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā // 4185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahorātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣāṃ prāṇināmiha / āyūṃṣi kṣapayantyāśu grīṣme jalamivāṃśavaḥ // 4186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahorātre vibhajate sūryo mānuṣadaivike / rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇāmahaḥ // 4187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho rūpamaho rūpam aho mukhamaho mukham / aho madhyamaho madhyam asyāḥ sāraṅgacakṣuṣaḥ // 4188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho vidhātastvamatīva bāliśo yastvātmasṛṣṭyapratirūpamīhase / pare'nujīvatyaparasya yā mṛtir viparyayaścettvamasi dhruvaḥ paraḥ // 4189	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
na hi kramaścediha mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāmastu tadātmakarmabhiḥ / yaḥ snehapāśo nijasargavṛddhaye svayaṃ kṛtaste tamimaṃ vivṛścasi // 4190	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aho vidhātrā hatakena nārthāt kṛto viyogo'pi viyogināṃ naḥ / rathāṅganāmnāmiva yena sīmā na vidyate nāpi sapakṣavattvam // 4191	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
aho viśālaṃ bhūpāla bhuvanatritayodaram / māti mātumaśakyo'pi yaśorāśiryadatra te // 4192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho viṣādapyadhikāḥ striyo raktavimānitāḥ / aho asevyāḥ sādhūnāṃ rājāno'tattvadarśinaḥ // 4193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aho vaicitryametasya saṃsārasya kimucyate / guṇo'pi kleśahetuḥ syād viśrāntaḥ kaṇṭhakandale // 4194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho saṃsāravairasyaṃ vairasyakāraṇaṃ striyaḥ / dolālolā ca kamalā rogābhogagehaṃ deham // 4195	upajāti anuṣṭubh: ajñātam [8: mygg], ajñātam [8: yrgg], ajñātam [8: trlg], ajñātam [8: mBlg]
aho saṃsṛtiveśyeyaṃ rāgādyuddīpanodyatā / rasamutpādya sarveṣām ante vairasyakāriṇī // 4196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho satsaṃgatirloke kiṃ pāpaṃ na vināśayet / na dadāti sukhaṃ kiṃ vā narāṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām // 4197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho samudragambhīradhīracittamanasvinaḥ / kṛtvāpyananyasāmānyam ullekhaṃ nodgiranti ye // 4198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho sāhajikaṃ prema dūrādapi virājate / cakoranayanadvandvam āhlādayati candramāḥ // 4199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho susadṛśī vṛttis tulākoṭeḥ khalasya ca / stokenonnatimāyāti stokenāyātyadhogatim // 4200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho strīpreraṇā nāma rajasālaṅghitātmanām / puṃsāṃ vātyeva sarasāmāśayakṣobhakāriṇī // 4201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aho sthiraḥ ko'pi tavepsito yuvā cirāya karṇotpalaśūnyatāṃ gate / upekṣate yaḥ ślathabandhalambinīr jaṭāḥ kapole kalamāgrapiṅgalāḥ // 4202	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
aho sthairyaṃ teṣāṃ prakṛtiniyamebhyaḥ sukṛtināṃ pratijñātatyāgo nahi bhavati kṛcchre'pi mahati / tathā hi tvatsenābharanamitadhātrībharadalat- kaṭāho'pi svāṅgaṃ kimu kamaṭhanāthaścalayati // 4203	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
aho hi me bahvaparāddhamāyuṣā yadapriyaṃ vācyamidaṃ mayedṛśam / ta eva dhanyāḥ suhṛdaḥ parābhavaṃ jagatyadṛṣṭvaiva hi ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ // 4204	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ahau vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā maṇau vā loṣṭe vā kusumaśayane vā dṛṣadi vā / tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama samadṛśo yāntu divasāḥ kvacit puṇye'raṇye śiva śiva śiveti pralapataḥ // 4205	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ahnastriścaturambubhiḥ snapayasi svaṃ puṣkarāvarjitair bhuṅkṣe medhyatarāṇi bhadra taruṇānyaśvatthapatrāṇi ca / puṇyāraṇyacaro'si na praviśasi grāmaṃ sakṛtkuñjara jñānaṃ cet kiyadapyudeti na samā brahmarṣayo'pi tvayā // 4206	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ahni bhāskaramicchanti rātrāvamṛtatejasam / ahni rātrau ca rājānam icchanti guṇinaṃ prajāḥ // 4207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahni ravirdahati tvaci vṛddhaḥ puṣpadhanurdahati prabaloḍham / rātridinaṃ punarantaramantaḥ saṃvṛtirasti raverna tu kantoḥ // 4208	dodhaka [11: BBBgg]
āṃ jñātaṃ nṛpate tvameva nikhilāṃ nityaṃ bibharṣi kṣitiṃ śailendrāḥ svayameva durbharabharāstaiḥ pratyutādho vrajet / asyāścoddharaṇe kṣamo'pi na parastvatto varāhādikaḥ paśvāderbharaṇakriyānipuṇatā naiva prabhāgocaraḥ // 4209	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āḥ kaṣṭaṃ vanavāsisāmyakṛtayā siddhāśramaśraddhayā pallīṃ bālakuraṅga saṃprati kutaḥ prāpto'si mṛtyormukham / yatrānekakuraṅgakoṭikadanakrīḍollasallohita- srotobhiḥ paripūrayanti parikhāmuḍḍāmarāḥ pāmarāḥ // 4210	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āḥ kaṣṭaṃ suvivekaśūnyahṛdayaiḥ saṃsargamāptaṃ ca tair vikrītaṃ badaraiḥ samaṃ kṣititale kugrāmasīmni sphuṭam / saṃviṣṭaṃśaṭhagāḍhamūḍhavadane dhūtkāradūrīkṛtaṃ kiṃ jānātyaguṇo jano guṇamato muktāphalaṃ roditi // 4211	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āḥ kaṣṭamapraḥṛṣṭāḥ śiṣṭā api vittacāpalāviṣṭāḥ / adhyāpayanti vedān ādāya cirāya māsi māsi bhṛtim // 4212	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: tgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
āḥ kimarthamidaṃ cetaḥ satāmambhodhidurbharam / iti krudheva durvedhāḥ paraduḥkhairapūrayat // 4213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḥ pākaṃ na karoṣi pāpini kathaṃ pāpī tvadīyaḥ pitā raṇḍe jalpasi kiṃ tavaiva jananī raṇḍā tvadīyā svasā / nirgaccha tvaritaṃ gṛhād bahirito nedaṃ tvadīyaṃ gṛhaṃ hā hā nātha mamādya dehi maraṇaṃ jārasya bhāgyodayaḥ // 4214	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āḥ pātrī syāmakṛtakaghanapremavisphāritānāṃ savrīḍānāṃ sakalakaraṇānandanāḍiṃdhamānām / teṣāṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayanihitākūtaniṣyandinetra- vyāpārāṇāṃ punarapi tathā subhruvo vibhramāṇām // 4215	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
āḥ sarvataḥ sphuratu kairavamāpibantu jyotsnākarambhamudaraṃbharayaścakorāḥ / yāto yadeṣa caramācalamūlacumbī paṅkeruhaprakarajāgaraṇapradīpaḥ // 4216	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āḥ sīte patigarvavibhramabharabhrāntabhramadbāndhava- pradhvaṃsasmitakāntimat tava tadā jātaṃ yadetanmukham / saṃpratyeva haṭhāt tadeṣa kurute keśoccayākarṣaṇa- trāsottānitalolalocanapatadbāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ // 4217	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
