āsīnaḥ sukhamāpaṇe yadi vaṇik śraddhālubhiḥ prārthitaḥ kiṃcic śaṃsati pañcakaṃ śatakamityetanna tasyādbhutam / āpātālavighūrṇitāmbhasi calatyautpātike mārute majjantyāmapi nāvi muñcati na yastāmeva mūlyasthitim // 5599	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
asīnaḥ svāminaḥ pārśve tanmukhekṣī kṛtāñjaliḥ / svabhāvaṃ cāsya vijñāya dakṣaḥ kāryāṇi sādhayet // 5600	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīnā taṭabhuvi sasmitena bhartrā rambhorūravatarituṃ sarasyanicchuḥ / dhunvānā karayugamīkṣituṃ vilāsāñ śītāluḥ salilagatena sicyate sma // 5601	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
āsīne pūṣṇi tūṣṇīṃ vyasanini śaśini vyomni kṛṣṇe satṛṣṇe daityendre jātanidre dravati maghavati klāntakāntau kṛtānte / abrahmaṇyaṃ bruvāṇe kamalapuṭakuṭīśrotriye śāntyupāye pāyād vaḥ kālakūṭaṃ jhaṭiti kavalayaṃllīlayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ // 5602	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āsīne lālayed bālāṃ taruṇīṃ śayane tathā / utthite'pyadhirūḍhāṃ ca lālanaṃ trividhaṃ viduḥ // 5603	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīnaiḥ svaṃ vimānaṃ kṛtaparivṛtibhiḥ sundarīsaṃgatais tair devaiḥ siddhaiśca yakṣairanimiṣanayanairdṛśyamānaḥ satṛṣṇam / madhyemaghye payodairmurajasadṛśatāṃ bodhayadbhiḥ sumanda- mambhaḥ saṃpātya puṣpairiva nanu mahitas tāṇḍavaḥ śreyase stāt // 5604	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āsīn nātha pitāmahī tava mahī mātā tato'nantaraṃ saṃpratyeva hi sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā jayodbhūtaye / pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samastaśāstraviduṣāṃ lokeśvarāṇāmidam // 5605	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsīn me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā yā dṛṣṭervrajati na gocaraṃ priyā me / jyotsnā hi sphuṭadhavalāpi kaumudīndor andhānāṃ bahalatamomalīmasaiva // 5606	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
āsīmā kālikā yasya kṣudrāṅgaṃ kuṇḍalīkṛtam / kṣudravajrakanāmānaṃ prāha nāgārjuno muniḥ // 5607	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīmāntān nivartante suhṛdaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ / sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi gacchantamanugacchati // 5608	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīstvaṃ niśirājaraktahṛdayetīrṣyālunā vajriṇā prātaḥ śaṅkitayeva divyapadavīṃ gatvātmanaḥ śuddhaye / aurvottāpitavārdhitāpakatalādādāya mukto bahiḥ prācyāsau divi taptamāṣaka iva pradyotano dyotate // 5609	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsuraṃ kulamanādaraṇīyaṃ cittametadamalīkaraṇīyam / rāmadhāma śaraṇīkaraṇīyaṃ līlayā bhavajalaṃ taraṇīyam // 5610	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
āse cet svagṛhe kuṭumbabharaṇaṃ kartuṃ na śakto'smyahaṃ seve cet sukhasādhanaṃ munivanaṃ muṣṇanti māṃ taskarāḥ / śvabhre cet svatanuṃ tyajāmi narakād bhīrātmahatyāvaśān no jāne karavāṇi daiva kimahaṃ martuṃ na vā jīvitum // 5611	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsevyate mukhaṃ sarvair vidyānāṃ yoṣitāmapi / hṛdayagrāhiṇas tāsāṃ dvitrāḥ santi na santi vā // 5612	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āskandan kathamapi yoṣito na yāvad bhīmatyaḥ priyakaradhāryamāṇahastāḥ / autsukyāt tvaritamamūstadambu tāvat saṃkrāntapratimatayā dadhāvivāntaḥ // 5613	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
āskandito bhujalatācalitāgraśākhām āliṅgito yuvatibhiḥ kalikārthinībhiḥ / dhanyo'si campakataro kusumānurūpair āsāṃ ghanastanaphalaiḥ phalito'si yacca // 5614	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āskandhāvadhi kaṇṭhakāṇḍavipine drāk candrahāsāsinā chettuṃ prakramite mayaiva tarasā truṭyacchirāsaṃtatau / asmeraṃ galitāśrugadgadapadaṃ bhinnabhruvā yadyabhūd vaktreṣvekamapi svayaṃ sa bhagavāṃstanme pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ // 5615	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ā stanyapānāj jananī paśūnām ā dāralābhācca narādhamānām / āgehakarmāvadhi madhyamānām ā jīvitāt tīrthamivottamānām // 5616	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āsta bhāvamadhigacchatos tayoḥ saṃmadeṣu karajakṣatārpaṇā / phāṇiteṣu maricāvacūrṇanā sā sphuṭaṃ kaṭurapi spṛhāvahā // 5617	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
āstāṃ kiṃ bahubhiḥ paropakṛtayaḥ saṃsārasāraṃ phalaṃ siddhaṃ tat pratikūlavartini vidhau na stokamapyatra naḥ / ete smaḥ kila mānuṣā vayamapi vyarthaṃ vyapetāyuṣo yeṣāṃ svodarapūrtireva hi kimapyaṣṭau mahāsiddhayaḥ // 5618	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ klamāpaharaṇaṃ jaladherjalena dūre davāgni paridīpitamānasānām / etāvadastu yadi toyakaṇairna jihvā dandahyate dviguṇatāṃ ca na yāti tṛṣṇā // 5619	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āstāṃ gāḍhatarānuśīlanavidhiḥ saṃsparśanaṃ dūrataḥ saṃśleṣe viṣayīkṛto'si na manāgakṣṇoḥ padaṃ prāpitaḥ / kiṃ brūmaḥ sahakāra tāvakaguṇānanyādṛśairdurlabhān saurabhyeṇa yadadhvagānapi muhuḥ prīṇāsi dūrādapi // 5620	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ cakṣuridaṃ tiro'ñcati kiyacceto'pi yadvaibhavair niṣpratyāśamayaṃ mune jalanidhirgaṇḍūṣitaḥ sattapaḥ / etenaiva virantumarhasi na te gaṇḍūṣapānādhikā kācit khyātirataḥparaṃ paramasau parjanyanīvīvyayaḥ // 5621	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ tat karakānipātakṛtabhīmaṇḍūkanirmajjana- kṣemaikakṣamavāri palvalaśataṃ sindhuṃ tameva stumaḥ / kupyacchakrakarasvarupraharaṇakṣuṇṇākhilāṅgakṣarat- kīlālena girivrajena śaraṇaṃ yadgarbhavāsaḥ kṛtaḥ // 5622	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ tāvat kimanyena daurātmyeneha yoṣitām / vidhṛtaṃ svodareṇāpi ghnanti putramapi svakam // 5623	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstāṃ tāvadakīrtirme tvayā tathyaṃ tu kathyatām / cittaṃ kathamivāsīt te harivaṃśīravaśrutau // 5624	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstāṃ tāvadasīmapauruṣajuṣaḥ saṃmānitātyadbhuta- prārambhābhyadhikakriyasya sa khalu prācyaḥ pracāro hareḥ / jīrṇasyāpi ca vindhyakandaradarīdvārāvatārākṣamair aṅgairaṅgabhṛto dalanti darato gandhena gandhadvipāḥ // 5625	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ tāvadaho samudramahimā dūre'pi karṇapriyas tīre yasya pipāsayaiva maraṇaṃ prāpnoti śīghraṃ janaḥ / tasmādambunidhervaraṃ laghusaraḥ kūpo'thavā vāpikā yatra svātmakaradvayena salilaṃ pepīyate svecchayā // 5626	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ tāvad digantaprathitasuyaśasāṃ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ taiḥ sākaṃ vairayogo'pyatiśayamahitāmunnatiṃ saṃnidhatte / loke kasyāgamiṣyacchrutipathamavapurvaktraśeṣo'pi rāhus trailokyakhyātadhāmnoryadi raviśaśinorvairitāṃ nākariṣyat // 5627	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āstāṃ tāvad vacanaracanābhājanatvaṃ vidūre dūre cāstāṃ tava tanuparīrambhasaṃbhāvanāpi / bhūyo bhūyaḥ praṇatibhiridaṃ kiṃ tu yāce vidheyā smāraṃ smāraṃ svajanagaṇane kāpi rekhā mamāpi // 5628	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
āstāṃ te guṇinastāvad bhūṣitāśeṣabhūtalāḥ / yeṣāṃ guṇarucirbhūyaḥ sāṃprataṃ te'pi durlabhāḥ // 5629	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstāṃ dūratayā tadīyavadanāmbhojāmṛtāsvādanaṃ nodetyeva manoratho'pi hṛdaye tatsaṃgamāśāṃ prati / utkaṇṭhāśithilīkṛtāṅgalatikaṃ vīkṣeta māmekadā sasnehaṃ yadi sā sarojavadanā dhanyo'smyahaṃ tāvatā // 5630	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ dūreṇa viśleṣaḥ priyāmāliṅgato mama / svedaḥ kiṃ na sarinnātho romāñcaḥ kiṃ na parvataḥ // 5631	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstāṃ bhavāntaravidhau suviparyayo'yam atraiva janmani nṛṇāmadharoccabhāvaḥ / alpaḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthurapi kṣaṇato'lpa eva svāmī bhavatyanucaraḥ sa ca tatpadārhaḥ // 5632	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āstāṃ maṇḍalamaindavaṃ varatanorvaktraśriyaś cet kathā koṇe kutracidāsatāṃ kuvalayānyakṣṇoḥ prasaṅgo yadi / dūre tiṣṭhatu vallakīkalaravaḥ prastāvanā ced girāṃ vārttā cedavalagnakasya yaśasāṃ vyomnaḥ prathāyai namaḥ // 5633	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ mahābodhabalena sādhyo mokṣo vibādhāmalasaukhyayuktaḥ / dharmārthakāmā api no bhavanti jñānaṃ vinā tena tadarcanīyam // 5634	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āstāṃ mādya bhave śubhe sakhi latā nyastā tvayā mādhavī kānte tan mama saṃprayaccha kusumaṃ kiṃ vāmunā me phalam / nālpaṃ nirmalayāmi mauktikamidaṃ nyastaṃ tvayā dahyatām itthaṃ vibhramasaṃbhramo madayati preyāṃsameṇīdṛśaḥ // 5635	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ mānaḥ kathanaṃ sakhīṣu vā mayi nivedyadurvinaye / śithilitaratiguṇagarvā mamāpi sā lajjitā sutanuḥ // 5636	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āstāṃ varamavakeśī mā dohadamasya racaya pūgataroḥ / etasmāt phalitādapi kevalamudvegamadhigaccha // 5637	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āstāṃ viśvasanaṃ sakhīṣu viditābhiprāyasāre jane tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ salilatāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā / loko hyeṣa paropahāsacaturaḥ sūkṣmeṅgitajño'pyalaṃ mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ // 5638	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstāṃ sakaṇṭakamidaṃ vasudhādhipatyaṃ trailokyarājyamapi deva tṛṇāya manye / niḥśaṅkasuptahariṇīkulasaṃkulāsu cetaḥ paraṃ valati śailavanasthalīṣu // 5639	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āstāmanaṅgīkaraṇād bhavena dṛśyaḥ smaro neti purāṇavāṇī / tavaiva dehaṃ śritayā śriyeti navastu vastu pratibhāti vādaḥ // 5640	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āstāmanyatsujanāḥ paropakāraikakaraṇadurlalitāḥ / saṃtāpitapiśuneṣu svaguṇeṣvapi hanta khidyante // 5641	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āstāmaparo lokaḥ krīḍāpekṣāparo yadi prītiḥ / byasanāntare patantī na vāritā parijanenāpi // 5642	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āstāmeva sarovareṇya bhavato dugdhodalabdhāmṛta- svādaspardhi sarojavṛndakhacitaṃ haṃsāvataṃsaṃ payaḥ / sphārollolasuśītaśīkaracayāsāraprasiktānila- sparśaireva manoharairapagatāḥ saṃtāpaśoṣaklamāḥ // 5643	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āstikyaṃ ced dhanamakhilamapyarthisātkartumarhaṃ nāstikyaṃ cet tadapi sutarāṃ bhogahetorapāsyam / aspṛṣṭvāpi svayamatirahaḥsthāpyate yat tadantas tasmin hetuḥ ka iti nibhṛtaṃ tarkayāmo na vidmaḥ // 5644	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
āstīkavacanaṃ smṛtvā yaḥ sarpo na nivartate / śatadhā bhidyate mūrdhni śiṃśavṛkṣaphalaṃ yathā // 5645	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstīryantāmupānte vanavṛtinipuṇairjālikairjālabandhā mucyantāṃ śṛṅkhalābhyaḥ śvagaṇabhiraṭavīgahvare sārameyāḥ / ākīryantāṃ sthalāni śramaśithilahayaiḥ sādibhiḥ pāśahastair vyādhūyantāṃ kṛtāntairiva mahiṣacarairdaṇḍibhiḥ kānanāni // 5646	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āstṛte'bhinavapallavapuṣpair apyanārataratābhiratābhyaḥ / dīyate sma śayituṃ śayanīye na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇadayāpi vadhūbhyaḥ // 5647	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
āste kaścana bhikṣuḥ saṃgṛhṇannavyayāni daśa / na mametyavyayayugalaṃ yācāmas taṃ kimastyanyat // 5648	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
āste'traiva sarasyaho bata kiyān saṃtoṣapakṣagraho haṃsasyāsya manāṅ na dhāvati matiḥ śrīdhāmni padme kvacit / supto'dyāpi vibudhyate na taditastāvat pratīkṣāmahe velāmityuṣasi priyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ ta eva kṣamāḥ // 5649	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āste dāmodarīyāmiyamudaradarīṃ yāvalambya trilokī saṃmātuṃ śaknuvanti prathimabharavaśādatra naitadyaśāṃsi / tāmetāṃ pūrayitvā niraguriva madhudhvaṃsinaḥ pāṇḍupadma- cchadmāpannāni tāni dvipadaśanasanābhīni nābhīpathena // 5650	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āste dvāri vadhūrvidhātṛracanāvaiduṣyavikrāntibhūr bhūretasya balādahāri bhavatā bhītā natārātinā / kiṃ nāmāparamatra kāryamadhunā sādhyaṃ samāśāsyate tatpāṇigrahamaṅgalāya manujādhīśāstu yatno mahān // 5651	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āste no suṣamā na cāpi kusumāmodo hi no vā manāk cāturyaṃ makarandadānaviṣaye kiṃ cāturīyaṃ punaḥ / yattvaṃ citragataṃ kuśeśayadalaṃ puṣṇāsi guñjāravair māhātmyaṃ ka iva bravīmi tadaho he cañcarīkādhunā // 5652	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āste rohatkanakakamale kelipātre mṛḍānyāḥ khelan helonmadamadhukarīmānase mānase yaḥ / bhekodrekapraṇayini valadbālajambālajāle sa syādutkaḥ parimitajale palvale kiṃ marālaḥ // 5653	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
āste vidhuḥ paramanirvṛta eva maulau śaṃbhoriti trijagatījanacittavṛttiḥ / antarnigūḍhanayanānaladāhaduḥkhaṃ jānāti kaḥ paramṛte bata śītaraśmeḥ // 5654	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āstrīśiśu prathitayaiṣa pipāsitebhyaḥ saṃrakṣyate'mbudhirapeyatayaiva dūrāt / daṃṣṭrākarālamakarālikarālitābhiḥ kiṃ bhāyayatyaparamūrmiparaṃparābhiḥ // 5655	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āsthāmālambya nīteṣu vaśaṃ kṣudreṣvarātiṣu / vyaktimāyāti mahatāṃ māhātmyamanukampayā // 5656	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āsthāya dāruṇataraṃ kamapi svabhāvam atyantaduṣkṛtakṛtāmapi śikṣaṇāya / gṛhṇāsi sāyakapade kusumānyamūni mātaḥ suteṣu mahatī kila rūkṣateyam // 5657	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āsthitaḥ sthagitavāridapaṅktyā saṃdhyayā gaganapaścimabhāgaḥ / sormividrumavitānavibhāsā rañjitasya jaladheḥ śriyamūhe // 5658	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
āsphālitaṃ yat pramadākarāgrair mṛdaṅgadhīradhvanimanvagacchat / vanyairidānīṃ mahiṣais tadambhaḥ śṛṅgāhataṃ krośati dīrghikāṇām // 5659	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āsphālitairjaladhirūrmiparaṃparāṇāṃ dūrīkaroti yadi ratnamavastubuddhyā / ratnākaratvamapi tasya bhaved vinaṣṭaṃ ratnaṃ tu hanta bhavitā mahadaṅgadhāryam // 5660	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āsmākī yuvatidṛśāmasau tanoti cchāyaiva śriyamanapāyinīṃ kimebhiḥ / matvaivaṃ svaguṇapidhānasābhyasūyaiḥ pānīyairiti vidadhāvire'ñjanāni // 5661	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
āsyaṃ nirasya rasitaiḥ suciraṃ vihasya gātrāntareṣu ghana varṣasi cātakasya / taccañcukoṭikuṭilāyatakaṃdharasya prāṇātyayo'sya bhavataḥ parihāsamātram // 5662	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āsyaṃ pidhāya sakalaṃ viralāṅgulinā kareṇa saghrāṇam / ayamuccaraddakāraṃ manoharaṃ jyotkaroti śiśuḥ // 5663	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āsyaṃ yadyapi hāsyavarjitamidaṃ lāsyena vītaṃ vaco netre śoṇasarojakānti tadapi kvāpi kṣaṇaṃ sthīyate / mālāyāḥ karaṇodyame makarikārambhaḥ kucāmbhojayor dhūpāḥ kuntaladhoraṇīṣu sudṛśaḥ sāyaṃtano dṛśyate // 5664	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsyaṃ yasyāḥ sudhāṃśuṃ kalayati nayanābhyāṃ jitaḥ puṃsamūhaḥ kāntyā vidyut kucābhyāṃ jalakanakadhare nirjite hanta mohaḥ / kuṣṭhaṃ durgandhiyuktaṃ laghukṛmivikṛtaṃ pūyamajjāsravāhi- vyāptaṃ tan makṣikābhirgatiriti vapuṣaḥ kutsitā nāsti loke // 5665	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āsyaṃ sahāsyaṃ nayanaṃ salāsyaṃ sindūrabindūdayaśobhi bhālam / navā ca veṇī hariṇīdṛśaśced anyairagaṇyairapi bhūṣaṇaiḥ kim // 5666	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āsyaproñchitapārvaṇenduyaśasaṃ netrāvadhūtotpala- śrīgarvāṃ daśanacchadavyavahitāśokapravāladyutim / etāṃ dṛṣṭisudhāprapāṃ trijagataḥ śilpī vidhāya svayaṃ manye harṣavaśādajāyata nijastotrapracaṇḍaḥ kaviḥ // 5667	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsyaśrījitajarjarendumalinaṃ kṛtvā kare kandukaṃ krīḍākautukamiśrabhāvamanayā tāmraṃ vahantyānanam / bhṛṅgāgragrahakṛṣṇaketakadalaspardhāvatīnāṃ dṛśā dīrghāpāṅgataraṅgitaikasuhṛdāmeṣo'smi pātrīkṛtaḥ // 5668	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsyaśrīrdvijarājabādhanakarī dṛṣṭiḥ śruterlaṅghinī mūrdhanyāvaligāminī kuṭilatā baddhāśca muktā guṇaiḥ / yatte sundari durvinītiriyatī dṛṣṭābalāyā mayā tan manye makaradhvajo bhavajayī jātastvadagresaraḥ // 5669	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsyendoḥ pariveṣavadratipateścāmpeyakodaṇḍavad dhammillāmbumucaḥ kṣaṇadyutivadāsajjau kṣipantī bhujau / viśliṣyadvali lakṣyanābhi vigalannīvyunnamanmadhyamaṃ kiṃcit kiṃcidudañcadañcalamaho kumbhastanī jṛmbhate // 5670	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsye pūrṇasudhānidhiścaraṇayoḥ kālpadrumaṃ vaibhavaṃ dehe kāñcanakāntatā tvaci punarhaiyaṅgavīnaṃ svayam / yasyā locanayornirūpadhi sadodītānukampātatiḥ sā mātā jagatāṃ prasādapadavī sākṣānmude stādumā // 5671	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsrāvayeccopacitān viparyasyecca karmasu / yathā na bhakṣayantyarthaṃ bhakṣitaṃ nirvamanti vā // 5672	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsrāvayedupacitān sādhu duṣṭavraṇāniva / āyuktāste ca varterann agnāviva mahīpatau // 5673	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ā svarlokāduraganagaraṃ nūtanālokalakṣmīm ātanvadbhiḥ kimiva sitatāṃ ceṣṭitais te na nītam / apyetāsāṃ ramaṇavirahe vidviṣatkāminīnāṃ yairānītā nakhapadamayī maṇḍanā pāṇḍimānam // 5674	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
āsvāditaṃ svādumarandabindu- svacchandamindīvarasundarībhiḥ / mākandapuṣpaṃ pramadājanasya pramodamāmodabharairakārṣīt // 5675	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āsvāditadayitādhara- sudhārasasyeva sūktayo madhurāḥ / akalitarasālamukulo na kokilaḥ kalamudañcayati // 5676	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āsvāditadviradaśoṇitaśoṇaśobhāṃ saṃdhyāruṇāmiva kalāṃ śaśalāñchanasya / jṛmbhāvidāritamukhasya mukhāt sphurantīṃ ko hartumicchati hareḥ paribhūya daṃṣṭrām // 5677	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āsvāditonmuktamivārddhabimbaṃ tamomukhād hanta sudhākarasya / sīmantasīmāntamudārarūpam idaṃ lalāṭaṃ nanu paṅkajākṣyāḥ // 5678	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āsvādito'si mohād bata viditā vadanamādhurī bhavataḥ / madhuliptakṣura rasanāc chedāya paraṃ vijānāsi // 5679	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āsvādyaṃ pramadāradacchada iva śravyaṃ navaṃ jalpitaṃ bālāyā iva dṛśyamuttamavadhūlāvaṇyalakṣmīriva / prodghoṣyaṃ ciraviprayuktavanitāsandeśavāṇīva me naivedyaṃ caritaṃ ca rūpamaniśaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa nāmāstu te // 5680	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsvādya nirviśeṣaṃ virahivadhūnāṃ mṛdūni māṃsāni / karakāmiṣeṇa manye niḥṣṭhīvati nīrado'sthīni // 5681	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āsvādya svayameva vacmi mahatīrmarmacchido vedanā mā bhūt kasyacidapyayaṃ paribhavo yācñeti saṃsāriṇaḥ / paśya bhrātariyaṃ hi gauravajarādhikkārakelisthalī mānamlānimasī guṇavyatikaraprāgalbhyagarbhacyutiḥ // 5682	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsvādyātra madhūni ṣaṭpada madaṃ mā gāḥ kaṣāyāṅkurair mākandasya pikān pratāritavato mūrdhānamadhyāsitaḥ / pratyāsannatame pike'pi bhavate yenārpitā tādṛśī mādhvī tasya vivekavicyutiriyaṃ sādguṇyametan na te // 5683	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āsvādyaiṣa kaṣāyamaṅkuramurupremānubaddhāśayo mākandasya yaśāṃsi kokilayuvā nirmāti digbhittiṣu / mādhvīkāni nipīya tasya madhupās tatraiva guñjantyamī ko brūtāmasatāṃ satāṃ ca vacasāṃ vartmātigaṃ ceṣṭitam // 5684	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhataṃ kucataṭena taruṇyāḥ sādhu soḍhamamuneti papāta / truṭyataḥ priyatamorasi hārāt puṣpavṛṣṭiriva mauktikavṛṣṭiḥ // 5685	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
āhate yatra khaḍge syād dhvaniḥ kākasvaropamaḥ / aṃ ākāradhvanirvā syāt sa varjyo narapuṃgavaiḥ // 5686	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhate yatra madhuro dhvaniḥ samupajāyate / pūjyaḥ sa khaḍgo nṛpateḥ śatrusaṃcayanāśanaḥ // 5687	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āhatya cinumaḥ svargam apavargamanukramāt / anukūle hi dāmpatye pratikūlaṃ na kiṃcana // 5688	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhatyāhatya mūrdhnā drutamanupibataḥ prasnutaṃ māturūdhaḥ kiṃcit kubjaikajānoranavaratacalaccārupucchasya dhenuḥ / utkarṇaṃ tarṇakasya priyatanayatayā dattahuṃkāramudrā visraṃsatkṣīradhārālavaśabalamukhasyāṅgamātṛpti leḍhi // 5689	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āha nāthavadanasya cumbataḥ sā sma śītakaratāmanakṣaram / sītkṛtāni sudatī vitanvatī sattvadattapṛthuvepathus tadā // 5690	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
āharannapi na svastho vinidro na prabudhyati / vakti na svecchayā kiṃcit sevako'pīha jīvati // 5691	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āharej jñānamarthāṃśca pumānamaravat sadā / gṛhīta iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmamācaret // 5692	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhave jagaduddaṇḍarājamaṇḍalarāhave / śrīnṛsiṃha mahīpāla svastyastu tava bāhave // 5693	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhaveṣu ca ye śūrāḥ svāmyarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ / bhartṛbhaktāḥ kṛtajñāśca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // 5694	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhaveṣu mitho'nyonyaṃ jighāṃsanto mahīkṣitaḥ / yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yāntyaparāṅmukhāḥ // 5695	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āha smaiṣā nalādanyaṃ na juṣe manaseti yat / yauvanānumitenāsyās tanmṛṣābhūn manobhuvā // 5696	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhāraṃ prati yat kathāpi śamitā yan maunamudrā mukhe yac cakṣurvinimīlanaṃ tanulatā yat tānave vartate / ekānte yadavasthitiryadapi ca dhyānaikatānaṃ manas tan manye subhaga tvadarthamanayā tapyeta tīvraṃ tapaḥ // 5697	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāraḥ phalamūlamātmarucitaṃ śayyā mahī valkalaṃ saṃvītāya paricchadaḥ kuśasamitpuṣpāṇi putrā mṛgāḥ / vastrānnāśrayadānabhogavibhavā niryantraṇāḥ śākhino mitrāṇītyadhikaṃ gṛheṣu gṛhiṇāṃ kiṃ nāma duḥkhādṛte // 5698	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāradoṣāya ca kākadīti syādākuṭāni dhvanitaṃ raṇāya / kekedhvaniṣṭhā kuvatī kikī ca trayaṃ tvidaṃ syāt puradūṣaṇāya // 5699	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhāranidrābhayamaithunāni sāmānyametat paśubhirnarāṇām / jñānaṃ narāṇāmadhiko viśeṣo jñānena hīnāḥ paśubhiḥ samānāḥ // 5700	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhāranirhāravihārayogāḥ susaṃvṛtā dharmavidā tu kāryāḥ / vāgbuddhikāryāṇi tapas tathaiva dhanāyuṣī guptatame tu kārye // 5701	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhārapānatāmbūlagandhamālyaphalādayaḥ / bhujyante yat sa bhogaśca tanmataḥ sādhusattamaiḥ // 5702	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhārabhojī kurute'numodaṃ naro vadhe sthāvarajaṅgamānām / tasyāpi tasmād duritānuṣaṅgam ityāha yas taṃ prati vacmi kiṃcit // 5703	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhāravarge sulabhe vicitre vimuktapāpe bhuvi vidyamāne / prārambhaduḥkhaṃ vividhaṃ prapoṣya cedasti gṛddhirna kimatti māṃsam // 5704	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhārāj jāyate vyādhir garbhāt krūraśca jāyate / alakṣmīkaśca śayyāyāṃ svapāṭhādāyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ // 5705	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhārārthaṃ karma kuryādanindyaṃ kuryāt taṃ ca prāṇasaṃdhāraṇārtham / prāṇā dhāryās tattvavijñānahetos tattvaṃ jñeyaṃ yena bhūyo na janma // 5706	śālinī [11: mttgg]
āhāre ca bhaved rogī naṣṭo garbhaśca maithune / nidrāyāṃ hriyate lakṣmīś cintāyāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvam // 5707	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhāre baḍavānalaśca śayane yaḥ kumbhakarṇāyate saṃdeśe badhiraḥ palāyanavidhau siṃhaḥ śṛgālo raṇe / andho vastunirīkṣaṇe'tha gamane khañjaḥ paṭuḥ krandane bhāgyenaiva hi labhyate punarasau sarvottamaḥ sevakaḥ // 5708	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāre viratiḥ samastaviṣayagrāme nivṛttiḥ parā nāsāgre nayanaṃ yadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ / maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamakhilaṃ yadviśvamābhāti te tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kimasi bhoḥ kiṃ vā viyoginyasi // 5709	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sukhī bhavet / dhanaṃ maitrīkaraṃ dāne cādāne śatrukāraṇam // 5710	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhāre śucitā dhvanau madhuratā nīḍe parādhīnatā bandhau nirmamatā vane rasikatā vācālatā mādhave / yasaite guṇarāśayaḥ pikavaraṃ tyaktvā kimete janā vandante khalu khañjanaṃ kṛmibhujaṃ citrā gatiḥ karmaṇām // 5711	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
āhāro garalaṃ tṛtīyamalike cakṣuḥ kapālaṃ kare vāsaḥ kuñjaracarma bhasmani ratirbhūṣā bhujaṅgādhipaḥ / janmālakṣyamasākṣikaṃ kulamavijñātā ca jātiḥ kathaṃ sevyo'smābhirasau piśācapariṣadbhartā hatāḥ smo vayam // 5712	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāro garalāyate pratidinaṃ hāro'pi bhārāyate candraścaṇḍakarāyate mṛdugatirvāto'pi vajrāyate / āvāso vipināyate malayajālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate hā hanta priyaviprayogasamayaḥ saṃhārakālāyate // 5713	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhāro dviguṇaḥ strīṇāṃ buddhis tāsāṃ caturguṇā / ṣaḍguṇo vyavasāyaśca kāmāś cāṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // 5714	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhitamuktāhāryaḥ samyak sakalaprayogasampattyā / bhāvavihīno'pi naṭaḥ sāmājikacittarañjanaṃ kurute // 5715	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
āhite tava niḥśāne sphuṭitaṃ ripuhṛdghaṭaiḥ / galite tatpriyānetre rājaṃś citramidaṃ mahat // 5716	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhite nu madhunā madhuratve ceṣṭitasya gamite nu vikāsam / ābabhau nava ivoddhatarāgaḥ kāminīṣvavasaraḥ kusumeṣoḥ // 5717	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ // 5718	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: na-vipulā)
āhuḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kiṃcid amātyaparirakṣaṇam / sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ tebhyo yadātmaparirakṣaṇam // 5719	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhutyāpyāyate sūryaḥ sūryād vṛṣṭirathauṣadhiḥ / tadannaṃ rasarūpeṇa śukratvamadhigacchati // 5720	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhūtaḥ parito digantagatibhiḥ śākhābharāḍambaraiḥ kiṃ re jālma javena śālmaliphalapratyāśayā dhāvasi / tasminn ekapade bhidelimaphalavyālolatūlotkarair adhvāno'pi nimīlitākṣamaṭatā na prekṣaṇīyāḥ puraḥ // 5721	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhūtasyābhiṣekāya nisṛṣṭasya vanāya ca / na mayā lakṣitas tasya svalpo'pyākāravibhramaḥ // 5722	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhūtādya mayotsave niśi gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ vimucyāgatā kṣībaḥ preṣyajanaḥ kathaṃ kulabadhūrekākinī yāsyati / vatsa tvaṃ tadimāṃ nayālayamiti śrutvā yaśodāgiro rādhāmādhavayorjayanti madhurasmerālasā dṛṣṭayaḥ // 5723	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vā vasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam / khadyoto'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram // 5724	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhūto'pi sahāyair emītyuktvā vimuktanidro'pi / āgantuko'pi pathikaḥ śaithilyaṃ naiva vijahāti // 5725	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āhūto malayācalāt pracalito mauhurtiko māruto nediṣṭhāḥ pathi santi kokilagaṇā gīte pratiṣṭhābhṛtaḥ / āptābhiḥ prativeśinībhirabhitaḥ saṃtyajya kundālayaṃ soṣyantī sahakārasaṃtatiraliśreṇībhirāveṣṭyate // 5726	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
āhūto vāpyanāhūto yo rājñāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhati / sa vai rājyaśriyaṃ bhuṅkte nāvamānī kadācana // 5727	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhūto hālikenāśrutamiva vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā kṣaṇaikaṃ tiṣṭhāsustabdharomā kathamapi viṭapaṃ niḥsamīraṃ vihāya / dorbhyāmāvṛtya vakṣaḥsthalamalasagatirdīnapādapracāraḥ śītkārotkampabhinnasphuṭadadharapuṭaḥ pāmaraḥ kṣetrameti // 5728	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
āhṛtābhyudyatāṃ bhikṣāṃ purastādapracoditām / mene prajāpatirgrāhyām api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ // 5729	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhṛtya parityaktā janayantyarthāḥ sukhābhāsam / atyantaparityaktāḥ paramānandāya kalpante // 5730	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇāpi yatnenāntarvirāgiṇī / asanmaitrī ca veśyā ca śrīśca kasya kadā sthirā // 5731	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhnikottāpadagdhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ jagatāṃ bata / tapanārciṣi śānte tad bhasmedaṃ timiraṃ tu na // 5732	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhlādayatveṣa kharairnakhāgrair daiteyavakṣaḥkhanimutkhanan vaḥ / prahlādahṛdyaṃ hṛdaye dvitīyam anveṣṭumicchanniva sūnuratnam // 5733	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
āhlādahetuniravadyaśarīrayaṣṭi- lāvaṇyakāntikaluṣīkaraṇena tāsām / āsīt kuśeśayadṛśāmayathārthataiva paryastabhāsvararucāmapi bhūṣaṇānām // 5734	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āhvānaṃ kiṃ bhavati hi taroḥ kasyacit praśnavijñāḥ prāyaḥ kāryaṃ kimapi na kalau kurvate ke pareṣām / pūrṇaṃ candraṃ vahati nanu kā pṛcchati mlānacakṣuḥ kenodanyājanitamasamaṃ kaṣṭamāpnoti lokaḥ // 5735	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat / tathāpi na tadākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // 5736	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ikṣutvakkṣodasārāḥ śakaṭasaraṇayo dhīradhūlīpatākāḥ pākasvīkāranamre śirasi niviśate śūkaśāleḥ śukālī / kedārebhyaḥ praṇālaiḥ praviśati śapharīpaṅktirādhāramārād acchaḥ kaccheṣu paṅkaḥ sukhayati saritāmātapādukṣapālam // 5737	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ikṣudaṇdāstilāḥ śūdrāḥ kāntā hema ca medinī / candanaṃ dadhi tāmbūlaṃ mardanaṃ guṇavardhanam // 5738	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ikṣurāpaḥ payo mūlaṃ tāmbūlaṃ phalamauṣadham / bhakṣayitvāpi kartavyāḥ snānadānādikāḥ kriyāḥ // 5739	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ikṣurdhanva śarāḥ prasūnavitatirbhṛṅgāvalī siñjinī yasyājñāvaśavartinaḥ pramanaso nirviṣṭarāṣṭrādayaḥ / yadbāṇābhihatā virañcimurajinmṛtyuṃjayendrādayo vyāptāśeṣamukhā iva tribhuvanaṃ pāyādajeyaḥ smaraḥ // 5740	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ikṣurnadīpravāho dyūtaṃ mānagrahaśca he sutanu / bhrūlatikā ca taveyaṃ bhaṅge rasamadhikamāvahati // 5741	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ikṣoragrāt kramaśaḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi yathā rasaviśeṣaḥ / tadvat sajjanamaitrī viparītānāṃ tu viparītā // 5742.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ikṣo rasaṃ yathādāya kūrcakas tyajyate janaiḥ / dharmasāraṃ tathādāya dehaṃ tyajati paṇḍitaḥ // 5742.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ikṣorvikārā matayaḥ kavīnāṃ gavāṃ raso bālakaceṣṭitāni / tāmbūlamagryaṃ yuvateḥ kaṭākṣā etānyaho śakra na santi nāke // 5743	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iṅgālasaptārciriva jvalitvā sarvaṃ dinaṃ caṇḍaruciḥ śaśāma / tadīyabhasmeva nabhohasantī vibhrājamānaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam // 5744	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iṅgitajñās tu magadhāḥ prekṣitajñās tu kosalāḥ / ardhoktāḥ kurupāñcālāḥ sarvoktā dakṣiṇāpathāḥ // 5745	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṅgitākāraceṣṭābhiḥ paracittapravedinaḥ / āptāḥ suśīghragā dūtā vāgmino mitabhāṣiṇaḥ // 5746	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṅgitākāratattvajña ūhāpohaviśāradaḥ / śūraśca kṛtavidyaśca na ca mānī vimatsaraḥ // 5747	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṅgitākāratattvajño balavān priyadarśanaḥ / apramādī sadā dakṣaḥ pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // 5748	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṅgitena nijarāganīradhiṃ saṃvibhāvya caṭubhirguṇajñatām / bhaktatāṃ ca paricaryayāniśaṃ sādhikādhikavaśaṃ vyadhatta tam // 5749	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
icchatāṃ saha vadhūbhirabhedaṃ yāminīvirahiṇāṃ vihagānām / āpureva mithunāni viyogaṃ laṅghyate na khalu kālaniyogaḥ // 5750	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
icchati mānī maraṇaṃ na ca gacchati vairiṇaḥ śaraṇam / mānakṣaraṇaṃ maraṇaṃ mānaprāṇasya kevalaṃ kṛtinaḥ // 5751	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
icchati śatī sahasraṃ sasahasraḥ koṭimīhate kartum / koṭiyuto'pi nṛpatvaṃ nṛpo'pi bata cakravartitvam // 5752	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
icchati śatī sahasraṃ sahasrī lakṣamīhate / lakṣādhipas tato rājyaṃ rājyācca svargamīhate // 5753	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
icchanti kecin narakeṣu vāsaṃ necchanti kecin narakeṣu vāsam / śreyo hi tasmān narakaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ na garbhavāsāt paramaṃ hi duḥkham // 5754	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
icchantyabhīkṣṇaṃ kṣayamātmano'pi na jñātayas tulyakulasya lakṣmīm / namanti śatrūn na ca bandhuvṛddhiṃ saṃtapyamānairhṛdayaiḥ sahante // 5755	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
icchāṃ sundarapāṇḍya unnatimatiṃ bibhrat svayā saṃjñayā niṣpādyābhyavahāravārayugalaṃ niṣkampasaṃpattikam / saṃpūrṇaṃ vidadhe gabhīramudaraṃ raṅgeśituḥ śārṅgiṇo yasyābhūd bhuvanaiś caturdaśabhirapyāpūraṇaṃ durlabham // 5756	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
icchec ced vipulāṃ maitrīṃ trīṇi tatra na kārayet / vāgvādamarthasaṃbandhaṃ tatpatnīparibhāṣaṇam // 5757	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
icchet paramanusartuṃ pratimāsaṃdarśanena viśadaruciḥ / anavāpya yenayogaṃ bhavato hṛdayeparaṃ nidhīyeta // 5758	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
icched yas tu sukhaṃ nivastumavanau gacchet sa rājñaḥ sabhāṃ kalyāṇīṃ girameva saṃsadi vadet kāryaṃ vidadhyāt kṛtī / akleśād dhanamarjayedadhipaterāvarjayed vallabhān kurvītopakṛtiṃ janasya janayet kasyāpi nāpakriyām // 5759	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ijyācāradamāhiṃsādānasvādhyāyakarmaṇām / ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo yad yogenātmadarśanam // 5760	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ijyādhyayanadānāni tapaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiḥ kṣamā / alobha iti mārgo'yaṃ dharmasyāṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // 5761	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pūrvaś caturvargo dambhārthamapi sevyate / uttaras tu caturvargo mahātmanyeva tiṣṭhati // 5762	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iḍayā saṃcaran vāyuḥ saumye kārye śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ / piṅgalāyāṃ tathā dīpte dvayoḥ kvāpi na śobhanaḥ // 5763	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca sarasvatī / gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā caiva nigadyate // 5764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alambuṣā kuhūścaiva śaṅkhinī daśamī matā / etāḥ prāṇavahā jñeyāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍikāḥ // 5765	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iḍā nāsāpuṭe vāme piṅgalā dakṣiṇe bhavet / suṣumṇā tālu bhittvaiva brahmadvāraṃ pravartitā // 5766	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iḍāyāṃ yadi bhūmyambutattve pravahatas tadā / sthirasaumyādikāryāṇām ārambhaḥ siddhikṛd bhavet // 5767	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iḍā somasya nāḍī syāt piṅgalā sūryanāḍikā / iḍā saumyā bhavet vāmā piṅgalogrā ca dakṣiṇā // 5768	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaḥ kākānīkaṃ pratibhayamitaḥ kauśikarutād ito gṛdhravyūhaḥ kulamidamitaḥ kaṅkavayasām / śmaśānāvasthe'sminnakhilaguṇavandhye hatamarāv api dvitrāḥ kecin na khalu kalavācaḥ śakunayaḥ // 5769	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ kekī nādais tudati śatakoṭipratibhaṭair itaḥ kāmaḥ kāmaṃ kaṭhinatarabāṇaiḥ praharati / ito garjatyuccairjaladharagaṇo bhīmaninadair vinā nāthaṃ jāne na sakhi bhavitā kiṃ nanu mama // 5770	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ krodho gṛdhraḥ prakaṭayati pakṣaṃ nijamitaḥ sṛgālī tṛṣṇeyaṃ vivṛtavadanā dhāvati puraḥ / itaḥ krūraḥ kāmo vicarati piśācaś ciramaho śmaśānaṃ saṃsāraḥ ka iha patitaḥ sthāsyati sukham // 5771	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrān vaidarbhi paśyānumatā mayāsi / evaṃvidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ // 5772	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
itaḥ paurastyāyāṃ kakubhi vivṛṇoti kramadalat- tamisrāmarmāṇaṃ kiraṇakaṇikāmambaramaṇiḥ / ito niṣkrāmantī navaratiguroḥ proñchati vadhūḥ svakastūrīpatrāṅkuramakarikāmudritamuraḥ // 5773	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā muhus tiṣṭhetyuccairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame / punardṛṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yat tat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām // 5774	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ prāleyāṃśuḥ pralayamakarot kairavakula- klamacchedotsekaiḥ kiraṇanikaraireṣa tamasām / ito'pyājñāvajñāṃ sakhi na sahate duḥsahatara- pratāpaḥ pañceṣus tadiha śaraṇaṃ sāhasarasaḥ // 5775	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ śuklā candradyutibhiriha raktāruṇakarais tamisrairapyantaḥskhalitagatibhirmecakaruciḥ / prabhātaśrīreṣā vilasati purasthā sukṛtināṃ mimaṅkṣūṇāṃ jahnudyumaṇividhijāsaṃgama iva // 5776	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ śociḥ prācyāṃ diśi diśati bhānoraruṇatām ito bhṛṅgaḥ kūjannabhikamalinīṃ proccalati ca / ito niryāntyuccairvihitasurataklāntiśithila- skhalatpādanyāsakṣaṇaraṇitamañjīramabalāḥ // 5777	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāptaśrīr neta evārhati kṣayam / viṣavṛkṣo'pi saṃvardhya svayaṃ chettumasāṃpratam // 5778	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaḥ svapiti keśavaḥ kulamitas tadīyadviṣām itaś ca śaraṇārthinaḥ śikharipatriṇaḥ śerate / ito'pi vaḍavānalaḥ saha samastasaṃvartakair aho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ // 5779	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
itaradeva bahirmukhamucyate hṛdi tu yat sphuratītaradeva tat / caritametadadhīravitārakaṃ dhuri payaḥpratibimbamivāsatām // 5780	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
itarapāpaphalāni yathecchayā vitara tāni sahe caturānana / arasikeṣu kavitvanivedanaṃ śirasi mā likha mā likha mā likha // 5781	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
itarabhajanaghanarasataḥ phalaniṣpattirnavā bhavediti na / muktāḥ paraṃ tu loke svātighanarasaṃ vinā na jāyeran // 5782	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
itarāṇyapi rakṣāṃsi peturvānarakoṭiṣu / rajāṃsi samarotthāni tacchoṇitanadīṣviva // 5783	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itarāścārthamicchanti rūpamicchanti dārikāḥ / jñātayaḥ kulamicchanti svargamicchanti tāpasāḥ // 5784	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaretarayantritoruyugmaṃ kaṭhinorustanapīḍitābhirāmam / bhujamūlaśayānugaṇḍamūlaṃ mithunaṃ syūtamivābhavan niśāyām // 5785	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
itaropāyaduḥsādhye caṇḍadaṇḍo mahīpatiḥ / aduṣṭāyatyasau nīter aśnāti vipulaṃ phalam // 5786	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaścañcaccūtacyutamadhucayā vānti caturāḥ samīrāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ diśi diśi diśanto madhulihām / niśānte kāntānāṃ smarasamarakeliśramamuṣo vijṛmbhante jṛmbhākalitakamalāmodasuhṛdaḥ // 5787	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaścandraḥ sāndraḥ smaramayavayaḥsaṃdhimadhuraḥ sphuranmugdhākelismitamiva mayūkhaiḥ sukhayati / cakorāṇāṃ cakraṃ kumudasamudāyo'pi ca śaran- niśārambhe'muṣmin samasamayamantarvikasati // 5788	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itaścetaścādbhirvighaṭitataṭaḥ seturudare dharitrī durlaṅghyā bahulahimapaṅko girirayam / idānīṃ nirvṛtte karituraganīrājanavidhau na jāne yātāras tava ca ripavaḥ kena ca pathā // 5789	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itastataś caṅkramaṇo rajobhiḥ krīḍanmanomattamataṅgajo'yam / yaḥ sarvadā pippalabhogatuṣṭas tacchāntaye tvaṃ harimāśrayasva // 5790	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
itastato bhaṣan bhūri na patet piśunaḥ śunaḥ / avadātatayā kiṃ ca na bhedo haṃsataḥ sataḥ // 5791	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itastato vātavidhūticañcalair nīrandhritāśāgaganairdhvajāṃśukaiḥ / lakṣaiḥ kvaṇatkāñcanakiṅkiṇīkulair amajji dhūlījaladhau nabhogate // 5792	upajāti jagatī: indravaṃśā [12: ttjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] atha vā vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
itastato vānti viśiṣya yasyāṃ vātāḥ śakṛdveśmavihāravisrāḥ / sā varṇyate rauravarājadhānī kena pratolī manasāpyagamyā // 5793	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
itastato'smin vilasanti meroḥ samānavapre maṇisānurāgāḥ / striyaśca patyau surasundarībhiḥ samā navapremaṇi sānurāgāḥ // 5794	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
itastāvan netre valaya malayādre nidhirapām apārastvatpādapraṇayaparatantro nivasati / athātmānaṃ kiṃ na smarasi kulaśailaṃ kimayaśaḥ- patākā sarpaughaiḥ pratiśikhariśākhāsu vahasi // 5795	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
itas trasadvidrutabhūbhṛdujjhitā priyātha dṛṣṭā vanamānavījanaiḥ / śaśaṃsa pṛṣṭādbhutamātmadeśajaṃ śaśitviṣaḥ śītalaśīlatāṃ kila // 5796	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti kṛtavacanāyāḥ kaścidabhyetya bibhyad galitanayanavāreryāti pādāvanāmam / karuṇamapi samarthaṃ mānināṃ mānabhede ruditamuditamastraṃ yoṣitāṃ vigraheṣu // 5797	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ / samārurukṣurdivamāyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopānaparaṃparāmiva // 5798	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti gadantamanantaramaṅganā bhujayugonnamanoccatarastanī / praṇayinaṃ rabhasādudaraśriyā valibhayālibhayādiva sasvaje // 5799	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iti gaditavatī ruṣā jaghāna sphuritamanoramapakṣmakeśareṇa / śravaṇaniyamitena kāntamanyā samamasitāmburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca // 5800	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti gantumicchumabhidhāya puraḥ kṣaṇadṛṣṭipātavikasadvadanām / svakarāvalambanavimuktagalat- kalakāñci kāṃcidaruṇat taruṇaḥ // 5801	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idamuktaṃ mayānagha / etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaśca bhārata // 5802	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
iti jagati na rakṣituṃ samarthaḥ kvacidapi kaścidapi prasahya nārīm / avati tu satataṃ viśuddha ekaḥ kulayuvatīṃ nijasattvapāśabandhaḥ // 5803	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
evaṃ cerṣyā nāma duḥkhaikahetur moghaḥ puṃsāṃ dveṣadāyī pareṣām / yo'yaṃ mā bhūd rakṣaṇāyāṅganānām atyautsukyaṃ pratyutāsāṃ tanoti // 5804	śālinī [11: mttgg]
iti tattvadhiyaḥ paricintya budhāḥ sakalasya janasya vinaśvaratām / na manāgapi cetasi saṃdadhate śucamaṅgayaśaḥsukhanāśakarām // 5805	toṭaka [12: ssss]
iti deva bhavatyudārasattvo dṛḍhabhaktaśca vilāsinījano'pi / avarodhasamo mahīpatīnāṃ kimutānyaḥ kulajaḥ purandhrilokaḥ // 5806	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iti deva sadaiva hāsyabhāvaṃ paribhāve ca janasya nindyatāṃ ca / vipadāspadatāṃ ca yānti mūḍhā iha santas tu bhavanti pūjanīyāḥ // 5807	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iti dvikṛtvaḥ śucimṛṣṭabhojināṃ dināni teṣāṃ katicin mudā yayuḥ / dviraṣṭasaṃvatsaravārasundarī- parīṣṭibhis tuṣṭimupeyuṣāṃ niśi // 5808	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti dharmatarormūlam aśuddhaṃ yasya mānasam / śuddhaṃ yasya ca tadrūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ // 5809	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti nikhilamudāramarthasārtha- praṇihitamekamiheva khaḍgaśāstre / giriśamatamidaṃ niṣevya cakre kṣitipatimantrisamūhacakravartī // 5810	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti netrādivikārair vaśamupanītaṃ pralīnadhairyāṅgam / māragrahābhibhūtaṃ parimṛṣṭaprāṅnirākṛtismaraṇam // 5811	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
prādurbhūtariraṃsaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jaghanadeśagatadṛṣṭim / pakvāmramiva vimokṣyasi pūrvavadācūṣya niḥśeṣam // 5812	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti pathi viniveśitātmano ripurapi gacchati sādhu mitratām / tadavanipatimatsarādṛte vinayaguṇena jagad vaśaṃ nayet // 5813	aparavaktra = [11: nnrlg] 1,3 + [12: njjr] 2,4
iti parigaṇitārthaḥ śāstramārgānusārī niyamayati yatātmā yaḥ prajā daṇḍanītyā / apunarapagamāya prāptamārgapracārā sarita iva samudraṃ saṃpadastaṃ viśanti // 5814	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iti pariṇayamitthaṃ yānamekatra yāne daracakitakaṭākṣaprekṣaṇaṃ cānayos tatat / divi diviṣadadhīśāḥ kautukenāvalokya praṇidadhuriva gantuṃ nākamānandasāndrāḥ // 5815	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
iti pūrvakarmaniyataṃ bhavitavyaṃ jagati yasya jantoryat / tadayatnena sa purataḥ patitaṃ prāpnotyasādhyamapi // 5816	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti prakupitoragapramukhabhaṅgurāṃ sarvadā nidhāya nijacetasi prabaladuḥkhadāṃ saṃsṛtim / vimuñcata parigrahagrahamanārjavaṃ sajjanā yadīcchata sukhāmṛtaṃ rasitumastasarvāśubham // 5817	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
iti pravīre subhage ca satyato vivekinīnāmapi deva yoṣitām / calaṃ mano dhāvati yatra kutracid viśuddhasattvā viralāḥ punaḥ striyaḥ // 5818	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti priye pṛcchati mānavihvalā kathaṃcidantardhṛtabāṣpagadgadam / na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yad vadhūḥ kiyan na tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam // 5819	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti bahubhirupāyaiḥ kuṭṭanī kāmukānāṃ kṛtasukṛtavihīnā vañcanāṃ sā kṛtaghnā   / vanabhuvi mṛgabandhaṃ hanta paśyanti nityaṃ tadapi hariṇaśāvāḥ kūṭapāśaṃ viśanti // 5820	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iti madamadanābhyāṃ rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭarāgān anavaratarataśrīsaṅginas tānavekṣya / abhajata parivṛttiṃ sātha paryastahastā rajaniravanatendurlajjayādhomukhīva // 5821	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iti muṣitadhiyaḥ śriyā prayāntyā rabhasavaśādavicintya dagdhabhūpāḥ / balabharabahumānataḥ pataṅga- vratamupayānti parapratāpadīpe // 5822	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti yasmādubhau lokau dhārayatyātmavān nṛpaḥ / prajānāṃ ca tataḥ samyag daṇḍaṃ daṇḍīva dhārayet // 5823	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti ratisamayopadeśayuktyā ratagurudarśitayā puraṃdhrilokaḥ / nijaparaparabhāgavṛttimaujjhīt smaraparamādvayabhūmikānilīnaḥ // 5824	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti rājaguṇānetān yathoktān yo'nutiṣṭhati / anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi pretya svarge mahīyate // 5825	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājyakalatramitraputrān gṛhadhāmaṃ ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ / gurusattvarajastamaḥ kalaṅkāṃ prakṛtiṃ hātumagād vanaṃ narendraḥ // 5826	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iti vacanaṃ bhūmipateḥ śrutvā mantrī vihasya sāsūyaḥ / tamuvāca kasya rājan veśyācarite'sti viśvāsaḥ // 5827	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti vadati sakhījane nimīlad- dviguṇitasāndratarākṣipakṣmamālā / apatadalibhayena bharturaṅkaṃ bhavati hi viklavatā guṇo'ṅganānām // 5828	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti vadati sakhījane'nurāgād dayitatamāmaparaś ciraṃ pratīkṣya / tadanugamavaśādanāyatāni nyadhita mimāna ivāvanīṃ padāni // 5829	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iti viracitabandhā paddhatiryā mayeyaṃ sakalaguṇigaṇānāṃ prītaye sāstu nityam / vipulavimaladīvyatsatkalānāṃ nidhānaṃ taruṇataraṇiruddhā vidviṣatkauśikānām // 5830	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ dharādhipam / parivṛddharāgamanubandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī // 5831	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
iti śāsati senānyāṃ gacchatas tānanekadhā / niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcit tasthe tatrāndhakāriṇā // 5832	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃsāraduḥkhārkatāpatāpitacetasām / vimuktipādapacchāyām ṛte kutra sukham nṛṇām // 5833	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saśarīrayā kṣaṇamiva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan saha viśarīrayā dayitayā virasān divasān / dinarajanīvihāraviparītamahaṃ caritai rathacaraṇāhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān // 5834	narkuṭaka [17: njBjjlg]
iti striyo devi mahākulodgatāḥ viśuddhadhīraiś caritairupāsate / sadaiva bhartāramananyamānasāḥ patiḥ satīnāṃ paramaṃ hi daivatabh // 5835	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti sphuṭaṃ tadvacasastayādarāt suraspṛhāropaviḍambanādapi / karāṅkasuptaikakapolakarṇayā śrutaṃ ca tadbhāṣitamaśrutaṃ ca tat // 5836	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti smaraḥ śīghramatiś cakāra taṃ vadhūṃ ca romāñcabhareṇa karkaśau / skhaliṣyati snigdhatanuḥ priyādiyaṃ mradīyasī pīḍanabhīrudoryugāt // 5837	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti sma rājā nayavartmanā vrajan samudyamī maṇḍalaśuddhimācaret / virājate sādhu viśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ śaracchaśīva pratirañjayan prajāḥ // 5838	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti sma rājā vinayaṃ nayānvito niṣevamāṇo naradevasevitam / padaṃ samākrāmati bhāsvaraṃ śriyaḥ śiro mahāratnagirerivonnatam // 5839	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
itihāsapurāṇāni śṛṇuyāt tadanantaram / bhuktavān viharec caiva strībhirantaḥpure saha // 5840.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ītihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet / bibhetyalpaśrutād vedo māmayaṃ pracariṣyati // 5840.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itihāsottamādasmāj jāyante kavibuddhayaḥ / pañcabhya iva bhūtebhyo lokasaṃvidhayas trayaḥ // 5841	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīrayitvā viratāṃ sa tāṃ punar girānujagrāhatarāṃ narādhipaḥ / virutya viśrāntavatīṃ tapātyaye ghanāghanaś cātakamaṇḍalīmiva // 5842	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
itīṣṭamapyaniṣṭāya jāyate'vidhinā kṛtam / tasmān na vidhimutsṛjya prājñaḥ kurvīta kiṃcana / aprekṣāpūrvakārī ca nindyate'vadyakṛt kṣaṇāt // 5843	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: jmnt], ajñātam [12: yjtr], ajñātam [12: mrsm], ajñātam [12: jrrj]
ito gaṅgābhaṅgā ghaṭitataṭabhaṅgā punarito davajvālā jvālājvalitatarumālā vanabhuvaḥ / saraṃhaḥ siṃho'gre dhvanati mama haṃho na hi gatir vinā daivaṃ daivaṃ hariṇaśiśurevaṃ pralapati // 5844	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ito dāvajvālaḥ sthalabhuva ito jālajaṭilā ito vyādho dhāvatyayamanupadaṃ vakritadhanuḥ / ito'pyagre tiṣṭhatyayamajagaro vistṛtamukhaḥ kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛgaśiśurayaṃ daivavaśagaḥ // 5845	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ito na kiṃcit parato na kiṃcid yato yato yāmi tato na kiṃcit / vicāryamāṇaṃ hi jagan na kiṃcit svātmāvabodhādadhikaṃ na kiṃcit // 5846	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ito bhraṣṭas tato bhraṣṭaḥ paramekāntiveṣabhāk / na samsārasukhaṃ tasya naiva muktisukhaṃ bhavet // 5847	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito mṛtyurito vyādhir ito vipadito jarā / caturaṅgā tulyabalā hanti lokamanityatā // 5848	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ito vidyutpuñjasphuritamasakṛd bhāvayatu mām itaḥ kekānekā haratu hṛdayaṃ nirdayamidam / itaḥ kāmo vāmaḥ praharatu muhuḥ puṅkhitaśaro gatāsi tvaṃ dūre capalanayane preyasi yataḥ // 5849	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ito vidyudvallīvilasitamitaḥ ketakataru- sphuradgandhaḥ prodyajjaladaninadasphūrjitamitaḥ / itaḥ kekikrīḍākalakalaravaḥ pakṣmaladṛśāṃ kathaṃ yāsyantyete virahadivasāḥ saṃbhṛtarasāḥ // 5850	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ito vipinapaṅktayas tilakitā rasālāṅkurair marunmalayabhūritaḥ kalamitaḥ pikīnāṃ rutam / itaśca navacampakaiḥ surabhitāḥ samantād diśas tadadya mayi tāṃ vinā bhajatu ghasmaratvaṃ smaraḥ // 5851	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ito hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyan na vidyate / yat tu durjana ityāha sajjanaṃ durjanaḥ svayam // 5852	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ kavikuṭumbasya vacāṃsi vicinoti yaḥ / aniddhavacanasyāpi tasya vaśyā sarasvatī // 5853	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ kelitatīrvihṛtya yamunākūle samaṃ rādhayā tadromāvalimauktikāvaliyuge veṇībhramaṃ bibhrati / tatrāhlādikucaprayāgaphalayorlipsāvatorhastayor vyāpārāḥ puruṣottamasya dadatu sphītaṃ mudāṃ saṃpadam // 5854	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
itthaṃ kriyāsu nivasantyapi yāsu tāsu puṃsāṃ śriyaḥ prabalasattvabahiṣkṛtāsu / evaṃ ca sāhasadhaneṣvatha buddhimatsu saṃtuṣya dānaniratāḥ kṣitipā bhavanti // 5855	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ityaihikena ca purā vihitena cāpi svenaiva karmavibhavena śubhāśubhena / śaśvad bhavet tadanurūpavicitrabhogaḥ sarvo hi nāma sasurāsura eṣa sargaḥ // 5856	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthaṃ copārjito yatnād guṇo'pi vidhure vidhau / saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye // 5857	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mūle hyavikṛte sadā sikte prajñānavāriṇā / nayālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣapādapaḥ // 5858	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
itthaṃ talpatalādhirohaṇamiyaṃ parṇārpaṇaprakriyā śayyāyā vacanakramasya dayitasyaivaṃvidhārādhanā / evaṃ keligṛhopadehali balādānīyamānā muhuś cāṭūktiprakaraiś ciraṃ navavadhūrālībhiradhyāpyate // 5859.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
itthaṃ tena nirīkṣitaṃ na ca mayāpyevaṃ samālokitas tenoktaṃ subhagena tatra na mayā dattaṃ vaco mandayā / tatsatyaṃ kathayāli kiṃ sa subhagaḥ kupyen na mahyaṃ gata ityuktvā sudṛśā kayāpi valitagrīvaṃ dṛśau sphārite // 5859.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
itthaṃ duravadhāryaiva strīcittasya gatiḥ kila / anyāsaktiṃ ca kurvanti mriyante ca patiṃ vinā // 5860	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ dharmārjitā lakṣmīr āsaṃtatyanapāyinī / itarā tu jalāpātatuṣārakaṇanaśvarī // 5861	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato yateta dharmeṇa dhanamarjayituṃ pumān / rājā tu sutarāṃ yena mūlaṃ rājyatarordhanam // 5862	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ vṛḍhataravāmita- manasāṃ puṃsāmasāṃprataṃ purataḥ / veśavilāsavatīnām aśarīraśaravyathākathanam // 5863	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
itthaṃ nārīrghaṭayitumalaṃ kāmibhiḥ kāmamāsan prāleyāṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śāntamānāntarāyāḥ / ācāryatvaṃ ratiṣu vilasanmanmamathaśrīvilāsā hrīpratyūhapraśamakuśalāḥ śīdhavaś cakrurāsām // 5864	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
itthaṃ paśupatipeśala- pāśakalīlāprayuktavakrokteḥ / harṣavaśataralatārakam ānanamavyād bhavānyā vaḥ // 5865	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
itthaṃ prajñaiva nāmeha pradhānaṃ lokavartanam / jīvatyarthadaridro'pi dhīdaridro na jīvati // 5866	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ phalati śuddhena siktaṃ saṃkalpavāriṇā / puṇyabījamapi svalpaṃ puṃsāṃ kṛṣikṛtāmiva // 5867	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeva dūṣitaṃ devi duṣṭasaṃkalpapāthasā / phalatyaniṣṭam ............ // 5868	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: jgl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
itthaṃ madhūtthaṃ rasamudgirantī tadoṣṭhabandūkadhanurvisṛṣṭā / karṇāt prasūnāśugapañcabāṇī vāṇīmiṣeṇāsya mano viveśa // 5869	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
itthaṃ yuktimupāyānāṃ kurvāṇasya catuṣṭayīm / vrajatīnduprabhāgauraṃ parairakṣayyatāṃ yaśaḥ // 5870	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ vihṛtya vanitābhirudasyamānaṃ pīnastanorujaghanasthalaśālinībhiḥ / utsarpitormicayalaṅghitatīradeśam autsukyanunnamiva vāri puraḥ pratasthe // 5871	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthaṃ sabhāpatirbhūtvā yaḥ kāvyāni parīkṣate / yaśas tasya jagadvyāpi sa sukhī tatra tatra ca // 5872	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ samutthavirahānalatīvratāpa- saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam / dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ // 5873	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthaṃ subuddhiralpena deva yatnena bodhyate / na kṛcchreṇāpi mahatā nirvicāramatiḥ punaḥ // 5874	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
itthaṃ svadurnayavipākavaśena divyāḥ śāpacyutā hyavataranti manuṣyaloke / bhuktvā phalaṃ taducitaṃ ca nijāṃ gatiṃ te pūrvārjitena sukṛtena punaḥ prayānti // 5875	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthamārādhyamāno'pi kliśnāti bhuvanatrayam / śāmyet pratyapakāreṇa nopakāreṇa durjanaḥ // 5876	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityaguhyaṃ nigūhante guhyaṃ prakaṭayanti ca / maurkhyābhimānenādātuṃ mūrkhāḥ pratyayamātmani // 5877	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityaṅgaiḥ saṃyutaḥ sarvair dehino bālakākṛtiḥ / māturāhārarasato dehe garbho'bhivardhate // 5878	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityajñānatamaśchannāḥ svadoṣonmārgagāminaḥ / apuraskṛtasacchāstradīpā bhraśyanti niścitam // 5879	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityanarthāya śabdaikaparo tātparyavij jaḍaḥ // 5880	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
ityanudvegaśīlā ye bhavyā dhairyāvalambanāḥ / dūrabhraṣṭāmapi nijāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti te // 5881	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityanyadupacāreṇa mitramanyat tu satyataḥ / tulye'pi snigdhatāyoge tailaṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ghṛtam // 5882	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityanyaraktacittā strībhujaṅgī hantyasaṃśayam // 5883	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
ityabuddhidhanādhānanidhānairvividhodayaiḥ / kūṭapaṇyairasāmānyais tāruṇyamativāhyate // 5884	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityarthalobhān mithyaiva vijñānakhyāpanecchavaḥ / mūrkhāḥ putramapi ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān // 5885	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvāmutkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva / śroṣyatyasmāt paramavahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcidūnaḥ // 5886	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
ityādiguṇasaṃpanne lokayātrāvidi sthire / nirvṛtaḥ pitarīvāste yatra lokaḥ sa pārthivaḥ // 5887	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi dūṣyān saṃdūṣya prajānāmabhivṛddhaye / vinayañ śriyamutkarṣaṃ rājā śalyaṃ samuddharet // 5888	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktavatyā yadalopi lajjā sānaucitī cetasi naś cakāstu / smaras tu sākṣī tadadoṣatāyām unmādya yas tattadavīvadat tām // 5889	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ityudgate śaśini peśalakāntadūtī- saṃlāpasaṃcalitalocanamānasābhiḥ / agrāhi maṇḍanavidhirviparītabhūṣā- vinyāsahāsitasakhījanamaṅganābhiḥ // 5890	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ityetat tapaso devā mahābhāgyaṃ pracakṣate / sarvasyāsya prapaśyantas tapasaḥ puṇyamudbhavam // 5891	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityetāḥ kuṭilatarāḥ krūrācārā gatatrapāś capalāḥ / yo nāma vetti rāmāḥ sa strībhirṇaiva vañcyate matimān // 5892	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ityevaṃ bahuhṛdayā bahujihvā bahukarāś ca bahumāyāḥ / tattvena satyarahitāḥ ko jānāti sphuṭaṃ veśyāḥ // 5893	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ityevaṃ yoṣito rājan bhedasya vyasanasya ca / parābhavasya ca padaṃ sevetāśaṅkito'tha tāḥ // 5894	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
idaṃ kavivarairnityam ākhyānamupajīvyate / udayaprepsubhirbhṛtyair abhijāta iveśvaraḥ // 5895	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ kiṃ te nyastaṃ valayini kare vaktrakamalaṃ na yuktaḥ kopo'yaṃ praṇayini nirāgasyapi jane / bruvāṇe mayyevaṃ śvasanaviṣamotkampitakucaṃ mṛgākṣyās tatkālaṃ nayanajalamevottaramabhūt // 5896	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapus tapaḥkṣamaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati / dhruvaṃ sa nīlotpalapatradhārayā samillatāṃ chettumṛṣirvyavasyati // 5897	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kāryam idamanyat kṛtākṛtam / evamīhāsukhāsaktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe // 5898	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama nanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenātha bhavatu / purā yenaivaṃ me ciramanusṛtā cittapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ // 5899	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ ca tvāṃ sarvaparaṃ bravīmi puṇyaṃ padaṃ tāta mahāviśiṣṭam / na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād dharmaṃ tyajej jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ // 5900	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgl], ajñātam [11: tttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
idaṃ jñeyamidaṃ jñeyam iti yas tṛṣitaś caret / api kalpasahasreṣu naiva jñeyamavāpnuyāt // 5901	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ tat kālindītaṭamiha hi kaṃsāsurabhido yaśaḥ śṛṇvad vaktraṃ skhalitakavalaṃ gokulamabhūt / bhramād veṇukvāṇapraṇayamasṛṇottāramadhura- svarābhirgopībhirdiśi diśi samudgīrṇamaniśam // 5902	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ tat snehasarvasvaṃ samamāḍhyadaridrayoḥ / acandanamanauśīraṃ hṛdayasyānulepanam // 5903	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ tāvac citraṃ yadavanitale pārvaṇaśaśī kalaṅkādunmuktaḥ kimapi ca tadantarvilasati / pravālaṃ māṇikyaṃ kuvalayadalaṃ manmathadhanur manovīṇāvādadhvaniriti mahaccitramadharam // 5904	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ te kenoktaṃ kathaya kamalātaṅkavadane yadetasmin hemnaḥ kaṭakamiti dhatse khalu dhiyam / idaṃ tad duḥsādhākramaṇaparamāstraṃ smṛtibhuvā tava prītyā cakraṃ karakamalamūle vinihitam // 5905	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ tvihotpātayugaṃ prthivyāṃ mahābhayaṃ śākunikā vadanti / yad vāyaso maithunasaṃniviṣṭo dṛśyeta yad vā dhavalaḥ kadācit // 5906	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
idaṃ dūrvākāṇḍadyutimuṣi kapole katipayaiḥ śramāmbhobhiḥ kīrṇaṃ sahajabakulāmodasubhagam / samākāṅkṣe tāmrādharamanumanuṣva priyatame manojñaṃ te pātuṃ mukhakamalamāghrātumathavā // 5907	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ nabhasi bhīṣaṇabhramadulūkakolāhale niśācaravilāsinīnivahadattanetrotsave / parisphurati nirbharapracurapaṅkamagnollasad- varāhakulamāṃsalaṃ prabalabandamandhaṃ tamaḥ // 5908	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
idaṃ nāsīn na cotpannaṃ na cāsīn na bhaviṣyati / tat tad brahmaiva sadrūpam idamitthamavasthitam // 5909	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ nṛpaprārthibhirujjhito'rthibhir maṇipraroheṇa vivṛdhya rohaṇaḥ / kiyaddinairambaramāvariṣyate mudhā munirvindhyamarundha bhūdharam // 5910	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ paramasundaraṃ tanupuraṃ kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ nivārya khalu śaiśavaṃ svayamanena nītaṃ balāt / tadāgamanaśaṅkayā makaraketunā kiṃ kṛtaṃ payodharadharādharau trivalivāhinīdustarau // 5911	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
idaṃ prakṛtyā viṣayairvaśīkṛtaṃ parasparastrīdhanalolupaṃ jagat / sanātane vartmani sādhusevite pratiṣṭhate daṇḍabhayopapīḍitam // 5912	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ prāyo loke na paricitapūrvaṃ nayanayor na yācñā yat puṃsaḥ suguṇaparimāṇaṃ laghayati / viśadbhirviśvātmā svavapuṣi baliprārthanakṛte trapālīnairaṅgairyadayamabhavad vāmanatanuḥ // 5913	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśaṃ dhārāsaṃnihitānalam / smaraṇaṃ yasya daityastrīgarbhapātāya kalpate // 5914	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ madaṃ candramasaḥ samantād asmatsapatnasya hariṣyatīti / yasmin purandhrīvadanasyalakṣmīṃ nijāṃ vyadhuḥ prābhṛtamambujāni // 5915	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
idaṃ yugasahasreṣu bhaviṣyadabhavad dinam / tadapyadyatvamāpannaṃ kā kathā maraṇāvadheḥ // 5916	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ labdhamidaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ lapsye manoratham / idaṃ cintayatāmeva jīrṇamāyuḥ śarīriṇām // 5917	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ vaktraṃ sākṣād virahitakalaṅkaḥ śaśadharaḥ sudhādhārādhāraś cirapariṇataṃ bimbamadharaḥ / ime netre rātriṃdivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ // 5918	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ viśvaṃ kuṭumbo na iti yeṣāṃ suniścayaḥ / te śāntāḥ paramodārāḥ keṣāṃ vandyā na sādhavaḥ // 5919	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ viśvaṃ pālyaṃ vidhivadabhiyuktena manasā priyāśoko jīvaṃ kusumamiva gharmo glapayati / svayaṃ kṛtvā tyāgaṃ vilapanavinodo'pyasulabhas tadadyāpyucchvāso bhavati nanu lābho hi ruditam // 5920	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ vyomasaromadhye bhāti candrasitotpalam / malino'ntargato yatra kalaṅko bhramarāyate // 5921	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ śarīraṃ puruṣasya mohajaṃ yathā pṛthag bhautikamīyate gṛham / yathaudakaiḥ pārthivataijasairjanaḥ kālena jāto vikṛto vinaśyati // 5922	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
yathānalo dāruṣu bhinna īyate yathānilo dehagataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ / yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na sajjate tathā pumān sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ paraḥ // 5923	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ śarīraṃ ślathasaṃdhi jarjaraṃ patatyavaśyaṃ pariṇāmadurvaham / kimauṣadhaṃ pṛcchasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayaṃ kṛṣṇarasāyanaṃ piba // 5924	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ śītaṃ pāthaḥ pibata pathikā muñcata manāk pathaḥ śrāntiṃ kāntāsmṛtijanitacintādviguṇitām / iti sphītāpāṅgaṃ mṛdumadhuravāgbhaṅgihasitaṃ prapāpālīmālā harati taruṇānāṃ pathi gatim // 5925	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idaṃ svajanadehajātanayamātṛbhāryāmayaṃ vicitramiha kenacid racitamindrajālaṃ nanu / kva kasya kathamatra ko bhavati tattvato dehinaḥ svakarmavaśavartinas tribhuvane nijo vā paraḥ // 5926	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
idaṃ svastyayanaṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ buddhivivardhanam / idaṃ yaśasyaṃ satatam idaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param // 5927	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhadattayoḥ / avicyuto'rthaḥ kavibhirnirūpito yaduttamaślokaguṇānuvarṇanam // 5928	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
idaṃ hi prāṇayaśasaṃ krayavikrayapattanam / svāmisatkāraśalyānām atraivoddharaṇī kriyā // 5929	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ hi māhātmyaviśeṣasūcakaṃ vadanti cihnaṃ mahatāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ / mano yadeṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbhave prayāti no harṣaviṣādavaśyatām // 5930	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idaṃ hi vaidagdhyarahasyamuttamaṃ paṭhen na sūktiṃ kavimāninaḥ puraḥ / na kevalaṃ tāṃ na vibhāvayatyasau svakāvyabandhena vināśayatyapi // 5931	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
idamananyaparāyaṇamanyathā hṛdayasaṃnihite hṛdayaṃ mama / yadi samarthayase madirekṣaṇe madanabāṇahato'smi hataḥ punaḥ // 5932	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
idamanucitamakramaś ca puṃsāṃ yadiha jarasyapi mānmatho vikāraḥ / yadapi ca na kṛtaṃ nitambinīnāṃ stanapatanāvadhi jīvitaṃ rataṃ vā // 5933	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
idamanuditahotuḥ ko'pi homāvasāna- jvaladanalamavādīt kuṇḍamākhaṇḍalasya / maṇighaṭamabhiṣeke prātarasyocureke kalitakiraṇatoyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ caṇḍabhāsaḥ // 5934	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamantaramupakṛtaye prakṛticalā yāvadarthisaṃpadiyam / vipadi niyatodayāyāṃ punarupakartuṃ kuto'vasaraḥ // 5935	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam / yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotir ā saṃsārān na dīpyate // 5936	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamanyac ca devarṣe rahasyaṃ sarvayoṣitām / dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hṛdyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // 5937	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamapaṭu kapāṭaṃ jarjaraḥ pañjaro'yaṃ viramati na gṛhe'smin krūramārjārayātrā / śuka mukulitajihvaṃ sthīyatāṃ kiṃ vacobhis tava vacanavinode nādaraḥ pāmarāṇām // 5938	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamaparamadbhutatamaṃ yuvatisahasrairvilupyamānasya / vṛddhirbhavati na hānir yat tava saubhāgyakoṣasya // 5939	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
idamapāsya virāgi parāgiṇīr alikadambakamamburuhāṃ tatīḥ / stanabhareṇa jitastabakānaman- navalate valate'bhimukhaṃ tava // 5940	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
idamapratimaṃ paśya saraḥ sarasijairvṛtam / sakhe mā jalpa nārīṇāṃ nayanāni dahanti mām // 5941	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamamṛtamameyaṃ seyamānandasindhur madhumadhuramapīdaṃ kiṃcidantardhunoti / yadayamudayalīlīlālasānāṃ vadhūnāṃ rativinimayabhājāṃ kelibhiryāti kālaḥ // 5942	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamamlānamānāyā lagnaṃ stanataṭe tava / chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi // 5943	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamayuktamaho mahadeva yad varatanoḥ smarayatyanilo'nyadā / smṛtasayauvanasoṣmapayodharān satuhinas tu hinastu viyoginaḥ // 5944	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
idamaśiśirairantastāpād vivarṇamaṇīkṛtaṃ niśi niśi bhujanyastāpāṅgaprasāribhiraśrubhiḥ / anabhilulitajyāghātāṅkaṃ muhurmaṇibandhanāt kanakavalayaṃ srastaṃ srastaṃ mayā pratisāryate // 5945	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
idamasulabhavastuprārthanādurnivāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti / kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupatrair upavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅkureṣu // 5946	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamaskhalitaṃ dhāraya vāraya paruṣākṣarā vācaḥ / ekaḥ sakalajanānāṃ jagati ripuḥ paruṣavāk puruṣaḥ // 5947	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
idamahaṃ karuṇāmṛtasāgaraṃ śaśikiśoraśiromaṇimarthaye / vrajatu janmani janmani me vapur bhavadupāsanasādhanatāmiti // 5948	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
idamābhāti gagane bhindānaṃ saṃtataṃ tamaḥ / amandanayanānandakaraṃ maṇḍalamaindavam // 5949	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamidamiti bhūruhāṃ prasūnair muhuratilobhayatā puraḥpuro'nyā / anurahasamanāyi nāyakena tvarayati rantumaho janaṃ manobhūḥ // 5950	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
idamidamiti samyak karmaṇā yojanīyaṃ niyatamiti vicintya prāpayedīhamānaḥ / sunayapihitarandhraḥ prākṛto yasya vargaḥ kṣitipatirupabhuṅkte sa trivargaṃ cirāya // 5951	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamucchvasitālakaṃ mukhaṃ tava viśrāntakathaṃ dunoti mām / niśi suptamivaikapaṅkajaṃ viratābhyantaraṣaṭpadasvanam // 5952	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
idamuddiśya vayasyāḥ svasamīhitadaivataṃ namata / yamunaiva jānudaghnī bhavatu na vā nāviko'stvaparaḥ // 5953	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
idamupahitasūkṣmagranthinā skandhadeśe stanayugapariṇāhācchādinā valkalena / vapurabhinavamasyāḥ puṣyati svāṃ na śobhāṃ kusumamiva pinaddhaṃ pāṇdupatrodareṇa // 5954	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
idamubhayabhittisaṃtata- hāraguṇāntargataikakucamukulam / guṭikādhanuriva bālā- vapuḥ smaraḥ śrayati kututena // 5955	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
idametat kariṣyāmi tata etad bhaviṣyati / saṃkalpaḥ kriyate yo'yaṃ na taṃ mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣate // 5956	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva kalerasya madavisphūrjitaṃ mahat / yan me manorathāvāptiḥ na rāmabhajanādapi // 5957	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva narendrāṇāṃ svargadvāramanargalam / yadātmanaḥ pratijñā ca prajā ca paripālyate // 5958	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva paraṃ maurkhyam upāyaistribhirujjhitam / parākramante yuddheṣu samamevobhaye bhaṭāḥ // 5959	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
idameva mahad dhairyaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ sutapasvinām / vighnavantyapi saṃprāpya yad vighnairna vihanyate // 5960	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva hi janmaphalaṃ jīvitaphalametadeva yat puṃsām / laṭahanitambavatījana- saṃbhogasukhena yāti tāruṇyam // 5961	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
idameva hi nirṇītaṃ paiśunyād duḥkhasaṃgamaḥ / anyārthaṃ khanato gartaṃ kūpe pātaḥ suniścitaḥ // 5962	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva hi pāṇḍityaṃ cāturyamidameva hi / idameva subuddhitvam āyādalpataro vyayaḥ // 5963	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idameva hi pāṇḍityam iyameva kulīnatā / ayameva paro dharma āyādalpataro vyayaḥ // 5964	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ tīvrābhirdahana iva bhābhiḥ parigato mamāścaryaṃ sūryaḥ kimu sakhi rajanyāmudayate / ayaṃ mugdhe candraḥ kimiti mayi tāpaṃ prakaṭayaty anāthānāṃ bāle kimiha viparītaṃ na bhavati // 5965	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idānīṃ tu mayā jñātaṃ tyāgān nāsti paraṃ sukham / nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti cakṣuḥsamaṃ balam // 5966	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ plakṣāṇāṃ jaṭharadalaviśleṣacaturaḥ śikhānāmābandhaḥ sphurati śukacañcūpuṭanibhaḥ / tataḥ strīṇāṃ hanta kṣamamadharakāntiṃ kalayituṃ samantān niryāti sphuṭasubhagarāgaṃ kisalayam // 5967	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idānīṃ vaṃśīnāṃ śabaramithunocchṛṅkhalarahaḥ- kriyāsakhyenālaṃ girivanasaridgrāmasuhṛdām / sphurallomaśyāmacchagalaśiśukarṇapratisama- cchadāgrābhis tvagbhirvalayitakarīrās taṭabhuvaḥ // 5968	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
idānīṃ santu kāvyāni bahūni jagatītale / yadādarśamayaṃ kāvyam ādyaṃ tat tu tadeva hā // 5969	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīmaṅgamakṣāli racitaṃ cānulepanam / idānīmeva te kṛṣṇa dhūlīdhūsaritaṃ vapuḥ // 5970	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīmarghanti prathamakalamacchedamuditā navāgrānnasthālīparimalamuco hālikagṛhāḥ / udañcaddorvallīraṇitavalayābhiryuvatibhir gṛhītaprotkṣiptabhramitamasṛṇodgīrṇamuśalāḥ // 5971	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
inaḥ sa eva sevyo yaḥ svālokena sudhāmucā / dvijendramaṇḍalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ samagrayati saṃpadā // 5972	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indindirairnirbharagarbhamīṣad- unmeṣavaccampakapuṣpamāsīt / hiraṇmayaṃ śāsanalekhahetoḥ sajjaṃ maṣībhāṇḍamiva smarasya // 5973	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indindiro marande vimukho yadi kiṃ nu madhuni māhātmyam / rasiko vāñchati no cet rāgādharabimbamasya ko bhūmā   // 5974	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
indīvaraṃ locanayos tulāyai nirmāya yatnena vidhiḥ kadācit / atulyatāṃ vīkṣya tato rajāṃsi nikṣipya cikṣepa sa paṅkamadhye // 5975	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indīvaradalaśyāmam indirānandakandalam / vandārujanamandāraṃ vande'haṃ yadunandanam // 5976	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indīvaraśyāmatanurnṛpo'sau tvaṃ rocanāgauraśarīrayaṣṭiḥ / anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye vāṃ yogas taḍittoyadayorivāstu // 5977	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indīvarasyāntarametadasyā netrotpalasyāpi yato himāṃśoḥ / tviṣo'pi naikaṃ sahate mukhākhyam ākramya tasthāvaparaṃ śaśāṅkam // 5978	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indīvarākṣi tava tīvrakaṭākṣabāṇa- pātavraṇe dvitayamauṣadhameva manye / ekaṃ tavādharasudhārasapānamanyad uttuṅgapīnakucakuṅkumapaṅkalepaḥ // 5979	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
indīvarākṣyāḥ sphuṭavidrumoṣṭhyāḥ saṃketamuddiśya vane carantyāḥ / cauraiḥ samastābharaṇāni hṛtvā nāsāmaṇirno'pahṛtaḥ kimetat // 5980	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indīvareṇa nayanaṃ mukhamambujena kundena dantamadharaṃ navapallavena / aṅgāni campakadalaiḥ sa vidhāya vedhāḥ kānte kathaṃ ghaṭitavānupalena cetaḥ // 5981	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
indīvarodarasahodarameduraśrīr vāso dravatkanakavṛndanibhaṃ dadhānaḥ / āmuktamauktikamanoharahāravakṣāḥ ko'yaṃ yuvā jagadanaṅgamayaṃ karoti // 5982	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
induṃ kairaviṇīva kokapaṭalīvāmbhojinīvallabhaṃ meghaṃ cātakamaṇḍalīva madhupaśreṇīva puṣpavrajam / mākandaṃ pikasundarīva ramaṇīvātmeśvaraṃ proṣitaṃ cetovṛttiriyaṃ sadā nṛpavara tvāṃ draṣṭumutkaṇṭhate // 5983	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ taṇḍulakhaṇḍamaṇḍalaruciṃ nityoditaṃ jātucid darśe meghagharaṭṭaghaṭṭanagaladdehaṃ vidhatte vidhiḥ / nūnaṃ lokahitecchayā kirati yat saṃtarpaṇaṃ sarvataḥ śubhrādabhraviśiṣṭapiṣṭaruciraṃbhūmau tuṣāraṃ divaḥ // 5984	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindati cakravākayugalaṃ bhāsāṃ nidhiṃ kauśikaḥ svādukṣīramarocakī sukṛtinaṃ pāpī jaḍaḥ paṇḍitam / tyaktaṃ sarvajanaiḥ khalaḥ kaṭuvacā grāmyaḥ pumān nāgaraṃ kaḥ paitāmahagolake'tra nikhilaiḥ saṃmānito vartate // 5985	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindati candanaṃ na sahate mallīsrajaṃ nekṣate hāraṃ dveṣṭi sitābjamujjhati bisastomaṃ nigṛhṇāti ca / śrībhūpāla mahīdhareṣu vipineṣvambhodhitīreṣu ca tvatkīrtis tvadaripriyā ca vilasatyuccaiḥ sphuratpāṇḍimā // 5986	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindati candanaṃ na sahate vidveṣṭi paṅkeruhaṃ hāraṃ bhāramavaiti naiva kurute karpūrapūre manaḥ / svargaṅgāmavagāhate himagiriṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgate yatkīrtirvirahātureva na manāgekatra viśrāmyati // 5987	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindati taskaro gṛhapatiṃ jāro suśīlaṃ khalaḥ sādhvīmapyasatī kulīnamakulo jahyāj jarantaṃ yuvā / vidyāvantamanakṣaro dhanapatiṃ nīcaś ca rūpojjvalaṃ vairūpyeṇa hataḥ prabuddhamabudhotkṛṣṭaṃ nikṛṣṭo janaḥ // 5988	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindati padmakhaṇḍakadalītalpaṃ na vā manyate karpūraṃ kirati prayāti na ratiṃ prāleyadhārāgṛhe / kiṃ vānyat tava viprayogaśikhinā sā dahyamānā muhus tvāmantarhṛdayasthitaṃ davabhayān netrāmbubhiḥ siñcati // 5989	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ nindatu nāma vātha nalinīṃ nindantu cakrāhvayā naivānena sudhākarasya suṣamāhānirna vā duryaśaḥ / etenaiva kṛtārthatāsya janatā yanmodamālambate yajjyotsnāsu ciraṃ cakorapariṣac cañcūpuṭaṃ nyasyati // 5990	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induṃ mukhād bahutṛṇaṃ tava yad gṛṇanti nainaṃ mṛgas tyajati tan mṛgatṛṣṇayaiva / atyeti mohamahimā na himāṃśubimba- lakṣmīviḍambimukhi vittiṣu pāśavīṣu // 5991	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
induṃ vetti divākaraṃ malayajaṃ dāvānalaṃ manyate jānātyambujamulmukaṃ kalayati prāleyatalpaṃ citām / hārāṅgārakadarthitena manasā sṛṣṭiṃ samastāmimāṃ saṃpratyagnimayī na vetti subhagā tyaktā varākī tvayā // 5992	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametat kimambu kutra gatam / lalitasavilāsavacanair mukhamiti hariṇākṣi niścitaṃ parataḥ // 5993	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
induḥ prayāsyati vinaṅkṣyati tārakaśrīḥ sthāsyanti līḍhatimirā na maṇipradīpāḥ / andhaṃ samagramapi kīṭamaṇe bhaviṣyaty unmeṣameṣyati bhavānapi durametat // 5994	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
induprabhārasavidaṃ vihagaṃ vihāya kīrānane sphurasi bhārati kā ratis te / ādyaṃ yadi śrayasi jalpatu kaumudīnāṃ govindarājavacasāṃ ca viśeṣameṣaḥ // 5995	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
indubimbādivotkīrṇaṃ padmagarbhādivoddhṛtam / vadanaṃ tava tanvaṅgi vimṛśadbhirvibhāvyate // 5996.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indubhāskarayoryatra nabhaḥsaṃcārakhinnayoḥ / patākāḥ pavanādhūtāḥ bhajante tālavṛntatām // 5996.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indumindumukhi lokaya lokaṃ bhānubhānubhiramuṃ paritaptam / vījituṃ rajanihastagṛhītaṃ tālavṛntamiva nālavihīnam // 5997	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
indumindradigasūta sarasvān uttaraṅgabhujarājiranṛtyat / ujjaharṣa jhaṣaketuravāpuḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ kumudabandhanamokṣam // 5998	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
indumukhī kumudākṣī rambhorū kamalacārukaracaraṇā / amṛtadravalāvaṇyā hṛdayagatā devi kiṃ dahasi // 5999	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
indurinduriti kiṃ durāśayā bindureṣa payaso vilokyate / nanvidaṃ vijayate mṛgīdṛśaḥ śyāmakomalakapolamānanam // 6000	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
indurmūrdhni śivasya śailaduhiturvakro nakhāṅkaḥ stane deyād vo'bhyudayaṃ dvayaṃ tadupamāmālambamānaṃ mithaḥ / samvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dalatā kāyaikatāyāṃ tayor ūrdhvadvāravicintitena ca hṛdi dhyātasvarūpeṇa ca // 6001	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induryatra na nindyate na madhuraṃ dūtīvacaḥ śrūyate nālāpā nipatanti bāṣpakaluṣā nopaiti kārśyaṃ tanuḥ / svādhīnāmanukūlinīṃ svagṛhiṇīmāliṅgya yat supyate tat kiṃ prema gṛhāśramavratamidaṃ kaṣṭaṃ samācaryate // 6002	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induryadyudayādrimūrdhni na bhavatyadyāpi tan mā sma bhūn nāsīre'pi tamaḥsamuccayamamūrunmūlayanti tviṣaḥ / apyakṣṇormudamudgiranti kumudairāmodayante diśaḥ saṃpratyūrdhvamasau tu lāñchanamabhivyaṅktuṃ prakāśiṣyate // 6003	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indurlipta ivāñjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭirmṛgīṇāmiva pramlānāruṇimeva vidrumadalaṃ śyāmeva hemaprabhā / kārkaśyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣviva prastutaṃ sundaryāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ sagarhā iva // 6004	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
induvratasahasraṃ tu cared yaḥ kāyaśodhanam / pibed yaś cāpi gaṅgāmbhaḥ samau syātāṃ na vā samau // 6005	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indus tvadyaśasā jito'vanipate bhāsāṃnidhis tejasā kandarpo vapuṣā sudhājalanidhirvāco vilāsena ca / tathyaṃ te jayaśīlametadadhunā tvaddānamaddainyayor madhye kaṃ nu vijeṣyatīti viṣaye dolāyate me manaḥ // 6006	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indūdayaś candanaminduvaktraś caitras tathā yasya mahāya saṃpat / vapuś ca śṛṅgāramayaṃ sa manye saṃtāpakas tvaṃ haravahniyogāt // 6007	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indoḥ kalākalāpena paṅktikramaniveśinā / sarvaduḥkhāpanodāya bālakānāṃ kṛtā bhujāḥ // 6008	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indoḥ kāntiṃ jaḍatarakarān mattanāgād gatiṃ vā trastān netre harasi hariṇāt tatra kiṃ nāma citram / etac citraṃ punariha jagajjaitrakandarpacāpa- śrīsarvasvaṃ yadapaharasi preyasi bhrūvilāsaiḥ // 6009	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
indoḥ kiṃ druhiṇasya vā surapateḥ kiṃ vā kṛtāntasya vā kiṃ bhūteśa diśāsthi bhūṣaṇagaṇeśvākṛṣya deyaṃ mayā / itthaṃ maṇḍanamandirodaracaravyāhārato bhīkarāt bhītā yasya surāḥ prasādhanavidhau pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ // 6010	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indoḥ saṃkṣayarakṣiṇākṣatasudhā kiṃ vedhasā nirmitā kiṃ dhairyāpaharā harasya vihitā kāmena kāntā tanuḥ / kiṃ tāruṇyavasantakāntilalitā śṛṅgārasiktā latā kiṃ lāvaṇyataraṅgiṇī punariyaṃ janmāntarāptā ratiḥ // 6011	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indoragatayaḥ padme sūryasya kumudeṃ'śavaḥ / guṇās tasya vipakṣe'pi guṇino lebhire'ntaram // 6012	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indorasya triyāmāyuvatikucataṭīcandanasthāsakasya vyomaśrīcāmarasya tripuraharajaṭāvallarīkorakasya / kaṃdarpakṣoṇipālasphaṭikamaṇigṛhasyaitadākha ṇḍalāśā- nāsāmuktāphalasya sthagayati jagatīṃ ko'pi bhāsāṃ vilāsaḥ // 6013	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indorivāsya purato yad vimukhī sāpavāraṇā bhramasi / tat kathaya kiṃ nu duritaṃ sakhi tvayā chāyayeva kṛtam // 6014	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
indorekakalāyā rudreṇoddhṛtya mūrdhani dhṛtāyāḥ / sthānamiva tucchametat kalaṅkarūpeṇa pariṇamati // 6015	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
indorlakṣma tripurajayinaḥ kaṇṭhamūlaṃ murārir diṅnāgānāṃ madajalamasībhāñji gaṇḍasthalāni / adyāpyurvīvalayatilaka śyāmalimnāvaliptāny ābhāsante vada dhavalitaṃ kiṃ yaśobhis tvadīyaiḥ // 6016	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
indoś candanabindunaiva daśanacchāyaṃ tadīyaṃ mukhaṃ cakraṃ locanabhallamārjanavidhau śāṇasya tat kuṇḍalam / bhinnānāṃ kucakandarā smitasudhākulyeva muktāvalī pādābje dhvanadindranīlavalayaṃ rolambamālaiva sā // 6017.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indau nindyā cakorairasamayati niśājāgaraḥ puṇḍarīkaiḥ bhṛṅgaiḥ śīdhunyasaṅgaḥ śaradi samadhikā glānirindīvaraiśca / bhrūbhaṅge yasya vairākarayuvatidṛśāmekamevopamānaṃ paśyāmyaśrāntabāṣpaprakaramayajharīgūḍ hacārāś camaryaḥ // 6017.2	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indraṃ dvyakṣadharaṃ tvamanthamudadhiṃ pañcānanaṃ padmajaṃ sindhuṃ svādujalaṃ śivaṃ sitagalaṃ kāmaṃ ca sadvigraham / śailān pakṣadharāṃs tathaiva ca hayāṃl lakṣmīpatiṃ piṅgalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sarvamidaṃ kvacin na raghurāḍdattaṃ svayaṃ hāritam // 6018	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indraṃ vai ṣaṇḍhamāhurmalinamuḍupatiṃ mādhavaṃ gopasūnuṃ vyāsaṃ matsītanūjaṃ gatarasamudadhiṃ pāvakaṃ sarvabhakṣam / veśyāputraṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ janapadavacanaiḥ pāṇḍavāś cānyajātā itthaṃ saṃcintya mahyaṃ kathaya narapate kasya doṣā na santi // 6019	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indraḥ prakṣubdhacitto diśi diśi sakalān dikpatīn sāvadhānān kurvan vajrāstrapāṇiḥ suravaravalitāṃ devasenāṃ nigṛhya / svargadvāre yadīyoddhatabalinihataprauḍhaḍhakkāninādaṃ śrutvātiṣṭhat prakampatkucakalaśataṭīkinnarīgīyamānaḥ // 6020	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indraḥ pradhānaṃ divi daivateṣu vipro manuṣyeṣu nadīṣu gaṅgā / gāvaḥ paśuṣveṣu dhaneṣu dhānyaṃ sarvatra gātrasya śiraḥ pradhānam // 6021.1	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indragopakaparamparā bhṛśaṃ kānaneṣu śuśubhe visarpiṇī / prāvṛṣaḥ sarabhasāgamāc cyutā padmarāgaghaṭiteva karṇikā // 6021.2	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
indragopairbabhau bhūmir nicitaiva pravāsinām / anaṅgabāṇairhṛdbhedasrutalohitabindubhiḥ // 6022	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
indrajic caṇḍavīryo'si nāmnaiva balavānasi / dhik dhik pracchannarūpeṇa yudhyase'smadbhayākulaḥ // 6023	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indranīlaśukapakṣakomalā śaṅkhakundakumudendusaṃnibhā / taptakāñcanavikāsicampaka- spardhinī vasumatī praśasyate // 6024	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
indras tvaṃ nṛpa sundarī tava śacī putro jayantopamo gehaṃ bhāti ca vaijayantasadṛśaṃ nāgo'bhramorvallabhaḥ / itthaṃ bodhakarairasatyavacanaiḥ svairaṃ stutaḥ svaṃ hariṃ vetti prasphuṭavikramaṃ sa mahimā jñeyo harermāyinaḥ // 6025	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indrasya vajreṇa hato vṛtrāsuramahāyaśāḥ / medasā sarvavicchinnaṃ tadarthamupalepanam // 6026	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
indrasyārkasya vāyoś ca yamasya varuṇasya ca / candrasya ca pṛthivyāś ca nṛpaḥ saptaguṇo bhavet // 6027	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indrāt prabhutvaṃ jvalanāt pratāpaṃ krodho yamād vaiśravaṇāc ca vittam / parākramaṃ rāmajanārdanābhyām ādāya rājñaḥ kriyate śarīram // 6028	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
indrādyā lokapālā harividhutapanā nāgavidyādharādyā dveṣyāḥ sarve'pi devāḥ priya tava varadaḥ ko'sti vandyo garīyān / śrutvā vācaṃ priyāyā iti daśamukhataḥ prāha vākyaṃ daśāsyaḥ śūlī śaṃbhuḥ pinākī śivabhavapaśupaḥ śarva īśaś ca bhargaḥ // 6029	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indrādyaiḥ kiṃ pradattaṃ pradiśasi dhavalaṃ dhāma dhanyaṃ yadebhyo mahyaṃ yan nāpi dhatse tṛṇaghaṭitakuṭīṃ kiṃ mayā te'parāddham / viśvebhyo viśvamātarvitarasi yadi vā śarma karmānusāri prottuṅgāyāḥ kṛpāyās tava tuhinagireḥ putri kutropayogaḥ // 6030	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
indrānilayamārkāṇām agneś ca varuṇasya ca / candravitteśayoś cāpi mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ // 6031	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indrābhyarthanayā pūrvaṃ bharatāya caturmukhaḥ / pramodāya mahendrasya nāṭyaṃ samupadiṣṭavān // 6032	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indrāya vīkṣamāṇas tanmukhamāsvādayannanantāya / spṛhayāmi cādya dayitām āliṅgan kārtavīryāya // 6033	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
indriyaṃ vijitaṃ yena tenaiva bhuvanaṃ jitam / yaś cendriyaiḥ parābhūtaḥ sa sarvatra parājitaḥ // 6034	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyasyendriyasyārthe rāgadveṣau vyavasthitau / tayorna vaśamāgacchet tau hyasya paripanthinau // 6035	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ jaye yogaṃ samātiṣṭhed divāniśam / jitendriyo hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayituṃ prajāḥ // 6036	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ jaye śūro dharmaṃ carati paṇḍitaḥ / satyavādī bhaved vaktā dātā bhavati vā na vā // 6037	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yadyekaṃ kṣaratīndriyam / tato'sya kṣarati prajñā dṛteḥ pādādivodakam // 6038	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena rāgadveṣakṣayeṇa ca / ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate // 6039	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣamṛcchatyasaṃśayam / saṃniyamya tu tānyeva tataḥ siddhiṃ niyacchati // 6040	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena dharmasyāsevanena ca / pāpān saṃyānti saṃsārān avidvāṃso narādhamāḥ // 6041	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ prasṛṣṭānāṃ hayānāmiva vartmasu / dhṛtiṃ kurvīta sārathye dhṛtyā tāni jayed dhruvam // 6042	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ vicaratāṃ viṣayeṣvapahāriṣu / saṃyame yatnamātiṣṭhed vidvān yanteva vājinām // 6043	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano'nuvidhīyate / tadasya harati prajñāṃ vāyurnāvamivāmbhasi // 6044	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātrī bhūtānāṃ cākhileṣu yā / bhūteṣu satataṃ tasyai vyāptyai devyai namo namaḥ // 6045	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇāmanutsargo mṛtyunā na viśiṣyate / atyarthaṃ punarutsargaḥ sādayed daivatānyapi // 6046	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi ca saṃyamya rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ / samaduḥkhasukhaḥ śāntaḥ tattvajñaḥ sādhurucyate // 6047	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi parāṇyāhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ / manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ // 6048	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi paśūn kṛtvā vedīṃ kṛtvā tapomayīm / ahiṃsāmāhutiṃ kṛtvā ātmayajñaṃ yajāmyaham // 6049	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvanaṃ tvayā / smaradbhariva taidvairam indriyaireva nirjitaḥ // 6050	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi pramāthīni harantyapi yatermanaḥ // 6051	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
