indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇo jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ / dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥkham icchāhaṅkāra eva ca // 6052	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prayatna ākṛtirvarṇaḥ svaradveṣau bhavābhavau / tasyaitadātmajaṃ sarvam anāderādimicchataḥ // 6053	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānamucyate / etairvimohayatyeṣa jñānamāvṛtya dehinam // 6054	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇi mahat prepsur niyacchedarthadharmayoḥ / indriyairniyatairbuddhir vardhate'gnirivendhanaiḥ // 6055	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇādīn mana eva ca / nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāramupakramet // 6056	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇyanupakleśya labhyaṃ śreyo gṛhāśrame / atasturyāśramaṃ prāhur abādhanyāyabādhitam // 6057	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇyantaraṅgāṇi pātayanti yathā janān / abhyantarās tathā rāṣṭre bhṛtyāḥ svārthaparāyaṇāḥ // 6058	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyāṇyeva tat sarvaṃ yat svarganarakāvubhau / nigṛhītavisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca // 6059	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyārtheṣu sarveṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ / atiprasaktiṃ caiteṣāṃ manasā saṃnivartayet // 6060	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
indriyairindracandrādyā hrepitā yaiḥ surā api / aparimlānamānatvaṃ tairmartyasyāthavā katham // 6061	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indriyairindriyārtheṣu vartamānairanigrahaiḥ / tairayaṃ tāpyate loko nakṣatrāṇi grahairiva // 6062	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indro nindati vāhamāha dinakṛttvarvvācamevārvataś cañcūrnyañcati kiṃ na pannagariporantastrapodrekataḥ / vātaḥ khañjati paṅgupuñjati manorājirbbhavadvājiṣu dbeṣādājiṣu vairiṇāmabhimukhaṃ dhāvatsu yāvat sukham // 6063	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indro yacchatamanyurasti dahano yat pāvako'pyantakaḥ kīnāśo dhanado vimānanirataḥ pāśī jalānāṃ patiḥ / īśaḥ kāmaharaś calo yadanilo yannairṛto rākṣasas tan nānyo'vanilokapāla bhavataḥ kaścit samaḥ syād guṇaiḥ // 6064	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
indro yamo'si varuṇo'si hutāśano'si brahmā haro harirasītyasakṛd yaduktiḥ / bhūpālamaulimaṇirañjitapādapīṭha tasyānṛtasya phalamindhanamudvahāmi // 6065	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ibhakumbhatuṅgakaṭhinetaretara- stanabhāradūravinivāritodarāḥ / pariphullagaṇḍaphalakāḥ parasparaṃ parirebhire kukurakauravastriyaḥ // 6066	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
ibhyā yadi nṛpadvāre saṃmanyante kimadbhutam / idānīṃ vibudhadvāre teṣāmeva puraskriyā // 6067	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imaṃ kanakavarṇābhaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam / gṛdhravākyāt kathaṃ putraṃ tyajadhvaṃ pitṛpiṇḍadam // 6068	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imaṃ tilasumāyitaṃ yuvatināsikāsaṃpuṭaṃ vibhāvya sumanojano manasi modamāpadyate / sakhe bhujagamutphaṇaṃ saviṣaphūtkṛtāhaṃkṛtaṃ vibhāvaya na tatspṛhāṃ kuru jahīhi taddṛśyatām // 6069	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
imaṃ parityajya paraṃ raṇādariḥ svameva bhagnaḥ śaraṇaṃ budhāviśat / na vetti yat trātumitaḥ kṛtasmayo na durgayā śailabhuvāpi śakyate // 6070	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam / guruśuśrūṣayā tveva brahmalokaṃ samaśnute // 6071	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
imāṃ ca vindyādanuraktaceṣṭāṃ priyāṇi vakti svadhanaṃ dadāti / vilokya saṃhṛṣyati vītaroṣā pramārṣṭi doṣān guṇakīrtanena // 6072	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
imāṃ parīpsurdurjāte parābhibhavakātarām / bhartṛpriyaḥ priyairbhartur ānṛṇyamasubhirgataḥ // 6073	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
imāṃ vidhātuṃ bhujavallimujjvalāṃ gṛhītasāraṃ vidhinā natabhruvaḥ / kaṭhorabhāvapriyameva kevalaṃ mṛṇālamantastaralaṃ kuto'nyathā // 6074	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
imāṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ himavadvindhyakuṇḍalām / mahīmekātapatrāṅkāṃ rājasiṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ // 6075	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imāni prāyaśas tāni veśyāsvevaṃ pradāpayet / sā muñcatyacirāt sarvam upabhogaṃ tadātmanaḥ // 6076	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imā yadi bhavanti no galitayauvanā nīrucas tadā kamalalocanās taruṇamāninīrmā mucat / vilāsamadavibhramān bhramati luṇṭhayatrī jarā yato bhuvi vadhus tato bhavati niḥspṛhas tanmukhe // 6077	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
imā rūpasthānasvajanatanayadravyavanitā- sutālakṣmīkīrtidyutiratimatiprītidhṛtayaḥ / madāndhastrīnetraprakṛticapalāḥ sarvabhavinām aho kaṣṭaṃ martyas tadapi viṣayān sevitumanāḥ // 6078	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
imāstāḥ kastūrīprakharakhuraṭaṅkakṣatataṭās taṭinyo'raṇyānīmanu kamalinīcchannasalilāḥ / jale yāsāṃ haṃsā bisakisalayagrāsarasikāḥ salīlaṃ līyante yuvatigatividyaikaguravaḥ // 6079	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
imāstā vindhyādreḥ śukaharitavaṃśīvanaghanā bhuvaḥ krīḍāloladviradadaśanābhugnataravaḥ / latākuñje yāsāmupanadi rataklāntaśabarī- kapolasvedāmbhaḥkaṇacayanudo vānti marutaḥ // 6080	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
imā hindolāsu bhramitamahasaḥ kuṅkumarucā trapārūpākārās taralatarahārāś caladṛśaḥ / udañcatkāñcīnāṃ bahalataraghoṣairmanasija- trilokīsamrājo dadhati jayaghaṇṭālininadam // 6081	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ime tāruṇyaśrīnavaparimalāḥ prauḍhasurata- pratāpaprārambhāḥ smaravijayadānapratibhuvaḥ / ciraṃ cetaścaurā abhinavavikāraikaguravo vilāsavyāpārāḥ kimapi vijayante mṛgadṛśām // 6082	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ime padme nāmbhaḥ pulinataṭametan na taṭinī khametan na vyāptiḥ stabakayugametan na latikā / pravālo'yaṃ nābdhiḥ śiśirakiraṇo'yaṃ na rajanī ghano'yaṃ na prāvṛṭ śiva śiva vidheḥ śilparacanā // 6083	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ime mama dhanāṅgajasvajanavallabhādehajā- suhṛjjanakamātulaprabhṛtayo bhṛśaṃ vallabhāḥ / mudheti hatacetano bhavavane ciraṃ khidyate yato bhavati kasya ko jagati vālukāmuṣṭivat // 6084	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
ime hi dainyena nimīlitekṣaṇā muhuḥ skhalanto vivaśās turaṅgamāḥ / gajāś ca saptacchadadānagandhino nivedayantīva raṇe nivartanam // 6085	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
imau rambhāstambhau dviradapatikumbhadvayamidaṃ tadetal līlābjaṃ śaradamṛtaraśmiḥ sphuṭamayam / kimaṅge tanvaṅgyāḥ kalayati jagat kāntamadhikaṃ yadetasyāṃ śaśvat paravaśamivonmattamiva ca // 6086	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ kalāvilāsinī kalāvatī samīpagā dhṛtāravindalocanā manojaśokamocanā / navīnanīradacchaṭāsamānakeśabhūṣitā na kasyacij janasya cittavṛttitāpakhaṇḍitā // 6087	pañcacāmara [16: jrjrjg]
iyaṃ kiyaccārukuceti paśyate payaḥpradāyā hṛdayaṃ samāvṛtam / dhruvaṃ manojñā vyataradyaduttaraṃ miṣeṇa bhṛṅgāradhṛteḥ karadvayī // 6088	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayor asāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaś candanarasaḥ / ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ // 6089	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ gauruddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ na vaidarbhādanyat spṛśati sulabhatve'pi hi katham / avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi kathamagamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ // 6090	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ gaurekā naḥ kvacidapi na saṃyojanavidhāv amuṣyāḥ paśyāmo rasabharamucaṃ kāṃcidaparām / gale baddhā dadhmo yadi na dhṛtiruddāmavidhṛtau bhayaṃ gocorebhyas tadiha ka upāyaḥ prabhavatu // 6091	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ ghaṭī mattagajendragāminī- vicitrasiṃhāsanasaṃsthitā sadā / anekarāmājanalālitā paraṃ vidhervaśāt saiva satī prajārthinī // 6092	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ cidrūpāpi prakaṭajaḍarūpā bhagavatī yadīyāmbhobindurvitarati hi śaṃbhorapi padam / punānā dhunvānā nikhilamapi nānāvidhamaghaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pāyādanudinamapāyāt suradhunī // 6093	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ tāval līlā yadadhiruruhe vṛddhavṛṣabho yadunnehe ruṇḍaṃ yadiha citibhasmāpi lilipe / ayaṃ ko vyāpāro yadatilaki bhāle hutavaho yadagraivi vyālo yadakavali hālāhalamapi // 6094	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ te jananī prāptā tvadālokanatatparā / snehaprasnavanirbhinnam udvahantī stanadvayam // 6095	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ triyāmā śatayāmadhāriṇī sudhākarādagnirudeti sarvataḥ / tanoti tāpaṃ mṛducandanānilo vidhau viruddhe hi vipat pade pade // 6096	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ tvabhinnamaryādaiḥ svanuśiṣṭaiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ / sarvaṃsahairupāyajñair amūḍhaireva dhāryate // 6097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ dhatte dhīre malayajasamīre na ca mudaṃ na padmānāṃ vṛnde lalitamakarande'pi ramate / na vā sā sānandā bhavati navakundāvalikule tadetasyā bādhāharamapi samādhānamiha kim // 6098	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ pallī bhillairanucitasamārambharasikaiḥ samantādākīrṇā viṣaviṣamabāṇapraṇayibhiḥ / tarorasya skandhe gamaya samayaṃ kīra nibhṛtaṃ na vāṇī kalyāṇī tadiha mukhamudraiva śaraṇam // 6099	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ prītirvallīhṛdayabhuvi daivāt samuditā tathā yatnād rakṣyā prakṛtimṛdulāpāyabahulā / yathā naināṃ sphītāṃ piśunajanadurvākyadahano dahatyantaḥ śoṣaṃ vrajati na punaḥ sauhṛdanidheḥ // 6100	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ bālā navodvāhā satyaṃ śrutvā vyathāṃ vrajet / kāmaṃ dhīrasvabhāveyaṃ strīsvabhāvas tu kātaraḥ // 6101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ bālā māṃ pratyanavaratamindīvaradala- prabhācauraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣipati kimabhipretamanayā / gato moho'smākaṃ smarasamarabāṇavyatikara- jvarajvālā śāntā tadapi na varākī viramati // 6102	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ bālā vallī mṛdukisalayaṃ tāpavilayaṃ ghanacchāyaṃ śālaṃ navamativiśālaṃ parigatā / paraṃtvasyābhyantargaralalavabhasmīkṛtavanaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ prottuṅgaṃ kathamiva varākī kalayatu // 6103	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ bhujaginīśritā lasadanekapuṣpānvitā dvirephatatisevitā pramadakhañjanālaṃkṛtā / phaladvayabharānatā vilasitā navaiḥ pallavair vilocanapathaṃ gatā bhavati kāpi haimī latā // 6104	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
iyaṃ mayi proṣita eva saṃgatā himatviṣābhūt kṛtamaṇḍanā satī / itīrṣyayeva drutamacchinad ruṣā vicitratārābharaṇāni bhāskaraḥ // 6105	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaś caturdigīśānavamatya māninī / arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patimāptumicchati // 6106	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ mukhāmbhoruhasaṃnidhāne vilambidhammillataticchalena / samāgatāṃ sādarameva bālā dvirephamālāmuta vā dadhāti // 6107	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
iyaṃ yaśāṃsi dviṣataḥ sudhārucaḥ kimaṅkametad dviṣataḥ kimānanam / yaśobhirasyākhilalokadhāvibhir vibhīṣitā dhāvati tāmasī masī // 6108	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ raṅgapraveśena kalānāṃ copaśikṣayā / vañcanāpaṇḍitatvena svaranaipuṇyamāśritā // 6109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ vilāsadrumadohadaśrīr iyaṃ sudhā yauvanadugdhasindhoḥ / lāvaṇyamāṇikyarucicchaṭeyam iyaṃ manaḥkārmaṇacūrṇamuṣṭiḥ // 6110	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iyaṃ vyādhāyate bālā bhrūrasyāḥ kārmukāyate / kaṭākṣāś ca śarāyante mano me hariṇāyate // 6111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ samdhyā dūrādahamupagato hanta malayāt tadekāṃ tvadgehe karuṇavati neṣyāmi rajanīm / samīreṇaivoktā navakusumitā cūtalatikā dhunānā murddhānaṃ nahi nahi nahītyeva kurute // 6112	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ sā kālindī kuvalayadalasnigdhamadhurā madāndhavyākūjattaruṇajalaraṃkupraṇayinī / purā yasyās tīre sarabhasasatṛṣṇaṃ murabhido gatāḥ prāyo gopīnidhuvanavinodena divasāḥ // 6113	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat / itas tīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaś cāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ // 6114	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ sunayanā dāsīkṛtatāmarasaśriyā / ānanenākalaṅkena jayantīnduṃ kalaṅkitam // 6115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ surataraṅgiṇī na punaratra nausaṃgamo bhavet taraṇimajjanaṃ pathika naiva pānthāgamaḥ / nidhāya hṛdaye sadā vipulacārukumbhadvayaṃ sakhe ghanaghanāgame ghanarasasya pāraṃ vraja // 6116	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
iyaṃ sustanī mastakanyastakumbhā kusumbhāruṇaṃ cāru vāso vasānā / samastasya lokasya cetaḥpravṛttiṃ gṛhītvā ghaṭe nyasya yātīva bhāti // 6117	bhujaṅgaprayāta [12: yyyy]
iyaṃ sṛṣṭā cañcatkanakalatikā paṅkajabhuvā niṣiktā lāvaṇyāmṛtarasabhareṇānudivasam / akasmād romālīmadhupapaṭalīha sphurati yat tataḥ śaṅke puṣpodgamasamayamāyātamadhunā // 6118	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyaṃ svargādhināthasya lakṣmīḥ kiṃ yakṣakanyakā / athavā vipinasyaiva devatā kimu pārvati // 6119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ hi nidrā nayanāvalambinī lalāṭadeśādupasarpatīva mām / adṛśyarūpā capalā jareva yā manuṣyasattvaṃ paribhūya vardhate // 6120	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate / ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ // 6121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ hi lokavyatirekavartinī svabhāvataḥ pārthivatā samuddhatā / balāt tadenāṃ vinayena yojayen nayasya siddhau vinayaḥ puraḥsaraḥ // 6122	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iyatā vayasā na sādhitaṃ yat parataḥ kiṃ nu kariṣyatīti vedhāḥ / tilataṇḍulitāsya romarekhā- cchalataḥ kajjalacūrṇamālilimpa // 6123.1	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iyatīṃ subhagāvasthāṃ gato'si yasyāḥ kṛte smarātaṅkāt / mūrcchāṃ harāmi sā tava gatapuṇyā nayanasalilena // 6123.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iyatī jagatī kiyatī bhavitā namitānanatāmiti yāti hayaḥ / viyadaṅgaṇariṅgaṇaraṅgavidhau parinartitumutkramatīva nabhaḥ // 6124	toṭaka [12: ssss]
iyat pṛthvīmātraṃ tadanu ca nabhomaṇḍalamiya- diyān pātālānto jalamapi pṛthivyāmiyaditi / iti jñātvā kūpe viditaviṣayo nāyamaparaḥ paraṃ mugdho bhekaḥ prabalatararāvaṃ prakurute // 6125	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyatyapyetasmin niravadhimahatyadhvani guṇās ta evāmī dvitrā jaraṭhajaraṭhā yānti gaṇanām / aho grāmyo lokaḥ sa na paramamībhiḥ kṛtadhṛtiḥ smayastabdho yāvat kalayati samagraṃ tṛṇamidam // 6126	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyatyāṃ saṃpattāvapi ca salilānāṃ tvamadhunā na tṛṣṇāmārtānāṃ harasi yadi kāsāra sahasā / nidāghe caṇḍāṃśau kirati parito'ṅgāranikarān kṛśībhūtaḥ keṣāmahaha parihartāsi khalu tām // 6127	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyatyāmapi sāmagryāṃ sukṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ tvayā / itīva kupito dantān antakaḥ pātayatyalam // 6128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyatyetasmin vā niravadhicamatkṛtyatiśayo varāho vā rāhuḥ prabhavati camatkāraviṣayaḥ / mahīmeko magnāṃ yadayamavahad dantaśalalaiḥ śiraḥśeṣaḥ śatruṃ nigilati paraṃ saṃtyajati ca // 6129	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iyamatra kayāpi diśā nītidṛśāṃ darśitā padavī / cāṇakyādyabhidhānāj jñeyanidhānādathānyadunneyam // 6130	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
iyamatra satāmalaukikī mahatī kāpi kaṭhoracittatā / upakṛtya bhavanti dūrataḥ parataḥ pratyupakārabhīravaḥ // 6131	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
iyamapratibodhaśāyinīṃ raśanā tvāṃ prathamā rahaḥsakhī / gativibhramasādanīravā na śucā nānumṛteva lakṣyate // 6132	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṃkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī / vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava- śriyamudayinīmudgāḍhāṃ ca vyanakti manorujam // 6133	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
iyamasau taralāyatalocanā gurusamunnatapīnapayodharā / pṛthunitambabharālasagāminī priyatamā mama jīvitahāriṇī // 6134	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iyamānandalatikā na grīvā hariṇīdṛśaḥ / yato'syāṃ viluṭhantyete muktāḥ śuddhaguṇāntarāḥ // 6135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyamiyaṃ mayadānavanandinī tridaśanāthajitaḥ prasavasthalī / kimaparaṃ daśakaṃdharagehinī tvayi karoti karadvayayojanam // 6136	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iyamiṣṭaguṇāya rocatāṃ rucirārthā bhavate'pi bhāratī / nanu vaktṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaścitaḥ // 6137	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
iyamudaradarī durantapūrā yadi na bhavedabhimānabhaṅgabhūmiḥ / kṣaṇamapi na sahe bhavādṛśānāṃ kuṭilakaṭākṣanirīkṣaṇaṃ nṛpāṇām // 6138	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iyamudgatiṃ harantī netranikocaṃ ca vidadhatī purataḥ / na vijānīmaḥ kiṃ tava vadati sapatnīva dinanidrā // 6139	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iyeṣa sā kartumavandhyarūpatāṃ samādhimāsthāya tapobhirātmanaḥ / avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiś ca tādṛśaḥ // 6140	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ilātalabharākrāntagrīvaṃ mā śeṣa vakraya / tvayi duḥkhini caikasmiñ jīvalokaḥ sadā sukhī // 6141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ilikā bhramarīdhyānaṃ dhyāyantī bhramarī bhavet / vītarāgapadaṃ dhyāyan vītarāgo bhaved dhruvam // 6142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣutrayeṇaiva jagattrayasya vinirjayāt puṣpamayāśugena / śeṣā dvibāṇī saphalīkṛteyaṃ priyādṛgambhojapade'bhiṣicya // 6143	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iṣṭaṃ dadāti gṛhṇāti kāryamākhyāti pṛcchati / bhuṅkte bhojayate caiva ṣaḍvidhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam // 6144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭakacite samantāt puruṣanikhāte'vaṭe tarurjātaḥ / vāmana eva hi dhatte phalakusumaṃ sarvakālamiti // 6145	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iṣṭāṃ bhāryāṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ putraṃ cāpi kanīyasam / riktapāṇirna paśyeta tathā naimittikaṃ prabhum // 6146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭāni cāpyapatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ / āpaddharmavimokṣāya bhāryā cāpi satāṃ matam // 6147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ / tairdattānapradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ // 6148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭāpūrtāni kalayet jagatkhyāto vased divi / akūpāroktavṛtto'gād indradyumno divaṃ punaḥ // 6149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭā bālakaceṣṭā yauvanadarpo'tha vṛddhavairāgyam / sāpi gatā so'pi gatas tadapi gataṃ svapnamāyeyam // 6150	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iṣṭā makhā dvijavarāś ca mayi prasannāḥ prajñāpitā bhayarasaṃ samadā narendrāḥ / evaṃvidhasya ca na me'sti manaḥpraharṣaḥ kanyāpiturhi satataṃ bahu cintanīyam // 6151	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
iṣṭeṣu visṛjatyarthān kubera iva kāmadaḥ / namasyeyuś ca taṃ bhaktyā śiṣyā iva guruṃ sadā // 6152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭo vā bahusukṛtopalālito vā śliṣṭo vā vyasanaśatābhirakṣito vā / dauḥśīlyāj janayati naiva jātvasādhur visrambhaṃ bhujaga ivāṅkamadhyasuptaḥ // 6153	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
iṣṭvā saṃgrāmayajñena nānāpraharaṇāmbhasā / asminnavabhṛthe snātaḥ kathaṃ patnyā mayā vinā // 6154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha kapaṭakutukataralita- dṛśi viśvāsaṃ kuraṅga kiṃ kuruṣe / tava rabhasataraliteyaṃ vyādhavadhūrvāladhau valate // 6155	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha kiṃ kuraṅgaśāvaka kedāre kalamamañjarīṃ tyajasi / tṛṇabāṇas tṛṇadhanvā tṛṇaghaṭitaḥ kapaṭapuruṣo'yam // 6156	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha kiṃ pratisphurati me tavāgrato nayaśāstranīranidhipāradṛśvanaḥ / avalīḍhaviśvatamasaḥ puro raver nahi jātu dīpakaśikhā prakāśate // 6157	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
iha khalu viṣamaḥ purā kṛtānāṃ vilasati jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ / haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādaiḥ // 6158	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha gamiṣyati vaidyamatiḥ śramaṃ prathamameva purastu mahāsukham / priyatamasya mṛgākṣi samāgame navakaragrahaṇā gṛhiṇī yathā // 6159	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iha gurujalabhārapūrṇagarbhāḥ pradaradarībhramabhūribhīmavegāḥ / taṭakaṭakaniyudhyamānaveṇī- dviguṇamahāravabhairavās taṭinyaḥ // 6160	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha catvāri dānāni proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ / vicārya nānāśāstrāṇi śarmaṇe'tra paratra ca // 6161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhītebhyaś cābhayaṃ deyaṃ vyādhitebhyas tathauṣadham / deyā vidyārthināṃ vidyā deyamannaṃ kṣudhāture // 6162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha caiva striyo dhanyāḥ śīlasya parirakṣaṇāt / śīlabhaṅge ca nārīṇāṃ yamalokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // 6163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śīlaṃ rakṣyaṃ sadā strībhir duṣṭasaṃgavivarjanāt / śīlena hi paraḥ svargaḥ strīṇāṃ vaiśya na saṃśayaḥ // 6164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha jagati janasya kasya citte na vasati saukhyavidhānamukhyavārtā / khalu bhavati tadeva tasya sarvaṃ bhuvanapatis tu yadīśvaraḥ karoti // 6165	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha jagati ratīśaprakriyākauśalinyaḥ kati kati na niśīthe subhruvaḥ saṃcaranti / mama tu vidhihatāyā jāyamānasmitāyāḥ sahacari paripanthī hanta dantāṃśureva // 6166	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha tava deva nipatatā karakamalakuśodakena jāyante / tattaddūradaridra- dvāri dvipadānavāribhiḥ saritaḥ // 6167	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iha turagaśataiḥ prayāntu mūrkhā dhanarahitā vibudhāḥ prayāntu padbhyām / giriśikharagatāpi kākapaṅktiḥ pulinagatairna samatvameti haṃsaiḥ // 6168	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha duḥkhaṃ nṛpādibhyaḥ paratra narakāditaḥ / prāpnoti steyatas tena steyaṃ tyājyaṃ sadā budhaiḥ // 6169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha duḥkhaṃ layaḥ prokto duḥkhaṃ hartuṃ layaḥ kṣamaḥ / duḥkhe śubhe layo duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ tasya kathyate // 6170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha dharmārthakāmānām avāptiphalamiṣyate / tatrārthaḥ saha kāmena nirīkṣyo dharmacakṣuṣā // 6171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parityajya hi yo dharmam arthamarthāya paśyati / kāmaṃ vā kāmalābhāya na sa buddheṣu buddhimān // 6172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha nagare pratirathyaṃ bhujaṃgasaṃbādharucirasaṃcāre / sundari mama matametan nakulapratipālanaṃ śreyaḥ // 6173	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha niculanikuñje madhyamadhye'sya rantur vijanamajani śayyā kasya bālapravālaiḥ / iti kathayati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān smitaśabalitarādhāmādhavālokitāni // 6174	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha niculanikuñje vaṃśasaṃbhārabhāji svapimi yadi muhūrtaṃ paśyasi kṣetrametat / iti pathikamakasmān mārga evopaviṣṭaṃ vadati taruṇakāntaṃ gopikā sāṅgabhaṅgam // 6175	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha nibhṛtanipātamūkapādaṃ valayitakārmukavallayaḥ kirātāḥ / bhavadalasavilokanānabhijñā mṛgagṛhiṇi praharanti gaccha dūram // 6176	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha nivasati meruḥ śekharo bhūdharāṇām iha hi nihitabhārāḥ sāgarāḥ sapta caiva / idamatulamanantaṃ bhūtalaṃ bhūribhūtod- bhavadharaṇasamarthaṃ sthānamasmadvidhānām // 6177	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha niśi nibiḍanirantara- kucakumbhadvitayadattahṛdayabharā / ramaṇaguṇakṛṣyamāṇā saṃtarati tamastaraṅgiṇīṃ kāpi // 6178	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iha paricitā jātyandhānāmiyaṃ na tavonnatir guṇaparicaye cakṣuṣmanto tvayātiviḍambitāḥ / kṛpaṇavaṇijāmalpīkartuṃ guṇāṃs tava kevalaṃ marakata mṛṣā doṣodgāraḥ kariṣyati duryaśaḥ // 6179	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
iha parimalo yatra vyakto na tatra madhuśriyo madhu samadhikaṃ yasmiṃs tasmin na gandhasamṛddhayaḥ / iti maruvakaṃ nindan kundādapetakutūhalaḥ kamalamadhikaṃ smāraṃ smāraṃ viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ // 6180	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
iha puro'nilakampitavigrahā milati kā na vanaspatinā latā / smarasi kiṃ sakhi kāntaratotsavaṃ na hi ghanāgamarītirudāhṛtā // 6181	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iha bahalitamindordīdhitīnāṃ prabhābhir madavikalacakorīcañcumudrāṅkitābhiḥ / ratibharaparikhedasrastarārthaṃ vadhūnāṃ karakisalayalīlābhañjanavyañjikābhiḥ // 6182	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha bhuvi kalayati laghurapi mahatāṃ saṅgena kamapi mahimānam / laṅghayati candralīno nabhastalaṃ helayā hariṇaḥ // 6183	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha bhogaṃ yaśaḥ prītiṃ sabhāsu bahumānyatām / dadyāt paratra sugatiṃ vidyādhanamanuttamam // 6184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iha madhupavadhūnāṃ pītamallīmadhūnāṃ vilasati kamanīyaḥ kākalīsaṃpradāyaḥ / iha naṭati salīlaṃ mañjarī vañjulasya pratipadamupadiṣṭā dakṣiṇenānilena // 6185	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha mahiṣaviṣāṇavyastapāṣāṇapīṭha- skhalanasulabharohidgarbhiṇībhrūṇahatyāḥ / kuharaviharamāṇaprauḍhabhallūkahikkā- cayacakitakirātasrastaśastrā vanāntāḥ // 6186	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ / sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhuvāṃ ca marīcayaḥ // 6187	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
iha yat kriyate karma tat paratropabhujuyate / siktamūlasya vṛkṣasya phalaṃ śākhāsu dṛśyate // 6188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
iha yat kriyate karma phalaṃ tatraiva bhujyate / karmabhūmiriyaṃ rājan phalabhūmiś ca sā smṛtā // 6189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha yādavavaṃśakṛṣṇavartmā- nugatiḥ sāṅgatayā mayānvabhāvi / adhunā tadavāpticetase me madhurākāmadhurāpi rocate kim // 6190	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iha rūpamātrasāre citrakṛte kamalakahlāre / na raso nāpi ca gandho madhukara bandho mudhā bhramasi // 6191	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
iha re bahalā lāse bālā rāhumalīmasā / sālakā rasalīlā sā tuṅgālāli kalārata // 6192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaloke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate / adbhirdattā svardharmeṇa pretyabhāve'pi tasya sā // 6193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro'pi svajanāyate / svajanastu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatāmeva naśyati // 6194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha loke hi dhanināṃ paro'pi svajanāyate / svajano'pi daridrāṇāṃ tatkṣaṇād durjanāyate // 6195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha loko hato n ṇāṃ dāridryeṇa yathā nṛpa / manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā janma māghasnānaṃ vinā hatam // 6196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
iha vaṭavṛkṣe yakṣaḥ prativasati divāpi yatra bhayaśaṅkā / tasminnabhinavavadhvā nītā vītodayāḥ kṣaṇadāḥ // 6197	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha vatsān samacārayad iha naḥ svāmī jagau vaṃśīm / iti sāsraṃ gadato me yamunātīre dinaṃ yāyāt // 6198	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
iha vahati bahumahodadhi- vibhūṣaṇā mānagarvamiyamurvī / devasya kamaṭhamūrter na pṛṣṭhamapi nikhilamāpnoti // 6199	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet / sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ityucyate budhaiḥ // 6200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha vikasadaśokāstokapuṣpopakārair ayamatiśayaraktaḥ saktasusnigdhabhāvaḥ / tribhuvanajayasajjaḥ prājyasā mrājyabhājaḥ prathayati pṛthumaitrīṃ puṣpacāpasya caitraḥ // 6201	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha vicaranti kirātās tvādṛksvacchandatānihantāraḥ / tadamīṣāṃ gānādau mā dhāḥ śravaṇe kuraṅgaśāva tvam // 6202	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iha vijayini vaṃśe kīrtidhārākalāpa- snapitasakalalokaḥ śrīyaśovigraho'bhūt / jalaghaṭa iva yuddhottālabhūpāladarpa- jvalanaśamanalīlākovidaḥ ko'pi vīraḥ // 6203	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha vidhiviṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ / kva janakatanayā kva rāmarāmā kva ca daśakandharamandire nivāsaḥ // 6204	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
iha viracayan sādhvīṃ śiṣyaḥ kriyāṃ na nivāryate tyajati tu yadā mārgaṃ mohāt tadā gururaṅkuśaḥ / vinayarucayas tasmāt santaḥ sadaiva niraṅkuśāḥ parataramataḥ svātantryebhyo vayaṃ hi parāṅmukhāḥ // 6205	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
iha viśvambharāpīḍe candanaṃ kasya na priyam / anusvāraṃ vilipyāpi okārasya prayojanāt // 6206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha / iha cāmutra vaikasya nāmutraikasya no iha // 6207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha vyādhavyūhaḥ paṭughaṭitayantrapraharaṇo mṛgendrāṇāṃ valgat prakharanakharāṇāṃ kulamiha / ihālaṅghyaḥ śailo bahalatarapaṅkā saridiha pradīpto'gnirmadhyevanamahaha kaṣṭaṃ karipateḥ // 6208	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
iha śayyāgatenāpi bandhumadhyasthitena vā / mayaivaikena soḍhavyā marmacchedādivedanā // 6209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha śikharakarālakṣoṇibhidgaṇḍaśaila- skhalanadalanagarjatphenilo budbudaughaḥ / pavanadhṛtaśirīṣaśreṇireṇupraṇālī- surabhisaliladṛptā dvīpavatyo vahanti // 6210	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā / vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate // 6211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha saṃtamase ghanāgame sukhitaṃ bhānavamaindavaṃ vapuḥ / taḍidujjvaladīpalekhayā harito'mūḥ parito vicinvati // 6212	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
iha samadaśakuntākrāntavānīravīrut- prasavasurabhiśītasvacchatoyā vahanti / phalabharapariṇāmaśyāmajambūnikuñja- skhalanamukharabhūrisrotaso nirjhariṇyaḥ // 6213	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha sarasi salīlaṃ cārupatre vidhunvan darataralitatiryakcañcukaṇḍūyitāṅgaḥ / anusarati sarāgaḥ preyasīmagrayātām anupadasamudañcatkaṇṭhanālo marālaḥ // 6214	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha sarasi saharṣaṃ mañjuguñjābhirāmaṃ madhukara kuru keliṃ sārdhamambhojinībhiḥ / anupamamakarandāmodadattapramodā tyajati bata na nidrāṃ mālatī yāvadeṣā // 6215	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha sarvasvaphalinaḥ kulaputramahādrumāḥ / niṣphalatvamalaṃ yānti veśyāvihagabhakṣitāḥ // 6216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha sāmānyānugamaṃ samupadiśantaḥ sthaleṣvanekeṣu / liṅgaparāmarśaparā navīnanaiyāyikā yānti // 6217	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iha sphuṭaṃ tiṣṭhati nātha kaṇṭakaḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ karṣa nakhāgralīlayā / iti cchalāt kācidalagnakaṇṭakaṃ padaṃ tadutsaṅgatale nyaveśayat // 6218	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iha hi navavasante mañjarīpuñjareṇu- cchuraṇadhavaladehā baddhahelaṃ saranti / taralamalisamūhā hārihuṃkārakaṇṭhā bahulaparimalālīsundaraṃ sinduvāram // 6219	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
iha hi madhuragītaṃ rūpametad raso'yaṃ sphurati parimalo'sau sparśa eṣa stanānām / iti hṛtaparamārthairidriyairbhrāmyamāṇaḥ svahitakaraṇadhūrtaiḥ pañcabhirvañcito'smi // 6220	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
ihāneke satyaṃ vṛṣamahiṣameṣāḥ suturagā gṛhāṇi kṣudrāṇāṃ katipayatṛṇaireva sukhinaḥ / gajānāmāsthānaṃ madasalilajambālitabhuvāṃ tadeko vindhyādrervipinamathavā bhūpasadanam // 6221	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ihāneke santaḥ satatamupakāriṇyupakṛtiṃ kṛtajñāḥ kurvanto jagati nivasanto'pi sudhiyaḥ / kiyantas te santaḥ sukṛtaparipākapraṇayino vinā svārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati parakṛtyavyasanitā // 6222	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ihāviśadyena pathātivakraḥ śāstraughaniṣyandasudhāpravāhaḥ / so'syāḥ śravaḥpatrayuge praṇālī- rekheva dhāvatyabhikarṇakūpam // 6223	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ihaikaś cūḍālo'bhyajani kalaśād yasya sakalaiḥ pipāsorambhobhiś culukamapi no bhartumaśakaḥ / svamāhātmyaślāghāgurugahanagarjābhiramitaḥ kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śrutikuharamabdhe kimiti naḥ // 6224	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ihaiva narakavyādheś cikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ / gatvā nirauṣadhasthānaṃ sa rogī kiṃ kariṣyati // 6225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva bhuvane jātaṃ sattvasaṃsthāpanaṃ kṣamam / gṛhyate kimapi svasthair anyat kimapi jihmagaiḥ // 6226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihodyāne sampratyahaha pariśiṣṭāḥ kramavaśād amī valmīkās te bhujagakulalīlāvasatayaḥ / gatās te vistīrṇastabakabharasaurabhyalaharī- parītavyomānaḥ prakṛtiguravaḥ ke'pi taravaḥ // 6227	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
ihopapattirmama kena karmaṇā kva vā prayātavyamito bhavediti / vicāraṇā yasya na vidyate smṛtau kathaṃ sa dharmapravaṇo bhaviṣyati // 6228	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
īkṣaṇadhyānasaṃsparśair matsyakūrmavihaṅgamāḥ / poṣayanti svakān putrān tadvat paṇḍitavṛttayaḥ // 6229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īkṣitopadiśatīva nartituṃ tatkṣaṇoditamudaṃ manobhuvam / kāntadantaparipīḍitādharā pāṇidhūnanamiyaṃ vitanvatī // 6230	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
īdṛśaṃ kārayen nyāsaṃ yena śreyo bhaviṣyati / anye'pi duṣṭamantreṇa na hiṃsanti kadācana // 6231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśaṃ nigadati priye dṛśaṃ saṃmadāt kiyadiyaṃ nyamīlayat / prātarālapati kokile kalaṃ jāgarādiva niśaḥ kumudvatī // 6232	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhrātaraṃ yaḥ parityajet / ko nāma sa bhavet tasya yameṣa na parityajet // 6233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśasya bhavataḥ kathametal lāghavaṃ muhuratīva rateṣu / kṣiptamāyatamadarśayadurvyāṃ kāñcidāma jaghanasya mahattvam // 6234	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
īdṛśe vyavahārāgnau mantribhiḥ paripātitāḥ / sthāne khalu mahīpālā gacchanti kṛpaṇāṃ daśām // 6235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśaiḥ śvetakākīyai rājñaḥ śāsanadūṣakaiḥ / apāpānāṃ sahasrāṇi hanyante ca hatāni ca // 6236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īpsitaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ kasya saṃpadyate sukham / daivāyattaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tasmāt saṃtoṣamāśrayet // 6237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyayā rakṣato nārīr dhik kulasthitidāmbhikān / smarāndhatvāviśeṣe'pi tathā naramarakṣataḥ // 6238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyayaiva samudvignāḥ puruṣād duṣṭacetasaḥ / atisaktāḥ palāyante śrīdhṛtismṛtikīrtayaḥ // 6239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyā kalahamūlaṃ syāt kṣamā mūlaṃ hi saṃpadām / īrṣyādoṣād vipraśāpam avāpa janamejayaḥ // 6240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
īrṣyā kulastrīṣu na nāyakasya niḥśaṅkakelirna parāṅganāsu / veśyāsu caitad dvitayaṃ prarūḍhaṃ sarvasvametās tadaho smarasya // 6241	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
īrṣyād hi kupyate veśyā prasaṅgāc ca virajyate / stabdhātigamanāc cāpi dānādapi vilupyate // 6242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyāprasphuritādharoṣṭharuciraṃ vaktraṃ na me darśitaṃ sādhikṣepapadā manāgapi giro na śrāvitā mugdhayā / maddoṣaiḥ sarasaiḥ pratāpitamanovṛttyāpi kopo'nayā kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvabaddhavasanagranthyā samāveditaḥ // 6243	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īrṣyābhayakrodhasamanvitena lubdhena rugdainyanipīḍitena / vidveṣayuktena ca sevyamānam annaṃ na samyak paripākameti // 6244	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
īrṣyāmalaṃ khaleṣvāste viṣamāśīviṣeṣviva // 6245	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
īrṣyāroṣajvalito nijapatisaṅgaṃ vicintayaṃs tasyāḥ / cyutavasanajaghanabhāvana- sāndrānandena nirvāmi // 6246	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īrṣyā lobho madaḥ prītiḥ krodho bhītiś ca sāhasam / pravṛtticchidrahetūni kārye sapta budhā jaguḥ // 6247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyī ghṛṇī tvasaṃtuṣṭaḥ krodhano nityaśaṅkitaḥ / parabhāgyopajīvī ca ṣaḍete nityaduḥkhitāḥ // 6248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśaḥ karasthīkṛtakāñcanādriḥ kuberamitraṃ rajatācalasthaḥ / tathāpi bhikṣāṭanamasya jātaṃ vidhau śiraḥsthe kuṭile kutaḥ śrīḥ // 6249	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
īśānotthaiḥ śakunaiś corā grāmaṃ praviśya na labhante / na ca rogārto jīvati svastho'pyasvāsthyamāpnoti // 6250	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īśānotthaiḥ śakunair viśeṣataḥ śūramaṇḍalākrāntaiḥ / ripuveṣṭita iva dūraṃ tyaktvā sthānaṃ palāyeta // 6251	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īśe padapraṇayabhāji muhūrtamātraṃ prāṇapriye'pi kuru mānini mā prasādam / jānātu matpatirasau padayornatānām asmādṛśāmapi manorathabhaṅgaduḥkham // 6252	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
īśo daṇḍasya varuṇo rājñāṃ daṇḍadharo hi saḥ / īśaḥ sarvasya jagato brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ // 6253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
īśo duratyayaḥ kāla iti satyavatī śrutiḥ / vṛddhānāmapi yad buddhir bālavākyairvibhidyate // 6254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvaraḥ sa jagatpūjyaḥ sa vāgmī caturānanaḥ / yasyāsti draviṇaṃ loke sa eva puruṣottamaḥ // 6255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa evāhṛdayo rāhur alasaḥ sa śanaiścaraḥ / vakraḥ kujanmā satataṃ vittaṃ yasya na vidyate // 6256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe'rjuna tiṣṭhati / bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā // 6257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvaragṛhamidamatra hi viṣaṃ ca vṛṣabhaś ca bhasma cādriyate / yas tu na viṣaṃ na vṛṣabho na bhasma tasyātra kā gaṇanā // 6258	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īśvaraparigrahocita- moho'syāṃ madhupa kiṃ mudhā patasi / kanakābhidhānasārā vītarasā kitavakalikeyam // 6259	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īśvaramārādhayato vigalitamānasya labdhamaiśvaryam / sphuṭameva bhavati laghimā garimāpi kathaṃ na jānīmaḥ // 6260	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īśvarasevā sulabha- nyakkārā durlabhotkarṣā / ciraparicaryā viphalā nirmālyā niṣkramo'pi nirayāya // 6261	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
īśvarasya jagat kṛtsnaṃ sṛṣṭimākulayannimām / asti yo'strīkṛtastrīkas tasya vairaṃ smaranniva // 6262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarāḥ piśunāñ śaśvad bibhratīti kimadbhutam / prāyo nidhaya evāhīn dvijihvān dadhatetarām // 6263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarāṇāṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ tathaivācaritaṃ kvacit / teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret // 6264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarāṇāmidaṃ tantraṃ prāyeṇautsukyamāvahet / yatas tiraścāṃ caritair nītimārgaḥ pradarśyate // 6265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
īśvarāt samabhūd rudro jyotirmaya umāpatiḥ / rudrād viṣṇurabhūdādyas trailokyaparipālakaḥ // 6266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarānugṛhīto hi kaścid bālo'pi śāmyati / vṛddho'pi na śamaṃ yāti kaścit kāpuruṣaḥ punaḥ // 6267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarā bhūridānena yal labhante phalaṃ kila / daridras tacca kākiṇyā prāpnuyāditi na śrutiḥ // 6268	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvareṇa samaṃ prītir na me lakṣmaṇa rocate / gatasya gauravaṃ nāsti āgatasya dhanakṣayaḥ // 6269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvaroktād dhanurvedād vyāsasyāpi subhāṣitāt / padānyākṛṣya racito granthaḥ saṃkṣepato mayā // 6270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
īṣatkampapayodharaṃ gurukaṭīprauḍhaprahārādbhutaṃ svidyadbhālamanekahāsyasarasaṃ saṃkathyapādavyatham / vāraṃvāramuraḥprapātasubhagaṃ saṃdaśyamānādharaṃ kiṃciddattanitambadeśanakharaṃ dhanyo rataṃ sevate // 6271	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īṣattuṣāraiḥ kṛtaśītaharmyaḥ suvāsitaṃ cāruśiraḥ sacampakaiḥ / kurvanti nāryo'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ // 6272	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [ttjgg, jtjr]
īṣatprakaṭito mandas tīkṣṇas tu pulakādibhiḥ / sa tu tīkṣṇataraḥ śvāsaśoṣitāvayavo'tra yaḥ // 6273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īṣadavaśiṣṭajaḍimā śiśire gatamātra eva ciramaṅgaiḥ / navayauvaneva tanvī niṣevyate nirbharaṃ vāpī // 6274	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
īṣadāyacchamāno'pi siṃho mattānapi dvipān / nihanti balavāṃs tasmāt saṃdheyaḥ śivamicchatā // 6275	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īṣadvakritapakṣmapaṅktibhiranākūtasmitairvīkṣit aiḥ etaireva tavādya sundari karakroḍe jagad vartate / antaḥ pāṃsulahemaketakidaladroṇīdurāpaśriyo dormūlasya nivedanādiha punaḥ krūre kimākāṅkṣasi // 6276	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īṣannāsānikocaḥ kharamukharasukhaprekṣaṇaṃ hāsaleśaḥ svābodhādaprasādadhvananamasadavadyoktihelāvahelā / maunavyāsaṅgavārtāntarapararuciraślokapāṭhāda yas te soḍhavyāḥ ke kiyantaḥ śiva śiva kavite kucchalā matsarāṇām // 6277	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
īṣanmīlitadṛṣṭi mugdhavilasatsītkāradhārāvaśād avyaktākulakelikākuvikasaddantāṃśudhautādharam / śāntastabdhapayodharaṃ bhṛśapariṣvaṅgāt kuraṅgīdṛśo harṣotkarṣavimuktaniḥsahatanordhanyo dhayatyānanam // 6278	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īṣanmīlitalocanā ślathasamastāṅgā śramodvejitā niśvāsaprathamā viratnarasanā saṃtyaktakaṇṭhasvanā / prodyatkāmajalā kalāsu kuśalā nirlajjayā kāminī kāntā kālavaśāt priyasya vaśagā jātā ratānte kṣaṇam // 6279	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īṣanmīlitalolalocanayugaṃ vyāvartitabhrūyugaṃ saṃdaṣṭādharavedanāpraṇayinaṃ mā meti mandākṣaram / tanvaṅgyāḥ suratāvasānasamaye dṛṣṭaṃ mayā yanmukhaṃ svedārdrīkṛtapāṇḍugaṇḍayugalaṃ tat kena vismaryate // 6280	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īṣallabdhapraveśo'pi snehavicchedakārakaḥ / kṛtakṣobho narīnarti khalo manthānadaṇḍavat // 6281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īṣallomaśabhāvabhāñji kapiśaśyāmānubandhacchavī- liptatvañci cakorakīraharitonmeṣīṇi māṣīlatāḥ / etās tarkaya bālavānaravadhūhastāṅgulīlabdhrima- spardhāvanti phalāni bibhrati parīṇāmābhirāmaśriyaḥ // 6282	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanam / ugraṃ tapaḥ samārohen na hyanuptaṃ prarohati // 6283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vṛddhasevayā / ahiṃsayā ca dīrghāyur iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ // 6284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī / labhdanāśo yathā mṛtyur labhdaṃ bhavati vā na vā // 6285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktaṃ ca vakṣyamānaṃ ca bhartsanaṃ tiryagīkṣaṇam / kvacid yathārthakathanaṃ vyākhyā tantrasya ṣaḍvidhāḥ // 6286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
uktaṃ durvacanaṃ mayā na subhage hāsye'pi duḥkhapradaṃ tyaktvā tvāmapi bhāṣitairapi mayā nānyā ganā lālitā / tvāmekāmanavadyabhūṣaṇabharaiḥ saṃbhāvayāmi tvayā he niṣkāraṇakopane vada kṛtaḥ kopaḥ kimarthaṃ mayi // 6287	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uktaṃ parasyāmiṣatām anuktaṃ yātyadṛśyatām / hṛdaye śalyatāṃ dhatte nidhane dhanināṃ dhanam // 6288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktaṃ yat kṛpaṇaṃ vaco viracito bhūyān vasūnāṃ vyayaḥ soḍhāḥ kiṃ ca viyogavajratatayo dūtī muhuḥ preṣitā / baddho'yaṃ praṇayāñjalirvinihite bāṣpāmbudhaute dṛśau niṣpīyādharapallavaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ sarve sakhe vismṛtam // 6289	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
(uttas) te rudhireṇāhaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ te mastakaṃ mayā / ityetāñ śapathān kṛtvā sā vai gamyā punaḥ punaḥ // 6290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktā gacchati lajjitā viramati premṇā manāgikṣate keśāṃlluñcati jṛmbhaṇaṃ racayati prastauti gāthāṃ muhuḥ / āli gatyaparāṃ virauti paruṣaṃ cumbatyasau bālakaṃ gātraṃ bhañjati jṛmbhate vihasati pratyuttaraṃ yācate // 6291	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
dormūlaṃ khalu darśayet stanayuge vastraṃ samālambate a guṣṭhena likhenmahīṃ smitamukhī vrīḍāṃ vidhatte mṛṣā / dantenādharapallavaṃ vidaśati vyaktaṃ tathā bhāṣate bhāvairebhiriha sphuṭaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ jñeyo'bhilāṣaḥ sadā // 6292	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uktā bravīṣi surataṃ na mayā niśāyās tvaṃ dauṣṭavena gajagāmini lajjayā vā / tāmbūlakajjalakucāmayacihnacitraṃ tat saṃnivedayati māṃ ramaṇottarīyam // 6293	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
uktirnānyā sphurati niyataṃ dhyānamanyanna cāste paśyatyanyaṃ na khalu nayanaṃ na śravo'pi śṛṇoti / śyāmaṃ śyāmaṃ pathiṣu cakitaṃ rītiretādṛśī no vṛndāraṇye ciraparicitāḥ ke na jīvanti nāryaḥ // 6294	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uktena bahunā kiṃ vā kiṃ kṛtaiḥ śapathairghanaiḥ / vadāmi satyamevaitat tvameva mama mānase // 6295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktvānṛtaṃ bhaved yatra prāṇināṃ prāṇrakṣaṇam / anṛtaṃ tatra satyaṃ syāt satyamapyanṛtaṃ bhavet // 6296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ muktau tathaiva ca / brāhmaṇānāṃ vipattau ca śapathairnāsti pātakam // 6297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ugragrāhamudanvato jalamatikrāmatyanālambane vyomni bhrāmyati durgamaṃ kṣitibhṛtām prāgbhāramārohati / kīrṇaṃ yāti viṣākulairahikulaiḥ pātālamekākinī kīrtiste nayanābhirāma kṛtakaṃ manye bhayaṃ yoṣitām // 6298	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ugratvaṃ ca mṛdutvaṃ ca samayaṃ vīkṣya saṃśrayet / andhakāramasaṃhṛtya nogro bhavati bhāskaraḥ // 6299	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ugrarūpaṃ kucadvandvaṃ hāraga gādharaṃ tava / candracūḍaṃ kariṣyāmi kuru tāvad digambaram // 6300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ugrābhiṣa gamanuṣa gi parasya duḥkhaṃ hantāślathaṃ vyathayati prasabhārdrabhāvam / baddhaḥ sarojakuhare virahārtanādaiś cakrābhidhasya madhupo'dhikameti dainyam // 6301	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ugrāvagrāhamagnā kuśadhuvanadhutādhoraṇāsphālitā gaiḥ pratyagroddaṇḍaśuṇḍoḍḍamaraṇasamaratrastadi nā gacakraiḥ / ālokyālokya śailānurucaraṇaraṇacchṛ khalāghaṭṭayadbhir yasyāśābhittijeturmadakalakaribhiḥ kvāpi na prāpi ra gaḥ // 6302	upajāti prakṛti: ajñātam [21: mrBnyys], sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy], ajñātam [21: mrBnjyj], ajñātam [21: mrBnysy]
ugraiḥ śāpairupahatibhiyā rakṣasā dūramuktāḥ dagdhuṃ yogyā hutavahamapi tvatpriyāvarṇaśuddhāḥ / utpaśyantyo janakatanayātejasaiva svarakṣāṃ rodhaṃ yasyāmanuvidadhate lokapālāvarodhāḥ // 6303	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
ucitaṃ gopanamanayoḥ kucayoḥ kanakādrikāntitaskarayoḥ / avadhīritavidhumaṇḍala- mukhamaṇḍalagopanaṃ kimiti // 6304	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ucitaṃ nāma nāra gyāṃ ketakyāmapi kaṇṭakāḥ / rasagandhojjhite kiṃ te kaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakārike // 6305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucitaṃ bandhanamanayoḥ kucayugayoḥ kevalaṃ tanvi / yuvajanamānasahāṭaka- cauravidhau paśyatoharayoḥ // 6306	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
ucitaḥ praṇayo varaṃ vihantaṃ bahavaḥ khaṇḍanahetavo hi dṛṣṭāḥ / upacāravidhirmanasvinīnāṃ na tu pūrvābhyadhiko'pi bhāvaśūnyaḥ // 6307	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ucitakarma tanoti na saṃpadām itaradapyasadeva vivekinām / iti nirastasamastasukhānvayaḥ kathamato na viṣīdatu paṇḍitaḥ // 6308	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
ucitaguṇotkṣiptā api purato'pi niveśite suvarṇalave / jhagiti patanti mukhena prakaṭapramadā yathā ca tulāḥ // 6309.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ucitavyayaśīlasya kṛśatvamapi śobhate / dvitīyaścandramā vandyo na vandyaḥ pūrṇacandramāḥ // 6309.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucitāmupāsya rucitām abhidhehi giraṃ nirantarāvahitaḥ / apyāyatimati puruṣe prabhuṇā kaluṣeṇa bhūyate kathite // 6310	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ucitena vicāreṇa cārutāṃ yānti sūktayaḥ / vedyatattvāvabodhena vidyā iva manīṣiṇām // 6311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccaṃ pradeśaṃ bhaṣaṇo'dhiruhya bhaṣatyabhīkṣṇaṃ ravimīkṣamāṇaḥ / yadā tadānīmacireṇa vṛṣṭir ambhodamuktā bhavati prabhūtā // 6312	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccaḥ satphalado yathāyamahamapyetādṛgetāvatā spardhāṃ manda madoddhataḥ svajanakenārkeṇa mā mā kṛthāḥ / dūrādeva bhavādṛśo'sya mahasā dhvastāḥ samastāḥ svayaṃ naivecchatyayamatyayaṃ guṇisakhaḥ kasyāpi tejonidhiḥ // 6313	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccakucakumbhanihito hṛdayaṃ cālayati jaghanalagnāgraḥ / atinimnamadhyasaṃkrama- dārunibhas taruṇi tava hāraḥ // 6314	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uccāt pradeśādavatīrya nimnaṃ yo yāti vāmo'tha sukhaprado'sau / nimnapradeśāt punaruccadeśaṃ yakṣo vrajan dakṣiṇago'pi śastaḥ // 6315	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccāraṇajño'tha girāṃ dadhānam uccā raṇatpakṣigaṇās taṭīs tam / utkaṃ dharaṃ draṣṭumavekṣya śaurim utkaṃ dharaṃ dāruka ityuvāca // 6316.1	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccārūḍhairnarairātmā rakṣaṇīyo'tiyatnataḥ / dūrārohaparibhraṃśavinipātaḥ suduḥsahaḥ // 6316.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccāvacaṃ jagaddauḥsthyam eka eva niṣedhati / praviṣṭamātro nṛpatiḥ prapañcamiva naḥ śrutiḥ // 6317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
uccāvacaṃ na kuruta svanitaṃ pata gās tūrṇaṃ mukhāni paśavo mukulīkurudhvam / karṇaṃ pradāya rasikāḥ kalayantu harṣaṃ tāraṃ tanoti raṇitaṃ taruṇaḥ piko'yam // 6318	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uccāvacakarānyāyyāḥ pūrvarājñāṃ yudhiṣṭhira / yathā yathā na hīyeraṃs tathā kuryān mahīmatiḥ // 6319	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccāvacāni jananāni bhavanti yāvat karmāṇi tāvadakhilāni layaṃ na yānti / tat karmamūlahananāya yatadhvamāryā yāvacchiro na viramej jalabandharogaḥ // 6320	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
uccāsanagato nīcaḥ nīca eva na cottamaḥ / prasādaśikharastho'pi kākaḥ kiṃ garuḍāyate // 6321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccityaṃ prathamamadhaḥ sthitaṃ mṛgākṣī puṣpaughaṃ śritaviṭapaṃ grahītukāmā / āroḍhuṃ caraṇamadādaśokayaṣṭer āmūlaṃ punarapi tena puṣpito'sau // 6322	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
uccīkṛtagrīvamaho mudhaiva kiṃ yācase cātakapota megham / atyūrjjitaṃ garjjitamātramasminn ambhodhare bindulavas tu dūre // 6323	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccīyante sma veśmanyaśanavirahite yatnataḥ śrotriyāṇāṃ yatra śyāmākabījānyapi caṭakavadhūcañcukoṭicyutāni / yasmin dātaryakasmāc caṭulavaṭukarākṛṣṭamuktāvacūla- bhraṣṭās tatraiva dṛṣṭā yuvatibhiralasaṃ ghūrṇitā muktikaughāḥ // 6324	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uccaiḥ kalyāṇavāhī karajitavasudhaḥ sarvadā pūrṇakāmo vikhyātaḥ karṇavṛttyā na ca vacasi kaṭuścitrapākānubhāvī / koṣāpekṣī parasmāducitabahukathas tatparaḥ puṇyaloke citraṃ rājādhirāja tvamiva tava ripus tatra kampaṃ pratīmaḥ // 6325	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uccaiḥ kumbhaḥ kapiśadaśano bandhuraskandhasaṃdhiḥ snigdhātāmradyutinakhamaṇirlambavṛttoruhastaḥ / śūraḥ saptacchadaparimalaspardhidānodako'yaṃ bhadraḥ sāndradrumagirisarittīracārī karīndraḥ // 6326	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
uccaiḥ padamadhitiṣṭhaṃl lokas tattveṣu muhyati prāyaḥ / viṣayamapi paśyati samaṃ parvataśikharāgramārūḍhaḥ // 6327	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uccaiḥ prakathanaṃ hāsaḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ kutsanaṃ tathā / jṛmbhaṇaṃ gātrabha gaṃ ca parvasphoṭaṃ ca varjayet // 6328	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
uccaiḥ ṣṭhīvanamutkaṭaprahasitaṃ śayyāsanotsarpaṇaṃ gātrāsphoṭanajṛmbhaṇāni sulabhadravyārthasaṃprārthanam / bālāli ganacumbanānyabhimukhe sakhyāḥ samālokanaṃ dṛkpātaśca parā mukho guṇakathā karṇasya kaṇḍūyanam // 6329	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uccaiḥ sthānakṛtodayairbahuvidhairjyotirbhirudyatprabhaiḥ śukrādyaiḥ kimamībhiratra vitathāṃ prauḍhiṃ dadhānairapi / yāvallokatamopahena bhavatā lakṣmīrna vistāryate tāvaccandra kathaṃ prayāti paramāṃ vṛddhiṃ sa ratnākaraḥ // 6330	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccaiḥsthitīnāṃ viduṣāṃ padamāroḍhumicchavaḥ / satsubhāṣitasopānasevinaḥ santu sādhavaḥ // 6331	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccairadhyayanaṃ ciraṃtanakathāḥ strībhiḥ sahālāpanaṃ tāsāmarbhakalālane ratiratho tatpākamithyāstutiḥ / putrabhrātṛjanāśiṣaḥ subhagatāyogyatvasaṃkīrtanaṃ svānuṣṭhānakathābhivādanavidhirbhikṣoguṇā dvādaśa // 6332	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccairadhyayanaṃ purātanakathāḥ strībhiḥ sahālāpanaṃ tāsāmarbhakalālanaṃ patinutis tatpākamithyāstutiḥ / ādeśasya karāvalambanavidhiḥ pāṇḍityalekhakriyā horāgāruḍamantratantrakavidhirbhikṣoguṇā dvādaśa // 6333	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccairuccaratu ciraṃ cīrī vartmani taruṃ samāruhya / digvyāpini śabdaguṇe śa khaḥ saṃbhāvanā bhūmiḥ // 6334.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uccairuccaritavyaṃ yat kiṃcidajānatāpi puruṣeṇa / mūrkhā bahu manyante viduṣāmapi saṃśayo bhavati // 6334.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uccairuccaiḥśravās tena hayaratnamahāri ca / dehabaddhamivendrasya cirakālārjitaṃ yaśaḥ // 6335	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccairuccaistarāmicchan padānyāyacchate mahān / nīco nīcaistarāṃ yāti nipātabhayaśa kayā // 6336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
uccairuḍḍīyamānā natimante vahati yā tu gacchantī / yacciralabhyamathālpaṃ tatsā bahu yacchati tvaritam // 6337	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uccairuttālakheladbhujavanapavanoddhūtaśailaughapāta- sphārodañcatpayodhiprakaṭitamakuṭasvardhunīsaṃgamāni / jīyāsus tāṇḍavāni sphuṭavikaṭajaṭākoṭisaṃghaṭṭabhūri- bhraśyannakṣatracakravyavahitasumanovṛṣṭipātāni śaṃbhoḥ // 6338	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uccairuttālagaṇḍasthalabahulagaladdānapānapramatta- sphītālivrātagītiśrutividhṛtikalonmīlitārdhākṣi pakṣmā / bhaktapratyūhapṛthvīruhanivahasamunmūlanoccairudañcac- chuṇḍādaṇḍāgra ugrārbhaka ibhavadano vaḥ sa pāyādapāyāt // 6339	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uccairudghoṣya jetavyaṃ madhyasthaścedapaṇḍitaḥ / paṇḍito yadi tatraiva pakṣapāto'dhiropyatām // 6340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccairunmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhikkarmaṇā lakṣmīmasya nirasyato jalanidherjātaṃ kimetāvatā / gāmbhīryaṃ kimayaṃ jahāti kimayaṃ puṣṇāti nāmbhodharān maryādāṃ kimayaṃ bhinatti kimayaṃ na trāyate vāḍavam // 6341	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccaireṣa taruḥ phalaṃ ca pṛthulaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva hṛṣṭaḥ śukaḥ pakvaṃ śālivanaṃ vihāya jaḍadhīs tāṃ nālikerīṃ gataḥ / tāmāruhya bubhukṣitena manasā buddhiḥ kṛtā bhedane āśā tasya na kevalaṃ vigalitā cañcūrgatā cūrṇatām // 6342	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uccairdaivādiha paśupatau bhūṣaṇībhūya tiṣṭhan kālavyāla prathayasi phaṇāṃ bhīṣaṇāṃ tāvadeva / deve dūrādavinayabhayād yāvadevaṃ garutmān kopāṭopaṃ kathamapi tirobhāvayan maunamāste // 6343	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
uccairniṣādagāndhārau nīcairṛṣabhadhaivatau / śeṣāstu svaritā jñeyāḥ ṣaḍjamadhyamapañcamāḥ // 6344	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uccairbrahmāṇḍakhaṇḍadvitayasahacaraṃ kumbhayugmaṃ dadhānaḥ pre khannāgāripakṣapratibhaṭavikaṭaśrotratālābhirā maḥ / devaḥ śaṃborapatyaṃ bhujagapatitanusparddhivarddhiṣṇuhastas trailokyāścaryamūrtiḥ sa jayati jagatāmīśvaraḥ kuñjarāsyaḥ // 6345	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uccairmahārajatarājivirājitāsau durvarṇabhittiriha sāndrasudhāsavarṇā / abhyeti bhasmaparipāṇḍuritasmarārer udvahnilocanalalāmalalāṭalīlām // 6346	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
uccairyadyasti manaḥ kiṃ vipadā saṃpadā gantrī / puruṣasya manasi bhagne magnevāpatsu lakṣyate lakṣmīḥ // 6347	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
uccairyo madhupānalubdhamanasāṃ bhṛ gā ganānāṃ gaṇair udgīto racitālayaḥ khagakulairdeśāntarādāgataiḥ / āsīd yaśca niṣevito'dhvagaśatairgrīṣmoṣmatānticchide so'yaṃ saṃprati durmadena dalitaś chāyātarurdantinā // 6348	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uccaistanantamabhigamya ghanaṃ tavāham abhyāgato'smyatithireṣa payodharārthī / vaktuṃ trapā tadapi vacmi vidūrabandhoḥ kāṭhinyamasti ca payodharayormamāpi // 6349	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
uccaistarāṃ matsariṇo'pi lokāḥ kurvanti saṃsatsu puraḥ praśaṃsām / na paṇḍitarviśvasitavyamatra tatsauhṛdaṃ yat kriyate parokṣam // 6350	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccaistarādambaraśailamauleś cyuto ravirgairikagaṇḍaśailaḥ / tasyaiva pātena vicūrṇitasya saṃdhyārajorājirihojjihīte // 6351	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uccau kucau kṛśatarā ca kaṭirgabhīro nābhiḥ samunnatataraṃ ca nitambabimbam / nimnonnateti sudṛśaḥ subhage śarīre magnaṃ mano mama na māṃ punarabhyupaiti // 6352	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ucchanneva kalau vṛṣasya caraṇaśreṇī navīnāṃ punas tāṃ nirmāya kṛtas tvayā punarapi nyastaḥ padasyandanaḥ / bhindānaistaraṇiṃ tvadastraniyatairetatkilodīritaṃ śrutvānūrurasau vihāya mihiraṃ tvāṃ deva seviṣyate // 6353	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ucchalan matsyapucchāgradaṇḍapātahatārṇasi / jagadudyānamambhodhāv unmamajja mamajja ca // 6354	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchāstrapadavinyāsaḥ sahasaivābhisaṃpataḥ / śatrukha gamukhagrāsam agatvā na nivartate // 6355	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ucchidyate dharmavṛttam adharmo vartate mahān / bhayamāhurdivārātraṃ yadā pāpo na vāryate // 6356	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchidrāṇi digambarasya vasanānyardhā ginassvāmino ratnālaṃkṛtibhirviśoṣitavapuḥśobhāśataṃ subhruvaḥ / paurāḍhyāśca purīḥ śmaśānavasaterbhikṣābhujo'pyakṣamā lakṣmīṃ na vyatanod daridrabharaṇeṣvajño hi senānvayaḥ // 6357	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ucchinnāśrayakātareva kulaṭā gotrāntaraṃ śrīrgatā tāmevānugatā gatānugatikāstyaktānurāgāḥ prajāḥ / āptairapyanavāptapauruṣaphalaiḥ kāryasya dhūrujjhitā kiṃ kurvantvathavottamā garahitaira gairiva sthīyate // 6358	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ucchiṣṭaṃ karakharparaṃ pathi gataṃ mūrkhairjaḍairdhikkṛtaṃ viprais tattvavicintakairmanasi taṃ svātmaprabodhe kṛtam / nṛtyantaṃ ca digambaraṃ ca jaṭilaṃ bālaiśca muktaṃ jaḍaṃ ḍimbhaścopahasanti catvarapathe dattvā muhus tālikāḥ // 6359	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ucchiṣṭaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ vamanaṃ śavakarpaṭam / kākaviṣṭhāsamutpannāḥ pañcaite'tipavitrakāḥ // 6360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchiṣṭo na spṛśet kha gaṃ niśikuryānna śīrṣake / divā ca pūjayedenaṃ gandhamālyādisaṃpadā // 6361	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchīrṣe padakaṃ kṛtvā yadi śete śunas tadā / āgacchadvallabhaṃ vakti tadveśmanyacirādapi // 6362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchūnāruṇamaśruṇirgamavaśāc cakṣurmanā mantharaṃ soṣmaśvāsakadarthitādhararucirvyastālakā bhrūbhuvaḥ / āpāṇḍuḥ karapallave ca nibhṛtam śete kapolasthalī mugdhe kasya tapaḥphalaṃ pariṇataṃ yasmai taveyaṃ daśā // 6363	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ucchṛ kalena nirapekṣatayonmadena yenākulīkṛtamidaṃ kariṇā babhūva / dattvā padaṃ śirasi hastipakārbhakeṇa mandaḥ kathaṃ gamita eṣa vaśaṃ prasahya // 6364	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ucchedanaṃ cāpacayaḥ pīḍanaṃ karśanaṃ tathā / iti vidyāvidaḥ prāhuḥ śatrau vṛttaṃ caturvidham // 6365	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchedyamapi vidvāṃso vardhayantyarimekadā / guḍena vardhitaḥ śleṣmā yato niḥśeṣatāṃ vrajet // 6366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchmaśrurvyāttavaktraḥ pravitatarasanāpallavālīḍhasṛkkā pi gograbhrāntanetraḥ pulakitataralottānalā gūlanālaḥ / kutrāpyaklāntigāmī kvacidatipihitaḥ kvāpi tu gāgramātraś citravyāghro'yamāptuṃ pramadavanamṛgītarṇakāṃstūrṇameti // 6367	upajāti prakṛti: ajñātam [21: yrBnyyy], sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy], ajñātam [21: mrBnysj] atha vā sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ucchrāyo janabhīti heturadhikaṃ vaikṛtyamudgrīvatā sarvatra pratiparvavikramabhavaḥ krūro marurjanmabhūḥ / yasyoccaiḥ kaṭukaṇṭakapraṇayitā dhik kaṣṭamuṣṭre paśau tasmin rājaparigrahaḥ sa ca mahāśabdadvayībhājanam // 6368	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ucchvasan maṇdalaprāntarekhamābaddhakuḍmalam / aparyāptamuro vṛddheḥ śaṃsatyasyāḥ stanadvayam // 6369	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchvāsaḥ khaṇḍakhaṇḍastaralitahṛdaye mūkatāṃ bhūṣaṇānām uktipratyuktibandho'pyabhinayavihitaḥ pāṃsulā bhūḥ suśayyā / tūṣṇīmeva prasādānunayanakalahāś cumbanaṃ śabdaśūnyaṃ yatraitat svasti tasmai nibhṛtanidhuvanāyeti nāndī namo'stu // 6370	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ucchvāsayantyaḥ ślathabandhanāni gātrāṇi kandarpasamākulāni / samīpavartiṣvadhunā priyeṣu samutsukā eva bhavanti nāryaḥ // 6371	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ucchvāsahikkāśayanā gabha ga- viṣṭhāvamiśvāsavijṛmbhaṇāni / vaktraṃ śuno'rdhonmiṣitāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ dyute praśaṃsanti ca vāmaceṣṭam // 6372	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ttjll], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ucchvāsāvadhayaḥ prāṇāḥ sa cocchvāsaḥ samīraṇaḥ / samīraṇāccalaṃ nāsti yat prāṇiti tadadbhutam // 6373	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchvāso'pi na niryāti bāṇe hṛdayavartini / kiṃ punarvikaṭāṭopa padabandhā sarasvatī // 6374	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucyatāṃ sa vacanīyamaśeṣaṃ neśvare paruṣatā sakhi sādhvī / ānayainamanunīya kathaṃ vā vipriyāṇi janayannanuneyaḥ // 6375	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ucyamāno'valambeta paramarmaṇi mūkatām / svakarmaṇi tu bādhiryasthairyamādhuryasoṣmavān // 6376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjāgaritabhrāmita- danturadalaruddhamadhukaraprakare / kāñcanaketaki mā tava vikasatu saurabhyasaṃbhāraḥ // 6377	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ujjāḍite yadā grāme gacchatāṃ dakṣiṇasvarāḥ / śrgālās taṃ punaḥ sthānaṃ kathayanti karasthitam // 6378	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ujjṛmbhate kumudinīsukṛtaṃ mṛgā ko viṣvagvikīrṇaparipāṭalaraśmidaṇḍaḥ / utsūtavidrumakulo jaladhes tara gād utkṣipyamāṇa iva kaścana rājakambuḥ // 6379	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
ujjṛmbhānanamullasatkucataṭaṃ loladbhramadbhrūlataṃ svedāmbhaḥsnapitā gayaṣṭi vigaladvrīḍaṃ saromāñcayā / dhanyaḥ ko'pi yuvā sa yasya vadane vyāpāritāḥ sāṃprataṃ mugdhe dugdhamahābdhiphenapaṭalaprakhyāḥ kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ // 6380	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ujjvalaṃ saralaṃ caiva vakramāraktameva ca / netraṃ caturvidhaṃ proktaṃ tasya bhāvāḥ pṛthak pṛthak // 6381	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjvalam mitrasaṃyoge saralaṃ putradarśane / vakraṃ ca kāminībhoge āraktaṃ śatrudarśane // 6382	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjvalaguṇamabhyuditaṃ kṣudro draṣṭuṃ na kathamapi kṣamate / dagdhvā tanumapi śalabho dīpraṃ dīpārciṣaṃ harati // 6383	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ujjvalacampakamukulā- śa kitayā yaḥ pradīpakaṃ spṛśati / kajjalakala kadāhaṃ muktvānyat tasya kiṃ ghaṭatām // 6384	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ujjvalālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate / malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayā yathā // 6385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjhatī śucimivāśu tamisrām antikaṃ vrajati tārakarāje / dikprasādaguṇamaṇḍanamūhe raśmihāsaviśadaṃ mukhamaindrī // 6386	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ujjhantyaḥ svarṇakāñcīrjhaṇiti raśanayā campakanyāsamayyā tanvatyastārahārān vicakilakalikāpaṃktimudrāvalībhiḥ / kiṃ cāśokapravālairaruṇamaṇimayān saṃtyajantyo'vataṃsān utkīrṇāḥ kāmabāṇairiva hṛdi suhṛdo vallabhānāṃ babhūvuḥ // 6387	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
ujjhitavṛṣayogā api ratisamaye naraviśeṣanirapekṣāḥ / kṛṣṇaukābhiratā api hiraṇyakaśipupriyāḥ satatam // 6388	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ujjhitasaubhāgyamada- sphuṭayācñāna gabhītayoryūnoḥ / akalitamanasorekā dṛṣṭirdūtī nisṛṣṭārthī // 6389	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ujjhitāhamiti vatsa na dūye rāghaveṇa kuladūṣaṇabhītyā / kā tvamityabhihite bata vanyān śrāvaye kimiti muhyati cetaḥ // 6390	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
ujjhitvā diśamambaraṃ varataraṃ vāso vasānaściraṃ hitvā vāsarasaṃ punaḥ pitṛvane kailāsaharmyāśrayaḥ / tyaktvā bhasma kṛtā garāganicayaḥ śrīkhaṇḍasāradravair devaḥ pātu himādrijāpariṇayaṃ kṛtvā gṛhasthaḥ śivaḥ // 6391	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uḍugaṇaparivāro nāyako'pyauṣadhīnām ayamamṛtaśarīraḥ kāntiyukto'pi candraḥ / bhavati vigataraśmirmaṇḍalaṃ prāpya bhānoḥ parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti // 6392	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
uḍuparivṛḍhaḥ patyā muktāmayaṃ yadapīḍayad yadapi bisinīṃ bhānorjāyāṃ jahāsa kumudvatī / tadubhaya mataḥ śa ke sa kocitaṃ nijaśa kayā prasarati navārke karkandhūphalāruṇarocaṣi // 6393	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uḍupariṣadaḥ kiṃ nārhatvaṃ niśaḥ kimu naucitī patiriha na yad dṛṣṭas tābhyāṃ gaṇeyarucīgaṇaḥ / sphuṭamuḍupaterāśmaṃ vakṣaḥ sphuranmalināśmana- cchavi yadanayorvicchede'pi drutaṃ bata na drutam // 6394	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
uḍurājamukhī mṛgarājakaṭir gajarājavirājitamandagatiḥ / yadi sā vanitā hṛdaye nihitā kva japaḥ kva tapaḥ kva samādhiratiḥ // 6395	toṭaka [12: ssss]
uḍḍāyitaḥ pūrvadiśā krameṇa prakāśara gaḥ pṛthulaḥ pataṇgaḥ / pāre viyadvicyutaraśmirarvāk patannidānīṃ kṣapito'staśaile // 6396	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jjjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uḍḍīnaṃ vihagairmṛtaṃ jalacaraiḥ kṣmāntargataṃ kacchapaiḥ pāṭhīnaiḥ pṛthupa kapīṭhaluṭhanādyasmin muhurmūrcchitam / tasminneva sarasyakālajaladenāgatya tacceṣṭitaṃ yenākumbhanimagnavanyakariṇāṃ yūthaiḥ payaḥ pīyate // 6397	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uḍḍīnā guṇapatriṇaḥ sukhaphalānyārād vikīrṇānyadhaḥ paryastāḥ parito yaśastabakitāḥ saṃpallatāpallavāḥ / prāgevāpasṛtaḥ pramodahariṇaścchāyā kathāntaṃ gatā daivāraṇyamata gajena balinā bhagne'bhimānadrume // 6398	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uḍḍīnānāmeṣāṃ prāsādāt taruṇi pakṣiṇāṃ pa ktiḥ / visphurati vaijayantī pavanacchinnāpaviddheva // 6399	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uḍḍīyāgatamindumaṇḍalamidaṃ kiṃ khañjarīṭadvayaṃ hitvā korakatāṃ vikasvaratare yāte kimindīvare / indorbimbamavāpya jātarabhasau kiṃ vā cakorāvimāv āṃ jñātaṃ śapharīvilāsapaṭunī netre kura gīdṛśaḥ // 6400	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ tu sahajaṃ kathitaṃ guruṇā sadā / abhyasedastatandras tu vṛddho'pi taruṇo bhavet // 6401	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uḍḍīyordhvaṃ gamane nipatyavacanā vadhonmukhī śakuniḥ / vāme yāturnidhanaṃ diśati vipakṣe vipakṣasya // 6402.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uta vā tṛṇavān mārgaḥ samo gamyaḥ praśasyate / suśodhyas trividho mārgaḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ ca svakaṃ balam // 6402.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkaṭakaṇṭakakoṭī- gharṣaṇaghṛṣṭāni hṛdi na cintayati / asadṛśarasavivaśamatir viśatyaliḥ ketakīkusumam // 6403	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
utkaṇṭhayati meghānāṃ mālā vṛndaṃ kalāpinām / yūnāṃ cotkaṇṭhayatyeṣa mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ // 6404	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkaṇṭhākulacakravākayuvatīniḥśvāsadaṇḍāhataḥ pīyūṣadyutiracchadarpaṇatulāmārohati prasthitaḥ / kokānāṃ kṛpayeva kukkuṭaravairāhūyamāne ravau dig jātā navadhautavidrumamaṇicchāyā ca sautrāmaṇī // 6405	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkaṇṭhākulamastu kaṇṭakakule saṃjāyatāṃ te manaḥ sānandaṃ picumandakandaladalāsvādeṣu kā vā kṣatiḥ / etat kiṃ tu tava kramelaka kathaṃkāraṃ sahe duḥsahaṃ tasmin puṇḍrakakandalīkisalaye yenāsi nindāparaḥ // 6406	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkaṇṭhita mano bālā sudūrasthā navaṃ vayaḥ / vidhirvāmo ripuḥ kāmo hā hā duḥkhaparamparā // 6407	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayānuguṇā vayasyā saṃketake cirayati pravaro vinodaḥ / saṃsthāpanā priyatamā virahāturāṇāṃ raktasya rāgaparivṛddhikaraḥ pramodaḥ // 6408	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayānugatā sakhīva saṃkīrṇadoṣarahitā viṣayeṣu goṣṭhī / krīḍāraseṣu madanavyasaneṣu kāntā strīṇāṃ tu kāntarativighnakarī sapatnī // 6409	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkampagharmapicchila- doḥsādhikahastavicyutaś cauraḥ / śivamāśāste sutanu stanayostava pañcalāñcalayoḥ // 6410	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
utkampinī bhayapariskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī / krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi // 6411	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkampo'pi sakampa eva hṛdaye cintāpi cintānvitā niḥśvāsā api niḥśvasantyanibhṛtaṃ bāṣpo'pi bāṣpāyate / kāntāṃ saṃsmarato videśavasaternaktaṃ divaṃ kāminaḥ prārohā iva niṣpatanti manaso duḥkhāni duḥkhānvitāt // 6412	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkampo hṛdaye skhalanti vacanānyāvegalolaṃ mano gātraṃ sīdati cakṣuraśrukaluṣaṃ cintā mukhaṃ śuṣyati / yasyaiṣā sakhi pūrvara garacanā mānaḥ sa mukto mayā vansyāstā api yoṣitaḥ kṣititale yāsāmayaṃ saṃmataḥ // 6413	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkarṇaṃ kariṇāṃ gaṇena vikasanmodaṃ cirād barhibhiḥ krīḍākeśaribhiśca pañjaragataiḥ kopasphurallocanam / kuñjotsa gabhuvi prakampataralaṃ sīmantinībhiḥ kṣaṇāt pītaḥ śrotrapuṭena deva paritaḥ prātarmṛda gadhvaniḥ // 6414	upajāti atidhṛti: śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg], ajñātam [19: tsjsttg], ajñātam [19: msjstjg] atha vā śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkarṇo'yamakāṇḍacaṇḍimapaṭuḥ sphārasphuratkesaraḥ krūrākārakarālavakravikaṭastabdhordhvalā gūlabhṛt / citreṇāpi na śakyate'bhilikhituṃ sarvā gasaṃkocanāc cītkurvadgirikuñjakuñjaraśiraḥ kumbhasthalastho hariḥ // 6415	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkartituṃ samartho'pi gantuṃ caiva sapakṣakaḥ / dvirepho gandhalobhena kamale yāti bandhanam // 6416	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkarṣavān nijaguṇo yathā yathā yāti karṇamanyasya / dhanuriva suvaṃśajanmā tathā tathā sajjano namati // 6417	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
utkarṣo naiva nityaḥ syānnāpakarṣas tathaiva ca / prāk karmavaśato nityaṃ sadhano nirdhano bhavet // 6418	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkalikābāhulyaṃ tat tat svābhāvikaṃ dravatvaṃ ca / sa ca nirupādhisnehas teneśasya priyā ga gā // 6419	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utkallolasya lakṣmīṃ lavaṇajalanidhirlambhitaḥ kṣīrasindhoḥ ko vindhyaḥ kaśca gaurīgururiti marutāmabhyudasto vivekaḥ / nītāḥ karkatvamarkapravahaṇaharayo hāritotsa galakṣmā rājannuddāmagaurairajani ca rajanīvallabhastvadyaśobhiḥ // 6420	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkāmunmanayantyete bālāṃ tadalakatviṣaḥ / ambhodharās taḍitvanto gambhīrāḥ stanayitnavaḥ // 6421	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkīrṇā iva vāsayaṣṭiṣu niśānidrālasā barhiṇo dhūpairjālaviniḥsṛtair valabhayaḥ saṃdigdhapārāvatāḥ / ācāraprayataḥ sapuṣpabaliṣu sthāneṣu cārciṣmatīḥ saṃdhyāma galadīpikā vibhajate śuddhāntavṛddho janaḥ // 6422	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkūjati bhramati roditi rāraṭīti padmāni cotkṣipati cañcupuṭena dūram / toye nimajjati śaśā kamudīkṣate ca kaṣṭaṃ priyāvirahito niśi cakravākaḥ // 6423	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkūjati śvasiti muhyati yāti tīraṃ tīrāt taruṃ tarutalāt punareti vāpīm / vāpyāṃ na tiṣṭhati na cāti mṛṇālakhaṇḍaṃ cakraḥ kṣapāsu virahe khalu cakravākyāḥ // 6424	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkūjantu vaṭe vaṭe bata bakāḥ kākā varākā api krāṃkurvantu sadā ninādapaṭavaste pippale pippale / so'nyaḥ ko'pi rasālapallavalavagrāsollasatpāṭava- krīḍatkokilakaṇṭhakūjanakalālīlāvilāsakramaḥ // 6425	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkṛtya jvalitāt śavāt kathamapi pretāśanaḥ paiśitīṃ peśīmagnimayīṃ nigīrya sahasā dandahyamānodaraḥ / dhāvatyutplavate muhurnipatati prottiṣṭhati prekṣate viṣvakkrośati saṃpinaṣṭi jaṭharaṃ muṣṭyā hate mastakam // 6426	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkṛtyotkṛtya kṛttiṃ prathamamatha pṛthūcchophabhūyāṃsi māṃsānya aṃsasphikpṛṣṭhapiṇḍādyavayavasulabhānyugrapūt īni jagdhvā / āttasnāyvantranetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretara kaḥ kara kād a kasthādasthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamavyagramatti // 6427	ajñātasamavṛtta [20: mynnttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkṛtyotkṛtya garbhānapi śakalayataḥ kṣatrasaṃtānaroṣād uddāmasyaikaviṃśatyavadhi vidhasataḥ sarvato rājavaṃśyān / pitryaṃ tadraktapūrṇahradasavanamahānandamandāyamāna- krodhāgneḥ kurvato me na khalu na viditaḥ sarvabhūtaiḥ svabhāvaḥ // 6428	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
utkṛṣṭabalavīryasya vijigīṣorjayaiṣiṇaḥ / guṇānuraktaprakṛter yātrā yānamiti smṛtam // 6429	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
utkṛṣṭamadhyamanikṛṣṭajaneṣu maitrī yadvacchilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā / vairaṃ kramādadhamamadhyamasajjaneṣu yadvacchilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā // 6430	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkocaṃ prītidānaṃ ca dyūtadravyaṃ subhāṣitam / kāminīṃ prathamāvasthāṃ sadyo gṛhṇāti buddhimān // 6431	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkocakāścaupadhikā vañcakāḥ kitavās tathā / ma galādeśavṛttāśca bhadraprekṣaṇikaiḥ saha // 6432	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asamyakkāriṇaścaiva mahāmātrāścikitsakāḥ / śilpopacārayuktāśca nipuṇāḥ puṇyayoṣitaḥ // 6433	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamādyān vijānīyāt prakāśāṃllokakaṇṭakān / vigūḍhacāriṇaścānyān anāryānāryali ginaḥ // 6434	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
utkocapāritoṣaka- bhāṭasubhāṣitatarārthacauryāṃśāḥ / tatkṣaṇameva grāhyāḥ ṣaḍanyakāle na labhyante // 6435	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
utkrāntaṃ girikūṭala ghanasahaṃ te vajrasārā nakhās tattejaśca tadūrjitaṃ sa ca nagonmāthī ninādo mahān / ālasyādavimuñcatā giriguhāṃ siṃhena nidrālunā sarvaṃ viśvajayaikasādhanamidaṃ labdhaṃ na kiṃcit kṛtam // 6436	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkrāntānāmāmiṣāyopariṣṭād adhyākāśaṃ babhrumuḥ patravāhāḥ / mūrtāḥ prāṇā nūnamadyāpyavekṣā- māsuḥ kāyaṃ tyājitā dāruṇāstraiḥ // 6437	śālinī [11: mttgg]
utkrāmadbhiśca yaḥ prāṇaiḥ prayataḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataḥ / cintayen manasā ga gāṃ sa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet // 6438	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
utkṣiptaṃ karaka kaṇadvayamidaṃ baddhā dṛḍhaṃ mekhalā yatnena pratipāditā mukharayormañjīrayormūkatā / ārabdhe rabhasān mayā priyasakhi krīḍābhisārotsave caṇḍālastimirāvaguṇṭhanapaṭakṣepaṃ vidhatte vidhuḥ // 6439	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkṣiptaṃ sakhi vartipūritamukhaṃ mūkīkṛtaṃ nūpuraṃ kāñcīdāma nivṛttagharghararavaṃ kṣiptaṃ dukūlāntare / suptāḥ pañjarasārikāḥ parijano'pyāghūrṇito nidrayā śūnyo rājapathastamāṃsi niviḍānyehyehi nirgamyatām // 6440	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkṣiptaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sākaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ bhūpānāṃ janakasya saṃśayadhiyā sārdhaṃ samāsphālitam / vaidehīmanasā samaṃ ca sahasā kṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava- prauḍhāhaṃkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ bhagnaṃ tadaiśaṃ dhanuḥ // 6441	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkṣiptabāhudarśita- bhujamūlaṃ cūtamukula mama sakhyā / ākṛṣyamāṇa rājati bhavataḥ paramuccapadalābhaḥ // 6442	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
utkṣiptamucchritasitāṃśukarāvalambair uttambhitoḍubhiratīvatarāṃ śirobhiḥ / śraddheyanirjharajalavyapadeśamasya viṣvaktaṭeṣu patati sphuṭamantarīkṣam // 6443	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkṣiptā api dantīdraiḥ kopanaiḥ pattayaḥ param / tadasūnaharan khaḍgaghātaiḥ svasya puraḥ prabhoḥ // 6444	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkṣipya karibhirdūrān muktānāṃ yodhināṃ divi / prāpi jīvātmabhirdivyā gatirvā vigrahairmahī // 6445	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkṣipya ṭiṭṭibhaḥ pādāv āste bha gabhayād divaḥ / svacittakalpito garvaḥ kasya nātrāpi vidyate // 6446	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkṣipyālakamālikāṃ vilulitāmāpāṇḍugaṇḍasthalād viśliṣyadvalayaprapātabhayataḥ prollāsya kiṃcit karau / dvārastambhaniṣaṇṇagātralatikā kenāpi puṇyātmanā mārgālokanadattadṛṣṭirabalā tatkālamāli gyate // 6447	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkṣipyoccaiḥ prasphurantaṃ radābhyām īṣādantaḥ kuñjaraṃ śātravīyam / śṛ gaprotaprāvṛṣeṇyāmbudasya spaṣṭaṃ prāpat sāmyamurvīdharasya // 6448	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
utkhātaṃ nidhiśa kayā kṣititalaṃ dhmātā girerdhātavo nistīrṇaḥ saritāṃpatirnṛpatayo yatnena saṃsevitāḥ / mantrārādhanatatpareṇa manasā nītāḥ śmaśāne niśāḥ prāptaḥ kāṇavarāṭako'pi na mayā tṛṣṇe'dhunā mā bhava // 6449	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkhātacchinnasaṃdhyāruṇakamalavano vyomakāsāramadhyaṃ manye matto niśīthāhvayavanamahiṣo ma kṣvavikṣanmima kṣuḥ / tatkālodbhidyamānaḥ saha tanupṛthubhis tārakābudbudaughais tasmādevojjihīte kaluṣitabhuvanaṃ bhīṣaṇo dhvāntapa kaḥ // 6450	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
utkhātadaivatamivāyatanaṃ purārer astācalāntaritasūryamivāntarikṣam / hammīrabhūbhuji gate suraveśma viśvaṃ paśyāmi hāramiva nāyakaratnaśūnyam // 6451	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
utkhātān pratiropayan kusumitāṃścinvaṃllaghūn vardhayan atyuccān namayan pṛthūn vidalayan viśleṣayan saṃhatān / tīkṣnān kaṇṭakino bahirniyamayan svāropitān pālayan mālākāra iva prayogakuśalo rājye ciraṃ tiṣṭhati // 6452	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
utkhāya cittopavanāt sumedho- mālā kṛtā pustakaniṣkuṭeṣu / kāvyadrumāṇāmadhiropitānāṃ phalaṃ parāṃ nirvṛtimunnayāmaḥ // 6453	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
utkhelattrivalītara gataralā romāvalīśaivala- stragvalliryuvatī dhruvaṃ janamanonirvāṇavārāṇasī / etasyā yadurastaṭīparisare yadbālyacāpalyayoḥ sthāne yauvanaśilpikalpitacitācaityadvayaṃ dṛśyate // 6454	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uttaṃsaḥ kekipicchairmarakatavalayaśyāmale doḥprakāṇḍe hāraḥ sāndrendranīlairmṛgamadaracito vaktrapatraprapañcaḥ / nīlābjaiḥ śekharaśrīrasitavasanatā cetyabhīkābhisāre saṃpratyeṇekṣaṇānāṃ timirabharasakhī vartate veṣalīlā // 6455	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
uttaṃsakautukarasena vilāsinīnāṃ lūnāni yasya na nakhairapi pallavāni / udyānamaṇḍanataro sahakāra sa tvam a gārakārakaragocaratāṃ gato'si // 6456	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uttaṃsitaṃ bhāti mukhaprabhābhir na kiṃcidabjaṃ yadaho tadasyāḥ / yuktaṃ dṛśāveva vidhirvidhijñaḥ karṇadvayālaṃkaraṇaṃ cakāra // 6457	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
uttaṃsīkṛtacandramāḥ sabhujagān vīcīn parāvartayan jyotsnābhasmavilepane niravadhisphīte mahimni sthitaḥ / pre kaccha karoṭikoṭihananaiḥ svaḥsindhumudghoṣayann atyantaṃ pathi garjitāṭṭahasito rudraṃ hasatyarṇavaḥ // 6458	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uttaṃseṣu nanarta na kṣitibhujāṃ na prekṣakairlakṣitaḥ sākā kṣaṃ luṭhito na ca stanataṭe līlāvatīnāṃ kvacit / kaṣṭaṃ bhościramantareva jaladherdaivād viśīrṇo'bhavat kheladvyālakulā gagharṣaṇaparikṣīṇapramāṇo maṇiḥ // 6459	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
uttapto'yamuraṃgamaḥ śikhitalacchāyāṃ samālambate vairaṃ sāhajikaṃ vihāya ca śikhī mūlaṃ tarorgacchati / yācante ca jalaṃ nikuñjabhavane tṛṣṇāturāḥ sārikās tapte vāriṇi pa kajāni madhupāstyaktvā śrayante latāḥ // 6460	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
uttamaṃ puṣkarakṣetraṃ tārākṣetraṃ na madhyamam / adhamaṃ ca kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsaṃ tvadhamādhamam // 6461	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaṃ praṇipātena śūraṃ bhedena yojayet / nīcamalpapradānena samaśaktiṃ parākramaiḥ // 6462	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaṃ suciraṃ naiva vipado'bhibhavantyalam / rāhugrasanasaṃbhūtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ vicchāyayed vidhum // 6463	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaṃ svārjitaṃ vittaṃ madhyamaṃ piturarjitam / adhamaṃ bhrātṛvittaṃ ca strīvittamadhamādhamam // 6464	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaḥ kleśavikṣobhaṃ kṣamaḥ soḍhuṃ na hītaraḥ / maṇireva mahāśāṇagharṣaṇaṃ na tu mṛtkaṇaḥ // 6465	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaḥ ṣaṭpadaḥ prokto madhyamaḥ pañcabhis tathā / kaniṣṭhastu caturbhiḥ syād evaṃ syurdhruvakās tridhā // 6466	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamakule'pi jātaḥ sevāṃ vidadhāti nīcalokasya / vadati ca vācaṃ nīcām udareśvarapīḍito martyaḥ // 6467	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uttamataruṇaprakṛtiḥ pulakādikasūcitānyatanusaktiḥ / sphuṭasaṃnihitavibhāvo nivāryate kena śṛ gāraḥ // 6468	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttamapadārtharasikāḥ sulabhā loke bhavanti sarve'pi / dūṣitapadārtharasikas tvamiva matas tvaṃ punaḥ karaṭa // 6469	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uttamabhujaṃgasaṃgama- nispandanitambacāpalastasyāḥ / mandaragiririva vibudhair itastataḥ kṛṣyate kāyaḥ // 6470	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uttamarṇadhanadānaśa kayā pāvakotthaśikhayā hṛdisthayā / deva dagdhavasanā sarasvatī nāsyato bahirupaiti lajjayā // 6471	upajāti triṣṭubh: rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg], ajñātam [11: rnBlg]
uttamarṇamukhaṃ paśyann adhamarṇo hriyā naman / mṛtyujīvitayoryuddhasaṃbhramaṃ parilokate // 6472	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamavanitaikagatiḥ karīva sarasīpayaḥ sakhīdhairyam / āskanditoruṇā tvaṃ hastenaiva spṛśan harasi // 6473	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uttamaś cintitaṃ kuryāt proktakārī tu madhyamaḥ / adhamo'śraddhayā kuryād akartoccaritam pituḥ // 6474	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamastoṣamāyāti tada gaṃ poṣyate yadi / vṛkṣaḥ prasīdati prāyaḥ pādābhya gena na svayam // 6475	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
uttamasya kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyasya praharadvayam / adhamasya tvahorātraṃ pāpiṣṭho naiva mucyate // 6476	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ / pūjanīyo yathāyogyaṃ sarvadevamayo'tithiḥ // 6477	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ / bālo vā yadi vā vṛddhaḥ sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ // 6478	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamāḥ svaguṇaiḥ khyātā madhyamāśca piturguṇaiḥ / adhamā mātulasyāpi śvaśurasyādhamādhamāḥ // 6479	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamāḥ svārjitairdravyaiḥ piturvittena madhyamāḥ / adhamā mātṛvittena strīvittenādhamādhamāḥ // 6480	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamā ātmanaḥ khyātāḥ pituḥ khyātāśca madhyamāḥ / adhamā mātulāt khyātāḥ śvaśurāc cādhamādhamaḥ // 6481	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamā godbhavāj jyaiṣṭhyād brahmaṇaścaiva dhāraṇāt / sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // 6482	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanaṃ budhaiḥ / tatra cātmahitaṃ grāhyaṃ vastavākyaṃ yathā nṛpaḥ // 6483	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamādhamamadhyāni buddhvā kāryāṇi pārthivaḥ / uttamādhamamadhyeṣu puruṣeṣu niyojayet // 6484	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamādhamasaṃsaktau jānan sadṛśavṛttitām / nārīṇāṃ śucibāhyānām a ganākhyāṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ // 6485	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamānāṃ svabhāvo'yaṃ paraduḥkhāsahiṣṇutā / svayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ manyate'nyasya vāryate // 6486	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamānāmapi strīṇāṃ viśvāso naiva vidyate / rājapriyāḥ kairaviṇyo ramante madhupaiḥ saha // 6487	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
uttamānuttamāneva gacchan hīnāṃśca varjayan / brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhatāmeti pratyavāyena śūdratām // 6488	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamāneva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān / adhamāṃstu na seveta ya icchec śreya ātmanaḥ // 6489	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamābhijanopetān na nīcaiḥ saha vardhayet / kṛśo'pi hi vivekajño yāti saṃśrayaṇīyatām // 6490	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamāścātmanā khyātāḥ pitrā khyātāśca madhyamāḥ / adhamā mātulaiḥ khyātāḥ śvaśuraiścādhamādhamāḥ // 6491	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamās tājikāḥ proktāḥ pārasīkāḥ samudrajāḥ / kokkāṇākhatalāṇāśca tathā saurāṣṭrajā hayāḥ // 6492	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttame tu kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyame ghaṭikādvayam / adhame syādahorātraṃ cāṇḍāle maraṇāntikaḥ // 6493	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamenottamaṃ sarvaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prayatnataḥ / adṛṣṭamīkṣya sarveṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ suvicakṣaṇaiḥ // 6494	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttame vighnavattāsti adhamo duḥkhabhājanam / tasmāt sarvatra yogyatvāc śreṣṭho vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ // 6495	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaiḥ saha sa gena ko na yāti samunnatim / mūrdhnā tṛṇāni dhāryante grathitaiḥ kusumaiḥ saha // 6496	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathām / alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // 6497	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ yat prājñaiḥ satyavādibhiḥ / bandhanastho'pi tiṣṭheta na tu rājye narādhamaiḥ // 6498	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamaiḥ svīkṛto nīco nīca eva na cottamaḥ / bhairavādhiṣṭhitaḥ śvā tu kadācin naiva kesarī // 6499	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamairananujñātaṃ kāryaṃ necchec ca taiḥ saha / devaiḥ sākaṃ sudhāpānād rāhoś chinnaṃ śiro yataḥ // 6500	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamairuttamairnityaṃ saṃbandhānācaret saha / ninīṣuḥ kulamutkarṣam adhamānadhamāṃs tyajet // 6501	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamo nātivaktā syād adhamo bahubhāṣakaḥ / na hi svarṇe dhvanis tādṛg yādṛk kāṃsye prajāyate // 6502	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamo'pi kulajo'pi manuṣyaḥ sarvalokamahito'pi budho'pi / dāsatāṃ bhajati yāṃ bhajamānas tāṃ bhajanti gaṇikāṃ kimu santaḥ // 6503	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
uttamo'pyadhamasya syād yācñānamrakaraḥ kvacit / kaustubhādīni ratnāni yayāce harirambudhim // 6504	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamo'prārthito datte madhyamaḥ prārthitaḥ punaḥ / yācakairyācyamāno'pi datte na tvadhamādhamaḥ // 6505	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamo madhyamo nīco'dhamo bhrātṛguṇairnaraḥ / kanyāstrībhaginībhāgyo naro'dhamatamo mataḥ // 6506	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamo rasavādaśca dhātuvādaśca madhyamaḥ / adhamo mantravādaśca mithyāvādo'dhamādhamaḥ // 6507	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttara gaya kura galocane locane kamalagarvamocane / astu sundari kalindanandinī- vīciḍambaragabhīramambaram // 6508	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: Bnslg], rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
uttarataśca madhūkād ahinilayaḥ paścimottare toyam / parihṛtya pañcahastān ardhāṣṭamapauruṣaṃ vācyam // 6509	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
uttaranti vinikīrya palvalaṃ gāḍhapa kamativāhitātapāḥ / daṃṣṭriṇo vanavarāhayūthapā daṣṭabha gurabisā kurā iva // 6510	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
uttarāduttaraṃ vākyam uttarādeva jāyate / suvṛṣṭiguṇasaṃpannād bījād bījamivāparam // 6511	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttarāpathakāntānāṃ kiṃ brūmo rāmaṇīyakam / yāsāṃ tuṣārasaṃbhede na mlāyati mukhāmbujam // 6512	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttarīyavinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tadīkṣaṇamārgam / āvariṣṭa vikaṭena vivoḍhur vakṣasaiva kucamaṇḍalamanyā // 6513	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
uttareṇa kimātmaiva pañcabāṇāgnisākṣikam / tava sakhyai mayā datto na sevyaḥ sevitā rahaḥ // 6514	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttareṇa sadā kāryaṃ prāṇasya na virodhakam / saṃgrāmeṇa vinā kāryaṃ na lakṣyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham // 6515	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
