kaṭvervārau yathā pakve madhuraḥ san raso'pi na / prāpyate hyātmani tathā nāpakvakaraṇe jñatā // 8357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kaṭhinaṃ vā madhuraṃ vā prastutavacanaṃ manohāri / vāme gardabhanādaś cittaprītyai prayāṇeṣu // 8358	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kaṭhinaḥ kṛśamūlaśca durlabho dakṣiṇetaraḥ / kaścit kalyāṇagotro'pi manuṣyairnopajīvyate // 8359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṭhinakucau tava bāle taralasarojākṣi tāvakaṃ cakṣuḥ / kuṭilasukeśi kacās te mithyā bhaṇitaṃ kṛśāṅgi tava madhyam // 8360	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kaṭhinataradāmaveṣṭana- lekhāsaṃdehadāyino yasya / rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ // 8361	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṭhinasyāpi hṛdayaṃ guṇavānārdrayed dṛśā / candrakāntopalaṃ candraḥ svāṃśubhirdrāvayatyasau // 8362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca krodhaṃ sukhapratighātakaṃ likhati divasaṃ yātaṃ yātaṃ yamaḥ kila mānini / vayasi taruṇe naitad yuktaṃ cale ca samāgame bhavati kalaho yāvat tāvad varaṃ subhage ratam // 8363	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca bhrāntiṃ vyalīkakathāśrayāṃ piśunavacanairduḥkhaṃ netuṃ na yuktamimaṃ janam / kimidamatha vā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayādya viniścitaṃ yadabhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām // 8364	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kaṭhināstīkṣṇavaktrāśca tīkṣṇodarkās tathaiva ca / gaṇakaiḥ kiṃ nu lekhanyas tā vā kiṃ te vinirmitāḥ // 8365	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṭhine durgame vāso guptaśaktiprakāśanam / raṇe putraḥ yathā śocyaḥ kalahaṃ veśyayā saha // 8366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṭhoranakharāhatadviradakumbhapīṭhasthalī- luṭhadrudhirarañjitollalitakesaraḥ kesarī / gabhīraravakātarāturatarāturavyāhṛtaiḥ patan hariṇakaiḥ samaṃ samarabhūmikāṃ lajjate // 8367	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
kaṭhorapārāvatakaṇṭhamecakaṃ vapurvūṣaskandhasubandhurāṃsakam / prasannarsihastimitaṃ ca vīkṣitaṃ dhvaniśca maṅgalyamṛdaṅgamāṃsalaḥ // 8368	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: ytjr], ajñātam [12: yjjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] atha vā vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kaṭhorāsthigranthivyatikararaṇatkāramukharaḥ kharasnāyucchedakṣaṇavihitavegavyupaśamaḥ / nirātaṅkaḥ paṅkeṣviva piśitapiṇḍeṣu vilasa- nnasirgātraṃ gātraṃ sapadi lavaśas te vikiratu // 8369	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kaṇa iva purāṃ vahnerbhasmāvadhūlanasaṅgato jayati bahalālokasphārāvadhūtaniśodayaḥ / smaraharajaṭābandhagranthirbhujaṅgaphaṇāmaṇi- stridaśataṭinīpūrānītaḥ sphuranniva tārakaḥ // 8370	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kaṇācāmatuṣāṅgārān yatnena parirakṣasi / mūṣakāpahṛtaṃ koṣe ratnarāśiṃ na paśyasi // 8371	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakasya tu bhagnasya dantasya calitasya ca / amātyasya ca duṣṭasya mūlāduddharaṇaṃ sukham // 8372	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakān kūpamagniṃ ca varjayanti yathā narāḥ / tathā nṛśaṃsakarmāṇaṃ varjayanti narā naram // 8373	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakāvaraṇaṃ yādṛk phalitasya phalāptaye / tādṛg durjanasaṅgo'pi sādhusaṅgāya bādhanam // 8374	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakitatanuśarīrā lajjāmukulāyamānanayaneyam / tava kumudinīva vāñchati nṛcandra bālā karasparśam // 8375	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṇṭakenāpi ye spṛṣṭā yānti kāmapi vikriyām / te'pi śastranikṛntasya paśormāṃsāni bhuñjate // 8376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakenāpi viddhasya mahatī vedanā bhavet / cakrabhīṣaṇakhaḍgādyair māryamāṇasya kiṃ punaḥ // 8377	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭakairiva vidāritapādaḥ padminīparicitairaparādreḥ / āruroha sarasīruhabandhuḥ skandhamambudhitaṭīgamanāya // 8378.1	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
kaṇṭako dārukhaṇḍaṃ ca vitanoti galavyathām / vyañjanāntarnipatitas tālu vidhyati vṛścikaḥ // 8378.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kaṇṭakyakaṇṭakānāṃ vyatyāse'mbhastribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt / khātvā puruṣatritayaṃ tribhāgayuktaṃ dhanaṃ vā syāt // 8379	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṇṭārikāyā anyoktiḥ saṇānyoktirudāhṛtā / dhattūrapādapānyoktir avadheyā tṛṇoktayaḥ // 8380	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhakoṇaviniviṣṭamīśa te kālakūṭamapi me mahāmṛtam / apyupāttamamṛtaṃ bhavadvapur- bhedavṛtti yadi me na rocate // 8381	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kaṇṭhagatairapyasubhiḥ kasyātmā nopasarpate jātu / mūrkhasya viṣādasya ca garvasya tathā kṛtaghnasya // 8382	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṇṭhagrahaṃ na vātyeva bhartuḥ kruddhāpi yatnataḥ / kaṅkaṇaśreṇikevāsau doṣamevāvalambate // 8383	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
unmatteva pramatteva prahṛṣṭevātureva ca / na śakyopāsituṃ rāmā prauḍhaṃ yauvanamāśritā // 8384	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sukhaduḥkhapradāyinyas tṛtīye yauvane sthitāḥ / jāyante gahanā rāmāḥ saṃsārasyeva rītayaḥ // 8385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhagrahe śithilatāṃ gamite kathaṃcid yo manyate maraṇameva sukhābhyupāyam / gacchan sa eṣa na balād vidhṛto yuvābhyām ityujjhite bhujalate valayairivāsyāḥ // 8386	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṇṭhacchāyamiṣeṇa kalparajanīmuttaṃsamandākinī- rūpeṇa pralayābdhimūrdhvanayanavyājena kalpānalam / bhūṣāpannagakelipānakapaṭādekonapañcāśa taṃ vātānapyupasaṃharannavatu vaḥ kalpāntaśāntau śivaḥ // 8387	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhacchedaviśīryamāṇarudhiraprāgbhārabhagn adyuter yena smeramukhena homaśikhinaḥ saṃdhukṣaṇākāṅkṣiṇā / bhrūbhaṅgaḥ śitikaṇṭhakaṇṭhaphaṇine phūtkārahetoḥ kṛtaḥ śauṭīryavratatuṣṭadhūrjaṭirasau kiṃ varṇyate rāvaṇaḥ // 8388	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhacchede suvarṇaṃ cet kṣuraṃ yadvaddhitaṃ na hi / bandhurapyapakārī cet sarvaistyājyas tathaiva saḥ // 8389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhamākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayed dṛḍhamicchayā / jālaṃdharo bandha eṣa sudhāvyayanivāraṇaḥ // 8390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kaṇṭhaśriyaṃ kuvalayastabakābhirāma- dāmānukārivikaṭacchavikālakūṭām / bibhrat sukhāni diśatādupahārapīta- dhūpotthadhūmamalināmiva dhūrjaṭirvaḥ // 8391	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṇṭhaśleṣaṃ samāsādya tasyāḥ prabhraṣṭayānayā / tulyāvasthā sakhīveyaṃ tanurāśvāsyate mama // 8392	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanaṃ nyastapādatalamagrapādayoḥ / prārthayanta śayanotthitaṃ priyās taṃ niśātyayavisargacumbanam // 8393	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kaṇṭhas tasyāḥ kuvalaydṛśaḥ kāñcanaḥ ko'pi kambur lāvaṇyāmbusmaranarapaterarghyamāviḥ karoti / tisro rekhāstribhuvanajayavyañjikās tatra tat kiṃ na syānmadhye trivaliracanā paunaruktyāya dhātuḥ // 8394	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kaṇṭhasthā yā bhaved vidyā sā prakāśyā sadā budhaiḥ / yā gurau pustake vidyā tayā mūḍhaḥ pratāryate // 8395	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya / anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ // 8396	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaṇṭhasya vidadhe kāntiṃ muktābharaṇatā yathā / tasyāḥ svabhāvaramyasya muktābharaṇatā tathā // 8397	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhādūrdhvaṃ viniryāti prāṇā yāñcākṣaraiḥ saha / dadāmītyakṣarairdātuḥ punaḥ śrotrād viśanti te // 8398	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhādraktaṃ pibati guṇināṃ madyamāṃsaṃ na bhuṅkte viṣṇudravyaṃ harati kurute dvādaśīṣūpavāsam / sāṃkhyaṃ śrutvāpaharati gavāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛttiṃ pāpo dambhaḥ kaliyugasakhaḥ kasya mitraṃ niyogī // 8399	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kaṇṭhāntaḥ kvaṇitaṃ divākarakaraklāntyā rajoviplavais tannetrāñcalakuñcanaṃ śitakuśaprāntakṣataiḥ sītkṛtiḥ / śvāsormiprabhavo vanecarabhiyā tvadvairivāmabhruvām evaṃ deva marostaṭe'pi suratakrīḍānurūpaḥ kramaḥ // 8400	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhālaṃkāraghaṇṭāghaṇaghaṇaraṇitādhmātarodaḥkaṭāhaḥ kaṇṭhekālādhirohocitaghanasubhagaṃ bhāvukasnindhapṛṣṭhaḥ / sākṣād dharmo vapuṣmān dhavalakakudanirdhūtakailāsakūṭaḥ kūṭastho vaḥ kakudmān nibiḍataratamaḥstomatṛṇyāṃ vitṛṇyāt // 8401	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kaṇṭhāliṅganamaṅgalaṃ ghanakucābhogopabhogotsavaṃ śroṇīsaṃgamasaubhagaṃ ca satataṃ matpreyasīnāṃ puraḥ / prāptuṃ ko'yamitīrṣyayeva yamunākūle balādyaḥ svayaṃ gopīnāmaharad dukūlanicayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ // 8402	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhāvasaktamṛdubāhulatās turaṅgād rājāvarodhanavadhūravatārayantaḥ / āliṅganānyadhikṛtāḥ sphuṭamāpureva gaṇḍasthalīḥ śucitayā na cucumburāsām // 8403	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṇṭhāśleṣiṇamunnatastanabharaśroṇītaṭagrāhiṇaṃ saṃsaktoruyugaṃ gṛhītajaghanaprākāramapyantataḥ / drāgeva ślathabandhaminduvadanā gāḍhāvamardāsahaṃ vijñāyātyajadāśu kāñcanapaṭaṃ vrīḍākulāpi kṣaṇam // 8404	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhe ka eṣa tava vallabha nūpuro'yaṃ tat pādabhūṣaṇamayaṃ valayas tadānīm / ityādivācyamavibhāvya vaco mṛgākṣyā jñāne'pi tadvihṛtamutsukatāṃ tanoti // 8405.1	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayamadhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan krāntvā dvārāṇi helācalacaraṇaraṇatkiṅkaṇīcakravālaḥ / dattātaṅko'ṅganānāmanusṛtasaraṇiḥ saṃbhramādaśvapālaiḥ prabhraṣṭo'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpatermandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ // 8405.2	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kaṇṭhe gadgadatā svedo mukhe vaivarṇyavepathū / mriyamāṇasya cihnāni yāni tānyeva yācataḥ // 8406	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhe cintāmaṇirjñeyaś cintitārthapradaḥ sadā / āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśe yaḥ sa sūryākhyaḥ śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ // 8407	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhe jīvitamānane tava guṇāḥ pāṇau kapolastanau saṃtāpastvayi mānasaṃ nayanayoracchinnadhāraṃ payaḥ / sarvaṃ niṣkaruṇa tvadīyavirahe sālambanaṃ kiṃ punas tasyāḥ saṃprati jīvite bata sakhīvargo nirālambanaḥ // 8408	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhe madaḥ kodravajo hṛdi tāmbūlajo madaḥ / lakṣmīmadas tu sarvāṅge putradāramukheṣvapi // 8409	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhe mauktikamālikāḥ stanataṭe kārpūramacchaṃ rajaḥ sāndraṃ candanamaṅgake valayitāḥ pāṇau mṛṇālīlatāḥ / tanvī naktamiyaṃ cakāsti śucinī cīnāṃśuke bibhratī śītāṃśoradhidevateva galitā vyomāgramārohataḥ // 8410	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇṭhe rajjuṃ baddhvā mṛtasya puṃsas tu rajjumādāya / tasyāḥ khaṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ gaṇḍasrajaṃ harati // 8411	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṇṭhe vasantī caturā yadasyāḥ sarasvatī vādayate vipañcīm / tadeva vāgbhūya mukhe mṛgākṣyāḥ śrotuḥ śrutau yāti sudhārasatvam // 8412	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaṇṭhocito'pi huṃkṛti- mātranirastaḥ padāntike patitaḥ / yasyāś candraśikhaḥ smara- bhallanibho jayati sā caṇḍī // 8413	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṇḍūyate dakṣiṇapāṇinā cet sa sārameyo vadanaṃ tadānīm / bhaktaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ saha bhūmipālair bhojyāni bhakṣyāṇi ciraṃ bhavanti // 8414	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaṇḍūladvipagaṇḍapiṇḍakaṣaṇākamp ena sampātibhir dharmasraṃsitabandhanaiḥ svakusumairarcanti godāvarīm / chāyāpaskiramāṇaviṣkiramukhavyākṛṣṭakīṭatvacaḥ kūjatklāntakapītakukkuṭakulāḥ kūle kulāyadrumāḥ // 8415	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṇḍūyamānaḥ khalu dakṣiṇena hastena bhālaṃ bhaṣaṇo dadāti / prabhāvinamrīkṛtarājacakraṃ rājyābhiṣeke varapaṭṭabandham // 8416	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
katarat purahara paruṣaṃ hālāhalakavalayācanāvacasoḥ / ekaiva tava rasajñā tadubhayarasatāratamyajñā // 8417	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kati kati na punaścaranti hanti pratiśikharaṃ pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ / tadapi janamanovinodahetur vilasati keṣvapi ko'pi nābhigandhaḥ // 8418	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kati kati na madoddhatāścaranti pratiśikhari pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ / kvacidapi punaruttamā mṛgās te madayati yan mada eva medinīśān // 8419	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kati kati na latāḥ kalitāḥ saṃcaratā cañcarīkarasikena / nalini bhavanmadhu madhuraṃ yat pītaṃ tat tadeva paripītam // 8420	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kati kati na vasante vallayaḥ śākhino vā surabhitasumanobhirbhūṣitāṅgā babhūvuḥ / tadapi yuvajanānāṃ prītaye kevalo'bhūd abhinavakalikālībhāraśālī rasālaḥ // 8421	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
katiciduddhatanirbharamatsarāḥ katicidātmavacaḥstutiśālinaḥ / ahaha ke'pi nirakṣarakukṣayas tadiha saṃprati kaṃ prati me śramaḥ // 8422.1	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
katicid divasāni kāṇḍaśeṣāḥ patitāśeṣapurāṇajīrṇaparṇāḥ / taravastvaci garhitapravālāḥ samavāpyanta na nāmato vivektum // 8422.2	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
katicid divasāni tayā gamitā- ni gṛhe tava saṅgamarocanayā / katicid vipine nalinīśayane vacanena pikīmadamocanayā // 8423	toṭaka [12: ssss]
na vane'pi ratirbhavane'pi na yaṃ pratirūpavinirjjitarocanayā / karuṇāvaruṇālaya kiṃ kriyatām aruṇāyatapaṅkajalocanayā // 8424	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kati te kabarībhāraḥ sumanaḥsaṅgāt priye'tinīlatvāt / bhavati ca kalāpavattvān nijairasevyaḥ kathaṃ na syāt // 8425	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kati na santi janā jagatītale tadapi tadvirahākulitaṃ manaḥ / kati na santi niśākaratārakāḥ kamalinī malinī raviṇā vinā // 8426	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kati na santi mahīṣu mahīruhaḥ surabhipuṣparasālaphalālayaḥ / surabhayanti na ke'pi ca bhūruhān iti yaśo'sti paraṃ tava candana // 8427	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kati no viṣayā nibhālitāḥ kati vā bhūmibhujo na śīlitāḥ / dharaṇīdhara tāvakān guṇān avadhāryājagaṇaṃ guruṃ laghum // 8428	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
katipayadivasasthāyini madakāriṇi yauvane durātmānaḥ / vidadhati tathāparādhaṃ janmaiva yathā vṛthā bhavati // 8429	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kattipayadivasasthāyī pūro dūronnato'pi bhavitā te / taṭini taṭadrumapātana- pātakamekaṃ cirasthāyi // 8430	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katipayadivasaiḥ kṣayaṃ prayāyāt kanakagiriḥ kṛtavāsarāvasānaḥ / iti mudamupayāti cakravākī vitaraṇaśālini vīrarudradeve // 8431	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
katipayanimeṣavartini janmajarāmaraṇavihvale jagati / kalpāntakoṭibandhuḥ sphurati kavīnāṃ yaśaḥprasaraḥ // 8432	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
katipayapurasvāmī kāyavyayairapi durgraho mitavitaritā mohenāho mayānusṛtaḥ purā / tribhuvanapatirbuddhyārādhyo'dhunā svapadapradaḥ punaradhigatas tat prācīno dunoti dinavyayaḥ // 8433	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
katipayasahakārapuṣparamyas tanutuhino'lpavinidrasinduvāraḥ / surabhimukhahimāgamāntaśaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smaraikabandhuḥ // 8434	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kati pallavitā na puṣpitā vā taravaḥ santi samantato vasante / jagato vijaye tu puṣpaketoḥ sahakārī sahakāra eka eva // 8435	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
katiṣu na kṛtā sevā ke vā na vāgvibhavaiḥ stutās tṛṇamapi guṇaprītaḥ prādānna ko'pi vipaścitām / ayamiha paraṃ duḥkhajvālākalāpamakhaṇḍayat kanakapayasāṃ dhārādaṇḍairakāṇḍaghanāghanaḥ // 8436	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kati santi nonnatibhṛtas taravas tadapi tvameva gurukīrtivaraḥ / nibiḍādaraṃ navamarandaharaḥ sahakāra kāraṇamiha bhramaraḥ // 8437	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
kati santi latā vipine kusuma- stavakānamitāḥ khalu pallavitāḥ / praticampakacandananīpavanī- navapaṅkajinīmadhusaṃvalitāḥ // 8438	toṭaka [12: ssss]
suciraṃ kusumeṣu paribhramatā na ca mālati kāpi tathā militā / madhupena punarmadhupānavidhau hṛdaye na yathā bhavatī kalitā // 8439	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kati santi lavaṅgalatā lalitā navakorakitā dharaṇīsutale / kati bandhuragandhabhṛtas taravo guravo nivasanti girau malaye // 8440	toṭaka [12: ssss]
katyakṣīṇi karoṭayaḥ kati kati dvīpidvipānāṃ tvacaḥ kākolāḥ kati pannagāḥ kati sudhādhāmnaśca khaṇḍāḥ kati / kiṃ ca tvaṃ ca kati trilokajanani tvadvāripūrodare majjajjantukadambakaṃ samudayatyekaikamādāya yat // 8441	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
katyaśvāḥ kati dhenavaḥ kati gajāḥ katyadbhutāḥ pādapāḥ sundaryaḥ kati susruvaḥ kati mahāratnānyanardhyāṇyapi / jātaikā kila kanyakā jalanidherdātuṃ prasaktā yadā sarvaṃ tad vyayitaṃ tadā pariṇatau nāmaikamuccheṣitam // 8442	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kathaṃcit kālidāsasya kālena bahunā mayā / avagāḍheva gambhīramasṛṇaudhā sarasvatī // 8443	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃcidahni hṛdaye kuśalairviniveśitā / śikṣā gaurakhareṇeva rājñā vismāryate niśi // 8444	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃcin naidāghe divasa iva kope vigalite prasattau prāptāyāṃ tadanu ca niśāyāmiva śanaiḥ / smitajyotsnārambhakṣapitavirahadhvāntanivaho mukhendurmāninyāḥ sphurati kṛtapuṇyasya surate // 8445	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kathaṃ te tyaktasadvṛttāḥ sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate / maraṇāntaritā yeṣāṃ narakeṣūpapattayaḥ // 8446	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ tvadupalambhāśāvihatāviha tādṛśī / avasthā nālamāroḍhum aṅganāmaṅganāśinī // 8447.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ na ramate cittaṃ dharme'nekasukhaprade / jīvānāṃ duḥkhabhīrūṇāṃ prāyo mithyādṛśo yataḥ // 8447.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ na lajjitastādṛk savitā tejasāṃ nidhiḥ / brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍikāṃ prāpya kurvan pādaprasārikām // 8448	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ nāma na sevyante yatnataḥ parameśvarāḥ / acireṇaiva ye tuṣṭāḥ pūrayanti manorathān // 8449	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ nu taṃ bandhurakomalāṅguliṃ karaṃ vihāyāsi nimagnamambhasi / acetanaṃ nāma guṇaṃ na lakṣayen mayaiva kasmādavadhīritā priyā // 8450	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcidāpadi / bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇamātmānaḥ // 8451	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kathaṃ nyāyyamanuṣṭhānaṃ mādṛśaḥ pratiṣedhatu / kathaṃ vābhyanujānātu sāhasaikarasāṃ kriyām // 8452	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ ghanaiḥ pihitakare niśākare / acintayantyabhinavavarṣavidyutas tvamāgatā sutanu yathā prabhāvatī // 8453	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
kathaṃ caiṣā tanvī prakṛtisukumārāṅgalatikā pragalbhavyāpāraṃ ratikalahakhedaṃ viṣahate / nalinyāstigmo'pi prabhavati sukhāyaiva savitā prakṛṣṭe premṇyevaṃ kimiva na sahante yuvatayaḥ // 8454	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kathaṃ priyāyā anukampitāyāḥ saṅgaṃ rahasyaṃ rucirāṃśca mantrān / suhṛtsu ca snehasitaḥ śiśūnāṃ kalākṣarāṇāmanuraktacittaḥ // 8455	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
putrān smaraṃstā duhit rhṛdasyā bhrāt n svas rvā pitarau ca dīnau / gṛhān manojñoruparicchadāṃśca vṛttīśca kulyāḥ paśubhṛtyavargān // 8456	ajñātasamavṛtta [8: tjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kathaṃ bhāryāmṛte dharmam arthaṃ vā puruṣaḥ prabho / prāpnoti kāmamatha vā tasyāṃ tritayamāhitam // 8457	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathaiva bhartāramṛte bhāryā dharmādisādhane / na samarthā trivargo'yaṃ dāmpatyaṃ samupāśritaḥ // 8458	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ mamorasi kṛtapakṣaniḥsvanaḥ śilīmukho'pahitaditi   jalpati priye / nivṛtya kiṃ kimiti bruvāṇayānayā sasādhvasaṃ kupitamamoci kāntayā // 8459	rucirā [13: jBsjg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kathaṃ mugdhe kathaṃ vakre kāntāyās te vilocane / kathaṃ janānurāgāya kathaṃ janavipattaye // 8460	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ yateta manujau bhinnaiva prakṛtiryataḥ / ekasthānasamutpanna sudhākṣveḍabhidā smṛtā // 8461	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet / rakṣaṇīyā viśeṣeṇa rājadārā mahābala // 8462	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ vilokeyamamuṃ yuvānaṃ kumudvatībandhumivojjihānam / bhartuḥ svasā bhādracaturthikeva kalaṅkayatyardhavilokane'pi // 8463	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kathaṃ vīthīmasmānupadiśasi dharmapraṇayinīṃ prasīda svāṃ śiṣyāmatikhalamukhīṃ śādhi muralīm / harantī maryādāṃ śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayaṃ nayantī dhṛṣṭeyaṃ yaduvara yathā nāhvayati naḥ // 8464	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kathaṃ saṃbodhyate rājā sugrīvasya ca kā priyā / nirdhanāḥ kiṃ ca vāñchanti kiṃ kurvanti manīṣiṇaḥ // 8465	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ sa dantarahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhirucyate / yo mīnarāśiṃ muktaiva meṣaṃ bhoktuṃ samudyataḥ // 8466	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kathanena vināpyāśāṃ pūrayanti hi sādhavaḥ / pratigehaṃ bhāsate hi vivasvān kathanaṃ vinā // 8467	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kathamagaṇitapūrvaṃ drakṣyate taṃ narendraḥ kathamapuruṣavākyaṃ śroṣyate siddhavākyaḥ / kathamaviṣayavanghyaṃ dhārayiṣyatyamarṣaṃ praṇipatati niruddhaḥ satkṛto dharṣito vā // 8468	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamadya kathaṃ ca śva iti jīvanacintayā / yā kṛthā hā vṛthā dainyam āyurantaṃ prayacchati // 8469	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam / asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya sasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ punaḥ // 8470	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kathamapi tava vṛndāraṇyamāhātmyavṛndaṃ na hi kathayitumuccairīśvaro'pyīśvaraḥ syāt / api ca tṛṇaphalānāṃ yasya lubdho rasāya prabhuramṛtabhujāmapyāśrayad vatsabhāvam // 8471	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupadatanayapāṇis tena pitrā mamādya / tava bhujabaladarpādhyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇa eṣa nyasyate vārayainam // 8472	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamapi paricitamudrā bhujabhudrāsaṅgataṃ svapne / uṣasi nimīlatanayanā śayanāntaḥ kāntamāmṛṣati // 8473	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kathamapi sakhi krīḍākopād vrajeti mayodite kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ / iti sarabhasadhvastapremṇi vyapetaghṛṇe spṛhāṃ punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ karoti karomi kim // 8474	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kathamapi hi bhavanti kṣetrasadbījayogāj jagadupakṛtihetornātmavṛttyai phalanti / dadhati phalasamṛddhyā dūramānamrabhāvaṃ nanu jagati suśūkāḥ sādhavaḥ śālayaśca // 8475	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamapyadhigatarandhrair adhyuṣitā yadi guhākhubhiḥ kṣudraiḥ / iyataiva kiṃ mṛgādhipa nijavikramanirvidaṃ vahasi // 8476	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kathamarthaṃ niṣedhantu śrutayaḥ smṛtayo'pi vā / yāsāmekaṃ padamapi na calatyarthato vinā // 8477	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kathamavanipa darpo yanniśātāsidhārā- dalanagalitamūrdhnā vidviṣāṃ svīkṛtā śrīḥ / nanu tava nihatārerapyasau kiṃ na nītā tridivamapagatāṅgairvallabhā kīrtirebhiḥ // 8478	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamasau na bhajatyaśarīratāṃ hatavivekapado hatamanmathaḥ / praharataḥ kadalīdalakomale bhavati yasya dayā na vadhūjane // 8479	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kathamasau madano na namasyatāṃ sthitavivekapado makaradhvajaḥ / mṛgadṛśaṃ kadalīlalitaṃ vapur yadabhi hanti śaraiḥ kusumodbhavaiḥ // 8480	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kathamiyati vanānte kaścideko na tādṛg varavanataruruccaiḥ puṣpavallīphalāḍhyaḥ / jagadasukhavidhāturdagdhadhāturniyogā- ddhavakhadirapalāśāḥ kevalaṃ vṛddhibhājaḥ // 8481	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathamiva tava saṃmatirbhavitrī samamṛtubhirmunināvadhīritasya / iti viracitamallikāvikāsaḥ smayata iva sma madhuṃ nidāghakālaḥ // 8482	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kathamiha manuṣyajanmā saṃpraviśati sadasi vibudhagamitāyām / yena na subhāṣitāmṛtam āhlādi nipītamā tṛpteḥ // 8483	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kathamutpadyate dharmaḥ kathaṃ dharmaḥ pravardhate / kathaṃ ca sthāpyate dharmaḥ kathaṃ dharmo vinaśyati // 8484	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyenotpadyate dharmo dayādānairvivardhate / kṣamayā sthāpyate dharmaḥ krodhalobhairvinaśyati // 8485	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathamupari kalāpinaḥ kalāpo vilasati tasya tale'ṣṭamīndukhaṇḍam / kuvalayayugalaṃ tato vilolaṃ tilakusumaṃ tadadhaḥ pravālamasmāt // 8486	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kathametat kucadvandvaṃ patitaṃ tava sundari / paśyādhaḥ khanane mūḍha patanti girayo'pi ca // 8487	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaya kathamivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ / ayamapi khalu guñjan mañju mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ // 8488.1	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathaya kathamurojadāmahetor yadupatireṣa cinoti campakāni / bhavati karatale yadasya kampaḥ priyasakhi matsmṛtireva matsapatnī // 8488.2	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kathaya kimapi dṛṣṭaṃ sthānamasti śrutaṃ vā vrajati dinakaro'yaṃ yatra nāstaṃ kadācit / iti vihagasamūhān nityamevāsti pṛcchan rajanivirahabhītaścakravākī varākaḥ // 8489	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathaya kimidaṃ jātyā khyātaṃ kimasya varāṭakaiḥ katibhirathavā labhyaṃ caitat prayojanamasya kim / pratipadamiti grāmīṇānāṃ gaṇena laghūkṛtaṃ bata karatale ratnaṃ kṛtvā viṣīdati vāṇijaḥ // 8490	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kathayata iva netre karṇamūlaṃ prayāte sumukhi tava kucābhyāṃ vartya paśyāvanīṃ vā / skhalati yadi kathaṃcit te padāmbhojayugmaṃ tava tanutaramadhyaṃ bhajyate nau na doṣaḥ // 8491	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathayata kathameṣā menayā vipradattā śiva śiva giriputro vṛddhakāpālikāya / iti vadati puraṃdhrīmaṇḍale siddhileśa- vyayakṛtavaraveṣaḥ pātu vaḥ śrīmaheśaḥ // 8492	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kathaya nipuṇe kasmin dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ nu kiyacciraṃ kimabhilikhitaṃ kiṃ tenoktaṃ kadā sa ihaiṣyati / iti bahuvidhapremollāsaprakalpitavistarāḥ priyatamakathāḥ svalpe'pyarthe prayānti na naṣṭatām // 8493	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kathayānimiṣo'smyahaṃ kathaṃ te vapurālokanamātra eva jātaḥ / adharāmṛtapāyināṃ bhavatyā suratāvāptirarālakeśi yuktā // 8494.1	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kathābhirdeśānāṃ kathamapi ca kālena bahunā samāyāte kānte sakhi rajanirardhaṃ gatavatī / tato yāvallīlāpraṇayakupitāsmi prakupitā sapatnīva prācī digiyamabhavat tāvadaruṇā // 8494.2	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kathāsu ye labdharasāḥ kavīnāṃ ye nānurajyanti kathāntareṣu / na granthiparṇapraṇayāścaranti kastūrikāgandhamṛgās tṛṇeṣu // 8495.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kathitāvadhijīvitāvadhir gaṇayantī divasānanukṣaṇam / dayitāśrubhareṇa jīvyate bata rekhā katicidvilumpatā // 8495.2	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kadapatyaṃ varaṃ manye sadapatyācchucāṃ padāt / nirvidyeta gṛhānmartyo yat kleśanivahā gṛhāḥ // 8496	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadambavṛkṣasāras tu vidyutpātanivāraṇaḥ / vidyutpātasya no bhītir devarāje'ti kīrtanāt // 8497	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadarthitasyāpi hi dhairyavṛtter na śakyate dhairyaguṇaḥ pramārṣṭum / adhomukhasyāpi kṛtasya vahner nādhaḥ śikhā yānti kadācideva // 8498	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadaryamākrośakamaśrutaṃ ca varākasambhūtamamānyamāninam / niṣṭhūriṇaṃ kṛtavairaṃ kṛtaghnam etān bhṛśārto'pi na jātu yācet // 8499	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: tBtgl], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadaryopārjitaṃ vittaṃ bhogyaṃ bhāgyavatāṃ bhavet / dantā adanti kaṣṭena jihvā grasati līlayā // 8500	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadalī kadalī karabhaḥ karabhaḥ karirājakaraḥ karirājakaraḥ / bhuvanatritaye'pi bibharti tulām idamūruyugaṃ na camūrudṛśaḥ // 8501	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kadalīkandavaddharmo na rohati bahirgataḥ / chāditastu phalaṃ cāru sūte panasamūlavat // 8502	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadalīkarabhasamānāṃ kalayati yo rūpakḷptim atirucirām / sopāyād dṛḍhayogaṃ gamitorasikopakaraṇaviṣayatayā // 8503	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kadalīprakāṇḍarucirorutarau jaghanasthalīparisare mahati / raśanākalāpakaguṇena vadhūr makaradhvajadviradamākalayat // 8504.1	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
kadalī bata jaṅghāyāḥ sādṛśyaṃ labhate katham / śaityaṃ hi sahajaṃ tatra tatra kālānurūpatā // 8504.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadalīvanamadhyastho vahnirmandaparākramaḥ / avivekijanasthāne guṇavān kiṃ kariṣyati // 8505	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadalīsāraniḥsāre mṛgatṛṣṇeva cañcale / sthāvare jaṃgame sarve bhūtagrāme caturvidhe // 8506	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadā kāntāgāre parimalamilatpuṣpaśayane śayānaḥ kāntāyāḥ kucayugamahaṃ vakṣasi vahan / aye kānte mugdhe kuṭilanayane candravadane prasīdetyāti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8507	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kadā kāryodyogaṃ sakalamapi saṃnyasya sahasā smaran nityaṃ śāntaṃ hṛdayavacanāgocaramahaḥ / vibho māyātīta prathama paramānandanibiḍa prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8508	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā gaṇḍādañcanmadalulitasindūrasubhagaṃ namaskurvan padmāmalamadhuramūrtiṃ gaṇapatim / gajāsya śrīśambhoḥsuta sumukha lambodara vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8509	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadācana mahākārye laghurevopayujyate / kiṃ dūrīkṛtya dīrghādi dūrvāṃ kṣemāya nādṛtaḥ // 8510	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācit kavacaṃ bhedyaṃ nārācena śareṇa vā / api varṣaśatāghāte brāhmaṇāśīrna bhidyate // 8511	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācit kaṣṭena draviṇamadhamārādhanavaśān mayā labdhaṃ stokaṃ nihitamavanau taskarabhayāt / tato nitye kaścit kvacidapi tadākhurbilagṛhe- 'nayallabdho'pyarthona bhavati yadā karma viṣamam // 8512	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadācit kālindītaṭavipinasaṅgītakaravo mudābhīrīnārīvadanakamalāsvādamadhupaḥ / ramāśambhubrahmāmarapatigaṇeśarcitapado jagannāthaḥ svāmī nayanapathagāmī bhavatu me // 8513	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadācit pāñcālī vipinabhuvi bhīmena bahuśaḥ kṛśāṅgi śrāntāsi kṣaṇamiha niṣīdeti gaditā / śanaiḥ śītacchāyaṃ taṭaviṭapinaṃ prāpya muditā puraḥ patyuḥ kāmācchvaśuramiyamāliṅgati satī // 8514	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadācit sādhutāmeti puraḥ śiśurasanmatiḥ / prāk pāṇḍupatrāḥ kutrāpi coyante cārubhūruhāḥ // 8515	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kadācidapi saṃjātam akāryādiṣṭasādhanam / yadaniṣṭaṃ tu satkāryān nākāryaprerakaṃ hi tat // 8516	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācidārohati saudhamunnataṃ kadācidāyāti dharātalaṃ punaḥ / kadācidāsyaṃ viniveśya jālake priyaṃ navoḍhā tu salajjamīkṣate // 8517	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kadā te sānandaṃ vitatanavadūrvāñcitataṭī- kuṭīre tīre vā savanamanu manvādikathitaiḥ / kathābandhairandhaṅkaraṇakaraṇagrāmaniyamād yamādujjhan bhītiṃ bhagavati bhaveyaṃ pramuditaḥ // 8518	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā drakṣyāmi nandasya bālakaṃ nīpamālakam / pālakaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ lasattilakabhālakam // 8519	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadādharadale bāle dantakesaraśobhite / bhavāmi tvanmukhāmbhoje rasiko madhupo yathā // 8520	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadā nu kanyāgamanapravādaṃ prakṣālayeyaṃ jagati prarūḍham / itīva bhāsvān parivṛddhatāpas tulāṃ viśuddhyarthamivāruroha // 8521	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadā nu cārubimboṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmamivānanam / īṣadunnamya pāsyāmi rasāyanamivāturaḥ // 8522	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vaktumakṣamam / avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat // 8523	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kadāpi nāśrayet prājño'karuṇaṃ miṣṭabhāṣiṇam / pracchannamasahiṣṇuṃ vā guḍamiśraṃ viṣaṃ yathā // 8524	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadāpi nogradaṇḍaḥ syāt kaṭubhāṣaṇatatparaḥ / bhāryā putro'pyudvijate kaṭuvākyāt pradaṇḍataḥ // 8525.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!))
paśavo'pi vaśaṃ yānti dānaiśca mṛdubhāṣaṇaiḥ // 8525.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
kadāpi veśyā na guṇārthinī syād rūpārthinī naiva hitārthinī ca / vidyārthinī nāpi na manyase ced vārtāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kayavannakasya // 8525.3	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadā puṇyakṣetre karakalitarudrākṣavalayo dadhat svānte śānte'khilaśivapadaṃ śrīśivapadam / maheśa śrīkaṇṭha smarahara hara tryambaka śiva prasīdetyākrośān nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8526	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā brahmeśānatridaśapatimukhyaiḥ suragaṇaiḥ stutaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ jitadanujasenaṃ hṛdi bhajan / aye viṣṇo jiṣṇo garuḍaratha viśvambhara hare prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8527	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā bhāgīrathyā bhavajaladhisaṃtārataraṇeḥ skhaladvīcīmālācapalatalavistāritamudaḥ / tamaḥsthāne kuñje kvacidapi niviśyāhṛtamanā bhaviṣyāmyekākī narakamathane dhyānarasikaḥ // 8528	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā bhikṣābhaktaiḥ karakalitagaṅgāmbutaralaiḥ śarīraṃ me sthāsyatyuparatasamastendriyasukham / kadā brahmābhyāsasthiratanutayāraṇyavihagāḥ patiṣyanti sthāṇubhramahatadhiyaḥ skandhaśirasi // 8529	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā mukhaṃ varatanu kāraṇādṛte tavāgataṃ kṣaṇamayi kopapātratām / aparvaṇi grahakaluṣendumaṇḍalā vibhāvarī kathaya kathaṃ bhaviṣyati // 8530	rucirā [13: jBsjg]
kadā vārāṇasyāmamarataṭinīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno'ñjalipuṭam / aye gaurīnātha tripurahara śambho trinayana prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8531	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā vā sākete vimalasarayūtīrapuline carantaṃ śrīrāmaṃ janakatanayālakṣmaṇayutam / aye rāma svāmin janakatanayāvallabha vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8532	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā vṛndāraṇye navaghananibhaṃ nandatanayaṃ parītaṃ gopībhiḥ kṣaṇarucimanojñābhirabhitaḥ / gamiṣyāmas toṣaṃ nayanaviṣayīkṛtya kṛtino vayaṃ premodrekaskhalitagatayo vepathubhṛtaḥ // 8533	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā vṛndāraṇye mihiraduhituḥ saṅgamahite muhurbhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ caritalaharīṃ gokulapateḥ / lapannuccairuccairnayanapayasāṃ veṇibhirahaṃ kariṣye sotkaṇṭho niviḍamavasekaṃ viṭapinām // 8534	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā vṛndāraṇye vimalayamunātīrapuline carantaṃ govindaṃ haladharasudāmādisahitam / aye kṛṣṇa svāmin madhuramuralīvādana vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8535	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā śayāno maṇikarṇikāyāṃ karṇe japāmyakṣaramindumauleḥ / avāpya mudrāṃ gatamohamudrāṃ nālokayiṣyāmi punaḥ prapañcam // 8536	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadā śrīmatpaṅkeruhavanavikāśiprasṛmara- prathāpuñjaṃ tejaḥ kimapi kalayannaupaniṣadam / graheśa śrībhāno mihira taraṇe sūrya savitaḥ prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8537	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā saṃsārajālāntar baddhaṃ triguṇarajjubhiḥ / ātmānaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śivabhaktiśalākayā // 8538	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadā samyag dhyāyannanupamacaritraṃ maṇigaṇa- sphuradbhūṣācitraṃ puraripukalatraṃ kimapi tat / śive durge kātyāyani janani bhaktapraṇayini prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān // 8539	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kadā hi mūrkho vacaneṣu bhītaḥ khalo na kutrāpi chaleṣvadakṣaḥ / andhena kācid yuvatī hi dṛṣṭā kasyātra kāmeṣu bhavecca lajjā // 8540	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kadā hyahaṃ sameṣyāmi bharatena mahātmanā / śatrughnena ca vīreṇa tvayā ca raghunandana // 8541	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanakaṃ sugandhi tava tanvi vapur madhuro maṇiśca sakhi te'pyadharam / nigaḍaṃ sukhasya karaṇaṃ bhavatīṃ sṛjato vidherniravadhirmahimā // 8542	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
kanakakamalakāntaiḥ sadya evāmbudhautaiḥ śravaṇataṭaniṣaktaiḥ pāṭalopāntanetraiḥ / uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito'dya // 8543	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kanakakamalakāntairānanaiḥ pāṇḍugaṇḍair uparinihitahāraiścandanārdraiḥ stanāntaiḥ / madajanitavilāsairdūṣṭipātairmunīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān // 8544	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kanakakalaśaśreṇī yatra prabhākaracumbanair atikharakarāghātairmadhyandine śithilīkṛtā / dravati bhajate dārḍhyaṃ siktā samīraṇakampita- dhvajapaṭasamānītasvargāpagājalabindubhiḥ // 8545	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kanakakunḍalamaṇḍitabhāṣiṇe śakaripurviṣayān daśa vidviṣaḥ / magadhakekayakeralakośalān kariśataṃ ca madālasalocanam // 8546	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kanakakramukāyitaṃ purastād atha paṅgeruhakorakāyamāṇam / kramaśaḥ kalaśāyamānamāste sudṛśo vakṣasi kasya bhāgadheyam // 8547	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kanakacchatramambāyāḥ kurute kutukaṃ mahat / viśadeva dṛśorantar yannirgacchati mūdhaini // 8548	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kanakadravakāntikāntayā militaṃ rāmamudīkṣya kāntayā / capalāyutavāridabhramān nanṛte cātakapotakairvane // 8549.1	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kanakadravagauramambaraṃ dadhatorudvitayena sundaram / udayanmaṇinūpuraprabhā- saraṇiśreṇijaṭālajānukam // 8549.2	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kanakanikaṣabhāsā sītayāliṅgitāṅgo navakuvalayadāmaśyāmavarṇābhirāmaḥ / abhinava iva vidyunmaṇḍito medhakhaṇḍaḥ śamayatu mama tāpaṃ sarvato rāmacandraḥ // 8550	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kanakanikaṣasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām / asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipañ jayati janitavrīḍānamrapriyāhasito hariḥ // 8551	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kanakabhaṅgapiśaṅgadalairdadhe sarajasāruṇakeśaracārubhiḥ / priyavimānitamānavatīruṣāṃ nirasanairasanairavṛthārthatā // 8552	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kanakabhūṣaṇasaṃgrahaṇocito yadi maṇis trapuṇi pratibadhyate / na sa virauti na cāpi na śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā // 8553	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kanakamṛgamudasya svāṃ kuṭīṃ saṃpraviṣṭaḥ kvacidapi na vadhūṭīṃ nodadarśāṅganādau / tadapi sa raghuvīraḥ parṇaśālāgṛhāntar na viśati hṛdayāśātantunāśātibhīruḥ // 8554	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kanakarasamasṛṇavartita- hayagandhāmūlamiśraparyuṣitam / māhiṣamiha navanītaṃ gatabīje kanakaphalamadhye 8555	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
gomayagāḍhodvartita- pūrvaṃ paścādanena saṃliptam / bhavati hayaliṅgasadṛśaṃ liṅgaṃ kaṭhināṅganādayitam // 8556	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kanakasya tu pañcāṅgaṃ karpūraṃ ketakīrajaḥ / ātmaśukreṇa saṃyuktaṃ vaśyakṛd bhakṣitaṃ striyāḥ // 8557	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanakahariṇaṃ hatvā rāmo yayau nijamāśramaṃ janakatanayāṃ prāṇebhyo'pi priyāmavilokayan / dṛḍhamupagatairbāṣpāpūrairnimīlitalocano na viśati kuṭīmāśātantupraṇāśabhayādasau // 8558	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kanakācalakānticauryabhājoḥ kucayoḥ kuṅkumapaṅkapūjanāni / anibandhanameva bandhanaṃ te kṛśatābhāgini kiṃ nu madhyabhāge // 8559	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kanakācalajitvarastanīnāṃ ramaṇīnāṃ khalu yatra sanniveśaḥ / manasaḥ paramāṇutāṃ vadantaḥ kathamadyāpi na tārkikās trapante // 8560	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kaniṣṭhāṅgulivat sthūlaṃ pūrvārdhakṛtakuñcitam / abhāve dantakāṣṭhasya pratiṣiddhadine'pi ca / apāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣair mukhaśuddhirbhaviṣyati // 8561	upajāti jagatī: ajñātam [12: ysmB], ajñātam [12: ssnt], ajñātam [12: yBtB], ajñātam [12: jrtt]
kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu samatvenānuvartate / samopabhogajīveṣu yathaiva tanayeṣu ca // 8562.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanīnikākāntibhirañjanaṃ dṛśoḥ smitatviṣā candanacarccanaṃ hṛdaḥ / kaṭākṣabhābhirnavamutpalaṃ śrutes tadā vadhūnāmiti bhūṣaṇānyabhān // 8562.2	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kanīnikeva netrasya kusumasyeva saurabham / samyaktvamucyate sāraṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmakarmaṇām // 8562.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanthāṃ vahasi durbuddhe gardabhairapi durvahām / śikhāyajñopavītābhyāṃ bhāraḥ kaste bhaviṣyati // 8563.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kandamūlāni ye mūḍhāḥ sūryadeve jarnādane / bhakṣayanti narāḥ pārtha te vai naraka gāminaḥ // 8563.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kandarpakaṇḍūlakaṭākṣabandīr indīvarākṣorabhilaṣyamāṇān / mandasmitādhāramukhāravindān vandāmahe vallavadhūrtapādān // 8564	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kandarpakandali salīladṛśā lunīhi kopāṅkuraṃ caraṇayoḥ śaraṇātithiḥ syām / paśya prasīda caramācalacūlacumbi bimbaṃ vidhorlavalapāṇḍuramastameti // 8565	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kandarpajvarasaṃjvarākulatanorāścaryamasyāściraṃ cetaścandanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu saṃtāmyati / kiṃ tu klāntivaśena śītalataraṃ tvāmekameva kṣaṇaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā kathamapi kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti // 8566	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpadarpakalitāṅgamanoharāṇāṃ premṇā svayaṃ suratamandiramāgatānām / aṅgāni komalatarāṇi manoramāṇāṃ dhanyā narāḥ sarabhasaṃ hi pariṣvajante // 8567	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kandarpadevasya vimānasṛṣṭiḥ prāsādamālā rasapārthivasya / caitrasya sarvartuviśeṣacihnaṃ dolāvilāsaḥ sudṛśāṃ rarāja // 8568	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kandarpapratibhūniveśitavalīrekhāvalīśobhite līlodañcitabāhupāśayugalāpātaiśca bhoḥ kāmukāḥ / veśyānāṃ vipule nitambaphalake śāraiḥ kaṭākṣairito yadvaḥ krīḍitamatra dāsyati puro dāridryamevottaram // 8569	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpapratimallakāntivibhavaṃ kādambinībāndhavaṃ vṛndāraṇyavilāsinīvyasaninaṃ veṣeṇa bhūṣāmayam / mandasmeramukhāmbujaṃ madhurimavyāmṛṣṭabimbādharaṃ vande kandalitārdrayauvanavanaṃ kaiśorakaṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ // 8570	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpaśca ratiśca kuṅkumamṛdālepena mūṣādvayaṃ kurvāte rasasādhanāya vidhivat kastūrikāmudvayā / antardarpakabāṇatāpitayuvapremoṣmabhūyastayā niryātā rasabindavo bahirito hārasya muktācchalāt // 8571	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpasya jagattrayīvijayinaḥ sāmrājyadīkṣāguruḥ kāntāmānaśiloñchavṛttirakhiladhvāntābhicā re kṛtī / devastryambakamaulimaṇḍanasarittīrasthalītāpasaḥ śṛṅgārādhvaradīkṣito vijayate rājā dvijānāmayam // 8572	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpādapi sundarākṛtiriti prauḍhotsaladrāgayā vṛddhatvaṃ varayoṣito'nayaditi trāsākulasvāntayā / mārasyāpi śarairabhedyahṛditi śraddhābharaprahvayā pāyād vaḥ sphuṭabāṣpakampapulakaṃ ratyā jino vanditaḥ // 8573	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpādapi sundaro ravimahāḥ pratyarthisīmantinī- vaktrāmbhojasudhākaro'tivibhavo yuddheṣu pārthopamaḥ / rakṣākṛjjagataḥ svakīrtividito rāmo'stu yukto mudā dānīṃ śaṅkarasevako varaguṇo nītyuttamaḥ sarvadā // 8574	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpe nalakūvare kumudinīkānte'pyavajñāvatāṃ tvatsaundaryakathāsu tāsu marutāṃ vṛttāsu kautūhalāt / prāptā tānavamurvaśī ratiratiklāntā hatā rohiṇī jātā kiṃca kharasmarajvarabharā rambhāpi rambhātanuḥ // 8575	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandarpaikakṛpāṇavallari vane kasmād akasyādiyaṃ he kālāgurubālamañjari hahā mohādiha prāruhaḥ / sahyantāmupajātasaurabhapariṣvaṅgais tadaṅgairimāḥ kāntaiḥ kāntapuraṃdhrikuntalabharacchāyaiḥ kuṭhāracchidaḥ // 8576	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandalayatyānandaṃ nindati mandānilenducandanakam / mandayati mandabhāvaṃ saṃdhatte saṃpado'pi satsaṅgaḥ // 8577.1	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kandalīṣu kuṭajeṣu mālatī- jālakeṣu navaketakīṣu ca / kantharāsu madhunā sukekināṃ saṃvibhakta iva vāridodayaḥ // 8577.2	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kandāgrāt protthitaḥ prāṇaḥ sadā vahati dehinām / hṛdgataṃ jīvamāśvāsya bahirgatvā nivartate // 8578	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanduko bhittiniḥkṣipta iva pratiphalan muhuḥ / āpatatyātmanaḥ prāyo doṣo'nyasya cikīrṣitaḥ // 8579	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kande sundaratā dale saralatā varṇasya saṃpūrṇatā skandhe bandhuratā phale sarasatā kasyāparasyedṛśī / dhanyastvaṃ sahakāra khinnapathikādhāra sthitaḥ satpathe dīrghāyurbhava sādhu sādhu vidhinā medhāvinā nirmitaḥ // 8580	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandaiḥ kandalitaṃ vanaiḥ kiśalitaṃ vallībhirujjṛmbhitaṃ vṛkṣaiḥ pallavitaṃ janaiḥ pramuditaṃ dhārādhare varṣati / bhrātaścātaka pātakaṃ kimapi te samyag na jānīmahe yenāsmin na patanti cañcupuṭake dvitrāḥ payobindavaḥ // 8581	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kandharāṃ samapahāya kaṃ dharāṃ prāpya saṃyati jahāsa kasyacit / māṃ kilānamayataḥ svapūrtaye durbharāt kimudarādviyogataḥ // 8582	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kandharāvanatasyorvī gatasyādhomukhasya te / lajjā na nāma nirlajjā garvo na galitaḥ katham // 8583	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāṃ kāmapyudūhya pravijahadudayadyauvanāmajña enāṃ dravyāśāpāśakṛṣṭo bhramati cirataraṃ hanta deśāntareṣu / anyonyāśleṣavāñchāvigalitavayasorāttamālinyam atyor daṃpatyorvyākṛtaivaṃ hatavidhirubhayorlokayoḥ śokayogam // 8584.1	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kanyāṃ chatraṃ phalaṃ pakvaṃ dīpamannaṃ mahādhvajam / mantraṃ vā labhate yo hi tasya cintitasiddhayaḥ // 8584.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāṃ bhuṅkte rajaḥkāle'gniḥ śaśī lomadarśane / stanodbhaveṣu gandharvās tat prāgeva pradīyate // 8585	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāṃ rūpavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā mohaṃ gacchen mahānapi / caṇḍālyāmapyarundhatyāṃ vasiṣṭho mohito'bhavat // 8586	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyākartitasūtreṇa baddhāpāmārgamūlikā / aihāhikajvaraṃ hanti śikhāyāmativegataḥ // 8587	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyā kācidihāpi karmaṇi paṇaḥ syādityasūyācalat- sītāpāṅgamayūkhamāṃsalamukhajyotsnāviluptīṃ divam / kurvāṇena raghūdvahena cakṛṣe nārāyaṇīyaṃ dhanuḥ saṃdhāyātha śaraśca bhārgavagaticchedādamoghīkṛtaḥ // 8588	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kanyā kautukamātrakeṇa vidhavā saṃmardamātrārthinī veśyā vittalavecchayā svagṛhiṇī gatyantarāsaṃbhavāt / vāñchantītthamanekakāraṇavaśāt puṃbhiḥ striyaḥ saṃgamaṃ śuddhasnehanibandhanā paravadhūḥ puṇyaiḥ paraiḥ prāpyate // 8589	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kanyāgate savitari tiṣṭhanti pitaro gṛhe / śūnyaṃ pretapuraṃ tatra yāvad vṛścikadarśanam // 8590.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyā-go-bhūmyalīkāni nyāsāpaharaṇaṃ tathā / kūṭasākṣyaṃ ca pañceti sthūlāsatyāni saṃtyajet // 8590.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāgośaṅkhabherīdadhiphalakusumaṃ pāvako dīpyamāno nāgendro'śvo ratho vā nṛpatirabhimukhaḥ pūrṇakumbho dhvajo vā / utkṣiptā naiva bhūmirkhalacarayugalaṃ siddhamannaṃ śatāyur veśyāstrī madyamāṃso hitamapi gaditaṃ maṅgalaṃ prasthitānām // 8590.3	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kanyādātre tu hyadhanaṃ dasyave sadhanaṃ naram / guptaṃ jighāṃsave naiva vijñātamapi darśayet // 8591	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā (ma-gaṇa-pūrvikā!), 3,4: pathyā)
kanyā niṣkāsitā śreṣṭhā vadhūḥ śreṣṭhā praveśitā / annaṃ saṃkalitaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dharmaḥ śreṣṭho dine dine // 8592	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāprasūtasya dhanuḥprasaṅgād aṅgādhikāsāditavikramasya / dhanaṃjayādhīnaparākramasya himasya karṇasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ // 8593	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kanyāyāḥ kila pūjayanti pitaro jāmāturāptaṃ janaṃ sambandhe viparītameva tadabhūdārādhanaṃ te mayi / tvaṃ kāmena tathāvidho'syapahṛtaḥ sambandhabījaṃ ca tad ghore'smin mama jīvalokanarake pāpasya dhiga jīvitam // 8594	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kanyā varayate rūpaṃ mātā vittaṃ pitā śrutam / bāndhavāḥ kulamicchanti miṣṭānnamitare janāḥ // 8595.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāvikrayiṇaścaiva rasavikrayiṇastathā / viṣavikrayiṇaścaiva narā nirayagāminaḥ // 8595.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanye samālokaya kānyakubjam akubjakīrtiṃ naranāthamenam / kakubjaye yasya dharāparāgair bhavanti vārāṃnidhayaḥ sthalāni // 8596	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapaṭaṃ ca bahutaraṃ na jānāti hi kaścana / kauliko viṣṇurūpeṇa bhuñjati rājakanyakām // 8597	upajāti anuṣṭubh: ajñātam [8: snlg], ajñātam [8: rrgl], ajñātam [8: Brlg], ajñātam [8: ysll]
kapaṭakalitanidraṃ mandamālokayantī priyamadharamadhūni svecchayā pātumaicchat / madanamadamanojñā lajjayākṛṣṭacittā mukulitamukhapadmā citrasaṃstheva tasthau // 8598	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kapaṭanaṭanakoṭerdhūrjaṭeḥ sannaṭasyod- bhaṭavikaṭajaṭābhistāḍitāḥ śailakūṭāt / kharatarakaraghātairutthitā diksthitāste nabhasi niravalambaṃ dantinaḥ saṃcaranti // 8599	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kapaṭapaṭutā drohe cittaṃ satāṃ ca vimānane matirapanaye śāṭhyaṃ mitre suteṣvapi vañcanā / kṛtakamadhurā vāk pratyakṣaṃ parokṣavighātinī kaliyugamahārājasyaitāḥ svarājyavibhūtayaḥ // 8600	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kapaṭavacanabhājā kenacid vārayoṣā sakalarasikagoṣṭhīvañcikā vañcitāsau / iti vihasati riṅgad bhṛṅgavikṣiptacakṣur vikacakusumakānticchadmanā kelikuñjaḥ // 8601	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kapaṭaśatanadīṣṇairvairibhirvañcito'pi nikṛtikaraṇadakṣo'pyatra saṃsārabhīruḥ / tanuvacanamanobhirvakratāṃ yo na yāti gatamalamṛjumānaṃ tasya sādhorvadanti // 8602	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kapaṭādapi ripuhananaṃ kuryāditi nītirauśanasī / hananamṛte ca gurumate bandhādi vidhīyate ripoḥ kapaṭaiḥ // 8603	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
kapaṭena punarnaiva vyāpāro yadi yā kṛtaḥ / punarna paripākārhā haṇḍikā kāṣṭhanirmitā // 8604	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapardī bhūtisaṃpanno jagatīpatiradvayaḥ / dhigdaivamavyayaḥ so'pi bhṛṅgī śuṣyatyato bhṛśam // 8605	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapāṭamuddhāṭaya cārunetre kāmo'sti śatrurmama pṛṣṭhalagnaḥ / āpūritaṃ tasya śaraiḥ śarīraṃ candrānane tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ // 8606	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapāṭamuddhāṭaya lolalocane kandarpaśatrurmama pṛṣṭhalagnaḥ / ākṛṣya bāṇaṃ śithilīkaroti candrānane tvāṃ śaraṇāgato'smi // 8607	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kapāṭavistīrṇamanoramoraḥ- sthalasthitiśrīlalanasya tasya / ānanditāśeṣajanā babhūva sarvāṅgasaṅginyaparaiva lakṣmīḥ // 8608	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucelasasahāyatā / samatā caiva sarvasminn etan muktasya lakṣaṇam // 8609	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapāla upahāraśca saṃtānaḥ saṃgatas tathā / upanyāsaḥ pratīkāraḥ saṃyogaḥ puruṣāntaraḥ // 8610	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭanara ādiṣṭa ātmāmiṣa upagrahaḥ / parikrayas tathocchinnas tathā ca paradūṣaṇaḥ // 8611	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
skandhopaneyaḥ saṃdhiśca ṣoḍaśaḥ parakīrtitaḥ / iti ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuḥ saṃdhiṃ sandhivicakṣaṇāḥ // 8612	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapālasaṃdhirvijñepaḥ kevalaṃ samasaṃdhikaḥ / saṃpradānād bhavati ya upahāraḥ sa ucyate // 8613	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kapāle gambhīraḥ kuhariṇi jaṭāsaṃdhiṣu kṛśaḥ samuttālaścūḍābhujagaphaṇaratnavyatikare / mṛdurlekhākoṇe rayavaśavilolasya śaśinaḥ punīyād dīrghaṃ vo haraśirasi gaṅgākalakalaḥ // 8614	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ tarucchidraprotān bisamiti karī saṃkalayati / ratānte talpasthān harati vanitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaś candro jagadidamaho viplavayati // 8615	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapāle yadvadāpaḥ syuḥ śvadṛtau vā yathā payaḥ / āśrayasthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutam // 8616	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapālairyo baddhaḥ kathamakhilaviśvaprabhurasāv anāryairasmābhiḥ paramiyamapūrvaiva racanā / yadindoḥ pīyūṣadravamayamayūkhotkarakiraḥ kalaṅkoratnaṃ tu pratiphaṇamanarghaṃ viṣabhṛtām // 8617	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapikacchūmūlena ca nijacaraṇavilepanād bhavati / bījastambhaḥ puṃso bahuśo dṛṣṭaḥ prayogo'yam // 8618	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kapikacchūmūlena ca madavihralachāgamūtrapiṣṭena / milanaṃ stabdhīkaraṇaṃ mūlena durālabhāyāśca // 8619	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kapikulanakhamukhakhaṇḍita- tarutalaphalabhojano varaṃ puruṣaḥ / na punardhanamadagarvita- mukhabhaṅgakadarthitā vṛttiḥ // 8620	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kapirapi ca kāpiśāyana- madamatto vṛścikena saṃdaṣṭaḥ / api ca piśācagrastaḥ kiṃ brūmo vaikṛtaṃ tasya // 8621	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kapilākṣīrapānena brāhmaṇīgamanena ca / vedākṣaravicāreṇa sa śūdro narakaṃ vrajet // 8622.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapilānāṃ sahasrāṇi yo viprebhyaḥ prayacchati / ekasya jīvitaṃ dadyān na ca tulyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira // 8622.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapīnāṃ vasayāśvānāṃ vahnidāhasamudbhavā / vyathā vināśamabhyeti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // 8623	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapermadhyaṃ śiśurbaddhvā yathonnatapadaṃ vrajet / tadvadrakṣakamāśritya padamunnatamāśrayet // 8624	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapolaṃ pakṣmabhyaḥ kalayati kapolāt kucataṭaṃ kucānmadhyaṃ madhyānnavamuditanābhīsarasijam / na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kiyadanena vyavasitaṃ yadasyāḥ pratyaṅgaṃ nayanajalabindurviharati // 8625	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhir vinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām / yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti // 8626	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapolapatrān makarāt saketur bhrūbhyāṃ jigīṣurdhanuṣāṃ jaganti / ihāvalabhbyāsti ratiṃ manobhū rajyadvayasyo madhunādhareṇa // 8627	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapolapālīṃ tava tanvi manye lāvaṇyadhanye diśamuttarākhyām / vibhāti yasyāṃ lalitālakāyāṃ manoharā vai śravaṇasya lakṣmīḥ // 8628	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kapolaphalakāvasyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ bhūtvā tathāvidhau / apaśyantāvivānyonyamīdṛkṣāṃ kṣamatāṃ gatau // 8629	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapolayorinduñjitoramuṣyāḥ prasarpatoreva mitho jayāya / svayaṃ svayaṃbhūḥ kṛtarodhamantar vyadhatta nāsāmiha sāmyadaṇḍam // 8630	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jmjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kapolavyālolaśravaṇanavamākandakalikā- marandavyāmiśrāstava varatanu svedapṛṣataḥ / rativyatyāsasya śramamapalapeyuryadi bhaved abhedopakrāntakvaṇitaraśanādāma jaghanam // 8631	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapolāduḍḍīnairbhayavaśavilolairmadhukarair madāmbhaḥsaṃlobhādupari patituṃ baddhapaṭalaiḥ / caladbarhacchatraśriyamiva dadhāno'tirucirām avighnaṃ herambo bhavadaghavighātaṃ ghaṭayatu // 8632.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapolāvunmīlatpulakanikurambau mayi manāṅ mṛśatyantaḥsmerastabakitamukhāmbhoruharucaḥ / kathaṃkāraṃ śakyāḥ parigaditumindīvaradṛśo daladdrākṣāniryadrasabharasapakṣā bhaṇitayaḥ // 8632.2	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam / muhuḥ paśyañ śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ // 8633	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapole patrālīṃ pulakini vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ svayaṃ śrīrādhāyāḥ karakalitavartirmadhuripuḥ / abhūd vaktrendau yan nihitanayanaḥ kampitabhujas tadetat sāmarthyaṃ tadabhinavarūpasya jayati // 8634	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo'dhararasaḥ / muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam // 8635	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapole pāṇḍutvaṃ kimapi jaladhārāṃ nayanayos tanau kārśyaṃ dainyaṃ vacasi hṛdi dāvānalaśikhām / avajñāṃ prāṇeṣu prakṛtiṣu viparyāsamadhunā kimanyad vairāgyaṃ sakalaviṣayeṣvākalayate // 8636	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapole'mbhojākṣyāḥ priyadaśanacihnaṃ priyadṛśoḥ sarojākṣī vaktracyutabhujagavallīrasalavam / sapatnī dṛṣṭvārādurutaraviniśvāsataralo- nnatorojadvandvaṃ rahasi śanakai roditi muhuḥ // 8637	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kapolau lolākṣyā madhumukulalīlāvijayinā- vurojau rejāte kanakakalaśābhogasubhagau / dṛśau vātotkhelattaralataranīlotpalarucau vaco no jānīmaḥ kimamṛtamayaṃ kiṃ viṣamayam // 8638.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kaphamūtramalaprāyaṃ nirjanturjagatītale / yatnādyadutsṛjetsādhuḥ sotsargasamitirbhavet // 8638.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kabandhaḥ parighābhāso dṛśyate bhāskarāntike / jagrāsa sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ // 8639	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kamaṭhapṛṣṭhakaṭhoramidaṃ dhanur madhuramūrtirasau raghunandanaḥ / kathamadhijyamanena vidhīyatām ahaha tāta paṇas tava dāruṇaḥ // 8640	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kamaṇḍalūpamo'mātyas tanutyāgī bahugrahaḥ / nṛpate kiṅkṣaṇo mūrkho daridraḥ kiṃvarāṭakaḥ // 8641	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamanīyatānivāsaḥ karṇas tasyā vicitramaṇibhūṣaḥ / savidhaprasūtaratnaṃ śaṅkhanidhiṃ dūrataramakarot // 8642.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamanīyatārahārā candanaparihasitacārunīhārā / paricitapāṇḍyavihārā kamalamukhīyaṃ karāñcadupahārā // 8642.2	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamanekatamādānaṃ suratanarajatucchalaṃ tadāsīnam / apyatimānaṃ khamate so'ganikānaṃ naraṃ jetum // 8643	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamalaṃ kavalīkṛtaṃ na vā salilaṃ vā na salīlamāhutam / kariṇā pariṇāmadāruṇo dadṛśe vindhyavane mṛgādhipaḥ // 8644	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kamalaṃ tava padakamale vimale mama dehi cañcarīkatvam / nānyat kimapi ca kāṅkṣe paścād gānaṃ kimasti bhikṣāyāḥ // 8645	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalaṃ bhavanaṃ rajo'ṅgarāgo madhu pānaṃ madhurāḥ priyāpralāpāḥ / śayanaṃ mṛdu kesaropadhānaṃ bhramarasyāmbhasi kā na rājalīlā // 8646.1	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kamaladṛśo'dhikapolaṃ daśanakṣatapaṅktirābhāti / yūno vaśayitumicchor japamālevātanoḥ pravālamayī // 8646.2	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
kamalanayana yuṣmadviprayogāturā sā sarasi sarasijāntaḥ snātukāmā mamajja / drutataramanuyāyād yāvadūrdhvaṃ kṛśāṅgī hari hari hariṇākṣī paṅkamagnā babhūva // 8647	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kamalanayanākarṇābhūṣe sphuranmaṇimañjule tribhuvanatale dṛṣṭvāmodaṃ prayāti na ko yuvā / śamabhaṭaśiraśchettuṃ sajjīkṛte bata vedhasā na kimu kumate rajjūtkṣipte vibodhasi cakrake // 8648	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kamalapallavavārikaṇopamaṃ kimiva pāsi sadā nidhanaṃ dhanam / kalabhakarṇacalāñcalacañcalaṃ sthiratarāṇi yaśāṃsi na jīvitam // 8649	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kamalabhūtanayā vadanāmbuje vasatu te kamalā karapallave / vapuṣi te ramatāṃ kamalāṅgajaḥ pratidinaṃ hṛdaye kamalāpatiḥ // 8650	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kamalamadhunas tyaktvā pānaṃ vihāya navotpalaṃ prakṛtisubhagāṃ gandhoddāmāmapāsya ca mālatīm / śaṭhamadhukarāḥ kliśyantīme kaṭāmbuṣu dantināṃ sulabhamapahāyai'vaṃ lokaḥ kaṭeṣu hi rajyate // 8651	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām / sā ca sukumārasubhagety utpātaparamparā keyam // 8652	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamalamiva cāru vadanaṃ mṛṇālamiva komalaṃ bhujāyugalam / alimāleva ca nīlā tavaiva madirekṣaṇe kabarī // 8653	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamalamukulamṛdvī phullarājīvagandhaḥ suratapayasi yasyāḥ saurabhaṃ divyamaṅge / cakitamṛgadṛśābhe prāntarakte ca netre stanayugalamanarghyaṃ śrīphalaśrīviḍambi // 8654	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
tilakusumasamānāṃ bibhratī nāsikāṃ ca dvijagurusurapūjāṃ śraddadhānā sadaiva / kuvalayadalakāntiḥ kāpi cāmpeyagaurī vikacakamalakośākārakāmātapatrā // 8655	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
vrajati mṛdu salīlaṃ rājahaṃsīva tanvī trivalivalitamaghyā haṃsavāṇī suveṣā / mṛdu śuci laghu bhuṅkte māninī gāḍhalajjā dhavalakusumavāsovallabhā padminī syāt // 8656	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kamalamukhi sarvatomukha- nivāraṇaṃ vidadhadeva bhūṣayati / rodhoruddhasvarasās taraṅgiṇīs taralanayanāśca // 8657	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamalavadanā pīnottuṅgaṃ ghaṭākṛti vibhratī stanayugamiyaṃ tanvī śyāmā viśāladṛgañcalā / viśadadaśanā madhyakṣāmā vṛtheti janāḥ śramaṃ vidadhati mudhā rāgāduccairanīdṛśavarṇane // 8658	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kamalavanacitāmbuḥ pāṭalāmodaramyaḥ sukhasalilaniṣekaḥ sevyacandrāṃśuhāraḥ / vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena // 8659	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kamalaśaradhirambhāsaikatānukramāḍhyaṃ kanakakalaśabhārākrāntasaudāminīkam / kisalayitamṛṇālaṃ hāragarbhapravālaṃ kuvalayitaśaśāṅkaṃ kauśalaṃ sā vidhātuḥ // 8660	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kamalāḥ pākavinamrā mūlatalāghrātasurabhikahlārāḥ / pavanākampitaśirasaḥ prāyaḥ kurvanti parimalaślāghām // 8661.1	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalākucakanakācala- jaladharamābhīrasundarīmadanam / adhitataśeṣaphaṇāvali- kamalavanībhṛṅgamacyutaṃ vande // 8661.2	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalākṣi vilambyatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ kamanīye kacabhārabandhane / dṛḍhalagnamidaṃ dṛśoryugaṃ śanakairadya samuddharāmyaham // 8662	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kamalācibukonnāyī kṛṣṇasya karaḥ karotu kalyāṇam / mukura iva nīlavṛnto bhāti nitāntaṃ tadānanaṃ yena // 8663	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalāni pānamadhubhājanāni naḥ pidadhāti yaḥ sa vidhureṣa gocaraḥ / iti roṣaṇairiva madhuvratairdhutaṃ dadhatī mukhaṃ surabhicārumārutam // 8664	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
kamalābhyāṃ sudhāsindhuvadanekṣaṇayos tulām / kalayantu pare kiṃ tu kveme paṅkeruhe kva te // 8665	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamalāsanakamalekṣaṇa- kamalārikirīṭakamalabhṛdvāhaiḥ / nutapadakamalā kamalā karadhṛtakamalā karotu me kuśalam // 8666	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalini malinīkaroṣi cetaḥ kimiti bakairavahelitānabhijñaiḥ / pariṇatamakarandamārmikāste jagati bhavantu cirāyuṣo milindāḥ // 8667	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kamalini vimale jale janis te taducitamācaraṇaṃ na saṃtanoṣi / malinamalikulaṃ yatastvamantaḥ śaśikiraṇān vimalān bahiṣkaroṣi // 8668	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kamalinīmalinī dayitaṃ vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām / tamadhunā madhunā nihitaṃ hṛdi smarati sā ratisāramaharniśam // 8669	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kamalinīvanakelikalārasī guṇavaśīkṛtakairaviṇīguṇaḥ / alirasau tava saurabhalobhataḥ patati ketakikaṇṭakasaṃkaṭe // 8670	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kamaleḥ samakeśaṃ te kamalerṣyākaraṃ mukham / kamalekhyaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kamalevonmadiṣṇuṣu // 8671	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamale kamalā śete haraḥ śete himālaye / kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete manye matkuṇaśaṅkayā // 8672	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamale kamale nityaṃ madhūni pibatas tava / bhaviṣyanti na sandehaḥ kaṣṭaṃ doṣākarodaye // 8673	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamale kamalotpattiḥ śrūyate na ca dṛśyate / bāle tava mukhāmbhoje dṛṣṭamindīvaradvayam // 8674	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kamale nidhāya kamalaṃ kalayantī kamalavāsinaṃ kamale / kamalayugādudbhūtaṃ kamalaṃ kamalena vārayati // 8675	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kamaleva matirmatiriva kamalā tanuriva vibhā vibheva tanuḥ / dharaṇīva dhṛtirdhūtiriva dharaṇī satataṃ vibhāti bata yasya // 8676.1	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kamalodarakomalapādatalaṃ gaṇanāparivarjitabāhubalam / praṇamāmi jagattrayabodhikaraṃ giranāravibhūṣaṇanemijinam // 8676.2	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kamiturabhisṛtvarīṇāṃ gaurāṅgīṇāmihendudhavalāsu / uḍḍayamānānāmiva rajaniṣu paramīkṣyate chāyā // 8677.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kampaḥ svedaḥ śramo mūrcchā bhramirglānirbalakṣayaḥ / rājayakṣmādirogāśca bhaveyurmaithunotthitāḥ // 8677.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kampakṣitīśamaniśaṃ kathayanti santaḥ saṅgītadugdhajaladheruditaṃ sudhāṃśum / sāhityamānasasarovararājahaṃsaṃ saṅgrāmaraṅganaṭanasthitisūtradhāram // 8677.3	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kampate guṇamuṣṭis tu mārgaṇasya hi pṛṣṭhataḥ / saṃmukhī syād dhanurmuṣṭis tadā vāme gatirbhavet // 8678	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jaḍakṛśaṃ go'jāvikaṃ glāyati śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇamapi kṣipto'pi naivojjñati / śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punarayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrmavat svānyaṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati // 8679	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kampante girayaḥ puraṃdarabhiyā mainākamukhyāḥ punaḥ krandantyambudharāḥ sphuranti baḍavāvaktrodgatā vahnayaḥ / bhoḥ kumbhodbhava mucyatāṃ jalanidhiḥ svastyastu te sāṃprataṃ nidrāluḥ ślathabāhuvallikamalāśleṣo hariḥ sīdati // 8680	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kampaprado'sau śiśirartucauro muṣṇāti vṛkṣān harate kimasmān / itīva bhītvā paripāṇḍurāṇi jātāni śuṣkāṇi tṛṇāni bhūmau // 8681	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kampitaṃ bhītamudghṛṣṭam avyaktamanunāsikam / kākasvaraṃ śiraḥsthaṃ ca tathā sthānavivarjitam // 8682	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kampitaḥ patasi pādakayugme netrakoṇanihato'pi bhayārtaḥ / yudhyase kimiṣubhiḥ priya bhīruṃ bhāṣukāmiti hasaṃścalito'nyaḥ // 8683	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
kampī ko'bhividhau kimavyayamiha kvāste dravatvaṃ punaḥ syād rūpaṃ prathamādvitīyavacane kiṃ veḥ khamadyāhvaya / ko dhāturgatigandhayordraviṇināṃ kiṃ yācate bhikṣukaḥ praśnānāṃ drutamuttarāṇi vada re bhayyā jalebī khavā // 8684	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kampoparuddhasarvāṅgair galatsvedodabindubhiḥ / tvadārabdhairmahīnātha vairibhirvanitāyitam // 8685	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kambāghātairvapuṣi nihatairucchalacchoṇitaughaiḥ kārāgārairnibiḍanigaḍairlaṅghanaṃ cumbanaṃ ca / evaṃ jñātvā virama sumate mā kuru tvaṃ niyogaṃ karṇopānte malinavadanā lekhinī phūtkaroti // 8686	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kambukaṇṭhi caraṇaḥ śanaiścaro rāhureṣa tava keśakalāpaḥ / na cyutaṃ tadapi yauvanametat sā payodharaguroranukampā // 8687	upajāti triṣṭubh: svāgatā [11: rnBgg], rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kayāpi krīḍatu brahmā divyāḥ strīrdīvyata svayam / kalistu caratu brahma praita vātipriyāya vaḥ // 8688	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kayāsi kāmin suratāparādhāt pādānataḥ kopanayāvadhūtaḥ / tasyāḥ kariṣyāmi dṛḍhānutāpaṃ pravālaśayyāśaraṇaṃ śarīram // 8689	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karaṃ gṛhītvā parimṛdya mandaṃ kaṭiṃ nipīḍyānuvimṛjya corum / nīvīmapākṛtya vilakṣaṇāyāḥ śaṭho manojopaniṣat papāṭha // 8690	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karaṃ prasārya sūryeṇa dakṣiṇāśāvalambinā / na kevalamanenātmā divaso'pi laghūkṛtaḥ // 8691	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karakaṅkaṭakuṭyaṅkakhaṅgasaṃghaṭṭaṭāṅkṛtaiḥ / kālarātryā pranṛtyantyā raṇavīṇeva vādyate // 8692	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karakajalapūtabhūtala- nihitapado vihitavikṛtahuṃkāraḥ / api vitathamantragaṇanā- vyagrasamagrāṅgulīparvā // 8693	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karakampitakhaṅgayaṣṭibhīme raṇasaṃnāhitarāmanāthavīre / aribhūbhṛdamartyasundarīṇām acalan dakṣiṇavāmalocanāni // 8694	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
karakalitadāranarake śerata iha ye sajanti bhavasindhau / rasikās ta eva mānyā manyantāṃ dhanyamātmānam // 8695	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karakalitapināka nākanātha dbiṣadurumānasaśūla śūlapāṇe / bhava vṛṣabhavimāna mānaśauṇḍa trijagadakāraṇatāraka prasīda // 8696	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
karakākṛtabhīkabhekaloka- pratipālyāḥ kimu sāgareṇa kulyāḥ / valabhitkuliśaprahārabhīru- kṣitibhṛdrakṣaṇadakṣiṇena tulyāḥ // 8697.1	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
karakiśalayacālyamānasūrpa- kramanamadunnamadakṣipakṣmapāli / karanihitakanīnikaṃ smitākṣyāḥ kṣaṇamapi notpavanaṃ jahāti cetaḥ // 8697.2	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
karakisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vilambitamekhalā kṣipati sumanomālāśeṣaṃ pradīpaśikhāṃ prati / sthagayati muhuḥ patyurnetre vihasya samākulā surataviratau ramyaṃ tanvī punaḥ punarīkṣyate // 8698.1	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
karakisalayamūlaṃ dhunvatīnāṃ sa dhanyaḥ śravaṇapathamanalpaṃ yasya puṃsaḥ praviṣṭāḥ / navarataparirambhe bālasīmantinīnāṃ ahaha na na na mā mā muñca muñceti vācaḥ // 8698.2	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karacaraṇakāñcihāra- prahāramavacintya balagṛhītakacaḥ / praṇayī cumbati dayitā- vadanaṃ sphuradadharamaruṇākṣam // 8699	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karacaraṇakṛtaṃ vā kāyajaṃ karmajaṃ vā śravaṇanayanajaṃ vā mānasaṃ vāparādham / vihitamavihitaṃ vā sarvametat kṣamasva jaya jaya karuṇābdhe śrīmahādeva śaṃbho // 8700	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karacaraṇanāsamādau karṇau gṛhṇāti raktatāṃ gamayan / śītaṃ gurukṛtapīḍaṃ paścādaṅgāni kūrma iva // 8701	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karacaraṇena praharati yathā yathāṅgeṣu kopataralākṣī / roṣayati paruṣavacanais tathā tathā preyasīṃ rasikaḥ // 8702	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karaculukajalo mahodadhiś caraṇanibaddhamaho nijāṅgaṇam / nijasadanasamaṃ rasātalaṃ bhavati nṛṇāṃ vyavasāyaśālinām // 8703	aparavaktra = [11: nnrlg] 1,3 + [12: njjr] 2,4
karajadaśanacihnaṃ naiśamaṅge'nyanārī- janitamiti saroṣāmīrṣyayā śaṅkamānām / smarasi na khalu dattaṃ mattayaitattvayaiva striyamanunayatītthaṃ vrīḍamānāṃ vilāsī // 8704	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca / gatirapi caraṇāvalagnamandā tvamasi mṛgasamākṣi kāmadattā // 8705	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: nnry]
karajālamapūrvaceṣṭitaṃ vas tadabhīṣṭapradamastu tigmabhāsaḥ / kriyate bhavabandhanād vimuktiḥ praṇatānāmupasevitena yena // 8706	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
karañjāragvadhāriṣṭasaptaparṇatvacākṛtaḥ / upacāraḥ krimiharo mūtramustaviḍaṅgavān // 8707	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karaṭikaraṭe bhrasyaddānapravāhapipāsayā parisarasaradbhṛṅgaśreṇī karoti yadā ravam / vadati śirasaḥ kampairnāsmānnivāraya vāraṇa vitara vitarāmānaṃ dānaṃ calāḥ kila saṃpadaḥ // 8708	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
karaṇabhagaṇadoṣaṃ vārasaṃkrāntidoṣaṃ kutithikulikadoṣaṃ yāmayāmārdhadoṣam / kujaśaniravidoṣaṃ rāhuketvādidoṣaṃ harati sakaladoṣaṃ candramāḥ saṃmukhasthaḥ // 8709	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karataralitabandhaṃ kañcukaṃ kurvatīnāṃ pratiphalitamidānīṃ daipamātāmramarciḥ / stanataṭapariṇāhe bhāminīnāṃ bhaviṣyan nakhapadalipilīlāsūtrapātaṃ karoti // 8710	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karatalayugapariṇaddhe kucakalaśe kuṅkumāruṇe tasyāḥ / sindūrite karipateḥ kumbhe nakṣatramāleva // 8711	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karadīkaraṇaṃ rājñāṃ ripūṇāṃ parimardanam / bhūmerupārjanaṃ bhūyo rājavṛttaṃ tu cāṣṭadhā // 8712	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karanakharavidīrṇadhvāntakumbhīndrakumbhāt tuhinakaṇamiṣeṇa kṣiptamuktāprarohaḥ / ayamudayadharitrīdhārimūrdhāviruḍho nayanapathamupeto bhānumatkesarīndraḥ // 8713	mālinī [15: nnmyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karapadānanalocananāmabhiḥ śatadalaiḥ sutanorvirahajvare / ravimaho bahupītacaraṃ cirād aniśatāpamiṣādudasṛjyata // 8714	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
karapātairdurālokais tīkṣṇaḥ saṃtāpayan prajāḥ / bhānurna bhavatā tulyaḥ kṣaṇasaṃraktamaṇḍalaḥ // 8715	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karapraceyāmuttuṅgaprabhuśaktiṃ prathīyasīm / prajñābalabṛhanmūlaḥ phalatyutsāhapādapaḥ // 8716	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karabadarasadṛśamakhilaṃ bhuvanatalaṃ yatprasādataḥ kavayaḥ / paśyanti sūkṣmamatayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī // 8717	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karabha kimidaṃ dīrghocchvāsaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi śarīrakaṃ virama śaṭha he kasyātyantaṃ sakhe sukhamāgatam / cara kisalayaṃ svasthaḥ pīlorvimuñca madhuspṛhāṃ punarapi bhavān kalyāṇānāṃ bhaviṣyati bhājanam // 8718	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
karabhadayite yattat pītaṃ sudurlabhamekadā madhu vanagataṃ tasyālābhe virauṣi kimutsukā / kuru paricitaiḥ pīloḥ patrairdhūtiṃ marugocarair jagati sakale kasyāvāptiḥ sukhasya nirantarā // 8719	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karabhadayite yo'sau pīlus tvayā madhulubdhayā vyapagataghanacchāyas tyakto na sādaramīkṣitaḥ / calakisalayaḥ so'pīdānīṃ prarūḍhanavāṅkuraḥ karabhadayitāvṛndairanyaiḥ sukhaṃ paribhujyate // 8720	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
karabha yadi kadācit prabhraman daivayogān madhukarakulatastvaṃ prāpayethā madhūni / virama virama tebhyaḥ santi śaṣpāṇyaraṇye prathamamukharasāste śoṣayantyeva paścāt // 8721	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karabha rabhasāt kroṣṭuṃ vāñchasyaho śravaṇajvaraṃ śaraṇamathavānṛjvī dīrghā tavaiva śirodharā / bahugalabilāvṛttiśrāntoccaliṣyati vāṅ mukhāt kiyati samaye ko jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim // 8722	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
karamudayamahīdharastanāgre galitatamaḥpaṭalāṃśuke niveśya / vikasitakumudekṣaṇaṃ vicumba- tyayamamareśadiśo mukhaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ // 8723	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
karayugmapadmamukulāpavarjitaiḥ prativeśma lājakusumairavākiran / avadīrṇaśuktipuṭamuktamauktaka- prakarairiva priyarathāṅgamaṅganāḥ // 8724	mañjubhāṣiṇī [13: sjsjg]
karayoḥ kalahāyamānayor ubhayoreva payodharopari / valayāvalayo balābalaṃ bahuvelaṃ patayālavo jaguḥ // 8725	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kararuddhanīvi dayitopagatau galitaṃ tvarāvirahitāsanayā / kṣaṇadṛṣṭahāṭakaśilāsadṛśa- sphuradūrubhitti vasanaṃ vavase // 8726	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
kararuhaśikhānikhāta bhrāntvā viśrānta rajaniduravāpa / raviriva yantrollikhitaḥ kṛśo'pi lokasya harasi dṛśam // 8727	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karalālito'pi dahati jvalati vyajanena vījyamāno'pi / dahana ivānirvāṇaṃ na vimuñcatyuṣṇatāṃ piśunaḥ // 8728	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karavāriruheṇa saṃdhunāne taravārri nṛpatau mukundadeve / racayantyamarāvatītaruṇyaḥ prathamaṃ kāñcanapārijātamālāḥ // 8729	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [ssjtj, sjgg]
karavālakarālavāridhārā yamunā divyataraṅgiṇī ca kīrtiḥ / tava kāmada tīrtharāja dūrād anubadhnāti sarasvatī kavīnām // 8730	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
karaśīkaraśītalaṃ vitanvan vanabhūbhāgamudagradāvadagdham / purato'ñcati cen na yūthanāthaḥ kalabhānāṃ sulabhas tadā na panthāḥ // 8731	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
karasādo'mbaratyāgas tejohāniḥ sarāgatā / vāruṇīsaṅgajāvasthā bhānunāpyanubhūyate // 8732.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karasthamapyevamamī kṛṣīvalāḥ kṣipanti baujaṃ pṛthupaṅkasaṅkaṭe / vayasya kenāpi kathaṃ vilokitaḥ samasti nāstītyathavā phalodayaḥ // 8732.2	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
karasthamudakaṃ tyaktvā ghanasthamabhivāñchati / siddhamannaṃ parityajya bhikṣāmaṭati durmatiḥ // 8733	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karasparśārambhāt pulakitapṛthūrojakalaśo śramāmbho vāmārdhe vamati madanākūtisulabham / vibhorvāraṃ vāraṃ kṛtasamadhikoddhūlanavidhes tanau bhasmasnānaṃ kathamapi samāptaṃ vijayate // 8734	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
karāgrajāgracchatakoṭirarthī yayorimau tau tulayet kucau cet / sarvaṃ tadā śrīphalamunmadiṣṇu jātaṃ vaṭīmapyadhunā na labdhum // 8735	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karādgalitakhādyasya kā hāniḥ kariṇo bhavet / pipīlikā tu tenaiva bibharti svakuṭumbakam // 8736	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karānītaṃ paṭānītaṃ striyānītaṃ tathaiva ca / eraṇḍapatrairānītaṃ devatānāṃ ca nārhati // 8737.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
karān tirodhāya tarūnnipīḍya śilā avaskandya mahīyaso'pi / ujjṛmbhitaḥ kālavaśāt tadanyas teṣāmadhastātpunareva jātaḥ // 8737.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karāmbujasajatsamākṣavalayā tanus tava śubhe jitendusuṣamā / chinattu duritacchaṭāṃ mama nadī taṭīmiva calajjaloddhatagatiḥ // 8738	jaloddhatagati [12: jsjs]
karāmbhoje kañjī madanamadabhañjī padajuṣāṃ manaḥpuñjārañjī madhuramaṇimañjīracaraṇaḥ / kalākūtavyañjī vrajayuvatisañjī jalamucāṃ gabhīrābhāgañjī mama sa paramañjīvanadhanam // 8739	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
karāravindena padāravindaṃ mukhāravinde viniveśayantam / vaṭasya patrasya puṭe śayānaṃ bālaṃ mukundaṃ satataṃ smarāmi // 8740	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karālakālarupeṇa janatāduritāpahā / tāraṇī tariṇī bhūyād amunā yamunāmbunā // 8741	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
karālavācālamukhāścamūkhanair dhvastāmbarā vīkṣya diśo rajasvalāḥ / tirobabhūve gahanairdineśvaro rajondhakāraiḥ varitaḥ kuto'pyasau // 8742	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karālairvikaṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ puruṣairudyatāyudhaiḥ / pāṣāṇais tāḍitaḥ svapne sadyo mṛtyuṃ labhen naraḥ // 8743	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karāviva śarīrasya netrayoriva pakṣmaṇī / avicārya priyaṃ kuryāt tan mitraṃ mitramucyate // 8744	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karā himāṃśorapi tāpayantīty etat priye cetasi naiva śaṅkyam / viyogataptaṃ hṛdayaṃ madīyaṃ tatra sthitāṃ tvāṃ samupaiti tāpaḥ // 8745	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karikapolamadoddhatabuddhito malinapaṅkajavṛndamihāśrayan / kanakagauramamaṃ navacampakaṃ madhupa cañcala muñcasi kiṃ mudhā // 8746	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
karikalabha vimuñca lolatāṃ cara vinayavratamānatānanaḥ / mṛgapatinakhakoṭibhaṅguro gururupari kṣamate na te'ṅkuśaḥ // 8747	aparavaktra = [11: nnrlg] 1,3 + [12: njjr] 2,4
karikavalitamṛṣṭaiḥ śākhiśākhāgrapatrair aruṇasaraṇayo'mī sarvato bhīṣayante / calitaśabarasenādattagośṛṅgacaṇḍa- dhvanicakitavarāhavyākulā vindhyapādāḥ // 8748.1	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
karikumbhatulāmurojayoḥ kriyamāṇāṃ kavibhirviśṛṅkhalaiḥ / kathamāli śṛṇoṣi sādaraṃ viparītārthavido hi yoṣitaḥ // 8748.2	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
karikṛṣṇāśvagandhā ca navanītaṃ ca māhiṣam / eteṣāṃ mardanālliṅgavṛddhiḥ saṃjāyate parā // 8749	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kariṇaśca hastikarṇair nirdeśyā vājino'śvakarṇena / gāvaśca pāṭalābhiḥ kadalībhirajāvikaṃ bhavati // 8750	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karin mā garjoccairmūgapatirihāste'tinikaṭe na dṛṣṭastvaṃ daivādapasara sudūraṃ drutamitaḥ / na kiṃ paśyasyagre kharanakharanirdāritakari- prakīrṇāsthiśreṇīdhavalitamimaṃ śailakaṭakam // 8751	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karimadaparimalavāhī vahati bahirgirisaritsamīra iti / mṛdugarbhāntarmāvaṃ na jahāti guhāgṛhasya harigṛhiṇī // 8752	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
karivaramṛditavalīmukha- nalakairmūleṣu kīlitasya taroḥ / saṃvatsaraṃ ca yāvat phalinasya phalāni jāyante // 8753	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kariṣyati kalānāthaḥ kutukī karamambare / iti nirvāpayāmāsa ravidīpaṃ niśāṅganā // 8754	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtānyeva ca daśaiyet / dharmakāmārthakāryāṇi tathā mantro na bhidyate // 8755	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kariṣyate yatra suduścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidas tapāṃsi / śiloccayaṃ cāruśiloccayaṃ tam eṣa kṣaṇānneṣyati guhyakas tvām // 8756	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmīti cintayā / mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmīti vismṛtam // 8757	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kariṣye'vaśyamityuktiḥ kariṣyannapi duṣyasi / dṛṣṭādṛṣṭā hi nāyattāḥ kāryīyā hetavastava // 8758.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karī barībharīti ced diśaṃ sarīsarīti kāṃ sthirīcarīkarīti cet na cañcarīkarītikām / darīdharīti ketakaṃ varīvarīti sārasaṃ jarījarīti mañjarī nirītirītirīdṛśī // 8758.2	pañcacāmara [16: jrjrjg]
karīṣamadhye nihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ pañcamāsakam / dravībhūtaṃ tataḥ sarvam uddharet tena lepayet // 8759	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karuṇamabhihitaṃ trapā nirastā tadabhimukhaṃ ca vimuktamaśru tābhiḥ / prakupitamabhisāraṇe'nunetuṃ priyamiyatī hyabalājanasya bhūmiḥ / 8760	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karuṇādravameva durjanaḥ sutarāṃ satpuruṣaṃ prabādhate / mṛdukaṃ hi bhinatti kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭhine kuṇṭhaka eva jāyate // 8761.1	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kare kṛtvā tūlaṃ kucakalaśamūlaṃ vidadhatī sphuṭaṃ vāraṃ vāraṃ taralayati hāraṃ suvadanā / samīcīnā mīnāyatanayananīlotpaladalā vitanvānā tantūn vikalayati jantūnavikalam // 8761.2	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kare ca dakṣiṇe vyādhiṃ hṛdi rājyādilābhadā / pṛṣṭhe copadravaṃ hantyudare miṣṭānnabhojanam // 8762	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kareṇa kaṇḍūyati dakṣiṇena yakṣo yadā vāmakaraṃ tadānīm / prabhūtamātaṅgaghaṭāsamṛddhaṃ brūte samantāt pṛthivīpatitvam // 8763	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kareṇa kariṇā vīraḥ sugṛhīto'pi kopinā / asināsūn jahārāśu tasyaiva svaymakṣataḥ // 8764	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kareṇa te raṇeṣvantakareṇa dviṣatāṃ hatāḥ / kareṇavaḥ kṣaradraktā bhānti saṃdhyāghanā iva // 8765	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kareṇa dānaṃ munirādadāno bhaktasya saṃketamiti bravīti / lokadvayecchāphalasaṃpradāne datto mayā dakṣiṇahasta eṣaḥ // 8766	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kareṇa vāñcheva vidhuṃ vidhartuṃ yamitthamātthādariṇī tamartham / pātuṃ śrutibhyāmapi nādhikurve varṇaṃ śrutervarṇa ivāntimaḥ kim // 8767	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kareṇa vātāyanalambitena spṛṣṭas tvayā caṇḍi kutūhalinyā / āmuñcatīvābharaṇaṃ dvitīyam udbhinnavidyudvalayo ghanas te // 8768.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kareṇa salilārdreṇa na gaṇḍau nāparaṃ karam / nekṣaṇe ca spṛśet kiṃ tu spraṣṭavye jānunī śriye // 8768.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kareṇurnāhūtā nijakavalabhāgapraṇayinī na cāmṛṣṭaḥ snehāt karakisalayenāpi kalabhaḥ / sa yenāsau darpāt pratigajajigīṣārabhasataḥ krudhā dhāvan magno hradapayasi kaṣṭaṃ karipatiḥ // 8769.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kare dānaṃ hṛdi dhyānaṃ mukhe maunaṃ gṛhe dhanam / tīrthe yānaṃ giri jñānaṃ maṇḍanaṃ mahatāmidam // 8769.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kare vāme vāsastadaparakare hāralatikāṃ vahantyā bimboṣṭhe patidaśanadattavraṇapadam / parimlānāṃ mālāṃ śirasi śaśikhaṇḍaṃ stanataṭe ratāntottiṣṭhantyā jagadapi na mūlyaṃ mṛgadaśaḥ // 8769.3	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kare vidhṛtyeśvarayā girāṃ sā pānthā pathīndrasya kṛtā vihasya / vāmeti nāmaiva babhāja sārdhaṃ purandhrisādhāraṇasaṃvibhāgam // 8770	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kare vibhāti tanvaṅgyā raṇadvalayasaṃhatiḥ / manaḥkuraṅgabandhāya pāśālīva manobhuvaḥ // 8771	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kare veṇīmeṇīsadṛśanayanā snānaviratau dadhānā harmyāgre haranayanatejohutamapi / iyaṃ mugdhā dugdhāmbudhibahalakallolasadṛśā dṛśā vāraṃ vāraṃ manasijataruṃ pallavayati // 8772	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kare ślāghyas tyāgaḥ śirasi gurupādapraṇamatā mukhe satyā vāṇī vijayi bhujayorvīryamatulam / hṛdi svacchā vṛttiḥ śrutamadhigataṃ ca śravaṇayor vināpyaiśvaryeṇa prakṛtimahatāṃ maṇḍanamidam // 8773.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
karairupāttān kamalotkarebhyo nijairvivasvān vikacodarebhyaḥ / tasyā nicikṣepa mukhāravinde svedāpadeśānmakarandabindūn // 8773.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karairvā pramitairgrāmair vatsare prabalaṃ ripum / toṣayet taddhi dānaṃ syād yathāyogeṣu śatruṣu // 8774	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti kālaḥ sakalaṃ saṃharet kāla eva hi / kālaḥ sthāpayate viśvaṃ kālādhīnamidaṃ jagat // 8775	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karo'titāmro rāmāṇāṃ tantrītāḍanavibhramam / karoti serṣyaṃ kānte ca śravaṇotpalatāḍanam // 8776	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
karoti doṣaṃ na tamatra kesarī na dandaśūko na karī na bhūmipaḥ / atīva ruṣṭo na ca śatruruddhato yamugramithyātvaripuḥ śarīriṇām // 8777	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
karoti nirmalādhāras tucchasyāpi mahārghatām / ambuno binduralpo'pi śuktau muktāphalaṃ bhavet // 8778	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti nīḍaṃ bhuvi ced varāhī samānyapatyāni vijāyate vā / samudbhavadbhānumayūkhavahnau jājvalyate tajjagatī samastā // 8779	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti pāpaṃ yo'jñānān nātmano vetti ca kṣamam / pradveṣṭi sādhuvṛttāṃśca sa lokasyaiti vācyatām // 8780.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti puṣpairjinanāyakasya pūjaṃ trikālaṃ tanumān sadā yaḥ / tasyāmareśāvanināthacakra- varttyādilakṣmīrvaśagā bhaved drāk // 8780.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti pūjyamāno'pi lokavyasanadīkṣitaḥ / darśane darśane trāsaṃ gṛhāhiriva durjanaḥ // 8781	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti māṃsaṃ balamindriyāṇāṃ tato'bhivṛddhiṃ madanasya tasmāt / karotyayuktiṃ pravicintya buddhyā tyajanti māṃsaṃ trividhena santaḥ // 8782	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
karoti yaḥ paradrohaṃ janasyānaparādhinaḥ / tasya rājñaḥ sthirāpi śrīḥ samūlaṃ nāśamṛcchati // 8783	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti yo'śeṣajanātiriktāṃ saṃbhāvanāmarthavatīṃ kriyābhiḥ / saṃsatsu jāte puruṣādhikāre na pūraṇī taṃ samupaiti saṃkhyā // 8784	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti lābhahīnena gauraveṇa kimāśritaḥ / kṣāmasyendorguṇaṃ dhatte kamīśvaraśirodhṛtiḥ // 8785.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti viratiṃ dhanyo yaḥ sadā niśibhojanāt / so'rdhaṃ puruṣāyuṣasya syādavaśyamupoṣitaḥ // 8785.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
karoti vairaṃ sphuṭamucyamānaḥ pratuṣyati śrotrasukhairapathyaiḥ / vivekaśūnyaḥ prabhurātmamānī mahānanarthaḥ suhṛdāṃ batāyam // 8786	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
