karoti śobhāmalake striyāḥ ko dṛśyā na kāntā vidhinā ca koktā / aṅge tu kasmin dahanaḥ purāreḥ sindūrabindurvidhavālalāṭe // 8787	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti saṃsāraśarīrabhoga- virāgabhāvaṃ vidadhāti rāgam / śīlavratadhyānatapaḥkṛpāsu jñānī vimokṣāya kṛtaprayāsaḥ // 8788	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yacca karoti saḥ // 8789	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
karoti sahakārasya kalikotkalikottaram / manmano manmano'pyeṣa mattakokilanisvanaḥ // 8790	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti suhṛdāṃ dainyam ahitānāṃ tathā mudam / akāle ca jarāṃ pitroḥ kusutaḥ kurute dhruvam // 8791	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti svamukhenaiva bahudhānyasya khaṇḍanam / namaḥ patanaśīlāya musalāya khalāya ca // 8792	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoti huṃhuṃ śṛgiti dhvaniṃ yo neṣṭo na duṣṭaḥ sa yato ratārthī / calaścalaḥ syāt kalahāya śabdaḥ kikīti dīpto gururugluśāntaḥ // 8793.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karoti he daityasuta yāvanmātraṃ parigraham / tāvanmātraṃ sa evāsya duḥkhaṃ cetasi yacchati // 8793.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karotu karaṭaḥ śabdaṃ sarvadā prāṅgaṇe vasan / na śṛṇoti budhaḥ prītyā śṛṇoti pikabhāṣitam // 8793.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karotu tādṛśīṃ prītiṃ yādṛśī nīrapaṅkayoḥ / raviṇā śoṣite nīre paṅgadeho viśīryate // 8794	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karotu nāma nītijño vyavasāyamitastataḥ / phalaṃ punas tadeva syād yad vidhermanasi sthitam // 8795	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karomīśo'pi nākrāntiṃ paritāpena khedavān / daridro'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmyanāmayaḥ // 8796	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karomyahamidaṃ tadā kṛtamidaṃ kariṣyāmyadaḥ pumāniti sadā kriyākaraṇakāraṇavyāpṛtaḥ / vivekarahitāśayo vigatasarvadharmakṣamo na vetti gatamapyaho jagati kālamatyākulaḥ // 8797	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
karoṣi tāstvamutkhātamohasthāne sthirā matīḥ / padaṃ yatiḥ sutapasā labhate'taḥ saśuklima // 8798.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karoṣi yat pretyahitāya kiṃcit kadācidalpaṃ sukṛtaṃ kathaṃcit / mā jīharastanmadamatsarādyair vinā ca tanmā narakātithirbhūḥ // 8798.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī payasyagādhe kila jātasaṃbhramā / sakhīṣu nirvācyamadhārṣṭyadūṣitaṃ priyāṅgasaṃśleṣamavāpa māninī // 8799	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam / upeyuṣī kalpalatābhiśaṅkayā kathaṃ nvitastrasyati ṣaṭpadāvaliḥ // 8800	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
karau śaradijāmbujakramavilāsaśikṣāgurū padau vibudhapādapaprathamapallavollaṅghinau / dṛśau dalitadurmadatribhuvanopamānaśriyau vilokaya vilocanāmṛtamaho mahaḥ śaiśavam // 8801	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
karkandhūphalamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalākāṅkṣayā gṛdhrolūkakadambakasya purataḥ kāko'pi haṃsāyate / kīrtyā te dhavalīṛkte tribhuvane kṣmāpāla lakṣmīḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vīkṣya balo'yamityupahitavrīḍaṃ śanairjalpati // 8802	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karkaśaṃ duḥsahavākyaṃ jalpanti vañcitāḥ paraiḥ / kurvanti dyūtakārasya karṇanāsādichedanam // 8803	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
karkaśatarkavicāra- vyagraḥ kiṃ vetti kāvyahṛdayāni / grāmya iva kṛṣivilagnaś cañcalanayanāvacorahasyāni // 8804	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
karkaśena tu cāpena yaḥ kṛṣṭau hīnamuṣṭinā / matsyapucchā gatis tasya sāyakasya prakīrtitā // 8805	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karkoṭikārkayormūlaṃ cūrṇayitvā ca sarṣapān / sarpiṣā pāyayen mantrī sthāvarakṣveḍaśāntaye // 8806	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇaṃ cakṣurajīgaṇattava pitus tātaḥ pitā te punaḥ śaktyādhārakumāramapyajagaṇattaṃ kātaratvena saḥ / devogānmahiṣīti paśyati jagattvevaṃ vivektuṃ punaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti vastadapi ca prajñādhanāḥ sādhavaḥ // 8807	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇaḥ sarvaśirogatastribhuvane karṇena kiṃ na śrūtaṃ viśrāmyanti mṛgīdṛśāmapi dṛśaḥ karṇe na citraṃ kvacit / āścaryaṃ punaretadeva yadayaṃ niśchidrasanmaṇḍalaḥ saptāmbhonidhimekhalāṃ vasumatīṃ dhatte jaganmaṇḍalaḥ // 8808	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karṇakalpitarasālamañjarī- piñjarīkṛtakapolamaṇḍalaḥ / niṣpatannayanavāridhārayā rādhayā madhuripurnirīkṣyate // 8809	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
karṇagateyamamoghā dṛṣṭis tava śaktirindradattā ca / sā nāsāditavijayā kvacidapi nāpārthapatiteyam // 8810.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karṇadvayāvanatakāñcanatālapatrā veṇyantalambimaṇimauktikahemagucchā / kūrpāsakotkavacitastanabāhumūlā lāṭī nitambaparivṛttadaśāntanīvī // 8810.2	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karṇalaṅghiguṇotkarṣā vadānyā dhanvino yathā / niṣphalān na vimuñcanti mārgaṇān samitau sthitā // 8811	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇaviṣeṇa ca bhagnaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na karoti bāliśo lokaḥ / kṣapaṇakatāmapi dhatte pibati surāṃ narakapālena // 8812	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karṇas tvacaṃ śibirmāṃsaṃ jīvaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ / dadau dadhīcirasthīni nāstyadeyaṃ mahātmanām // 8813.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇasphuratkanakakuṇḍalakāntiramyam ādṛṣṭigocarakucadvayalobhanīyam / kāleyabindukalikāyitakuṅkumāṅkaṃ karṇāṭayauvatamidaṃ kamanīyarūpam // 8813.2	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karṇasya bhūṣaṇamidaṃ mamāyativirodhinaḥ / iti karṇotpalaṃ prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate // 8814	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇākṣidantacchadabāhupāṇi- pādādinaḥ svākhilatulyajetuḥ / udvegabhāgadvayatābhimānād ihaiva vedhā vyadhita dvitīyam // 8815	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karṇāgranthitakiṃtanurnataśirā bibhrajjarājarjara- sphiksaṃdhipraviveśitapravicalallāṅgūlanālaḥ kṣaṇam / ārād vīkṣya vipakṣamākramakṛtakrodhasphuratkandharaṃ śvā mallīkalikāvikāśidaśanaḥ kiṃcit kvaṇan gacchati // 8816	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇāgre pīḍite yeṣāṃ sindūrābhasya darśanam / śoṇitasya bhavet kṣipraṃ te vāhyāścirajīvinaḥ // 8817	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇāṭaṃ dehi karṇādhikavidhivihitatyāga lāṭaṃ lalāṭa- prottuṅga drāviḍaṃ vā pracalabhujabalaprauḍhimāgāḍharāḍham / prasphūrjadgurjaraṃ vā dalitaripuvadhūgarbha vaidarbhakaṃ vā gājī rājīvadṛṣṭe kuśaśatamathavā śāhajallāludīna // 8818	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
karṇāṭīdaśanāṅkitaḥ śitamahārāṣṭrīkaṭākṣāhatataḥ prauḍhāndhrīstanapīḍitaḥ praṇayinībhrūbhaṅgavitrāsitaḥ / lāṭībāhuviveṣṭitaśca malayastrītarjanītarjitaḥ so'yaṃ saṃprati rājaśekharakavirvārāṇasīṃ vāñchati // 8819	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karṇābhyarṇavidīrṇasṛkkavikaṭavyādānadīptāgnibhir daṃṣṭrākoṭiviśaṅkaṭairita ito dhāvadbhirākīryate / vidyutpuñjanikāśakeśanayanabhrūśmaśrujālairna bho lakṣyālakṣyaviśuṣkadīrghavapuṣāmulkāmu khānāṃ mukhaiḥ // 8820	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇābhyarṇāriśṛṅgakṣatirudhirarasāsvādanābaddhagardha- dhvāṅkṣacchāyāttabhītipratihatadhavalīvargasaṃ vardhanecchaḥ / śīlavyākruddhagopīlaguḍahatinamatpṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ kathaṃcit prātaḥ kedāranīraṃ kalamadalabhiyā kūṇitākṣo mahokṣaḥ // 8821	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
karṇāmṛtaṃ sūkrisaṃ vimucya doṣe prayatnaḥ sumahān khalānām / nirīkṣate kelivanaṃ praviśya kramelakaḥ kaṇṭakajālameva // 8822	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karṇāruntudamantareṇa raṇitaṃ gāhasva kāka svayam mākandaṃ makarandasundaramidaṃ tvāṃ kokilaṃ manmahe / bhavyāni sthalasauṣṭhavena katicid vastūni kastūrikāṃ nepālakṣitipālabhālatilake paṅkaṃ na śaṅketa kaḥ // 8823	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇāruntudameva kokilarutaṃ tasyāḥ śrute bhāṣite candre lokarucis tadānanaruceḥ prāgeva saṃdarśanāt / cakṣurmīlanameva tannayanayoragre mṛgīṇāṃ varaṃ haimo vallyapi tāvadeva lalitā yāvanna sā lakṣyate // 8824	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇārpito lodhrakaṣāyarūkṣe gorocanākṣepanitāntagaure / tasyāḥ kapole parabhāgalābhād babandha cakṣūṃṣi yavaprarohaḥ // 8825.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karṇālaṅkaraṇaṃ kadā kṛtamiti sparśaḥ kapole kṛtaḥ kīdṛk kāntamaho nu kañcukamiti nyastaḥ karo vakṣasi / rāgaḥ sāhajikaḥ kimeṣa vadane'pyasparśi bimbādharo mogdhyenaiva mṛgīdṛśi vyavasitaṃ nirvighnamāsīnmama // 8825.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇāhativyatikaraṃ kariṇāmupekṣya dānaṃ vyavasyati madhruvrata eṣa tiktam / smartavyatāmupagateṣu saroruheṣu dhig jīvitavyasanamasya malīmasasya // 8826	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karṇikādiṣviva svarṇam arṇavādiṣvivodakam / bhediṣvabhedi yat tasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ // 8827	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇikāralatāḥ phullakusumākulaṣaṭpadāḥ / sakajjalaśikhā rejur dīpamālā ivojjvalāḥ // 8828	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇikārasasauvīraguptāṃ trikaṭumādhavīm / yaṣṭīdhānyaguḍakṣīraṃ daṣṭo mattaśunā pibet // 8829	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇinālīkanārācā nirharanti śarīrataḥ / vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ // 8830	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇe kāntāgamanavacanaśrāviṇi svarṇabhūṣāṃ tasyādarśinyakṛta nayane śyāmikāmañjanena / sthāpyaḥ kutra priya iti parāmṛśya hārāvṛtāṅke hṛtparyaṅke pulakapaṭalītūlikāmāstṛṇoti // 8831	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karṇeṃ cāmaracārukambukalikā kaṇṭhe maṇīnāṃ gaṇaḥ sindūraprakaraḥ śiraḥparisare pārśvāntike kiṅkiṇī / labdhaścen nṛpavāhanena kariṇā baddhena bhūṣāvidhis tat kiṃ bhūdharadhūlidhūsaratanurmānyo na vanyaḥ karī // 8832	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇejapaḥ kuṭilamūrtirasavyapāṇir agresaras taditaras tava baddhamuṣṭiḥ / tanmārgaṇās tadapi lakṣamamī labhante dhānuṣka tat kimapi kauśalamadbhutaṃ te // 8833	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karṇejapā api sadā kuṭilasvabhāvā duṣṭāśayā nirabhisaṃdhitavairibhūtāḥ / sohārdahṛṣṭahṛdayā mayi santu yeṣāṃ jihvāpaṭurvinimayeṣu guṇā guṇānām // 8834	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karṇejapānāṃ vacanaprapañcān- mahātmanaḥ kvāpi na dūṣayanti / bhujaṅgamānāṃ garalaprasaṅgān- nāpeyatāṃ yānti mahāsarāṃsi // 8835	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karṇe tat kathayanti dundubhiravai rāṣṭre yadudghoṣitaṃ tannamrāṅgatayā vadanti karuṇaṃ yasmāt trapāvān bhavet / ślāghante tadudīryate yadariṇāpyugraṃ na marmāntakṛd ye kecin nanu śāṭhyamaugdhyanidhayas te bhūbhṛtāṃ rañjakāḥ // 8836	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇe tāṭaṅkalakṣmīmurasi makarikāpatramūrau dukūlaṃ savye'rdhe dakṣiṇe ca dvirasanabhasitavyālakṛttīrdadhānaḥ / kaṇṭhe niḥsīmaśīrṣasrajamatha vidadhadvīkṣitaḥ śailaputryā sabhrūvikṣepamantaḥsmitalalitamukho bhūtabhartāvatād vaḥ // 8837	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
karṇe tāladalaṃ tanau malayajaṃ karpūravāsoṃ'śuke cūle gumphitaketakīdalabharaḥ kaṇṭhe navaikāvalī / vāsaḥ śrīvanavāsasīmani vacaśrīḥ satkaveruktayo vaktre nāgarakhaṇḍamastu purataḥ premākulāḥ kuntalāḥ // 8838	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇena ghātayitvā ghaṭotkacaṃ śakraśaktinirmokṣāt / jīvitamarakṣi pārthaiḥ svātmānaṃ sarvato rakṣet // 8839	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karṇena nirjito'smīti cintāṃ cintāmaṇe tyaja / jitā devadrumāḥ pañca na duḥkhaṃ pañcabhiḥ saha // 8840	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇe baddhā ravau śvetaturaṃgaripumūlikā / sarvajvaraharā śvetamandārasya ca mūlikā // 8841	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇe yanna kṛtaṃ sakhījanavaco yannādṛtā bandhuvāk yat pāde nipatannapi priyatamaḥ karṇotpalenāhataḥ / tenendurdahanāyate malayajālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate rātriḥ kalpaśatāyate bisalatāhāro'pi bhārāyate // 8842	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇe'vataṃsayitumarpayituṃ śikhāsu māṣṭuṃ ratiśramajalaṃ caṣake nidhātum / kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ racayituṃ valayān rvidhātuṃ strīṇāṃ mano'tilulubhe śaśinaḥ kareṣu // 8843	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karṇottaṃsaḥ śiśuśukavadhūpicchalīlaṃ śirīṣaṃ sāntaḥsūtrāḥ parimalamuco mallikānāṃ ca hārāḥ / muktāgaurairvalayaracanākandalāgrairbisānāṃ grīṣmārambhe ramayati navaṃ maṇḍanaṃ kāminīnām // 8844	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karṇottālitakuntalāntanipatattoyakṣaṇāsaṅginā hāreṇeva vṛtastanī pulakitā śītena sītkāriṇī / nirdhautāñjanaśoṇakoṇanayanā snānāvasāne'ṅganā prasyandatkabarībharā na kurute kasya spṛhārdraṃ manaḥ // 8845.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇotpalaṃ kaṭākṣāḥ kāntiste kanakakañcukaviśeṣaḥ / hasitāni sindhukanye hārāsstanaśailanirjhaṃravihārāḥ // 8845.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karṇotpalānnayanamapi gaticyutātte tanmīlane mukhamayaṃ na jahāti bhṛṅgaḥ / yenaivamadya vinivārayasi pramatte tasmin kare'pi na kimambujasāmyadoṣaḥ // 8846	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
karṇotpalenāpi mukhaṃ sanāthaṃ labheta netradyutinirjitena / yadyetadīyena tataḥ kṛtārthā svacakṣuṣī kiṃ kurute kuraṅgī // 8847	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karṇotsaṅgavisarpiṇī nayanayoḥ kāntirvataṃsotpalaṃ lākṣāsaṃbhramanirvyapekṣamadharaṃ lāvaṇyamevāñcati / hāro'syāḥ smitacandrikaiva kucayoraṅgaprabhā kañcukī tanvyāḥ kevalamaṅgabhāramadhunā manye paraṃ bhūṣaṇam // 8848	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karṇau tāvat kuvalayadṛśāṃ locanāmbhoruhābhyām abhyākrāntau kanakaruciro bhāladeśo'pi neyaḥ / ityāśaṅkākulitamanasā vedhasā kajjalaughaiḥ sīmārekhā vyaraci nibiḍabhrūlatākaitavena // 8849	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karṇau sapatnyaḥ praviśālayeyur viśālayeyurna kadāpi netre / vidyā sadabhyāsavaśena labhyā saujanyamabhyāsavaśādalabhyam // 8850.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kartavyaṃ jinavandanaṃ vidhiparairharṣollasanmānasaiḥ saccāritravibhūṣitāḥ pratidinaṃ sevyāḥ sadā sādhavaḥ / śrotavyaṃ ca dine dine jinavaco mithyātvanirnāśanaṃ dānādau vratapālane ca satataṃ kāryā ratiḥ śrāvakaiḥ // 8850.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kartavyaṃ tveva karmeti manoreṣa viniścayaḥ / ekāntena hyanīho'yaṃ parābhavati pūruṣaḥ // 8851	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyaṃ na karoti bandhubhirapi snehātmabhirbodhitaḥ kāmitvādavamanyate hitamataṃ dhīro'pyabhīṣṭaṃ naraḥ / niṣkāmasya na vikriyā tanubhṛto loke kvacid dṛśyate yattasmādidameva mūlamakhilānarthasya nirdhāritam // 8852	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kartavyaṃ bhūmipālena śaraṇāgatarakṣaṇam / kapotarakṣaṇaṃ śyenāt kṛtvā kīrtiṃ śibirgataḥ // 8853	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ sarvaiḥ samūhahitavādinām // 8854	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
kartavyaḥ pratidivasaṃ prasannacittaiḥ svalpo'pi vrataniyamopavāsadharmaḥ / prāṇeṣu praharati nityameva mṛtyur bhūtānāṃ mahati kṛte'pi hi prayatne // 8855	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
kartavyaḥ saṃcayo nityaṃ na tu kāryo'tisaṃcayaḥ / atisaṃcayaśīlo'yaṃ dhanuṣā jambuko hataḥ // 8856	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyameva kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi / akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // 8857	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyā cārthasāre'pi kāvye śabdavicitratā / vinā ghaṇṭāṭaṇatkāraṃ gajo gacchanna śobhate // 8858	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāni ca / paśya kūrmapatirbaddho mūṣikeṇa vimocitaḥ // 8859	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyānyeva mitrāṇi sabalānyabalāni ca / hastiyūthaṃ vane baddhaṃ mūṣakairyad vimocitam // 8860	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavye sāhasaṃ nityam utkaṭaṃ hi vigarhitam / atisāhasadoṣeṇa bhīmaḥ sarpavaśaṃ gataḥ // 8861.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyo guṇasaṃgrahaḥ parihate deyaṃ nijaṃ mānasaṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanāmṛtaṃ jinavacaḥ kāryaṃ yathāsthānavat / dātavyaṃ yatipuṅgaveṣu nijakaṃ nyāyaprakalpyaṃ dhanaṃ śraddheyaṃ satataṃ satāṃ sucaritaśreyaskaro'yaṃ vidhiḥ // 8861.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kartavyo'pyāśrayaḥ śreyān phalaṃ bhāgyānusārataḥ / nīlakaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe'pi vāsukirvāyubhakṣakaḥ // 8862	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyo bhrātṛṣu sneho vismartavyā guṇetarāḥ / saṃbandho bandhubhiḥ śreyān lokayorubhayorapi // 8863	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartavyo hṛdi vartate yadi tarorasyopakāras tadā mā kālaṃ gamayāmbuvāha samaye siñcainamambhobharaiḥ / śīrṇe puṣpaphale dale vigalite mūle gate śuṣkatāṃ kasmai kiṃ hitamācariṣyasi parītāpas tu te sthāsyati // 8864	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kartā kārayitā caiva preṣako hyanumodakaḥ / sakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caiva catvāraḥ samabhāginaḥ // 8865	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartā kārayitā caiva yaścaivamanumanyate / śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ teṣāmapi samaṃ phalam / 8866	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so'timānī kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanamarut pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ / rājā duḥśāsanādergururanujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitraṃ kvāste duryodhano'sau kathayata na ruṣā druṣṭumabhyāgatau svaḥ // 8867	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kartuṃ trilocanādanyo na pārthavijayaṃ kṣamaḥ / tadarthaḥ śakyate draṣṭuṃ locanadvayibhiḥ katham // 8868	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kartumakartuṃ śaktaḥ sakalaṃ jagadetadanyathākartum / yastaṃ vihāya rāmaṃ kāmaṃ mā dhehi mānasānyasmin // 8869	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kartumiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ vā kaḥ prabhurvidhinā vinā / kartāramanyamāropya lokas tuṣyati kupyati // 8870	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kardamavadātmavaibhavam ullāsya ca mānavīṃ prajāṃ suciram / tapanottāpapluṣṭaṃ svavapuḥ kṛtvā gataṃ sarasā // 8871	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karpāsabījamajjānāṃ cūrṇaṃ tailena pācayet / tena saṃjāyate puṣpaṃ yuvatīnāṃ cirād gatam // 8872.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpāsabhasmatakrāsthivarjaṃ sarvaṃ sitaṃ śubham / govājigajadevarṣivarjaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tu ninditam // 8872.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpāsāsthipracayanicitā nirdhanaśrotriyāṇāṃ yeṣāṃ vātyāpravitatakuṭīprāṅgaṇāntā babhūvuḥ / tatsaudhānāṃ parisarabhuvi tvatprasādādidānīṃ krīḍāyuddhacchidurayuvatīhāramuktāḥ patanti // 8873	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karpūraṃ candanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ tulasī sarjasaṃbhavam / mustaṃ śilārasaṃ caiva dhattūramagurus tathā // 8874	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śephālī śatapuṣpā ca sarṣapāstagaraṃ guḍaḥ / tathā rudrajaṭā sarvam etadekatra kārayet // 8875	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpūra iva dagdhopi śaktimān yo jane jane / namo'stvavāryavīryāya tasmai makaraketave // 8876	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpūragauraṃ karuṇāvatāraṃ saṃsārasāraṃ bhujagendrahāram / sadā vasantaṃ hṛdayāravinde bhavaṃ bhavānīsahitaṃ namāmi // 8877	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūracandanarajo dhavalaṃ vahantīm āśyānacandanavilepanamaṅgamaṅgam / antargatasya dahatī mahataḥ smarāgner dagdhasya saṃkṣayavaśādiva bhasmaśeṣam // 8878	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karpūradravaśīkarotkaramahānīhāramagnāmiva pratyagrāmṛtaphenapaṅkapaṭalīlepopadigdhāmiva / svacchaikasphaṭikāśmaveśmajaṭharakṣiptāmiva kṣmāmimāṃ kurvan pārvaṇaśarvarīpatirasāvuddāmamuddyotate // 8879	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūradhūlidhavaladyutipūradhauta- diṅmaṇḍale śiśirarociṣi tasya yūnaḥ / līlāśiroṃ'śukaniveśaviśeṣakḷpti- vyaktastanonnatirabhūnnayanāvanau sā // 8880.1	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karpūradhūlīracitālavālaḥ kastūrikākalpitadohadaśrīḥ / himāmbupūrairabhiṣicyamānaḥ prāñcaṃ guṇaṃ muñcati kiṃ palāṇḍuḥ // 8880.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūradhūlīracitālavālaḥ kastūrikākuṅkumaliptadehaḥ / suvarṇakumbhaiḥ pariṣicyamāno nijaṃ guṇaṃ muñcati kiṃ palāṇḍuḥ // 8881	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūrantaki ketakantaki śaradrākāśaśāṅkantaki śrīcandrantaki candanantaki sudhāsārācchapūrantaki / kailāsantaki dugdhasāgaralasatsvacchācchadundhantaki śrīśambhuntaki kīrtayas tava vibho darvīkarendrantaki // 8882	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūranti sudhādravanti kamalāhāsanti haṃsanti ca prāleyanti himālayanti karakāsāranti hāranti ca / trailokyāṅganaraṅgalaṅghimagatiprāgalbhyasaṃbhāvit āḥ śītāṃśoḥ kiraṇacchaṭā iva jayantyetarhi tatkīrtayaḥ // 8883	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrapūracchavivādavidyā- saṃvāvadūkadyutiśuktitāmre / indau nṛpadveṣi tamovitānaṃ sūryodaye roditi cakravākī // 8884	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūrapūratulanāṃ kalayanti kīrteḥ śrīrāmacandra tava yat kavayaḥ kathaṃ tat / tvadvairiṇāmatitarāmapakīrtito'syāḥ syād dhūsaratvamiti tatra vayaṃ pratīmaḥ // 8885	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karpūrapratipanthino himagirigrāvāgrasaṃgharṣiṇaḥ kṣīrāmbhonidhimadhyagarbhajayino gaṅgaughasarvaṃkaṣāḥ / svacchandaṃ haricandanadyutitudaḥ kundendusaṃvādinas tasyāsannaravindakandarucayo'neke guṇāḥ kecana // 8886	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrabhallātakaśaṅkhacūrṇaṃ kṣāro yavānāṃ samanaḥśilaśca / tailaṃ vipakvaṃ haritālamiśraṃ nirmūlalomāni karoti sadyaḥ // 8887	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūramiśrasehuṇḍadugdhalepena jāyate / śephaso mahatī vṛddhiḥ kaṭhinastrīsukhāvahā // 8888	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpūramiśreṇa ca kaṇṭakārī- bījodbhavenaiva rasena liptam / liṅgaṃ rate drāvakaraṃ vadhūnāṃ saṃjāyate'tyantasukhāvahaṃ ca // 8889	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karpūra re parimalas tava marditasya śrīkhaṇḍa re parimalas tava gharṣitasya / re kākatuṇḍa tava vahnigatasya gandhaḥ kastūrikā svayamathādhitagandhadṛṣṭā // 8890	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karpūravartiriva locanatāpahantrī phullāmbujasragiva kaṇṭhasukhaikahetuḥ / cetaścamatkṛtipadaṃ kaviteva ramyā namyā narībhiramarīva hi sā vireje // 8891	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karpūrādapi kairavādapi dalatkundādapi svarṇadī- kallolādapi ketakādapi lalatkāntādṛgantādapi / dūronmuktakalaṅkaśaṃkaraśiraḥśītāṃśukhaṇḍādapi śvetābhis tava kīrtibhirdhavalitā saptārṇavā medinī // 8892	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrāmbuniṣekabhāji sarasairambhojinīnāṃ dalair āstīrṇe'pi vivartamānavapuṣoḥ srastasraji srastare / mandonmeṣadṛśeḥ kimanyadabhavatsā kāpyavasthā tayor yasyāṃ candanacandracampakadalaśreṇyādi vahnīyate // 8893	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrāyitasaikatāya śiśirakṣodāyamānātapa- vyūhāya vyajanānilāyitamahājhañjhāmarudraṃhase / asmai tanvi nidāghavāsaravayomadhyābhisārakramo- tsāhātyutsavasāhasāya mahate sauhārdamīhāmahe // 8894	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrīyanti bhūmau sarasi sarabhasaṃ kairavīyanti gaṅgā- kallolīyanti nāke diśi diśi paritaḥ ketakīyanti kiṃ ca / haṃsīyantyantarikṣe kamaladaladṛśāṃ mauktikīyanti kaṇṭhe śuktīyanyamburāśau viśadavisaruco raśmayaḥ śītaraśmeḥ // 8895	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
karpūreṇa sthalaviracanā kuṅkumenālavālaṃ mādhvīkāni pratidinapayaḥ pañcabāṇaḥ kṛṣāṇaḥ / tatrotpannā yadi kila bhavet kāñcanī kāpi vallī sā cedasyāḥ kimapi labhate subhruvaḥ saukumāryam // 8896	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karpūraiḥ kimapūri kiṃ malayajairālepi kiṃ pāradair akṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kimaghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyorvapuḥ / etat tarkaya kairavaklamahare śṛṅgāradīkṣāgurau dikkāntāmukure cakorasuhṛdi prauḍhe tuṣāratviṣi // 8897	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karpūrairiva pāradairiva sudhāsyandairivāplāvite jāte hanta divāpi deva kakubhāṃ garbhe bhavatkīrtibhiḥ / dhṛtvāṅge kavacaṃ nibadhya śaradhiṃ kṛtvā puro mādhavaṃ kāmaḥ kairavabāndhavodayadhiyā dhunvan dhanurdhāvati // 8898	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karma khalviha kartavyaṃ jātenāmitrakarśana / akarmāṇo hi jīvanti sthāvarā netare janāḥ // 8899	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karma cātmahitaṃ kāryaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vā yadi vā mṛdu / grasyate'karmaśīlas tu sadānarthairakiṃcanaḥ // 8900	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojakam / śreyaḥpāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām // 8901	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmajanyaśarīreṣu romāḥ śārīramānasāḥ / śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // 8902	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmajāḥ prabhavantyeva yathākālamupadravāḥ / etattu kaṣṭaṃ yacchatruḥ kartāhamiti manyate // 8903.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
karma jīvaṃ ca saṃśliṣṭaṃ parijñātātmaniścayaḥ / vibhinnīkurute sādhuḥ sāmāyikaśalākayā // 8903.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmajñānaṃ ca mokṣāya karmaṇyartho'dhikāritā / ato'rthenaiva kaivalyaṃ na kaivalyena labhyate // 8904	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇaḥ phalanirvṛttiṃ svayamaśnāti kārakaḥ / pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate loke kṛtasyāpyakṛtasya ca // 8905	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇaḥ saṃcayāt svarganarakau mokṣabandhane / karmaṇo jñāyate jantur bījādiva navāṅkuraḥ // 8906	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam / rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam // 8907	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca / pramādamohau tamaso bhavato'jñānameva ca // 8908	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
karmaṇāṃ tu praśastānām anuṣṭhānaṃ sukhāvaham / teṣāmevānanuṣṭhānaṃ paścāt tāpakaraṃ mahat // 8909	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ sadbhirācaritaṃ ca yat / tadevāsthāya modante dāntāḥ śamaparāyaṇāḥ // 8910	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva vilīyate / sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate // 8911	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti cedīśvaraḥ kaścit phalarūpyanyakarmaṇām / kartāraṃ bhajate so'pi na hyakartuḥ prabhurhi saḥ // 8912	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā takṣakāreṇa manuṣyo yattu putrikā / vāsanārajjumākṛṣya savaṃkarmasu coditaḥ // 8913.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā tu pramucyate / tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ // 8913.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā bādhyate buddhir buddhyā karma na bādhyate / subuddhirapi yad rāmo haimaṃ hariṇamanvagāt // 8914	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā manasā vācā yatnāddharmaṃ samācaret / asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācaren na tu // 8915	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā manasā vācā yadabhīkṣṇaṃ niṣevate / tadevāpaharatyenaṃ tasmāt kalyāṇamācaret // 8916.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā / akleśajananaṃ proktaṃ tvahiṃsā paramarṣibhiḥ // 8916.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇāmiṣṭaduṣṭānāṃ jāyate phalasaṃkṣayaḥ / cetaso'rthakaṣāyatvād yatra sā ghvastirucyate // 8917.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā mohanīyena mohitaṃ sakalaṃ jagat / dhanyā mohaṃ samutsārya tapasyanti mahādhiyaḥ // 8917.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā / uddhared dīnamātmānaṃ samartho dharmamācaret // 8918	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā rahitaṃ jñānaṃ paṅgunā sadṛśaṃ bhavet / na tena prāpyate kiṃcit na ca kiṃcit prasādhyate // 8919	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ jñānena hīnaṃ yat karmāndhena samaṃ smṛtam / mārgo vā mārgalakṣyaṃ vā naiva tasya pratīyate // 8920	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇā manasā vācā kartavyaṃ karma kurvataḥ / tasmādeveṣṭasaṃsiddhiś caturasrā prajāyate // 8921	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ / lokasaṃgrahamevāpi saṃpaśyan kartumarhasi // 8922	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇo'pi pradhānatvaṃ kiṃ kurvanti śubhā grahāḥ / vasiṣṭhadattalagne'pi jānakī duḥkhabhāginī // 8923	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇo yasya yaḥ kālaḥ tatkālavyāpinī tithiḥ / tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhiṃ na kārayet // 8924	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇo hi pradhānena buddhinā kiṃ prayojanam / pāṣāṇasya kuto buddhis tato devo bhaviṣyati // 8925	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇo hyapi boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ / akarmaṇaśca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ // 8926	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇyakarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ / sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt // 8927	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇyakarmavidhireṣa yadācaranti karmāṇi tattadanubandhajihāsayeti / satyaṃ tathāpyabhinavo bhavitā na bandhaḥ prācīnabandhaharaṇe ka ivābhyupāyaḥ // 8928	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karmaṇyakovidāḥ stabdhā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ / vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhā yayā mādhvyā girotsukāḥ // 8929	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaṇyevādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana / mā karmaphalaheturbhūr mā te saṅgo'stvakarmaṇi // 8930	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karma tyajema yadi nūnamadhaḥ patema yadyācarema na kadāpi bhavaṃ tarema / karma tyajediti carediti ca pravṛttā bhāvena kena nigamā iti na pratīmaḥ // 8931	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karmadāyādaval lokaḥ karmasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaḥ / karmāṇi codayantīha yathānyonyaṃ tathā vayam // 8932	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmabrahmavicāraṇāṃ vijahato bhogāpavargapradāṃ ghoṣaṃ kaṃcana kaṇṭhaśoṣaphalakaṃ kurvantyamī tārkikāḥ / pratyakṣaṃ na punāti nāpaharate pāpāni pīlucchaṭā vyaptirnāvati naiva pātyanumitirno pakṣatā rakṣati // 8933	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
karmabhiḥ svairavāptasya janmanaḥ pitarau yathā / rājñaṃ tathānye rājyasya pravṛttāveva kāraṇam // 8934	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
karmabhūmimimāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yacchubham / agnirvāyuśca somaśca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // 8935	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmabhūmiriyaṃ brahman phalabhūmirasau matā / iha yat kriyate karma tat paratropabhujyate // 8936	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karma lokaviruddhaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ kṣaṇadācara / tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭamivāgatam // 8937	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karma sarvottamaṃ kiṃ me karaṇīyaṃ bhavediti / mānavaḥ prabhaved vettuṃ labdhvā sthairyaṃ śamaṃ tathā // 8938	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmāṇi janmāntarasaṃcitāni mahānti vijñānamahāhutāśe / sarvāṇi dagdhāni bhavanti sadyo mahānalasyāsti kimārdrabhāvaḥ // 8939	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karmāṇi badhnanti śubhāśubhāni kartātramaupādhikameva jīvam / paraṃ na tatsākṣiṇamastadoṣam ābhīramadyāt kimaje śayāne // 8940	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karmāṇi yāni loke duḥkhanimittāni lajjanīyāni / sarvāṇi tāni kurute jaṭharanarendrasya vaśamito jantuḥ // 8941.1	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
karmāṇi sarvāṇi ca mohanīye duḥkhāni sarvāṇi daridratāyām / pāpāni sarvāṇi ca cauryabhāve doṣā aśeṣā anṛte bhavanti // 8941.2	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karmāṇyārabhamāṇānāṃ duḥkhahatyai sukhāya ca / paśyet pākaviparyāsaṃ mithunīcāriṇāṃ nṛṇām // 8942	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmāniṣṭaṃ vidhatte bhavati paravaśo lajjate no janānāṃ dharmādharmau na vetti tyajati gurukulaṃ sevate nīcalokam / bhūtvā prājñaḥ kulīnaḥ prathitapṛthuguṇo mānanīyo budho'pi grasto yenātra dehī nuda madanaripuṃ jīva taṃ buḥkhadakṣam // 8943.1	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
karmānubhāvaduḥkhita evaṃ mohāndhakāragahanavati / andha iva durgamārge bhramati hi saṃsārakāntāre // 8943.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karmānumeyāḥ sarvatra parokṣaguṇavṛttayaḥ / tasmāt parokṣavṛttīnāṃ phalaiḥ karma vibhāvayet // 8944	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmānyajanmani kṛtaṃ sadasacca daivaṃ tat kevalaṃ bhavati janmani satkulādye / bālyāt paraṃ vinayasauṣṭhavapātratāpi puṃdaivajā kṛṣivadityata udyameta // 8945	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
karmāparādhāt sattvānāṃ vināśe samupasthite / anayo nayarūpeṇa buddhimākramya tiṣṭhati // 8946	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmāyattaṃ phalaṃ puṃsāṃ buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī / tathāpi sudhiyā bhāvyaṃ suvicāryaiva kurvatā // 8947	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmāraṇyaṃ dahati śikhivanmātṛvatpāti duḥkhāt samyagrītiṃ vadati guruvat svāmivad yad bibharti / tattvātattvaprakaṭanapaṭuḥ spaṣṭamāpnoti pūtaṃ tat saṃjñānaṃ vigalitamalaṃ jñānadānena martyaḥ // 8948	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran / indriyārthān rvimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate // 8949	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate'rjuna / karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate // 8950.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
karmendhanaṃ yadajñānāt saṃcitaṃ janmakānane / upavāsaśikhī sarvaṃ tadbhasmīkurute kṣaṇāt // 8950.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmendhanaṃ samāśritya dṛḍhā sadbhāvanāhutiḥ / dharmadhyānāgninā kāryā dīkṣitenāgnikārikā // 8950.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karmaiva kāraṇaṃ cātra sugatiṃ durgatiṃ prati / karmaiva prāktanamapi kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ ko'sti cākriyaḥ // 8951	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karmoktinarmanirmāṇaiḥ prātaḥ prātaḥ pradhāvatām / dhanaṃ dhanaṃ pralapatāṃ nidhanaṃ vismṛtaṃ nṛṇām // 8952.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karmodayād bhavagatir bhavagatimūlā śarīranirvṛttiḥ / dehādindriyaviṣayā viṣayanimitte ca sukhaduḥkhe // 8952.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kāryasya niḥsaṃśayamātmahetoḥ sarūpatāṃ hetubhirabhyupetya / duḥkhasya kāryaṃ sukhamāmanantaḥ svenaiva vākyena hatā varākāḥ // 8953	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
karṣaṇānveṣaṇe yātuḥ kṣutaṃ jaladavṛṣṭaye / hemādibhūṣaṇe navye vidhṛte bhūṣaṇāptaye // 8954	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṣati vapati lunīte dīvyati sīvyati punāti vayate ca / vidadhāti kiṃ na kṛtyaṃ jaṭharānalaśāntaye tanumān // 8955	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
karṣadbhiḥ sicayāñcalānatirasāt kurvadbhirāliṅganaṃ gṛhṇānaiḥ kacamālikhadbhiradharaṃ vidrāvayadbhiḥ kucau / pratyakṣe'pi kaliṅgamaṇḍalapaterantaḥpurāṇāmaho dhikkaṣṭaṃ viṭapairviṭairiva vane kiṃ nāma nāceṣṭitam // 8956	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalaṃ kamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikā stanadvayī ca tvadṛte na hantyataḥ / na yāti bhūtaṃ gaṇane bhavanmukhe kalaṅkamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikā // 8957	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kalakaṇṭha gaṇāsvādye kāmasyāstre nijāṅkure / nimbavṛttibhirudgadīrṇe na cūtaḥ paritapyate // 8958	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kalakalamaparā mudhā vidhāya kṣititilakān nayanāntamāsasāda / avatarati mṛgīdṛśāṃ tṛtīyaṃ manasijacakṣurupāyadarśaneṣu // 8959	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kalakokilanādavivādabalad- bhramarāvalilolarasāladruma- / kramamālatikādikadambalasat- kusumāgamamodamanojaśaraiḥ // 8960	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
paripīḍitayā vidhusāndrakalā- kamalākaracampakasaṃgadadhat- / pavanairanucintitayā priya sā sakhi samprati kiṃ kriyate'balayā // 8961	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kalakvaṇitagarbheṇa kaṇṭhenāghūrṇitekṣaṇaḥ / pārāvataḥ paribhramya riraṃsuścumbati priyām // 8962	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalakvāṇe vīṇe virama raṇitāt kokila sakhe sakhedo mābhūstvaṃ druhiṇavihitaste paribhavaḥ / sudhe muñca spardhāmadharamadhusaṃsargasarasāḥ sphuṭantyetā vācaḥ kimapi kamanīyā mṛgadṛśaḥ // 8963	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalaṅkadāśo gaganāmburāśau prasārya candrātapatantujālam / lagnoḍumīnāṃllaghu saṃjighṛkṣuś candraplavasthaścaramāvdhimeti // 8964	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalaṅkayanti sanmārgajuṣaḥ paribhavantyalam / vātyā ivāticapalāḥ striyo bhūrirajovṛtāḥ // 8965	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat tāsu na prasaktavyaṃ dhīrasattvaiḥ subuddhibhiḥ / śīlamabhyasanīyaṃ tu vītarāgapadāptaye // 8966	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalaṅkahīnaḥ kṣayadoṣaśūnyaḥ sadā nivṛttas tamaso bhayācca / batābhaviṣyad dvijanāyako'pi tadāpi manye na tavānanābham // 8967	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kalaṅkinaḥ priye doṣākarasya ca jaḍasya ca / na jātu śaktirindos te mukhena pratigarjitum // 8968	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalaṅkini jale kvāpi sauraṃ pratiphalan mahaḥ / tamo'pahatvaṃ tanute samṛddhiṃ ca dine dine // 8969	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kalaṅkī niḥśaṅkaṃ paritapatu śītadyutirasau bhujaṅgavyāsaṅgīvamatu garalaṃ candanarasaḥ / svayaṃ dagdho dāhaṃ vitaratu manobhūrapi bhṛśaṃ jagatprāṇa prāṇānapaharasi kiṃ te samucitam // 8970.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalaṅkena yathā candraḥ kṣāreṇa lavaṇāmbudhiḥ / kalahena tathā bhāti jñānavānāpi mānavaḥ // 8970.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalatraṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā ramate yaḥ parastriyaḥ / adharmaścāpadastasya sadyaḥ phalati nityaśaḥ // 8971	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalatracintākucitasya puṃsaḥ śrutaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca guṇāśca sarve / apakvakumbhe nihitā ivāpaḥ prayānti dehena samaṃ vināśam // 8972	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kalatranindāguruṇā kilaivam abhyāhataṃ kīrtiviparyayeṇa / ayoghanenāya ivābhitaptaṃ vaidehibandhor hṛdayaṃ vidadre // 8973	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalatraputrādinimittataḥ kdacid vinindyarūpe vihite'pi karmaṇi / idaṃ kṛtaṃ karma vininditaṃ satāṃ mayeti bhavyaścakito vinindati // 8974	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kalatrabhāreṇa vilolanīvinā galaddukūlastanaśālinorasā / valivyapāyasphuṭaromarājinā nirāyatattvādudareṇa tāmyatā // 8975	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
vilambamānākulakeśapāśayā kayācidāviṣkṛtabāhumūlayā / taruprasūnānyapadiśya sādaraṃ manodhināthasya manaḥ samādade // 8976	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kalatramātmā suhṛdo dhanāni vṛthā bhavantīha nimeṣamātrāt / muhurmuhuś cākulitāni tāni tasmān na vidvānativigrahī syāt // 8977.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalatraharaṇalkeśāt khinnānāmātmanastanau / dhartumutsukatā naṣṭeḥ sudṛśāṃ sudhiyāmiva // 8977.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalabha tavāntikamāgatam alimetaṃ mā kadāpyavajñāsīḥ / api dānasundarāṇāṃ dvipadhuryāṇāmayaṃ śirodhāryaḥ // 8978	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalamākrāntaviśvasya maṣīkṛṣṇasya bhoginaḥ / āsannabandhanasyānte divirasya dhanena kim // 8979	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalamaṃ phalabhārātigurumūrdhatayā śanaiḥ / vināmāntikodbhūtaṃ samāghrātumivotpalam // 8980.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kalamadhuraraktakaṇṭhī śayane madirālasā samadanā ca / vaktrāparavaktrābhyām upatiṣṭhatu vāramukhyā tvām // 8980.2	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kalamāḥ pākavinamrā mūlatalāghrātasurabhikalhārāḥ / pavanākampitaśirasaḥ prāyaḥ kurvanti parimalaślāghām // 8981	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalamāntanirgatamaṣī- binduvyājena sāñjanāśrukaṇā / kāyasthaluṇṭhyamānā roditi khinneva rājaśrīḥ // 8982	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kalaya kamalamasmirnnityudīrya sthitānāṃ pratiphalitamukheṣu nyastahastāravindāḥ / sphaṭikavipinamadhye māṇikapreyasīnāṃ nibhṛtahasitapātraṃ yatra yātā yuvānaḥ // 8983	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kalayati kamalopamānamakṣṇoḥ prathayati vāci sudhārasasya sāmyam / sakhi kathaya kimācarāmi kānte samajani tatra sahiṣṇutaiva doṣaḥ // 8984	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
kalayati kiṃ na sadā phalatāṃ bahuphalatāṃ ca sa vṛkṣaḥ / yasya paropakṛtau kaścin na sapakṣo'pi vipakṣaḥ // 8985	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalayati kuvalayamālā- lalitaṃ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣavikṣepaḥ / adharaḥ kisalayalīlā- mānanamasyāḥ kalānidhivilāsam // 8986	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalayati mama cetastalpamaṅgārakalpaṃ jvalayati mama gātraṃ candanaṃ candrakaśca / tirayati mama netre mohajanmāndhakāro vikṛtabahuvikāraṃ manmatho māṃ dunoti // 8987	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kalayatu haṃsavilāsagatiṃ sa bakaḥ sarasi varākaḥ / nīrakṣīravivekavidhau tasya kutaḥ paripākaḥ // 8988	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kalaya valayaṃ dhammille'sminniveśaya mallikāṃ racaya sicayaṃ muktāhāraṃ vibhūṣaya satvaram / mṛgamadamaṣīpatrālepaṃ kuruṣva kapolayoḥ sahacari samāyātaḥ prātaḥ sa te hṛdayapriyaḥ // 8989	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kalayasi vayasya kasmāt tvaṃ ruciraṃ bhāratīśāstram / atro'ktipratyuktau kalaya mitho bhūriśastrapātaraṇam // 8990	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
kalayā tuṣārakiraṇasya puraḥ parimandabhinnatimiraughajaṭam / kṣaṇamabhyapadyata janairna mṛṣā gaganaṃ gaṇādhipatimūrtiriti // 8991	pramitākṣarā [12: sjss]
kalayātra prakāśyaṃ cet kiṃcidvā divyajīvane / tasyāmapi prakāśā syād viśālā śāntirujjvalā // 8992.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalaye kisalayamadharaṃ śaṅke paṅkeruhaṃ karadvandvam / manye manasijavetraṃ gātraṃ netraikamohanaṃ tanvyāḥ // 8992.2	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalaravakaṇṭhakarambita- kalaravakalakaṇṭhakūjite surate / tava manumīlitalocana- mānanamavalokituṃ priye kalaye // 8992.3	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalaśe nijahetudaṇḍajaḥ kimu cakrabhramakāritāguṇaḥ / sa taduccakucau bhavan prabhā- jharacakrabhramamātanoti yat // 8993	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kalahaḥ kadāpi māstviti kalitaśarīraikyayoḥ śivayoḥ / ahamasmyahamasmīti prāptaḥ kalaho mama trāṇe // 8994	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kalahakalabhavindhyaḥ kopagṛdhraśmaśānaṃ vyasanabhujagarandhraṃ dveṣadasyupradoṣaḥ / sukṛtavanadavāgnirmārdavāmbhodavāyur nayanalinatuṣāro'tyarthamarthānurāgaḥ // 8995	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kalahakalayā yat saṃvṛtyai trapāvanatānanā pihitapulakodbhedaṃ subhrūścakarṣa na kañcukam / dayitamabhitastāmutkaṇṭhāṃ vivavruranantaraṃ jhaṭiti taṭiti truṭyanto'ntaḥ stanāṃśukasandhayaḥ // 8996	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kalahapriyātidīrghā kharvā vā śyāmapītaharitā vā / lamboṣṭhī laghunāsā laghuśithilastanavibhāgā ca // 8997	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kalahamātanute madirāvaśas tamiha yena nirasyati jīvitam / vṛṣamapāsyati saṃcinute malaṃ dhanamapaiti janaiḥ paribhūyate // 8998	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kalahāntaritāpralapanam ataḥ paraṃ nāyakasya śikṣā ca / saṃbhogāviṣkaraṇaṃ kulaṭā saṃkīrṇamiti ca śṛṅgāraḥ // 8999	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalahāntāni harmyāṇi kuvākyāntaṃ ca sauhṛdam / kurājāntāni rāṣṭrāṇi kukarmāntaṃ yaśo nṛṇām // 9000	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalahāyante mūḍhāḥ kaḥ pratibhūḥ śvaḥ prabhāta iti / tasyāmeva rajanyāṃ kaḥ pratibhūḥ svasya sattāyām // 9001	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kalāṃ tāmaindavīṃ vande yayā yādaṣpatiḥ pitā / āruhya haramūrdhānaṃ kṛtas trailokyamūrdhani // 9002	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatays tathā / ete tvaṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam // 9003.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kalākalāpasampannā upakartuḥ parañmukhāḥ / na bhavanti mahātmānaḥ sarasaḥ śikhino yathā // 9003.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalākāṣṭhāmuhūrtānāṃ kālasya vrajatāṃ javāt / na lakṣyate vibhāgena dīpasyevārciṣāṃ gatiḥ // 9004	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāttamāyālavakāntamūrtiḥ kalakvaṇadveṇuninādaramyaḥ / śrito hṛdi vyākulayaṃstrilokīṃ śriye'stu gopījanavallabho vaḥ // 9005	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kalādhāro vakraḥ sphuradadhararāgo navatanur galanmānāveśāstaruṇaramaṇīrnāgara iva / ghanaśroṇībimbe nayanamukule cādharadale kapole grīvāyāṃ kucakalaśayoścumbati śaśī // 9006	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalādhināthādhigamād dvitīye kimadvitīyeti tanoṣi garvam / ayi tvamasmadvacasi pratīyā ayaṃ tṛtīyāmupagantukāmaḥ // 9007	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kalādhināthānayanāya sāyaṃ kumudvatīpreṣita eva bhṛṅgaḥ / kimindunāliṅgya sarāgamaṅke kṛtaḥ kalaṅkabhramamātanoti // 9008	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kalānāṃ grahaṇādeva saubhāgyamupajāyate / deśakālau tvapekṣyāsāṃ prayogaḥ saṃbhavenna vā // 9009	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalānāthaḥ kāmaṃ bhajati bahudoṣāṅkitatanuṃ kumudvatyāstasminnapi bhavati kiṃ nāma na ruciḥ / na padminyā modaḥ kimudayatyuṣṇamahasi priye prāyo doṣān na gaṇayati cittaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ // 9010.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kalānidhikarasparśāt prasannollāsitārakā / bimraṇāmbaramānīlaṃ kāminī yāminīyate // 9010.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalānidhirayaṃ raveḥ samupalabhya rūpaṃ svayaṃ dināntasamaye'spṛśat sapadi padminīṃ rāgavān / dhavānyakarasaṃgamānmukuliteti pūrvākṛtiṃ samīkṣya jahasuḥ priyā dhruvamabhūdataḥ pāṇḍuraḥ // 9011	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
kalāpināṃ cārutayopayānti vṛndāni lāpoḍhaghanāgamānām / vṛndānilāpoḍhaghanāgamānāṃ kalāpināṃ cārutayo'payānti // 9012	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalābhirucchritā veśyā rūpaśīlaguṇānvitā / labhate gaṇikāśabdaṃ sthānaṃ ca janasaṃsadi // 9013	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāminduḥ karaṃ dātā dhārāṃ dhārādharo yadi / saṃkocayiṣyate tarhi jīviṣyati kathaṃ jagat // 9014	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāratnaṃ gītaṃ gaganatalaratnaṃ dinamaṇiḥ sabhāratnaṃ vidvān śravaṇapuṭaratnaṃ harikathā / niśāratnaṃ candraḥ śayanatalaratnaṃ śaśimukhī mahīratnaṃ śrīmāñjayati raghunātho nṛpavaraḥ // 9015	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalāvataḥ saiva kalā yayādhaḥkriyate bhavaḥ / bahvībhiśca kalābhiḥ kiṃ yābhiraṅkaḥ pradarśyate // 9016	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāvati kṣatatamasi prabhāvati sphuṭodaye jananayanābhinandini / dadurdūśaṃ śaśini ruṣābhisārikāḥ kvacid bhavatyatisubhago'pi durbhagaḥ // 9017	rucirā [13: jBsjg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kalāvati calāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kuryās tvaṃ muhurmuhuḥ / lagno'pi na tathā bāṇo bādhate cālito yathā // 9018	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāsīmā kāvyaṃ sakalaguṇasīmā vitaraṇaṃ bhaye sīmā mṛtyuḥ sakalasukhasīmā suvadanā / tapaḥsīmā muktiḥ sakalakṛtisīmāśritabhṛtiḥ priye sīmāhlādaḥ śravaṇasukhasīmā harikathā // 9019	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalā sevātha dharmārthau tṛṣṇādāridryapaddhatī / santoṣakṣāntikaruṇā vairāgyaṃ tadanu stutiḥ // 9020	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kalāstāstāḥ samyagvahasi yadasi tvaṃ dvijapatir dyutis tādṛgnūtnā janirapi ca ratnākarakule / bahu brūmaḥ kiṃ vā puraharaśiromaṇḍanamasi tvadīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śaśadhara kalaṅkād viphalitam // 9021	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalikaluṣasaṅkaṭākula- kuṭumbasaṃvalanakhedavikalasya / pratinidhiriva pravāsaḥ saṃsāravirāgasukhasamudrasya // 9022	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kalikaluṣe manasi sve kathamiva jagadārjavaṃ labhate / cakṣurdoṣe jāgrati candradvitvaṃ kuto yātu // 9023	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
kalikālamiyaṃ yāvad agastyasya munarepi / mānasaṃ khaṇḍayatyatra śaśikhaṇḍānukāriṇī // 9024	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kalitagarimā śroṇirmadhyaṃ vivṛddhavalitrayaṃ hṛdayamudayallajjaṃ majjaccirantanacāpalam / mukulitakucaṃ vakṣaścakṣurmanāgdhṛtavakrima kramaparigaladbālyaṃ tasyā vapus tanute śriyam // 9025	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kalitamambaramākalayan karair mṛditapaṅkajakośapayodharaḥ / vikasadutpalanetravilokitaḥ sakhi niśāṃ sarasīkurute vidhuḥ // 9026	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
kalito ruciraṃ na karma cet kriyate'naṅgakṛteḥ kutaḥ phalam / smarato hṛdi puṇḍarīkadṛg bhajate'sau saphalas tataḥ śramaḥ // 9027	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kalindagirinandinītaṭavanāntaraṃ bhāsayan sadā pathi gatāgataśramabharaṃ haran prāṇinām / latāvaliśatāvṛto madhurayā rucā saṃbhṛto mamāśu haratu śramānatitamāṃ tamāladrumaḥ // 9028.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
kalindajānīrabhare'rdhamagnā bakāḥ prakāmaṃ kṛtabhūriśabdāḥ / dhvāntena vairād vinigīryaṃmāṇāḥ krośanti manye śaśinaḥ kiśorāḥ // 9028.2	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ttygg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalibhūpe samāyāte dharmo'dharmāyate bhuvi / adharmaḥ sarvaṃtaḥ puṃsāṃ hanta dharmavadarthyate // 9029	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kalimāyāntamutprekṣya vilīyante surā api / tadāśritasya dharmādeḥ kā kathā jīvane punaḥ // 9030	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalilaṃ caikarātreṇa pañcarātreṇa budbudam / pakṣaikenāṇḍakaḥ so'tha māsapūrṇe śiro kuru // 9031	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalisāmrājyamāsādya na bhetavyaṃ bhavāntarāt / dharmānuṣṭhānamūḍhāvāṃ bhītirekāvaśiṣyate // 9032	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaluṣaṃ kaṭukaṃ lavaṇaṃ virasaṃ salilaṃ yadi vāśubhagandhi bhavet / tadanena bhavatyamalaṃ surasaṃ sasugandhi guṇairaparaiśca yutam // 9033	toṭaka [12: ssss]
kaluṣaṃ ca tavāhiteṣvakasmāt sitapaṅkeruhasodaraśri cakṣuḥ / patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ // 9034	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kaluṣaṃ madhuraṃ cāmbhaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatra sāṃpratam / anārjavajanasyeva kṛtakavyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 9035	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalerante bhaviṣyanti nararūpeṇa rākṣasāḥ / manuṣyān bhakṣayiṣyanti vittato na śarīrataḥ // 9036	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalerdoṣanidhe rājann asti hyeko mahān guṇaḥ / kīrtinādeva kṛṣṇasya muktabandhaḥ paraṃ vrajet // 9037.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalau karāle na sukhaṃ labheta pakṣadvayādeva virodhakāle / madhyasthatā pratyuta nindyate'pi samantato hā sa kale prabhāvaḥ // 9037.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalau kale khale mitre putre durvyasanānvite / taskareṣu pravṛddheṣu lubdhe rājñi dhanena kim // 9038	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalau gaṅgā kāśyāṃ tripuraharapuryāṃ bhagavatī praśastā devānāmapi bhavati sevyānudivasam / iti vyāso brūte munijanadhurīṇo harikathā- sudhāpānasvastho galitabhavabandho'tulamatiḥ // 9039	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kalau jagapatpatiṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvasraṣṭāramīśvaram / nārcayiṣyanti maitreya pākhaṇḍopahatā janāḥ // 9040	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kalau daśasahasreṣu haristyajati medinīm / tadardhaṃ jāhlavītoyaṃ tadardhaṃ grāmadevatāḥ // 9041.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalau yuge kalmaṣamānasānām anyatra dharme khalu nādhikāraḥ / rāmeti varṇadvayamādareṇa sadā japanmuktimupeti jantuḥ // 9041.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalkī kalkaṃ haratu jagataḥ sphūrjadūjaisvitejā vedocchedasphuritaduritadhvaṃsane dhūmaketuḥ / yenotkṣipya kṣaṇamasilatāṃ dhūmavat kalmaṣecchān mlecchān hatvā dalitakalinākāri satyāvatāraḥ // 9042	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kalpakṣoṇiruho'yamityanudinaṃ bhūmīsurairbhāvyase kāmo'sāviti kāminībhirabhitaścitte ciraṃ cintyase / śrīnārāyaṇa eva kevalamiti premṇā śriyā dhyāyase tvaṃ kālo'yamiti pratikṣitidharaireko'pyanekātmabhṛt // 9043	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalpatarukāmadogdhrī- cintāmaṇidhanadaśaṅkhānām / racito rajobharapayas tejaḥścāsāntarāmbaraireṣaḥ // 9044	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
kalpadrumaḥ kalpitameva sūte sā kāmadhuk kāmitameva dogdhi / cintāmaṇiścintitameva datte satāṃ hi saṅgaḥ sakalaṃ prasūte // 9045	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalpadrumān vigatavāñchajane sumerau ratnānyagādhasalile saritāmadhīśe / dhātrā śriyaṃ nidadhatā prakhaleṣu nityam atyujjvalaḥ khalu ghaṭe nihitaḥ pradīpaḥ // 9046	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kalpadrumāśca santaśca nārhanti samaśīrṣikām / arthināṃ prārthitāḥ pūrve phalantyanye svayaṃ yataḥ // 9047	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpadrumaiḥ kiṃ kanakācalasthaiḥ paropakārapratilambhaduḥsthaiḥ / varaṃ karīro marumārgavartī yaḥ pānthasārthaṃ kurute kṛtārtham // 9048	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kalpadrumo na jānāti na dadāti bṛhaspatiḥ / ayaṃ tu jagatījānir jānāti ca dadāti ca // 9049	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpadrumo'pi kāle na bhaved yadi phalapradaḥ / ko viśeṣas tadā tasya vanyairanyamahīruhaiḥ // 9050.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpadrorapi kalpadrur mahato'pi maṇermaṇiḥ / devānāmapi pūjyo'si kiyat te mama pūraṇam // 9050.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpayati yena vṛttiṃ sadasi ca sadbhiḥ praśasyate yena / sa guṇas tena guṇavatā vivardhanīyaśca rakṣyaśca // 9051.1	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kalpayedekaśaḥ pakṣa romaśmaśrukacānnakhān / na cātmadaśanāgreṇa svapāṇibhyāṃ ca nottamaḥ // 9051.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpavṛkṣaśikhareṣu saṃprati prasphuradbhiravikalpasundari / hārayaṣṭigaṇanāmivāṃśubhiḥ kartumudyatakutūhalaḥ śaśī // 9052	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
kalpasthāyi na jīvitam aiśvaryaṃ nāpyate ca yadabhimatam / lokas tathāpyakāryaṃ kurute kāryaṃ kimuddiśya // 9053	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kalpāntakrūrakeliḥ kratukadanakaraḥ kundakarpūrakāntiḥ krīḍan kailāsakūṭe kalitakumudinīkāmukaḥ kāntakāyaḥ / kaṅkālakrīḍanotkaḥ kalitakalakalaḥ kālakālīkalatraḥ kālindīkālakaṇṭhaḥ kalayatu kuśalaṃ ko'pi kāpāliko naḥ // 9054	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalpāntapavanā vāntu yāntu caikatvamarṇavāḥ / tapantu dvādaśādityā nāsti nirmanasaḥ kṣatiḥ // 9055	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpāntavāsasaṃkṣobhalaṅghitāśeśabhūbh ṛtaḥ / sthairyaprasādamaryādās tā eva hi mahodadheḥ // 9056	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalpānte krodhanasya tripuravijayinaḥ krīḍayā saṃcariṣṇoḥ kṛtvāpi prāṇijātairnijamukhakuharātithyamaprāptatṛpteḥ / digbhittīḥ prekṣya śūnyāḥ pralayajalanidhiprekṣitātmīyamūrti- grāsavyāsaktamoghaśramajanitaruṣaḥ pāntu vo garjitāni // 9057	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalpānte śamitatrivikramamahākaṅkālabaddhasphurac- cheṣasyūtanṛsiṃhapāṇinakharaprotādikolāmiṣaḥ / viśvaikārṇavatāviśeṣamuditau tau matsyakūrmāvubhau karṣan dhīvaratāṃ gato'syatu satāṃ mohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ // 9058.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalpyate kimiti karmaṇacintā- svedameduramidaṃ nijacetaḥ / paśyatāṃ nayati pūrvabhavāttaṃ puṇyameva bhuvanāni kimanyat // 9058.2	svāgatā [11: rnBgg]
kalyāṇaṃ kathayāmi kiṃ sahacari svaireṣu śaśvat purā yasyā nāma samīritaṃ muraripoḥ prāṇeśvarīti tvayā / sāhaṃ premabhidābhayāt priyatamaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi dūtaṃ prabhoḥ sandiṣṭāsmi na veti saṃśayavatī pṛcchāmi no kiṃcana // 9059	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kimadhikamito jīvanārthaṃ yadasmāl lūtvā vṛkṣānahaha dahasi mrātaraṅgārakāra / kiṃ tvetasminnaśanipiśunairātapairākulānām adhvanyānāmaśaraṇamaruprāntare ko'bhyupāyaḥ // 9060	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kalyāṇaṃ parikalpyatāṃ pikakule rohantu vāñchāptayo haṃsānāmudayo'stu pūrṇaśaśinaḥ stādbhadramindīvare / ityudbāṣyavadhūgiraḥ pratipadaṃ saṃpūrayantyāntike kāntaḥ prasthitikalpitopakaraṇaḥ sakhyā bhṛśaṃ vāritaḥ // 9061	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇaṃ bhagavatkathākathanataḥ kāvyaṃ vidhātuḥ kaves tasyaivāṅkatayā kvacid racayataḥ śṛṅgāravīrādikam / ko doṣo bhavitā yadatra kavitāśīlaiḥ samāśrīyate panthā vyāsavasuṃdharāśrutibhavagranthādiṣu prekṣitaḥ // 9062	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇaṃ bhavatāṃ yaśaḥ prasaratāṃ dharmaḥ sadā vardhatāṃ saṃpattiḥ prathatāṃ prajā praṇamatāṃ śatrukṣayo jāyatām / vākyaṃ saṃvadatāṃ vapuḥ prabhavatāṃ lakṣmīpatiḥ prīyatām āyus te śaradāṃ śataṃ vijayatāṃ dānāya dīrghāyuṣe // 9063	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇaṃ bhavate'stu kokilakulākalpāya yena śruti- krūrakroṣṭurutārditaṃ kalaravairviśvaṃ samāśvāsitam / atyantābhyasanābhyuditvarabṛhannādāvabodhollasa- cchabdabrahmarasānubhūtijanitānandaughaniṣyandibhiḥ // 9064	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsurmiladaṭaniyugasthāsnugīrvāṇabhogi- straiṇavyatyastakalpadrumanavasumanonāgahārāvalīni / nālīkāśliṣṭalakṣmīkaratalakamalodvāntamādhvīkadhārā- timyatphālekṣaṇāni tripuraharadhanurjyālatākarṣaṇāni// 9065	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalyāṇaṃ vo vidhattāṃ karaṭamadadhunīlolakallolamālā- kheladrolambakolāhalamukharitadikcakravālāntarālam / pratnaṃ vetaṇḍaratnaṃ satataparicalatkarṇatālapraroha- dvātaṅkūrājihīrṣādaravivṛtaphaṇāśṛṅgabhūṣābhujaṃgam // 9066	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalyāṇado bhaved vīre dhruvakaścandraśekharaḥ / dvidigvarṇapadaṃ yatra tripuṭe ca vidhīyate // 9067.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
drutadvandvaṃ laghudvandvaṃ tāle tripuṭasaṃjñake // 9067.2	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
kalyāṇapādapārāmaṃ śrutagaṅgāhimācalam / jñānāmbhojaraviṃ devaṃ vande śrījñānanandanam // 9067.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalyāṇabhāk sadā kārye sarvasaubhāgyavardhinī / yā khalvetādṛśī bhāryā sā devī na tu mānuṣī // 9068.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalyāṇamāvahatu naḥ kuhanāvarāho yasyāsthisīmni nikhilaṃ pratiromakūpam / ābhāti sapraṇayamudvahato dharitrīṃ svedābhidhāna iva sāttvikahāvabhedaḥ // 9068.2	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kalyāṇāmāvahatu vaḥ śivayoḥ śarīram ekaṃ yadīyamasitacchavikaṇṭhamūlam / vāmetare'pi kurute sitabhāsi bhāge prārabdhaśailatanayāpariṇāmaśaṅkām // 9069	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kalyāṇavāktvamiva kiṃ padamatra kāntaṃ sadbhūpates tvamiva kaḥ paritoṣakārī / kaḥ sarvadā vṛṣagatis tvamivātimātraṃ bhūtyāśritaḥ kathaya pālitasarvabhūtaḥ // 9070	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kalyāṇastu yathāśakti karoti saphalaṃ vacaḥ / śaṭhaḥ pakṣau calayati dvāvapyarthopalipsayā // 9071	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kalyāṇahitavān bhūpo gurūṇāṃ doṣaguptakaḥ / samamatiḥ sukhe duḥkhe samare cāpalāyitaḥ // 9072	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kulaśīleṣu sampanno nītidharmeṣu paṇḍitaḥ / tathaiva pūjyate rājā caturasraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 9073	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalyāṇāṅgarucānuraktamanasā tvaṃ yena saṃprārthyate yasyārthe sumukhi tvayā punarasutyāge'pi saṃnahyate / so'yaṃ sundari pañcabāṇaviśikhavyālīḍhadorantara- svairotpīḍitapīvarastanataṭas tvaddorlatāpañjare // 9074	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇānāṃ tvamasi mahasāṃ bhājanaṃ viśvasūrte dhuryāṃ lakṣmīmatha mayi bhṛśaṃ dhehi deva prasīda / yad yat pāpaṃ pratijahi jagannātha namnasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan bhūyase maṅgalāya // 9075	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kalyāṇānāṃ nidhānaṃ kalimalamathanaṃ pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ pātheyaṃ yan mumukṣoḥ sapadi parapadaprāptaye prasthitasya / viśrāmasthānamekaṃ kavivaravacasāṃ jīvanaṃ sajjanānāṃ bījaṃ dharmadrumasya prabhavatu bhavatāṃ bhūtaye rāmanāma // 9076	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalyāṇāni dadātu vo gaṇapatiryasmin nu tuṣṭe sati kṣodīyasyapi karmaṇi prabhavituṃ brahmāpi jihmāyate / jāte yaccaraṇapraṇāmasulabhe saubhāgyabhāgyodaye raṅkasyāṅkamanaṅkuśā niviśate devendralakṣmīrapi // 9077.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇāyabhavantu khaṇḍaparaśoḥ koṭīravāṭīruhāṃ vallīnāṃ valayāni velladuragaśreṇīni śoṇatviṣām / unmīlatkanakāravindakalikākiñjalkapuñjakṣarad- dhūlīdhūsarasiddhasindhulaharīsindūritendūni vaḥ // 9077.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kalyāṇi candanarasaiḥ pariṣicya gātraṃ dvitrāṇyahāni kathamapyativāhayethāḥ / aṅke nidhāya bhavatīṃ parirabhya dorbhyāṃ neṣyāmi sūryakiraṇānapi śītalatvam // 9078	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kalyāṇi pāṇipatitāni vinā vicāram etāni moktumucitāni na mauktikāni / guñjeti saṃjanayate yadiha bhramante hastāravindanayanotpalayoḥ prabhaiva // 9079	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me / eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi // 9080	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalyāṇollāsasīmā kalayatu kuśalaṃ kālameghābhirāmā kācit sāketadhāmā bhavagahanagatiklāntihāripraṇāmā / saundaryahrīṇakāmā dhṛtajanakasutāsādarāpāṅgadhāmā dikṣu prakhyātabhūmā diviṣadabhinutā devatā rāmanāmā // 9081	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kalyotthānaparā nityaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratā / susaṃmṛṣṭagṛhā caiva gośakṛtkṛtalepanā // 9082	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kallolakṣiptapaṅkatripuraharaśiraḥsvaḥsravantīmṛṇālaṃ karpūrakṣodajālaṃ kusumaśaravadhūsīdhubhṛṅgāranālam / etad dugdhābdhibandhorgaganakamalinīpatrapānīyabindor antas toṣaṃ na keṣāṃ kisalayati jaganmaṇḍanaṃ khaṇḍamindoḥ // 9083.1	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kallolacapalā lakṣmīḥ saṃgamāḥ svapnasannibhāḥ / vātyāvyatikarotkṣiptatūlatulyaṃ ca yauvanam // 9083.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kallolavellitadṛṣatparuṣaprahārai ratnānyamūni makarālaya māvamaṃsthāḥ / kiṃ kaustubhena vihito bhavato na nāma yācñāprasāritakaraḥ puruṣottamo'pi // 9084	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kallolasaṃcaladagādhajalairalolaiḥ kallolinīparivṛḍhaiḥ kimapeyatoyaiḥ / jīyāt sa jarjaratanurgirinirjharo'yaṃ yadvipruṣāpi tṛṣitā vitṛṣībhavanti // 9085	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kallolaiḥ sthagayan mukhāni kakubhāmabhraṃlihairambhasā kṣāreṇāpi divāniśaṃ jalanidhe garjan na viśrāmyasi / etatte yadi ghoranakranilayaṃ svādu vyadhāsyād vidhiḥ kiṃ kartāsi tadā na vedmi taralaiḥ svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ // 9086	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kallolairvikiratvasau girivarān velāvilāsotthitaiḥ śabdairvā badhirīkarotu kakubho dhattāṃ ca vistīrṇatām / pānthānāṃ ravitāpataptavapuṣāṃ tṛṣṇātirekacchidaḥ kiṃ sāmyaṃ pratanoḥ karotu saraso'pyabdhiḥ kṛtāḍambaraḥ // 9087	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kavayaḥ kavayantu tailabhuktāḥ sarasā eva parantu dākṣiṇātyāḥ / api locanacañcalā hariṇyo madirākṣyā na samāḥ kaṭākṣapātaiḥ // 9088	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
kavayaḥ kālidāsādyāḥ kavayo vayamapyamī / parvate paramāṇau ca vastutvamubhayorapi / 9089	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ / pramadāḥ kiṃ na kurvanti kiṃ na jalpanti madyapāḥ // 9090	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ / madyapāḥ kiṃ na jalpanti kiṃ na kurvanti yoṣitaḥ // 9091	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavayaḥ parituṣyanti netare kavisūktibhiḥ / nahyakūpāravat kūpā vardhante vidhukāntibhiḥ // 9092	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavalayati na cetas tasya dāridryaduḥkhaṃ na ca piśunajanoktiḥ karṇakaṇḍūṃ karoti / varakavikṛtagoṣṭhībandhagandhopabhoge ya iha madhu vamantīṃ kāvyacintāṃ karoti // 9093	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kavayati paṇḍitarāje kavayantyanye'pi vidvāṃsaḥ / nṛtyati pinākapāṇau nṛtyantyanye'pi bhūtavetālāḥ // 9094	udgīti (12, 15, 12, 18)
kavayo vada kutra kīdṛśāḥ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ viditaṃ samantataḥ / adhunā tava vairiyoṣitāṃ hṛdi tāpaḥ prabalo vihāya kāḥ // 9095.1	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
kavalayasi candradīdhitī- rnaviralamaśnāsi nūnamaṅgārān / adhikataramuṣṇamanayoḥ kimiha cakorāvadhārayasi // 9095.2	ajñātasamavṛtta [8: nslg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kavalitamiha nālaṃ kandalaṃ ceha dṛṣṭam iha hi kumudakośe pītamambhaḥ suśītam / iti viraṭati rātrau paryaṭantī taṭānte sahacaraparimuktā cakravākī varākī // 9096	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni paṇḍito vetti tadrasam / kāminīkucakāṭhinyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā // 9097	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni svādu jānāti paṇḍitaḥ / sundaryā api lāvaṇyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā // 9098	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaviḥ karoti padyāni lālayatyuttamo janaḥ / taruḥ prasūte puṣpāṇi marud vahati saurabham // 9099	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kaviḥ pitā poṣayati pālako rasikaḥ patiḥ / kavitāyuvaternūnaṃ sodarās tu vivekinaḥ // 9100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaviḥ sūyati kāvyāni hṛdā dadhati sajjanāḥ / sūte muktāḥ payorāśir vahanti taruṇīstanāḥ // 9101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavitākalanena kiṃ nṛpāṇāṃ yadi kavayo na labhanti pūrṇakāmāḥ / nayanena kimeṇalocanānāṃ yadi vakraṃ na vilokitā yuvānaḥ // 9102	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: ssjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kavitākundavikāsana- kṛtine vijitajanatānidāghāya / dalitoddāmāghāya praṇatiṃ kalayāmi māghāya // 9103	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kavitā vanitā kasya na modāya sacetasaḥ / rasa eva sadā tasyā narīnartīva sarvataḥ // 9104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavitvaṃ na śṛṇotyeva kṛpaṇaḥ kīrtivarjitaḥ / napuṃsakaḥ kiṃ kurute puraḥsthitamṛgīdṛśā // 9105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kavitvagānapriyavādasatyā- nyasyā vidhātā vyadhitādhikaṇṭham / rekhātrayanyāsamiṣādamīṣāṃ vāsāya so'yaṃ vibabhāja sīmāḥ // 9106	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kavitvaprodgumphaśravaṇakṛtajhampavyatikaraṃ ciraṃ yeṣāṃ svāntaṃ samajani nitāntaṃ rasavaśam / amīṣāṃ pīyūṣāpacitasurayoṣādharapuṭo- llasanmādhurye vā samudayati kiṃ vā ratirapi // 9107	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kavitvamārogyamatīva medhā strīṇāṃ priyatvaṃ kanakasya lābhaḥ / sarveṣu tathyaṃ svajaneṣu pūjā svargasthitānāṃ kila cihnametat // 9108.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kavitvaśaktirhi divo'vatīrṇā bhūmau sudhāsāra ivāryapuṇyāt / punargrahītuṃ nijavastu devāḥ samāgatāstat kavayaḥ samutkāḥ // 9108.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kavitve vāditvaṃ kanakakusume saurabhaguṇo dhanitve dātṛtvaṃ viṣamataruphale svādurasatā / kulīne saujanyaṃ mṛgamadarase rāgaracanā prabhutve vidvattvaṃ parabhṛtamukhe mānuṣavacaḥ // 9109.1	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnam anyatrāpi na duṣyati / mukhamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhaṃ kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // 9109.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavibhirnūpasevāsu citrālaṃkārahāriṇī / vāṇī veśyeva lobhena paropakaraṇīkṛtā // 9110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavimatiriva bahulohā sughaṭitacakrā prabhātaveleva / haramūrtiriva hasantī bhāti vidhūmānalopetā // 9111	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaviranuharati cchāyāṃ padamekaṃ pādamekamardhaṃ vā / sakalaprabandhahartre sāhasakartre namas tasmai // 9112	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaviramaraḥ kaviracalaḥ kavirabhinandaśca kālidāsaśca / anye kavayaḥ kapayaś cāpalamātraṃ padaṃ dadhati // 9113	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaviravimahotkarṣān harṣan prapañcaya pañcaṣān skhalasi rasane kiṃ vā sarvān pravaktumanīśvare / gaṇayati yadapyetān dhātā dināvalimālayā tadapi bhagavāneṣāmantaṃ kadāpi na vindati // 9114	hariṇī [17: nsmrslg]
kavirahitāḥ kavilāpā jāyante kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇāyaiva / saṃmukhagataḥ kaviścet bhavati kulapitāpi kavikulapitaiva // 9115	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kavireva kavervetti kāvyakarmaṇi kauśalam / śeṣāhireva jānāti bhuvo bhārasya niścayam // 9116.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavirbhāradvājo jagadavadhijāgrannijayaśā rasaśreṇīmarmavyavaharaṇahevākarasikaḥ / yadīyānāṃ vācāṃ rasikahṛdayollāsanavidhā- vamandānandātmā pariṇayati sandarbhamahimā // 9116.2	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kavivākyāmṛtatīrtha- snānaiḥ pūtā bhṛśaṃ yaśodehāḥ / yeṣāṃ ta eva bhūpā jīvanti mṛtā vṛthaivānye // 9117	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kavividyādurādharṣo yo rākṣasa ivāparaḥ / dakṣiṇastho labdhavarṇo vikhyātaḥ kavirākṣasaḥ // 9118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kaviṣu dadhatamutkarṣaṃ visphuradanavadyahṛdyavāgvarṣam / iha khalu khalapradharṣaṃ śrīharṣaṃ naumi harṣasaṃgharṣam // 9119	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kavihṛdayeṣvanasūyā kastūrīkardameṣvamālinyam / akṣāratā payodhā- vavanīpāleṣu pāṇḍityam // 9120	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kavīnāṃ ca budhānāṃ ca vadānyānāṃ ca yo guruḥ / nānāśāstracaṇaprajñaḥ śivanāthaḥ sa namyate // 9121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavīnāṃ mahatāṃ sūktair gūḍhārthāntarasūcibhiḥ / vidhyamānaśrutermābhūd durjanasya kathaṃ vyathā // 9122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavīnāṃ mānasaṃ naumi taranti pratibhāmbhasi / yatra haṃsavayāṃsīva bhuvanāni caturdaśa // 9123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavīnāṃ saṃtāpo bhramaṇamabhito durgatiriti trayāṇāṃpañcatvaṃ racayasi na tac citramadhikam / caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ vyaraci navatā vīra bhavatā dviṣatsenālīnābhayutamapi lakṣaṃ tvamakṛthāḥ // 9124	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kavīnāmagalad darpo nūnaṃ vāsavadattayā / śaktyeva pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ gatayā karṇagocaram // 9125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavīnduṃ naumi vālmīkiṃ yasya rāmāyaṇīṃ kathām / candrikāmiva cinvanti cakorā iva sādhavaḥ // 9126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kavīndrāṇāmāsan prathamataramevāṅgaṇabhuvaś caladbhṛṅgāsaṅgākulakarimadāmodamadhurāḥ / amī paścāt teṣāmupari patitā rudranṛpateḥ kaṭākṣāḥ kṣīrodaprasaraduruvīcīsahacarāḥ // 9127	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
kavīśvarāṇāṃ vacasāṃ vinodair nandanti vidyānidhayo na cānye / candropalā eva karaiḥ sudhāṃśor dravanti nānyā dṛṣadaḥ kadācit // 9128	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaverabhiprāyamaśabdagocaraṃ sphurantamārdreṣu padeṣu kevalam / vadadbhiraṅgaiḥ kṛtaromavikriyair janasya tūṣṇīṃ bhavato'yamañjaliḥ // 9129	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
kaśābhiriva haimībhir vidyudbhirabhitāḍitam / antaḥstanitanirghoṣaṃ savedanamivāmbaram // 9130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaśca pratyakṣamutsṛjya saṃśayasthamalakṣaṇam / āyatisthaṃ cared dharma kṣatrabandhuraniścitam // 9131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścic chastrāpātamūḍho'pavoḍhur labdhvā bhūyaścetanāmāhavāya / vyāvartiṣṭa krośataḥ sakhyuruccais tyaktaścātmā kā ca lokānuvṛttiḥ // 9132	śālinī [11: mttgg]
kaścit karābhyāmupagūḍhanālam ālolapatrābhihatadvirepham / rajobhirantaḥpariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāṃcakāra // 9133	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaścit kaṣṭaṃ kirati karakājālameko'timātraṃ garjatyeva kṣipati viṣayaṃ vaidyutaṃ vahnimanyaḥ / sūte vātaṃ javanamaparastena jānīhi tāvat kiṃ vyādatse vihaga vadanaṃ tatra tatrāmbuvāhe // 9134	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kaścit kasyacideva syāt suhṛd viśrambhabhājanam / padmaṃ vikāsayatyarkaḥ saṃkocayati kairavam // 9135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ śāpenāstaṃgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ / yakṣaścakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // 9136	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kaścit krandati kālakarkaśakarākṛṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ haṭhād utkṛṣṭaṃ tanayaṃ vilokya purataḥ putreti hā hā kvacit / kaścinnartakanartakīparivṛto nṛtyatyaho kutracic citraṃ saṃsṛtipaddhatiḥ prathayati prītiṃ ca kaṣṭaṃ ca naḥ // 9137	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaścit tarati kāṣṭhena sugambhīrāṃ mahānadīm / sa tārayati tat kāṣṭhaṃ sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate // 9138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścit tāvat tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā śaṅkito'pi vā / kṣitau vā yadi vā svarge yasya mṛtyur na vidyate // 9139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścit paṇyastrīṇāṃ vibhavopacitānyapuruṣayojanayā / vidadhāti smārādhana- madhanatvamupāgataḥ kāmī // 9140	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaścit pānthas tṛṣārtaḥ pathi tapaṛtau gamyamāno'nyapānthaṃ papracchānandalīno vada pathika kuto jahnukanyāpravāhaḥ / tenāsau śīghravācā pracalitamanasā vipravaryeṇa coce sūcyagre kūpaṣaṭkaṃ tadupari nagarī tatra gaṅgāpravāhaḥ // 9141	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kaścit pumān kṣipati māṃ prati rūkṣavākyaiḥ so'haṃ kṣamābharaṇametya mudaṃ prayāmi / śokaṃ vrajāmi punarevamayaṃ tapasvī cāritrataḥ skhalitavāniti mannimittam // 9142	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaścidāmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃśca nipiñcati / puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // 9143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścidāśrayasaundaryād dhatte śobhāmasajjanaḥ / pramadālocananyastaṃ malīmasamivāñjanam // 9144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhumutsahate pumān / yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo'nyatra dṛśyate // 9145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścid daivena saumitrai yoddhumutsahate saha / yasyeha vigrahopāyo na kathaṃcana vidyate // 9146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścid dviṣatkhaḍgahṛtottamāṅgaḥ sadyo vimānaprabhutāmupetya / vāmāṅgasaṃsaktasurāṅganaḥ svaṃ nṛtyatkabandhaṃ samare dadarśa // 9147	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaścid yathābhāgamavasthite'pi svasaṃniveśād vyatilaṅghinīva / vajrāṃśugarbāṅgulirandhramekaṃ vyāpārayāmāsa karaṃ kirīṭe // 9148	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaścid vācaṃ racayitumalaṃ śrotumevāparas tām kalyāṇī te matirubhayato vismayaṃ nas tanoti / na hyekasminnatiśayavatāṃ saṃnipāto guṇānām ekaḥ sūte kanakamupalas tatparīkṣākṣamo'nyaḥ // 9149	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
kaścin navaṃ pallavamādadāti kaścit prasūnāni phalāni kaścit / paraṃ karāle'sya nidāghakāle mūle na dātā salilasya kaścit // 9150	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaścin mālāsamaṃ mitraṃ kaścin mitraṃ tulāsamam / kaścin merusamaṃ mitraṃ kaścin mitraṃ mahīsamam // 9151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścinmūrcchāmetya gāḍhaprahāraḥ siktaḥ śītaiḥ śīkarairvāraṇasya / ucchaśvāsa prasthitā taṃ jighṛkṣur vyarthākūtā nākanārī mumūrccha // 9152	śālinī [11: mttgg]
kaś cumbati kulapuruṣo veśyādharapallavaṃ manojñamapi / cārabhaṭacauraceṭaka- naṭaviṭaniṣṭhīvanaśarāvam // 9153	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaśmīrān gantukāmasya mīraśāhākhyabhūpateḥ / śāhābuddīnabhūmīndraḥ prāhiṇoditi lekhakam // 9154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimevamaviśaṅkitaḥ śiśukuraṅga lolakramaṃ parikramitumīhase virama naiva śūnyaṃ vanam / sthito'tra gajayūthanāthamathanocchalacchoṇitac- chaṭāpaṭalabhāsurotkaṭasaṭābharaḥ kesarī // 9155.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
kaṣāyakaluṣo jīvo rāgarañjitamānasaḥ / caturgatibhavāmbhodhau bhinnanauriva sīdati // 9155.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyapaśubhirduṣṭairdharmakāmārthanāśa kaiḥ / śamamantrahatairyajñaṃ vidhehi vihitaṃ budhaiḥ // 9155.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyamuktaṃ kathitaṃ caritraṃ kaṣāyavṛddhāvupaghātameti / yadā kaṣāyaḥ śamameti puṃsas tadā caritraṃ punareti pūtam // 9156.1	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
kaṣāyarāgavacanaṃ vītarāgo'dharastava / vihāraḥ kaṇṭhadeśaśca dūti pravrajitāsi kim // 9156.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyavijaye saukhyam indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahe / jāyate paramotkṛṣṭam ātmano bhavabhedi yat // 9156.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyaviṣayārtānāṃ dehināṃ nāsti nirvūtiḥ / teṣāṃ ca virame saukhyaṃ jāyate paramādbhutam // 9156.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyaviṣayāhāratyāgo yatra vidhīyate / upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śeṣaṃ laṅghanakaṃ viduḥ // 9156.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyasaṅgau sahate na vṛttaṃ samārdracakṣurna dinaṃ ca reṇum / kaṣāyasaṅgau vidhunanti tena cāritravanto munayaḥ sadāpi // 9157.1	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kaṣāyān śatruvat paśyed viṣayān viṣavat tathā / mohaṃ ca paramaṃ vyādhim evamūcurvicakṣaṇāḥ // 9157.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyā viṣayā yogāḥ pramādāviratī tathā / mithyātvamārtaraudre cety aśubhaṃ prati hetavaḥ // 9157.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyāstannihantavyās tathā tatsahacāriṇaḥ / nokaṣāyāḥ śivaddhārā galībhūtā mumukṣubhiḥ // 9157.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣāyairupavāsaiśca kṛtāmullāghatāṃ nṛṇām / nijauṣadhakṛtāṃ vaidyo nivedya harate dhanam // 9158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ karmeti durmedhāḥ kartavyād vinivartate / na sāhasamanārabhya śreyaḥ samupalabhyate // 9159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ khalu mūrkhatvaṃ kaṣṭaṃ khalu yauvane ca dāridryam / kaṣṭādapi kaṣṭataraṃ paragṛhavāsaḥ pravāsaśca // 9160	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṣṭaṃ ca khalu mūrkhatvaṃ kaṣṭaṃ ca khalu yauvanam / kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ caiva paragehanivāsanam // 9161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ jīvati gaṇako gaṇikā kathakaśca sevako vaidyaḥ / divase divase maraṇaṃ parajanamanarañjanī vṛttiḥ // 9162	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṣṭaṃ naiva paristhite samudiyāt kāryeṣu no jātucit saṃjāyeta na cāpi tadvyatikarād bāhyādakiṃcitkarāt / kasmāccit khalu bhāvato'ntarabhavāt tvasmākamutpadyate prāṇasyaiva viśeṣato'ntaraśayād bhāvāt samujjṛmbhate // 9163	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kaṣṭaṃ vane nivasato'tra sadā narasya no kevalaṃ nijatanuprabhavaṃ bhavec ca / daivaṃ ca pitryamakhilaṃ na vibhāti kṛtyaṃ tasmād gṛhe nivasatātmahitaṃ pracintyam // 9164	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṣṭaṃ sāhasakāriṇi tava nayanārdhena so'dhvani spṛṣṭaḥ / upavītādapi vidito na dvijadehas tapasvī te // 9165	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kaṣṭaṃ hṛdi jvalati śokamayo mamāgnis te cakṣuṣī ca virahajvarajāgaruke / etanmano bhramati viṣvagasūṃs tathāpi tvaṃ paśyatohara iva smara hartukāmaḥ // 9166	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kaṣṭā vṛttiḥ parādhīnā kaṣṭo vāso nirāśrayaḥ / nirdhano vyavasāyaśca sarvakaṣṭā daridratā // 9167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭā vedhavyathā kaṣṭo nityaṃ ca vahanaklamaḥ / śravaṇānāmalaṃkāraḥ kapolasya tu kuṇḍalam // 9168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭe nopārjitaṃ vittaṃ helayā kvāpi nirgatam / kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi nirbhāgyo'haṃ bhuvastale // 9169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭo janaḥ kuladhanairanurañjanīyas tanno yaduktamaśivaṃ na hi tat kṣamaṃ te / naisargikī surabhiṇaḥ kusumasya siddhā mūrdhni sthitirna caraṇairavatāḍanāni // 9170.1	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kaṣṭopārjitamatra vittamkhilaṃ dyūte mayā yojitaṃ vidyā kaṣṭataraṃ guroradhigatā vyāpāritā kustutau / pāramparyasamāgatā ca vinayo vāmekṣaṇāyāṃ kṛtaḥ satpātre kimahaṃ karomi vivaśaḥ kāle'dya nedīyasi // 9170.2	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kastasya jīvitārthaḥ sati vibhave kaśca tasya puruṣārthaḥ / yo'rthinamabhimukhamāgatam anabhimukhaḥ san visarjayati // 9171	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kastāṃ nindati lumpati kaḥ smaraphalakasya barṇakaṃ mugdhaḥ / ko bhavati ratnakaṇṭakam amṛte kasyārucirudeti // 9172	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kastāvad balikarṇabhārgavamahādānapramāṇastavaḥ kaścāsau kurupāṇḍapāṇḍurayaśaḥ prastāvanāvistaraḥ / yāvad varṣati vīrasiṃhatanayo vṛṣṭīrimāḥ kāñcanīr dhārāḥ prāvṛṣi tāvadañjanarucirdhārā na dhārādharaḥ // 9173	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrikāṃ tṛṇabhujāmaṭavīmṛgāṇāṃ nikṣipya nābhiṣu cakāra ca tān vadhārhān / mūḍho vidhiḥ sakaladurjanalolajihvā- mūle sma nikṣipati cet sakalopakāraḥ // 9174	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kastūrikāṃ hariṇa muñca vanopakaṇṭhaṃ mā saurabheṇa kakubhaḥ surabhīkuruṣva / āstāṃ yaśo nanu kirātaśarābhighātāt trātāpi hanta bhavitā bhavato durāpaḥ // 9175	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kastūrikācandanakuṅkumāni saubhāgyacihnāni vilāsinīnām / prayāgamṛtsnātilakakriyaiva saubhāgyacihnaṃ vidhavālalāṭe // 9176	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kastūrikātilakamāli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim / prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudāmudārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni // 9177.1	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
kastūrikādikrayavikrayāṅgāṃ yadṛcchayā yadvipaṇiṃ gatānām / saurabhyamaṅgeṣu samagralagnam na hīyate pañcaṣamapyahāni // 9177.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kastūrikāmṛgāṇām aṇḍād gandhaguṇamakhilamādāya / yadi punarahaṃ vidhiḥ syāṃ khalajihvāyāṃ niveśayiṣyāmi // 9178	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kastūrī jāyate kasmāt ko hanti kariṇāṃ śatam / kiṃ kuryāt kātaro yuddhe mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyanam // 9179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastūrīti kimaṅga sāṃparimaladravyaṃ kimapyāmaraṃ peyā kiṃ na hi kīdṛśī mṛgadṛśāṃ śṛṅgāralīlāspadam / dhāryā kutra kucasthalīṣu kucayoḥ sthaulyaṃ tato hīyate kliṣṭaḥ kliśyati pakvaṇaiśca bahuśaḥ kastūrikāvikrayī // 9180	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrītilakaṃ tasyā janayati śobhāṃ bhruvorantaḥ / kodaṇḍamadhyalagnaṃ phalamiva pañceṣubāṇasya // 9181	ajñātasamavṛtta [10: nyyg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kastūrītilakaṃ bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru / adya sāmyaṃ bhajāmīti jṛmbhate śaśalāñchanaḥ // 9182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastūrītilakaṃ bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru / kalaṅkaśaṅkayā rāhur grasiṣyati tavānanam // 9183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastūrītilakaṃ lalāṭaphalake vakṣaḥsthale kaustubhaṃ nāsāgre navamauktikaṃ karatale veṇuṃ kare kaṅkaṇam / sarvāṅge haricandanaṃ ca kalayan kaṇṭhe ca muktāvaliṃ gopastrīpariveṣṭato vijayate gopālacūḍāmaṇiḥ // 9184	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrītilakaṃ lalāṭaracitaṃ nāsāmaṇiṃ nistalaṃ vaktraṃ kuñcitakeśapāśamaniśaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nisṛṣṭāṃ puraḥ / puṃsāṃ mānasamatsyabandhanavidhau dhatse'tra vatse svayaṃ jambūvajjalabinduvajjalajavajjambālavajjālavat // 9185	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrītilakanti bhālaphalake devyā mukhāmbhoruhe rolambanti tamālabālamukulottaṃsanti mauliṃ prati / yāḥ karṇe vikacotpalanti kucayoraṅke ca kālāguru- sthāsanti prathayantu tās tava śivaṃ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhatviṣaḥ // 9186	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrīyanti bhāle tadanu nayanayoḥ kajjalīyanti karṇa- prānte nīlotpalīyantyurasi marakatālaṃkṛtīyanti devyāḥ / romālīyanti nābherupari harimaṇīmekhalīyanti madhye kalyāṇaṃ kuryurete trijagati purajitkaṇṭhabhāsāṃ vilāsāḥ // 9187	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kastūrīvarapatrabhaṅganikaro bhraṣṭo na gaṇḍasthale no luptaṃ sakhi candanaṃ stanataṭe dhautaṃ na netrāñjanam / rāgo na skhalitas tavādharapuṭe tāmbūlasaṃvardhitaḥ kiṃ ruṣṭāsi gajendramattagamane kiṃ vā śiśus te patiḥ // 9188	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūrī sitimānamāgatavatī śauklyaṃ gatāḥ kuntalā nīlaṃ colamabhūt sitaṃ dhavalimā jāto maṇīnāṃ gaṇe / dhvāntaṃ śāntamabhūt samaṃ narapate tvatkīrticandrodaye trailokyeṅpyabhisārasāhasarasaḥ śāntaḥ kuraṅgīdṛśām // 9189.1	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kastūryā tatkapoladvayabhuvi makarīnirmitau prastutāyāṃ nirmitsūnāṃ svavakṣasyatiparicayanāt tvatpraśastīrupāṃśu / vīra śrīsiṃhabhūpa tvadahitakubhujāṃ rājyalakṣmīsapatnī- mānavyājena lajjāṃ sapadi vidadhate svāvarodhe pragalbhāḥ // 9189.2	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kas te śaśāṅka mohaḥ sudhākaro'haṃ na ko'pi madbhinnaḥ / kiṃ nanu paśyasi nijabhā- jayi vanitāyā mukhaṃ mūḍha // 9190	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kas te śauryamado yoddhuṃ tvayyekaṃ saptimāsthite / saptasaptisamāruḍhā bhavanti paripanthinaḥ // 9191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
kas tvaṃ kṛṣṇamavehi māṃ kimiha te manmandirāśaṅkayā yuktaṃ tannavanītabhājanapuṭe nyastaḥ kimarthaṃ karaḥ / kartuṃ tatra pipīlikāpanayanaṃ suptāḥ kimudbodhitā bālā vatsagatiṃ vivektumiti saṃjalpan hariḥ pātu vaḥ // 9192	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ ko'pi kuto'si ratnavasatestīrādahaṃ nīradher labdhaṃ kiṃcana garjitairbadhiratā dṛgvyāhatiḥ saikataiḥ / mā khedaṃ kuru tādṛgaurvadahanajvālāvalīduḥsahaṃ kṣārodaṃ yadupāsya jīvasi sakhe ślāghyaṃ na tan manyase // 9193	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ ko'haṃ kuta āyātaḥ kā me jananī ko me tātaḥ / iti paribhāvaya sarvamasāraṃ sarvaṃ tyakvā svapnavicāram // 9194	āryāgīti (12, 20, 12, 20)
kas tvaṃ tāsu yadṛcchayā kitava yāstiṣṭhanti gopāṅganāḥ premāṇaṃ na vidanti yās tava hare kiṃ tāsu te kaitavam / eṣā hanta hatāśayā yadabhavaṃ tvayyekatānā paraṃ tenāsyāḥ praṇayo'dhunā khalu mama prāṇaiḥ samaṃ yāsyati // 9195	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ pītāṃbaro'haṃ kimu vadasi mṛṣā cāṃbaraṃ kena pītaṃ mugdhe kaṃsasya śatruḥ śiva śiva sālilaṃ sasyavairi kva dṛṣṭam / mallāsyadhvaṃsano'haṃ kimiti nijamaho lāsyamadhvaṃsi ceti vyāhārairvallavīnāṃ niśi bhavatu mude'nuttaraḥ śrīpatirvaḥ // 9196	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kas tvaṃ brahma nnapūrvaḥ kva ca tava vasati ryākhilā brahmasṛṣṭiḥ kas te nātho hyanāthaḥ kva ca tava janako naiva tātaṃ smarāmi / kiṃ te'bhīṣṭaṃ dadāmi tripadaparimitā bhūmi ralpaṃ kimetat trailokyaṃ bhāvagarbhaṃ balimidamavadad vāmano vaḥ sa pāyāt // 9197	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kas tvaṃ brahmann apūrvas tvadanucarajano nāstyanātho'hamekaḥ kiṃ dadyāmīpsitaṃ te tripadaviharaṇasthānametat kiyatte / trailokyaṃ tad dvijātermama śamaniratasyeti sammūḍhabhāvā viṣṇorvācaḥ surārau kṛtakapaṭapadanyāsamugdhāḥ punantu // 9198	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
kastvaṃ bhadra khaleśvaro'ham iha kiṃ ghore vane sthīyate śārdūlādibhireva hiṃsrapaśubhiḥ bhojyo'hamityāśayā / kasmāt kaṣṭamidaṃ tvayā vyavasitaṃ maddehamāmsāśinaḥ pratyutpannanṛmāṃsabhakṣaṇadhiyaste ghnantu sarvānnarān // 9199	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate / vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevate na cchāyāpi paropakārakaraṇe mārgasthitasyāpi me // 9200	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ bhoḥ kavirasmi tat kimu sakhe kṣīṇo'sya nāhārato dhig deśaṃ guṇino'pi durmatiriyaṃ deśaṃ na māmeva dhik / pākārthī kṣudhito yadaiva vidadhe pākāya duddhiṃ tadā vindhye nendhanamambudhau na salilaṃ nānnaṃ dharitrītale // 9201	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
kas tvaṃ bho niśi keśavaḥ śirasijaiḥ kiṃ nāma garvāyase bhadre śaurirahaṃ guṇaiḥ rpitṛgataiḥ putrasya kiṃ syādiha / cakrī candramukhi prayacchasi na me kuṇḍīṃ ghaṭīṃ dehinīm itthaṃ gopavadhūhṛtottaratayā duḥstho hariḥ pātu vaḥ // 9202	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
